My face is non religious! 898 00:55:28,767 --> 00:55:30,041 This is amazing. 899 00:55:30,100 --> 00:55:33,172 No matter what the religion they make you wear the cap. 900 00:55:34,667 --> 00:55:36,874 Who is it? - I think, the priest is here. 901 00:55:37,467 --> 00:55:38,605 The priest? 902 00:55:38,667 --> 00:55:40,613 That's the surprise. - What? 903 00:55:41,267 --> 00:55:45,113 Amit would like you to learn about religion from the priest. 904 00:55:45,467 --> 00:55:47,469 It will be useful, when you have to meet Swamiji. 905 00:55:47,533 --> 00:55:49,240 Listen to me... - It's okay. 906 00:55:49,734 --> 00:55:53,375 Oh, God! This is a terrible surprise. 907 00:55:53,434 --> 00:55:57,382 Aren't you the same man? I am true, but not right. 908 00:55:57,434 --> 00:56:00,574 No! Don't misunderstand. 909 00:56:00,667 --> 00:56:03,147 I am true and I am right! 910 00:56:03,234 --> 00:56:06,238 I am fine, all over. Everywhere. - Yes. 911 00:56:07,833 --> 00:56:10,973 Om. -Om. 912 00:56:11,200 --> 00:56:14,738 So, let's start with the first lesson. Say, Shree Ganeshay Namah. 913 00:56:14,800 --> 00:56:16,245 Shree Ganeshay Namah. 914 00:56:16,800 --> 00:56:18,939 First, we must perform the cleansing. 915 00:56:19,000 --> 00:56:22,209 So, you need to close your eyes and nose and drink this. Go on. 916 00:56:26,267 --> 00:56:27,769 What is this? - Drink it up. 917 00:56:33,700 --> 00:56:35,805 What is that? - It's cow urine. 918 00:56:36,267 --> 00:56:37,712 Cow urine? - Yes. 919 00:56:38,000 --> 00:56:40,207 It's essential to cleanse your inner soul. 920 00:56:40,767 --> 00:56:43,714 If you go out and eat anything else, you must cleanse yourself, again. 921 00:56:44,100 --> 00:56:46,376 Come on, focus. Say after me. 922 00:56:46,700 --> 00:56:49,579 Om. -Om... 923 00:56:49,934 --> 00:56:51,811 Now, we will perform Wazu. - Wazu. 924 00:56:51,900 --> 00:56:54,471 Cleaning, as in ablutions. - I saw it on the CD. 925 00:56:54,533 --> 00:56:56,740 Yes! How is it to be done? 926 00:56:57,067 --> 00:57:00,844 Rinse the mouth, cleaning of mouth and face. 927 00:57:00,900 --> 00:57:03,744 And then, the arms. - Like that. 928 00:57:03,933 --> 00:57:05,674 The prayer mat has been set out. 929 00:57:05,734 --> 00:57:10,046 Place both hands behind your ears, like this. 930 00:57:11,900 --> 00:57:14,039 Alright? Then... 931 00:57:15,934 --> 00:57:17,311 ...do this. 932 00:57:17,800 --> 00:57:19,746 This is called the intention to pray. 933 00:57:19,933 --> 00:57:21,913 The intention to pray. - Yes. 934 00:57:23,900 --> 00:57:26,278 (Arabic prayers) 935 00:57:28,634 --> 00:57:30,636 (Arabic prayers) 936 00:57:31,500 --> 00:57:37,507 (Arabic prayers) 937 00:57:40,400 --> 00:57:44,542 Dad, why are you looking at them so intently? 938 00:57:44,900 --> 00:57:47,380 I am just looking at how he does that. 939 00:57:47,834 --> 00:57:49,040 The prayers? 940 00:57:49,133 --> 00:57:51,135 Yes, that's right. The prayers, the veneration. The ritual. 941 00:57:51,234 --> 00:57:53,043 I wanted to see how they perform it. 942 00:57:53,200 --> 00:57:55,180 Come on, sit. Let me drop you to college. 943 00:57:55,267 --> 00:57:57,713 Dad, it is 6 in the evening... 944 00:57:57,934 --> 00:57:59,538 College is out. 945 00:57:59,600 --> 00:58:02,479 I am going to go home. - That's what I said. Sit. 946 00:58:02,567 --> 00:58:04,103 Come on. 947 00:58:04,200 --> 00:58:07,875 (Arabic prayers) 948 00:58:09,700 --> 00:58:11,008 I can't do this. 949 00:58:12,934 --> 00:58:15,972 I can't do this. It's fine right up to the intention to pray. 950 00:58:16,033 --> 00:58:18,980 But, saying the words is hard. 951 00:58:19,034 --> 00:58:20,775 No, you can do it! You can do it. 952 00:58:20,867 --> 00:58:22,540 What you have to do is... 953 00:58:22,633 --> 00:58:24,271 ...when you are standing in the mosque... 954 00:58:24,333 --> 00:58:28,076 ...then, you follow what the man before you does. 955 00:58:28,867 --> 00:58:30,175 Follow the leader. 956 00:58:30,767 --> 00:58:32,075 Follow. - Follow. 957 00:58:32,600 --> 00:58:34,978 Now go down like this. Don't stop. 958 00:58:35,034 --> 00:58:37,776 Nothing to be said, right? - No, nothing! 959 00:58:38,767 --> 00:58:41,373 Hey! What are you doing? - What? 960 00:58:42,400 --> 00:58:45,210 It's really dusty, I'm getting rid of it. 961 00:58:45,567 --> 00:58:47,240 It's all so dusty! 962 00:58:47,534 --> 00:58:49,514 I just don't understand him, now. 963 00:58:52,400 --> 00:58:54,880 You know those fakirs who carry peacock feathers? 964 00:58:54,967 --> 00:58:57,243 They throw up the clouds of loban (frankincense) smoke. 965 00:58:57,534 --> 00:58:59,639 What should I do about them? Touch their feet? 966 00:58:59,734 --> 00:59:01,111 No! 967 00:59:01,434 --> 00:59:04,608 Islam forbids it. You can't touch someone's feet. 968 00:59:04,700 --> 00:59:06,702 You don't bow down to anyone. 969 00:59:07,200 --> 00:59:10,704 But, if you feel an intense desire... 970 00:59:11,100 --> 00:59:12,807 ...then, you must greet the person first. 971 00:59:13,334 --> 00:59:14,540 And then... 972 00:59:14,700 --> 00:59:16,737 ...you may kiss the person's hand. 973 00:59:17,067 --> 00:59:18,512 What do you mean? 974 00:59:18,700 --> 00:59:20,805 I mean, you kiss. 975 00:59:21,900 --> 00:59:23,436 Kiss! Then why don't you say that? 976 00:59:23,534 --> 00:59:25,639 Why are you making it sound so heavy? 977 00:59:25,734 --> 00:59:27,407 That's how it is said. 978 00:59:27,500 --> 00:59:29,241 Here, you hold the hand like this. 979 00:59:29,334 --> 00:59:31,905 Yes, right! - Kissing. - Kiss it. 980 00:59:32,600 --> 00:59:34,204 Hello. - Salamalaikum. 981 00:59:34,533 --> 00:59:35,910 Salam. 982 00:59:36,634 --> 00:59:38,113 Greetings. - Greetings. 983 00:59:38,167 --> 00:59:39,737 Greetings. - Yes. 984 00:59:39,800 --> 00:59:41,575 Do come in. - Come in. 985 00:59:42,367 --> 00:59:44,847 Repeat after me. As you stride along.. 986 00:59:45,134 --> 00:59:46,807 You walk the world... 987 00:59:46,900 --> 00:59:47,970 Listen carefully. 988 00:59:48,034 --> 00:59:49,638 As you stride along... 989 00:59:49,734 --> 00:59:51,111 As you walk... 990 00:59:51,167 --> 00:59:53,613 As you stride along, lighting up the path... 991 00:59:53,700 --> 00:59:54,974 Lighting up the... 992 00:59:55,067 --> 00:59:56,444 Lighting... 993 00:59:56,900 --> 01:00:00,973 Joseph and... 994 01:00:02,967 --> 01:00:04,378 What is this tongue twister? 995 01:00:05,567 --> 01:00:07,478 Say it right! 996 01:00:07,800 --> 01:00:10,576 Tongue twister. - Tongue twister. 997 01:00:10,634 --> 01:00:12,136 This is just a waste of time. 998 01:00:12,234 --> 01:00:14,180 No! You did it again! 999 01:00:14,234 --> 01:00:17,340 You have to enunciate right. 1000 01:00:17,767 --> 01:00:20,748 Alright. - Like that. 1001 01:00:20,967 --> 01:00:23,345 That's it. - Okay. 1002 01:00:24,100 --> 01:00:26,239 Repeat after me. Resident of Kailash and Kashi... 1003 01:00:27,167 --> 01:00:28,612 Resident of Khailash and Khashi... 1004 01:00:28,667 --> 01:00:30,112 What's wrong with your throat? 1005 01:00:30,534 --> 01:00:33,777 Say it clearly, enunciate properly. 1006 01:00:33,833 --> 01:00:36,177 Don't pronounce it with Kh. - Kh... 1007 01:00:36,367 --> 01:00:39,541 K...the residents of Kailash and Kashi. - Kailash.. 1008 01:00:39,600 --> 01:00:41,739 And go down on the knees. - No speaking, right? 1009 01:00:41,800 --> 01:00:44,041 No! On your knees. 1010 01:00:44,134 --> 01:00:46,580 Bend, bow. 1011 01:00:47,267 --> 01:00:51,443 Look, this is the complete bow. Do this. 1012 01:00:53,267 --> 01:00:54,837 What are you doing? 1013 01:00:54,900 --> 01:00:56,402 This is the standing bow. 1014 01:00:56,467 --> 01:00:57,969 Bow as you stand. 1015 01:00:58,067 --> 01:00:59,478 I am standing on my legs and I'm bowing. 1016 01:00:59,534 --> 01:01:01,172 A standing bow. 1017 01:01:01,267 --> 01:01:02,974 Why don't you read it? 1018 01:01:04,867 --> 01:01:07,143 When Joseph and his comrades... 1019 01:01:07,400 --> 01:01:09,107 When Joseph and his comrades... 1020 01:01:09,200 --> 01:01:11,043 ...left the ship to embark on the island... 1021 01:01:11,100 --> 01:01:13,307 ...the cruel Jalaal stood there leering... 1022 01:01:13,367 --> 01:01:14,937 ...while standing tied up in chains. 1023 01:01:16,467 --> 01:01:18,140 That's a lot of emphasis. 1024 01:01:18,234 --> 01:01:19,474 Doesn't it hurt your throat? 1025 01:01:20,500 --> 01:01:21,535 A drink! 1026 01:01:21,633 --> 01:01:24,113 Striding along, lighting up the path... 1027 01:01:24,167 --> 01:01:27,080 Lighting... 1028 01:01:27,134 --> 01:01:28,772 Sir, please pay attention first. - Yes. 1029 01:01:28,867 --> 01:01:30,107 Striding along, lighting up the path. 1030 01:01:30,167 --> 01:01:31,475 Striding along... 1031 01:01:31,534 --> 01:01:33,775 Striding along, lighting up the path. 1032 01:01:33,867 --> 01:01:36,473 Brandishing the trident and the crescent moon... 1033 01:01:36,533 --> 01:01:38,410 Don't chatter. Don't talk nonsense. 1034 01:01:38,467 --> 01:01:41,175 Go and wash your face in a dirty water canal. 1035 01:01:41,233 --> 01:01:43,736 What are you... I'm going. - Get going! 1036 01:01:43,834 --> 01:01:45,745 Get going! - I'm leaving. - Dharam! 1037 01:01:45,800 --> 01:01:47,507 I am leaving. 1038 01:01:47,567 --> 01:01:50,741 I will never come back! He's insane! 1039 01:01:52,767 --> 01:01:54,576 Hello, may I speak to Dr. Chunnawala? 1040 01:01:54,900 --> 01:01:56,573 Yes, from your psychiatry department. 1041 01:02:25,833 --> 01:02:28,575 Get back a bit. Scoot back! 1042 01:02:32,667 --> 01:02:34,772 Sir, please move a bit forward. 1043 01:02:35,367 --> 01:02:36,573 A bit more. 1044 01:02:51,600 --> 01:02:53,011 Here you are. 1045 01:02:55,500 --> 01:02:57,070 Eat it. 1046 01:02:57,167 --> 01:03:00,011 I am being religious for you. Eat up. - No. 1047 01:03:00,234 --> 01:03:03,113 You promise like a politician and forget it, later. 1048 01:03:03,167 --> 01:03:05,477 What did I forget? - You haven't been to the ashram since two days. 1049 01:03:05,567 --> 01:03:07,478 My son, I have to go to the market early in the morning. 1050 01:03:07,567 --> 01:03:09,706 You can't get fresh produce after 9 AM. 1051 01:03:09,767 --> 01:03:10,905 No, it's an excuse. 1052 01:03:10,967 --> 01:03:12,378 Come with me to the ashram today. 1053 01:03:12,467 --> 01:03:13,741 Neeleshwarji will be there. 1054 01:03:13,800 --> 01:03:16,041 At least greet him. Baba! 1055 01:03:16,134 --> 01:03:19,445 Listen! - He must see you attend the veneration. 1056 01:03:19,700 --> 01:03:22,112 Higher. - Wait till the veneration is complete. 1057 01:03:22,167 --> 01:03:24,238 Please? - That's right! 1058 01:03:24,434 --> 01:03:26,778 That's right. Keep it right there. 1059 01:03:28,500 --> 01:03:30,446 Hello? - Assalam alaikum. 1060 01:03:31,000 --> 01:03:33,844 I am calling from the Khwaja Garib Nawaz sanatorium. - Yes. 1061 01:03:33,934 --> 01:03:36,915 I thought, I should tell you your dad is unwell. 1062 01:03:37,267 --> 01:03:39,406 What do you mean? - He's critical" 1063 01:03:39,800 --> 01:03:42,440 You mean, he is really ill. - Yes, he is. 1064 01:03:42,900 --> 01:03:45,141 Then, I will come there, Ali Bhai. - No, listen to me. 1065 01:03:45,200 --> 01:03:46,907 Yes? - Come during prayers. 1066 01:03:46,967 --> 01:03:48,503 He should not find out. 1067 01:03:48,567 --> 01:03:50,046 He won't know. 1068 01:03:50,367 --> 01:03:52,005 What is it? - What? 1069 01:03:52,500 --> 01:03:54,104 It's a call from the shop. 1070 01:03:54,300 --> 01:03:55,677 So, you're not staying for the veneration? 1071 01:03:55,767 --> 01:03:57,872 I will attend the evening veneration, okay? 1072 01:03:57,934 --> 01:03:59,379 Dad, is there any problem? 1073 01:03:59,467 --> 01:04:01,743 It's nothing, it's just about the business. 1074 01:04:02,033 --> 01:04:03,569 Why don't you go? 1075 01:04:03,667 --> 01:04:06,978 That's right. Keep it right there. 1076 01:05:04,133 --> 01:05:07,580 Listen, Lord, I am at your abode. 1077 01:05:08,334 --> 01:05:13,079 At least let me meet my dad, now. Please? Atleast once. 1078 01:05:22,500 --> 01:05:23,979 Salam alaikum. 1079 01:05:27,500 --> 01:05:28,945 Walaikum salam. 1080 01:05:29,034 --> 01:05:30,445 Shame on you! 1081 01:05:30,500 --> 01:05:32,980 How could you be so rude while praying? 1082 01:05:33,034 --> 01:05:34,707 You lied in the abode of the Lord! 1083 01:05:34,800 --> 01:05:35,972 Get him out of here, right now. 1084 01:05:36,034 --> 01:05:38,480 Listen to me, my dad doesn't have much time. 1085 01:05:38,567 --> 01:05:40,513 Let me meet him. - The law is the law. 1086 01:05:40,600 --> 01:05:42,602 A non Muslim can't go in and that's that. 1087 01:05:42,667 --> 01:05:44,647 Take him away! - You know I am a Muslim. 1088 01:05:44,700 --> 01:05:46,008 I am a born Muslim. 1089 01:05:46,067 --> 01:05:47,774 Sir, you know it. Sir... 1090 01:05:48,400 --> 01:05:50,038 lam a Muslim, sir! - Come on. 1091 01:05:52,800 --> 01:05:54,040 Alright, fine. 1092 01:06:25,867 --> 01:06:28,040 Amit, what are you saying? - Mom, it's true! 1093 01:06:28,134 --> 01:06:29,613 I saw Dad myself. 1094 01:06:29,667 --> 01:06:32,671 He was standing outside the mosque amongst the Muslims wearing the cap. 1095 01:06:32,734 --> 01:06:35,271 For the sake of my father and my son... 1096 01:06:35,367 --> 01:06:37,278 ...and the Holy Spirit, Amen. 1097 01:06:37,367 --> 01:06:40,871 Oh, God, forgive them, for they know not what I do. 1098 01:06:41,734 --> 01:06:43,077 What is going on, Dharam? 1099 01:06:43,134 --> 01:06:45,774 Amit said, you went to the mosque. 1100 01:06:45,834 --> 01:06:47,575 And you were behaving like a proper Muslim! 1101 01:06:47,667 --> 01:06:50,147 I even went to church. He didn't see that. 1102 01:06:51,100 --> 01:06:54,104 Jesus never fails. But, has he passed? 1103 01:06:54,167 --> 01:06:56,204 Dad, why are you doing this? 1104 01:06:56,400 --> 01:06:59,779 For the sake of my father, my son and the Holy Spirit, dear. 1105 01:06:59,834 --> 01:07:03,839 I would like to ask God, Allah, the Almighty. 1106 01:07:03,900 --> 01:07:07,143 If you are one, why are there so many variations? 1107 01:07:07,200 --> 01:07:09,009 Why these different departments? 1108 01:07:09,400 --> 01:07:10,936 Due to your identification... 1109 01:07:11,000 --> 01:07:13,276 ...competition has been caused in your creation. 1110 01:07:13,367 --> 01:07:15,745 I want solution for this confusion. 1111 01:07:15,800 --> 01:07:18,610 Please! Please, give me a solution... - Listen! 1112 01:07:18,667 --> 01:07:20,340 ...to this confusion! Please! 1113 01:07:20,400 --> 01:07:23,006 This is an action or an opinion of an inadequate reason. 1114 01:07:23,067 --> 01:07:24,569 And this is all because of you, Amit. 1115 01:07:24,667 --> 01:07:26,772 Ever since you forced him to be religious... 1116 01:07:26,833 --> 01:07:28,210 ...dad has become like this. 1117 01:07:28,267 --> 01:07:29,746 I talked to Dr. Chunawala. 1118 01:07:29,800 --> 01:07:32,007 He said, just leave him alone. It will be alright. 1119 01:07:32,100 --> 01:07:34,205 So, just stop harassing him. 1120 01:07:35,867 --> 01:07:38,108 Hail Lord Shiva. 1121 01:07:38,400 --> 01:07:39,743 Come, sister. 1122 01:07:40,100 --> 01:07:42,512 Your horoscope is excellent. 1123 01:07:42,833 --> 01:07:45,814 But, there is some unrest at present. 1124 01:07:46,300 --> 01:07:49,372 Saturn has adversely aspected the seventh house. 1125 01:07:49,434 --> 01:07:52,381 So, you could have problems with your husband. 1126 01:07:53,100 --> 01:07:55,273 What kind of problems, priest? 1127 01:07:55,600 --> 01:07:57,204 Please explain. 1128 01:07:57,700 --> 01:07:59,805 I mean, is it work, money... - Sister... 1129 01:07:59,867 --> 01:08:01,710 ...there are other spheres apart from these. 1130 01:08:01,800 --> 01:08:03,279 Such as the sphere of moral character. 1131 01:08:04,300 --> 01:08:05,745 Character? 1132 01:08:06,267 --> 01:08:08,247 Are you saying, there's another woman? 1133 01:08:08,300 --> 01:08:09,643 Hail Lord Shiva! 1134 01:08:09,700 --> 01:08:12,237 Another woman? Or perhaps another... 1135 01:08:13,400 --> 01:08:15,812 The trouble is in the seventh house. 1136 01:08:15,867 --> 01:08:17,972 The problem is, that being a man, the first house... 1137 01:08:18,067 --> 01:08:20,069 ...he is involved with a male planet. 1138 01:08:20,134 --> 01:08:22,614 Don't ask me any more and put me in a moral dilemma. 1139 01:08:23,000 --> 01:08:25,412 In fact, focus on your husband's... 1140 01:08:25,467 --> 01:08:27,208 ...strange behavior. 1141 01:08:28,467 --> 01:08:31,744 Priest, can't anything be done about this? 1142 01:08:32,267 --> 01:08:33,541 Listen. 1143 01:08:34,834 --> 01:08:37,075 I have stopped solving such problems, these days. 1144 01:08:37,167 --> 01:08:39,147 Alright, then. Bless you. 1145 01:09:20,034 --> 01:09:21,377 What are you looking at? 1146 01:09:22,700 --> 01:09:25,647 I am doing something important. You won't understand. 1147 01:09:25,967 --> 01:09:27,640 I know it very well! 1148 01:09:27,734 --> 01:09:29,839 What's going on with you and Mehmood. 1149 01:09:29,933 --> 01:09:31,344 I know all about it. 1150 01:09:32,967 --> 01:09:34,378 Who told you? 1151 01:09:34,934 --> 01:09:36,607 What has to be said about that? 1152 01:09:36,667 --> 01:09:38,305 Can't I see it? 1153 01:09:38,400 --> 01:09:42,212 I have watched you scale the wall to disgrace yourself. 1154 01:09:43,634 --> 01:09:46,478 Indu, I was going to tell you, but... 1155 01:09:46,934 --> 01:09:48,845 How could I tell you? 1156 01:09:49,767 --> 01:09:51,246 Oh, Goddess! 1157 01:09:52,667 --> 01:09:54,476 Why did this happen to me? 1158 01:09:54,700 --> 01:09:57,010 Why was I fated to deal with this? 1159 01:09:57,867 --> 01:09:59,244 Go away. 1160 01:09:59,334 --> 01:10:00,779 Leave and go to Mehmood! 1161 01:10:00,834 --> 01:10:03,371 You like him, right? Just go to him. 1162 01:10:04,234 --> 01:10:07,545 What? I like Mehmood? 1163 01:10:10,234 --> 01:10:11,975 Are you insane? 1164 01:10:12,300 --> 01:10:13,973 What do you mean, I like him? 1165 01:10:14,167 --> 01:10:16,238 I am not gay, you fool! 1166 01:10:16,967 --> 01:10:20,073 I am straight, straight as an arrow. 1167 01:10:20,567 --> 01:10:22,843 Why do go to meet him on the sly, then? 1168 01:10:23,267 --> 01:10:24,405 For you. 1169 01:10:24,467 --> 01:10:26,242 To Mehmod's place? - Yes. 1170 01:10:26,634 --> 01:10:30,207 We are going to celebrate our 25th wedding anniversary after a week. 1171 01:10:30,934 --> 01:10:34,279 I want to take you on a honeymoon. 1172 01:10:34,367 --> 01:10:37,007 It will be even more awesome than the first time around. 1173 01:10:38,067 --> 01:10:41,412 Why do you have to visit Mehmood at home for that? 1174 01:10:42,500 --> 01:10:44,741 I have to! 1175 01:10:44,834 --> 01:10:48,179 He has some Yunani medicines. 1176 01:10:48,234 --> 01:10:50,771 It adds to a man's vitality. Okay? 1177 01:10:50,934 --> 01:10:53,005 Yes, so, you could go about it the regular way. 1178 01:10:53,267 --> 01:10:56,111 Why scale the wall? - I wanted to surprise you! 1179 01:10:56,167 --> 01:10:59,171 To surprise you, I'd scale his wall... 1180 01:10:59,267 --> 01:11:01,907 ...as well as the Great Wall of China, too! 1181 01:11:02,501 --> 01:11:04,606 Swear to me. - It's true. 1182 01:11:04,700 --> 01:11:06,543 I want proof. - Don't believe me? 1183 01:11:06,600 --> 01:11:09,308 Promise me. - One moment. 1184 01:11:12,567 --> 01:11:16,379 First, use and then believe it. Come along. 1185 01:11:18,501 --> 01:11:19,878 Don't laugh! 1186 01:11:19,934 --> 01:11:21,914 It was a narrow escape. 1187 01:11:23,234 --> 01:11:24,907 Once the Maulvi agrees... 1188 01:11:24,967 --> 01:11:27,709 ...I will meet my dad and this charade will stop. 1189 01:11:28,800 --> 01:11:32,247 You overruled my idea of going to court. 1190 01:11:32,300 --> 01:11:35,076 If you hadn't done that, that wretched clergyman... 1191 01:11:35,134 --> 01:11:36,943 ...would have been set right in no time. 1192 01:11:37,000 --> 01:11:38,536 What do you think? 1193 01:11:38,600 --> 01:11:41,547 Am I ready to meet him? - Yes. 1194 01:11:42,100 --> 01:11:46,276 Your Muslim customs, formalities, etiquettes, life... 1195 01:11:46,334 --> 01:11:49,110 ...have I imbibed all of that? 1196 01:11:49,167 --> 01:11:51,113 You're alight. - Okay. 1197 01:11:51,200 --> 01:11:54,010 But, don't pronounce etiquettes with a slur. 1198 01:11:57,701 --> 01:12:00,113 What is this? - ...to celebrate the aqiqah... 1199 01:12:00,167 --> 01:12:02,340 Great! He is my client. 1200 01:12:02,434 --> 01:12:04,505 Mr. Akbar Zariwala. 1201 01:12:04,600 --> 01:12:07,080 It is an invite to an aqiqah (ritual after child's birth). 1202 01:12:07,334 --> 01:12:08,369 Come with me. 1203 01:12:08,467 --> 01:12:11,311 It's experience on the ground and you will learn from it. 1204 01:12:11,601 --> 01:12:13,137 What's an aqiqah? 1205 01:12:13,234 --> 01:12:15,646 You will know, when you get there. 1206 01:12:16,967 --> 01:12:19,846 Don't get me into trouble. - No! Aqiqah. 1207 01:12:20,000 --> 01:12:22,071 Aqiqah, ' Aqiqah, 1208 01:12:22,267 --> 01:12:24,611 Aqiqah! Forget it. 1209 01:12:24,867 --> 01:12:26,608 Salam alaikum. How are you? 1210 01:12:26,667 --> 01:12:28,510 You've arranged everything very well. - Yes. 1211 01:12:29,200 --> 01:12:31,077 I believe you've opened a new shop. 1212 01:12:31,667 --> 01:12:33,305 God has been kind. 1213 01:12:33,467 --> 01:12:35,003 Did you hear about Rafique? 1214 01:12:35,067 --> 01:12:36,944 Where is your aunt? 1215 01:12:37,300 --> 01:12:40,042 Amazing! - Thank you. 1216 01:12:40,334 --> 01:12:42,109 Assalam alaikum. - Walaikum salam. 1217 01:12:42,200 --> 01:12:43,474 All well? 1218 01:12:43,534 --> 01:12:45,844 Salam alaikum, Sir. - Walaikum salam. All well? 1219 01:12:45,900 --> 01:12:46,970 God is kind. - Alright. 1220 01:12:47,034 --> 01:12:48,877 This is a special friend of mine. 1221 01:12:48,934 --> 01:12:50,072 A very close and dear friend. 1222 01:12:50,167 --> 01:12:52,010 Do take very good care of him. 1223 01:12:52,067 --> 01:12:53,512 Of course. 1224 01:12:53,601 --> 01:12:54,875 This is Ejaz. - Hello. 1225 01:12:54,934 --> 01:12:56,379 This is Sahir. 1226 01:12:58,134 --> 01:12:59,670 I will be back. - Hello. 1227 01:12:59,900 --> 01:13:00,776 I'll be right back. 1228 01:13:01,767 --> 01:13:03,940 So, Sir... - Hello, ma'am. 1229 01:13:04,000 --> 01:13:06,378 Kids these days ask the most weird questions. 1230 01:13:06,434 --> 01:13:09,005 It is difficult to answer them. - Yes. 1231 01:13:09,434 --> 01:13:12,904 Just yesterday my son was saying... 1232 01:13:12,967 --> 01:13:15,675 ...that, if you can't perform Wazu... 1233 01:13:15,767 --> 01:13:17,269 ...will the prayer be accepted? 1234 01:13:17,367 --> 01:13:19,347 Now tell me, what should I say? 1235 01:13:28,867 --> 01:13:30,972 It hurts to sit like this. 1236 01:13:31,801 --> 01:13:36,079 No, those who find it tough to sit in this posture... 1237 01:13:36,134 --> 01:13:38,705 ...they have another option. Yes. 1238 01:13:38,767 --> 01:13:41,270 They can sit on a chair and perform their prayers. 1239 01:13:41,367 --> 01:13:43,574 The intention has to be pure. - Right. 1240 01:13:44,767 --> 01:13:48,943 You can perform prayers while sitting in a chair. 1241 01:13:49,534 --> 01:13:51,138 What? - Yes. 1242 01:13:51,201 --> 01:13:53,181 Make sure your intentions are good. 1243 01:13:53,234 --> 01:13:55,407 If you are good, then anything is good for you. 1244 01:13:55,600 --> 01:13:58,206 Wonderful! - Well said. 1245 01:13:58,300 --> 01:13:59,973 Amazing. - You bet. 1246 01:14:01,534 --> 01:14:04,572 I don't know you. lam Shahzeb Khan. 1247 01:14:04,667 --> 01:14:06,510 What's your good name? 1248 01:14:07,100 --> 01:14:08,738 Sharif Khan. 1249 01:14:09,801 --> 01:14:12,543 You seem to be wise and learned man. 1250 01:14:12,634 --> 01:14:15,513 Tell me, is it a sin to grow one's hair? 1251 01:14:22,000 --> 01:14:23,104 Mom! 1252 01:14:24,701 --> 01:14:26,942 What does your mom say about this? 1253 01:14:29,467 --> 01:14:32,471 She says, if it is 0k, so be it. 1254 01:14:32,534 --> 01:14:34,980 Because, heaven is at her feet. 1255 01:14:35,067 --> 01:14:38,344 Wonderful! - Well said. 1256 01:14:38,601 --> 01:14:40,080 Sir, tell me. 1257 01:14:40,134 --> 01:14:42,614 Which is the true path to heaven? 1258 01:14:44,767 --> 01:14:46,110 Where do you live? 1259 01:14:46,434 --> 01:14:48,812 There is a road which goes left from Kalawar... 1260 01:14:48,900 --> 01:14:51,107 ...that's the road to my humble abode. 1261 01:14:51,167 --> 01:14:54,910 That's it, that's the road to heaven. 1262 01:14:55,534 --> 01:14:59,004 The road to your home is the road to heaven. 1263 01:14:59,067 --> 01:15:02,207 Well said! - Wonderful! - Great! 1264 01:15:02,267 --> 01:15:03,905 Amazing. - Come this way. 1265 01:15:04,001 --> 01:15:06,038 Sir, this is my wife. 1266 01:15:06,301 --> 01:15:07,837 This is our dear princess. 1267 01:15:08,134 --> 01:15:09,477 Bless her, please. 1268 01:15:10,934 --> 01:15:12,504 How can I bless her? 1269 01:15:14,134 --> 01:15:17,980 Yes! What's true is right. 1270 01:15:18,734 --> 01:15:20,338 Well said! - Amazing. 1271 01:15:20,434 --> 01:15:22,539 What is true is right. 1272 01:15:22,634 --> 01:15:24,409 Amazing, well said. 1273 01:15:25,900 --> 01:15:27,072 Come, let's have dinner. 1274 01:15:27,134 --> 01:15:28,875 Let's begin with God's grace, don't say let's eat. 1275 01:15:28,934 --> 01:15:31,881 Beautiful! - This way, please. 1276 01:15:31,967 --> 01:15:33,446 Come along. - This way. 1277 01:15:37,934 --> 01:15:41,040 The beard is off. You're happy. 1278 01:15:41,734 --> 01:15:44,408 But, I swear, at the party... 1279 01:15:44,501 --> 01:15:47,141 ...you were the center of attraction. 1280 01:15:47,567 --> 01:15:49,240 God saved me. 1281 01:15:49,500 --> 01:15:51,070 Tell me something. 1282 01:15:51,434 --> 01:15:53,539 You left me with strangers. 1283 01:15:53,600 --> 01:15:55,477 Why were you chasing that lady? 1284 01:15:55,534 --> 01:15:57,878 No! Don't get me wrong. 1285 01:15:58,067 --> 01:16:00,570 She's not a stranger. - Who is she, then? 1286 01:16:01,234 --> 01:16:04,238 She is my wife. She left me to stay with her family. 1287 01:16:04,434 --> 01:16:06,744 God! I am sorry. 1288 01:16:06,800 --> 01:16:08,575 I had no idea. Sorry. 1289 01:16:09,734 --> 01:16:12,544 Do you think, I will pass this test? 1290 01:16:12,600 --> 01:16:16,207 Of course! You were amazing. 1291 01:16:16,267 --> 01:16:19,612 If you can repeat it for that wretched clergyman... 1292 01:16:19,667 --> 01:16:21,340 ...we will win the battle. 1293 01:16:22,034 --> 01:16:23,377 Say amen to that. 1294 01:16:23,634 --> 01:16:25,045 Amen. - Amen to that. 1295 01:16:33,534 --> 01:16:37,346 Zia-uhhaq... 1296 01:16:38,467 --> 01:16:39,878 Mehmood. - Yes. 1297 01:16:41,534 --> 01:16:43,172 Hello. 1298 01:16:43,934 --> 01:16:45,845 Hello. - Hello. 1299 01:16:45,900 --> 01:16:47,277 Sit down, please. 1300 01:16:47,534 --> 01:16:48,808 Sir. 1301 01:16:50,601 --> 01:16:52,774 Tell me. -Sir... 1302 01:16:53,334 --> 01:16:58,750 ...I am Mehmood Nazeem Ali Shah Khan Bahadur. 1303 01:16:59,100 --> 01:17:00,101 Wonderful. 1304 01:17:00,167 --> 01:17:03,671 I am connected to the royal family of the kingdom of Junagadh. 1305 01:17:03,767 --> 01:17:05,178 That is wonderful. 1306 01:17:05,467 --> 01:17:08,004 Dharampal Trivedi is my dear friend. 1307 01:17:08,101 --> 01:17:09,136 Hello. - Sit. 1308 01:17:09,201 --> 01:17:12,307 By a mere coincidence, your president... 1309 01:17:12,734 --> 01:17:16,011 ...Saeed lmtiaz Hussein is also my dear friend. 1310 01:17:16,500 --> 01:17:18,207 We were just playing polo the day before yesterday. 1311 01:17:18,267 --> 01:17:19,974 For God's sake. 1312 01:17:20,667 --> 01:17:24,308 He passed away two years ago. 1313 01:17:25,067 --> 01:17:27,547 It's an old plaque, you see? 1314 01:17:27,800 --> 01:17:30,508 May God grant him heavenly peace. 1315 01:17:30,767 --> 01:17:32,974 He still visits me in dreams. 1316 01:17:33,067 --> 01:17:36,344 I was playing polo with him in my dreams yesterday. 1317 01:17:41,467 --> 01:17:47,179 Sir, I am a complete Muslim, now. 1318 01:17:47,667 --> 01:17:50,011 My friend has been very dedicated... 1319 01:17:50,100 --> 01:17:52,273 ...and embraced Islam. 1320 01:17:53,367 --> 01:17:56,348 But, don't worry. I will find out in my own way. 1321 01:17:56,734 --> 01:17:57,940 Of course. 1322 01:17:58,000 --> 01:18:01,311 I am sure, you know the five must dos for Muslims. 1323 01:18:02,134 --> 01:18:03,807 Five? - Duties? 1324 01:18:03,867 --> 01:18:05,403 Five, yes. 1325 01:18:08,434 --> 01:18:10,209 The Kalma. - Very good. 1326 01:18:10,867 --> 01:18:12,244 Namaz. 1327 01:18:14,867 --> 01:18:16,141 Roza. 1328 01:18:16,934 --> 01:18:18,242 Jakaat. 1329 01:18:18,734 --> 01:18:19,906 Haj. 1330 01:18:19,967 --> 01:18:21,947 Five. Haj. - Very good! 1331 01:18:22,000 --> 01:18:23,240 Well done. 1332 01:18:24,067 --> 01:18:25,705 Recite the first Kalma, please. 1333 01:18:26,034 --> 01:18:28,947 (Arabic prayers) 1334 01:18:29,401 --> 01:18:30,903 The first Kalma. - Go for it. 1335 01:18:31,000 --> 01:18:33,310 Yes, no problem. It's been said. - The Kalma. 1336 01:18:33,634 --> 01:18:37,639 Keep reciting the Kalma and don't bother about the results. 1337 01:18:38,400 --> 01:18:40,437 But I am worried. 1338 01:18:41,234 --> 01:18:42,679 About your father. 1339 01:18:43,301 --> 01:18:45,508 You may leave. Good bye. 1340 01:18:45,934 --> 01:18:48,278 What are you saying? - Yes. 1341 01:18:48,334 --> 01:18:50,314 Yes, this is wrong. 1342 01:18:50,400 --> 01:18:52,437 This is very wrong! It's a crime. 1343 01:18:52,500 --> 01:18:54,639 No one can be forced... 1344 01:18:54,700 --> 01:18:56,338 ...to become a Muslim! 1345 01:18:56,400 --> 01:18:58,175 Mehmood! - This has to be said. 1346 01:18:58,234 --> 01:19:01,477 A son has every right to meet his father. 1347 01:19:01,567 --> 01:19:03,569 Mehmood! -And if you steal his right... 1348 01:19:03,634 --> 01:19:06,342 ...then, under section 239 of the Indian Penal Code... 1349 01:19:06,400 --> 01:19:08,175 Mehmood! Stop! - ...and section 340... 1350 01:19:08,234 --> 01:19:10,145 ...you could be dragged to court for this. 1351 01:19:11,334 --> 01:19:13,143 Really? So you brought your lawyer with you. 1352 01:19:13,400 --> 01:19:14,572 No, we are old friends. 1353 01:19:14,634 --> 01:19:16,671 Mehmood Nazeem Ali Shah etc, etc... 1354 01:19:16,767 --> 01:19:18,440 ...whatever your name is, you are a lawyer. 1355 01:19:18,534 --> 01:19:19,808 Yes, Sir. 1356 01:19:20,067 --> 01:19:22,069 Take him to court and let him fight for his rights. 1357 01:19:22,167 --> 01:19:24,943 No! I... - But, by the time the hearing comes up... 1358 01:19:25,000 --> 01:19:28,209 ...your father will be dead and gone. 1359 01:19:30,067 --> 01:19:31,842 Sit down! Let me speak. 1360 01:19:33,167 --> 01:19:35,204 Don't listen to him. 1361 01:19:35,834 --> 01:19:38,678 Just let me meet my father... 1362 01:19:38,767 --> 01:19:40,405 ...let me meet my dad. 1363 01:19:40,500 --> 01:19:41,843 Good bye. 1364 01:19:51,734 --> 01:19:53,543 He won't give in easily. 1365 01:19:54,034 --> 01:19:57,481 Let's do one thing. Sign a legal affidavit. 1366 01:19:57,567 --> 01:19:59,069 I will handle the rest of it. 1367 01:19:59,900 --> 01:20:03,905 You'll see, within two days... 1368 01:20:03,967 --> 01:20:05,173 ...your dad and he... 1369 01:20:05,234 --> 01:20:07,373 ...will land up at your doorstep. 1370 01:20:07,467 --> 01:20:08,571 I promise you... 1371 01:20:08,634 --> 01:20:11,046 ...I will change my name if I can't. - No! 1372 01:20:11,601 --> 01:20:14,411 I have heard you say your name a thousand times, enough! 1373 01:20:15,167 --> 01:20:18,376 I told you, I don't want to go to court. 1374 01:20:20,234 --> 01:20:22,407 This is all your fault. 1375 01:20:23,000 --> 01:20:24,775 Because of me? - You bet! 1376 01:20:25,134 --> 01:20:27,774 If you weren't rude to him, we wouldn't be in this situation. 1377 01:20:28,167 --> 01:20:30,078 Are you fighting with me over that wretched clergyman? 1378 01:20:30,167 --> 01:20:31,737 With your friend? 1379 01:20:31,934 --> 01:20:35,780 This is too much! I have done so much for your friendship. 1380 01:20:36,000 --> 01:20:39,914 I taught you, out of my love for you. I tutored you. 1381 01:20:39,967 --> 01:20:41,605 I mentored you and you? 1382 01:20:41,701 --> 01:20:44,011 An immature friend is a pain in the neck. 1383 01:20:45,101 --> 01:20:46,808 With a friend like you... 1384 01:20:46,900 --> 01:20:49,039 ...who needs enemies? 1385 01:20:49,234 --> 01:20:51,077 Great! 1386 01:20:52,000 --> 01:20:53,775 Cheat! Traitor! 1387 01:20:56,100 --> 01:20:57,579 What happened? - Get out. 1388 01:20:58,567 --> 01:20:59,910 What? 1389 01:21:01,067 --> 01:21:02,808 Out here? - Yes, here. 1390 01:21:02,867 --> 01:21:04,346 Right here, right now. 1391 01:21:07,200 --> 01:21:08,941 He's back on track. 1392 01:21:10,000 --> 01:21:11,343 He betrayed me. 1393 01:21:11,800 --> 01:21:15,213 And how? In the middle of the road, outside the city limits. 1394 01:21:15,300 --> 01:21:16,870 My grandma was right! 1395 01:21:16,934 --> 01:21:19,005 You people can't be loyal to anyone! 1396 01:21:19,100 --> 01:21:21,671 And you people can't be grateful to anyone. 1397 01:21:21,767 --> 01:21:23,041 You people are ungrateful! 1398 01:21:23,100 --> 01:21:25,944 Your clan is treacherous, it runs in your blood. 1399 01:21:26,167 --> 01:21:29,774 All the wars in the world boil down to you! 1400 01:21:30,034 --> 01:21:32,378 Whether it is Hindus, Christians, or Jews. 1401 01:21:32,467 --> 01:21:33,969 It doesn't matter who the other party is... 1402 01:21:34,034 --> 01:21:36,105 ...the first party is always your people! 1403 01:21:37,234 --> 01:21:39,111 You have no idea... 1404 01:21:39,434 --> 01:21:41,607 ...what problems a minority community faces? 1405 01:21:41,700 --> 01:21:43,077 Minority. 1406 01:21:43,434 --> 01:21:46,677 When you don't get your rights, it sets off a fire. 1407 01:21:47,267 --> 01:21:48,678 You can't get homes. 1408 01:21:48,734 --> 01:21:50,111 You can't find jobs. 1409 01:21:50,200 --> 01:21:52,976 Every other person considers us to be terrorists. 1410 01:21:53,067 --> 01:21:54,375 Why? 1411 01:21:54,467 --> 01:21:56,811 Didn't we... 1412 01:21:57,034 --> 01:21:59,036 ...participate in building this country... 1413 01:21:59,134 --> 01:22:01,614 ...and in setting it free? 1414 01:22:01,667 --> 01:22:04,204 How can we prove that we are patriotic, too? 1415 01:22:04,267 --> 01:22:06,042 To challenge that... 1416 01:22:06,134 --> 01:22:08,637 ...I came alone, to live in your colony. 1417 01:22:08,701 --> 01:22:10,544 And if I had not been a lawyer, I swear to God... 1418 01:22:10,634 --> 01:22:13,410 ...you would have thrown me out, with dishonor! 1419 01:22:13,867 --> 01:22:17,076 Not onto the highway, or out of the city but, out of this country! 1420 01:22:18,467 --> 01:22:19,810 Good bye. 1421 01:22:37,867 --> 01:22:39,141 What's the matter? 1422 01:22:39,401 --> 01:22:40,539 Shraddha! 1423 01:22:42,201 --> 01:22:45,876 Amit, why do you keep calling me to check on the lighting? 1424 01:22:46,167 --> 01:22:48,010 I really miss you. 1425 01:22:48,267 --> 01:22:50,269 It's no use, now. 1426 01:22:50,734 --> 01:22:52,179 It's too late. 1427 01:22:53,467 --> 01:22:54,775 What happened? 1428 01:22:56,267 --> 01:22:59,339 Amit, I tried to stop Dad. 1429 01:22:59,400 --> 01:23:02,074 But, you've been dithering so much! 1430 01:23:02,134 --> 01:23:04,136 You wasted a lot of time. 1431 01:23:05,134 --> 01:23:07,512 Now, Vyas Uncle has convinced dad. 1432 01:23:09,301 --> 01:23:12,475 I am going to marry Vivek, Amit. 1433 01:23:15,334 --> 01:23:19,305 And dad is going to announce it on the day of appearance. 1434 01:23:21,767 --> 01:23:24,179 So, forget about me. - It's not possible! 1435 01:23:24,600 --> 01:23:25,908 I will die! 1436 01:23:26,734 --> 01:23:29,476 I turned religious for you, but, dad? 1437 01:23:30,867 --> 01:23:33,347 I don't know what he is always up to. 1438 01:23:35,534 --> 01:23:38,174 I am going to kill myself. - Please, Amit. 1439 01:23:38,967 --> 01:23:40,275 Shraddha! 1440 01:23:43,100 --> 01:23:45,603 Only a miracle will help us to get married, now. 1441 01:23:50,334 --> 01:23:51,506 A miracle? 1442 01:23:51,567 --> 01:23:55,014 Come close to the screen, devotees. 1443 01:23:55,067 --> 01:23:57,946 Neelanand Swami has a special message... 1444 01:23:58,034 --> 01:24:00,412 ...which is going to be telecast. - Hail! 1445 01:24:00,467 --> 01:24:02,538 Hail Neelanand Maharaj! - Hail! 1446 01:24:02,634 --> 01:24:04,875 Hail Neelanand Maharaj! - Hail! 1447 01:24:05,267 --> 01:24:08,874 I am really sad... 1448 01:24:08,934 --> 01:24:12,108 ...to inform you... 1449 01:24:12,367 --> 01:24:17,544 ...that, yesterday in Hyderabad outside a mosque... 1450 01:24:18,067 --> 01:24:22,277 ...some Muslims beat up two of the Neel servitors. 1451 01:24:22,667 --> 01:24:23,338 What? 1452 01:24:23,434 --> 01:24:28,076 They burnt their headgear. - Burnt it? Oh, God! 1453 01:24:28,134 --> 01:24:33,140 I will ensure that the culprits are punished. 1454 01:24:34,267 --> 01:24:38,215 All the devotees should... 1455 01:24:38,267 --> 01:24:44,115 ...protest peacefully outside the District Administrator's office. 1456 01:24:44,201 --> 01:24:46,442 I command you to do so! 1457 01:24:49,900 --> 01:24:53,609 Today, religion is in a crisis. 1458 01:24:53,667 --> 01:24:56,443 It is calling to you. 1459 01:24:56,534 --> 01:24:59,674 If you don't protect your religion today... 1460 01:24:59,767 --> 01:25:02,976 ...then, your existence will be destroyed. 1461 01:25:03,034 --> 01:25:07,005 Go and show them what we are capable of. 1462 01:25:07,234 --> 01:25:10,613 Show them, what we are capable of. 1463 01:25:10,667 --> 01:25:13,944 The one who combats Neelanand... - Will be crushed! 1464 01:25:14,000 --> 01:25:17,641 The one who combats Neelanand... - Will be crushed! 1465 01:25:24,200 --> 01:25:25,975 Oh, God. 1466 01:25:29,234 --> 01:25:31,475 Oh, God. 1467 01:25:34,601 --> 01:25:36,274 Salam. 1468 01:25:37,467 --> 01:25:40,880 Dad! - One moment, I'm in the washroom. I'll be there. 1469 01:25:42,267 --> 01:25:44,975 Dad, I have had enough. - Yes, it is enough. 1470 01:25:45,034 --> 01:25:48,140 What is too much? - Whatever is too much! 1471 01:25:48,201 --> 01:25:50,545 Stop joking! What kind of a man are you? 1472 01:25:50,767 --> 01:25:53,077 I am wondering about that myself. 1473 01:25:53,167 --> 01:25:54,578 You don't care about me. 1474 01:25:54,634 --> 01:25:56,079 Shraddha is getting married the day after. 1475 01:25:56,134 --> 01:25:57,943 And you haven't done squat for me so far. 1476 01:25:58,034 --> 01:26:00,139 Either you go to the mosque or you dress like a Christian priest. 1477 01:26:00,201 --> 01:26:01,908 I don't know what you're up to! 1478 01:26:01,967 --> 01:26:04,811 Vyas Uncle hounded Mr. Pandya and now... 1479 01:26:04,901 --> 01:26:07,006 ...he is getting Vivek married to Shraddha. 1480 01:26:07,100 --> 01:26:08,602 And I couldn't do a thing about it. 1481 01:26:09,034 --> 01:26:10,707 You promised me! 1482 01:26:11,100 --> 01:26:14,013 I will never marry and I will never forgive you for this. 1483 01:26:14,100 --> 01:26:17,013 Hey!
