01:42:36,400 --> 01:42:39,920
Moreover they will marry two
weeks later at London.

1361
01:42:40,000 --> 01:42:42,040
They will settle there permanently.

1362
01:42:43,600 --> 01:42:44,720
Are you serious?

1363
01:42:45,960 --> 01:42:49,360
It means Anuj is ready to marry
her after all that happened.

1364
01:42:50,200 --> 01:42:51,200
Yes!

1365
01:42:52,200 --> 01:42:54,640
This girl must have performed well.

1366
01:42:54,720 --> 01:42:56,680
Do something before she
runs away from India.

1367
01:42:56,880 --> 01:42:58,160
We don't have much time.

1368
01:42:59,680 --> 01:43:00,920
Kavita, hold on.

1369
01:43:01,240 --> 01:43:02,720
Sir, I wanted your signature.

1370
01:43:03,760 --> 01:43:04,760
It's urgent.

1371
01:43:08,960 --> 01:43:11,440
Okay. Who told you?

1372
01:43:12,000 --> 01:43:15,280
Anuj Mathur's dad had come to
invite my Hotel's promoter.

1373
01:43:15,880 --> 01:43:18,000
Luckily I was present there.
So I heard them speaking.

1374
01:43:20,360 --> 01:43:22,200
Is someone present there?
- Yes.

1375
01:43:22,880 --> 01:43:24,600
If you want we can talk later.

1376
01:43:29,080 --> 01:43:32,520
Alright.
I will call you later. Bye.

1377
01:43:37,000 --> 01:43:39,040
Is there a problem?

1378
01:43:40,200 --> 01:43:42,280
There's no problem Mr. Sahil Mehra.

1379
01:43:47,040 --> 01:43:48,040
Sahil?

1380
01:43:48,320 --> 01:43:51,440
Yes.
You can keep your neck straight.

1381
01:43:53,640 --> 01:43:57,360
I alerted myself when
you spoke of quality.

1382
01:43:58,600 --> 01:44:01,560
Surya never spoke of quality.
He spoke of only money.

1383
01:44:02,000 --> 01:44:03,480
I doubted you earlier.

1384
01:44:04,360 --> 01:44:06,400
Today you confirmed it.

1385
01:44:07,040 --> 01:44:08,480
You did your signatures.

1386
01:44:10,920 --> 01:44:12,040
Oh no!

1387
01:44:15,480 --> 01:44:16,920
Where is Surya?

1388
01:44:18,800 --> 01:44:20,320
At Shimla Mental Asylum.

1389
01:44:21,760 --> 01:44:24,400
Asylum? What do you mean?

1390
01:44:24,800 --> 01:44:27,560
Please don't tell anyone anything.
Please!

1391
01:44:28,560 --> 01:44:31,360
I always felt you are innocent.

1392
01:44:31,960 --> 01:44:33,600
You can't kill anyone.

1393
01:44:34,880 --> 01:44:36,320
But I couldn't do much.

1394
01:44:37,040 --> 01:44:38,680
I had no evidence.

1395
01:44:38,800 --> 01:44:40,480
Don't worry. I'll do something.

1396
01:44:40,560 --> 01:44:43,440
Three years ago when that
girl did the act...

1397
01:44:43,720 --> 01:44:45,480
I tried to help you.

1398
01:44:46,080 --> 01:44:47,680
But Surya found out.

1399
01:44:52,440 --> 01:44:55,960
You were my father's servant.
Remain a servant.

1400
01:44:56,720 --> 01:44:58,680
Don't try to enter the family.

1401
01:44:59,960 --> 01:45:02,600
Hereafter if you try
to talk to Sahil.

1402
01:45:03,360 --> 01:45:06,160
I will do exactly the same thing
what I did to my father.

1403
01:45:07,160 --> 01:45:10,160
And your state will
be just like Sahil.

1404
01:45:16,480 --> 01:45:19,960
I am pleased that rascal
is in that asylum now.

1405
01:45:20,440 --> 01:45:21,680
And you are free.

1406
01:45:23,520 --> 01:45:25,720
Sorry! I couldn't do much for you.

1407
01:45:27,120 --> 01:45:30,560
But if I can do something
for you...

1408
01:45:31,160 --> 01:45:32,760
don't hesitate to tell me.

1409
01:45:36,320 --> 01:45:38,000
Congratulations!

1410
01:45:38,280 --> 01:45:42,240
Congratulations to the beautiful
couple. Anuj and Mittee.

1411
01:45:42,520 --> 01:45:44,800
You guys are truly made
for each other.

1412
01:45:45,240 --> 01:45:48,040
Well, this is blessed day
for both the families.

1413
01:45:48,280 --> 01:45:50,240
The Mathur's and the Deora's.

1414
01:45:50,320 --> 01:45:53,680
Presenting to you all something
really special.

1415
01:45:54,200 --> 01:45:55,640
Dim the lights please!

1416
01:46:07,480 --> 01:46:09,040
Oh!

1417
01:46:26,240 --> 01:46:29,480
Hi Mittee!
And hi the lucky man, Anuj Mathur.

1418
01:46:30,040 --> 01:46:33,400
I am very happy today.
Finally Mittee found her dream man.

1419
01:46:33,600 --> 01:46:35,160
Do you remember what
you said on the

1420
01:46:35,240 --> 01:46:36,760
10th anniversary of Stellar sweets?

1421
01:46:37,080 --> 01:46:38,280
I want to be rich babe.

1422
01:46:38,520 --> 01:46:41,360
Look,
I will date my boss Anuj Mathur.

1423
01:46:41,640 --> 01:46:42,880
You were a trainee.

1424
01:46:43,280 --> 01:46:45,960
Guess what? Today you are
getting engaged to him.

1425
01:46:46,480 --> 01:46:47,760
Now you are rich, babe.

1426
01:46:47,840 --> 01:46:51,080
Hello Mittee.
Do you remember 35% marks?

1427
01:46:51,360 --> 01:46:54,400
No money in the pocket. Trying to
pacify me twice in a day at office.

1428
01:46:54,720 --> 01:46:58,040
Bilal, get me a job. Get me a job.

1429
01:46:58,320 --> 01:47:00,760
And in a month Bilal
became your lover.

1430
01:47:01,080 --> 01:47:02,760
We started dating.

1431
01:47:02,880 --> 01:47:06,480
I managed to get a trainee's
position at Stellar sweets.

1432
01:47:06,720 --> 01:47:09,840
After that you turned off the phone.
Number got changed. No contact.

1433
01:47:10,120 --> 01:47:11,800
When I met you, you said...

1434
01:47:11,880 --> 01:47:14,640
My parents won't allow me
to marry a Muslim guy.

1435
01:47:14,720 --> 01:47:15,880
Sorry Bilal!

1436
01:47:16,680 --> 01:47:20,080
Next month you found
your next lover.

1437
01:47:21,920 --> 01:47:24,520
Mittee's best friend Kavita
and I were engaged.

1438
01:47:24,960 --> 01:47:27,800
One day Kavita introduced
me to Mittee.

1439
01:47:28,480 --> 01:47:31,240
After dinner when I went
to drop Mittee home.

1440
01:47:31,600 --> 01:47:34,760
She started talking sexy
things with me.

1441
01:47:35,640 --> 01:47:36,640
I...

1442
01:47:39,880 --> 01:47:41,760
Within a week Anand broke
off the engagement.

1443
01:47:42,200 --> 01:47:44,840
My cousin's took me for clubbing to
help me cope with my depression.

1444
01:47:45,200 --> 01:47:48,320
Guess whom I see Anand
dancing with?

1445
01:47:48,600 --> 01:47:49,720
Mittee Deora.

1446
01:47:52,000 --> 01:47:54,960
She trapped Sahil Mehra the richest
boy of the class in Shimla.

1447
01:47:55,200 --> 01:47:56,760
When they had an argument...

1448
01:47:57,040 --> 01:47:58,920
she proved that normal
boy as unstable

1449
01:47:59,000 --> 01:48:00,280
and sent him to the asylum.

1450
01:48:01,160 --> 01:48:02,760
He is in the asylum
since three years.

1451
01:48:03,240 --> 01:48:05,320
After Sahil was out of the way.
I was the next one.

1452
01:48:06,040 --> 01:48:09,160
We didn't have a proper
relationship. We were just enjoying.

1453
01:48:09,920 --> 01:48:12,560
During that time Mittee
took a loan of 35,000.

1454
01:48:13,200 --> 01:48:16,600
When she had to return it she got
away with her dad's health stories.

1455
01:48:17,480 --> 01:48:20,800
Look here. Your Rolex watch.
Mittee gave it to me.

1456
01:48:22,640 --> 01:48:24,920
Your fiancÃ©e was 15 year
old and I was 22.

1457
01:48:25,000 --> 01:48:26,520
We had an affair since then.

1458
01:48:26,880 --> 01:48:28,560
I earned 10,000 a month.

1459
01:48:28,800 --> 01:48:30,720
I gave her 5,000 out of it.

1460
01:48:31,800 --> 01:48:34,320
One day my mom fell sick.
I exhausted my money.

1461
01:48:34,800 --> 01:48:36,640
Mittee started blackmailing me.

1462
01:48:36,800 --> 01:48:39,880
Give me money. Or I will imprison
you for sex with minor.

1463
01:48:40,880 --> 01:48:43,200
I sold mom's earrings and
arranged the money.

1464
01:48:43,720 --> 01:48:45,440
She is such a cheap girl.

1465
01:48:47,280 --> 01:48:49,160
On our 5th month anniversary
she said...

1466
01:48:49,240 --> 01:48:51,040
Please let's donate 25,000.

1467
01:48:51,720 --> 01:48:53,760
When I transferred the money...

1468
01:48:54,040 --> 01:48:56,200
She got a sms on her mobile.

1469
01:48:56,600 --> 01:48:58,080
That alerted me too.

1470
01:48:59,080 --> 01:49:00,480
I checked her phone.

1471
01:49:01,240 --> 01:49:04,360
25,000 credited to Muskan NGO.

1472
01:49:04,880 --> 01:49:08,240
It means she was the
false trustee...

1473
01:49:08,320 --> 01:49:09,840
of that false NGO.

1474
01:49:10,840 --> 01:49:12,480
I left her right there.

1475
01:49:13,280 --> 01:49:14,960
And chapter closed.

1476
01:49:15,200 --> 01:49:17,760
Sir, if you have to live alone
in life then live alone.

1477
01:49:18,000 --> 01:49:20,200
But don't marry this girl
even by mistake.

1478
01:49:20,280 --> 01:49:21,760
We told you the whole story.

1479
01:49:21,840 --> 01:49:23,480
And you are intelligent.

1480
01:49:23,640 --> 01:49:25,920
So save yourself and your family,
Mr. Mathur.

1481
01:49:26,000 --> 01:49:27,200
All the best, dear boss!

1482
01:49:45,240 --> 01:49:46,240
Anuj.

1483
01:49:57,480 --> 01:50:00,120
Go to hell.

1484
01:50:12,360 --> 01:50:13,360
Shame on you!

1485
01:50:22,120 --> 01:50:24,120
What is wrong with you?
What happened?

1486
01:50:24,200 --> 01:50:25,880
Dad!
- Call the doctor.

1487
01:50:26,160 --> 01:50:29,040
Dad! - Call the doctor.
- What happened? - Call the doctor.

1488
01:50:29,600 --> 01:50:30,600
What happened?

1489
01:50:31,920 --> 01:50:33,280
Call the ambulance.

1490
01:50:38,160 --> 01:50:39,400
Leave us alone.

1491
01:50:39,720 --> 01:50:41,520
For God's sake leave us alone.

1492
01:51:49,600 --> 01:51:51,880
Hello!
- Hi Mittee.

1493
01:51:54,120 --> 01:51:55,720
You bastard!

1494
01:51:56,480 --> 01:51:57,960
Your dad is dying at the hospital.

1495
01:51:58,040 --> 01:51:59,760
And you are sleeping
peacefully at home.

1496
01:52:00,600 --> 01:52:02,160
Aren't you worried about your dad?

1497
01:52:02,960 --> 01:52:04,440
Don't speak about my dad.

1498
01:52:05,080 --> 01:52:07,880
If you have the courage come to me.
I won't spare you.

1499
01:52:08,920 --> 01:52:10,560
I won't spare you instead.

1500
01:52:11,720 --> 01:52:14,760
I stole your bank account
I mean Anuj Mathur.

1501
01:52:15,880 --> 01:52:18,960
Then showed your true face to
everyone and humiliated you.

1502
01:52:20,560 --> 01:52:24,360
Now I'll steal from you the
most precious thing.

1503
01:52:26,160 --> 01:52:27,240
Dad!

1504
01:52:28,800 --> 01:52:32,400
I will kill you if anything
happens to dad.

1505
01:52:35,800 --> 01:52:38,280
Hello! Hello!

1506
01:52:51,160 --> 01:52:53,840
Dr. Sarah, come to O.T. right away.

1507
01:52:57,400 --> 01:52:58,400
Dad!

1508
01:53:08,560 --> 01:53:10,040
Mittee, leave from here.

1509
01:53:11,560 --> 01:53:13,560
You gave us enough sorrow.

1510
01:53:13,720 --> 01:53:16,160
Mom, please let me meet dad once.

1511
01:53:17,800 --> 01:53:20,240
He doesn't want to meet you.
Got it?

1512
01:53:22,160 --> 01:53:23,360
Go away from here.

1513
01:53:24,360 --> 01:53:26,920
Mom, please. Don't do this.
- Please!

1514
01:53:27,160 --> 01:53:29,040
Dad!
- Go away from here.

1515
01:53:31,200 --> 01:53:34,480
'Response ward. 2nd row.'

1516
01:53:40,960 --> 01:53:43,600
'Hi Kuttee. I mean Mittee.'

1517
01:53:43,960 --> 01:53:45,360
'Are you enjoying yourself?'

1518
01:53:46,200 --> 01:53:48,040
'Why did you do this to me?'

1519
01:53:49,360 --> 01:53:51,120
Come in front of me once.

1520
01:53:52,920 --> 01:53:55,120
'You are crazy to get
rid of me earlier.'

1521
01:53:55,600 --> 01:53:57,280
'Now you want to see me?'

1522
01:53:57,960 --> 01:53:59,960
Where are you?
- 'Turn'.

1523
01:54:02,040 --> 01:54:05,040
What joke is this? Hello! Hello!

1524
01:54:08,160 --> 01:54:09,200
Hello!

1525
01:54:11,160 --> 01:54:13,280
Our story is so dramatic.

1526
01:54:13,600 --> 01:54:16,160
Come.
Let's make the climax interesting.

1527
01:54:16,960 --> 01:54:18,720
You hit a girl. Rascal!

1528
01:54:19,800 --> 01:54:20,960
Ma'am, are you alright?

1529
01:54:30,520 --> 01:54:31,840
'Who got shot?'

1530
01:54:31,920 --> 01:54:34,240
Go away from here.
- No. No.

1531
01:54:34,440 --> 01:54:35,960
Mittee Deora, come here.

1532
01:54:45,600 --> 01:54:49,360
No. No wait here. Don't
go outside the room.

1533
01:54:51,240 --> 01:54:53,200
Mittee! Here. Here.

1534
01:54:57,560 --> 01:54:59,080
Where are you running away?

1535
01:54:59,760 --> 01:55:01,800
I am here to beat you.

1536
01:55:32,840 --> 01:55:34,680
Ma'am,
you are not allowed to come here.

1537
01:55:34,760 --> 01:55:36,400
It's a restricted area.
- Shut up.

1538
01:55:53,120 --> 01:55:54,160
Ahh!
- Hey!

1539
01:56:23,920 --> 01:56:25,280
Hey, wait.

1540
01:56:26,280 --> 01:56:28,960
The girl is here.
She has gone upstairs.

1541
01:56:36,960 --> 01:56:38,080
Sahil!

1542
01:57:08,240 --> 01:57:09,520
Mittee!

1543
01:58:07,560 --> 01:58:09,120
Switch on the fan.

1544
01:58:09,240 --> 01:58:10,400
Shut up!

1545
01:58:12,120 --> 01:58:13,800
Someone is here to meet you.

1546
01:58:18,200 --> 01:58:20,880
Uh! Is it my dad?

1547
01:58:42,800 --> 01:58:46,880
Surya Mehra. I am his twin brother.

1548
01:58:56,200 --> 01:58:58,240
He didn't tell anyone about me.

1549
01:58:59,520 --> 01:59:01,040
He hated me.

1550
01:59:03,200 --> 01:59:06,320
As I killed my father
and blamed it on him.

1551
01:59:09,120 --> 01:59:13,080
I went to meet him at the asylum
for some signatures.

1552
01:59:15,000 --> 01:59:17,680
He trapped me and ran
away from there.

1553
01:59:19,760 --> 01:59:22,760
He worried you and
me for two months.

1554
01:59:25,400 --> 01:59:27,760
But the way you killed him...

1555
01:59:29,440 --> 01:59:31,760
I was very happy to hear about it.

1556
01:59:33,120 --> 01:59:35,520
I wanted to meet you personally
to thank you.

1557
01:59:38,280 --> 01:59:39,680
Thanks!

1558
01:59:42,920 --> 01:59:45,520
I heard you got a life term.

1559
01:59:47,560 --> 01:59:49,520
And your parents didn't
come for your hearing.

1560
01:59:50,960 --> 01:59:52,240
Sad!

1561
01:59:53,200 --> 01:59:54,680
But don't worry.

1562
01:59:55,840 --> 01:59:58,640
I will help you somehow.

1563
02:00:01,120 --> 02:00:03,800
You fulfilled my revenge
by killing Sahil.

1564
02:00:04,480 --> 02:00:06,440
Say bye to him. Your time is up.

1565
02:00:11,760 --> 02:00:12,760
Bye!

1566
02:00:37,000 --> 02:00:38,360
Leave me.

1567
02:00:41,200 --> 02:00:42,480
Leave me.

1568
02:00:46,920 --> 02:00:50,200
'You have to get Surya out from
the asylum.' - 'What?'

1569
02:00:50,280 --> 02:00:52,080
'Mittee had taken a gun.'

1570
02:00:53,360 --> 02:00:56,320
'I'm sure she will try to kill me
after her engagement breaks.'

1571
02:00:57,200 --> 02:01:00,280
'She will fire at Surya not me.'

1572
02:01:00,360 --> 02:01:02,120
Leave me.

1573
02:01:04,600 --> 02:01:07,800
'I am ready to take the
responsibility of Sahil Mehra.

1574
02:01:07,880 --> 02:01:08,880
I am his uncle.'

1575
02:01:11,880 --> 02:01:16,800
"I am mad.
I am mad! Be aware of me!"

1576
02:01:16,880 --> 02:01:19,920
'I have blood cancer. I am going
to London for the treatment.'

1577
02:01:20,120 --> 02:01:22,080
'Before going home come
to the hospital

1578
02:01:22,160 --> 02:01:23,920
and take the legal papers from me.'

1579
02:01:24,640 --> 02:01:25,800
'Which hospital?'

1580
02:01:30,040 --> 02:01:32,680
'Where are you?' - 'I am on the
first floor. Where are you?'

1581
02:01:33,360 --> 02:01:34,680
'Come on the third floor.'

1582
02:01:39,400 --> 02:01:42,040
"My quality is that I am crazy.
I do mistakes!"

1583
02:01:42,120 --> 02:01:44,520
"I am out of my mind and
my life is messed!"

1584
02:01:44,600 --> 02:01:47,080
"I walk carefree. Stare at me!"

1585
02:01:47,200 --> 02:01:49,760
"I did what you taught me.
This fight was fair!"

1586
02:01:53,080 --> 02:01:55,800
'Where are you?
Someone is firing here.'

1587
02:01:55,960 --> 02:01:57,680
'Come to 218. Quickly.'

1588
02:02:00,760 --> 02:02:01,960
'Where is Sahil Mehra?'

1589
02:02:02,400 --> 02:02:03,520
'Sahil!'

1590
02:02:06,240 --> 02:02:13,360
'The fight was fair!"

1591
02:02:13,960 --> 02:02:19,080
"I am mad.
I am mad. Be aware of me!"

1592
02:02:19,160 --> 02:02:24,520
"I am mad.
I am mad. Be aware of me!"

1593
02:03:11,200 --> 02:03:20,400
"I am torched.
My hatred is very extreme!"

1594
02:03:20,480 --> 02:03:30,800
"Wherever you are.
I'll reach there!"

1595
02:03:30,880 --> 02:03:39,880
"How can I leave you? I'll break
you! The way you broke me!"

1596
02:03:39,960 --> 02:03:44,360
"Listen cruel one.
Now it's my turn!"

1597
02:03:44,440 --> 02:03:48,600
"You are very sweet.
But full of venom!"

1598
02:03:50,440 --> 02:03:59,360
"Yes. I am mad. I am mad!"

1599
02:03:59,440 --> 02:04:09,240
"I am mad. I am mad!"

1600
02:04:32,200 --> 02:04:38,480
"Why did you do this?
You cheated me!"

1601
02:04:41,320 --> 02:04:46,600
"Why did you wound me?"

1602
02:05:06,440 --> 02:05:15,600
"You are delicate to look at.
But you are a savage inside!"

1603
02:05:15,680 --> 02:05:25,960
"I have borne your brutality.
I have done a lot for you!"

1604
02:05:26,040 --> 02:05:30,560
"I was your protector.
But not anymore!"

1605
02:05:30,640 --> 02:05:35,200
"I will think of ending your life!"

1606
02:05:35,280 --> 02:05:39,800
"I won't let you cry.
Nor allow you to sleep!"

1607
02:05:39,880 --> 02:05:43,680
"I will give you sleepless nights!"

1608
02:05:45,640 --> 02:05:53,400
"Yes. I am mad. I am mad!"

1609
02:05:54,680 --> 02:06:04,960
"I am mad. I am mad!"

1
00:00:05,773 --> 00:00:10,622
What happens to this city?
Either there is ash or smoke.

2
00:00:11,544 --> 00:00:12,992
Why doesn't anyone say anything?

3
00:00:13,771 --> 00:00:15,884
Why do they tolerate
this smoke quietly?

4
00:00:16,627 --> 00:00:18,485
It's the limit to tolerance.

5
00:00:19,113 --> 00:00:21,976
Let douse cigarettes and cigars.

6
00:00:22,362 --> 00:00:24,369
There is ban on smoking
on public places.

7
00:00:24,803 --> 00:00:26,805
You've to pay fine for it.

8
00:00:27,180 --> 00:00:30,033
Neither smoking nor
let others smoking.

9
00:00:31,125 --> 00:00:32,912
Smoking costs dearly.

10
00:00:37,533 --> 00:00:39,138
Everyone desires happiness.

11
00:00:41,780 --> 00:00:43,828
But at what cost?

12
00:00:44,756 --> 00:00:47,319
Smoking costs dearly.

13
00:00:49,257 --> 00:00:52,223
Smoking is injurious
to your health..

14
00:00:54,720 --> 00:00:56,776
..to your loves ones too.

15
00:01:00,697 --> 00:01:02,732
You've to pay dearly for smoking.

16
00:03:16,195 --> 00:03:17,490
Good morning, guys.
- Good morning, sir

17
00:03:17,724 --> 00:03:18,724
What's happening?

18
00:03:18,770 --> 00:03:19,924
Sir, we're doing the lighting.

19
00:03:23,324 --> 00:03:24,633
Fine, fine.

20
00:03:25,585 --> 00:03:27,739
Mohit, what's up?

21
00:03:28,968 --> 00:03:31,126
How did you call me today?

22
00:03:31,524 --> 00:03:33,219
No, man. Shooting.

23
00:03:34,244 --> 00:03:35,499
GH Mills.

24
00:03:36,604 --> 00:03:37,914
Royal Mansions.

25
00:03:38,524 --> 00:03:39,579
It's a feature.

26
00:03:40,244 --> 00:03:41,124
What?

27
00:03:41,164 --> 00:03:42,164
Tonight?

28
00:03:43,020 --> 00:03:44,094
For what?

29
00:03:44,644 --> 00:03:46,044
Narration.

30
00:03:47,949 --> 00:03:49,478
Narration only?

31
00:03:50,404 --> 00:03:51,964
Okay. I'll be there.

32
00:03:52,284 --> 00:03:53,964
Ma'am, shot is ready.

33
00:03:54,044 --> 00:03:55,524
Scene 10 by Take 1.

34
00:03:56,284 --> 00:03:57,572
And...action!

35
00:04:18,244 --> 00:04:20,137
What happened to Madam,
Get the water quickly.

36
00:04:28,792 --> 00:04:32,884
"Where do we go?"

37
00:04:33,884 --> 00:04:37,964
"Where do we go?"

38
00:04:38,953 --> 00:04:43,404
"Who will understand..."

39
00:04:44,028 --> 00:04:48,844
"..the sad story of the ghosts."

40
00:04:49,204 --> 00:04:53,362
"Where do we go?"

41
00:04:54,364 --> 00:04:58,084
"Where do we go?"

42
00:05:09,522 --> 00:05:14,604
"What's happening in
the name of progress?"

43
00:05:19,884 --> 00:05:24,804
"What's happening in
the name of progress?"

44
00:05:25,004 --> 00:05:29,764
"The bulldozer's
razing down our homes."

45
00:05:30,090 --> 00:05:34,884
"Shopping malls and Multiplex.."

46
00:05:35,244 --> 00:05:39,804
"..are snatching our graves."

47
00:05:40,364 --> 00:05:45,364
"O Government, hear our plea."

48
00:05:45,524 --> 00:05:48,964
"Where do we go?"

49
00:05:50,724 --> 00:05:54,564
"Where do we go?"

50
00:06:05,924 --> 00:06:10,724
"There's no one with us."

51
00:06:16,244 --> 00:06:21,124
"There's no one with us."

52
00:06:21,444 --> 00:06:26,084
"Ghosts have become helpless."

53
00:06:26,404 --> 00:06:31,204
"We don't have the
right to vote either."

54
00:06:31,635 --> 00:06:36,284
"Even the politicians shun us."

55
00:06:36,709 --> 00:06:41,564
"O Government, hear our plea."

56
00:06:41,844 --> 00:06:45,484
"Where do we go?"

57
00:06:46,884 --> 00:06:50,764
"Where do we go?"

58
00:06:51,924 --> 00:06:54,324
"Where do we go?"

59
00:06:54,684 --> 00:06:57,004
"Where do we go?"

60
00:06:57,084 --> 00:06:59,364
"Where do we go?"

61
00:06:59,524 --> 00:07:01,884
"Where do we go?"

62
00:07:02,044 --> 00:07:04,764
"Where do we go?"

63
00:07:10,409 --> 00:07:11,884
What a scary structure, right?

64
00:07:12,082 --> 00:07:13,844
So old and dilapidated.

65
00:07:14,219 --> 00:07:15,219
Yes.

66
00:07:15,305 --> 00:07:17,924
Most of the disputed properties in
Mumbai are in the same condition.

67
00:07:18,223 --> 00:07:20,844
Aditya, Do you
remember that Ragini incident?

68
00:07:21,148 --> 00:07:23,084
Yes, that ghost affair.
- Yes.

69
00:07:23,244 --> 00:07:24,364
Just imagine.

70
00:07:24,626 --> 00:07:27,124
Ragini must be going
through some serious PR crises.

71
00:07:27,719 --> 00:07:28,964
Why such cheap publicity?

72
00:07:29,289 --> 00:07:31,163
Today's marketing mantra is..

73
00:07:31,865 --> 00:07:33,764
..any publicity is good publicity.

74
00:07:34,019 --> 00:07:35,084
If you want to promote your film.

75
00:07:35,468 --> 00:07:36,588
And her act worked.

76
00:07:36,748 --> 00:07:38,708
Her story was all over.

77
00:07:38,844 --> 00:07:41,868
News, TV, internet. Everywhere.

78
00:07:42,148 --> 00:07:44,028
Ghost stories intrigue everyone.

79
00:07:44,108 --> 00:07:46,758
No wonder that such films
are made and run successfully.

80
00:07:48,428 --> 00:07:49,428
What happened?

81
00:07:49,748 --> 00:07:51,188
I really don't understand.

82
00:07:51,468 --> 00:07:54,108
In Raaz 3, Esha Gupta knows..

83
00:07:54,188 --> 00:07:55,908
..that the house she's
living in is haunted.

84
00:07:56,068 --> 00:07:57,908
So why doesn't she just leave?

85
00:07:58,188 --> 00:08:01,108
Tanya, if you try to find
logic in the ghost stories.

86
00:08:01,348 --> 00:08:04,228
..then you are going to see only
ghosts at the box-office window.

87
00:08:04,468 --> 00:08:07,188
And Bhootnath, Amitabh
Bachchan is a ghost..

88
00:08:07,268 --> 00:08:09,548
..who is visible to a kid,
but not Juhi Chawla.

89
00:08:09,628 --> 00:08:11,628
And in the climax, even
Juhi Chawla can see him.

90
00:08:11,708 --> 00:08:12,807
Again Logic.

91
00:08:13,108 --> 00:08:15,148
It is up to the ghost to decide..

92
00:08:15,228 --> 00:08:17,484
..who can see him and who cannot.

93
00:08:18,228 --> 00:08:20,748
Mostly ghosts are seen..

94
00:08:20,828 --> 00:08:22,508
..to those people
who are in trouble.

95
00:08:22,588 --> 00:08:26,388
Or someone who create
troubles for them. Get it?

96
00:08:26,468 --> 00:08:27,868
Good morning, sir.

97
00:08:28,988 --> 00:08:30,388
You..
- Raju, sir.

98
00:08:30,588 --> 00:08:31,708
Raju writer.

99
00:08:31,988 --> 00:08:34,788
Oh yes yes.
What are you doing here?

100
00:08:34,868 --> 00:08:36,628
Sir, I was here to see
location with someone...

101
00:08:36,708 --> 00:08:38,428
I saw you here then I
thought to meet you.

102
00:08:38,508 --> 00:08:40,428
That's the real job of
a struggling writer.

103
00:08:41,628 --> 00:08:43,508
So, what do you want?
- Sir I want one single chance.

104
00:08:43,588 --> 00:08:45,148
Sir, I've a superhit idea, sir.

105
00:08:45,188 --> 00:08:46,348
Sir, just give me one hearing.

106
00:08:46,428 --> 00:08:48,588
Sir FIMFARE, ZEE, IIFA, TOIFA,

107
00:08:48,668 --> 00:08:50,108
..Even the Lion's club
award will be yours sir.

108
00:08:50,188 --> 00:08:51,388
Sir, just hear me once.

109
00:08:51,468 --> 00:08:53,348
You are here also... Ok
leave from here.. Get out.

110
00:08:53,428 --> 00:08:55,908
Mr. Gupta, remember I
came to your office.

111
00:08:55,988 --> 00:08:57,588
Yes, unwanted.
- And I hugged you..

112
00:08:57,628 --> 00:08:59,268
..in your last
film's success party.

113
00:08:59,348 --> 00:09:01,468
Remember, sir.
- You had crashed the gate at the party.

114
00:09:01,548 --> 00:09:02,548
And gulped down the entire bottle.

115
00:09:02,628 --> 00:09:04,308
Now Just get out from here,
or I'll make you regret it.

116
00:09:04,388 --> 00:09:06,668
Mr. Gupta,
What else can you do with me?

117
00:09:06,748 --> 00:09:08,028
I've been struggling for 5 years..

118
00:09:08,108 --> 00:09:09,228
..but I couldn't get one break.

119
00:09:09,308 --> 00:09:10,828
No place to stay, no food to eat.

120
00:09:10,908 --> 00:09:12,068
But no problem, sir.

121
00:09:12,148 --> 00:09:13,588
The day will come soon when..

122
00:09:13,668 --> 00:09:15,668
..a lucky director
will accept my story..

123
00:09:15,748 --> 00:09:18,148
..and make a
super-duper blockbuster film.

124
00:09:18,228 --> 00:09:20,428
And then it will be
your loss, sir, not mine.

125
00:09:20,508 --> 00:09:21,948
Because I might be unfortunate..

126
00:09:22,028 --> 00:09:24,068
..but I have hunger in me,
I've confidence.

127
00:09:24,148 --> 00:09:26,348
If you're hungry, go and
have some fritters. Get out.

128
00:09:26,476 --> 00:09:29,188
I will, sir. I will eat that.

129
00:09:29,590 --> 00:09:31,348
But remember one thing.

130
00:09:31,577 --> 00:09:33,868
Those who eat fritters
during their bad phase..

131
00:09:33,948 --> 00:09:36,268
..They will be
exorbitant at their good time.

132
00:09:36,776 --> 00:09:38,068
Bye, sir.

133
00:09:44,452 --> 00:09:45,938
I wonder how he got in here.

134
00:09:47,434 --> 00:09:49,514
Filmy strugglers are
like unwanted messages.

135
00:09:49,594 --> 00:09:52,952
No matter how many times you
delete them they keep coming.

136
00:09:53,066 --> 00:09:54,714
It is very frustrating.

137
00:09:54,754 --> 00:09:56,354
Aditya, this is Hemantbhai.

138
00:09:56,594 --> 00:09:57,600
He will take us around.

139
00:09:57,640 --> 00:09:58,794
Hi, Hemantbhai.

140
00:09:59,034 --> 00:10:01,554
I am Aditya, Hi and
this is Tanya, my AD.

141
00:10:03,754 --> 00:10:06,080
Which is the latest film
that you made?

142
00:10:06,592 --> 00:10:09,079
No feature film yet.

143
00:10:09,354 --> 00:10:11,132
No feature film yet.

144
00:10:11,344 --> 00:10:12,161
Nice title.

145
00:10:12,201 --> 00:10:14,994
Hemant, he makes commercials.

146
00:10:15,074 --> 00:10:16,501
It's important
to make commercials..

147
00:10:16,706 --> 00:10:18,978
..otherwise people don't like it.

148
00:10:19,594 --> 00:10:20,834
Are you casting Salman?

149
00:10:20,914 --> 00:10:23,954
Hemantbhai, he wants to
say that I make ad-films.

150
00:10:24,034 --> 00:10:26,912
Advertisement films.
- I see.

151
00:10:26,952 --> 00:10:28,874
The things that bore you..

152
00:10:28,914 --> 00:10:30,754
..between TV serials and news.

153
00:10:30,794 --> 00:10:31,794
Frustrating.

154
00:10:31,834 --> 00:10:37,554
In 1932, the workers burned
this mill down to the ground.

155
00:10:37,634 --> 00:10:38,714
Frustrating.

156
00:10:38,874 --> 00:10:41,194
And from 1985 till now..

157
00:10:41,274 --> 00:10:44,554
..around 50-60 films
have been shot here.

158
00:10:46,194 --> 00:10:48,754
100 years ago, Gaindamal..

159
00:10:48,834 --> 00:10:51,874
..built this mansion on
the plot next to his mill.

160
00:10:51,914 --> 00:10:54,914
To entertain his British guests.

161
00:10:55,354 --> 00:10:56,554
After the Lingering doubt shoot..

162
00:10:56,634 --> 00:10:58,474
..he's been renting it
out for shootings again.

163
00:10:58,594 --> 00:11:00,114
You're the first director..

164
00:11:00,194 --> 00:11:01,674
..who's come here
after that incident.

165
00:11:01,794 --> 00:11:03,954
Otherwise it was closed
for the last one year.

166
00:11:04,154 --> 00:11:05,354
No income.

167
00:11:05,474 --> 00:11:07,114
It was frustrating.

168
00:11:07,474 --> 00:11:10,634
Wow. What a mansion, Hemantbhai.
- Thank you.

169
00:11:10,834 --> 00:11:13,194
I want to see every part
of this mansion and mill.

170
00:11:13,354 --> 00:11:15,834
But I am here only
for half an hour.

171
00:11:16,514 --> 00:11:17,536
Come, Tanya.

172
00:11:18,834 --> 00:11:20,714
Well there are many rooms here.

173
00:11:20,874 --> 00:11:22,434
What do you exactly want?

174
00:11:22,514 --> 00:11:24,954
We want a room and a verandah.

175
00:11:25,154 --> 00:11:26,794
And if we can get the terrace,
that will be even better.

176
00:11:34,114 --> 00:11:36,954
Mr. Director, here's your verandah.

177
00:11:37,034 --> 00:11:38,874
And here's the terrace.

178
00:11:38,914 --> 00:11:40,194
Is this what you wanted?

179
00:11:40,354 --> 00:11:41,594
Wow, great.

180
00:11:41,794 --> 00:11:42,914
It's Beautiful.

181
00:11:43,714 --> 00:11:45,954
Now this is nice.

182
00:11:46,394 --> 00:11:49,634
Listen, here our actor
will swing on a chair.

183
00:11:49,830 --> 00:11:51,150
Right here.
- Okay.

184
00:11:51,714 --> 00:11:54,194
And then we'll get the
entire city in the background.

185
00:11:54,787 --> 00:11:57,394
Then the scene will look great.

186
00:11:57,754 --> 00:11:59,434
Script and storyboard
is in the laptop.

187
00:11:59,566 --> 00:12:00,874
Should I switch it on?

188
00:12:01,051 --> 00:12:03,685
My dear Script is always
in the director's mind.

189
00:12:04,041 --> 00:12:05,417
I don't need a laptop.

190
00:12:06,605 --> 00:12:07,714
Once Sumit will come..

191
00:12:07,794 --> 00:12:09,674
..then we'll
finalize our shot divisions.

192
00:12:09,929 --> 00:12:10,929
Cool.

193
00:12:11,390 --> 00:12:14,034
And before that, let's
see the entire house.

194
00:12:14,114 --> 00:12:15,554
You go ahead, I'll be right there.

195
00:12:15,714 --> 00:12:19,194
Hemantbhai. These actors can
do anything for publicity.

196
00:12:19,315 --> 00:12:22,314
Gupta, stop gossiping.
- No, sir.

197
00:12:22,394 --> 00:12:24,994
I was talking about Ragini's case.

198
00:12:25,114 --> 00:12:27,314
She saw a ghost
during the shooting.

199
00:12:30,074 --> 00:12:32,434
I think these rumors are true.

200
00:12:32,794 --> 00:12:34,434
It's an old mansion.

201
00:12:34,594 --> 00:12:36,234
It has to be infested by ghosts.

202
00:12:36,314 --> 00:12:37,434
Has to be?

203
00:12:37,554 --> 00:12:38,554
It is.

204
00:12:38,674 --> 00:12:42,074
Don't smoke.

205
00:12:43,594 --> 00:12:45,434
Don't smoke.

206
00:12:45,514 --> 00:12:46,514
Tanya.

207
00:12:47,034 --> 00:12:48,194
Coming.

208
00:12:50,914 --> 00:12:53,714
Listen, smoke but be around.

209
00:12:54,034 --> 00:12:55,145
If you smoke alone..

210
00:12:55,185 --> 00:12:56,954
..the ghost will snatch
your cigarette.

211
00:12:57,234 --> 00:12:58,987
What rubbish?
- Ask them.

212
00:13:02,674 --> 00:13:05,025
This is the most
beautiful room of the mansion.

213
00:13:05,594 --> 00:13:07,838
Wow, Hemantbhai. This is great.

214
00:13:08,794 --> 00:13:10,474
There's a bar and a stage too.

215
00:13:11,194 --> 00:13:12,194
Yes Beautiful.

216
00:13:12,234 --> 00:13:14,714
So many musical instruments.
- Exactly.

217
00:13:15,187 --> 00:13:16,794
Is this a hall or a music room?

218
00:13:16,986 --> 00:13:18,994
This is where the
entertainment would take place.

219
00:13:19,434 --> 00:13:20,954
Famous Dancers performed here.

220
00:13:21,034 --> 00:13:23,834
Renowned singers like
Ustad Allauddin Khan..

221
00:13:23,954 --> 00:13:26,554
..Baiju Bawra sir
harmonized this place.

222
00:13:34,634 --> 00:13:35,754
Hemantbhai.

223
00:13:38,674 --> 00:13:41,674
By the way, is this
mansion really haunted?

224
00:13:42,076 --> 00:13:43,154
Yes, it is.

225
00:13:44,114 --> 00:13:47,474
Then it must have
scary stories as well.

226
00:13:47,714 --> 00:13:50,154
This house has an unusual past.

227
00:13:50,440 --> 00:13:52,754
They say this house is cursed.

228
00:13:53,396 --> 00:13:57,714
After Gaindamal murdered by
the hands of the Mill workers..

229
00:13:58,361 --> 00:14:02,674
..Gaindamal's soul roam
around here in the mansion.

230
00:14:03,634 --> 00:14:04,634
Jesus!

231
00:14:04,886 --> 00:14:06,874
Aditya, change your ringtone.
- Aditya, sir.

232
00:14:07,114 --> 00:14:08,394
What Aditya sir..
It's was scary.

233
00:14:08,618 --> 00:14:09,674
Yes, Sumit Da. Yes.

234
00:14:10,548 --> 00:14:11,803
Yes, I can hear.

235
00:14:13,433 --> 00:14:14,713
What, you're stuck?

236
00:14:15,459 --> 00:14:18,393
Oh, rail blockage
against land acquisition.

237
00:14:18,753 --> 00:14:19,873
So what will we do now?

238
00:14:20,513 --> 00:14:22,113
No, the shoot is
day after tomorrow.

239
00:14:22,473 --> 00:14:23,827
No, it's not possible tomorrow.

240
00:14:23,867 --> 00:14:25,633
I've an important meeting tomorrow.

241
00:14:25,773 --> 00:14:26,773
Yes.

242
00:14:27,533 --> 00:14:30,053
Fine, Ok! let me talk to Hemant.

243
00:14:30,173 --> 00:14:31,333
I'll try to get his permission.

244
00:14:31,413 --> 00:14:32,413
Okay.

245
00:14:34,413 --> 00:14:35,173
No.

246
00:14:35,213 --> 00:14:36,213
I won't stay.

247
00:14:36,253 --> 00:14:37,493
I won't stay back.

248
00:14:37,533 --> 00:14:40,893
Today, There's a hearing in
the High Court for Royal Mansion.

249
00:14:40,973 --> 00:14:43,053
The great grandsons of Gaindamal..

250
00:14:43,133 --> 00:14:45,613
..are fighting in the
court for this property.

251
00:14:45,733 --> 00:14:47,213
I've to go with them.

252
00:14:47,293 --> 00:14:48,653
It's frustrating.

253
00:14:48,733 --> 00:14:50,998
Hemant, leave the
keys with the watchman.

254
00:14:51,711 --> 00:14:54,613
Who would come to a house
that's haunted by ghosts.

255
00:14:54,693 --> 00:14:57,614
I did appoint one...but
the ghosts drove him away.

256
00:14:57,693 --> 00:14:58,933
What are you saying?

257
00:14:59,093 --> 00:15:00,573
The entire house is
filled with antiques.

258
00:15:00,653 --> 00:15:02,333
And everything must be expensive.

259
00:15:02,413 --> 00:15:04,013
Yes, they say that..

260
00:15:04,093 --> 00:15:06,573
..there's a huge treasure
buried under this house too.

261
00:15:06,653 --> 00:15:08,053
You mean hidden treasure.

262
00:15:08,173 --> 00:15:12,333
People have seen golden
coins of the British era.

263
00:15:12,733 --> 00:15:14,093
That's why I don't
give the keys to anyone.

264
00:15:14,173 --> 00:15:16,133
Hemantbhai. Hemantbhai.
- No, no.

265
00:15:16,213 --> 00:15:17,893
Have faith, I'll bring the keys.

266
00:15:17,973 --> 00:15:19,853
Tanya, please.
- Hemantbhai, please.

267
00:15:19,933 --> 00:15:21,893
Please, please, please, let it be.

268
00:15:21,973 --> 00:15:22,973
Please.

269
00:15:23,493 --> 00:15:25,333
Please is what gets us in the end.

270
00:15:26,093 --> 00:15:27,093
Fine.

271
00:15:27,133 --> 00:15:29,253
Please. Here are the keys.

272
00:15:29,333 --> 00:15:31,453
Thank you so much.
- Thank you very much.

273
00:15:31,855 --> 00:15:34,013
Thank you so much, Hemantbhai.

274
00:15:34,133 --> 00:15:35,133
Thank you.

275
00:15:38,893 --> 00:15:40,293
Really, Tanya.

276
00:15:40,653 --> 00:15:44,253
Your magical embrace
cast a spell on Hemantbhai.

277
00:15:44,411 --> 00:15:46,253
Come on.
I hugged him out of affection.

278
00:15:46,333 --> 00:15:47,333
Yes, right.

279
00:15:47,413 --> 00:15:49,133
Sir, what will we
do for next two hours?

280
00:15:49,419 --> 00:15:51,373
I will have to wait for Sumit Da.

281
00:15:51,573 --> 00:15:53,533
I've to discuss the
shot divisions with him.

282
00:15:54,133 --> 00:15:56,813
I suggest that you two
go to the police station.

283
00:15:57,013 --> 00:16:00,093
And get the permissions
for next week's shoot.

284
00:16:00,215 --> 00:16:01,133
That's a good idea.

285
00:16:01,173 --> 00:16:03,413
Yeah, even I've to meet
with the costume dada, so..

286
00:16:03,680 --> 00:16:05,173
Great. You guys get going then.

287
00:16:05,253 --> 00:16:06,413
Leave the keys with me.

288
00:16:06,493 --> 00:16:07,493
Okay.

289
00:16:07,733 --> 00:16:09,773
Will you manage it alone?
- Yes.

290
00:16:10,438 --> 00:16:11,720
Camera, laptop.

291
00:16:11,810 --> 00:16:12,773
Thank you.
- Take care.

292
00:16:12,813 --> 00:16:13,653
Yes, I will.

293
00:16:13,693 --> 00:16:15,333
Bye, sir.
- Bye, Gupta.

294
00:18:04,373 --> 00:18:05,933
Sir.
- Who is it? Who is it?

295
00:18:06,223 --> 00:18:07,853
Sir, it's me. Raju writer, sir.

296
00:18:08,374 --> 00:18:10,149
You?
You're back again.

297
00:18:10,955 --> 00:18:11,955
What do you want now?

298
00:18:12,035 --> 00:18:13,275
Sir, neither money nor credit.

299
00:18:13,515 --> 00:18:14,795
I just need a break.

300
00:18:14,875 --> 00:18:18,275
Oh God! You don't need a break
But I really need one from you.

301
00:18:18,315 --> 00:18:20,035
That's exactly what
I want to give, sir.

302
00:18:20,075 --> 00:18:22,196
I want to give you a break
to make a film on my story.

303
00:18:22,635 --> 00:18:23,635
I am just joking, sir.

304
00:18:23,675 --> 00:18:25,195
Sir, please hear my story once.

305
00:18:25,275 --> 00:18:26,835
Sir, I've done my research here..

306
00:18:26,915 --> 00:18:28,355
..and written a story
about this place.

307
00:18:28,435 --> 00:18:30,355
My friend,
I've told you many times..

308
00:18:30,435 --> 00:18:32,315
..I've no interest
in hearing your story.

309
00:18:32,395 --> 00:18:34,195
Sir, but I am interested
in telling you.

310
00:18:34,275 --> 00:18:36,595
FIMFARE, ZEE, IIFA, TOIFA,

311
00:18:36,675 --> 00:18:38,235
Even the Lion's club
award will be yours sir.

312
00:18:38,463 --> 00:18:39,915
Thank you very much for the awards.

313
00:18:39,995 --> 00:18:42,515
But dude, I don't
want to hear your story.

314
00:18:42,643 --> 00:18:44,995
Because I've got my own
story for my first film.

315
00:18:45,075 --> 00:18:46,315
Hold on, sir.

316
00:18:47,435 --> 00:18:48,984
You wrote a story without me.

317
00:18:50,675 --> 00:18:52,035
Without me?

318
00:18:52,502 --> 00:18:53,435
Sorry.

319
00:18:53,475 --> 00:18:54,595
Sir, just joking.

320
00:18:54,675 --> 00:18:55,995
By the way, what's the genre?

321
00:18:56,075 --> 00:18:57,635
I mean what kind of a film is it?

322
00:18:57,675 --> 00:18:59,555
Action? Social? Thriller? Horror?

323
00:18:59,595 --> 00:19:00,955
Or one of those
intellectual art films..

324
00:19:01,035 --> 00:19:02,635
..with a strong message.

325
00:19:02,715 --> 00:19:03,835
It's not like that.

326
00:19:03,955 --> 00:19:06,275
But what do you know about these
intellectual art-house movies?

327
00:19:06,355 --> 00:19:08,355
Sir, I may look like a tramp..

328
00:19:08,435 --> 00:19:10,275
..but tramp only get the triumph.

329
00:19:10,475 --> 00:19:12,803
By the way, I am MA in Literature
from Allahabad University.

330
00:19:12,996 --> 00:19:14,676
And member of the
Cineclub in Allahabad.

331
00:19:15,194 --> 00:19:17,035
Fellini, Truffaut, Bergman..

332
00:19:17,260 --> 00:19:20,715
..and our very own Satyajit Ray,
Gurudutt, Shantaram..

333
00:19:21,771 --> 00:19:22,964
..made such great films.

334
00:19:23,266 --> 00:19:24,915
I guess you're a big movie buff.

335
00:19:25,090 --> 00:19:26,090
Very big sir.

336
00:19:26,289 --> 00:19:27,289
Big one?

337
00:19:27,512 --> 00:19:29,235
Okay, how about the
contemporary film-makers?

338
00:19:29,431 --> 00:19:31,803
Danny Boyle, Ang Lee,
Christopher Nolan..

339
00:19:31,881 --> 00:19:32,911
..have you seen their work?

340
00:19:32,951 --> 00:19:34,071
Just tell me the movie name, sir..

341
00:19:34,111 --> 00:19:35,831
..I can tell you the entire
screenplay, with dialogues.

342
00:19:35,951 --> 00:19:36,991
No, let it be.

343
00:19:37,071 --> 00:19:38,271
Sir. Can I say something?

344
00:19:38,391 --> 00:19:41,231
Stop making these ad-films.
- Why is that?

345
00:19:41,271 --> 00:19:43,871
If a young talent like you do
the slavery to this consumerism.

346
00:19:43,951 --> 00:19:45,751
And sell these soaps and
toothpaste, doesn't look nice.

347
00:19:45,871 --> 00:19:47,871
Make a feature film.

348
00:19:47,951 --> 00:19:49,511
And say whatever you want.

349
00:19:49,631 --> 00:19:51,422
Sir, there's great fun in
making a feature film, sir.

350
00:19:51,751 --> 00:19:53,911
But you just mentioned Satyajit Ray.
- Yes, sir.

351
00:19:53,991 --> 00:19:55,871
Even he made ad-films first.

352
00:19:56,151 --> 00:19:58,111
And if we don't sell
these soaps and toothpaste..

353
00:19:58,151 --> 00:19:59,551
..then what will we eat?

354
00:19:59,711 --> 00:20:02,231
And anyway, who will
finance my independent film?

355
00:20:02,431 --> 00:20:04,951
Corporates are only interested
in the number game and stars.

356
00:20:05,031 --> 00:20:06,351
That's true, sir.

357
00:20:06,511 --> 00:20:08,671
But, are you interested
in making a feature film?

358
00:20:08,791 --> 00:20:10,311
Definitely.

359
00:20:10,551 --> 00:20:12,391
In fact, I also have
a story in my mind.

360
00:20:12,471 --> 00:20:13,911
Hot Haryanvi.

361
00:20:14,071 --> 00:20:16,391
And for that I'm
also meeting a producer.

362
00:20:16,671 --> 00:20:18,231
Well, you didn't hear my story..

363
00:20:18,271 --> 00:20:20,101
..but I will definitely
hear your story.

364
00:20:21,591 --> 00:20:23,231
Don't worry, I won't leak it out.

365
00:20:23,471 --> 00:20:25,111
I can also sign an NDA for you.

366
00:20:25,231 --> 00:20:26,751
Non Disclosure Agreement.

367
00:20:33,789 --> 00:20:35,635
So the basic story is about a boy..

368
00:20:36,268 --> 00:20:37,151
..who plays in a band.

369
00:20:37,191 --> 00:20:38,281
Marriage band?

370
00:20:39,229 --> 00:20:40,229
No.

371
00:20:40,537 --> 00:20:41,701
Music band. Musical group.

372
00:20:41,804 --> 00:20:43,395
I see. Like beetles, etcetera.

373
00:20:43,524 --> 00:20:44,524
Something like that.

374
00:20:44,574 --> 00:20:46,869
But they only play Haryanvi music.
- Oh!

375
00:20:47,669 --> 00:20:48,669
Haryanvi music?

376
00:20:49,389 --> 00:20:51,149
Hard to digest,
but sounds interesting.

377
00:20:51,309 --> 00:20:52,589
Next, sir. Next.

378
00:20:52,669 --> 00:20:54,029
The parents of this boy..

379
00:20:54,109 --> 00:20:58,109
..want to fulfill
their dreams through him.

380
00:20:58,509 --> 00:21:01,389
They want their son
to become a musician.

381
00:21:01,709 --> 00:21:02,909
But the son knows..

382
00:21:02,989 --> 00:21:05,749
..he can never fulfill
his parent's dreams.

383
00:21:05,989 --> 00:21:07,549
Because he's a bad musician.

384
00:21:07,665 --> 00:21:10,015
He doesn't have the
talent to compose songs.

385
00:21:10,568 --> 00:21:11,568
He is out of tune.

386
00:21:11,629 --> 00:21:14,559
He's stuck in a
strange non-creative limbo.

387
00:21:14,949 --> 00:21:16,987
He also has a girlfriend
who loves him.

388
00:21:17,269 --> 00:21:19,956
But the boy hates
love and affection.

389
00:21:21,109 --> 00:21:22,629
Same old wine in a new bottle.

390
00:21:22,709 --> 00:21:24,429
You said something?
- No, sir. Nothing.

391
00:21:24,469 --> 00:21:26,509
Sir, what happens in the end?

392
00:21:26,669 --> 00:21:28,149
That's the problem.

393
00:21:28,749 --> 00:21:31,024
I just can't figure out
what the end should be.

394
00:21:31,429 --> 00:21:35,154
I have characters,
plot points, crises..

395
00:21:35,349 --> 00:21:37,949
..cinematic moments,
but I can't think of..

396
00:21:38,029 --> 00:21:39,709
..what the resolution should be.

397
00:21:40,029 --> 00:21:41,869
The problem is by tomorrow..

398
00:21:41,949 --> 00:21:44,137
..I've to work out
the end at any cost.

399
00:21:45,239 --> 00:21:47,389
Sir, if you don't mind
can I say something?

400
00:21:47,429 --> 00:21:48,269
No, go ahead.

401
00:21:48,309 --> 00:21:50,686
Sir, throw your
story in the dustbin.

402
00:21:52,709 --> 00:21:53,269
What?

403
00:21:53,309 --> 00:21:54,804
Sir, your story's got no impact.

404
00:21:56,349 --> 00:21:58,629
This was just the synopsis.

405
00:21:58,789 --> 00:22:01,269
When I tell you scene by scene
you'll realize the real impact.

406
00:22:01,349 --> 00:22:03,909
Sir Raju writer is my name.
Writing is my job.

407
00:22:04,105 --> 00:22:05,189
By hearing 2 minutes of the story..

408
00:22:05,269 --> 00:22:07,749
I can imagine the entire screenplay
and know what's going to happen next.

409
00:22:07,829 --> 00:22:09,389
Really?
- Sir, you felt bad.

410
00:22:09,469 --> 00:22:11,069
No, sir. - That's why
you're leaving me in the middle.

411
00:22:11,149 --> 00:22:12,069
I didn't feel bad,

412
00:22:12,109 --> 00:22:13,629
Sir, I heard your boring story..

413
00:22:13,749 --> 00:22:15,473
..so you got to hear
my interesting story.

414
00:22:17,469 --> 00:22:20,269
You mean your story's
better than mine.

415
00:22:20,429 --> 00:22:23,469
Sir, don't try to
compare a diamond with a stone.

416
00:22:24,549 --> 00:22:25,549
I see.
- Yes, sir.

417
00:22:25,629 --> 00:22:27,949
If you make a film on my story..
- I know, I know.

418
00:22:28,029 --> 00:22:30,069
Filmfare,
Screen, Zee, IIFA, TOIFA..

419
00:22:30,149 --> 00:22:31,469
..we'll even bag
the Lions Club award.

420
00:22:31,549 --> 00:22:32,780
Right?
- Yes, sir.

421
00:22:33,714 --> 00:22:36,509
What are you?
- The best, sir.

422
00:22:38,669 --> 00:22:40,749
Fine, you win I lose.

423
00:22:40,909 --> 00:22:42,429
Sir, I love you.
- What are you doing?

424
00:22:42,509 --> 00:22:43,879
I love you.
- Stay away.

425
00:22:44,334 --> 00:22:45,349
Come on, tell me your story.

426
00:22:45,530 --> 00:22:46,530
Okay, sir.

427
00:22:46,572 --> 00:22:49,349
So, we begin our
story from a smoke.

428
00:22:49,697 --> 00:22:50,697
Smoke?
- Yes.

429
00:22:50,751 --> 00:22:53,069
Sir, the signing.
- Oh, you want money already.

430
00:22:53,219 --> 00:22:54,549
Sir, cigarette.

431
00:22:55,897 --> 00:22:56,704
Yes.

432
00:22:56,744 --> 00:22:58,475
Here you go.
- Yes, sir.

433
00:22:58,975 --> 00:23:01,109
Now light it.

434
00:23:02,037 --> 00:23:03,229
Take a puff.

435
00:23:03,782 --> 00:23:05,149
There'll be smoke all around.

436
00:23:05,720 --> 00:23:08,829
And with the smoke
the story starts.

437
00:23:10,549 --> 00:23:13,189
Sir, the old mills and buildings..

438
00:23:13,349 --> 00:23:15,349
..are disappearing from the city.

439
00:23:15,629 --> 00:23:17,949
From the mills between
Lower Parel and Mahalaxmi..

440
00:23:18,269 --> 00:23:20,256
..to the old house
between Bandra and Colaba..

441
00:23:20,296 --> 00:23:22,549
..were devoured by the
wind of development.

442
00:23:23,193 --> 00:23:24,709
From British rule to Indian rule.

443
00:23:24,789 --> 00:23:27,109
And now it feels like we're
living in the promoter's rule.

444
00:23:27,429 --> 00:23:28,989
Old structures are
being razed down..

445
00:23:29,109 --> 00:23:30,789
..to build 7 star hotels.

446
00:23:30,869 --> 00:23:32,429
New condominiums are
being built every day.

447
00:23:32,509 --> 00:23:34,589
Multiplexes, shopping malls.

448
00:23:34,789 --> 00:23:36,029
By the grace of God..

449
00:23:36,236 --> 00:23:37,869
..and some new Municipal rules..

450
00:23:38,309 --> 00:23:40,549
..heritage and disputed
properties are still intact.

451
00:23:40,829 --> 00:23:42,389
But they are few in numbers.

452
00:23:43,109 --> 00:23:44,189
The question is..

453
00:23:44,269 --> 00:23:46,869
..who's most bothered by
the city's development?

454
00:23:46,949 --> 00:23:47,949
Mumbaikars.

455
00:23:48,069 --> 00:23:50,229
I mean, all this is
forcing a common Mumbaikar..

456
00:23:50,269 --> 00:23:51,989
..to leave the city and go out.

457
00:23:52,069 --> 00:23:53,389
No, sir.
That problem was always there..

458
00:23:53,469 --> 00:23:54,909
..and it will always be there.

459
00:23:55,180 --> 00:23:57,494
But the demolition
of mills and houses..

460
00:23:57,949 --> 00:23:59,589
..has put Mumbai's
spirit in danger.

461
00:23:59,709 --> 00:24:00,709
Spirit?

462
00:24:00,846 --> 00:24:03,269
Oh, I see. You mean the Mumbai spirit?
- No, sir.

463
00:24:03,349 --> 00:24:04,389
Not that spirit.

464
00:24:04,549 --> 00:24:06,757
By spirit I mean ghosts, souls.

465
00:24:08,869 --> 00:24:09,869
Dead people.

466
00:24:14,629 --> 00:24:16,269
Sir, they're in a terrible state.

467
00:24:16,989 --> 00:24:18,109
They are ruined.

468
00:24:18,709 --> 00:24:20,189
These old houses and mills..

469
00:24:20,309 --> 00:24:21,709
..used to be their den.

470
00:24:22,267 --> 00:24:24,029
You can also call it
their dwelling place.

471
00:24:24,309 --> 00:24:27,069
And now those simple,
nave ghosts..

472
00:24:27,349 --> 00:24:29,189
..are facing a big crises.

473
00:24:29,682 --> 00:24:31,598
They are wandering from
one place to another..

474
00:24:31,638 --> 00:24:32,989
..like crazy homeless souls.

475
00:24:33,263 --> 00:24:36,029
And the few homes that are left
are not enough for all of them.

476
00:24:36,109 --> 00:24:38,028
Because their population is more
than the number of homes.

477
00:24:38,269 --> 00:24:40,109
And sir, the worst part is..

478
00:24:40,149 --> 00:24:41,909
..no one's paying
attention to the ghost community..

479
00:24:42,069 --> 00:24:43,509
..during their time of crises.

480
00:24:43,909 --> 00:24:45,909
The government isn't
introducing any scheme..

481
00:24:45,949 --> 00:24:47,509
..to resettle them.

482
00:24:47,749 --> 00:24:50,589
No one's starting any movement.

483
00:24:50,944 --> 00:24:53,149
Ruling party, opposition party,
civil societies..

484
00:24:53,229 --> 00:24:55,589
..and even the media
isn't ready to help them..

485
00:24:55,809 --> 00:24:57,469
Because their viewership
doesn't depend on ghosts.

486
00:24:57,613 --> 00:24:58,909
Exactly, sir. You're on the mark.

487
00:24:59,044 --> 00:25:01,229
Because they are
neither consumers nor voters.

488
00:25:01,656 --> 00:25:02,656
Very good.

489
00:25:03,123 --> 00:25:05,587
I can sense political
satire in your story.

490
00:25:06,121 --> 00:25:08,281
But there shouldn't be any
lecture or long speeches..

491
00:25:08,361 --> 00:25:10,561
..to deliver a social message.

492
00:25:10,641 --> 00:25:12,041
I like films which has layers.

493
00:25:12,081 --> 00:25:13,321
Something that has ups and downs.

494
00:25:13,361 --> 00:25:15,001
Sir, you'll find
layers after layers..

495
00:25:15,081 --> 00:25:16,681
..in Raju Writer's story.

496
00:25:16,721 --> 00:25:18,521
With all commercial ingredients.

497
00:25:18,624 --> 00:25:21,321
Crime, passion, thrill, music,
romance, dance.

498
00:25:21,441 --> 00:25:22,801
After all, these things make..

499
00:25:22,881 --> 00:25:25,521
..a great Indian pot boiler.

500
00:25:26,521 --> 00:25:27,681
Fine, let's listen.

501
00:25:27,982 --> 00:25:30,241
We'll start our story
with the character of..

502
00:25:30,321 --> 00:25:32,521
..Raibahadur Mr. Gendamal Hemraj.

503
00:25:32,601 --> 00:25:35,241
Isn't he the same person
Hemant was talking about?

504
00:25:35,321 --> 00:25:38,521
Yes, sir. In return of
selling his mills to the British..

505
00:25:38,601 --> 00:25:41,081
..he got the title of
Raibahardur from the British.

506
00:25:41,161 --> 00:25:44,001
And on that occasion, there's
a celebration in the mansion.

507
00:25:44,321 --> 00:25:45,321
Cheers!

508
00:25:45,841 --> 00:25:47,081
Cheers!

509
00:25:50,241 --> 00:25:52,201
On one side there
were celebrations..

510
00:25:52,321 --> 00:25:54,841
..and on the other,
the mill workers..

511
00:25:54,921 --> 00:25:56,601
..were fuming with hatred.

512
00:25:57,041 --> 00:25:58,574
Right after taking over the mills..

513
00:25:58,614 --> 00:26:00,681
..the Britishers cut
down their salary and wages.

514
00:26:00,841 --> 00:26:01,961
And the Mill Worker Unions..

515
00:26:02,223 --> 00:26:03,921
..staged a strike
against this cruelty.

516
00:26:04,001 --> 00:26:05,921
Gendamal was supporting
the Britishers..

517
00:26:06,041 --> 00:26:08,561
..and wasn't ready to bow before
the demands of the workers.

518
00:26:08,641 --> 00:26:09,961
Down with..
- Gendamal!

519
00:26:10,041 --> 00:26:11,481
Down with..
- Gendamal!

520
00:26:11,561 --> 00:26:12,585
Down with..
- Gendamal!

521
00:26:12,625 --> 00:26:17,241
The workers were gripped
with starvation and sickness.

522
00:26:17,698 --> 00:26:21,315
And in a fit of rage they
burnt the mill down to ashes.

523
00:26:25,361 --> 00:26:26,561
Save me!

524
00:26:32,739 --> 00:26:35,601
After his death,
Raibahadur Gendamal..

525
00:26:35,921 --> 00:26:38,041
..decided to stay in this mansion..

526
00:26:38,161 --> 00:26:40,361
..instead of wandering in the mill.

527
00:26:46,801 --> 00:26:50,481
Sir, other than the Royal mansion
there was another mansion in the city.

528
00:26:50,561 --> 00:26:51,641
Imperial Palace.

529
00:26:51,681 --> 00:26:53,921
Before India got freedom..

530
00:26:54,001 --> 00:26:56,281
..the Governor
General Ramsay lived in it.

531
00:26:56,881 --> 00:26:58,561
Indian revolutionaries were..

532
00:26:58,641 --> 00:26:59,961
..thirsty for British blood.

533
00:27:00,081 --> 00:27:03,881
And one day they attacked
Ramsay sir when he was alone.

534
00:27:04,001 --> 00:27:05,561
Vande Mataram!

535
00:27:07,521 --> 00:27:09,681
And before India achieved freedom..

536
00:27:09,841 --> 00:27:12,721
..Ramsay's soul was
liberated from his body.

537
00:27:12,899 --> 00:27:16,513
Ramsay's ghost resided
comfortably in the Imperial Palace.

538
00:27:16,721 --> 00:27:18,761
But this luxury lasted
only for a few days.

539
00:27:18,978 --> 00:27:20,321
Because right after
the independence..

540
00:27:20,401 --> 00:27:21,848
..the Indian
government sanctioned an order..

541
00:27:21,888 --> 00:27:23,401
..to convert that
place into a library.

542
00:27:23,803 --> 00:27:26,081
Now Ramsay liked to read books.

543
00:27:26,214 --> 00:27:29,961
But his ghost detested books,
magazines and newspapers.

544
00:27:30,247 --> 00:27:32,681
So Ramsay was in a dilemma.

545
00:27:32,961 --> 00:27:34,201
Mr. Booth!

546
00:27:34,856 --> 00:27:36,321
Mr. Booth!

547
00:27:36,940 --> 00:27:41,081
And he met his
once-upon-a-time boss, Mr. Booth..

548
00:27:41,281 --> 00:27:43,481
..and made him call Gendamal..

549
00:27:43,627 --> 00:27:46,641
..and get him a place
in the Royal mansion.

550
00:27:47,092 --> 00:27:48,601
I've a friend, Ramsay.

551
00:27:48,729 --> 00:27:50,161
He just passed away.

552
00:27:50,297 --> 00:27:51,660
I need a place for him.

553
00:27:54,645 --> 00:27:57,061
Excuse me, are you Raibahadur?

554
00:27:57,101 --> 00:27:58,281
Depends who's asking?

555
00:27:58,603 --> 00:28:00,603
I am Governor general Ramsay.

556
00:28:01,803 --> 00:28:03,323
You are Governor general Ramsay.

557
00:28:03,403 --> 00:28:05,589
Than I am Raibahadur
Gendamal Hemraj.

558
00:28:06,403 --> 00:28:08,883
Mr. Booth has
recommended your name.

559
00:28:08,963 --> 00:28:11,803
No, Mr. Booth
recommended me your name.

560
00:28:11,883 --> 00:28:12,963
He was a nice man.

561
00:28:13,003 --> 00:28:14,723
He used to called me
Genda affectionately.

562
00:28:14,883 --> 00:28:15,983
Genda?

563
00:28:16,363 --> 00:28:17,443
As in hippopotamus?

564
00:28:17,483 --> 00:28:19,363
No, no, that's Gainda
Da this is Gentha-tha

565
00:28:19,483 --> 00:28:22,683
This is not the same.
- Oh, Ganda, meaning dirty.

566
00:28:22,723 --> 00:28:26,258
No, it means flower...marigold.

567
00:28:26,298 --> 00:28:28,643
Marigold. A lovely name.

568
00:28:28,683 --> 00:28:30,043
Shall we go inside?
- No.

569
00:28:30,123 --> 00:28:31,283
We will not go inside.

570
00:28:31,323 --> 00:28:32,363
Who is the boss? I am the boss.

571
00:28:32,403 --> 00:28:33,406
Who is the boss?
- You're the boss.

572
00:28:33,446 --> 00:28:35,285
Yes. So you will not go inside.

573
00:28:35,556 --> 00:28:37,283
I will ask you to come inside.

574
00:28:37,363 --> 00:28:38,523
Please come inside.

575
00:28:38,683 --> 00:28:39,895
May I sir?
- Yes.

576
00:28:44,603 --> 00:28:46,163
And now we come to the 50's.

577
00:28:46,803 --> 00:28:49,698
Gendamal's younger brother,
Gulabchand Hemraj.

578
00:28:49,910 --> 00:28:52,002
Hemraj family's most useless son.

579
00:28:52,163 --> 00:28:53,923
Alcohol, women, gambling, race.

580
00:28:54,003 --> 00:28:56,363
You can say he had every
bad habit in the world.

581
00:28:56,523 --> 00:28:57,843
Complete Casanova.

582
00:28:57,923 --> 00:28:59,843
Those days he was
madly in love with..

583
00:28:59,883 --> 00:29:02,003
..the famous singer
Manoranjana Kumari..

584
00:29:02,203 --> 00:29:05,003
..of those days, and also invested
lots of money in her films.

585
00:29:05,123 --> 00:29:06,883
Manoranjana Kumari?
- Yes.

586
00:29:07,243 --> 00:29:08,603
She always said.

587
00:29:08,923 --> 00:29:10,403
Entertainment.
Entertainment.

588
00:29:10,483 --> 00:29:13,283
And only entertainment
is what makes a film successful.

589
00:29:13,643 --> 00:29:18,083
Entertaining the director, producer
and actor behind the scenes.

590
00:29:18,203 --> 00:29:19,723
And she wouldn't waste a moment..

591
00:29:19,803 --> 00:29:23,963
..entertaining anyone she liked,
Manoranjana Kumari.

592
00:29:43,590 --> 00:29:47,363
"I won't give it."

593
00:29:47,723 --> 00:29:51,363
"I won't give it."

594
00:29:51,803 --> 00:29:55,393
"I won't give my heart for free."

595
00:29:55,563 --> 00:29:59,363
"I won't give my heart for free."

596
00:30:16,242 --> 00:30:19,603
"Trying to cajole me."

597
00:30:20,388 --> 00:30:23,723
"But first check your pockets."

598
00:30:28,483 --> 00:30:31,997
"Trying to cajole me."

599
00:30:32,634 --> 00:30:36,083
"But first check your pockets."

600
00:30:36,683 --> 00:30:40,265
"Check your bank balance first."

601
00:30:40,796 --> 00:30:44,043
"And then say I love you."

602
00:30:44,202 --> 00:30:48,169
"O beloved, if you don't pay.."

603
00:30:48,247 --> 00:30:52,004
"..the taxes for this service,
you won't get anything."

604
00:30:52,918 --> 00:30:54,523
"I won't give it."

605
00:30:54,977 --> 00:30:56,603
"I won't give it."

606
00:30:56,748 --> 00:30:58,523
"I won't give it."

607
00:30:58,770 --> 00:31:00,443
"I won't give it for free."

608
00:31:01,163 --> 00:31:04,685
"I won't give it."

609
00:31:05,083 --> 00:31:08,833
"I won't give my heart for free."

610
00:31:09,286 --> 00:31:12,923
"I won't give it."

611
00:31:13,384 --> 00:31:16,921
"I won't give it."

612
00:31:17,127 --> 00:31:24,347
"I won't give my heart for free."

613
00:31:24,793 --> 00:31:27,163
"I won't give my heart for free."

614
00:31:27,528 --> 00:31:29,643
I am not asking your
heart for free, Manoranjana.

615
00:31:30,010 --> 00:31:32,563
Did I give you these earrings,
the necklace for free?

616
00:31:32,818 --> 00:31:34,385
Don't they have a value?

617
00:31:34,528 --> 00:31:36,043
Don't they have a price?

618
00:31:36,617 --> 00:31:40,563
And I've also transferred the
property papers in your name.

619
00:31:41,196 --> 00:31:43,403
I don't want your property.

620
00:31:43,872 --> 00:31:45,603
All I want is a
pinch of vermillion..

621
00:31:45,896 --> 00:31:47,203
..to grace my forehead.

622
00:31:47,506 --> 00:31:48,506
Foolish!

623
00:31:48,611 --> 00:31:51,455
I am ready to squander all
my wealth at your bellow.

624
00:31:51,791 --> 00:31:55,949
And all you demand is
a pinch of vermillion.

625
00:31:56,798 --> 00:31:59,403
Yes. Make me your wife.

626
00:32:00,090 --> 00:32:02,163
And give me some place
in your heart.

627
00:32:02,843 --> 00:32:06,443
Manoranjana is tired
of entertaining people.

628
00:32:06,838 --> 00:32:08,763
Take it easy my nightingale.

629
00:32:09,510 --> 00:32:11,630
I love you.

630
00:32:12,030 --> 00:32:15,590
And I swear I will take
the nuptial rounds with you..

631
00:32:15,670 --> 00:32:17,870
...and marry you ASAP, darling.

632
00:32:17,990 --> 00:32:21,122
Thank you.
- Mention not.

633
00:32:21,245 --> 00:32:24,190
Don't forget me, I beg of you.

634
00:32:24,264 --> 00:32:26,790
Will give you, will
also give you the bag

635
00:32:27,350 --> 00:32:29,190
Gulab didn't keep his promise.

636
00:32:29,971 --> 00:32:31,390
And Manoranjana's age..

637
00:32:31,470 --> 00:32:33,674
..put a full stop
on her movie career.

638
00:32:34,798 --> 00:32:36,710
And then one day
she found out, that..

639
00:32:36,870 --> 00:32:40,430
..Gulab got married to a
famous industrialist's daughter.

640
00:32:41,434 --> 00:32:43,910
She couldn't endure
her shattered heart..

641
00:32:43,990 --> 00:32:45,470
..and this terrible shock.

642
00:32:46,579 --> 00:32:50,567
And she took to the
famous filmy bottle SAD 69.

643
00:32:51,891 --> 00:32:54,881
And one day, after
finishing 69 bottles..

644
00:32:55,661 --> 00:32:57,870
..under the influence of alcohol..

645
00:32:58,350 --> 00:33:01,870
..she hung herself from the fan.

646
00:33:02,630 --> 00:33:03,590
Oh no!

647
00:33:03,630 --> 00:33:07,230
Manoranjana's soul
decided to take refuge..

648
00:33:07,310 --> 00:33:09,876
..in the same mansion, where she..

649
00:33:09,916 --> 00:33:11,990
..had dreamt of entering
as the daughter-in-law.

650
00:33:31,150 --> 00:33:37,270
"My breath severed
all ties with life."

651
00:33:39,430 --> 00:33:45,390
"My delicate heart
shattered like glass."

652
00:33:47,830 --> 00:33:53,830
"My heart slowly burns like ember."

653
00:33:56,246 --> 00:34:02,270
"My delicate heart
shattered like glass."

654
00:34:04,415 --> 00:34:10,990
"My delicate heart
shattered like glass."

655
00:34:33,652 --> 00:34:38,870
"My heart slowly burns like ember."

656
00:34:41,838 --> 00:34:47,990
"A sigh comes out of my heart."

657
00:34:50,348 --> 00:34:56,182
"My heart slowly burns like ember."

658
00:34:58,567 --> 00:35:04,430
"A sigh comes out of my heart."

659
00:35:06,870 --> 00:35:12,590
"I've lost everything."

660
00:35:15,266 --> 00:35:20,910
"My delicate heart
shattered like glass."

661
00:35:36,270 --> 00:35:37,270
Sir.

662
00:35:38,261 --> 00:35:39,990
Please turn off the lights.

663
00:35:43,441 --> 00:35:44,870
Your story is very nice.

664
00:35:45,146 --> 00:35:46,830
I mean it's superb.
- Thank you, sir.

665
00:35:47,031 --> 00:35:50,830
But...the production
designing will be really difficult.

666
00:35:52,094 --> 00:35:53,346
Different periods.

667
00:35:53,572 --> 00:35:55,810
The properties. Costumes.

668
00:35:55,959 --> 00:35:56,959
Furniture.

669
00:35:57,118 --> 00:35:59,490
We'll have to do
detailed research. - No, sir.

670
00:35:59,555 --> 00:36:01,990
We don't have to do so much
research in a ghost story.

671
00:36:03,897 --> 00:36:09,310
You know, I'll shoot
Ramsay's scenes in sepia mode.

672
00:36:09,629 --> 00:36:11,710
And Manoranjana Kumari's
scenes in black and white.

673
00:36:12,441 --> 00:36:14,310
Back projection, direct lighting.

674
00:36:14,990 --> 00:36:16,990
Every character will
have dual shadow..

675
00:36:17,070 --> 00:36:19,670
..cast on a hand-drawn
background of the sky.

676
00:36:20,262 --> 00:36:21,470
We can play around with the sky.

677
00:36:21,877 --> 00:36:23,510
We can play around with grey-scale.

678
00:36:28,459 --> 00:36:29,459
Thank you, sir.

679
00:36:30,865 --> 00:36:33,710
You gave such a good
reaction on a struggler's story.

680
00:36:34,308 --> 00:36:35,710
No one does that, sir.

681
00:36:36,470 --> 00:36:37,510
I am touched, sir.

682
00:36:38,230 --> 00:36:39,590
I am honored.

683
00:36:40,754 --> 00:36:42,910
Thank you, sir.
- Control yourself.

684
00:36:49,224 --> 00:36:50,510
Now we cut to the 70's.

685
00:36:51,153 --> 00:36:52,153
Bombay.

686
00:36:53,454 --> 00:36:54,510
Time of the underworld.

687
00:36:57,617 --> 00:36:59,350
After Gendamal's
death when Gulabchand..

688
00:36:59,430 --> 00:37:01,634
..tried to take
over GH mills, then..

689
00:37:01,897 --> 00:37:03,510
..Gulabchand uncle, Heerachand..

690
00:37:03,590 --> 00:37:07,830
..tipped famous gangster
Salim Fatela to kill Gulabchand.

691
00:37:08,124 --> 00:37:09,510
Coincidentally Salim Fatela..

692
00:37:09,590 --> 00:37:11,190
..was also a big fan
of Manoranjana Kumari.

693
00:37:11,500 --> 00:37:13,950
"I won't give it."

694
00:37:17,799 --> 00:37:20,456
Gulabchand's ghost wanted to
live in Royal mansion too..

695
00:37:20,887 --> 00:37:23,790
..and apologizes
to Manoranjana Kumari.

696
00:37:24,141 --> 00:37:25,630
I am sorry, Manoranjana.

697
00:37:26,124 --> 00:37:27,570
I made a big mistake.

698
00:37:27,841 --> 00:37:28,891
Forgive me.

699
00:37:29,034 --> 00:37:32,237
And give me what you
always did when you were alive.

700
00:37:32,394 --> 00:37:34,910
What?
- Your love, Manoranjana.

701
00:37:35,655 --> 00:37:38,200
Don't have dirty
picture in your mind.

702
00:37:39,499 --> 00:37:41,019
Rascal, useless.

703
00:37:41,116 --> 00:37:42,878
You came back like a useless coin.

704
00:37:42,984 --> 00:37:45,082
Get out of here.
Manoranjana, go inside.

705
00:37:45,122 --> 00:37:46,933
Sorry, bro.
- Get out. Come on, out.

706
00:37:47,077 --> 00:37:48,855
Out!
- I am sorry. I am sorry.

707
00:37:49,735 --> 00:37:51,579
Funny. Very funny. Too funny.

708
00:37:51,775 --> 00:37:52,775
Right, sir.

709
00:37:53,175 --> 00:37:55,415
And very exciting too.
- Right?

710
00:37:55,735 --> 00:37:59,575
I'll shoot this killing
portion with a hand-reel camera.

711
00:37:59,884 --> 00:38:00,754
Like RGV.

712
00:38:00,794 --> 00:38:01,794
Sir, RGV?

713
00:38:01,910 --> 00:38:04,495
Ram Gopal Verma.
- Oh yeah, of course.

714
00:38:04,575 --> 00:38:05,535
Sir, I suggest that..

715
00:38:05,575 --> 00:38:07,420
..you let him shoot
the killing scenes.

716
00:38:07,815 --> 00:38:08,981
Why not?

717
00:38:09,478 --> 00:38:10,935
Actually, he's my guru, you know.
- I see.

718
00:38:10,975 --> 00:38:11,975
Yes.

719
00:38:12,452 --> 00:38:13,455
I've assisted him.

720
00:38:13,495 --> 00:38:15,175
I've written dialogues for him.

721
00:38:15,655 --> 00:38:17,255
And I even operated
the camera in one film.

722
00:38:17,295 --> 00:38:18,514
What are you saying?
- 5D.

723
00:38:18,975 --> 00:38:20,175
Sometimes under the table.

724
00:38:20,255 --> 00:38:21,712
Sometimes under the actor's face.

725
00:38:21,835 --> 00:38:23,367
And sometimes above
the fan's blade..

726
00:38:23,407 --> 00:38:26,175
..and many other places.

727
00:38:26,335 --> 00:38:27,653
Superb, sir.

728
00:38:28,095 --> 00:38:30,375
This project is
getting very interesting.

729
00:38:30,415 --> 00:38:31,217
Thank you, sir.

730
00:38:31,257 --> 00:38:32,415
All the characters aren't just..

731
00:38:32,495 --> 00:38:34,375
..from different
socio-economic backgrounds..

732
00:38:34,455 --> 00:38:36,188
..in fact, they're from
different time-period as well.

733
00:38:36,228 --> 00:38:37,037
Thank you, sir.

734
00:38:37,077 --> 00:38:39,335
And this movie will have
an amazing ensemble cast.

735
00:38:39,415 --> 00:38:39,907
Thank you, sir.

736
00:38:39,947 --> 00:38:41,257
And these days there's
an award for this as well.

737
00:38:41,330 --> 00:38:42,330
Yes, sir.

738
00:38:42,615 --> 00:38:43,815
Bro, continue.

739
00:38:44,335 --> 00:38:46,655
Many of the old
haunted houses in Mumbai..

740
00:38:46,695 --> 00:38:49,015
..were being razed down in
the name of development.

741
00:38:49,295 --> 00:38:50,775
And the ghosts living in them..

742
00:38:50,815 --> 00:38:52,502
..decided to make
Gendamal's mansion..

743
00:38:52,542 --> 00:38:55,135
..their permanent
address and came to them.

744
00:38:55,615 --> 00:38:58,135
But it was getting
difficult for Gendamal..

745
00:38:58,215 --> 00:39:01,055
..to adjust and
accommodate everyone.

746
00:39:01,135 --> 00:39:04,055
So how did the ghosts
accommodation problem get solved?

747
00:39:04,215 --> 00:39:06,695
Sir, an interview board was formed.

748
00:39:08,135 --> 00:39:10,055
This is very loud, get it repaired.

749
00:39:10,095 --> 00:39:11,935
And not just from Mumbai, but..

750
00:39:12,015 --> 00:39:14,175
..ghosts from the
different parts of the country..

751
00:39:14,335 --> 00:39:16,641
..in fact, even from outside the
country came from the interview.

752
00:39:17,855 --> 00:39:19,655
Don't bend so much.

753
00:39:19,775 --> 00:39:22,095
Otherwise you'll hit your
head on the ground and break it.

754
00:39:22,175 --> 00:39:23,575
There's gas filled in your head.

755
00:39:23,615 --> 00:39:26,714
Take this pill and go.

756
00:39:29,892 --> 00:39:33,812
Mister, the leaf that you chew
is called a 'Paan' (betel-leaf).

757
00:39:34,012 --> 00:39:36,028
And my name's Akbar Khwaza Khan..

758
00:39:36,068 --> 00:39:38,804
alias Natwar Khawaza Khan
alias Khatwar Khwaza Khan.

759
00:39:39,092 --> 00:39:41,452
That's fine, but which one's
out of these three is your name?

760
00:39:41,541 --> 00:39:43,692
Gentleman, the person's
name is Akbar Khwaza Khan.

761
00:39:43,772 --> 00:39:44,852
And what's your name?

762
00:39:44,932 --> 00:39:46,452
I am Akbar Khwaza Khan.

763
00:39:46,612 --> 00:39:48,492
Then what is person's name?

764
00:39:48,612 --> 00:39:49,892
Gentleman, this is Urdu dialect.

765
00:39:49,972 --> 00:39:51,932
There's just me, there's no us.

766
00:39:52,012 --> 00:39:52,696
Oh you mean.

767
00:39:52,736 --> 00:39:55,132
You are my mother and you are my
father.. you are my friend too.

768
00:39:55,212 --> 00:39:56,922
It's an old Hindi film from
know you will not understand..

769
00:39:56,962 --> 00:39:58,348
..but nothing to worry.
- Continue

770
00:39:58,502 --> 00:40:00,532
In Continue We're Pindari's,
mister.

771
00:40:00,612 --> 00:40:02,012
Muslim-Maratha are brothers.

772
00:40:02,092 --> 00:40:03,652
We fought the battle of Mahirpur.

773
00:40:04,652 --> 00:40:06,372
Warrior.
- Warrior Akbar.

774
00:40:06,452 --> 00:40:07,852
Jodha-Akbar!

775
00:40:08,012 --> 00:40:09,972
You movie buff.

776
00:40:10,332 --> 00:40:12,172
Not Jodha-Akbar! Warrior Akbar.

777
00:40:12,252 --> 00:40:13,332
Talk with respect.

778
00:40:13,412 --> 00:40:14,052
Continue.

779
00:40:14,092 --> 00:40:17,692
Well, I was king of Indore's
Malhar Holkar's special chef.

780
00:40:17,772 --> 00:40:19,372
How did you become a ghost?

781
00:40:19,532 --> 00:40:21,732
Mister,
during the war of Mahirpur..

782
00:40:21,772 --> 00:40:24,132
..I tried to make
a hole in kitchen..

783
00:40:24,212 --> 00:40:26,932
..and keep an eye on
the enemy for the king.

784
00:40:27,372 --> 00:40:29,012
But I didn't know that the enemy..

785
00:40:29,092 --> 00:40:31,172
..already made a
hole in the back wall..

786
00:40:31,252 --> 00:40:33,812
..and have their guns aimed..

787
00:40:33,892 --> 00:40:35,532
..at the kind's special chef.

788
00:40:35,612 --> 00:40:37,467
On the whole what happened?

789
00:40:37,772 --> 00:40:41,772
On the whole the enemy
filled my whole body with holes..

790
00:40:41,892 --> 00:40:44,812
..that I didn't know
where do I breathe from..

791
00:40:44,972 --> 00:40:46,572
..and from where do I..

792
00:40:46,772 --> 00:40:49,932
Mister, that's why I
hate these Britishers.

793
00:40:50,252 --> 00:40:52,052
Is he talking about me?
- Yes.

794
00:40:52,132 --> 00:40:53,292
He says he likes you.

795
00:40:53,332 --> 00:40:54,332
Oh, hello.

796
00:40:54,419 --> 00:40:57,692
Mister, the kitchen
where I used to live.

797
00:40:58,034 --> 00:40:59,972
Now someone's opened
a tea-stall there.

798
00:41:00,052 --> 00:41:01,532
And now I am kitchen-less.

799
00:41:03,692 --> 00:41:07,292
Let's appoint him for
making non-veg food.

800
00:41:07,452 --> 00:41:08,492
Select.

801
00:41:09,372 --> 00:41:10,012
Selected.

802
00:41:10,052 --> 00:41:11,100
My name's PK.

803
00:41:11,294 --> 00:41:13,020
I was a film producer in Mumbai.

804
00:41:13,412 --> 00:41:17,092
You might know that a film
producer's life...is really bad.

805
00:41:17,332 --> 00:41:19,132
First run after the
director for the script.

806
00:41:19,212 --> 00:41:20,892
Then run after the hero for dates.

807
00:41:20,972 --> 00:41:23,094
Then run after the
heroine to dress her up fully.

808
00:41:23,212 --> 00:41:24,845
You get so good at running..

809
00:41:24,885 --> 00:41:26,959
..that, if you make the
producer run in the Olympics..

810
00:41:26,999 --> 00:41:28,332
..then he'll
definitely win a gold medal.

811
00:41:28,372 --> 00:41:30,892
Sir. Why does he use
that word when he speaks?

812
00:41:30,932 --> 00:41:32,972
Because the rascal does
not deserve to be here.

813
00:41:33,012 --> 00:41:33,932
Out!

814
00:41:33,972 --> 00:41:35,452
Reject him.
- Why, sir?

815
00:41:35,532 --> 00:41:36,332
Rejected.

816
00:41:36,372 --> 00:41:38,132
What did you do, rascal?
- Sorry, sir.

817
00:41:38,212 --> 00:41:39,812
Hello, sir.
I am Bhootnath Bhaduri.

818
00:41:39,892 --> 00:41:40,932
Bhoot..
- Yes.

819
00:41:41,012 --> 00:41:44,252
Before the partition I
lived in East Bengal.

820
00:41:44,372 --> 00:41:46,532
Back there I was a
compounder with the doctor.

821
00:41:46,612 --> 00:41:47,892
I used to give
medicines to the patients.

822
00:41:48,092 --> 00:41:51,012
And after the
partition I came to Bombay.

823
00:41:51,172 --> 00:41:52,732
Mumbai. Mumbai.

824
00:41:52,812 --> 00:41:54,812
You're so stupid, brother.

825
00:41:54,852 --> 00:41:56,372
There was no Mumbai back then.

826
00:41:56,452 --> 00:41:58,092
It was just Bombay back then.

827
00:41:58,172 --> 00:41:59,412
So I came to Bombay..

828
00:41:59,492 --> 00:42:01,692
..and started living
close to the railway tracks.

829
00:42:01,772 --> 00:42:03,052
It was nice. It was nice.

830
00:42:03,132 --> 00:42:05,612
But my life had become terrible.

831
00:42:05,732 --> 00:42:07,532
Every day the train pass-by..

832
00:42:07,612 --> 00:42:11,932
..making the clacking sounds.

833
00:42:12,252 --> 00:42:15,772
One day a train passed
too close to my ears.

834
00:42:15,852 --> 00:42:16,932
I didn't realize.

835
00:42:17,012 --> 00:42:19,892
But then someone said
"Bengali man passed away".

836
00:42:19,972 --> 00:42:22,372
That's when I realized
that I am dead.

837
00:42:22,612 --> 00:42:24,692
So after that I
started living on a tree.

838
00:42:24,883 --> 00:42:26,723
Then one day few people
came and said..

839
00:42:26,763 --> 00:42:28,612
..we'll make a highway here,
four-lane highway.

840
00:42:28,692 --> 00:42:30,972
And they cut down the tree.
I lost my home.

841
00:42:31,132 --> 00:42:34,132
After that I searched for a home..

842
00:42:34,172 --> 00:42:36,732
..but, I couldn't find a
single home in Mumbai.

843
00:42:36,812 --> 00:42:38,252
Bombay. Bombay.

844
00:42:38,692 --> 00:42:41,012
He's very stupid.

845
00:42:41,783 --> 00:42:44,743
Now it's Mumbai, there's
no more Bombay anymore.

846
00:42:46,253 --> 00:42:49,212
You see, East Bengal
became Bangladesh.

847
00:42:49,292 --> 00:42:50,692
Bombay became Mumbai.

848
00:42:50,772 --> 00:42:52,132
Humans become devil.

849
00:42:52,212 --> 00:42:54,189
But I was a refugee
even before I died..

850
00:42:54,229 --> 00:42:55,972
..and I am a refugee
even after I am dead.

851
00:42:56,052 --> 00:42:57,172
Nothing happened to me.

852
00:42:58,252 --> 00:43:00,292
Your story is very touching.

853
00:43:01,132 --> 00:43:03,692
A Compounder that's bit
like a doctor Isn't it?

854
00:43:04,023 --> 00:43:05,012
I know better.

855
00:43:05,052 --> 00:43:07,892
After eating Khwaja
Khan's food we might need him.

856
00:43:08,097 --> 00:43:08,794
Okay.

857
00:43:08,834 --> 00:43:09,834
Accepted.

858
00:43:10,434 --> 00:43:11,434
Accepted.

859
00:43:11,842 --> 00:43:13,572
Thank you.
Thank you, brother.

860
00:43:13,732 --> 00:43:16,492
Try this medicine.

861
00:43:16,892 --> 00:43:18,412
Take it. Take it.
Take this pill.

862
00:43:21,440 --> 00:43:22,732
Always works, brother.

863
00:43:23,377 --> 00:43:24,612
So fast?
- Yes.

864
00:43:25,856 --> 00:43:27,892
For the next
interview we'll go outdoors.

865
00:43:28,265 --> 00:43:29,211
Okay.

866
00:43:29,251 --> 00:43:30,251
Oh, God!

867
00:43:30,864 --> 00:43:33,052
It is still not working,
but this is working.

868
00:43:34,887 --> 00:43:35,887
Sir.

869
00:43:36,607 --> 00:43:37,652
I am sorry. I am sorry.

870
00:43:37,938 --> 00:43:38,972
I am sorry.

871
00:43:39,396 --> 00:43:41,292
Brigadier Hoshiyar
Singh from Hoshiyarpur..

872
00:43:41,332 --> 00:43:43,007
..winner of Dharamveer Chakra, sir.

873
00:43:43,145 --> 00:43:44,145
Sir!

874
00:43:44,203 --> 00:43:47,283
Sir, shall we talk and talk
and pass some gas too? - No.

875
00:43:47,363 --> 00:43:49,003
I mean pass some time, sir.
- Yes.

876
00:43:49,083 --> 00:43:50,083
Sir.
- Sir.

877
00:43:50,323 --> 00:43:53,363
In the year of 1999, the enemy..

878
00:43:53,443 --> 00:43:55,963
..was showering bullets on us.

879
00:43:56,136 --> 00:44:00,723
We had reacquired many parts
of Drass and Batalik sector.

880
00:44:00,970 --> 00:44:02,883
In the happiness of the victory..

881
00:44:02,963 --> 00:44:04,403
..our convoy was moving ahead..

882
00:44:04,483 --> 00:44:07,043
..singing 'Hindustan Hamara',
when suddenly.

883
00:44:07,549 --> 00:44:08,723
we were shelled.

884
00:44:08,883 --> 00:44:10,255
We were bombarded.

885
00:44:11,068 --> 00:44:13,116
Sir...sir..

886
00:44:13,354 --> 00:44:15,763
I guess the enemy ghosts are
bombarding this place as well.

887
00:44:15,843 --> 00:44:16,963
We should be careful.
- Relax.

888
00:44:17,043 --> 00:44:19,523
We should..
- Relax, there's nobody here.

889
00:44:19,603 --> 00:44:21,243
It's just a passing phase.

890
00:44:21,323 --> 00:44:22,123
Passing.

891
00:44:22,163 --> 00:44:23,363
It's passed.

892
00:44:23,603 --> 00:44:25,123
I respect your opinion, sir.

893
00:44:25,203 --> 00:44:27,603
But an army man should
always be alert, sir.

894
00:44:27,683 --> 00:44:29,803
Why?
- We attained martyrdom.

895
00:44:29,963 --> 00:44:33,188
And even after we died the
government scammed our coffins.

896
00:44:33,228 --> 00:44:35,563
Why? Because we weren't alert.

897
00:44:35,643 --> 00:44:37,843
This is the perfect man
to maintain security..

898
00:44:37,923 --> 00:44:39,283
..for our mansion.
- Okay.

899
00:44:40,187 --> 00:44:41,710
Hoshiyar Singh.
- Yes sir.

900
00:44:42,167 --> 00:44:44,483
Situation and breeze, both
are quite worse. - I know, sir.

901
00:44:44,667 --> 00:44:48,443
But you used your brains,
so I select you.

902
00:44:50,170 --> 00:44:52,083
I am Aatmaram Paswan.

903
00:44:52,302 --> 00:44:53,523
No, you were.

904
00:44:54,206 --> 00:44:55,443
Better take the Ram and
Paswan out of your name.

905
00:44:55,523 --> 00:44:56,603
Now you're just Aatma (spirit).

906
00:44:56,758 --> 00:44:57,923
District was Darbhanga.

907
00:44:58,042 --> 00:44:59,203
No, it still is.

908
00:44:59,352 --> 00:45:01,083
You're dead, but
Darbhanga is still alive.

909
00:45:01,237 --> 00:45:03,392
What did you do?
- Sir, during the day..

910
00:45:03,432 --> 00:45:05,323
..I used to drive
the taxi in Mumbai.

911
00:45:05,403 --> 00:45:07,003
And sleep on the footpath at night.

912
00:45:07,166 --> 00:45:09,643
One night,
just before the new year..

913
00:45:09,813 --> 00:45:11,603
..I was sleeping
covered in my blanket.

914
00:45:11,863 --> 00:45:15,283
Suddenly, a rich man,
who was very drunk..

915
00:45:15,363 --> 00:45:17,683
..drove his car onto the footpath.

916
00:45:18,059 --> 00:45:19,560
Exactly at the spot
where I was sleeping.

917
00:45:19,600 --> 00:45:21,563
And right then Aatmaram's soul..

918
00:45:21,705 --> 00:45:23,911
..was liberated from
Aatmaram's body. Right?

919
00:45:24,025 --> 00:45:25,523
I don't know, sir.

920
00:45:25,800 --> 00:45:26,963
I am a poor man.

921
00:45:27,202 --> 00:45:29,203
I have an old model
car parked outside.

922
00:45:29,534 --> 00:45:31,523
Can you take me
to the beach in that?

923
00:45:31,711 --> 00:45:33,102
I will take you
wherever you want, sir.

924
00:45:33,142 --> 00:45:34,763
Fine, fine. Yes, what do you say?

925
00:45:35,239 --> 00:45:37,443
This driver does have some drive.
- Yes.

926
00:45:37,695 --> 00:45:38,695
