Accept him.

927
00:45:38,749 --> 00:45:39,883
The whiteman said something.

928
00:45:40,073 --> 00:45:41,083
Selected.

929
00:45:41,263 --> 00:45:43,203
Myself Robin Hooda.

930
00:45:43,530 --> 00:45:45,723
Robin Hood?
- Not Hood.

931
00:45:46,243 --> 00:45:48,283
Hooda. From Rohtak, Haryana.

932
00:45:48,635 --> 00:45:49,635
Father was an engineer..

933
00:45:49,683 --> 00:45:51,203
..so, he wanted me
to be an engineer too.

934
00:45:51,412 --> 00:45:52,403
And mother was a doctor.

935
00:45:52,443 --> 00:45:54,003
She wanted to see me in
the operation theatre.

936
00:45:54,143 --> 00:45:55,963
But I was interested in
music since I was a kid.

937
00:45:56,043 --> 00:45:56,923
Rock music.

938
00:45:56,963 --> 00:45:58,323
Dodes, Metallica.

939
00:45:58,776 --> 00:46:01,523
Anyway, I formed a band.
Also released an album.

940
00:46:01,719 --> 00:46:03,203
We sold 13 CDs in the market.

941
00:46:03,458 --> 00:46:04,163
That's all.

942
00:46:04,203 --> 00:46:06,283
Squandered lots of money,
also got humiliated.

943
00:46:06,363 --> 00:46:07,563
And I also went into depression.

944
00:46:07,723 --> 00:46:09,803
I couldn't write songs.
The writer in me was blocked.

945
00:46:10,044 --> 00:46:11,803
In frustration
I started taking drugs.

946
00:46:11,931 --> 00:46:15,163
Drugs you mean Aspro,
Anacin and Crocin.

947
00:46:15,386 --> 00:46:16,810
No. Marijuana, cannabis.

948
00:46:17,690 --> 00:46:20,283
Earlier I took small doses.
Later I increased the dosage.

949
00:46:21,478 --> 00:46:23,443
One day I injected excess heroine.

950
00:46:23,707 --> 00:46:25,015
When I came to my senses..

951
00:46:25,055 --> 00:46:27,483
..I realized that's Robin
Hooda lying on the ice-slab.

952
00:46:27,847 --> 00:46:30,123
My nose was plugged with cotton.

953
00:46:30,379 --> 00:46:32,523
It would be nice to
have a musician. - Yes.

954
00:46:32,843 --> 00:46:33,843
I believe so.

955
00:46:34,215 --> 00:46:35,710
Here at Royal Mansion,
we would have..

956
00:46:35,750 --> 00:46:37,563
..different kinds of
musicians visiting us.

957
00:46:37,803 --> 00:46:40,533
Really?
- Yes. They would come, perform..

958
00:46:40,619 --> 00:46:43,643
..then eat, and after
they ate, I would perform.

959
00:46:43,888 --> 00:46:45,561
But whenever I
performed they would leave.

960
00:46:45,648 --> 00:46:46,723
I don't know why. Selected.

961
00:46:58,664 --> 00:46:59,664
You're the boss.

962
00:47:01,926 --> 00:47:02,926
Hi, I am Tina.

963
00:47:03,314 --> 00:47:04,314
I am.. I am..I am

964
00:47:06,122 --> 00:47:07,202
No, no, it's alright.

965
00:47:07,521 --> 00:47:08,922
I'm Gendamal Hemraj.

966
00:47:09,042 --> 00:47:10,139
Please sit down.

967
00:47:10,762 --> 00:47:13,013
Daughter of famous
industrialist Pran Chopra.

968
00:47:14,104 --> 00:47:16,642
Power-plants, chemical industries,
real-estate.

969
00:47:16,842 --> 00:47:19,362
My dad used to do
every kind of business.

970
00:47:19,562 --> 00:47:22,563
You know what, I was a
really pampered kid.

971
00:47:22,962 --> 00:47:25,926
And on top of that,
I loved to party.

972
00:47:26,113 --> 00:47:28,184
Heineken was my favorite beer

973
00:47:28,682 --> 00:47:30,322
One day I realized that..

974
00:47:30,402 --> 00:47:33,042
..due to partying
and drinking beer..

975
00:47:33,162 --> 00:47:35,162
..I had gained so much weight.

976
00:47:35,482 --> 00:47:37,263
Right then I joined a gym.

977
00:47:37,802 --> 00:47:40,682
And that's where I met Sam.

978
00:47:41,562 --> 00:47:42,562
Sam?

979
00:47:42,642 --> 00:47:44,722
Sam Gonzalvis,
my gym instructor.

980
00:47:44,802 --> 00:47:47,097
I was totally in love with him.

981
00:47:47,970 --> 00:47:50,435
One day my mom-dad
found out everything.

982
00:47:50,842 --> 00:47:53,836
They tried to bribe
me for leaving Sam.

983
00:47:54,442 --> 00:47:55,802
But when I didn't agree..

984
00:47:55,922 --> 00:47:57,942
..they made Sam
disappear from Mumbai.

985
00:47:58,162 --> 00:47:59,626
I could never forget Sam.

986
00:48:00,002 --> 00:48:01,202
I was in love.

987
00:48:01,642 --> 00:48:03,720
And I was completely heart-broken.

988
00:48:04,002 --> 00:48:06,057
I didn't know what to do.

989
00:48:06,442 --> 00:48:08,322
One day I climbed
up to the 10th floor..

990
00:48:08,442 --> 00:48:10,442
..and jumped down.

991
00:48:10,722 --> 00:48:12,022
I killed myself.

992
00:48:12,402 --> 00:48:15,202
And when I died
I saw my parents crying.

993
00:48:15,517 --> 00:48:17,373
I felt really, really sad.

994
00:48:23,162 --> 00:48:24,162
Accepted.

995
00:48:26,467 --> 00:48:27,242
Thanks.

996
00:48:27,282 --> 00:48:29,202
After the interview was over..

997
00:48:29,282 --> 00:48:31,599
..Royal Mansion put up
a houseful board.

998
00:48:31,922 --> 00:48:33,322
And that night Gendamal..

999
00:48:33,402 --> 00:48:36,882
..called the selected ghosts
in the hall for a welcome drink.

1000
00:48:40,802 --> 00:48:43,282
My dear late Ladies and Gentlemen.

1001
00:48:44,522 --> 00:48:47,727
A ghostly welcome to Royal Mansion.

1002
00:48:48,968 --> 00:48:51,432
Today is a unique day for us.

1003
00:48:52,002 --> 00:48:53,362
It's unimaginable.

1004
00:48:53,442 --> 00:48:55,362
Because after today,
all of us..

1005
00:48:55,442 --> 00:48:56,915
..will be living
under the same roof..

1006
00:48:57,242 --> 00:48:59,366
..which might not have
been possible if we were humans.

1007
00:49:01,722 --> 00:49:02,722
Friends.

1008
00:49:02,962 --> 00:49:05,082
When we were alive,
the fear of death..

1009
00:49:05,162 --> 00:49:06,882
..wouldn't let us live peacefully.

1010
00:49:07,766 --> 00:49:09,122
But now we're dead.

1011
00:49:09,448 --> 00:49:11,042
Now we're not scared of death.

1012
00:49:13,322 --> 00:49:16,402
So come...from today
we enjoy our life..

1013
00:49:16,442 --> 00:49:19,082
I mean our afterlife.

1014
00:49:19,759 --> 00:49:24,322
And swear that we
couldn't be a good human being.

1015
00:49:24,535 --> 00:49:26,431
But we will definitely
be a good ghost.

1016
00:49:26,842 --> 00:49:28,762
And we'll make the
ghosts of Royal mansion..

1017
00:49:28,842 --> 00:49:31,322
..proud amongst the
ghosts in the world.

1018
00:49:31,402 --> 00:49:32,802
Yes!
- Cheers.

1019
00:49:32,882 --> 00:49:34,042
Tell me one thing.

1020
00:49:34,122 --> 00:49:37,362
Did all the ghosts settle in
Royal Mansion? - Yes, sir.

1021
00:49:37,753 --> 00:49:40,762
All the ghosts lived
here comfortably.

1022
00:49:40,921 --> 00:49:42,402
Aatmaram.

1023
00:49:42,758 --> 00:49:44,322
You dead-man.

1024
00:49:44,602 --> 00:49:46,322
Where are you dying?

1025
00:49:46,402 --> 00:49:48,162
Hurry up.

1026
00:49:48,202 --> 00:49:49,242
Start the car.

1027
00:49:49,322 --> 00:49:50,882
I've to go to Dadar TT.

1028
00:49:51,002 --> 00:49:55,362
And I've to buy sweets
from Damodar's shop.

1029
00:49:56,802 --> 00:49:58,082
Aatmaram.

1030
00:49:58,162 --> 00:50:00,322
You're a insult
to the ghost society.

1031
00:50:00,402 --> 00:50:03,002
It's morning
and you're still sleeping.

1032
00:50:03,082 --> 00:50:06,299
I am not sleeping, just
straightening my back.

1033
00:50:06,339 --> 00:50:09,562
Rascal, you're a crooked man
that's why you've a crooked back.

1034
00:50:09,642 --> 00:50:11,882
I don't know. I am a poor man.

1035
00:50:12,002 --> 00:50:13,322
Rascal.

1036
00:50:13,402 --> 00:50:15,082
If you're a poor man then
sit in the driver's seat.

1037
00:50:15,162 --> 00:50:16,242
What are you doing at the back?

1038
00:50:16,322 --> 00:50:17,402
Yes.
- And hurry up.

1039
00:50:17,482 --> 00:50:19,762
Hurry up,
I've to get to market soon.

1040
00:50:19,802 --> 00:50:21,642
Why the market so soon?

1041
00:50:21,682 --> 00:50:25,202
You fool, look there.

1042
00:50:25,460 --> 00:50:26,922
In the sky.

1043
00:50:27,042 --> 00:50:28,522
The sky is this way.

1044
00:50:28,663 --> 00:50:30,722
Here too.
- You're a poor man.

1045
00:50:30,802 --> 00:50:31,922
So look here.
- I see.

1046
00:50:32,002 --> 00:50:36,682
See, the stars have set
and the sun is shining.

1047
00:50:37,082 --> 00:50:39,122
Now let's go, start the car.

1048
00:50:39,762 --> 00:50:42,722
The great Indian poor man.

1049
00:50:43,522 --> 00:50:45,162
But why does he have to buy?

1050
00:50:45,322 --> 00:50:47,442
He can just extend
his hand and steal it.

1051
00:50:47,522 --> 00:50:49,082
Sir, he's a Bengali
ghost after all.

1052
00:50:49,162 --> 00:50:50,722
Until he doesn't argue and haggle..

1053
00:50:50,802 --> 00:50:53,675
..with the shopkeeper,
who will call him...

1054
00:50:54,922 --> 00:50:57,802
You've done a good study
of the Bengali's character traits.

1055
00:50:57,882 --> 00:50:59,682
Thank you, sir. And
thank for this also, sir.

1056
00:50:59,762 --> 00:51:01,162
Sir, do you like the story?

1057
00:51:01,322 --> 00:51:03,802
That's why I am also giving
you your first installment.

1058
00:51:03,962 --> 00:51:04,802
Right, sir.

1059
00:51:04,842 --> 00:51:06,602
So all the shopping was done.

1060
00:51:06,913 --> 00:51:10,042
Bhootnath returned with
fresh sweets and snacks..

1061
00:51:10,242 --> 00:51:15,469
..to express his
eternal love to Manoranjana.

1062
00:51:16,563 --> 00:51:18,002
Stop. Stop.

1063
00:51:18,202 --> 00:51:19,962
I am stopping.

1064
00:51:20,134 --> 00:51:21,962
Why are you heading
out of the gate again?

1065
00:51:22,082 --> 00:51:23,442
Now do one thing.

1066
00:51:23,562 --> 00:51:25,076
Get what's down there.

1067
00:51:25,657 --> 00:51:26,275
What?

1068
00:51:26,315 --> 00:51:29,042
Get what's down there.

1069
00:51:29,202 --> 00:51:30,122
Oh no.

1070
00:51:30,162 --> 00:51:31,202
No.

1071
00:51:31,282 --> 00:51:33,362
Get what's down there?
- How?

1072
00:51:33,562 --> 00:51:38,442
Not yours, what's down mine.
- What?

1073
00:51:38,482 --> 00:51:39,762
The bag.

1074
00:51:39,842 --> 00:51:41,442
Get the shopping bag.

1075
00:51:41,522 --> 00:51:43,007
It's between my legs.

1076
00:51:44,202 --> 00:51:46,202
Get it out.
- Yes, sir.

1077
00:51:47,006 --> 00:51:49,482
You might be a poor man,
but take bigger steps.

1078
00:51:49,717 --> 00:51:51,082
Hurry up!
Hurry up!

1079
00:51:51,330 --> 00:51:56,042
How dare you come to the
1st floor in this uniform?

1080
00:51:56,271 --> 00:51:58,962
I don't know, sir.
I am a poor man.

1081
00:51:59,182 --> 00:52:01,602
I wonder where I get
it from. I mean courage.

1082
00:52:01,682 --> 00:52:03,402
Keep the bags in the
kitchen and go down.

1083
00:52:03,482 --> 00:52:04,682
That's a good idea.

1084
00:52:04,802 --> 00:52:06,482
Keep it.

1085
00:52:07,794 --> 00:52:11,654
Bhootnath,
you're a high-class Bengali.

1086
00:52:12,432 --> 00:52:14,362
Why do you entertain
such lowly people?

1087
00:52:14,482 --> 00:52:17,682
You won't tell me who I'll
entertain and who I will not.

1088
00:52:17,846 --> 00:52:19,419
Because you're a
double-standard man.

1089
00:52:19,459 --> 00:52:20,745
You brought that home..

1090
00:52:20,785 --> 00:52:22,802
..for the sake of your
Biryanis and Kebabs.

1091
00:52:22,842 --> 00:52:24,682
Did I say something?
- Don't say that.

1092
00:52:24,803 --> 00:52:26,162
I am telling you..

1093
00:52:26,242 --> 00:52:27,722
You fools.

1094
00:52:27,947 --> 00:52:30,468
You're 21st century ghosts
and still talk about classes.

1095
00:52:30,763 --> 00:52:31,763
Now hear a song.

1096
00:52:31,842 --> 00:52:32,802
No, no.

1097
00:52:32,842 --> 00:52:34,983
Stop singing. Stop.

1098
00:52:35,130 --> 00:52:38,624
I already died once. I don't want
to die again hearing your song.

1099
00:52:38,899 --> 00:52:41,922
I guess he lost his
musical sense when he died. - No.

1100
00:52:42,519 --> 00:52:44,402
My musical sense is intact.

1101
00:52:44,793 --> 00:52:47,177
But the way you sing,
it's not called music.

1102
00:52:47,393 --> 00:52:49,713
We selected him for this mansion..

1103
00:52:49,873 --> 00:52:53,860
..so that I will get to
hear classical music again.

1104
00:52:54,033 --> 00:52:56,593
But he turned
everything un-classical.

1105
00:52:56,713 --> 00:52:59,033
True. True.

1106
00:53:03,113 --> 00:53:04,153
Bhootnath.

1107
00:53:04,873 --> 00:53:06,633
When I was alive,
I had a similar..

1108
00:53:06,713 --> 00:53:08,673
..old and grumpy man
in my neighborhood.

1109
00:53:09,033 --> 00:53:11,553
He used to speak
nonsense about my music.

1110
00:53:12,033 --> 00:53:13,833
Once that old man lodged a
complaint with the police..

1111
00:53:13,913 --> 00:53:15,233
..to stop my jam session.

1112
00:53:16,513 --> 00:53:18,073
It's the same situation
all over again..

1113
00:53:18,153 --> 00:53:19,153
..even after I am dead.

1114
00:53:19,193 --> 00:53:21,433
Son, don't sulk.

1115
00:53:21,593 --> 00:53:23,153
Don't be sad.

1116
00:53:23,433 --> 00:53:24,673
Do one thing.

1117
00:53:24,753 --> 00:53:26,993
Start singing folk songs.

1118
00:53:27,153 --> 00:53:29,113
If you don't know folk,
then sing patriotic songs.

1119
00:53:29,273 --> 00:53:30,873
Like 'Vande Mataram'..

1120
00:53:31,033 --> 00:53:32,473
Bhootnath. Bhootnath.

1121
00:53:32,673 --> 00:53:34,793
I've already prepared a
remix version of this song.

1122
00:53:34,873 --> 00:53:36,633
But I don't want my songs..

1123
00:53:36,673 --> 00:53:38,313
..to be bounded by country borders.

1124
00:53:38,393 --> 00:53:39,433
Great.

1125
00:53:39,513 --> 00:53:42,913
Wonderful, Robin. Wonderful.

1126
00:53:42,993 --> 00:53:46,833
What a dialogue...about music.

1127
00:53:50,193 --> 00:53:55,713
But...according to me, sing
a song for broken heart..

1128
00:53:56,113 --> 00:53:58,793
..which compels me to drink.

1129
00:53:58,873 --> 00:54:00,553
One can sing about heartbreaks..

1130
00:54:00,593 --> 00:54:01,873
..only after a few pegs.

1131
00:54:01,953 --> 00:54:05,089
You mean first we down a few
pegs and then sing a song. - Right.

1132
00:54:05,188 --> 00:54:07,753
Then I'll take you
to Bhoot Bar today.

1133
00:54:07,833 --> 00:54:08,833
Bhoot Bar.

1134
00:54:08,993 --> 00:54:10,833
Tonight's Friday night.

1135
00:54:11,044 --> 00:54:14,193
There must be gorgeous
ghosts visiting today.

1136
00:54:17,713 --> 00:54:19,753
This is Bhoot Bar.

1137
00:54:19,793 --> 00:54:21,233
Amazing.

1138
00:54:21,553 --> 00:54:23,233
It's so nice.

1139
00:54:23,433 --> 00:54:25,593
I thought she hasn't arrived yet.

1140
00:54:26,353 --> 00:54:27,793
Go get it.

1141
00:54:28,513 --> 00:54:29,873
Come on.

1142
00:54:31,689 --> 00:54:34,673
"..will you drink me?

1143
00:54:35,673 --> 00:54:42,473
"Intoxication is
something you can't let go."

1144
00:54:43,183 --> 00:54:49,633
"It's like my beloved,
you just can't let go."

1145
00:54:54,076 --> 00:54:57,473
"The bottle of alcohol's
such a rascal."

1146
00:54:57,732 --> 00:55:00,873
"Will I drink you,
or will you drink me?"

1147

"The bottle of alcohol's

"Will I drink you,

"The bottle of alcohol's

"The bottle of alcohol's

"The bottle of alcohol's

1152
00:55:41,796 --> 00:55:48,153
"Will I drink you,

1153
00:55:48,758 --> 00:55:54,915
"The bottle...
of alcohol's such a rascal."

1154
00:55:55,105 --> 00:55:58,353
"The bottle of alcohol's
such a rascal."

1155
00:55:58,593 --> 00:56:01,873
"Will I drink you,
or will you drink me?"

1156
00:56:02,033 --> 00:56:05,433
"The bottle of alcohol's

1157
00:56:05,820 --> 00:56:08,873
"Will I drink you,
or will you drink me?"

1158

"Take a sip or gulp
down the entire bottle."

1159
00:56:12,627 --> 00:56:15,633
"Forget the world,
let's shake the world."

1160
00:56:15,852 --> 00:56:19,353
"Life's short,
let me drink half of it."

1161
00:56:19,588 --> 00:56:21,513
"Forget all your sorrows,
take a peg."

1162

"Baby don't cry."

1163

"I couldn't find any love,
so I picked you."

1164

"I hadn't gotten over my first sorrow."
"And now I invited another."

1165

"I couldn't find any love,
so I picked you."

1166
00:56:33,784 --> 00:56:36,910
"I hadn't gotten over my first sorrow."
"And now I invited another."

1167

"I couldn't find any love,
so I picked you."

1168

"I couldn't find any love,
so I picked you."

1169
00:56:51,601 --> 00:56:55,001
"I hadn't gotten
over my first sorrow."

1170

"And now I invited another."

1171
00:56:58,681 --> 00:57:05,561
"You're bound to
drown in this sorrow."

1172
00:57:05,685 --> 00:57:11,721
"The bottle of alcohol's
such a rascal."

1173
00:57:15,481 --> 00:57:16,481
"Bottle."

1174
00:58:08,544 --> 00:58:14,841
"The bottle of alcohol's
such a rascal."

1175
00:58:21,721 --> 00:58:23,641
"The bottle of alcohol's.."

1176
00:58:25,481 --> 00:58:30,241
"Will I drink you,
or will you drink me?"

1177
00:58:41,121 --> 00:58:41,841
See, sir.

1178
00:58:41,881 --> 00:58:44,321
It matches to your vision.

1179
00:58:44,401 --> 00:58:45,321
Matching.

1180
00:58:45,361 --> 00:58:48,361
Biggest commercial
complex in the country, sir.

1181
00:58:48,441 --> 00:58:51,161
Superb. Find the owner.

1182
00:58:51,511 --> 00:58:52,761
Guliyani, sir.

1183
00:58:52,841 --> 00:58:54,961
Yes, Guliyani. Find the owner.

1184
00:58:55,121 --> 00:58:58,041
But, sir, there's a problem.

1185
00:59:00,281 --> 00:59:04,041
We builders setup our shop
where there's a problem.

1186
00:59:04,401 --> 00:59:08,081
So Gu, I want this Royal Mansion.

1187
00:59:08,576 --> 00:59:10,401
At any cost.

1188
00:59:10,649 --> 00:59:12,001
Get that?
- Yes, sir.

1189
00:59:12,161 --> 00:59:15,801
"Where do we go?"

1190
00:59:20,478 --> 00:59:21,718
Silence.
- Start sound.

1191
00:59:21,798 --> 00:59:22,998
Rolling.
- Camera.

1192
00:59:23,078 --> 00:59:24,118
Rolling. Clap.

1193
00:59:24,198 --> 00:59:25,958
Take 7.
- Action.

1194
00:59:27,798 --> 00:59:28,798
Cut. Cut. Cut.

1195
00:59:32,437 --> 00:59:36,158
Manoranjana.
Who are you cutting?

1196
00:59:36,318 --> 00:59:38,717
I was dreaming.

1197
00:59:38,757 --> 00:59:41,718
Dreaming? - I am
shooting for a film and..

1198
00:59:41,918 --> 00:59:45,878
You've crossed
the LOC of your life.

1199
00:59:46,250 --> 00:59:47,958
So I suggest that you..

1200
00:59:48,078 --> 00:59:50,478
..stop dreaming about
shootings and films.

1201
00:59:50,786 --> 00:59:53,478
Whether a film actor
leaves her work or the world..

1202
00:59:53,872 --> 00:59:57,678
..but she can never forget
those gleaming arc lights.

1203
00:59:57,821 --> 00:59:58,821
Wow.

1204
00:59:59,514 --> 01:00:00,598
The camera.

1205
01:00:01,299 --> 01:00:02,299
The Nagra.

1206
01:00:02,817 --> 01:00:03,878
The green room.

1207
01:00:04,349 --> 01:00:05,998
Ice box, spot boy.

1208
01:00:06,400 --> 01:00:10,278
Food from hero's home.
- Wow.

1209
01:00:10,899 --> 01:00:14,853
Watching your passion
for your work..

1210
01:00:15,013 --> 01:00:17,681
..even after you're dead
has made me your...deadly fan.

1211
01:00:19,689 --> 01:00:21,398
Autograph please.

1212
01:00:21,588 --> 01:00:24,838
I don't sign on currency notes.
- Why?

1213
01:00:25,438 --> 01:00:29,186
When the chairman
of the Reserve Bank..

1214
01:00:29,740 --> 01:00:32,598
..has already signed on it,
then how can I sign it?

1215
01:00:35,106 --> 01:00:36,398
Sigh my palm.

1216
01:00:37,827 --> 01:00:38,877
Pen please.

1217
01:00:40,634 --> 01:00:41,615
Name please.

1218
01:00:41,655 --> 01:00:43,038
Hoshiyar Singh.

1219
01:00:44,618 --> 01:00:49,738
Love to Hoshiyar Singh,
Manoranjana Kumari.

1220
01:00:51,658 --> 01:00:55,298
I will never wash this hand again,
even if I've to cut it.

1221
01:00:56,433 --> 01:01:00,338
You know, in 1965 when
I was in Khardunla..

1222
01:01:00,818 --> 01:01:03,538
You must be in an epic
battle with the enemy.

1223
01:01:03,618 --> 01:01:04,578
No.

1224
01:01:04,618 --> 01:01:06,218
I was watching your film.

1225
01:01:06,298 --> 01:01:07,938
Love can happen anytime.

1226
01:01:08,378 --> 01:01:09,658
Such a nice title.

1227
01:01:09,738 --> 01:01:11,184
Love can happen anytime.

1228
01:01:11,536 --> 01:01:12,536
It can happen now too.

1229
01:01:12,620 --> 01:01:16,338
"I am such a crazy Jatt."

1230
01:01:18,075 --> 01:01:21,018
"I am such a crazy Jatt."

1231
01:01:21,134 --> 01:01:24,338
"Couldn't understand
such a simple thing."

1232
01:01:24,418 --> 01:01:25,138
"That.."

1233
01:01:25,178 --> 01:01:26,258
Hoshiyar Singh.

1234
01:01:26,338 --> 01:01:27,898
You're showing your smartness here.

1235
01:01:27,978 --> 01:01:29,538
And Gaindamal's looking for you.

1236
01:01:29,699 --> 01:01:31,898
Let's go.
- Okay.

1237
01:01:32,298 --> 01:01:33,578
Okay.

1238
01:01:34,032 --> 01:01:36,818
Thank you for your autograph.

1239
01:01:39,715 --> 01:01:43,011
We got introduced.
- Hurry up.

1240
01:01:43,218 --> 01:01:44,178
Come on.

1241
01:01:44,218 --> 01:01:47,538
"She loves."

1242
01:01:47,916 --> 01:01:50,578
"She's crazy about me."

1243
01:01:50,778 --> 01:01:51,778
Sir.

1244
01:01:53,171 --> 01:01:54,658
You called, sir.

1245
01:01:55,098 --> 01:01:55,858
Who's the boss?

1246
01:01:55,898 --> 01:01:56,978
I am the boss.
Who's the boss?

1247
01:01:57,058 --> 01:01:58,738
You're the boss.
- The boss didn't call you.

1248
01:01:58,818 --> 01:01:59,578
Rotate this.

1249
01:01:59,618 --> 01:02:02,898
Manoranjana, I've seen
all your plays. - Plays?

1250
01:02:03,018 --> 01:02:07,058
No, no, I mean cinema.

1251
01:02:07,538 --> 01:02:13,138
After watching your first
film I fell in love with you.

1252
01:02:13,218 --> 01:02:15,778
Like they say,
love at first night.

1253
01:02:16,893 --> 01:02:18,138
Love at first sight.

1254
01:02:18,296 --> 01:02:20,858
I know it's love at first sight.

1255
01:02:20,999 --> 01:02:22,618
But I saw the night show.

1256
01:02:22,783 --> 01:02:25,298
So I said love at first night.

1257
01:02:25,691 --> 01:02:28,138
Oh, God! I guess the
old man's lost his mind.

1258
01:02:28,218 --> 01:02:29,898
I didn't hear anything.

1259
01:02:30,256 --> 01:02:33,498
I was a big fan of your
since I was just a kid.

1260
01:02:33,578 --> 01:02:36,058
You know, I also
made a fan club for you.

1261
01:02:36,254 --> 01:02:39,378
And in that club we
all addressed you as Ma.

1262
01:02:41,086 --> 01:02:42,858
Not as in mother.

1263
01:02:42,978 --> 01:02:44,738
By Ma we meant Goddess.

1264
01:02:44,858 --> 01:02:48,898
Bhootnath, the movie
world is a bad place.

1265
01:02:49,451 --> 01:02:51,098
My Guru used to say..

1266
01:02:51,428 --> 01:02:53,298
..that you can stay in
this glittering world..

1267
01:02:53,378 --> 01:02:56,258
..only as long as
you stay beautiful.

1268
01:02:56,362 --> 01:02:57,538
Once your beauty disappears..

1269
01:02:57,618 --> 01:02:58,872
..you will disappear.

1270
01:03:00,540 --> 01:03:02,818
How could your Guru say that?

1271
01:03:03,107 --> 01:03:06,138
Beauty is not a pot of tea..

1272
01:03:06,218 --> 01:03:08,658
..that when the tea's over,
the pot's broken.

1273
01:03:09,011 --> 01:03:12,218
Manoranjana,
your time will never be up.

1274
01:03:12,557 --> 01:03:15,218
Because you were beautiful,
you still are..

1275
01:03:15,298 --> 01:03:16,860
..and forever will be.

1276
01:03:16,953 --> 01:03:20,138
There's no point in
praising me now, Bhootnath.

1277
01:03:20,378 --> 01:03:23,406
It's very late now.
- I understand.

1278
01:03:23,640 --> 01:03:26,738
But Manoranjana,
everyone's late here.

1279
01:03:27,022 --> 01:03:29,258
I am late Bhootnath Bhaduri.

1280
01:03:29,527 --> 01:03:32,058
You're late Manoranjana Kumari.

1281
01:03:32,520 --> 01:03:34,178
But before it's too late.

1282
01:03:34,948 --> 01:03:37,858
Sweets and snacks for you.

1283
01:03:38,399 --> 01:03:40,942
Bhootnath,
this isn't time for sweets.

1284
01:03:41,072 --> 01:03:43,178
Yes, I understand. I understand.

1285
01:03:43,518 --> 01:03:46,298
I get it. This is
time for something else.

1286
01:03:46,559 --> 01:03:50,138
But Manoranjana, I
want to say something.

1287
01:03:50,942 --> 01:03:53,762
Like all men, you'll say..

1288
01:03:53,981 --> 01:03:56,985
..Manoranjana, I love you a lot.

1289
01:03:57,508 --> 01:04:00,378
I am fed up of
hearing this dialogue.

1290
01:04:00,470 --> 01:04:02,938
Why will I say that?

1291
01:04:03,814 --> 01:04:06,605
I will say what I want.

1292
01:04:07,140 --> 01:04:09,500
And I want to hear you sing.

1293
01:04:10,506 --> 01:04:11,506
What?

1294
01:04:11,547 --> 01:04:13,538
Shameless.
Aren't you ashamed?

1295
01:04:13,661 --> 01:04:14,661
I'll show you.

1296
01:04:14,858 --> 01:04:15,858
Anybody there.

1297
01:04:16,212 --> 01:04:17,090
Anybody there.

1298
01:04:17,130 --> 01:04:18,578
Manoranjana.

1299
01:04:18,887 --> 01:04:20,658
I meant song.

1300
01:04:20,698 --> 01:04:22,477
Singing.

1301
01:04:22,683 --> 01:04:24,818
"Open your door."

1302
01:04:25,012 --> 01:04:26,765
"I am standing at your threshold."

1303
01:04:26,859 --> 01:04:30,401
"Don't let me standout anymore."

1304
01:04:30,627 --> 01:04:32,818
Who's there? Who's bothering you?

1305
01:04:33,080 --> 01:04:35,168
Manoranjana, my love..

1306
01:04:35,323 --> 01:04:38,018
..this Bhootnath's after you again.

1307
01:04:38,299 --> 01:04:39,538
But don't be scared.

1308
01:04:39,915 --> 01:04:42,245
This is Muslim-Maratha,
Khwaja Akbar Khan..

1309
01:04:42,327 --> 01:04:44,304
..chef of king Malhar
Holkar speaking.

1310
01:04:45,172 --> 01:04:47,326
I will teach him a lesson.

1311
01:04:47,396 --> 01:04:51,154
You rascal,
you will teach me a lesson.

1312
01:04:51,286 --> 01:04:54,818
A soldier without a shield and
sword and come here holding a rose.

1313
01:04:54,858 --> 01:04:58,178
Mind your tongue, Bhootnath.

1314
01:04:58,423 --> 01:05:00,873
Oh, God! What's going on?

1315
01:05:01,038 --> 01:05:04,718
Accept this lover's true
love and take this rose..

1316
01:05:04,878 --> 01:05:09,198
..and I'll personally
cook for you Kebabs.

1317
01:05:09,238 --> 01:05:12,198
And then you'll
suffer from loose motions.

1318
01:05:12,278 --> 01:05:14,318
Enemy of my love, be alert.

1319
01:05:14,438 --> 01:05:18,598
If you have Urdu poems
then I've Bengal Tigers.

1320
01:05:18,678 --> 01:05:19,638
I won't be scared.

1321
01:05:19,678 --> 01:05:20,758
You won't be scared?
- No.

1322
01:05:20,838 --> 01:05:22,478
Then you will be killed by me.

1323
01:05:22,558 --> 01:05:24,040
Come on.
- I see.

1324
01:05:24,131 --> 01:05:25,518
I will die. You will kill me?

1325
01:05:25,558 --> 01:05:27,838
Rascal, how will you kill me?

1326
01:05:27,918 --> 01:05:30,146
How will you kill me?
- Don't provoke me.

1327
01:05:30,186 --> 01:05:31,998
Will you kill me with
the plastic rose?

1328
01:05:32,078 --> 01:05:33,798
There goes your plastic rose.

1329
01:05:33,878 --> 01:05:35,318
What the..

1330
01:05:38,598 --> 01:05:39,718
What's up, sister?

1331
01:05:39,758 --> 01:05:41,341
You've hit the jackpot.

1332
01:05:41,518 --> 01:05:42,918
One rose and three admirers.

1333
01:05:42,973 --> 01:05:45,758
Oh my, God! How will I
handle three lovers?

1334
01:05:45,838 --> 01:05:46,838
Three.

1335
01:05:47,237 --> 01:05:50,558
I'm experienced
at handling 30, Tina.

1336
01:05:50,858 --> 01:05:54,198
But these are old men,
and they're all dead.

1337
01:05:55,108 --> 01:05:57,438
But there's a nice
boy for you here.

1338
01:05:57,584 --> 01:05:59,918
He's single, and also ready to
mingle. If I would be at your place

1339
01:06:00,170 --> 01:06:02,798
I would've taken
him on a long-drive..

1340
01:06:02,878 --> 01:06:04,198
..and eaten dinner with him.

1341
01:06:06,278 --> 01:06:07,745
You smoke so much?

1342
01:06:08,038 --> 01:06:10,198
Haven't you heard?
Smoking is injurious to health.

1343
01:06:10,278 --> 01:06:12,318
Sweetheart, when there's no
health then what's it injurious to?

1344
01:06:12,438 --> 01:06:14,478
Whatever it is, it's really bad.

1345
01:06:14,598 --> 01:06:15,878
It's stinking man.

1346
01:06:16,798 --> 01:06:19,383
Tell me,
when did you start singing?

1347
01:06:19,998 --> 01:06:21,118
When I was born.

1348
01:06:21,438 --> 01:06:23,078
But when a child is born he cries.

1349
01:06:23,158 --> 01:06:24,078
I was singing.

1350
01:06:24,118 --> 01:06:27,238
But you know, people
like love, romantic music..

1351
01:06:27,318 --> 01:06:29,678
..more than what you sing.

1352
01:06:29,758 --> 01:06:31,238
To hell with it.

1353
01:06:31,438 --> 01:06:35,318
I've forsaken romance and
romantic music from my system.

1354
01:06:35,931 --> 01:06:38,678
I don't let flowers, mountains,
river, waterfalls, love..

1355
01:06:38,758 --> 01:06:40,198
..anywhere close to my music.

1356
01:06:40,278 --> 01:06:43,078
I don't sing from the mouth
I sing from my entire body.

1357
01:06:43,318 --> 01:06:47,396
A song that has passion,
openness, liberty.

1358
01:06:48,198 --> 01:06:51,358
That means you will
never sing romantic songs?

1359
01:06:51,859 --> 01:06:53,838
Never.
- But why?

1360
01:06:54,082 --> 01:06:55,438
Do you want to know the answer?

1361
01:07:04,785 --> 01:07:06,782
"I am scared of being betrayed."

1362
01:07:06,929 --> 01:07:09,238
"My heart be filled with pain."

1363
01:07:13,126 --> 01:07:15,598
"I am scared of being betrayed."

1364

"My heart be filled with pain."

1365

"The thought of it makes me sweat."

1372

1373

1374

1375

1387

1388

"Love's a butcher, it ruins a man."

1389

"It makes your market
value zero in a minute."

1390

1391

1395

1396
