1397
01:09:30,942 --> 01:09:32,878
This is Haryanvi rock.

1398
01:09:36,372 --> 01:09:37,517
Wow. Simply superb.

1399
01:09:37,557 --> 01:09:38,878
Thank you, sir.
Thank you.

1400
01:09:39,140 --> 01:09:41,358
This is a complete
insanity ambiance.

1401
01:09:41,398 --> 01:09:43,738
No, sir, hauntedness.
- What?

1402
01:09:43,968 --> 01:09:44,968
Hauntedness?

1403
01:09:45,014 --> 01:09:46,014
Nice one.

1404
01:09:46,169 --> 01:09:49,478
So all the ghosts were
spending their days..

1405
01:09:49,598 --> 01:09:51,638
..with love and affection.

1406
01:09:52,075 --> 01:09:54,558
But one day suddenly
a problem came up.

1407
01:09:55,125 --> 01:09:57,078
Problem? For the ghosts?

1408
01:09:58,100 --> 01:10:01,056
I had heard that
ghosts trouble people.

1409
01:10:01,096 --> 01:10:03,358
Yes, sir. But the situation
was different here.

1410
01:10:03,922 --> 01:10:05,878
The people were
troubling the ghosts.

1411
01:10:16,424 --> 01:10:19,778
They've turned Royal
Mansion into a vegetable market.

1412
01:10:20,063 --> 01:10:21,478
They're hammering
a nail on every wall.

1413
01:10:21,875 --> 01:10:22,875
Someone's taking a nap.

1414
01:10:22,936 --> 01:10:24,798
Someone throwing used plates.
And someone's spitting.

1415
01:10:25,097 --> 01:10:26,638
And they've setup a
rail-track on the floor..

1416
01:10:26,718 --> 01:10:28,598
..and people are getting
on and off that thing.

1417
01:10:29,025 --> 01:10:31,447
That means they
have no civic sense.

1418
01:10:31,487 --> 01:10:34,558
And the heroine has filled my room
with smoke from her cigarette.

1419
01:10:35,012 --> 01:10:36,095
I was a film actress too.

1420
01:10:36,305 --> 01:10:38,198
But even I never
smoked so many cigarettes.

1421
01:10:38,578 --> 01:10:39,878
And she's showing such attitude.

1422
01:10:40,137 --> 01:10:41,215
Let's lodge a report
at the police station.

1423
01:10:41,257 --> 01:10:43,104
Who will lodge a ghost's report?

1424
01:10:43,223 --> 01:10:45,650
And anyway, they already
bribe the police at first.

1425
01:10:45,829 --> 01:10:47,743
Then we'll have to
use our special power.

1426
01:10:47,886 --> 01:10:48,592
What's that?

1427
01:10:48,632 --> 01:10:49,678
Let's scare them away.

1428
01:10:50,146 --> 01:10:53,955
Sister, I feel you should
teach that heroine a lesson first.

1429
01:10:54,313 --> 01:10:55,218
Fine.

1430
01:10:55,258 --> 01:10:57,978
All the film actresses are
nervous before the shot.

1431
01:10:58,218 --> 01:10:59,698
I'll scare her so badly..

1432
01:10:59,778 --> 01:11:01,618
..that she'll never
act again in her life.

1433
01:11:01,789 --> 01:11:03,298
Scene 1, take 1.

1434
01:11:04,035 --> 01:11:05,298
And action.

1435
01:11:26,978 --> 01:11:30,018
She fell down,
the shooting was cancelled.

1436
01:11:30,178 --> 01:11:33,298
Mid Day and Mirror covered
the story on their front page.

1437
01:11:33,378 --> 01:11:36,338
And slowly the news, that
GH Mills and Royal Mansion..

1438
01:11:36,418 --> 01:11:38,898
..are haunted, spread in
the entire film industry.

1439
01:11:39,178 --> 01:11:42,618
Producers and
directors stopped filming here.

1440
01:11:43,298 --> 01:11:45,218
The ghosts of Royal Mansion won..

1441
01:11:45,298 --> 01:11:47,218
..and it was celebration time.

1442
01:11:47,458 --> 01:11:48,938
And on this joyous occasion..

1443
01:11:49,018 --> 01:11:51,904
..Gaindamal decided to take
all the ghosts out for a picnic.

1444
01:11:52,715 --> 01:11:55,446
"Here come the care fee ghosts."

1445
01:11:55,538 --> 01:11:58,178
"Care free ghosts."

1446
01:11:58,258 --> 01:12:01,018
"Care free ghosts."

1447
01:12:09,938 --> 01:12:11,898
It feels so strange, right?

1448
01:12:12,218 --> 01:12:14,498
We ghosts are out on
the beach to party..

1449
01:12:14,578 --> 01:12:16,018
..and have a blast.

1450
01:12:16,223 --> 01:12:20,515
Bhootnath, we ghosts
have the right to have fun.

1451
01:12:20,700 --> 01:12:23,418
The biggest advantage
of being a ghost is..

1452
01:12:23,498 --> 01:12:24,858
..we don't need
any visa or passport.

1453
01:12:24,938 --> 01:12:27,538
We can go anywhere, any place,
any time and anyway we want.

1454
01:12:28,658 --> 01:12:30,698
Right, Aatmaram?
- I don't know, sir.

1455
01:12:30,941 --> 01:12:32,338
I am a poor man.

1456
01:12:35,696 --> 01:12:37,338
You lost with 15
- Love.

1457
01:12:37,723 --> 01:12:39,378
I've already lost.

1458
01:12:39,602 --> 01:12:42,218
But I really liked
one thing today, Robin.

1459
01:12:42,628 --> 01:12:43,498
What? My game?

1460
01:12:43,538 --> 01:12:46,298
No, I heard you say
'love' 15 times today.

1461
01:12:46,538 --> 01:12:48,698
"Mister, walk slowly."

1462
01:12:49,288 --> 01:12:51,818
"Be careful in love."

1463
01:12:52,229 --> 01:12:53,578
Very nice.

1464
01:12:53,881 --> 01:12:55,634
The oil is wonderful.

1465
01:12:55,674 --> 01:12:57,578
Hey mister, this isn't the oil..

1466
01:12:57,658 --> 01:12:59,218
..it's the magic of my hands.

1467
01:12:59,644 --> 01:13:01,704
Once I make any vegetable..

1468
01:13:01,909 --> 01:13:04,532
..whether it's a Bengali or a Bihari
he can't stop licking his hands.

1469
01:13:04,665 --> 01:13:06,938
Khwaja, tell me one thing.

1470
01:13:07,190 --> 01:13:08,858
Did you forsake the
sword and take up the ladle..

1471
01:13:08,938 --> 01:13:10,498
..or forsake the ladle
and take up the sword?

1472
01:13:10,538 --> 01:13:12,743
Insolent, audacious fool.
How dare you joke with me?

1473
01:13:13,058 --> 01:13:14,058
Sorry. Sorry.

1474
01:13:14,138 --> 01:13:15,578
I was only pulling your string.

1475
01:13:16,170 --> 01:13:17,298
I was joking..

1476
01:13:17,761 --> 01:13:19,338
But I'll be honest with you.

1477
01:13:19,518 --> 01:13:21,898
You really cook well.
- Thank you, mister.

1478
01:13:22,160 --> 01:13:25,178
Not the food, you bore me too much.

1479
01:13:25,402 --> 01:13:26,858
With your hideous poems.

1480
01:13:26,898 --> 01:13:28,618
Why you..

1481
01:13:28,938 --> 01:13:31,250
You pollute the
place where you eat.

1482
01:13:31,704 --> 01:13:33,378
Brother, can I sit here?

1483
01:13:33,492 --> 01:13:35,418
Sitting.
- No, no.

1484
01:13:35,498 --> 01:13:36,658
It's sit. Sit.

1485
01:13:36,738 --> 01:13:38,167
Sit. Sit.

1486
01:13:38,975 --> 01:13:40,695
Brother, you love eating.

1487
01:13:40,815 --> 01:13:43,255
You talk to a Bengali about eating.

1488
01:13:43,375 --> 01:13:45,135
A Bengali eats so much..

1489
01:13:45,215 --> 01:13:47,414
..that he squanders his
entire money on eating.

1490
01:13:48,335 --> 01:13:51,895
That's why the food's
tasty but not nutritious.

1491
01:13:52,015 --> 01:13:55,615
We eat for taste, not to wrestle.

1492
01:13:56,855 --> 01:13:58,815
What food do you get in Mumbai?

1493
01:13:58,895 --> 01:14:02,471
'Bhelpuri, Sevpuri,
Panipuri, Madam Puri, Amrish Puri.'

1494
01:14:02,537 --> 01:14:05,335
It seems like the surname
of the entire Puri family.

1495
01:14:05,975 --> 01:14:07,735
There's only 'Jhol'
(curry) in Bengali food.

1496
01:14:07,815 --> 01:14:09,335
'Fish curry, potato curry.

1497
01:14:09,455 --> 01:14:11,455
Curry, curry and more curry.

1498
01:14:11,575 --> 01:14:12,655
No, brother.

1499
01:14:12,735 --> 01:14:15,775
Before pointing finger at a Bengali
take a peak in your own wok.

1500
01:14:15,855 --> 01:14:17,695
What do you have in Mumbai's wok?

1501
01:14:17,815 --> 01:14:20,141
Except for the 'Puri' family
just a dry 'Vada pav' (Fritter).

1502
01:14:20,181 --> 01:14:21,455
Hey!

1503
01:14:21,695 --> 01:14:23,255
Vada Pav is the pride of Mumbai.

1504
01:14:23,375 --> 01:14:25,135
'Bhelpuri, Sevpuri, Panipuri..'

1505
01:14:25,215 --> 01:14:26,775
..are the symbol of our unity.

1506
01:14:26,855 --> 01:14:28,335
And a person from
every community eats it.

1507
01:14:28,415 --> 01:14:30,175
And Mumbai has a specialty.

1508
01:14:30,255 --> 01:14:31,695
Here a person gets up
on a empty stomach..

1509
01:14:31,775 --> 01:14:33,015
..but never sleeps hungry.

1510
01:14:33,095 --> 01:14:36,655
And the credit goes to 'Bhelpuri,
Sevpuri, Panipuri and Vada Pav.'

1511
01:14:36,735 --> 01:14:38,935
Scoundrel refugee.

1512
01:14:39,015 --> 01:14:41,575
You lived, slept
and woke up in Mumbai.

1513
01:14:41,655 --> 01:14:44,895
But didn't you feel hurt
while insulting Vada Pav.

1514
01:14:44,935 --> 01:14:47,175
From today you're out
of the Royal Mansion.

1515
01:14:47,255 --> 01:14:48,735
Out!
- Out!

1516
01:14:48,908 --> 01:14:50,535
I was only having a discussion.

1517
01:14:50,615 --> 01:14:53,800
And it's important for a
Bengali to win every discussion.

1518
01:14:56,043 --> 01:14:58,535
Fine, I admit I lost
this discussion. Okay.

1519
01:14:59,231 --> 01:15:00,255
Come on, say sorry.

1520
01:15:00,295 --> 01:15:01,815
Now.
- Who's the boss?

1521
01:15:01,930 --> 01:15:03,114
I am the boss. Who's the boss?

1522
01:15:03,254 --> 01:15:04,575
You're the boss.
- Now say sorry.

1523
01:15:04,735 --> 01:15:05,735
Sorry.
- Say sorry.

1524
01:15:05,775 --> 01:15:07,016
Say sorry.
- Sorry.

1525
01:15:07,056 --> 01:15:08,815
Say sorry sister.
- I won't say it.

1526
01:15:08,855 --> 01:15:10,735
I will say sorry but I
won't call her sister.

1527
01:15:10,775 --> 01:15:13,255
It's a wonderful
situation for an argument.

1528
01:15:13,512 --> 01:15:17,135
Robin would've made a
nice song on this situation.

1529
01:15:17,175 --> 01:15:18,601
But where is Robin?

1530
01:15:18,681 --> 01:15:20,761
You girls are crazy.

1531
01:15:21,241 --> 01:15:23,681
Love, love, in everything
you want to get love.

1532
01:15:23,961 --> 01:15:25,441
Don't you have anything else to do?

1533
01:15:25,641 --> 01:15:26,641
What is your problem?

1534
01:15:26,761 --> 01:15:28,561
Why do you hate girls?

1535
01:15:28,761 --> 01:15:31,441
Did someone ditch you?
- One?

1536
01:15:32,041 --> 01:15:34,401
If I start counting
you'll be jealous.

1537
01:15:36,281 --> 01:15:38,481
All girls are crazy about money.
- Wrong.

1538
01:15:38,681 --> 01:15:41,041
There are some girls
who are crazy about love.

1539
01:15:41,201 --> 01:15:42,641
The example is right before you.

1540
01:15:42,801 --> 01:15:44,281
Yes.

1541
01:15:44,841 --> 01:15:46,641
You don't even mention the name..

1542
01:15:46,761 --> 01:15:48,921
..for the one you
jumped from the 10th floor.

1543
01:15:49,161 --> 01:15:50,706
Instead you try to flirt with me.

1544
01:15:53,081 --> 01:15:54,081
Oh...

1545
01:15:54,442 --> 01:15:56,001
Tina, what happened?

1546
01:15:56,733 --> 01:15:57,601
What happened?

1547
01:15:57,641 --> 01:16:00,601
Why should I take that greedy,
cheater's name?

1548
01:16:00,681 --> 01:16:03,321
He first cheated
me and then killed me.

1549
01:16:03,601 --> 01:16:05,441
He did what your father said.

1550
01:16:05,681 --> 01:16:06,681
What could he do?

1551
01:16:06,875 --> 01:16:08,056
I lied.

1552
01:16:10,401 --> 01:16:12,081
After I died I found out.. Oh !

1553
01:16:12,281 --> 01:16:14,441
..that Sam was never
shifted out of Mumbai.

1554
01:16:14,801 --> 01:16:18,982
In fact, he asked for a big money
from my dad to leave me and Mumbai.

1555
01:16:19,401 --> 01:16:21,801
And after taking the
money he went to Australia.

1556
01:16:21,968 --> 01:16:23,642
He completely forgot me.

1557
01:16:24,923 --> 01:16:26,401
He never loved me.

1558
01:16:27,248 --> 01:16:28,441
Sorry, Tina.

1559
01:16:29,038 --> 01:16:30,321
I am really sorry.

1560
01:16:32,241 --> 01:16:34,401
Forget it.
Give me a smile.

1561
01:16:35,554 --> 01:16:37,441
Smile. Tina.

1562
01:16:39,161 --> 01:16:40,041
Tina, listen.

1563
01:16:40,081 --> 01:16:42,961
Tina, you always say why
do I sing meaningless songs.

1564
01:16:43,435 --> 01:16:45,537
I'll sing a
romantic-sweet song for you today.

1565
01:16:47,001 --> 01:16:48,201
But on one condition.

1566
01:16:48,691 --> 01:16:50,481
Before I sing you
will have to smile.

1567
01:16:51,001 --> 01:16:52,001
Now smile.

1568
01:17:03,230 --> 01:17:08,641
"Its love that I see
in my beloved's eye."

1569
01:17:12,561 --> 01:17:16,121
"I know you're restless.."

1570
01:17:16,343 --> 01:17:19,441
"..to cajole Hooda."

1571
01:17:20,001 --> 01:17:25,481
"My confused heart's
finally at peace."

1572
01:17:41,313 --> 01:17:45,001
"O dark glasses,
what's your scene."

1573
01:17:48,170 --> 01:17:51,801
"O long tresses,
what's your scene."

1574
01:17:55,196 --> 01:17:58,201
"What's your scene?"
"What's your scene?"

1575
01:17:58,431 --> 01:18:02,001
"Don't waste our time."

1576
01:18:03,754 --> 01:18:07,281
"Tell us clearly who do you want?"

1577
01:18:15,997 --> 01:18:17,841
"My throat's dry."

1578
01:18:20,241 --> 01:18:22,841
"Get me my favorite booze."

1579
01:18:26,223 --> 01:18:27,841
"My throat's dry."

1580
01:18:28,001 --> 01:18:30,641
"Get me my favorite booze."

1581
01:18:31,637 --> 01:18:35,121
"SAD 69, o beloved."

1582
01:18:35,359 --> 01:18:36,801
"My throat's dry."

1583
01:18:38,351 --> 01:18:46,001
"You dwell in my heartbeats."

1584
01:18:46,482 --> 01:18:54,401
"I've brought what you
drink day and night."

1585
01:18:54,732 --> 01:18:57,921
"Drink until you're knocked out."

1586
01:18:58,300 --> 01:19:02,561
"And come in my arms."

1587
01:19:03,977 --> 01:19:07,401
"Father's in the courtyard.."

1588
01:19:08,164 --> 01:19:10,481
"..and your lovers
at the threshold."

1589
01:19:10,744 --> 01:19:14,681
"How do I get in your house?"

1590
01:19:17,867 --> 01:19:19,641
"Father's in the courtyard.."

1591
01:19:19,801 --> 01:19:21,721
"..and your lovers
at the threshold."

1592
01:19:22,076 --> 01:19:25,161
"How do I get in your house?"

1593
01:19:25,369 --> 01:19:29,001
"How do I get in your house?"

1594
01:19:29,147 --> 01:19:32,601
"My father's gone away."
"And my lover's are hanging."

1595
01:19:32,799 --> 01:19:36,201
"My father's gone away."
"And my lover's are hanging."

1596
01:19:36,422 --> 01:19:39,881
"Now pack your bags
and run to Bihar."

1597
01:19:40,139 --> 01:19:43,441
"Now pack your bags
and run to Bihar."

1598
01:19:45,711 --> 01:19:49,201
"The heart's said to your heart."

1599
01:19:51,495 --> 01:19:54,660
"I am in love with you."

1600
01:19:57,094 --> 01:19:59,601
"The heart's said to your heart."

1601
01:19:59,835 --> 01:20:02,348
"The heart's said to your heart."

1602
01:20:02,664 --> 01:20:05,301
"I am in love with you."

1603
01:20:05,504 --> 01:20:08,107
"I am in love with you."

1604
01:20:08,201 --> 01:20:10,850
"My friend just chill."

1605
01:20:11,140 --> 01:20:13,576
"Come and fill my empty life."

1606
01:20:13,939 --> 01:20:19,158
"Be just as crazy as I am."

1607
01:20:19,566 --> 01:20:22,000
"Understand my dilemma."

1608
01:20:22,328 --> 01:20:25,201
"And fall in love with me."

1609
01:20:30,856 --> 01:20:35,474
"We're the best."
"We're the best."

1610
01:20:35,817 --> 01:20:38,971
"The ghosts of Royal Mansion."

1611
01:20:40,958 --> 01:20:43,361
"The ghosts of Royal Mansion."

1612
01:20:43,553 --> 01:20:46,021
"We're each other's friends."

1613
01:20:46,061 --> 01:20:48,230
"We have no.."

1614
01:20:48,570 --> 01:20:51,082
"We have no host."

1615
01:20:51,152 --> 01:20:53,641
"We're filled with joy,
let's have toast."

1616
01:20:53,869 --> 01:20:55,910
"We're the best."

1617
01:20:56,041 --> 01:20:57,641
"We're the best."

1618
01:20:58,320 --> 01:21:00,364
"The ghosts of Royal Mansion."

1619
01:21:00,463 --> 01:21:02,241
"We're each other's friends."

1620
01:21:03,735 --> 01:21:04,735
Stop it!

1621
01:21:05,681 --> 01:21:06,681
What happened?

1622
01:21:06,798 --> 01:21:09,641
I was dancing.
What do you want?

1623
01:21:09,994 --> 01:21:11,281
Hold on.

1624
01:21:11,926 --> 01:21:13,441
Sir, Royal Mansion's in trouble.

1625
01:21:13,892 --> 01:21:15,761
What? What are you saying?
- Yes.

1626
01:21:16,140 --> 01:21:18,213
We were living there
peacefully until now..

1627
01:21:18,425 --> 01:21:20,616
..because your
property was disputed. - Yes.

1628
01:21:20,824 --> 01:21:22,959
But the dispute is over.
- So?

1629
01:21:23,351 --> 01:21:26,049
Your great grandsons
have joined hands.

1630
01:21:26,503 --> 01:21:28,331
They have agreed on
out-of-the-court settlement..

1631
01:21:28,481 --> 01:21:30,774
..and they're selling
the mansion and mill.

1632
01:21:30,931 --> 01:21:33,299
What? What are you saying?
- Yes, sir, it's true.

1633
01:21:33,564 --> 01:21:36,514
They will raze
everything down and build a mall.

1634
01:21:36,554 --> 01:21:37,357
Mall.

1635
01:21:37,397 --> 01:21:39,392
You know all my male fans used
to call me a 'Maal' (hottie).

1636
01:21:39,512 --> 01:21:41,121
You're still one, sweetheart.

1637
01:21:41,584 --> 01:21:44,425
Manoranjana! Oh, God!
This is devastating news.

1638
01:21:44,554 --> 01:21:46,289
If anything happens
to the Royal Mansion..

1639
01:21:46,329 --> 01:21:48,001
..then I'll be homeless again.

1640
01:21:48,818 --> 01:21:50,541
If this had been the British rule..

1641
01:21:50,688 --> 01:21:52,900
..I would've hanged
this man to his death.

1642
01:21:53,005 --> 01:21:55,939
Soldiers,
we will give our life, boss.

1643
01:21:56,287 --> 01:21:58,347
But we will protect the mansion.

1644
01:21:58,559 --> 01:22:00,613
Idiot, you're already dead
how can you die again?

1645
01:22:01,145 --> 01:22:03,476
Let's first find out
who's the buyer. - Yes.

1646
01:22:03,619 --> 01:22:05,481
I think she has a point.
Who is this buyer?

1647
01:22:06,038 --> 01:22:07,927
Some builder called Bhooteriya.

1648
01:22:08,144 --> 01:22:09,866
Who told you?
- Technology.

1649
01:22:09,981 --> 01:22:12,385
I installed surveillance
cameras outside Royal Mansion.

1650
01:22:12,425 --> 01:22:13,062
Cameras?

1651
01:22:13,102 --> 01:22:14,875
And I just received
a MMS from that.

1652
01:22:14,943 --> 01:22:16,271
MMS.
- MMS. - See.

1653
01:22:18,197 --> 01:22:18,881
See.

1654
01:22:18,921 --> 01:22:20,001
That's Royal Mansion.
See. See.

1655
01:22:20,247 --> 01:22:21,476
Who's getting down from the car?

1656
01:22:21,516 --> 01:22:24,303
He's Bhooteriya.
He looks like a villain.

1657
01:22:24,343 --> 01:22:25,602
Yes, Manoranjana.

1658
01:22:29,850 --> 01:22:31,905
Suresh bhai, thank you.

1659
01:22:32,138 --> 01:22:34,201
Ramesh bhai, congratulations.

1660
01:22:36,080 --> 01:22:38,279
Bhooteriya sir, all yours.

1661
01:22:40,240 --> 01:22:41,400
See, Guliyani.

1662
01:22:41,669 --> 01:22:43,764
When Bhooteriya sets
his eyes on something..

1663
01:22:43,804 --> 01:22:45,920
Yes!
- ..he always gets it.

1664
01:22:46,840 --> 01:22:49,200
Yes! Now watch what
I do with this place.

1665
01:22:49,360 --> 01:22:50,440
I will give it a complete makeover.

1666
01:22:50,520 --> 01:22:51,920
But sir, what will you build here?

1667
01:22:52,000 --> 01:22:54,480
I'll build a 5 floor mall.

1668
01:22:54,640 --> 01:22:56,840
I've also thought of a name.

1669
01:22:58,080 --> 01:23:01,098
Bhooteriya 5 Star Plaza.

1670
01:23:01,496 --> 01:23:03,440
Oh my god. What's this?
- It's run out of battery.

1671
01:23:03,605 --> 01:23:04,760
We'll go home and recharge it.

1672
01:23:04,840 --> 01:23:07,311
Let's go to Royal Mansion. Follow me.
- Cadets. Comrades.. lets go.

1673
01:23:10,080 --> 01:23:11,280
Oh, God. Look.

1674
01:23:12,120 --> 01:23:13,320
Cheers.

1675
01:23:18,835 --> 01:23:20,840
Everything has been settled,
no problem.

1676
01:23:20,960 --> 01:23:21,960
Cheers.

1677
01:23:22,040 --> 01:23:24,557
Look at him. After giving us
pain they're drinking champagne.

1678
01:23:24,812 --> 01:23:25,951
We'll have to do something.

1679
01:23:26,053 --> 01:23:27,560
There's just one problem,
Mr Bhooteriya sir.

1680
01:23:27,798 --> 01:23:30,212
Heritage site status.
- No, sir.

1681
01:23:30,299 --> 01:23:32,320
There are two problems, sir.

1682
01:23:32,480 --> 01:23:34,600
One is heritage site.

1683
01:23:34,668 --> 01:23:36,832
And second is... very big

1684
01:23:38,072 --> 01:23:40,840
Quiet. Ghost. Stop stammering.

1685
01:23:42,012 --> 01:23:43,012
Go.

1686
01:23:43,606 --> 01:23:46,120
Ask the architect to start work.
- Yes.

1687
01:23:46,383 --> 01:23:47,920
Tell him to make
the best construction.

1688
01:23:48,083 --> 01:23:49,616
Mumbai will turn
into Shanghai later.

1689
01:23:49,656 --> 01:23:51,560
We'll build our own
mini Shanghai first.

1690
01:23:53,590 --> 01:23:54,942
Stop!

1691
01:23:55,480 --> 01:23:56,530
What the...

1692
01:24:01,417 --> 01:24:03,320
You're talking about
building Shanghai..

1693
01:24:03,400 --> 01:24:05,720
..and the Municipality
doesn't have a clue.

1694
01:24:05,817 --> 01:24:09,234
So you're from the Municipality.
- No.

1695
01:24:09,325 --> 01:24:11,720
The Municipality is in my pocket.

1696
01:24:11,945 --> 01:24:13,129
Come here.
- Me?

1697
01:24:13,229 --> 01:24:14,920
Me... come here.

1698
01:24:15,760 --> 01:24:17,920
Ma..ka..rand.
- Hey!

1699
01:24:18,080 --> 01:24:19,320
Not Ma..kha..rand

1700
01:24:19,857 --> 01:24:22,886
That's Makhrand Marathe.

1701
01:24:22,926 --> 01:24:23,926
Maharashtrian.

1702
01:24:24,047 --> 01:24:25,840
The chief of Makad Company.

1703
01:24:26,095 --> 01:24:27,169
Get that?
- Yes.

1704
01:24:27,209 --> 01:24:30,320
Makad means?
- Makad means monkey.

1705
01:24:31,120 --> 01:24:35,360
Ok. I was overhearing your
conversation quietly like a monkey.

1706
01:24:38,280 --> 01:24:40,553
Is there a problem
with the heritage status?

1707
01:24:40,593 --> 01:24:42,139
No, no, no...

1708
01:24:42,313 --> 01:24:43,960
Say it. There's no problem.

1709
01:24:44,040 --> 01:24:45,905
All your problems will be solved.

1710
01:24:45,997 --> 01:24:48,360
It's the rule of the world.
Give and take.

1711
01:24:48,818 --> 01:24:51,600
In the language of Makad
company you give and I take.

1712
01:24:52,002 --> 01:24:53,002
Name your price.

1713
01:24:53,527 --> 01:24:54,440
20...

1714
01:24:54,480 --> 01:24:55,480
Lakh.

1715
01:24:55,534 --> 01:24:56,534
Quiet!

1716
01:24:56,938 --> 01:24:59,593
Look. 20 means 20 percent.

1717
01:24:59,633 --> 01:25:01,732
20 percent? Too much.

1718
01:25:01,864 --> 01:25:03,096
Don't try to be too difficult.

1719
01:25:03,136 --> 01:25:05,840
Otherwise it will take
just one bullet to kill you.

1720
01:25:06,294 --> 01:25:07,960
You have just one week.

1721
01:25:08,473 --> 01:25:11,363
Get me my 20 percent
and build your mall.

1722
01:25:11,813 --> 01:25:13,240
Makad's, let's go.

1723
01:25:15,123 --> 01:25:16,643
Guys, there's a twist
in the story.

1724
01:25:16,683 --> 01:25:19,003
Political twist.
- There's not twist.

1725
01:25:19,083 --> 01:25:20,563
He's a rich man.

1726
01:25:20,678 --> 01:25:22,603
He'll pay the 20 percent.

1727
01:25:22,683 --> 01:25:25,248
The politician will get what
he wants and we'll be homeless.

1728
01:25:25,288 --> 01:25:27,833
He won't be convinced so easily.

1729
01:25:28,083 --> 01:25:29,163
He's a businessman.

1730
01:25:29,243 --> 01:25:31,426
He'll negotiate till the end.

1731
01:25:31,599 --> 01:25:33,573
That means we have some time..

1732
01:25:33,723 --> 01:25:35,603
..and a window of opportunity.

1733
01:25:35,683 --> 01:25:38,203
But until then we
can't just sit idle.

1734
01:25:38,429 --> 01:25:40,843
Revolt. Bloodbath.
Charge.

1735
01:25:40,923 --> 01:25:42,563
No point in screaming and yelling.

1736
01:25:42,603 --> 01:25:44,083
Think of an idea, Bhootnath.
- Yes.

1737
01:25:44,243 --> 01:25:49,683
I am thinking to over feed
him the Bengali sweets..

1738
01:25:49,803 --> 01:25:51,203
..and he'll get high blood sugar.

1739
01:25:51,243 --> 01:25:52,483
And he'll die of diabetes.

1740
01:25:52,523 --> 01:25:54,723
That's a stupid idea.
Aatmaram, what do you say?

1741
01:25:54,763 --> 01:25:57,123
What can I say, sir?
I am a poor man.

1742
01:25:57,203 --> 01:25:58,919
Robin, how about you?

1743
01:25:59,123 --> 01:26:00,803
I feel we should give
him a sound thrashing.

1744
01:26:00,843 --> 01:26:02,603
You can't even play
your guitar properly.

1745
01:26:02,683 --> 01:26:03,843
How will you give him
a sound thrashing?

1746
01:26:03,963 --> 01:26:05,803
I'll play the guitar.
- Quiet.

1747
01:26:06,563 --> 01:26:08,283
Can I say something?
- Yes.

1748
01:26:08,443 --> 01:26:09,884
In the year 1857..

1749
01:26:09,983 --> 01:26:12,083
Oh no, Not again. Common yaar.
Oh god, Again!

1750
01:26:12,243 --> 01:26:13,243
Silence.

1751
01:26:14,243 --> 01:26:16,243
It's important, you
will have to hear it.

1752
01:26:18,043 --> 01:26:20,763
combat, battle, struggle and War.

1753
01:26:20,883 --> 01:26:23,963
The first stage is
always intelligence gathering.

1754
01:26:24,203 --> 01:26:28,563
When you find out
your enemy's strength..

1755
01:26:28,643 --> 01:26:30,585
..and weaknesses,
you've won half the war.

1756
01:26:30,625 --> 01:26:32,919
Then who will win half the war?
This shorty.

1757
01:26:33,416 --> 01:26:34,923
I am Khwaja Akbar.

1758
01:26:35,003 --> 01:26:36,845
Alias Khwaja Akbar..

1759
01:26:37,734 --> 01:26:41,203
I've decided that I
will go to the builder.

1760
01:26:41,243 --> 01:26:42,363
I will spy on him.

1761
01:26:42,443 --> 01:26:44,443
And I will find his weakness.

1762
01:26:44,523 --> 01:26:46,803
By selling him pills?
- Not pills.

1763
01:26:47,146 --> 01:26:49,043
I'll floor him with my acting.

1764
01:26:49,150 --> 01:26:50,403
I've done many plays.

1765
01:26:50,483 --> 01:26:52,763
French, Romans, Countrymen.
Ceaser

1766
01:26:56,183 --> 01:26:57,483
You bloody fool.

1767
01:26:58,209 --> 01:26:59,763
How dare you talk about
acting in front of Manoranjana?

1768
01:26:59,843 --> 01:27:01,843
I was always casted
without the couch. - Idea.

1769
01:27:01,923 --> 01:27:02,683
What? Say it.

1770
01:27:02,723 --> 01:27:05,683
To make our mission successful..

1771
01:27:05,763 --> 01:27:08,883
..we need a cunning
actor like Manoranjana.

1772
01:27:08,923 --> 01:27:10,803
Cunning actress?
- I mean successful actress.

1773
01:27:10,843 --> 01:27:14,163
Thank you. - So Manoranjana,
get ready for the mission..

1774
01:27:14,283 --> 01:27:15,363
Mission Bhooteriya.

1775
01:27:15,403 --> 01:27:17,883
"Here comes the carefree ghosts."

1776
01:27:22,015 --> 01:27:23,803
200 shops on 1 floor..

1777
01:27:23,883 --> 01:27:27,043
..which means 1000 shops
on 5 floors.

1778
01:27:27,563 --> 01:27:29,963
1 crore for 1 shop.

1779
01:27:30,227 --> 01:27:31,643
1000 shops...

1780
01:27:34,457 --> 01:27:37,243
1000...crores.

1781
01:27:37,438 --> 01:27:40,123
"Carefree ghosts."

1782
01:27:40,363 --> 01:27:42,523
"Carefree ghosts."

1783
01:27:42,794 --> 01:27:45,760
Bhooteriya the king.

1784
01:27:47,017 --> 01:27:48,043
Come in.

1785
01:28:03,776 --> 01:28:05,477
"I won't give it."

1786
01:28:05,781 --> 01:28:07,569
"I won't give it."

1787
01:28:07,660 --> 01:28:09,483
"I won't give it."

1788
01:28:09,935 --> 01:28:11,678
Hi, I am Bhavna.

1789
01:28:13,286 --> 01:28:14,143
Bhooteriya.

1790
01:28:14,183 --> 01:28:15,563
Nice to touch you.

1791
01:28:17,286 --> 01:28:20,883
But without appointment
in my office..

1792
01:28:21,323 --> 01:28:24,803
If I had taken an appointment
then I would've been disappointed.

1793
01:28:25,243 --> 01:28:27,203
Good. Good.
You did the right thing.

1794
01:28:27,363 --> 01:28:28,363
You did the right thing.

1795
01:28:28,795 --> 01:28:31,443
What are you playing?
- Golf.

1796
01:28:31,738 --> 01:28:33,658
Will you play?
- Will you teach me?

1797
01:28:33,738 --> 01:28:34,738
Golf?

1798
01:28:34,978 --> 01:28:36,258
Sure. Sure.

1799
01:28:37,178 --> 01:28:38,258
Come, come.

1800
01:28:38,738 --> 01:28:39,738
Hold. Hold.

1801
01:28:42,378 --> 01:28:44,138
Now teach me.
- Yes.

1802
01:28:44,258 --> 01:28:49,098
In golf, the stick
should be hard and a good aim.

1803
01:28:49,258 --> 01:28:52,178
So that the ball goes
directly in the hole.

1804
01:28:52,378 --> 01:28:53,378
Like this.

1805
01:28:59,279 --> 01:29:03,258
Mr. Bhooteriya, yes!
I need a favor from you.

1806
01:29:03,427 --> 01:29:06,018
Flavor? What flavor?

1807
01:29:06,218 --> 01:29:08,138
"I won't give it."

1808
01:29:12,077 --> 01:29:15,098
I want a space
in your 5 star Plaza.

1809
01:29:16,130 --> 01:29:18,618
But who told you about it?

1810
01:29:18,879 --> 01:29:21,458
We haven't even
started this project?

1811
01:29:21,863 --> 01:29:23,331
It's confidential.

1812
01:29:24,223 --> 01:29:27,099
I've hid it from everyone.

1813
01:29:27,418 --> 01:29:30,578
Don't worry,
even I believe in hiding.

1814
01:29:35,873 --> 01:29:37,178
Mr. Bhooteriya.

1815
01:29:37,438 --> 01:29:39,058
Mr. Bhooteriya.
- Yes.

1816
01:29:39,347 --> 01:29:41,138
I've lost my key.

1817
01:29:41,263 --> 01:29:43,698
Please find it.
- Yes, sure, sure.

1818
01:29:43,900 --> 01:29:44,900
Why not?

1819
01:29:49,320 --> 01:29:50,418
It's not..

1820
01:29:51,891 --> 01:29:53,091
Do you see it?

1821
01:29:53,310 --> 01:29:54,578
I am trying.

1822
01:29:59,218 --> 01:30:00,218
Found it.

1823
01:30:00,456 --> 01:30:02,258
Found it?
- Thank you.

1824
01:30:03,323 --> 01:30:04,687
Thank you so much.

1825
01:30:06,898 --> 01:30:09,738
Will you give me space?

1826
01:30:13,178 --> 01:30:14,178
I will.

1827
01:30:14,318 --> 01:30:16,658
As much as you want.
- You are so sweet.

1828
01:30:17,038 --> 01:30:18,138
Oh no.
- What happened?

1829
01:30:18,392 --> 01:30:21,098
See, in a hurry
I brought my car keys..

1830
01:30:21,273 --> 01:30:22,818
..but I forgot to bring my car .

1831
01:30:23,131 --> 01:30:24,658
How will I go back?

1832
01:30:26,124 --> 01:30:28,962
Only if I let you go.
- Really?

1833
01:30:29,002 --> 01:30:30,002
Yes.

1834
01:30:30,595 --> 01:30:32,839
Now will you really give me space?

1835
01:30:33,986 --> 01:30:36,778
But what will you
give me in return?

1836
01:30:36,938 --> 01:30:38,418
Everything.

1837
01:30:39,288 --> 01:30:42,978
Head massage.
Shoulder massage.

1838
01:30:43,544 --> 01:30:45,218
Body massage.

1839
01:30:45,538 --> 01:30:47,178
Full sensation.

1840
01:30:47,815 --> 01:30:50,018
I will touch your strong points.

1841
01:30:50,941 --> 01:30:53,458
I hope you don't have a weak point.

1842
01:30:55,951 --> 01:30:56,968
My wife.

1843
01:30:59,836 --> 01:31:01,236
Are you scared of her?

1844
01:31:01,596 --> 01:31:02,796
Yes.

1845
01:31:03,196 --> 01:31:05,276
I was scared of her
when she was alive.

1846
01:31:05,436 --> 01:31:07,996
Now that she's dead,
I am still scared.

1847
01:31:08,236 --> 01:31:09,316
She's dead?

1848
01:31:10,516 --> 01:31:14,186
Yes. That's why she haunts
me every night in my dreams.

1849
01:31:15,287 --> 01:31:17,824
What happened to her?
- Nothing happened.

1850
01:31:18,356 --> 01:31:19,506
I killed her.

1851
01:31:20,119 --> 01:31:22,837
What?
- I burnt her alive.

1852
01:31:24,116 --> 01:31:25,116
Why?

1853
01:31:25,396 --> 01:31:27,188
She nagged me all the time.

1854
01:31:27,956 --> 01:31:28,977
I had a chick.

1855
01:31:29,649 --> 01:31:30,802
Beautiful chick.

1856
01:31:31,516 --> 01:31:33,039
We were having an affair.

1857
01:31:33,756 --> 01:31:37,546
When Lakshmi found out
she was jealous.

1858
01:31:38,689 --> 01:31:42,926
I thought...let's get her
out of the way forever.

1859
01:31:44,917 --> 01:31:46,876
Then? - Then what?

1860
01:31:47,356 --> 01:31:49,810
One day when
she set out in her BMW..

1861
01:31:50,516 --> 01:31:53,956
..I poured petrol on the car,
and set it ablaze.

1862
01:31:56,436 --> 01:31:57,845
I miss her.

1863
01:31:58,818 --> 01:31:59,756
The wife?

1864
01:31:59,796 --> 01:32:01,761
No, the BMW.

1865
01:32:02,356 --> 01:32:04,120
It was worth 65 lakhs.

1866
01:32:04,996 --> 01:32:07,796
Actually,
Lakshmi's my weakness, Bhavna.

1867
01:32:07,993 --> 01:32:09,916
She doesn't let me sleep all night.

1868
01:32:10,076 --> 01:32:11,435
People are right.

1869
01:32:12,116 --> 01:32:14,116
Men become ghosts after they die.

1870
01:32:14,196 --> 01:32:17,079
But women are always a witch.

1871
01:32:18,434 --> 01:32:20,256
"I won't give it."
- Bhavna.

1872
01:32:20,421 --> 01:32:21,756
"I won't give it."

1873
01:32:21,836 --> 01:32:22,836
Bhavna.

1874
01:32:25,396 --> 01:32:27,556
So even though
Manoranjana was dead..

1875
01:32:27,636 --> 01:32:29,436
..she still entertained Bhooteriya.

1876
01:32:29,737 --> 01:32:30,436
Yes.

1877
01:32:30,476 --> 01:32:32,276
But only to know his secret.

1878
01:32:32,396 --> 01:32:34,476
But this Bhooteriya
seems like a dangerous man.

1879
01:32:34,556 --> 01:32:35,556
Exactly, sir.

1880
01:32:35,743 --> 01:32:37,850
And so, the ghosts of
Royal Mansion needs..

1881
01:32:38,010 --> 01:32:41,556
..someone more dangerous than
Bhooteriya to teach him a lesson.

1882
01:32:41,683 --> 01:32:43,276
But where will we find such a man?

1883
01:32:43,356 --> 01:32:44,916
On Spookbook.

1884
01:32:45,076 --> 01:32:46,355
Spookbook?
- Yes!

1885
01:32:46,395 --> 01:32:48,476
It's a social
networking site for all the ghosts.

1886
01:32:48,556 --> 01:32:49,876
We'll definitely find someone here.

1887
01:32:49,956 --> 01:32:52,716
And their slogan is... "Ghost.
Let's strengthen relationships".

1888
01:32:52,933 --> 01:32:55,476
And they found the man
they were looking for.

1889
01:32:55,516 --> 01:32:57,793
He lost an arm when he was kid
while making a local bomb.

1890
01:32:58,156 --> 01:33:00,300
And since them people
started calling him Babu Hathkata.

1891
01:33:10,417 --> 01:33:13,716
What kinds of ghosts are you
that are scared of a gun?

1892
01:33:14,145 --> 01:33:15,860
If I don't take
this out before I sit..

1893
01:33:15,900 --> 01:33:17,991
..then it pricks
in the wrong places.

1894
01:33:18,031 --> 01:33:19,676
Babu bhai, how are you?

1895
01:33:25,232 --> 01:33:26,236
Babu bhai, how are you?

1896
01:33:26,380 --> 01:33:29,716
Uncle, don't try to be
too friendly.

1897
01:33:29,796 --> 01:33:32,156
Get to the business, who do
you want to get out of the way?

1898
01:33:32,437 --> 01:33:35,420
No mercy, no forgiveness,
all I need is one blow.

1899
01:33:35,577 --> 01:33:38,470
No, no, Babu bhai,
we're non-violent ghosts.

1900
01:33:38,552 --> 01:33:39,552
Non-violent ghosts.

1901
01:33:39,606 --> 01:33:41,276
You Idiot.

1902
01:33:41,816 --> 01:33:45,491
Did you call me here
to play the violin?

1903
01:33:45,600 --> 01:33:47,796
Actually we're in trouble.

1904
01:33:48,127 --> 01:33:51,981
If you don't help us,
then my house..

1905
01:33:52,290 --> 01:33:53,916
This is a true war, mister.

1906
01:33:54,192 --> 01:33:56,152
And you'll receive merits for it.

1907
01:33:56,242 --> 01:33:57,712
Idiot, sit down.

1908
01:33:57,952 --> 01:34:02,103
Merits won't do.
I need hard cash.

1909
01:34:02,280 --> 01:34:03,392
Babu, please.

1910
01:34:03,432 --> 01:34:05,352
We're in big trouble.

1911
01:34:05,472 --> 01:34:06,832
Help us, Babu.

1912
01:34:10,935 --> 01:34:15,837
This gorgeous girl
called me Babu, not brother.

1913
01:34:16,094 --> 01:34:18,336
So I cannot refuse her request.

1914
01:34:20,112 --> 01:34:21,712
Thank you Babuji bhai.

1915
01:34:22,112 --> 01:34:24,734
For helping us helpless ghosts.

1916
01:34:25,112 --> 01:34:26,338
You will earn merits for this.

1917
01:34:26,437 --> 01:34:27,530
Hey, uncle.

1918
01:34:28,112 --> 01:34:30,594
Keep your merits in your pocket.

1919
01:34:31,166 --> 01:34:32,812
I did many good deeds myself.

1920
01:34:33,112 --> 01:34:34,858
I taught a boy to use the knife.

1921
01:34:34,898 --> 01:34:36,927
And he slit my throat one
day and dumped me in the drain.

1922
01:34:37,072 --> 01:34:39,200
Let's talk about money.
You can keep the merits.

1923
01:34:40,312 --> 01:34:42,178
Sorry, girls. I got too emotional.

1924
01:34:42,432 --> 01:34:46,889
Don't worry. I will honor
you with a Queen's cross.

1925
01:34:47,232 --> 01:34:49,112
Who brought him here from London?

1926
01:34:49,192 --> 01:34:50,432
Did you pay his duty?

1927
01:34:50,632 --> 01:34:51,792
What did he just say?

1928
01:34:51,872 --> 01:34:53,512
He said you're a gem of a person.

1929
01:34:53,552 --> 01:34:54,632
Thank you. Hello.

1930
01:34:54,712 --> 01:34:56,752
Now let's get to business.
Tell me what I've to do.

1931
01:34:56,792 --> 01:34:58,512
You've to meet Bhooteriya.

1932
01:34:58,592 --> 01:35:01,618
Who is he? Is he a ghost too?
- No. he's a builder.

1933
01:35:01,962 --> 01:35:03,712
He's the owner of
Bhooteriya Constructions.

1934
01:35:03,792 --> 01:35:05,432
And his name is
- GK Bhooteriya.

1935
01:35:05,512 --> 01:35:07,792
GK.
- Whether he's GK or PK.

1936
01:35:07,832 --> 01:35:12,632
No mercy, no forgiveness for him,
all I need is one blow.

1937
01:35:12,817 --> 01:35:14,297
Deby Baby.

1938
01:35:14,697 --> 01:35:16,497
If you would be mine,
then this six bedroom hall..

1939
01:35:16,537 --> 01:35:19,017
..on the top floor will be yours.

1940
01:35:19,937 --> 01:35:23,217
Dance floor, disco, Jacuzzi.

1941
01:35:23,377 --> 01:35:25,337
Mini theatre.

1942
01:35:25,417 --> 01:35:27,497
Where we'll watch a film.

1943
01:35:27,937 --> 01:35:29,897
The adult ones.

1944
01:35:30,737 --> 01:35:31,737
Sir.

1945
01:35:31,857 --> 01:35:32,857
Sir.

1946
01:35:33,234 --> 01:35:34,217
Sir. Sir

1947
01:35:34,257 --> 01:35:35,457
Squeeze me.

1948
01:35:36,457 --> 01:35:37,697
Excuse me.

1949
01:35:37,817 --> 01:35:38,897
Excuse me.

1950
01:35:39,657 --> 01:35:40,777
Excuse me.

1951
01:35:41,017 --> 01:35:42,257
Deby Baby...

1952
01:35:44,217 --> 01:35:46,897
Yes. - Sir, that man that
just came up looks dangerous.

1953
01:35:46,977 --> 01:35:47,977
Fine, fine.

1954
01:35:48,097 --> 01:35:50,017
So you have got my
character certificate.

1955
01:35:50,337 --> 01:35:51,737
What's your problem?

1956
01:35:51,817 --> 01:35:54,537
The problem is not mine,
it's yours.

1957
01:35:54,657 --> 01:35:57,057
Your problem,
my solution.

1958
01:35:57,297 --> 01:36:00,017
If you don't hear it,
then you'll be at loss.

1959
01:36:00,137 --> 01:36:01,897
If you listen,
then you'll make profit.

1960
01:36:03,457 --> 01:36:05,097
Profit. Mine?

1961
01:36:05,137 --> 01:36:06,897
Yes!
- My profit.

1962
01:36:07,417 --> 01:36:08,937
Yes! Sit. Sit. Sit.

1963
01:36:09,737 --> 01:36:11,685
I myself Ganesh Bhutoria.

1964
01:36:12,337 --> 01:36:17,901
People of this world humiliate
me by the name of Babu Hathkata.

1965
01:36:19,497 --> 01:36:21,097
Babu Hathkata.

1966
01:36:22,097 --> 01:36:23,657
Famous don.

1967
01:36:23,777 --> 01:36:26,587
How much did Makhrand
Marathe demand?

1968
01:36:27,217 --> 01:36:29,097
Babu..
- 20%, right?

1969
01:36:30,403 --> 01:36:32,777
Rascal,
if you give 20% to Makhrand..

1970
01:36:32,857 --> 01:36:35,218
..then what will you earn?

1971
01:36:36,737 --> 01:36:38,737
Now listen to my proposal.

1972
01:36:38,897 --> 01:36:41,337
Tomorrow I'll introduce
you to Marathe's God father..

1973
01:36:41,417 --> 01:36:42,737
..at the Royal Mansion.

1974
01:36:42,869 --> 01:36:43,897
Marathe's God father.

1975
01:36:43,977 --> 01:36:46,737
My younger brother, Kabu bhai.

1976
01:36:46,817 --> 01:36:49,137
Babu bhai's younger
brother Kabu bhai?

1977
01:36:49,217 --> 01:36:50,497
Party president.

1978
01:36:50,657 --> 01:36:53,577
All the ministers
are in his control.

1979
01:36:53,657 --> 01:36:55,937
And that heritage problem.
- Yes.

1980
01:36:56,167 --> 01:36:57,617
Solved with in one phone call.

1981
01:36:57,777 --> 01:36:59,857
And commission, only 10%.

1982
01:36:59,937 --> 01:37:01,017
10%?

1983
01:37:01,222 --> 01:37:03,737
Bhooteriya, come tomorrow at 10..

1984
01:37:03,817 --> 01:37:05,417
..with 20% advance.

1985
01:37:05,497 --> 01:37:07,617
Okay, Babu bhai. I'll be
ready by 10 AM tomorrow..

1986
01:37:07,697 --> 01:37:11,417
You fool, what will you do
at 10 o'clock in the morning.

1987
01:37:11,497 --> 01:37:14,319
But 10, I meant in the Night.

1988
01:37:19,977 --> 01:37:23,775
Welcome, Bhooteriya.

1989
01:37:23,888 --> 01:37:26,697
Did you have any
problems on the way?

1990
01:37:26,857 --> 01:37:29,417
His problems will
start once he's inside.

1991
01:37:30,066 --> 01:37:32,257
What do you mean?
- I don't know, sir.

1992
01:37:32,406 --> 01:37:33,377
I am a poor man.

1993
01:37:33,417 --> 01:37:35,457
Say goodbye to this poor man.

1994
01:37:35,675 --> 01:37:38,377
There's a rich man waiting
inside to say hello. Come on.

1995
01:37:40,590 --> 01:37:42,457
Come, Bhooteriya.

1996
01:37:42,692 --> 01:37:43,897
Meet Allen Mittal.

1997
01:37:44,042 --> 01:37:45,217
LN Mittal.

1998
01:37:45,472 --> 01:37:47,417
The famous steel magnet.

1999
01:37:48,016 --> 01:37:50,177
I am Bhooteriya, sir.

2000
01:37:50,483 --> 01:37:53,323
Pleasure meeting you, sir.
- No, no, no.

2001
01:37:53,585 --> 01:37:55,363
He's LN Mittal.

2002
01:37:55,588 --> 01:37:56,883
I am Allen Mittal.

2003
01:37:57,206 --> 01:37:59,446
He's steel magnet,
I am only magnet.

2004
01:37:59,723 --> 01:38:02,025
I've 40 magnet
chimneys in Chiploon.

2005
01:38:02,763 --> 01:38:04,258
Nice, very nice.

2006
01:38:04,298 --> 01:38:05,523
And he is..

2007
01:38:05,603 --> 01:38:07,763
Sir Richmond of diamond
and almond from ootakamond.

2008
01:38:07,803 --> 01:38:09,603
Yes!
- Full imported. Very important.

2009
01:38:09,683 --> 01:38:11,843
He's loaded with money and
richness reflects in his name.

2010
01:38:11,923 --> 01:38:13,683
Very nice.
- Sit, buddy.

2011
01:38:14,643 --> 01:38:18,664
This diamond got a knack of
speaking the local Mumbai language.

2012
01:38:18,843 --> 01:38:19,923
You said he is Richmond?

2013
01:38:20,003 --> 01:38:23,323
It's the same thing.
Diamonds are same as Richmond.

2014
01:38:25,563 --> 01:38:27,283
Sit, sit, sit. Very true.

2015
01:38:27,883 --> 01:38:28,883
Sit, sit.

2016
01:38:30,403 --> 01:38:31,203
Diamonds... I mean.

2017
01:38:31,243 --> 01:38:33,923
Richmond, what is the
name of your company?

2018
01:38:34,483 --> 01:38:36,203
The East India Company.

2019
01:38:36,363 --> 01:38:37,443
East India Company.

2020
01:38:37,523 --> 01:38:38,683
I've heard that name?

2021
01:38:39,740 --> 01:38:41,843
Indian company?
- International company.

2022
01:38:41,923 --> 01:38:43,883
They even planned to buy India.

2023
01:38:43,963 --> 01:38:45,723
I see.
So the deal didn't go through?

2024
01:38:45,763 --> 01:38:46,643
The deal didn't go through..

2025
01:38:46,683 --> 01:38:48,363
..because India didn't
budge from their offer.

2026
01:38:50,723 --> 01:38:51,723
Solid party, aren't they?

2027
01:38:51,763 --> 01:38:53,643
Rocks, Babu bhai.

2028
01:38:53,763 --> 01:38:55,043
Now let's talk business.

2029
01:38:55,123 --> 01:38:57,643
Now decide whether you
want to invest money..

2030
01:38:57,723 --> 01:39:00,043
..in his business or not?

2031
01:39:00,123 --> 01:39:04,163
Mr. Bhooteriya,
we're ready to invest.

2032
01:39:04,323 --> 01:39:06,683
Thank you, Mittal sir.
Thank you so much.

2033
01:39:08,310 --> 01:39:11,403
Now, once Kabu bhai
solves the heritage problem..

2034
01:39:11,483 --> 01:39:13,283
That will be taken
care of too. Don't worry.

2035
01:39:14,163 --> 01:39:15,043
Kabu!

2036
01:39:15,083 --> 01:39:16,243
Yes Babu bhai.

2037
01:39:16,723 --> 01:39:20,243
Babu bhai's younger
brother Kabu bhai.

2038
01:39:20,363 --> 01:39:21,144
Hello.

2039
01:39:21,184 --> 01:39:22,603
Babu bhai.

2040
01:39:22,843 --> 01:39:26,323
Who do I need to get
under my control now?

2041
01:39:26,444 --> 01:39:29,882
Kabu, didn't I tell you
about the heritage problem?

2042
01:39:29,962 --> 01:39:31,283
No need to worry.
No need to worry.

2043
01:39:31,363 --> 01:39:32,363
Son.
- Yes, mister.

2044
01:39:32,403 --> 01:39:35,163
Get the phone.
- Yes. Yes. Yes. Yes.

2045
01:39:35,374 --> 01:39:37,603
CM. Talk to master.

2046
01:39:37,723 --> 01:39:40,963
Hey CM. Cm. How are you?

2047
01:39:41,043 --> 01:39:43,243
Kabu, my son.

2048
01:39:43,363 --> 01:39:45,923
My baby, my sweetheart.

2049
01:39:46,138 --> 01:39:47,723
Shut up. Listen to me.

2050
01:39:47,914 --> 01:39:51,003
GK Bhooteriya is
an important man to me.

2051
01:39:51,257 --> 01:39:53,363
He's buying a property.

2052
01:39:53,523 --> 01:39:57,443
But it's been deemed
as heritage site.

2053
01:39:57,678 --> 01:39:59,123
Yes, yes, I know..

2054
01:39:59,311 --> 01:40:01,963
In the year..
- To hell with your years.

2055
01:40:02,187 --> 01:40:05,443
Now listen carefully
with both your ears.

2056
01:40:05,669 --> 01:40:08,523
If you don't cancel
that in two days..

2057
01:40:08,603 --> 01:40:10,483
..then you'll no longer be the CM.

2058
01:40:10,812 --> 01:40:12,443
Now hang up.

2059
01:40:13,000 --> 01:40:14,163
Thank you. Thank you.

2060
01:40:14,528 --> 01:40:16,043
Thank you, Kabu bhai.

2061
01:40:16,123 --> 01:40:18,323
Here's 10%. It's ready.
- Keep it there.

2062
01:40:18,403 --> 01:40:19,523
Here.

2063
01:40:19,643 --> 01:40:20,683
So can I leave?
- No, no.

2064
01:40:20,763 --> 01:40:22,883
Bhooteriya, we don't
let our guests leave..

2065
01:40:22,963 --> 01:40:24,963
..without showing our hospitality.

2066
01:40:25,127 --> 01:40:26,563
Yes, we'll treat you..

2067
01:40:26,643 --> 01:40:28,603
..and also show you ladies dance.

2068
01:40:28,723 --> 01:40:29,723
Ladies dance.

2069
01:40:29,803 --> 01:40:32,443
Would you like to see a trailer?

2070
01:40:32,523 --> 01:40:33,843
Trailer.. babu bhai.

2071
01:40:38,243 --> 01:40:43,683
"I am a wound on your
heart." (Cheers applauds)

2072
01:40:44,876 --> 01:40:51,683
"I am a movie plot."

2073
01:40:53,117 --> 01:40:59,123
"I am thank you, mention not."

2074
01:41:00,358 --> 01:41:06,243
"From head to toe...I am hot.."

2075
01:41:06,895 --> 01:41:12,203
"I am hot."

2076
01:41:17,243 --> 01:41:22,043
"Strike that matchstick."

2077
01:41:25,100 --> 01:41:30,123
"Strike that
matchstick and light the fire."

2078
01:41:35,467 --> 01:41:40,443
"Strike that
matchstick and heat up my body."

2079
01:41:45,277 --> 01:41:47,963
"You won't need petrol,
or diesel.."

2080
01:41:48,003 --> 01:41:50,243
"Still I'll turn to ashes."

2081
01:41:50,658 --> 01:41:53,043
"Make me your blanket.."

2082
01:41:53,123 --> 01:41:55,643
"..in the winter if you like."

2083
01:41:55,898 --> 01:42:00,723
"Strike that
matchstick and light the fire."

2084
01:42:11,079 --> 01:42:13,123
"Strike that
matchstick and heat up my body."

2085
01:42:13,255 --> 01:42:15,602
"Someone open the refrigerator."

2086
01:42:16,134 --> 01:42:18,302
"The temperature's rising."

2087
01:42:18,393 --> 01:42:20,963
"Someone open the refrigerator."

2088
01:42:21,176 --> 01:42:23,403
"Make me the apple of your eye."

2089
01:42:23,483 --> 01:42:26,403
"I am very juicy, sweetheart."

2090
01:42:31,483 --> 01:42:33,803
"Make me the apple of your eye."

2091
01:42:34,033 --> 01:42:36,123
"I am very juicy, sweetheart."

2092
01:42:36,537 --> 01:42:38,969
"Make me the dimple
of your cheeks."

2093
01:42:39,009 --> 01:42:41,403
"I am such a cutie, sweetheart."

2094
01:42:41,897 --> 01:42:44,003
"My heat can melt ice."

2095
01:42:44,198 --> 01:42:46,403
"I can melt you too."

2096
01:42:46,682 --> 01:42:51,043
"If you touch me,
I'll fall in your arms."

2097
01:42:51,495 --> 01:42:52,542
"Wait.."

2098
01:42:52,609 --> 01:42:56,436
"Strike that matchstick.."

2099
01:42:57,357 --> 01:43:01,963
"Strike that
matchstick and light the fire."

2100
01:43:02,433 --> 01:43:03,433
"Come on."

2101
01:43:04,998 --> 01:43:06,912
"Come on."

2102
01:43:07,361 --> 01:43:08,739
"This girl's on fire."

2103
01:43:08,856 --> 01:43:10,087
"She can take you higher."

2104
01:43:10,161 --> 01:43:12,567
"She's your burning desire."

2105
01:43:12,724 --> 01:43:14,763
"She's a burning desire."

2106
01:43:14,843 --> 01:43:17,323
"She'll take you high."

2107
01:43:17,761 --> 01:43:19,923
"She's a burning desire.
- She's on fire."

2108
01:43:20,077 --> 01:43:23,000
"She'll take you high.
She's a burning desire."

2109
01:43:23,040 --> 01:43:24,040
"Hey man.."

2110
01:43:24,929 --> 01:43:26,483
"No mercy, or apology."

2111
01:43:27,200 --> 01:43:30,399
"All I need is one
blow to kill you."

2112
01:43:32,756 --> 01:43:35,289
"I'll make you the
bullet of my pistol."

2113
01:43:35,329 --> 01:43:37,563
"And fire all night."

2114
01:43:43,177 --> 01:43:45,498
"I'll make you the
bullet of my pistol."

2115
01:43:45,580 --> 01:43:47,577
"And fire all night."

2116
01:43:47,617 --> 01:43:48,490
"I see."

2117
01:43:48,530 --> 01:43:50,704
"I can pick you up with one hand."

2118
01:43:50,816 --> 01:43:52,889
"Babu's very daring."

2119
01:43:53,275 --> 01:43:57,883
"I'll make sure your story.."

2120
01:43:58,163 --> 01:44:02,883
"..has a happy ending."

2121
01:44:03,942 --> 01:44:07,745
"Strike that matchstick.."

2122
01:44:09,072 --> 01:44:13,953
"Strike that
matchstick and light this fire."

2123
01:44:14,155 --> 01:44:18,802
"Strike that
matchstick and light the fire."

2124
01:44:19,253 --> 01:44:21,757
"You didn't need petrol,
or diesel.."

2125
01:44:21,926 --> 01:44:24,267
"Still she burned to ashes."

2126
01:44:24,367 --> 01:44:28,959
"You struck matchstick
and lit her on fire."

2127
01:44:29,512 --> 01:44:34,283
"You struck matchstick
and lit me on fire."

2128
01:44:34,643 --> 01:44:39,003
"You struck matchstick
and lit me on fire."

2129
01:44:39,635 --> 01:44:42,300
"You won't need petrol,
or diesel.."

2130
01:44:42,340 --> 01:44:44,652
"You set me on fire."

2131
01:44:44,864 --> 01:44:49,923
"You struck matchstick
and lit me on fire."

2132
01:44:51,623 --> 01:44:52,743
Lakshmi.

2133
01:44:52,900 --> 01:44:55,263
Yes, Lakshmi, you rascal.

2134
01:44:56,783 --> 01:44:59,663
Lakshmi, but you were dead.

2135
01:44:59,743 --> 01:45:01,423
Dead, right?

2136
01:45:01,903 --> 01:45:04,283
But I am back as a ghost
to teach you a lesson.

2137
01:45:05,272 --> 01:45:06,863
Ghost. Ghost.

2138
01:45:07,783 --> 01:45:09,743
Save me, Mittal sir.

2139
01:45:10,063 --> 01:45:11,063
Help me.

2140
01:45:11,143 --> 01:45:13,211
No one will help you here.

2141
01:45:14,423 --> 01:45:16,703
Because we're all ghosts.

2142
01:45:25,023 --> 01:45:29,211
You rascal. You burnt me alive.

2143
01:45:29,581 --> 01:45:31,255
Now I will burn you alive.

2144
01:45:31,743 --> 01:45:33,143
You will suffer to death.

2145
01:45:33,223 --> 01:45:34,143
No, Lakshmi.

2146
01:45:34,183 --> 01:45:35,881
Don't forget I am your husband.

2147
01:45:36,143 --> 01:45:37,143
Your husband.

2148
01:45:37,183 --> 01:45:38,424
Husband.

2149
01:45:40,803 --> 01:45:42,143
Babu bhai, please save me.

2150
01:45:42,223 --> 01:45:44,023
Don't try to be too difficult.

2151
01:45:44,103 --> 01:45:46,317
Just die quietly. Get that.

2152
01:45:46,633 --> 01:45:49,103
Babu bhai, I made a mistake.

2153
01:45:49,183 --> 01:45:49,983
Forgive me.

2154
01:45:50,023 --> 01:45:51,515
Keep the money.

2155
01:45:51,659 --> 01:45:53,719
I'll send you 20 Cr. more.

2156
01:45:54,058 --> 01:45:55,103
Let me go.

2157
01:45:55,183 --> 01:45:56,383
Here you go.

2158
01:45:57,264 --> 01:45:58,983
I'll pour alcohol on his body..

2159
01:45:59,113 --> 01:46:01,583
..and you set his body on fire.

2160
01:46:02,943 --> 01:46:04,183
Stop, Lakshmi.

2161
01:46:04,482 --> 01:46:05,220
Let him go.

2162
01:46:05,260 --> 01:46:06,435
Let him go? Why?

2163
01:46:07,419 --> 01:46:09,383
You know what he did with me.

2164
01:46:09,463 --> 01:46:11,863
He's the reason why my
soul's wandering around.

2165
01:46:11,943 --> 01:46:13,103
Don't worry, Lakshmi.

2166
01:46:13,335 --> 01:46:15,503
I will support your wandering soul.

2167
01:46:15,583 --> 01:46:17,663
And if he doesn't, then I will.

2168
01:46:17,743 --> 01:46:19,703
And if he doesn't, then I'm there.

2169
01:46:20,015 --> 01:46:20,743
What?

2170
01:46:20,783 --> 01:46:22,263
Like a sister.

2171
01:46:23,727 --> 01:46:27,143
If we kill him then even he'll
start living her as a ghost.

2172
01:46:27,387 --> 01:46:30,103
And then he'll spoil
our time-table. - Yes.

2173
01:46:30,143 --> 01:46:31,103
She's right.

2174
01:46:31,143 --> 01:46:32,501
He's got loads of black money.

2175
01:46:32,863 --> 01:46:34,663
And those who have black money..

2176
01:46:34,743 --> 01:46:36,343
..always die of heart attack.

2177
01:46:36,800 --> 01:46:39,663
If he dies a natural death,
he'll go straight to hell.

2178
01:46:39,831 --> 01:46:40,623
Simple.

2179
01:46:40,663 --> 01:46:43,150
Go, Bhooteriya sir,
we forgive you.

2180
01:46:43,463 --> 01:46:44,463
Thank you.

2181
01:46:44,620 --> 01:46:45,620
Thank you.

2182
01:46:45,663 --> 01:46:47,303
Thank you.
- Hey, smarty?

2183
01:46:48,219 --> 01:46:49,703
Do you think we're dumb?

2184
01:46:49,948 --> 01:46:51,235
Keep the bag down.
- Yes.

2185
01:46:51,275 --> 01:46:54,023
And send the other 20
which you just said.

2186
01:46:54,183 --> 01:46:58,663
Now get lost. - Wait Mr. Bhooteriya
You can't go like that.

2187
01:46:58,863 --> 01:47:00,520
Who is the boss? I am the boss.

2188
01:47:00,560 --> 01:47:01,703
Who is the boss?

2189
01:47:01,863 --> 01:47:03,663
You are the boss.
- Yes.

2190
01:47:03,823 --> 01:47:06,463
So you'll be pardoned
only after hearing the boss.

2191
01:47:06,678 --> 01:47:08,223
Mr. Ramsay, play the music please.

2192
01:47:08,479 --> 01:47:09,983
Yes, sir.
- Thank you.

2193
01:47:13,263 --> 01:47:14,423
Friends.

2194
01:47:15,374 --> 01:47:16,543
Ghosts.

2195
01:47:17,682 --> 01:47:18,682
Human being.

2196
01:47:20,421 --> 01:47:25,436
You know...their
shopping malls, multiplexes..

2197
01:47:26,156 --> 01:47:29,823
..housing complexes,
high-rise towers..

2198
01:47:30,870 --> 01:47:32,783
..have deprived
the poor of the sun.

2199
01:47:34,564 --> 01:47:37,381
Because of them, the
sky's getting smaller..

2200
01:47:37,517 --> 01:47:39,484
..for the children
to fly their kites.

2201
01:47:40,524 --> 01:47:42,764
With the pointed
edges of their towers..

2202
01:47:42,804 --> 01:47:46,036
..they are piercing
the heart of the skies.

2203
01:47:47,608 --> 01:47:50,672
That's when it doesn't rain,
it doesn't rain.

2204
01:47:51,564 --> 01:47:54,628
And when it does,
it wreaks havoc.

2205
01:47:56,044 --> 01:47:58,995
There was a time when there
were huge homes in the city.

2206
01:47:59,244 --> 01:48:01,599
With huge courtyards, lawns.

2207
01:48:02,249 --> 01:48:06,249
But today...the common man
makes many sacrifices..

2208
01:48:06,289 --> 01:48:10,526
..and pays EMI and what
does he get in return.

2209
01:48:10,684 --> 01:48:12,644
A small pigeon coop.

2210
01:48:15,524 --> 01:48:17,742
By stealing each foot, they're..

2211
01:48:17,939 --> 01:48:20,279
..pulling the earth
from below the poor.

2212
01:48:21,484 --> 01:48:23,485
They have left no
place for a grave either.

2213
01:48:24,324 --> 01:48:26,666
Graves are getting smaller..

2214
01:48:27,164 --> 01:48:29,456
..that a person feels
suffocated even after he's dead.

2215
01:48:29,604 --> 01:48:31,484
Move aside. I feel suffocated.

2216
01:48:31,600 --> 01:48:32,600
Move.

2217
01:48:33,244 --> 01:48:34,380
Forget humans.

2218
01:48:34,724 --> 01:48:37,017
They've even made the
lives of ghosts difficult.

2219
01:48:38,444 --> 01:48:39,987
How have we harmed you..

2220
01:48:40,244 --> 01:48:42,760
..that you want to
snatch our peace and serenity.

2221
01:48:47,324 --> 01:48:50,324
Only to fill your
banks with more money..

2222
01:48:50,404 --> 01:48:52,379
..why are you throwing
us out of our homes?

2223
01:48:53,284 --> 01:48:55,988
Without thinking where
we'll go, where we'll stay.

2224
01:48:56,884 --> 01:48:59,004
In dustbins, the public toilet.

2225
01:48:59,084 --> 01:49:01,329
Or in one of the
trial rooms in your mall.

2226
01:49:02,404 --> 01:49:04,537
If you keep
constructing these buildings..

2227
01:49:05,444 --> 01:49:07,684
..then one day the
earth will cave in..

2228
01:49:07,764 --> 01:49:12,328
..under the burden of
the iron, metal and bricks.

2229
01:49:12,964 --> 01:49:14,766
The world was scared of ghosts.

2230
01:49:15,404 --> 01:49:18,444
But now ghosts are scared
of these real-estate demons.

2231
01:49:19,403 --> 01:49:21,680
So tell me who do we complain to?

2232
01:49:22,244 --> 01:49:23,542
Who do we talk to?

2233
01:49:24,204 --> 01:49:25,204
No.

2234
01:49:26,804 --> 01:49:28,804
You cannot understand our pain.

2235
01:49:29,604 --> 01:49:30,924
You're human after all.

2236
01:49:32,164 --> 01:49:33,468
And humans these days..

2237
01:49:33,508 --> 01:49:35,364
..don't understand
another human's pain..

2238
01:49:35,444 --> 01:49:37,644
..so how can they
understand a ghost's pain?

2239
01:49:38,204 --> 01:49:39,284
Go.

2240
01:49:39,903 --> 01:49:41,004
Go away from here.

2241
01:49:41,265 --> 01:49:42,804
Leave us to our condition.

2242
01:49:43,133 --> 01:49:44,284
Take him away.

2243
01:49:44,324 --> 01:49:45,324
Go.

2244
01:49:45,444 --> 01:49:47,804
Son, you're fortunate.

2245
01:49:48,332 --> 01:49:49,444
Now get out of here.

2246
01:49:49,604 --> 01:49:53,475
No mercy, or apology.
One blow is enough.

2247
01:49:54,414 --> 01:49:55,452
Let's go.

2248
01:49:56,204 --> 01:49:57,325
Get out.

2249
01:49:57,604 --> 01:49:58,604
Run away.

2250
01:49:59,337 --> 01:50:00,337
Get out.

2251
01:50:18,004 --> 01:50:22,129
Aatmaram, will you take me home?
- Of course, sir.

2252
01:50:22,435 --> 01:50:23,435
I am a driver.

2253
01:50:23,484 --> 01:50:26,004
And a good driver picks
his guest from his home..

2254
01:50:26,084 --> 01:50:27,308
..and also takes him back.

2255
01:50:27,444 --> 01:50:28,964
What a nice thing to say?

2256
01:50:29,333 --> 01:50:31,524
Are you a ghost too?
- I don't know, sir.

2257
01:50:31,741 --> 01:50:33,183
I am a poor man.

2258
01:50:34,764 --> 01:50:35,684
Very, very interesting.

2259
01:50:35,724 --> 01:50:36,924
Thank you thank you.

2260
01:50:37,111 --> 01:50:39,284
I didn't get one thing.
- Yes.

2261
01:50:39,558 --> 01:50:41,444
How did the ghosts find Lakshmi?

2262
01:50:41,524 --> 01:50:42,524
Spookbook.

2263
01:50:42,644 --> 01:50:43,604
What? Spookbook?

2264
01:50:43,644 --> 01:50:44,724
Yes, just like Facebook..

2265
01:50:44,764 --> 01:50:46,164
..ghosts have Spookbook.
- Nice.

2266
01:50:46,643 --> 01:50:47,594
Bizarre Boss.

2267
01:50:47,634 --> 01:50:50,604
Lakshmi accepted Tina's request.

2268
01:50:51,027 --> 01:50:53,484
And also her offer to
teach Bhooteriya a lesson.

2269
01:50:53,564 --> 01:50:56,364
But sir, the main problem
was doing a hot item number.

2270
01:50:56,602 --> 01:50:58,308
Because Lakshmi was a simple,
homely lady.

2271
01:50:58,348 --> 01:50:59,444
She didn't know how to dance.

2272
01:50:59,592 --> 01:51:01,548
Got it, Manoranjana Kumari.

2273
01:51:01,647 --> 01:51:02,644
And Tina, sir.

2274
01:51:02,684 --> 01:51:04,804
They both trained her.
- What a concept.

2275
01:51:04,884 --> 01:51:06,404
What a concept.
- Thank you, sir.

2276
01:51:06,672 --> 01:51:09,364
And these ghosts taught a
nice lesson to Bhooteriya.

2277
01:51:09,949 --> 01:51:12,204
I guess he never cast an
eye on Royal Mansion again.

2278
01:51:12,284 --> 01:51:13,284
No, sir, he came back.

2279
01:51:14,065 --> 01:51:15,244
In fact the next day?

2280
01:51:15,824 --> 01:51:17,111
With a witch doctor?

2281
01:51:20,914 --> 01:51:22,797
With the original
papers of Royal Mansion.

2282
01:51:29,065 --> 01:51:32,465
Bhooteriya transferred the property
back to the ghosts forever.

2283
01:51:32,589 --> 01:51:36,278
And once again there was
happiness in Royal Mansion.

2284
01:51:45,305 --> 01:51:46,505
And on this joyous occasion..

2285
01:51:46,585 --> 01:51:47,905
..Gaindamal allowed Gulabchand..

2286
01:51:47,945 --> 01:51:50,265
..in Royal Mansion as well.

2287
01:51:50,505 --> 01:51:54,625
And Manoranjana Kumari and
Gulabchand were together again.

2288
01:51:58,878 --> 01:52:01,425
What a story.
- Sir.

2289
01:52:02,385 --> 01:52:03,225
Sir.

2290
01:52:03,265 --> 01:52:05,145
What a story.
- Thank you, sir.

2291
01:52:05,265 --> 01:52:08,265
It's got characters, plot points,
cinematic moments.

2292
01:52:08,345 --> 01:52:10,465
Crises, and now I've
the resolution as well.

2293
01:52:10,545 --> 01:52:12,825
And a hot item number too.

2294
01:52:13,705 --> 01:52:16,905
Raju writer,
you really are a writer.

2295
01:52:17,025 --> 01:52:18,025
Thank you, sir.

2296
01:52:18,225 --> 01:52:19,265
Thank you.

2297
01:52:24,265 --> 01:52:25,305
I like it. My friend!

2298
01:52:25,665 --> 01:52:27,265
I like it very much.

2299
01:52:28,505 --> 01:52:29,947
But brother, you see...

2300
01:52:30,825 --> 01:52:32,385
..our story is very nice.

2301
01:52:32,505 --> 01:52:33,929
Not just nice, it's sensational.

2302
01:52:34,665 --> 01:52:36,277
But there's a small hurdle.

2303
01:52:36,665 --> 01:52:38,892
Hurdle?
- Not too much.

2304
01:52:39,025 --> 01:52:40,585
Our story's a bit whacky.

2305
01:52:40,625 --> 01:52:41,785
It's a bit weird.

2306
01:52:41,865 --> 01:52:45,508
So the producer might hesitate
a bit to invest in this idea.

2307
01:52:46,128 --> 01:52:47,987
But I will manage.
I'll do it. Not to worry.

2308
01:52:50,105 --> 01:52:52,196
Sir, is that all?
- Yes, that's it.

2309
01:53:05,145 --> 01:53:07,967
What's this? - See it yourself,
you'll understand.

2310
01:53:17,025 --> 01:53:19,825
These are coins during the
East India Company rule.

2311
01:53:19,985 --> 01:53:21,345
They must be really old, antique.

2312
01:53:21,425 --> 01:53:22,745
Not just antique, sir.

2313
01:53:22,785 --> 01:53:24,345
They are worth a fortune.

2314
01:53:24,425 --> 01:53:26,236
Enough for you to start your film.

2315
01:53:27,057 --> 01:53:28,057
Keep it.

2316
01:53:28,105 --> 01:53:30,280
We'll arrange for the rest too.
- Hold on.

2317
01:53:30,585 --> 01:53:32,745
First you tell me your story.

2318
01:53:32,825 --> 01:53:35,020
After that you also
arrange for the finance.

2319
01:53:35,343 --> 01:53:36,595
What do you want?

2320
01:53:37,765 --> 01:53:40,026
Sir, I want to see a film
being made on my script.

2321
01:53:40,305 --> 01:53:43,003
Sir, since I grew conscious,
I had just one dream.

2322
01:53:43,871 --> 01:53:45,545
Someday I'll be a film writer.

2323
01:53:46,185 --> 01:53:48,236
And someone will
make a film on my story.

2324
01:53:49,919 --> 01:53:52,105
With this dream and 400 rupees..

2325
01:53:52,185 --> 01:53:54,185
..I came to Mumbai from Allahabad.

2326
01:53:55,731 --> 01:53:58,766
Fought with my mother
and angered my brother.

2327
01:54:00,044 --> 01:54:01,185
I was worried as well.

2328
01:54:01,945 --> 01:54:03,465
But I was confident.

2329
01:54:03,905 --> 01:54:06,564
I knew that someday my
dream will come true.

2330
01:54:09,992 --> 01:54:12,185
Slowly my dreams
started shattering..

2331
01:54:12,953 --> 01:54:14,305
..and so did my faith.

2332
01:54:15,563 --> 01:54:17,545
Everywhere I went with my story..

2333
01:54:18,030 --> 01:54:20,188
..all I would get is rejection.

2334
01:54:22,025 --> 01:54:23,896
Everyone said
"Raju, forsake this profession".

2335
01:54:23,936 --> 01:54:26,095
You will only face failure.

2336
01:54:27,702 --> 01:54:29,905
But, sir,
I had heard a line in a play.

2337
01:54:30,808 --> 01:54:32,825
If a man has to be a failure..

2338
01:54:33,413 --> 01:54:36,985
..then it should be in
the work he wants to do.

2339
01:54:46,067 --> 01:54:48,545
You're successful now.

2340
01:54:49,694 --> 01:54:51,531
I am making a film on your story.

2341
01:54:53,208 --> 01:54:57,385
I am happy that I got
success at least after I died.

2342
01:54:59,231 --> 01:55:01,985
What?
After I died?

2343
01:55:02,865 --> 01:55:05,843
Sir, five months
ago I had no work..

2344
01:55:07,196 --> 01:55:09,240
..so I used to do
ghost-writing for many writers.

2345
01:55:09,588 --> 01:55:11,026
One day I was returning home..

2346
01:55:11,066 --> 01:55:13,145
..after finishing work.
And its raining heavily.

2347
01:55:13,457 --> 01:55:15,666
And I suddenly heard
a girl screaming.

2348
01:55:16,994 --> 01:55:18,065
Save me!

2349
01:55:20,305 --> 01:55:21,585
Save me!

2350
01:55:24,505 --> 01:55:25,505
Come on.

2351
01:55:25,665 --> 01:55:26,705
Come.

2352
01:55:27,264 --> 01:55:28,511
Who are you?

2353
01:55:28,905 --> 01:55:29,985
Come on.

2354
01:55:31,048 --> 01:55:32,048
Run!

2355
01:55:32,120 --> 01:55:33,320
Run! Go.
Run!

2356
01:55:37,745 --> 01:55:39,065
Kill him..

2357
01:55:43,705 --> 01:55:44,825
Kill him.

2358
01:55:48,425 --> 01:55:50,105
And that is how I got killed.

2359
01:55:50,305 --> 01:55:52,465
I couldn't become a writer..

2360
01:55:52,585 --> 01:55:54,065
..but I definitely became a ghost.

2361
01:55:54,145 --> 01:55:56,385
After I became a ghost
I came to Royal Mansion.

2362
01:55:56,625 --> 01:55:58,682
Gaindamal sir gave me
permission to stay here..

2363
01:55:58,722 --> 01:55:59,820
..as a special case.

2364
01:56:00,727 --> 01:56:02,345
Then one day I wrote a story..

2365
01:56:02,505 --> 01:56:05,145
..about the joys, sorrows and
the sufferings of the ghosts..

2366
01:56:05,454 --> 01:56:07,145
..which I just narrated to you.

2367
01:56:10,512 --> 01:56:12,305
I must say you should start acting.

2368
01:56:12,500 --> 01:56:13,985
You should stop writing.

2369
01:56:14,292 --> 01:56:16,047
That is how I got killed, sir.

2370
01:56:17,408 --> 01:56:18,785
You think I am joking.

2371
01:56:19,254 --> 01:56:20,894
I don't think. I know.

2372
01:56:20,987 --> 01:56:22,414
You're pulling my leg.

2373
01:56:22,614 --> 01:56:23,694
What's the proof?

2374
01:56:24,217 --> 01:56:25,037
You want proof?

2375
01:56:25,077 --> 01:56:26,526
Yes, I do.
- Come.

2376
01:56:54,094 --> 01:56:56,014
You want proof, don't you?

2377
01:56:56,814 --> 01:56:58,254
Curtain call, please.

2378
01:57:41,014 --> 01:57:42,294
Yes, Sumit.

2379
01:57:43,054 --> 01:57:44,974
Sorry, I fell asleep.

2380
01:57:45,054 --> 01:57:45,974
Very sorry.

2381
01:57:46,014 --> 01:57:48,854
You fell asleep,
but I am in a mess.

2382
01:57:48,934 --> 01:57:50,774
I had to travel in a
truck the whole day.

2383
01:57:51,214 --> 01:57:52,894
I guess I'll have
to give it a massage.

2384
01:57:53,014 --> 01:57:54,374
Let's go.
- Wait.

2385
01:57:55,414 --> 01:57:58,454
I just found out how
beneficial sleeping is.

2386
01:57:58,574 --> 01:57:59,654
How?

2387
01:57:59,894 --> 01:58:02,014
I heard a film story in my dream.

2388
01:58:02,303 --> 01:58:03,303
Almost a script.

2389
01:58:04,694 --> 01:58:07,534
Do one thing, go the
Guinness Book of World Records.

2390
01:58:07,894 --> 01:58:09,734
They will definitely
produce your film.

2391
01:58:10,014 --> 01:58:11,734
After all,
this will be the first film..

2392
01:58:11,774 --> 01:58:13,174
..which was written in the dream.

2393
01:58:13,668 --> 01:58:15,341
Give me a drag.
- Yes, sure.

2394
01:58:22,494 --> 01:58:23,774
What's this?

2395
01:58:28,934 --> 01:58:29,974
Aditya.

2396
01:59:14,374 --> 01:59:15,654
Number 1, take 1.

2397
01:59:15,734 --> 01:59:16,734
Clap.

2398
01:59:16,854 --> 01:59:19,074
And action.

2399
01:59:21,428 --> 01:59:22,428
Trolley.

2400

"Here comes...
the carefree ghost."

2401
01:59:44,602 --> 01:59:49,174
"Dance to the tunes of
movie songs, sweetheart."

2403

2408

2417

2429

2430

2431

2432

beautiful."

1
00:01:30,727 --> 00:01:35,357
A peacock feather in his
hair and a winning smile

2
00:01:38,468 --> 00:01:42,996
He is fun, he plays the flute

3
00:01:45,475 --> 00:01:49,935
A peacock feather in his
hair and a winning smile

4
00:01:50,013 --> 00:01:53,813
... his friend Radha calls him Shyam

5
00:01:53,884 --> 00:01:57,650
These old legends of
the little hero...

6
00:01:57,721 --> 00:02:02,715
have passed into folk tales

7
00:02:03,360 --> 00:02:06,989
Hey Krishna...

8
00:02:07,264 --> 00:02:10,756
Hey Krishna... we still speak his name

9
00:02:10,834 --> 00:02:14,793
Hey Krishna...

10
00:02:14,871 --> 00:02:18,864
Hey Krishna... we still speak his name

11
00:02:26,316 --> 00:02:30,275
The blue-skinned boy
who tended his flock...

12
00:02:30,353 --> 00:02:34,050
He has many names,
he plays divine music

13
00:02:34,291 --> 00:02:37,886
and he has been
worshipped down the ages

14
00:02:37,961 --> 00:02:43,297
Such are the old legends
that have passed into folk tales

15
00:02:43,800 --> 00:02:47,395
Hey Krishna...

16
00:02:47,504 --> 00:02:51,463
Hey Krishna... we still speak his name

17
00:02:51,541 --> 00:02:55,341
Hey Krishna...

18
00:02:55,412 --> 00:02:59,075
Hey Krishna... we still speak his name

19
00:02:59,316 --> 00:03:03,650
In a village on the banks of
Yamuna ... there it all began

20
00:03:04,688 --> 00:03:09,853
It was in those meadows his
flocks grazed and his flute played

21
00:03:09,926 --> 00:03:14,329
In a village on the banks of
Yamuna ... there it all began

22
00:03:14,397 --> 00:03:18,333
It was in those meadows his
flocks grazed and his flute played

23
00:03:18,401 --> 00:03:22,030
And the notes of his
flute rose in the air

24
00:03:22,272 --> 00:03:25,730
making melodies we so love to hear

25
00:03:25,809 --> 00:03:26,935
of how little Krishna...

26
00:03:26,977 --> 00:03:29,775
won the hearts of men and
how he stole their butter...

27
00:03:29,880 --> 00:03:34,681
and the songs tell of his strength,
how he moved mountains with a finger

28
00:03:35,619 --> 00:03:39,316
Hey Krishna...

29
00:03:39,389 --> 00:03:43,382
Hey Krishna... we still speak his name

30
00:03:43,460 --> 00:03:46,918
Hey Krishna...

31
00:03:46,997 --> 00:03:50,831
Hey Krishna... we still speak his name

32
00:05:07,377 --> 00:05:10,869
Butterfly...

33
00:05:10,947 --> 00:05:14,439
What is that thing?
- A rising storm?

34
00:05:14,517 --> 00:05:16,883
Look at it... coming in.
- Will it rain?

35
00:05:16,953 --> 00:05:18,853
Is it... the earth rumbling?

36
00:05:23,393 --> 00:05:27,261
Look at that cloud...
Let it rain, let it rain...

37
00:05:27,330 --> 00:05:28,957
Not a raincloud...

38
00:05:29,599 --> 00:05:31,794
A cloud of dust... armies?

39
00:05:34,304 --> 00:05:39,606
Armies...?
- Yes, it is an army

40
00:05:45,448 --> 00:05:47,882
Run... run for your lives... now!

41
00:05:47,951 --> 00:05:51,580
The murderous Prince of Mathura!

42
00:06:00,764 --> 00:06:03,756
Go... run away, while you can...

43
00:06:03,833 --> 00:06:06,529
Run...

44
00:06:18,415 --> 00:06:22,476
Chanur... Mustik... let the hunt begin

45
00:06:25,021 --> 00:06:27,581
It was the era of evil,

46
00:06:28,024 --> 00:06:31,926
an age of sin

47
00:06:32,962 --> 00:06:35,453
Greedy kings and their
bloodthirsty armies...

48
00:06:35,532 --> 00:06:37,523
unleashed terror

49
00:06:37,600 --> 00:06:41,001
and in the blood of
countless innocent people..

50
00:06:41,271 --> 00:06:43,330
..this earth was drenched...

51
00:06:43,406 --> 00:06:49,504
and in songs and stories of those
who were wounded and made slaves,

52
00:06:49,579 --> 00:06:53,572
the legends and
histories of this world were told

53
00:06:57,487 --> 00:06:59,648
Start the fires...

54
00:07:14,404 --> 00:07:16,235
Round them up

55
00:07:23,713 --> 00:07:25,340
Into the cages

56
00:07:32,355 --> 00:07:35,916
Please Prince, show us mercy...

57
00:07:37,293 --> 00:07:42,560
..do not take our food,
don't take our cattle...

58
00:07:42,632 --> 00:07:47,592
do not leave us to starve to death

59
00:07:47,670 --> 00:07:54,633
Please, at least not our children...
please Mercy prince... mercy

60
00:07:57,313 --> 00:08:02,512
I am Kans... what I
fancy is mine to take

61
00:08:03,553 --> 00:08:05,817
Hurry!

62
00:08:55,505 --> 00:08:59,566
Is there no end to our pain?

63
00:08:59,976 --> 00:09:03,673
When will this torture stop?

64
00:09:04,547 --> 00:09:08,278
When will You send us a savior?

65
00:09:08,718 --> 00:09:10,481
When...?

66
00:09:26,402 --> 00:09:28,461
Out of our way...

67
00:09:28,538 --> 00:09:31,336
The Prince is coming home

68
00:09:49,626 --> 00:09:52,288
Victory to Prince Kans

69
00:09:52,362 --> 00:09:54,956
Long live prince Kans

70
00:09:55,031 --> 00:09:58,626
Long live prince Kans
- Back to work, slaves

71
00:09:59,369 --> 00:10:02,634
Don't drop the bag of cement

72
00:10:03,773 --> 00:10:05,297
Do work.

73
00:10:39,342 --> 00:10:47,442
My power is so great, my
rule will spread beyond Mathura

74
00:10:47,517 --> 00:10:50,315
And the whole world will
become the kingdom of Kans

75
00:10:50,386 --> 00:10:52,320
I shall shatter the peace of heavens..

76
00:10:52,388 --> 00:10:55,585
..and I shall
unleash the furies of hell

77
00:10:55,658 --> 00:11:00,652
and history will speak
of how I thrust my sword..

78
00:11:00,763 --> 00:11:03,732
..into the heart of the earth

79
00:11:03,766 --> 00:11:06,860
This, the world's biggest stadium..

80
00:11:06,903 --> 00:11:09,929
..will become a symbol of my greatness

81
00:11:10,006 --> 00:11:14,306
If it is not finished by
the time of my coronation,

82
00:11:14,377 --> 00:11:17,574
then, you slaves will be buried
alive under the sands of this arena

83
00:11:17,647 --> 00:11:20,878
And your bones will be
mixed with the concrete

84
00:11:27,924 --> 00:11:30,552
Put the new slaves to work

85
00:11:30,626 --> 00:11:33,322
Double the working shifts

86
00:11:33,396 --> 00:11:35,728
And halve the rations

87
00:11:54,450 --> 00:11:56,418
Kans' cruelty reflects...

88
00:11:56,486 --> 00:12:01,583
my failure as a parent

89
00:12:02,492 --> 00:12:05,290
In Mathura, I Emperor Ugrasen...

90
00:12:05,361 --> 00:12:07,921
stand reduced to a helpless father

91
00:12:07,997 --> 00:12:12,263
But Uncle, cousin Kans is so caring...

92
00:12:12,301 --> 00:12:15,964
he always remembers to bring me gifts

93
00:12:16,039 --> 00:12:19,770
He is always worried
about my safety, protection

94
00:12:19,842 --> 00:12:24,302
I know, Devaki. But
I am afraid that...

95
00:12:24,580 --> 00:12:26,377
after you're married
and gone from here..

96
00:12:26,482 --> 00:12:30,509
..he might abandon all human values

97
00:12:30,887 --> 00:12:35,756
But please, you must never abandon him

98
00:12:36,492 --> 00:12:40,656
For he is to be the king of our clan

99
00:12:41,931 --> 00:12:44,365
I can only hope and pray that..

100
00:12:44,434 --> 00:12:47,892
..he doesn't destroy the other clans

101
00:12:48,337 --> 00:12:50,805
He is the sum total
of my fears, Devaki

102
00:12:51,007 --> 00:12:55,842
It's a fragile peace
between warring clans...

103
00:12:55,912 --> 00:12:59,575
Your marriage with Prince Vasudev..

104
00:12:59,649 --> 00:13:02,311
..promises to be the
first alliance for peace

105
00:13:02,618 --> 00:13:06,645
Eighteen warring clans will be united

106
00:13:07,590 --> 00:13:13,495
This is the beginning of
my dream for a golden age

107
00:13:13,563 --> 00:13:14,928
But..

108
00:13:16,265 --> 00:13:17,596
Cousin Kans...

109
00:13:18,034 --> 00:13:20,502
it's got to be you

110
00:13:20,570 --> 00:13:24,472
Devaki, you are the apple of my eye

111
00:13:26,275 --> 00:13:28,038
But I find it so hard to believe...

112
00:13:28,277 --> 00:13:32,475
..that you are getting
married and leaving us

113
00:13:53,436 --> 00:13:55,370
Live a long and healthy life

114
00:13:58,307 --> 00:14:01,003
I had promised your father..

115
00:14:01,077 --> 00:14:06,674
..that you will be given a
wedding fit for a princess of Mathura

116
00:14:06,749 --> 00:14:09,775
I have fulfilled my promise

117
00:14:10,520 --> 00:14:14,854
Akrur, won't you bless Devaki?

118
00:14:16,325 --> 00:14:18,452
Live happily

119
00:14:18,528 --> 00:14:20,894
May you have mighty sons

120
00:14:27,470 --> 00:14:28,801
Dear cousin...

121
00:14:30,573 --> 00:14:34,669
Everyone in Mathura
will miss you, Devaki

122
00:14:39,916 --> 00:14:41,543
Vasudev...

123
00:14:41,984 --> 00:14:46,421
I give her to you. She
is as dear to me as life

124
00:14:47,323 --> 00:14:51,692
Therefore care for her as I have

125
00:14:52,929 --> 00:14:56,330
Never bring her any sorrow

126
00:14:56,399 --> 00:14:58,526
Her wish is my command

127
00:14:59,869 --> 00:15:01,302
Hey...

128
00:15:01,370 --> 00:15:02,598
climb down

129
00:15:02,672 --> 00:15:05,800
I shall drive the bride's chariot

130
00:15:12,281 --> 00:15:15,307
God bless Devaki and Vasudev

131
00:15:15,384 --> 00:15:18,842
God bless Devaki and Vasudev

132
00:15:18,921 --> 00:15:22,357
God bless Devaki and Vasudev

133
00:15:22,425 --> 00:15:24,950
God bless Devaki and Vasudev

134
00:15:25,027 --> 00:15:28,258
God bless Devaki and Vasudev

135
00:15:28,331 --> 00:15:31,892
God bless Devaki and Vasudev

136
00:15:31,968 --> 00:15:35,597
God bless Devaki and Vasudev

137
00:15:35,671 --> 00:15:39,334
God bless Devaki and Vasudev

138
00:15:39,408 --> 00:15:42,605
God bless Devaki and Vasudev

139
00:16:16,746 --> 00:16:18,839
Beware Kans...

140
00:16:19,382 --> 00:16:22,977
know this... the one whom
you are saying goodbye to...

141
00:16:23,452 --> 00:16:26,580
the eighth son of this very Devaki...

142
00:16:26,689 --> 00:16:29,453
will kill you

143
00:16:37,400 --> 00:16:44,704
Her child will be my undoing?

144
00:16:44,774 --> 00:16:46,537
I cannot allow this
prophecy to be true...

145
00:16:46,609 --> 00:16:50,375
..to let her son be born
so that he can kill me...?

146
00:16:50,446 --> 00:16:53,006
Never... never...

147
00:16:54,417 --> 00:16:55,748
Devaki,

148
00:16:55,818 --> 00:17:01,313
forgive me, forgive
me my dearest cousin

149
00:17:10,533 --> 00:17:11,898
Kans..?

150
00:17:19,475 --> 00:17:21,943
No Kans... no!

151
00:17:22,945 --> 00:17:27,439
If your life is to be the
cause of my death Devaki...

152
00:17:27,516 --> 00:17:30,542
..then in your death is my life

153
00:17:30,619 --> 00:17:32,280
Kans, stop

154
00:17:32,955 --> 00:17:34,684
This is Devaki... she is a woman...

155
00:17:34,757 --> 00:17:36,622
..and she is your cousin

156
00:17:36,859 --> 00:17:39,020
... and we are Just-married

157
00:17:39,562 --> 00:17:41,723
Holding a knife on her...

158
00:17:41,997 --> 00:17:45,023
..doesn't suit... a
great warrior like you

159
00:17:45,267 --> 00:17:48,725
It's her tough luck.
I must do what I must

160
00:17:48,804 --> 00:17:51,967
Then I am bound to
defend my wife, Kans

161
00:17:52,508 --> 00:17:54,305
And remember...

162
00:17:54,377 --> 00:17:56,868
if I am forced to raise my sword,

163
00:17:56,946 --> 00:18:00,507
..then your clan and mine are at war..

164
00:18:00,549 --> 00:18:03,677
..and my allies are
also at war with you

165
00:18:03,753 --> 00:18:06,244
Are you threatening me, Vasudev?

166
00:18:06,322 --> 00:18:07,687
No! He isn't threatening

167
00:18:08,391 --> 00:18:11,883
Please! Have mercy upon us...

168
00:18:12,628 --> 00:18:15,222
Should I invite my death?

169
00:18:15,297 --> 00:18:16,958
No!

170
00:18:22,371 --> 00:18:24,737
Neither I nor Devaki
will cause of your death ...

171
00:18:24,807 --> 00:18:27,275
..it is the eighth son

172
00:18:29,545 --> 00:18:30,944
I..

173
00:18:31,947 --> 00:18:33,915
I give you my word...

174
00:18:34,283 --> 00:18:38,276
Each of Devaki's sons,
as soon as they are born,

175
00:18:38,788 --> 00:18:40,915
I shall give to you

176
00:18:43,526 --> 00:18:47,826
You are truthful and a
man of honor, Vasudev

177
00:18:47,897 --> 00:18:51,663
But as long as I am alive,

178
00:18:51,734 --> 00:18:56,364
you shall remain my prisoner

179
00:18:56,739 --> 00:18:57,831
Soldier...

180
00:18:57,907 --> 00:18:59,670
As you wish, my Lord

181
00:20:05,574 --> 00:20:11,638
Kans has imprisoned his cousin..

182
00:20:11,747 --> 00:20:14,511
..and her husband

183
00:20:14,583 --> 00:20:17,051
It's because of that prophecy...

184
00:20:17,286 --> 00:20:21,313
..that Devaki's
eighth son, will kill Kans

185
00:20:21,624 --> 00:20:28,792
How cruel of him... to throw a
newly-wedded couple into the dungeons

186
00:20:28,864 --> 00:20:32,925
How could he be so heartless...
this son of Ugrasen?

187
00:20:33,002 --> 00:20:35,402
The list of his
misdeeds grows longer...

188
00:20:35,471 --> 00:20:39,339
it's said that Kans
has angered his father

189
00:20:45,614 --> 00:20:50,347
This would've Qualified
for a death sentence..

190
00:20:50,719 --> 00:20:53,950
..this betrayal borders on treason

191
00:20:54,857 --> 00:20:58,486
but a crown prince is given
a chance to defend himself
