What?

1768
01:25:00,120 --> 01:25:02,040
Yes. She has 8 to 10 siblings.

1769
01:25:02,120 --> 01:25:04,880
8 to 10.
She must be telling you the time.

1770
01:25:04,960 --> 01:25:09,080
No, she wasn't, son.
This is my bad luck.

1771
01:25:10,600 --> 01:25:12,520
We can't get married now.

1772
01:25:12,600 --> 01:25:13,920
Don't be absurd, papa.

1773
01:25:14,000 --> 01:25:16,080
Who cares about Hindu and
Muslim in this era?

1774
01:25:16,400 --> 01:25:18,320
- Take Shahrukh and Gauri.
- Yes.

1775
01:25:18,400 --> 01:25:19,880
- Aamir and Kiran.
- Yes.

1776
01:25:19,960 --> 01:25:21,600
- Saif and Kareena.
- Yes.

1777
01:25:21,680 --> 01:25:22,760
Suresh and Hameeda.

1778
01:25:22,840 --> 01:25:23,760
Who is Suresh?

1779
01:25:23,840 --> 01:25:26,480
- The guy that sells juice at the corner.
- Oh I see.

1780
01:25:26,560 --> 01:25:29,520
And in fact, take Smiley for instance.

1781
01:25:29,880 --> 01:25:31,640
- Is this Sikhs a Muslim?
- No.

1782
01:25:31,720 --> 01:25:34,160
But his fiancÃ© Sakeena is a Muslim.

1783
01:25:34,360 --> 01:25:36,480
What? My fiancÃ© is a Muslim?

1784
01:25:36,560 --> 01:25:37,440
Did you forget?

1785
01:25:37,520 --> 01:25:38,640
Yes, I did. Remind me.

1786
01:25:38,720 --> 01:25:40,040
Sakeena.

1787
01:25:40,840 --> 01:25:42,640
Go ahead and tell papa..

1788
01:25:42,720 --> 01:25:45,680
..that you don't have a problem
with your girlfriend being a Muslim.

1789
01:25:46,280 --> 01:25:49,160
No. I don't have a problem, uncle.

1790
01:25:49,240 --> 01:25:51,040
Muslims are classy people.

1791
01:25:51,120 --> 01:25:53,360
Manners, Love, Care..

1792
01:25:53,440 --> 01:25:56,600
But son, marrying a Muslim..

1793
01:25:57,040 --> 01:25:58,720
What if there is a problem..

1794
01:25:58,800 --> 01:26:00,000
You are right.
There is a small problem.

1795
01:26:00,080 --> 01:26:01,520
What are you saying?
Where is the problem?

1796
01:26:01,600 --> 01:26:02,840
What are you saying?

1797
01:26:02,920 --> 01:26:05,120
Tomorrow when I have kids,
what am I going to call them?

1798
01:26:05,200 --> 01:26:06,560
Razia Chadda, Harpreet Hussain.

1799
01:26:06,640 --> 01:26:08,200
They will run around
greeting Insah Allah...

1800
01:26:08,280 --> 01:26:09,960
How will that look?
You tell me, uncle.

1801
01:26:10,040 --> 01:26:11,040
You are absolutely right,

1802
01:26:11,120 --> 01:26:12,080
What right?

1803
01:26:12,160 --> 01:26:14,680
Children are not born with surnames.

1804
01:26:14,760 --> 01:26:17,040
No one congratulates saying,
it's Sharma.

1805
01:26:17,120 --> 01:26:19,000
Congratulations, it's Shukla.

1806
01:26:19,080 --> 01:26:20,760
Whether it's Agarwal or Ansari.

1807
01:26:20,840 --> 01:26:22,280
Love by any name is still love.

1808
01:26:22,360 --> 01:26:23,280
You are right.

1809
01:26:23,360 --> 01:26:25,960
Let's assume that Baisakhi
and Eid fall on the same day..

1810
01:26:26,040 --> 01:26:27,080
..then what will I eat first?

1811
01:26:27,160 --> 01:26:29,920
- Kidney beans or goat meat.
- True.

1812
01:26:31,400 --> 01:26:33,640
Feed the kidney beans
to the goat and eat the goat.

1813
01:26:33,720 --> 01:26:35,000
Radhe-Radhe. What nonsense.

1814
01:26:35,080 --> 01:26:37,080
Thousands of goats are
sacrificed on Eid, father.

1815
01:26:37,240 --> 01:26:39,440
What difference will it
make if you offer one at home?

1816
01:26:41,360 --> 01:26:43,280
Think about it.
There is no hurry.

1817
01:26:43,440 --> 01:26:45,720
If you believe Hindu, Muslim,

1818
01:26:45,800 --> 01:26:48,040
Christian, Parsi,
Jainism (Religion) are above love.

1819
01:26:48,120 --> 01:26:49,360
Then don't marry her.

1820
01:26:52,960 --> 01:26:53,920
Let it be.

1821
01:27:04,480 --> 01:27:06,040
What's going on?
- Where are you going, mom?

1822
01:27:06,120 --> 01:27:08,440
- Where are you going, grandma?
- Stay back.

1823
01:27:08,560 --> 01:27:09,560
Mom, stop.

1824
01:27:09,640 --> 01:27:11,440
- Aunty, stop.
- Be quiet.

1825
01:27:11,520 --> 01:27:13,280
I will talk to Mahinder.

1826
01:27:13,600 --> 01:27:15,200
I won't stay in this house anymore.

1827
01:27:15,280 --> 01:27:16,440
Let's go, Deepak.

1828
01:27:16,520 --> 01:27:17,240
Where are you going?

1829
01:27:17,320 --> 01:27:18,920
Look..here he is..

1830
01:27:19,000 --> 01:27:21,040
He's an embarrassment to this family.

1831
01:27:21,120 --> 01:27:22,320
What is grandma saying?

1832
01:27:22,400 --> 01:27:24,800
We are busy preparing for
my marriage and What are you doing?

1833
01:27:24,880 --> 01:27:26,880
Who is Pooja?
What are these dirty talks?

1834
01:27:26,960 --> 01:27:28,000
What dirty talks?

1835
01:27:28,080 --> 01:27:31,440
If that girl comes here, then I won't.

1836
01:27:32,320 --> 01:27:33,760
- Let's go, Deepak.
- Stop Deepak.

1837
01:27:33,960 --> 01:27:35,040
First, decide what to do.

1838
01:27:35,120 --> 01:27:37,520
It's decided. I love Pooja.

1839
01:27:38,280 --> 01:27:41,280
Not every girl that talks dirty
on the phone are characterless, Mahi.

1840
01:27:41,400 --> 01:27:43,960
She understands my feelings,
and I understand hers.

1841
01:27:44,040 --> 01:27:45,600
Maybe she was forced into this.

1842
01:27:45,920 --> 01:27:47,200
Maybe some sort of helplessness.

1843
01:27:47,280 --> 01:27:48,840
And that's why she
does this kind of job.

1844
01:27:48,920 --> 01:27:50,360
Why don't you explain it to her, Mahi?

1845
01:27:52,840 --> 01:27:54,040
Do you love her?

1846
01:27:54,840 --> 01:27:55,920
Are you sure?

1847
01:28:03,160 --> 01:28:04,200
Grandma..

1848
01:28:04,720 --> 01:28:08,240
Since brother loves her so much,
then let's meet her up once.

1849
01:28:08,320 --> 01:28:10,320
Fine, If you don't want to meet her
why don't you just talk to her?

1850
01:28:10,400 --> 01:28:11,920
There is no need to leave the house.

1851
01:28:12,000 --> 01:28:13,720
Have faith in me, grandma.

1852
01:28:13,800 --> 01:28:15,960
Can I ever do anything wrong?

1853
01:28:17,480 --> 01:28:18,440
Fine.

1854
01:28:19,000 --> 01:28:20,520
If you think I am wrong?

1855
01:28:20,600 --> 01:28:22,440
Then you stay, and I will leave.

1856
01:28:22,560 --> 01:28:24,040
Stop Mahinder!

1857
01:28:25,960 --> 01:28:27,600
That's my luggage.

1858
01:28:27,960 --> 01:28:30,040
Fine. You can keep your luggage.

1859
01:28:30,120 --> 01:28:32,400
This is true love, grandma.
You won't understand.

1860
01:28:32,960 --> 01:28:33,720
Radhe-Radhe.

1861
01:28:33,840 --> 01:28:35,480
Brother, come back.

1862
01:28:37,240 --> 01:28:38,400
What?

1863
01:28:39,080 --> 01:28:40,560
Just say yes, grandma.

1864
01:28:42,120 --> 01:28:43,560
Say yes..

1865
01:28:44,200 --> 01:28:45,960
Do you love her?

1866
01:28:47,160 --> 01:28:48,680
I swear I do.

1867
01:28:50,120 --> 01:28:52,120
By the way,
brother, all that time among cows..

1868
01:28:52,200 --> 01:28:53,920
..and buffaloes has made you wise.

1869
01:28:54,000 --> 01:28:55,800
Call sister-in-law.

1870
01:28:56,120 --> 01:28:57,080
No. I am feeling embarrassed.

1871
01:28:57,160 --> 01:28:58,320
Come on.

1872
01:28:58,400 --> 01:28:59,320
Let it be.

1873
01:28:59,400 --> 01:29:00,880
I already dialled her number.

1874
01:29:03,120 --> 01:29:04,040
Look now..

1875
01:29:04,720 --> 01:29:06,120
Rafi's rough copy..

1876
01:29:06,640 --> 01:29:08,280
He'll start singing
even if you don't want him to.

1877
01:29:10,120 --> 01:29:10,720
Hello.

1878
01:29:10,800 --> 01:29:12,960
Hi Pooja. Grandma wants to talk to you.

1879
01:29:13,040 --> 01:29:13,920
Grandma?

1880
01:29:14,840 --> 01:29:15,920
Daughter-in-law.

1881
01:29:16,080 --> 01:29:17,680
Having a peg, grandma.

1882
01:29:17,880 --> 01:29:19,800
I mean hello, grandma.

1883
01:29:19,880 --> 01:29:21,680
God bless you, dear.

1884
01:29:22,080 --> 01:29:22,960
What are you doing?

1885
01:29:23,040 --> 01:29:25,040
Watering the plants.

1886
01:29:25,120 --> 01:29:26,440
- At this hour?
- Yes.

1887
01:29:26,520 --> 01:29:28,600
- Let me also talk to her.
- Yes, dear.

1888
01:29:28,680 --> 01:29:30,120
Hello..sister-in-law.

1889
01:29:30,200 --> 01:29:31,400
This is Mahi.

1890
01:29:32,120 --> 01:29:33,000
Hi.

1891
01:29:33,360 --> 01:29:34,880
Your sister-in-law.

1892
01:29:35,880 --> 01:29:38,400
- Hi!
- Brother told grandma everything.

1893
01:29:38,560 --> 01:29:40,800
And grandma has agreed
for this marriage.

1894
01:29:41,240 --> 01:29:46,640
Since you're watering
your plants, dear, water mine too.

1895
01:29:47,120 --> 01:29:50,920
Does everyone in
your house have separate plants?

1896
01:29:51,160 --> 01:29:51,920
Yes.

1897
01:29:52,000 --> 01:29:53,400
I'll talk to you later.

1898
01:29:53,480 --> 01:29:54,600
Papa is calling.

1899
01:29:54,680 --> 01:29:55,960
Okay, bye.

1900
01:29:56,360 --> 01:29:59,160
Go and get more water
for papa's plants.

1901
01:29:59,640 --> 01:30:01,320
Mahinder told everything to her.

1902
01:30:01,400 --> 01:30:04,560
By the way, who told you such
negative things about her?

1903
01:30:04,640 --> 01:30:05,280
Right?

1904
01:30:05,360 --> 01:30:09,880
I just can't remember
who was the one.

1905
01:30:14,920 --> 01:30:16,080
What happened?
Water..

1906
01:30:16,160 --> 01:30:17,120
Water..

1907
01:30:22,000 --> 01:30:24,640
Fathers are so unique.

1908
01:30:27,080 --> 01:30:28,920
Your father is one in a million.

1909
01:30:30,480 --> 01:30:32,080
Sometimes I wonder..

1910
01:30:34,200 --> 01:30:37,640
..how he spent a lifetime alone

1911
01:30:38,600 --> 01:30:40,240
And look at us..

1912
01:30:40,720 --> 01:30:42,440
Whenever we are tensed..

1913
01:30:43,440 --> 01:30:44,960
..we start drinking.

1914
01:30:46,000 --> 01:30:47,800
And look at this man.

1915
01:30:48,240 --> 01:30:50,160
No cigarette, or alcohol.

1916
01:30:50,880 --> 01:30:52,920
In fact, even if he's ever
had a problem in life..

1917
01:30:54,360 --> 01:30:56,200
..he hasn't even told me about it.

1918
01:31:02,120 --> 01:31:04,360
Not to mention that
I have caused him so much pain.

1919
01:31:06,000 --> 01:31:07,080
You're right.

1920
01:31:07,160 --> 01:31:09,880
He's always scolded me.

1921
01:31:10,640 --> 01:31:14,080
But I never felt bad.

1922
01:31:14,640 --> 01:31:15,960
I swear..

1923
01:31:23,200 --> 01:31:24,720
We will apologise.

1924
01:31:33,360 --> 01:31:34,480
Wake up.

1925
01:31:36,840 --> 01:31:37,960
Move.

1926
01:31:54,600 --> 01:31:56,080
Try harder.

1927
01:32:06,360 --> 01:32:07,040
Listen, Uncle..

1928
01:32:07,120 --> 01:32:08,680
Hello..

1929
01:32:08,760 --> 01:32:10,360
Waah..

1930
01:32:11,400 --> 01:32:12,640
Papa, it's you.

1931
01:32:13,480 --> 01:32:16,440
From Jagjeet Singh to Mehendi Hassan.

1932
01:32:16,560 --> 01:32:19,160
Love is responsible for this makeover.

1933
01:32:19,240 --> 01:32:21,760
You gave a complete makeover
to yourself and our ancestral shop.

1934
01:32:21,840 --> 01:32:24,200
Feels like happiness
has entered my life.

1935
01:32:24,480 --> 01:32:27,920
And no more selling
funeral items and caskets..

1936
01:32:28,280 --> 01:32:31,440
..instead your Abba will
promote beautiful lovely items.

1937
01:32:31,520 --> 01:32:33,320
Who Abba?

1938
01:32:33,480 --> 01:32:35,000
Me of course.

1939
01:32:35,080 --> 01:32:36,600
Your Abba.

1940
01:32:36,680 --> 01:32:40,720
That night I had an epiphany..

1941
01:32:41,160 --> 01:32:42,600
..and I changed for good.

1942
01:32:44,000 --> 01:32:48,600
And Ismail has the biggest
contribution in this changeover.

1943
01:32:48,840 --> 01:32:49,840
Ismail?

1944
01:32:49,920 --> 01:32:51,520
No, uncle, Smiley.

1945
01:32:51,600 --> 01:32:54,120
Take the 'e' out..so Ismail.

1946
01:32:55,920 --> 01:32:57,840
But why paint the house again.

1947
01:32:57,920 --> 01:32:58,920
We just got it painted on Diwali.

1948
01:32:59,000 --> 01:33:00,920
But Eid's coming up, son.

1949
01:33:01,000 --> 01:33:02,000
Our Eid?

1950
01:33:02,080 --> 01:33:02,880
Yes..

1951
01:33:03,520 --> 01:33:06,800
As you said, millions
of goats are sacrificed on Eid.

1952
01:33:06,880 --> 01:33:10,120
One more won't make a difference.

1953
01:33:10,480 --> 01:33:12,040
Look there.
See that..

1954
01:33:12,120 --> 01:33:16,400
I've even installed a stanchion
for the goat.

1955
01:33:18,840 --> 01:33:21,320
And son, don't forget
to bring Sakeena over for Eid.

1956
01:33:21,400 --> 01:33:22,520
Of course.

1957
01:33:22,920 --> 01:33:24,040
Who is that?

1958
01:33:24,560 --> 01:33:25,840
You're fiancÃ©.

1959
01:33:27,800 --> 01:33:29,400
FiancÃ©.. Sakeena?

1960
01:33:29,480 --> 01:33:31,640
- But she can't come over, uncle.
- Why?

1961
01:33:31,720 --> 01:33:33,920
She has gone for Hajj to Patiala.

1962
01:33:34,000 --> 01:33:35,200
To Patiala for Hajj?

1963
01:33:36,080 --> 01:33:38,320
I mean her aunt and
uncle live in Patiala.

1964
01:33:38,400 --> 01:33:40,480
- She will meet them first
and then leave for Hajj. - I see..

1965
01:33:40,560 --> 01:33:41,760
Wonderful. Wonderful.

1966
01:33:41,840 --> 01:33:43,720
Uncle, why are you speaking in Urdu?

1967
01:33:44,360 --> 01:33:45,520
Ignorant.

1968
01:33:45,600 --> 01:33:49,200
Fix your pronunciation.
It's Urdu.

1969
01:33:49,280 --> 01:33:55,280
And Urdu is one of the
finest and smooth language.

1970
01:33:55,360 --> 01:33:56,280
And listen.

1971
01:33:56,360 --> 01:33:58,440
And on that note here
a few lines from a poet..

1972
01:33:58,520 --> 01:34:01,880
"I can spend from dawn to dusk
under the refuge of your tresses."

1973
01:34:01,960 --> 01:34:04,600
"I'll do my duties in this lifetime."

1974
01:34:04,760 --> 01:34:07,360
"If you lock eyes with me,
I'll ask for the consequences."

1975
01:34:07,560 --> 01:34:09,720
"And if you skirt eyes,
I'll just greet you."

1976
01:34:10,520 --> 01:34:12,200
Nice. Nice.
But I didn't get it, uncle.

1977
01:34:12,280 --> 01:34:13,280
I didn't either.

1978
01:34:13,360 --> 01:34:15,320
What are these bricks for?

1979
01:34:15,400 --> 01:34:18,960
Well, son, I am not a Shahjahan
to build another Taj Mahal.

1980
01:34:19,040 --> 01:34:22,480
And your future mother
has a dozen siblings.

1981
01:34:22,560 --> 01:34:27,840
So I am making four tombs
up there for her siblings.

1982
01:34:27,920 --> 01:34:29,720
- You mean rooms.
- Exactly.

1983
01:34:29,800 --> 01:34:32,160
Come Ismail, let me show you.

1984
01:34:35,320 --> 01:34:36,960
Take a look. See..

1985
01:34:37,120 --> 01:34:39,440
This is where the rooms
are being constructed.

1986
01:34:39,520 --> 01:34:42,000
- They are making the rooms right now.
- Great.

1987
01:34:42,080 --> 01:34:44,400
My new family will
also stay here with me.

1988
01:34:44,480 --> 01:34:46,000
And my wife.

1989
01:34:46,600 --> 01:34:47,880
What happened, uncle?
Are you all right?

1990
01:34:47,960 --> 01:34:51,680
My heart skips a beat
whenever I think of her.

1991
01:34:52,120 --> 01:34:54,720
She has a mesmerising
and enchanting voice.

1992
01:34:54,800 --> 01:34:56,440
- Really?
- Yes, son.

1993
01:35:02,600 --> 01:35:03,720
Greetings.

1994
01:35:03,800 --> 01:35:04,800
Yes.

1995
01:35:05,120 --> 01:35:06,040
Mind your own business.

1996
01:35:06,120 --> 01:35:07,640
I just wanted to say..

1997
01:35:07,720 --> 01:35:12,400
..that I am ready
to get married to you.

1998
01:35:13,440 --> 01:35:18,840
You know what, send your
father over to fix a wedding date.

1999
01:35:18,920 --> 01:35:20,320
My father's out of his limits?

2000
01:35:20,400 --> 01:35:21,720
Crossing his limits or
crossing borders for Hajj?

2001
01:35:21,800 --> 01:35:23,680
My father is crossing his limits.

2002
01:35:24,600 --> 01:35:27,000
Fine, send him over when he returns.

2003
01:35:27,760 --> 01:35:33,760
My son's good friend
Ismail is right here with me.

2004
01:35:34,200 --> 01:35:35,360
He is like a kid.

2005
01:35:35,600 --> 01:35:36,800
I'll give my greetings to her.

2006
01:35:37,200 --> 01:35:39,560
Hello, mammi aunty.

2007
01:35:39,640 --> 01:35:40,960
Hang up.

2008
01:35:41,040 --> 01:35:42,080
This Jagjeet has lost his mind.

2009
01:35:42,240 --> 01:35:44,520
The changes that your
father is going through.

2010
01:35:44,720 --> 01:35:47,080
You will repent one day.

2011
01:35:49,240 --> 01:35:50,320
Be careful.

2012
01:35:50,520 --> 01:35:54,760
Time is so bad, even a dog's
bark sounds like advice to me.

2013
01:35:56,120 --> 01:35:58,840
You know,
people like to take a flying arrow..

2014
01:35:58,920 --> 01:36:00,920
..but you've taken a spear.

2015
01:36:01,600 --> 01:36:04,640
Your beloved father is
in full mood to get married.

2016
01:36:04,760 --> 01:36:05,960
She was the one missing.

2017
01:36:06,040 --> 01:36:07,040
Roma.

2018
01:36:10,520 --> 01:36:12,440
Hello. How are you doing?

2019
01:36:13,000 --> 01:36:15,520
What's the matter?
You seem to be in a great mood today?

2020
01:36:15,720 --> 01:36:17,800
yes, there is good news sister.

2021
01:36:18,040 --> 01:36:19,040
Good news?

2022
01:36:19,120 --> 01:36:22,240
Yes. I am getting
married to my boyfriend.

2023
01:36:22,320 --> 01:36:23,520
What?

2024
01:36:24,600 --> 01:36:27,760
This might be good news for you,
but not for me.

2025
01:36:28,080 --> 01:36:28,840
Listen..

2026
01:36:28,920 --> 01:36:30,720
- Sign.
- Move.

2027
01:36:33,120 --> 01:36:35,360
You know that all men are dogs.

2028
01:36:35,440 --> 01:36:37,760
No, no, my boyfriend is not a dog.

2029
01:36:37,880 --> 01:36:40,880
He is so naive that he
still smooches me on my head.

2030
01:36:41,000 --> 01:36:43,360
All men pretend to
be naive in the beginning.

2031
01:36:43,480 --> 01:36:46,480
I don't want anyone to ruin your life.

2032
01:36:46,640 --> 01:36:50,080
Pooja, I don't care if we meet up or
not, but I want to meet up with Anurag.

2033
01:36:50,160 --> 01:36:52,560
But why meet up.
You can talk to him on the phone.

2034
01:36:52,640 --> 01:36:53,600
Anu baby..

2035
01:36:53,680 --> 01:36:54,960
Yes, Pooja.

2036
01:36:55,320 --> 01:36:57,480
No. Not on the phone.

2037
01:36:58,600 --> 01:37:01,120
Everyone sounds sweet
to me over the phone.

2038
01:37:01,600 --> 01:37:04,200
Tell him I want to meet him tomorrow.
I'll text you the time and place.

2039
01:37:04,400 --> 01:37:07,320
And listen.
Try to come over if you can.

2040
01:37:08,840 --> 01:37:10,320
Hear me out first..

2041
01:37:11,360 --> 01:37:13,280
She has called Pooja's
boyfriend for a meeting.

2042
01:37:13,880 --> 01:37:15,160
Happy birthday.

2043
01:37:15,440 --> 01:37:17,400
Firstly a woman, secondly
experienced..

2044
01:37:17,480 --> 01:37:19,880
And thirdly a news reporter
and fourthly she is very clever.

2045
01:37:20,080 --> 01:37:22,640
From where you'll get
Pooja's boyfriend. Online

2046
01:37:23,640 --> 01:37:25,320
You are dead man.

2047
01:37:25,720 --> 01:37:27,520
Let's go fast.

2048
01:37:28,040 --> 01:37:29,800
Let's go. Have fun.

2049
01:37:29,880 --> 01:37:33,360
Hey stop! Over there,
that is Pooja's brother.

2050
01:37:33,440 --> 01:37:35,280
Hey move!

2051
01:37:44,640 --> 01:37:47,320
So, where did you meet
Pooja for the first time?

2052
01:37:47,440 --> 01:37:48,920
We used to speak on the phone.

2053
01:37:49,040 --> 01:37:50,760
And liked the voice very much...

2054
01:37:51,760 --> 01:37:53,160
Her voice is mesmerising.

2055
01:37:53,240 --> 01:37:55,400
No..she liked my voice very much.

2056
01:37:56,720 --> 01:37:59,720
And who proposed whom?

2057
01:37:59,800 --> 01:38:02,080
As you can guess from the face,
she did.

2058
01:38:03,240 --> 01:38:04,680
But please don't tell her this.

2059
01:38:14,440 --> 01:38:16,320
Ohh..sorry.

2060
01:38:16,400 --> 01:38:18,840
You came to show
off how decent you are.

2061
01:38:19,360 --> 01:38:21,920
Oh no, I don't drink, I never smoked.

2062
01:38:23,320 --> 01:38:24,800
Shall I order juice instead?

2063
01:38:25,000 --> 01:38:26,320
Hmm?..

2064
01:38:26,400 --> 01:38:28,360
Bloody uncool sh**

2065
01:38:49,040 --> 01:38:52,400
Will you judge my decency
by whether I drink or not.

2066
01:38:53,200 --> 01:38:55,760
In that case,
you're completely spoiled.

2067
01:38:57,800 --> 01:38:59,400
Smoking and drinking
can be bad habits..

2068
01:38:59,480 --> 01:39:01,880
..but not signs of
a bad character, ma'am.

2069
01:39:03,200 --> 01:39:04,320
How dare you?

2070
01:39:04,400 --> 01:39:06,320
Is this a way you talk to a woman?

2071
01:39:06,560 --> 01:39:08,040
I am calling Pooja right now.

2072
01:39:08,120 --> 01:39:09,040
Wait!

2073
01:39:10,560 --> 01:39:11,480
Call her.

2074
01:39:11,720 --> 01:39:13,360
Yes, I am calling her..

2075
01:39:14,720 --> 01:39:16,040
I will show you.

2076
01:39:17,360 --> 01:39:18,880
How was Anurag?

2077
01:39:18,960 --> 01:39:20,800
Don't mind if he gets a little angry.

2078
01:39:20,880 --> 01:39:22,640
He looks cute even
when he loses his temper.

2079
01:39:22,720 --> 01:39:27,040
I knew it.
You will like her too.

2080
01:39:27,200 --> 01:39:29,160
- I am so lucky.
- Pooja...

2081
01:39:31,640 --> 01:39:32,640
Happy?

2082
01:39:33,760 --> 01:39:35,240
Everyone in this world is wrong.

2083
01:39:35,920 --> 01:39:37,600
The right one is with good intentions.

2084
01:39:39,000 --> 01:39:42,320
And yes..your whiskey
was way more classy than you are.

2085
01:39:42,720 --> 01:39:44,320
And don't forget.

2086
01:39:44,680 --> 01:39:46,360
I love Pooja.

2087
01:39:46,440 --> 01:39:49,200
And I will marry her.
Will give her my everything. Okay.

2088
01:39:51,360 --> 01:39:52,840
Radhe-Radhe!

2089
01:39:53,720 --> 01:39:54,960
Who is she?

2090
01:39:57,040 --> 01:39:59,040
- This place isn't for you.
- But why?

2091
01:39:59,320 --> 01:40:01,040
- What are you doing here?
- Shopping.

2092
01:40:01,120 --> 01:40:02,120
Of all the places..

2093
01:40:02,200 --> 01:40:03,080
Karam.

2094
01:40:04,400 --> 01:40:06,360
Mahi. What are you doing here?

2095
01:40:06,440 --> 01:40:07,680
Shopping.

2096
01:40:07,920 --> 01:40:08,840
What are you doing here?

2097
01:40:08,920 --> 01:40:10,760
I came here for a meeting.
Let's go.

2098
01:40:10,840 --> 01:40:12,240
Oh my, God.

2099
01:40:12,640 --> 01:40:14,880
So you are Pooja.

2100
01:40:15,280 --> 01:40:16,960
Hi. Roma.

2101
01:40:17,480 --> 01:40:20,040
I am not Pooja. I am Mahi.

2102
01:40:20,840 --> 01:40:22,000
His future wife.

2103
01:40:22,080 --> 01:40:23,120
What?

2104
01:40:23,520 --> 01:40:25,000
Bloody two-timer.

2105
01:40:25,360 --> 01:40:27,600
You're either cheating on Pooja or her?

2106
01:40:28,240 --> 01:40:29,160
- She is drunk.
- What?

2107
01:40:29,240 --> 01:40:30,680
- Let's go.
- Hold on.

2108
01:40:30,960 --> 01:40:32,480
She can't talk nonsense
even if she is drunk.

2109
01:40:32,560 --> 01:40:33,800
What do you mean?

2110
01:40:34,080 --> 01:40:36,440
This man is a fraud and a cheat.

2111
01:40:36,640 --> 01:40:38,880
He came to meet me
as Pooja's boyfriend.

2112
01:40:38,960 --> 01:40:41,120
Which Pooja are you talking about?

2113
01:40:41,440 --> 01:40:44,480
She's my phone-a-friend.

2114
01:40:44,560 --> 01:40:46,640
That Pooja.
But I love her.

2115
01:40:46,720 --> 01:40:47,680
Mahi.

2116
01:40:47,920 --> 01:40:48,680
What?

2117
01:40:49,320 --> 01:40:51,600
But Pooja said she loves Anurag.

2118
01:40:51,680 --> 01:40:53,760
I see..
Now, who is this Anurag?

2119
01:40:53,960 --> 01:40:55,120
This Anurag.

2120
01:40:55,200 --> 01:40:56,880
She is definitely high.

2121
01:40:57,000 --> 01:41:00,480
You are mistaken.
He is not Anurag. He is Karam.

2122
01:41:00,560 --> 01:41:01,360
Yes.

2123
01:41:01,440 --> 01:41:03,760
He is no Karam. This guy's Anurag.

2124
01:41:03,840 --> 01:41:05,600
She is lying. She is lying.

2125
01:41:05,680 --> 01:41:06,840
Let's go, Mahi.

2126
01:41:07,960 --> 01:41:10,360
If she's lying, Karam,
then why don't you tell us the truth.

2127
01:41:10,800 --> 01:41:12,920
It's a long story, Mahi.
I'll tell you sometime later.

2128
01:41:13,000 --> 01:41:13,960
Tell me now, Karam.

2129
01:41:14,040 --> 01:41:16,400
- I'll tell you some other day..
- You must clear everything right now!

2130
01:41:20,800 --> 01:41:22,120
You are lying.

2131
01:41:23,120 --> 01:41:23,920
Roma.

2132
01:41:24,000 --> 01:41:24,880
Pooja.
What's the name.

2133
01:41:24,960 --> 01:41:26,680
- Mahi. Listen to me.
- Brother-in-law.

2134
01:41:27,200 --> 01:41:28,720
This is completely unfair.

2135
01:41:28,800 --> 01:41:30,480
- You screwed both of us.
- Get lost.

2136
01:41:31,480 --> 01:41:32,320
You get lost.

2137
01:41:32,400 --> 01:41:33,240
Move, please.

2138
01:41:33,320 --> 01:41:34,920
Mahi. Mahi, listen to me.

2139
01:41:35,080 --> 01:41:37,960
Wait. Where are you going?

2140
01:41:38,040 --> 01:41:40,040
Give me a chance to explain.
Please..

2141
01:41:40,120 --> 01:41:42,920
- Hello, bro..
- Get lost.

2142
01:41:43,000 --> 01:41:44,360
I am in a bad mood.

2143
01:41:44,440 --> 01:41:45,760
Ohh, don't spoil my mood.

2144
01:41:45,840 --> 01:41:47,760
I meant I am already in a bad mood,
you don't have to spoil yours.

2145
01:41:47,840 --> 01:41:50,000
Please tell me honestly.
How do you know Pooja?

2146
01:41:50,240 --> 01:41:51,520
I love Pooja.

2147
01:41:51,600 --> 01:41:52,960
How can you love her?

2148
01:41:53,160 --> 01:41:55,120
I love Pooja..sister.

2149
01:41:55,200 --> 01:41:57,080
What sister?

2150
01:41:57,160 --> 01:42:00,080
The other day you were trying to be so
sturdy. But now you're being so mellow.

2151
01:42:00,160 --> 01:42:01,880
You know what he was saying.
He'll hack me to pieces.

2152
01:42:01,960 --> 01:42:03,320
- Beat him.
- Beat me.

2153
01:42:03,400 --> 01:42:06,160
Come on, beat me. There my
sister Pooja's husband is beating her.

2154
01:42:06,240 --> 01:42:07,440
You beat me.

2155
01:42:07,600 --> 01:42:08,680
- Pooja's husband?
- Yes.

2156
01:42:08,760 --> 01:42:09,840
He's a pain in the neck.

2157
01:42:09,920 --> 01:42:11,960
Pooja never told
me that she is married.

2158
01:42:12,040 --> 01:42:15,040
How could she?
His demands never end.

2159
01:42:15,120 --> 01:42:16,400
Save her, brother-in-law.

2160
01:42:17,040 --> 01:42:18,160
- Brother-in-law?
- Yes.

2161
01:42:19,240 --> 01:42:22,240
Now we are family. Don't worry.

2162
01:42:22,320 --> 01:42:24,680
I'll show you how
Gujjar's batter.

2163
01:42:24,760 --> 01:42:26,640
This is your brother-in-law's promise.

2164
01:42:26,720 --> 01:42:28,240
- Come on.
- Yes, come on.

2165
01:42:28,320 --> 01:42:30,360
How dare he touch my Pooja.

2166
01:42:30,440 --> 01:42:31,400
Don't come any closer.

2167
01:42:31,480 --> 01:42:33,200
Don't..or else I will kill you.

2168
01:42:33,280 --> 01:42:34,440
Kill her.

2169
01:42:34,600 --> 01:42:37,520
Wiseguy..how dare you touch my Pooja.

2170
01:42:37,600 --> 01:42:38,320
Your Pooja.

2171
01:42:38,400 --> 01:42:39,360
What is he saying, sister?

2172
01:42:39,440 --> 01:42:40,120
Beat him.

2173
01:42:40,200 --> 01:42:41,480
What beat him?
Let's talk.

2174
01:42:41,560 --> 01:42:43,920
- Wait. How was the recording?
- Don't ask.

2175
01:42:44,240 --> 01:42:45,240
Rickshaw.

2176
01:42:45,360 --> 01:42:46,760
- But what happened?
- No one's stopping.

2177
01:42:46,840 --> 01:42:48,640
I'll tell you later.
Rickshaw.

2178
01:42:48,880 --> 01:42:50,000
Rickshaw.

2179
01:42:50,560 --> 01:42:52,320
- Where are you going?
- Wait a minute.

2180
01:42:53,200 --> 01:42:55,440
- Where is sister-in-law?
- She is at home.

2181
01:42:57,200 --> 01:42:59,720
Order's cancelled.

2182
01:42:59,880 --> 01:43:00,960
Rickshaw.

2183
01:43:01,280 --> 01:43:03,160
Wait. I have my own bike.

2184
01:43:07,920 --> 01:43:08,920
There she is.

2185
01:43:11,640 --> 01:43:12,680
Mahi.

2186
01:43:12,760 --> 01:43:14,920
Stay with her.
This is not a race.

2187
01:43:15,000 --> 01:43:16,320
Wait a minute.

2188
01:43:17,840 --> 01:43:20,640
At least tell me why you're hitting me.

2189
01:43:20,920 --> 01:43:22,240
At least tell me why you're hitting me.

2190
01:43:22,320 --> 01:43:23,720
What do you want?
- Save me, sister.

2191
01:43:23,800 --> 01:43:26,600
No need to worry. I am here now.

2192
01:43:26,680 --> 01:43:29,120
Mahi. Mahi, wait.

2193
01:43:29,400 --> 01:43:30,800
Listen to me, Mahi.

2194
01:43:30,880 --> 01:43:32,040
Lower that volume.

2195
01:43:32,120 --> 01:43:35,080
It's Daler Mehndi,
he sings this loud even in low volumes.

2196
01:43:35,160 --> 01:43:36,240
Then turn it off.

2197
01:43:36,320 --> 01:43:38,400
Mahi, listen.
Listen to me, Mahi.

2198
01:43:38,560 --> 01:43:39,880
Just listen to me.

2199
01:43:39,960 --> 01:43:41,400
Listen to what, Karam.

2200
01:43:42,080 --> 01:43:43,000
And who are you?

2201
01:43:43,080 --> 01:43:44,320
It's me..Toto.

2202
01:43:44,400 --> 01:43:45,760
We used to romance over the phone.

2203
01:43:45,840 --> 01:43:48,640
I even made a tattoo of your name.
Pujja.

2204
01:43:49,360 --> 01:43:51,640
My name is Roma.

2205
01:43:52,000 --> 01:43:53,480
And the spelling is wrong.

2206
01:43:53,560 --> 01:43:55,280
But my love is real.

2207
01:43:55,360 --> 01:43:57,520
If you love someone else
then why are you marrying me?

2208
01:43:57,600 --> 01:44:00,080
Mahi, I only love
you and not some Pooja.

2209
01:44:00,160 --> 01:44:02,480
But you couldn't say
this in front of that girl.

2210
01:44:02,560 --> 01:44:04,560
I had imagined so many
things about you, Karam.

2211
01:44:04,760 --> 01:44:06,160
And you are still lying to me.

2212
01:44:06,320 --> 01:44:08,240
What is the confusion?

2213
01:44:08,480 --> 01:44:10,880
You say that you love Pooja.
So does he.

2214
01:44:10,960 --> 01:44:12,280
Even I love her.

2215
01:44:12,360 --> 01:44:13,640
Who is Pooja?

2216
01:44:13,760 --> 01:44:15,120
And why is everyone taking her name?

2217
01:44:15,200 --> 01:44:17,280
Oh, God. And you think
I have an affair with her.

2218
01:44:17,360 --> 01:44:18,960
Yes. I do.

2219
01:44:19,720 --> 01:44:20,640
Mahi.

2220
01:44:20,720 --> 01:44:22,040
Mahi, wait.

2221
01:44:23,480 --> 01:44:25,240
I don't understand one thing.

2222
01:44:25,440 --> 01:44:28,240
You sound so sweet over the phone.

2223
01:44:28,600 --> 01:44:30,280
But in reality, you sound a bit hoarse.

2224
01:44:30,640 --> 01:44:32,040
You think I sound hoarse.

2225
01:44:32,160 --> 01:44:33,640
I said I am not Pooja.

2226
01:44:33,760 --> 01:44:35,800
Save me. Save me.

2227
01:44:38,400 --> 01:44:39,480
Catch him.

2228
01:44:39,600 --> 01:44:41,480
This way..

2229
01:44:42,000 --> 01:44:42,880
Come on.

2230
01:44:44,000 --> 01:44:44,760
Catch him.

2231
01:44:44,880 --> 01:44:46,320
What is this Pooja's matter?

2232
01:44:46,440 --> 01:44:48,200
Step on it, man.

2233
01:44:49,320 --> 01:44:52,560
Pooja. That Anurag is a fraud.

2234
01:44:52,680 --> 01:44:54,600
Curse you.
Trying to ruin people's lives.

2235
01:44:54,720 --> 01:44:56,240
Bloody drunk woman. Hang up.

2236
01:44:57,400 --> 01:44:58,360
Who was that?

2237
01:44:58,480 --> 01:45:01,080
- Mahi. Just listen to me.
- No, Karam.

2238
01:45:01,360 --> 01:45:02,800
Fine, Then here is the truth.

2239
01:45:02,920 --> 01:45:04,400
I love Pooja.

2240
01:45:04,520 --> 01:45:06,880
I love her and we're one.
One heart and soul.

2241
01:45:08,680 --> 01:45:12,200
- Stop the rickshaw.
- You too.

2242
01:45:15,400 --> 01:45:17,440
- What did you say?
- I love you.

2243
01:45:19,760 --> 01:45:21,440
Pooja and I are one heart and soul.

2244
01:45:22,000 --> 01:45:23,000
Pooja is that lovely.

2245
01:45:23,280 --> 01:45:24,240
Not just me.

2246
01:45:24,840 --> 01:45:28,120
Your brother Mahinder as well as
your father-in-law love her a lot.

2247
01:45:28,240 --> 01:45:29,280
What?

2248
01:45:29,960 --> 01:45:32,560
I do. I do. I do.

2249
01:45:32,760 --> 01:45:35,240
The marriage gets solomonized
if you repeat it three times.

2250
01:45:35,640 --> 01:45:36,920
I'll say it again louder.

2251
01:45:37,040 --> 01:45:39,120
Do you want the entire city to hear?

2252
01:45:39,240 --> 01:45:40,880
If you use up all your
strength at the wedding..

2253
01:45:41,000 --> 01:45:43,640
..then what will you
do on your wedding night?

2254
01:45:45,440 --> 01:45:48,520
Payal, Pankhudi, Jyoti, Yasmeen..

2255
01:45:48,640 --> 01:45:49,800
Where is Pooja, Karam?

2256
01:45:51,240 --> 01:45:51,960
Pooja.

2257
01:45:54,160 --> 01:45:55,200
Pooja's here too.

2258
01:45:56,920 --> 01:45:58,240
Where, Karam?

2259
01:46:01,240 --> 01:46:02,040
Karam?

2260
01:46:02,720 --> 01:46:03,680
Karam?

2261
01:46:05,000 --> 01:46:07,160
Hello. Pooja speaking.

2262
01:46:08,640 --> 01:46:09,560
How are you?

2263
01:46:10,720 --> 01:46:11,600
I am fine.

2264
01:46:13,360 --> 01:46:16,760
I'll call you later. Please.

2265
01:46:17,520 --> 01:46:18,880
Okay, bye. Love you, take care.

2266
01:46:28,200 --> 01:46:29,400
Karam is Pooja.

2267
01:46:30,320 --> 01:46:32,400
Pooja who cannot exist without Karam.

2268
01:46:35,240 --> 01:46:36,760
And Karam not without you.

2269
01:46:39,720 --> 01:46:41,640
Why didn't you tell me before?

2270
01:46:42,080 --> 01:46:43,600
No job, and debts to pay.

2271
01:46:48,360 --> 01:46:50,360
Even I am in love with this Pooja.

2272
01:46:56,400 --> 01:46:57,920
Hi, Pooja baby..

2273
01:46:58,440 --> 01:47:02,800
'The work that isn't getting
done...something something...'

2274
01:47:05,160 --> 01:47:07,040
This is Mahi. My fiancÃ©.

2275
01:47:07,160 --> 01:47:08,120
Ohh..

2276
01:47:09,600 --> 01:47:10,920
She came to see Pooja.

2277
01:47:14,840 --> 01:47:16,400
You told her everything.

2278
01:47:16,600 --> 01:47:17,760
Isn't that what you wanted?

2279
01:47:18,480 --> 01:47:19,560
This is Mr. W.

2280
01:47:19,800 --> 01:47:21,240
He runs this call centre.

2281
01:47:22,600 --> 01:47:25,200
He came into my life as a guide
but soon turned selfish.

2282
01:47:26,640 --> 01:47:32,160
He threatened to expose me if I quit.

2283
01:47:32,400 --> 01:47:33,480
No.

2284
01:47:35,000 --> 01:47:36,640
You are a scum.

2285
01:47:37,400 --> 01:47:43,280
You should be grateful to everyone
here, who is a breadwinner for you.

2286
01:47:43,720 --> 01:47:45,440
What are you without them?

2287
01:47:46,920 --> 01:47:49,680
You sound better than him.

2288
01:47:49,960 --> 01:47:53,720
If you're under some kind of debt,
I'll clear it for you.

2289
01:47:55,520 --> 01:47:56,600
You..

2290
01:47:59,000 --> 01:48:00,640
Don't forget.

2291
01:48:02,160 --> 01:48:03,480
Pooja is a man.

2292
01:48:25,880 --> 01:48:28,000
Pooja!

2293
01:48:35,320 --> 01:48:36,760
Karam. Karam.

2294
01:48:36,880 --> 01:48:38,160
Where are you hiding?

2295
01:48:38,920 --> 01:48:40,640
Green house.
I think I am in the wrong house.

2296
01:48:40,760 --> 01:48:44,240
Mahinder. Greetings.

2297
01:48:44,360 --> 01:48:45,760
How is everyone?

2298
01:48:47,240 --> 01:48:48,400
Didn't you recognise me?

2299
01:48:48,640 --> 01:48:51,920
It's Jagjeet. Uncle Jagjeet.

2300
01:48:52,040 --> 01:48:53,080
Radhe-Radhe Uncle.

2301
01:48:53,200 --> 01:48:54,120
Hello.

2302
01:48:54,280 --> 01:48:55,080
What happened to you?

2303
01:48:55,200 --> 01:48:58,320
Forget about me, what happened to you?

2304
01:48:58,440 --> 01:49:00,280
Nothing, uncle. I had a fight.

2305
01:49:00,720 --> 01:49:02,440
Sorry to tell you son,
but you got beaten up.

2306
01:49:02,560 --> 01:49:03,560
Yes, that.

2307
01:49:03,680 --> 01:49:05,640
- What happened?
- I am being wronged.

2308
01:49:05,760 --> 01:49:06,480
What happened?

2309
01:49:06,600 --> 01:49:08,680
You are so decent and your
son Karam's completely opposite.

2310
01:49:08,800 --> 01:49:09,760
What did he do now?

2311
01:49:09,880 --> 01:49:12,400
The girl I love and want to marry..

2312
01:49:12,520 --> 01:49:13,960
- ..he is chasing after her.
- What?

2313
01:49:15,160 --> 01:49:18,920
There's someone else
in his life other than Mahi.

2314
01:49:19,040 --> 01:49:19,760
Yes, uncle.

2315
01:49:19,880 --> 01:49:20,520
Who?

2316
01:49:20,640 --> 01:49:22,160
Her name is Pooja.

2317
01:49:23,120 --> 01:49:24,040
Pooja who?

2318
01:49:24,160 --> 01:49:28,760
A girl with whom I fell in love
while talking on the phone.

2319
01:49:29,800 --> 01:49:31,240
- Phone-a-friend Pooja?
- Yes.

2320
01:49:31,360 --> 01:49:32,760
My Pooja.

2321
01:49:33,600 --> 01:49:35,120
Exclaims.

2322
01:49:35,280 --> 01:49:40,640
My son Karam is romancing
his future mother.

2323
01:49:40,760 --> 01:49:42,320
Future mother.
What nonsense.

2324
01:49:42,440 --> 01:49:43,960
It's not nonsense.

2325
01:49:44,080 --> 01:49:46,040
I am in love with her.

2326
01:49:46,160 --> 01:49:47,440
I am madly in love with her.

2327
01:49:47,560 --> 01:49:50,240
And her real name isn't Pooja,
her name is Zubeida.

2328
01:49:50,360 --> 01:49:52,600
Radhe-Radhe! What a shameless family.

2329
01:49:52,720 --> 01:49:54,280
- What shameless.
- Father and son after the same girl.

2330
01:49:54,400 --> 01:49:56,120
Mahinder. Mahinder.

2331
01:49:56,240 --> 01:49:58,000
Uncle, they are the
guys that beat me up.

2332
01:49:58,120 --> 01:49:59,320
Who are you?

2333
01:49:59,440 --> 01:50:02,200
Your wedding hasn't been fixed yet..

2334
01:50:02,320 --> 01:50:04,800
..and your family members
are already showing up.

2335
01:50:04,920 --> 01:50:07,280
Uncle, I am not his family.

2336
01:50:07,400 --> 01:50:08,640
I am Pooja's future husband.

2337
01:50:08,760 --> 01:50:11,240
- Huh..
- Allah..what kind of a woman is she?

2338
01:50:11,360 --> 01:50:13,920
She has entraped every variety of
man.

2339
01:50:14,040 --> 01:50:15,160
Except for me.

2340
01:50:15,280 --> 01:50:18,240
- Hey, Priest..don't provoke me.
- Get lost.

2341
01:50:18,680 --> 01:50:21,000
- Pooja is only mine.
- Hey..

2342
01:50:21,120 --> 01:50:23,560
If anyone comes between
Pooja and me then I will kill him.

2343
01:50:23,680 --> 01:50:25,720
But son, Zubeida is mine.

2344
01:50:25,840 --> 01:50:28,120
- Zubeida who?
- I am leaving.

2345
01:50:28,240 --> 01:50:30,840
- Stay seated.
- But I have to pee.

2346
01:50:30,960 --> 01:50:32,480
Hold it.

2347
01:50:34,280 --> 01:50:35,760
Where on earth did you come from?
Who are you?

2348
01:50:35,880 --> 01:50:38,320
- I am here for the wedding.
- Here..

2349
01:50:38,720 --> 01:50:40,280
Another one..

2350
01:50:40,440 --> 01:50:43,200
I can control my pee..

2351
01:50:43,280 --> 01:50:45,480
..but someone control that woman.

2352
01:50:45,600 --> 01:50:47,880
That woman has more lovers..

2353
01:50:48,000 --> 01:50:49,920
..than we have devotees in the mosque.

2354
01:50:50,080 --> 01:50:51,360
By wedding I mean..

2355
01:50:51,480 --> 01:50:53,520
..Karam called me over to
collect advance for the wedding.

2356
01:50:53,640 --> 01:50:55,520
Are you going to play
that DJ at his funeral?

2357

2455

I am Pooja.

2456

When I got talking to people,
I realised..

2457

increasing, but so is loneliness.

2458
01:57:18,520 --> 01:57:22,160
Today we have thousands of friends
over Facebook, Twitter, and Instagram.

2459
01:57:22,840 --> 01:57:25,560
But do you have one
true friend in real life?

2460
01:57:28,720 --> 01:57:32,480

understand you?

2461
01:57:33,680 --> 01:57:35,760

has increased to an extent..

2462
01:57:36,800 --> 01:57:39,560

to take a family picture.

2463
01:57:41,120 --> 01:57:42,960
Everyone's only worried about selfies.

2464
01:57:44,560 --> 01:57:47,040
And for these lonely people,
along came..

2465
01:57:47,640 --> 01:57:48,800

2466
01:57:49,600 --> 01:57:52,760
While talking to people
I gradually understood..

2467
01:57:54,760 --> 01:57:58,280

in this world needs Pooja.

01:57:59,680 --> 01:58:01,440
And Pooja is not a gender.

2469

Anyone like your friends,
family, relatives, wife, children..

2470
01:58:08,840 --> 01:58:10,680
Anyone can be your Pooja.

2471
01:58:11,360 --> 01:58:13,760

2472

26
00:08:35,396 --> 00:08:37,762
not until now but
riya will not leave him

27
00:08:40,668 --> 00:08:43,603
its your college reunion tonight

28
00:08:45,306 --> 00:08:48,707
tonight we will have a big party

29
00:08:56,083 --> 00:08:59,610
l will encounter like never before

30
00:09:00,287 --> 00:09:03,688
l will kill a leader by which you
will do party for whole year

31
00:09:27,815 --> 00:09:29,783
are you coming to party?

32
00:09:36,090 --> 00:09:37,648
he is also coming in college's party

33
00:09:49,036 --> 00:09:51,937
how l tell what was kabir for me?

34
00:09:56,377 --> 00:09:59,210
he does not have anyone else
except me

35
00:10:01,982 --> 00:10:06,442
l was leaving in dreams.
l'm going back to government college

36
00:10:11,959 --> 00:10:14,291
l dont want your father money

37
00:10:35,149 --> 00:10:38,243
until now we have done everything
together

38
00:10:39,854 --> 00:10:44,257
stop drama and do sign on paper

39
00:10:44,892 --> 00:10:49,522
no excuse.
l will make you police officer

40
00:11:00,541 --> 00:11:03,999
you have to stand up.
dont move

41
00:11:18,692 --> 00:11:20,250
what are you doing?

42
00:11:23,931 --> 00:11:30,097
l told him many times do his own work.
dont involve in other's matters

43
00:11:44,285 --> 00:11:46,810
l'm like this and l will
remain forever like this

44
00:11:47,488 --> 00:11:49,683
if you know about me then why
did you bring me here?

45
00:11:54,995 --> 00:11:56,895
dont show me your face again

46
00:12:06,307 --> 00:12:10,004
l dont know where he was

47
00:12:45,079 --> 00:12:50,244
l was doing some boring jobs then
l joined 1 electronics company

48
00:12:51,051 --> 00:12:55,488
then l started my company to
make mobile phones

49
00:13:16,677 --> 00:13:22,172
1st consignment sold immediately

50
00:13:22,917 --> 00:13:28,981
after 2 months l got complaints
and dealers stopped my payment

51
00:13:39,266 --> 00:13:41,564
you beat police officer?

52
00:14:03,991 --> 00:14:05,515
how sure are you?

53
00:14:07,962 --> 00:14:10,692
they are planning for return attack

54
00:14:38,859 --> 00:14:42,090
rajan is here.
he is 400 degress far from target

55
00:14:50,104 --> 00:14:52,800
home minister is on the line

56
00:16:46,820 --> 00:16:48,117
which group is behind it?

57
00:16:48,722 --> 00:16:52,658
we are doing investigation.
who is behind it?

58
00:17:09,977 --> 00:17:13,037
l announce infront of whole world

59
00:17:26,860 --> 00:17:32,492
we will never give our land

60
00:17:41,074 --> 00:17:45,704
but sir home minister gave permission

61
00:17:49,383 --> 00:17:54,047
did l allow you to send officers?

62
00:17:59,026 --> 00:18:02,484
dont put your tension on me

63
00:18:05,232 --> 00:18:12,695
just now prashant mahanta has called
media

64
00:18:19,479 --> 00:18:25,850
until government takes the safety responsibility
of all workers we cannot do any work

65
00:18:38,398 --> 00:18:40,662
show some action DGP sir

66
00:18:49,810 --> 00:18:53,507
emotions will be disturbed
by losing our soldiers

67
00:19:01,121 --> 00:19:05,581
l know adi but these politicians
have different compulsions

68
00:19:06,326 --> 00:19:10,422
they put pressure on us

69
00:19:21,708 --> 00:19:26,736
timing is not good.
who wants to go nandi ghaat?

70
00:19:34,721 --> 00:19:38,657
l dont understand how 84 police
officer died in 1 night?

71
00:19:39,459 --> 00:19:43,327
and how terrorists are ruling
in nandi ghaat?

72
00:20:04,251 --> 00:20:06,515
you are going to do
this madness

73
00:20:07,354 --> 00:20:13,418
we got togetherjob after so much hard wor.
just now we decided to start a new life

74
00:21:07,781 --> 00:21:12,377
police officers come at their
own risk

75
00:21:25,399 --> 00:21:28,197
around 4 to 5 kms

76
00:22:31,298 --> 00:22:34,131
why gate is shut?

77
00:22:37,103 --> 00:22:41,472
key is with sir.
tell him SP sir has come

78
00:23:02,996 --> 00:23:06,591
another police station is 23 kms
far from this place

79
00:23:12,672 --> 00:23:17,473
when we make police station,
terrorists blast it with dynamite

80
00:23:19,012 --> 00:23:22,675
how you get all the information?

81
00:23:30,724 --> 00:23:33,989
they settle all the matters in
their own court

82
00:24:06,192 --> 00:24:09,821
stop this drama

83
00:24:24,311 --> 00:24:31,843
they make billions and when we ask
for 20 millions then they are angry

84
00:25:56,670 --> 00:25:59,730
they buy weapons and arms
from this money

85
00:26:03,443 --> 00:26:08,745
l can arrest you

86
00:26:13,987 --> 00:26:17,514
sorry but even police dont reply
us for our protection

87
00:26:18,024 --> 00:26:21,323
millions lose.
what is the solution?

88
00:26:36,743 --> 00:26:39,007
but you also have to help us

89
00:26:46,853 --> 00:26:49,651
we have to fight together

90
00:26:50,390 --> 00:26:52,950
our younsters dont understand politics

91
00:26:53,426 --> 00:26:57,419
they dont understand why we are
fighting with our own people?

92
00:26:58,765 --> 00:27:03,429
they think our politicians dont want
solution

93
00:27:05,505 --> 00:27:11,341
if our soldiers saved from terrorists
then they will die from malaria

94
00:27:16,850 --> 00:27:19,444
they cannot talk to their family

95
00:27:22,088 --> 00:27:26,047
if he is strong then KK and saranjeet
would not be trapped

96
00:27:26,926 --> 00:27:31,386
they have full support of villagers

97
00:27:36,469 --> 00:27:41,463
they are among villagers thats why
its difficult to recognize them

98
00:27:42,242 --> 00:27:46,576
there network is so strong that
they get all our news

99
00:28:26,419 --> 00:28:31,015
they are afraid of police man
more than death

100
00:30:25,104 --> 00:30:26,696
your friend

101
00:30:27,407 --> 00:30:30,376
l accept we made a mistake

102
00:30:31,477 --> 00:30:35,174
government did not concentrate on you

103
00:30:35,782 --> 00:30:40,151
you are afraid of police man

104
00:30:41,988 --> 00:30:45,981
if you support us then we can
correct our mistake

105
00:30:46,993 --> 00:30:50,656
this country wants you to be
a part of it

106
00:30:56,369 --> 00:31:03,241
just think what they have done for you?

107
00:31:08,314 --> 00:31:12,774
did they give you all this?
can they give all this?

108
00:31:31,938 --> 00:31:35,897
this war should end

109
00:31:36,876 --> 00:31:42,610
leave this coward life and support us.
we can make a good society

110
00:31:51,724 --> 00:32:00,860
if you have any problem.
no matter who they are

111
00:32:01,501 --> 00:32:07,064
this is my phone number.
i promise i will take immediate action

112
00:32:38,538 --> 00:32:41,405
they cheat you

113
00:32:42,141 --> 00:32:44,974
they do buttering and then cheat you

114
00:32:51,951 --> 00:32:55,011
this is a police of cheat government

115
00:33:19,112 --> 00:33:21,137
from where all this money comes?

116
00:33:29,789 --> 00:33:37,389
they made a contract of
15000 crores

117
00:33:55,781 --> 00:33:58,875
they will open international
university

118
00:34:00,052 --> 00:34:04,853
where our children will speak
and learn english

119
00:34:10,830 --> 00:34:14,857
all this drama is to take our land

120
00:35:53,833 --> 00:35:55,733
leave him rajan

121
00:36:02,475 --> 00:36:08,004
dont fool our villagers

122
00:36:21,027 --> 00:36:26,863
our law is clear.
what is the punishment of cheating

123
00:37:24,590 --> 00:37:29,027
if they signed on any paper then
he will refuse in court

124
00:37:59,792 --> 00:38:01,419
how many people he has?

125
00:38:01,961 --> 00:38:04,759
atleast 40 to 50 people.
news is confirmed?

126
00:40:54,867 --> 00:40:56,300
have you gone mad?

127
00:40:58,571 --> 00:41:02,871
my life is for you butjust give
me some wine

128
00:41:12,585 --> 00:41:15,281
they dont know we learned
gorilla training

129
00:41:23,796 --> 00:41:27,698
how you are here?
what do you mean?

130
00:42:04,003 --> 00:42:08,167
poor people always pissed off

131
00:42:10,843 --> 00:42:14,677
i will not leave him

132
00:42:22,921 --> 00:42:28,553
l'm a police.
i will decide what is right and what is wrong

133
00:42:55,988 --> 00:42:57,148
leave it

134
00:43:24,316 --> 00:43:26,250
you are still awake?

135
00:43:31,090 --> 00:43:33,923
have you gone mad?

136
00:43:38,997 --> 00:43:42,194
they can kill you in 1 second

137
00:43:49,374 --> 00:43:52,673
if l will go inside then l will
give you all news

138
00:43:56,315 --> 00:43:59,341
you just attack

139
00:44:00,152 --> 00:44:04,111
your plan is foolish and
dangerous too

140
00:44:11,330 --> 00:44:14,458
we have always worked like a team

141
00:44:28,280 --> 00:44:31,272
you want rajan?
i will give you rajan

142
00:44:54,706 --> 00:44:59,541
its 7th days of wanted poster
but have not get any news

143
00:45:16,895 --> 00:45:20,228
this is my medicine money

144
00:45:23,535 --> 00:45:26,527
you are goverment servant,
it does not suits you

145
00:46:35,173 --> 00:46:37,869
l come here to take my money

146
00:47:10,842 --> 00:47:27,885
where he will go? leave him
you will also beat me?

147
00:48:12,204 --> 00:48:14,866
run from lock up and run to jungle

148
00:48:15,640 --> 00:48:19,872
dont be scared. police will not follow
you to jungle at night

149
00:48:33,492 --> 00:48:35,619
they will find you

150
00:48:36,395 --> 00:48:41,628
they think all strangers are police
informer

151
00:49:47,466 --> 00:49:49,331
who are you?

152
00:49:50,435 --> 00:49:53,598
take him.
what are you doing?

153
00:50:41,820 --> 00:50:44,015
are you police officer?

154
00:50:44,890 --> 00:50:52,160
you are police officer?
do you think we are fool?

155
00:50:53,298 --> 00:50:58,395
we know you are SP Adi khan person

156
00:51:01,973 --> 00:51:06,842
l also know you are madhuri dixit

157
00:51:32,137 --> 00:51:33,604
what you are doing in
nandi ghaat?

158
00:51:34,606 --> 00:51:38,098
i was doing mobile phone business
in nagpur

159
00:51:38,376 --> 00:51:47,011
i had a loss in business. i came here for
recovery but found his shop is closed

160
00:51:52,290 --> 00:51:55,350
he repairs 2nd hand mobile phones

161
00:52:43,108 --> 00:52:47,010
you are not human being.
you are terrorists

162
00:52:51,650 --> 00:52:58,818
if i will not get my mobile money then its ok.
i will make something else. you can go

163
00:53:22,013 --> 00:53:24,208
where are you going?

164
00:53:29,754 --> 00:53:34,817
you are saying if police will find me
then they will kill me

165
00:56:42,514 --> 00:56:45,847
do all inquiry.
i will check myself

166
00:57:46,744 --> 00:57:50,771
to win their trust you have to give
them our movement update

167
00:57:56,120 --> 00:58:00,716
on monday our wireless frequency will
be 132.5

168
00:58:27,352 --> 00:58:30,378
police is coming here.
we have to go from here

169
00:58:58,149 --> 00:59:02,483
if i say then you always
start to beat me

170
00:59:27,912 --> 00:59:31,109
you have broken madhav rao's nose

171
00:59:32,283 --> 00:59:35,480
he also listened police
talk on radio

172
01:00:09,854 --> 01:00:12,618
from where you learned all this?

173
01:00:50,561 --> 01:00:54,622
you are great.
you dont know counting after 20

174
01:01:05,042 --> 01:01:09,001
dont take him lightly

175
01:01:10,181 --> 01:01:15,278
they have hired a senior officer

176
01:01:23,361 --> 01:01:26,330
they have hired private soldiers

177
01:01:37,241 --> 01:01:42,736
we will give weapons training to
senate and congress

178
01:02:12,577 --> 01:02:15,375
l do collection and you do accounts

179
01:02:20,484 --> 01:02:23,681
whatever l do collection l
give it to you

180
01:02:43,507 --> 01:02:48,069
control yourself

181
01:03:09,233 --> 01:03:13,465
tell suppliers to give weapons on time

182
01:04:40,091 --> 01:04:42,355
why they are leaving us here?

183
01:05:58,469 --> 01:06:01,495
i'm a bit late.
i will be there in 15 mins

184
01:06:10,614 --> 01:06:17,850
every person has so many names here.
juhi is your real name?

185
01:06:40,778 --> 01:06:45,909
my father wanted me to study.
but something else was written in my destiny

186
01:06:52,923 --> 01:06:59,487
first he kidnapped my 2 brothers
and then he took over our land

187
01:07:17,314 --> 01:07:21,876
i want to make my government

188
01:07:24,088 --> 01:07:27,888
if i will live for 10 more years
then i will kill 100 more people

189
01:08:34,692 --> 01:08:38,594
i thought you are busy in singing

190
01:08:48,872 --> 01:08:52,706
after giving me location then
break your phone

191
01:10:24,068 --> 01:10:25,660
police raid this place

192
01:10:34,078 --> 01:10:37,172
everyone arrested

193
01:11:20,991 --> 01:11:24,188
they had a plan to distribute guns
to villagers

194
01:11:25,929 --> 01:11:29,956
but our intelligence is keeping
their eye on them

195
01:11:38,542 --> 01:11:43,536
no matter what adi do.
even death cannot shake us

196
01:11:47,918 --> 01:11:50,182
this is for civilians

197
01:11:55,426 --> 01:12:03,231
until we kill them all we will
not sit quiet

198
01:17:46,209 --> 01:17:51,374
we have smashed their trainign camp

199
01:17:52,215 --> 01:17:56,447
whole credit goes to adil khan

200
01:17:58,488 --> 01:18:06,088
are you sure 64 people killed are
not innocent?

201
01:18:10,167 --> 01:18:14,263
when police do human rights violent
then why there is no enquiry?

202
01:18:25,415 --> 01:18:28,111
these terrorists dont believe
on any rule

203
01:18:33,957 --> 01:18:37,654
police man died because they
were securing their country

204
01:19:01,785 --> 01:19:04,845
why you did not give warning?
why you did firing?

205
01:19:06,056 --> 01:19:09,685
we gave warning but they were
busy in singing

206
01:19:13,396 --> 01:19:18,698
it was no good. so many innocent
people died

207
01:19:21,671 --> 01:19:26,574
they think government never do anything
for them now they will take there home

208
01:19:30,413 --> 01:19:36,318
l trust you otherwise l would not
allow you to go inside

209
01:19:37,087 --> 01:19:44,323
you are getting confused from there
propaganda and if you want leave this mission

210
01:19:51,468 --> 01:19:53,527
l have taken this mission
to help you

211
01:20:02,979 --> 01:20:06,847
l know you are hurt by looking at them

212
01:20:13,356 --> 01:20:18,225
this place will become hell

213
01:20:22,599 --> 01:20:25,591
what we are doing,
people will get benefit from it

214
01:20:31,274 --> 01:20:34,539
when l get rajan,
you run from there

215
01:21:21,825 --> 01:21:26,558
you have done a solid work for us,
we should also do something for you

216
01:21:27,230 --> 01:21:32,031
we thought to send seeta mother to you

217
01:21:38,575 --> 01:21:41,339
we are sending riya memon as
a director here

218
01:21:43,246 --> 01:21:48,980
your president cannot stop
gold medal this time

219
01:22:28,591 --> 01:22:30,616
then country will move further

220
01:22:59,889 --> 01:23:02,653
whatever happened it was not
your mistake

221
01:23:37,660 --> 01:23:42,723
rajan is looking so weak

222
01:23:43,700 --> 01:23:48,194
you are also human being

223
01:24:01,384 --> 01:24:07,687
money is also a part of game

224
01:24:08,625 --> 01:24:15,292
and adil khan knows this better.
i have seen his record

225
01:24:17,467 --> 01:24:22,632
now you have to think how to
kill his confidence

226
01:24:31,247 --> 01:24:35,547
govind has 1 7 different cases registered
on his name

227
01:24:36,286 --> 01:24:43,988
why dont you transfer all cases to 1 place?

228
01:24:54,304 --> 01:24:57,296
thats why l dont want to leave you behind

229
01:24:58,007 --> 01:25:02,171
we have to accomplish this mission

230
01:25:02,946 --> 01:25:06,905
we will kill enemy by entering
in his own house

231
01:25:24,267 --> 01:25:27,725
stand outside police head quater

232
01:25:28,471 --> 01:25:31,804
as police car comes out inform me
on wireless

233
01:26:12,081 --> 01:26:14,140
take it on side

234
01:28:52,008 --> 01:28:56,411
what we do with him l dont know

235
01:29:04,720 --> 01:29:08,087
we fought with hard work
and got succeed

236
01:29:08,825 --> 01:29:15,458
how you think its your success?
they attacked on you and free govind

237
01:29:23,940 --> 01:29:25,965
let them take him

238
01:29:26,843 --> 01:29:31,280
we have their commander in cheif

239
01:29:45,761 --> 01:29:51,131
trust me its your success

240
01:30:01,177 --> 01:30:04,408
l will put camera everywhere,
i will find him

241
01:30:08,417 --> 01:30:15,220
tell me 1 thing how made a reliable
network so fast?

242
01:30:16,058 --> 01:30:22,224
you made their weakness into
your power

243
01:30:31,107 --> 01:30:32,665
its called mahatma gandhi

244
01:31:11,547 --> 01:31:14,846
my son is crazy for your bravery

245
01:31:18,354 --> 01:31:20,914
i'm just doing my duty

246
01:31:21,557 --> 01:31:24,651
i will try my best these terrorists
will not disturb you

247
01:31:25,728 --> 01:31:34,830
its a list of villagers who are
on our project lands

248
01:31:41,777 --> 01:31:48,444
you need to talk to collector and
revenur department to empty this place

249
01:31:55,825 --> 01:32:03,755
we do work for legal work only

250
01:32:19,849 --> 01:32:24,684
they are arranging arms on
emergency basis

251
01:32:25,521 --> 01:32:31,949
people who got notice to empty the place,
we will go there and talk to them

252
01:32:33,496 --> 01:32:36,397
what you want it will happen now

253
01:33:07,930 --> 01:33:12,697
we miss him

254
01:33:15,137 --> 01:33:23,408
but we have to move forward his work.
you have to take his responsibility

255
01:33:39,195 --> 01:33:41,459
you will get all benefit

256
01:33:46,969 --> 01:33:49,369
we have to empty 230 villages fast

257
01:33:51,006 --> 01:33:56,911
after supreme court orders
it does not work

258
01:34:02,885 --> 01:34:03,681
we love to talk directly

259
01:34:12,461 --> 01:34:17,364
as much as you give money
we will do our work fast

260
01:34:20,002 --> 01:34:23,665
i give priority to work most

261
01:34:24,306 --> 01:34:27,537
leave government tension on us

262
01:36:54,290 --> 01:36:58,693
dont interfere in our work

263
01:36:59,261 --> 01:37:02,697
they were doing work with guns

264
01:37:09,371 --> 01:37:15,071
you look at terrorists,
they will look at villages

265
01:37:15,878 --> 01:37:21,839
they are angry on governement.
we will lose our newly made goodwill

266
01:37:25,354 --> 01:37:30,018
i will take action against a person
who breaks law

267
01:37:43,038 --> 01:37:48,169
i'm sending special team to
supervise

268
01:38:12,434 --> 01:38:18,270
adil khan is doing with planning to
make us weak

269
01:38:19,008 --> 01:38:22,637
we have to defend ourselves

270
01:38:23,512 --> 01:38:31,044
whatever we have, we have to
arrange food for them

271
01:38:38,327 --> 01:38:42,161
business man only look their profit

272
01:38:45,200 --> 01:38:49,034
government and police is for them,
not for ordinary people

273
01:38:54,343 --> 01:39:00,543
we need to put ointment on
their wounds

274
01:39:04,853 --> 01:39:11,156
bring all the funds.
we dont have much funds

275
01:43:26,281 --> 01:43:29,773
we will not disrespect any girl

276
01:43:45,500 --> 01:43:54,772
government law is clear. movement will
take all the collections

277
01:44:51,233 --> 01:44:54,828
something is moving

278
01:45:01,643 --> 01:45:03,770
there is a movement on sattellite

279
01:45:22,664 --> 01:45:25,394
find out who is patrolling on
barah kheri area?

01:45:31,973 --> 01:45:35,966

30
00:05:09,122 --> 00:05:11,682
i'd have branded your
institute's name on your foreheads.

31
00:05:13,793 --> 00:05:14,760
Thank you, gentlemen.

32
00:05:21,701 --> 00:05:26,434
Had you asked me a single question
about my subject, you would've realised that...

33
00:05:26,806 --> 00:05:30,139
a person's intelligence and performance
do not depend on his background.

34
00:05:31,077 --> 00:05:32,479
You have obviously forgotten that,
given the opportunity...

35
00:05:32,479 --> 00:05:36,472
it was a backward caste person
who drafted our country's constitution.

36
00:05:46,626 --> 00:05:50,084
It's precisely this despicable mentality
that is ruining our country.

37
00:05:51,231 --> 00:05:54,257
I can't believe that they studied
in this very college.

38
00:05:55,235 --> 00:05:56,463
And this is their mindset!

39
00:05:58,038 --> 00:05:59,471
I have obviously failed as their teacher.

40
00:05:59,806 --> 00:06:00,704
Sir... it's okay.

41
00:06:02,275 --> 00:06:03,799
No! It's not okay!

42
00:06:04,577 --> 00:06:08,570
I'm sorry that by sending you there
i caused you to suffer humiliation.

43
00:06:09,215 --> 00:06:14,517
I thought that until your doctorate begins,
you could gain some experience.

44
00:06:16,056 --> 00:06:19,355
And, it would also
reduce your mother's burden.

45
00:06:21,227 --> 00:06:22,592
How's her backache now?

46
00:06:23,496 --> 00:06:24,520
She's much better, sir.

47
00:06:25,465 --> 00:06:26,762
Do look after her well.

48
00:06:27,067 --> 00:06:30,336
Have you mailed your
papers to cornell university?

49
00:06:30,336 --> 00:06:33,601
Sir, actually i'd like to
do my doctorate under you.

50
00:06:33,840 --> 00:06:34,431
Absolutely not!

51
00:06:35,375 --> 00:06:38,401
Whatever you needed to learn from me, you have.
Time you moved ahead.

52
00:06:39,813 --> 00:06:40,541
Yes, sir.

53
00:06:45,852 --> 00:06:50,757
But until you leave for the us, why can't
the principal give you a job at his college?

54
00:06:50,757 --> 00:06:53,157
Mother... sir has already
helped me so much.

55
00:06:53,660 --> 00:06:57,528
Now, if he also hires me,
won't people accuse him of favouritism?

56
00:06:57,797 --> 00:07:00,425
You're back early, hariya?

57
00:07:00,533 --> 00:07:03,670
Must've sneaked out
of the evening class. Isn't it?

58
00:07:03,670 --> 00:07:05,705
The teacher himself didn't show up.

59
00:07:05,705 --> 00:07:08,241
Don't tell me his goat was stolen again.

60
00:07:08,241 --> 00:07:09,509
No, not the goat.

61
00:07:09,509 --> 00:07:11,711
This time they say his wife ran away
in sheer frustration.

62
00:07:11,711 --> 00:07:12,575
Shut up, silly boy!

63
00:07:13,379 --> 00:07:15,415
Won't you play the computer game today?

64
00:07:15,415 --> 00:07:17,484
No, got to work on important stuff.
Don't disturb me.

65
00:07:17,484 --> 00:07:19,884
Why, haven't you finished
your homework yet?

66
00:07:20,587 --> 00:07:22,555
No, i have to
submit this today. Go now!

67
00:07:22,555 --> 00:07:24,691
Deepu... admit it.

68
00:07:24,691 --> 00:07:26,682
You're scared of losing.

69
00:07:29,295 --> 00:07:31,698
- So, suppose a plus b plus...

70
00:07:31,698 --> 00:07:35,259
panditji, there you go again
taking the longer route!

71
00:07:35,568 --> 00:07:38,204
Obviously! After all, he is from
the intellectual caste of our society.

72
00:07:38,204 --> 00:07:42,197
How will he prove that
unless he exhibits his extra intelligence?

73
00:07:42,408 --> 00:07:44,308
But sir, my answer is
the same as that!

74
00:07:45,145 --> 00:07:47,739
Sure. But, why did you need
these extra four steps?

75
00:07:48,681 --> 00:07:50,717
Sir, but i've memorized every answer.

76
00:07:50,717 --> 00:07:53,208
Now, if i try the shorter route,
i could lose direction.

77
00:07:56,790 --> 00:07:57,586
Ok.

78
00:07:57,657 --> 00:07:59,488
Congratulations, principal sir.

79
00:07:59,793 --> 00:08:03,160
Both ganesh and raghav
have been accepted into llt kanpur.

80
00:08:04,297 --> 00:08:05,594
Wow!

81
00:08:05,899 --> 00:08:08,868
Well done, well done!

82
00:08:10,770 --> 00:08:12,237
However...

83
00:08:13,173 --> 00:08:15,266
your real struggle begins now.

84
00:08:16,242 --> 00:08:18,176
Have some sweets, shambhu kaka.

85
00:08:19,245 --> 00:08:20,610
To celebrate whose success?

86
00:08:20,880 --> 00:08:21,848
Their success.

87
00:08:21,848 --> 00:08:23,509
They've got into the engineering stream.

88
00:08:23,917 --> 00:08:24,751
Wow!

89
00:08:24,751 --> 00:08:28,312
Whoever studies here
is bound to succeed anywhere.

90
00:08:28,421 --> 00:08:29,888
So, shall we enroll you too?

91
00:08:31,257 --> 00:08:33,191
Come on, what'll i do here?

92
00:08:33,660 --> 00:08:36,429
But, you know my daughter muniya...
she is in the tenth grade.

93
00:08:36,429 --> 00:08:37,760
As soon as she clears that...

94
00:08:38,731 --> 00:08:40,665
i'll plonk her in front of guruji.

95
00:08:40,834 --> 00:08:42,768
She will work hard, you'll see...

96
00:08:42,869 --> 00:08:46,464
mark my words, she will become...
how d'you say it... a collector!

97
00:08:46,873 --> 00:08:48,942
Dad, you aren't allowed.

98
00:08:48,942 --> 00:08:50,543
Surely, just one...

99
00:08:50,543 --> 00:08:53,413
ever since the results were declared last week,
you've been gorging on sweets.

100
00:08:53,413 --> 00:08:54,209
Now no more.

101
00:08:54,814 --> 00:08:57,647
You're becoming exactly
like your mother, you know that?

102
00:08:58,685 --> 00:08:59,845
You said something?

103
00:09:04,724 --> 00:09:05,358
Last one!

104
00:09:05,358 --> 00:09:13,356
Suppose, a+b+c+d by 2 is greater
than or equal to under root a+b...

105
00:09:15,368 --> 00:09:15,768
+c+d

106
00:09:15,768 --> 00:09:17,237
did you send your papers to cornell?

107
00:09:17,237 --> 00:09:19,330
Yes. But i won't be going.

108
00:09:19,439 --> 00:09:21,808
You will have to, junior professor.

109
00:09:21,808 --> 00:09:24,675
Because, you see,
i am going to follow you there.

110
00:09:24,911 --> 00:09:27,505
Quit dreaming. I'm not going.

111
00:09:28,514 --> 00:09:30,573
Alright, don't go to cornell.

112
00:09:30,850 --> 00:09:32,613
But, surely you can come for a movie.

113
00:09:35,722 --> 00:09:36,956
What?

114
00:09:36,956 --> 00:09:39,254
You're gawking like
i tried to molest you.

115
00:09:54,874 --> 00:09:58,970
When you ruffle your wet hair
and shower droplets all around

116
00:10:00,947 --> 00:10:02,437
it feels so good

117
00:10:03,883 --> 00:10:08,479
when you part your lips
and softly whisper sweet nothings

118
00:10:09,956 --> 00:10:11,685
it feels so good

119
00:10:13,660 --> 00:10:16,891
don't float around like a fragrance,
just get to the point.

120
00:10:18,298 --> 00:10:19,959
Look into my eyes and say it

121
00:10:20,533 --> 00:10:22,023
don't make me wander in dreams

122
00:10:22,402 --> 00:10:25,303
in short, just say it

123
00:10:26,572 --> 00:10:29,097
just get to the point

124
00:10:30,977 --> 00:10:33,673
just get to the point

125
00:10:53,700 --> 00:10:56,692
it's another feeling

126
00:10:58,137 --> 00:10:59,866
when you are around

127
00:11:12,085 --> 00:11:17,790
when you turn around
and smile in your endearing style

128
00:11:17,790 --> 00:11:19,849
it feels so good

129
00:11:21,494 --> 00:11:24,952
don't play around with words,
don't fool me with your act

130
00:11:25,965 --> 00:11:29,696
take my hand in yours,
come out with those three little words

131
00:11:30,370 --> 00:11:33,168
in short, just say it

132
00:11:34,807 --> 00:11:36,536
just get to the point

133
00:11:38,878 --> 00:11:41,540
just get to the point

134
00:11:42,949 --> 00:11:44,177
say something...

135
00:11:46,052 --> 00:11:47,952
the weather is great...

136
00:11:50,957 --> 00:11:52,686
the lake is beautiful...

137
00:11:54,627 --> 00:11:55,389
and so are you...

138
00:11:58,064 --> 00:11:59,998
can't you just get to the point?

139
00:12:27,727 --> 00:12:32,426
It's not as bad as it seems.

140
00:12:36,736 --> 00:12:37,964
You're looking fit.

141
00:12:38,805 --> 00:12:41,137
How about a game of badminton?

142
00:12:41,908 --> 00:12:44,502
You've obviously forgotten...

143
00:12:45,044 --> 00:12:49,674
that i beat you 21-15 the last time.

144
00:12:50,883 --> 00:12:56,048
I suggest you practice
some more before challenging me.

145
00:13:04,530 --> 00:13:08,830
The moment you come
everything seems fine.

146
00:13:10,470 --> 00:13:13,633
I am worried about them.

147
00:13:14,740 --> 00:13:16,935
Nothing seems to have worked out.

148
00:13:17,477 --> 00:13:21,038
They want to start computer classes...

149
00:13:21,881 --> 00:13:25,681
but the bank isn't sanctioning their loan.

150
00:13:26,819 --> 00:13:29,481
They need a guarantor.

151
00:13:30,123 --> 00:13:31,784
The house hasn't been built completely.

152
00:13:31,824 --> 00:13:33,724
Listen...

153
00:13:35,261 --> 00:13:37,957
if the bank agrees...

154
00:13:37,997 --> 00:13:39,487
i'll sign as a guarantor.

155
00:13:40,299 --> 00:13:44,504
As for the house,
right now they're staying in our new house.

156
00:13:44,504 --> 00:13:48,964
But for how long
can we pile on to you?

157
00:13:50,776 --> 00:13:54,644
They were supposed to be there
just for two months... it's already four!

158
00:13:55,314 --> 00:14:00,251
Papa, the builder said we'll
get possession in three-four months.

159
00:14:00,286 --> 00:14:03,221
That's perfect.
I don't need the house immediately.

160
00:14:03,923 --> 00:14:06,858
The college is giving me
a two-year extension.

161
00:14:06,893 --> 00:14:09,225
I don't want you to worry.

162
00:14:11,297 --> 00:14:14,232
You're the only one i have.

163
00:14:18,237 --> 00:14:21,900
But, i can't play badminton today.

164
00:14:24,177 --> 00:14:26,668
Tomorrow, definitely tomorrow.

165
00:14:37,924 --> 00:14:39,789
I'll be here.

166
00:14:44,797 --> 00:14:47,561
- I'll only be a minute.
- Make it quick.

167
00:14:50,469 --> 00:14:51,595
Guruji?

168
00:14:56,475 --> 00:14:58,602
Guruji, guruji...

169
00:14:58,644 --> 00:15:00,544
greetings to you.

170
00:15:00,613 --> 00:15:02,672
You can't leave unless
you have some tea.

171
00:15:03,249 --> 00:15:05,284
Shambhu, some other day.
I'm in a rush today.

172
00:15:05,284 --> 00:15:07,420
It'll only take a minute.

173
00:15:07,420 --> 00:15:11,186
Listen... make some tea.

174
00:15:22,235 --> 00:15:26,399
She works very hard.
And, all on her own.

175
00:15:28,841 --> 00:15:31,143
- Greetings guruji.
- Bless you.

176
00:15:31,143 --> 00:15:32,337
What's going on here?

177
00:15:32,378 --> 00:15:33,709
- Greetings guruji.
- Bless you.

178
00:15:35,481 --> 00:15:39,315
Oh my god!
What is this high-sounding formula?

179
00:15:39,685 --> 00:15:41,710
- What is this?
- It's bernoulli's equation.

180
00:15:41,821 --> 00:15:43,880
I know, but what exactly does
bernoulli's equation mean?

181
00:15:44,156 --> 00:15:47,387
- Make sure you keep the house clean.
- Yes.

182
00:15:47,460 --> 00:15:49,655
- You do light a lamp at the altar, right?
- Yes, everyday.

183
00:15:53,566 --> 00:15:54,328
- Namaste.
- Namaste.

184
00:15:54,367 --> 00:15:55,459
- Take care.
- Ok.

185
00:15:56,702 --> 00:15:58,294
- So, what did we learn?

186
00:15:58,571 --> 00:16:02,837
- When air passes between
two strips of paper at high speed...

187
00:16:03,276 --> 00:16:04,334
like this...

188
00:16:06,345 --> 00:16:11,112
the pressure between them
decreases and...

189
00:16:12,385 --> 00:16:14,216
they fall in love.

190
00:16:15,588 --> 00:16:18,658
That means, even aeroplanes fly
using bernoulli's principle.

191
00:16:18,658 --> 00:16:20,182
Absolutely... q.e.d.

192
00:16:20,760 --> 00:16:23,251
Oh yes, q.e. D
is quod erat demonstrandum.

193
00:16:23,296 --> 00:16:25,498
Oh no, no,
q.e.d. Means...

194
00:16:25,498 --> 00:16:26,430
quite easily done!

195
00:16:26,732 --> 00:16:28,199
Well, that was quite easily done.

196
00:16:28,367 --> 00:16:29,459
Absolutely!

197
00:16:37,710 --> 00:16:40,270
I'm sanjay, sir.
Commerce, 2002 batch.

198
00:16:40,680 --> 00:16:41,510
Sanjay...

199
00:16:42,348 --> 00:16:43,144
sanjay tandon!

200
00:16:43,549 --> 00:16:44,750
Banking services.

201
00:16:44,750 --> 00:16:46,479
I'm a senior manager here,
come in, please.

202
00:16:47,653 --> 00:16:48,381
Please sit.

203
00:16:51,490 --> 00:16:54,926
Indradev, please call for
some tea and get their papers.

204
00:16:56,162 --> 00:16:56,628
The papers?

205
00:16:56,696 --> 00:16:58,288
Sir, i am so happy you've come here.

206
00:17:04,337 --> 00:17:06,539
Sir, even i tried to get into s.t.m.

207
00:17:06,539 --> 00:17:08,564
I wanted to become a scientist.

208
00:17:09,375 --> 00:17:12,310
But i didn't score enough
at the state level exams.

209
00:17:12,345 --> 00:17:15,181
I worked hard in college
and scored well in the b. Com. Exams.

210
00:17:15,181 --> 00:17:17,183
And i got a job here,
in the reserved category.

211
00:17:17,183 --> 00:17:18,548
I see.

212
00:17:19,452 --> 00:17:21,620
It's only through hard work
that we win respect.

213
00:17:21,620 --> 00:17:22,484
Yes, sir.

214
00:17:22,521 --> 00:17:24,785
It was my good fortune
that i got to meet you today.

215
00:17:25,324 --> 00:17:27,460
It was a pleasure
meeting you too, indradev.

216
00:17:27,460 --> 00:17:29,462
Ram, sir. Indradev ram.

217
00:17:29,462 --> 00:17:30,360
Thank you, sir.

218
00:17:30,396 --> 00:17:31,761
- Thank you.
- Thank you.

219
00:17:31,964 --> 00:17:34,262
If there is any problem,
let me know.

220
00:17:34,734 --> 00:17:36,497
Now work sincerely.

221
00:17:37,403 --> 00:17:39,928
I want to see my friend happy.

222
00:17:40,206 --> 00:17:41,195
Yes, uncle.

223
00:17:46,645 --> 00:17:48,476
Sushant, can't you wait?

224
00:17:48,781 --> 00:17:49,679
But, i'm starving!

225
00:17:49,715 --> 00:17:51,350
Wait for deepak to come.

226
00:17:51,350 --> 00:17:52,214
He'll eat when he gets here.

227
00:17:52,918 --> 00:17:53,942
Why should i starve to death?

228
00:17:54,320 --> 00:17:56,220
The parathas will go cold
if you open the container.

229
00:17:56,522 --> 00:17:57,887
Oh i see...

230
00:17:58,591 --> 00:18:00,718
such glorious love!

231
00:18:00,860 --> 00:18:03,328
Now that he is going to the us...

232
00:18:04,530 --> 00:18:06,293
for whom will you bring hot parathas?

233
00:18:07,500 --> 00:18:08,933
That leaves only...

234
00:18:09,735 --> 00:18:10,895
me!

235
00:18:12,471 --> 00:18:14,840
Then the parathas are mine and so are...

236
00:18:14,840 --> 00:18:16,375
you wish!
Take a look in the mirror!

237
00:18:16,375 --> 00:18:18,639
Why?
Is it worse than deepak's?

238
00:18:24,383 --> 00:18:30,913
Deepak kumar, i'm extremely pleased
to appoint you as a junior lecturer at s.t.m.

239
00:18:30,956 --> 00:18:32,253
Congratulations.

240
00:18:34,059 --> 00:18:34,821
Thank you, sir.

241
00:18:37,763 --> 00:18:38,821
I'm proud of you.

242
00:18:50,272 --> 00:18:51,500
- Come on.

243
00:18:51,606 --> 00:18:52,903
- This is where deepak lives?

244
00:18:53,075 --> 00:18:55,210
Why didn't you tell me
you live in such a narrow lane?

245
00:18:55,210 --> 00:18:56,700
I could barely get my car in!

246
00:18:56,778 --> 00:18:59,581
But i had built a special helipad
for you on the roof.

247
00:18:59,581 --> 00:19:02,284
Little did i know
that you'd come by road.

248
00:19:02,284 --> 00:19:06,744
I would've happily come but
your poorbi is scared of flying with me.

249
00:19:06,922 --> 00:19:08,822
Sushant! You can't even walk properly...

250
00:19:08,857 --> 00:19:09,687
and you're talking of flying.

251
00:19:10,258 --> 00:19:10,917
Oh yeah?

252
00:19:10,959 --> 00:19:12,127
Make it fast, ok?

253
00:19:12,127 --> 00:19:13,526
- Shanti...

254
00:19:14,029 --> 00:19:15,831
how are you?

255
00:19:15,831 --> 00:19:16,763
I'm good.

256
00:19:16,798 --> 00:19:19,266
When it comes to a party,
you conveniently forget your leader.

257
00:19:19,901 --> 00:19:21,801
Just some snacks for the kids.

258
00:19:22,304 --> 00:19:23,236
- Namaste, aunty.
- Hello.

259
00:19:24,139 --> 00:19:25,834
Deepak got a job.

260
00:19:26,241 --> 00:19:27,538
Oh, this is just a temporary job, aunty.

261
00:19:27,609 --> 00:19:29,978
Once he completes his doctorate in
the us, he'll get his real job.

262
00:19:29,978 --> 00:19:33,345
All of us are in for greatjobs soon.

263
00:19:33,915 --> 00:19:35,550
No one can stop
the supreme court from...

264
00:19:35,550 --> 00:19:37,719
granting 27% reservation
for seats in higher education.

265
00:19:37,719 --> 00:19:41,022
27% reservation for whom?
And, where will it come from?

266
00:19:41,022 --> 00:19:43,024
Greetings sir, please have a seat.

267
00:19:43,024 --> 00:19:44,855
It is i who should be greeting you.

268
00:19:45,227 --> 00:19:47,252
You are a model
for the backward castes...

269
00:19:48,196 --> 00:19:49,686
and great is your principal...

270
00:19:49,731 --> 00:19:53,635
for going out of his way
to help backward caste kids.

271
00:19:53,635 --> 00:19:54,693
It's not like that.

272
00:19:55,137 --> 00:19:56,126
He helps everyone.

273
00:19:56,571 --> 00:19:58,038
That's indeed the
highest of truths, deepak.

274
00:19:58,073 --> 00:19:59,908
Our principal's heart overflows
with kindness for one and all.

275
00:19:59,908 --> 00:20:03,712
And his perennial intention is to furnish each
individual with a modicum of opportunity.

276
00:20:03,712 --> 00:20:04,804
Modicum of opportunity?

277
00:20:05,647 --> 00:20:07,308
Meaning that he gives
everyone a chance.

278
00:20:07,349 --> 00:20:08,907
Then why don't you say chance?

279
00:20:09,184 --> 00:20:10,708
That's exactly what i indicated.

280
00:20:11,720 --> 00:20:15,090
Did you guys hear what
pandit here just indicated?

281
00:20:15,090 --> 00:20:39,114
Chance!

282
00:20:39,114 --> 00:20:41,912
Spread your wings and you'll take flight

283
00:20:42,684 --> 00:20:45,551
give me a chance and
you'll have the sky in sight

284
00:20:53,094 --> 00:20:56,231
spread your wings and you'll take flight

285
00:20:56,231 --> 00:20:59,598
give me a chance and
you'll have the sky in sight

286
00:20:59,901 --> 00:21:02,631
draw a starting line, one for all

287
00:21:03,138 --> 00:21:05,936
draw a starting line, one for all

288
00:21:06,675 --> 00:21:09,610
and you'll know if courage or
god is above all

289
00:21:10,512 --> 00:21:13,504
just give me a chance

290
00:21:13,615 --> 00:21:18,453
just give me one chance, my dear,
oh my dear

291
00:21:18,453 --> 00:21:19,852
and watch me take flight

292
00:21:20,055 --> 00:21:24,549
just give me one chance, my dear,
oh my dear

293
00:21:25,160 --> 00:21:26,593
and watch me take flight

294
00:21:26,895 --> 00:21:31,229
just give me one chance, my dear,
oh my dear

295
00:21:32,000 --> 00:21:33,262
and watch me take flight

296
00:21:34,135 --> 00:21:36,968
give me a chance, please

297
00:21:37,606 --> 00:21:40,234
give me a chance, please

298
00:21:48,483 --> 00:21:51,145
chance

299
00:21:51,486 --> 00:21:54,717
just give me a chance

300
00:21:54,923 --> 00:21:57,653
it showers it's glow with every step

301
00:21:58,593 --> 00:22:00,151
let me see your moves

302
00:22:01,763 --> 00:22:04,493
my sweet darling

303
00:22:05,066 --> 00:22:07,933
take it, take it all

304
00:22:08,169 --> 00:22:10,694
just one chance

305
00:22:11,573 --> 00:22:14,770
the one who owns the bat and the ball

306
00:22:14,943 --> 00:22:18,037
he writes the rules and wins it all

307
00:22:21,783 --> 00:22:24,980
how long will you
keep this up this game?

308
00:22:27,055 --> 00:22:30,047
Why don't you set up
a stadium of hope?

309
00:22:30,592 --> 00:22:31,957
Just one chance

310
00:22:33,762 --> 00:22:36,595
watch me as i step on the field

311
00:22:37,098 --> 00:22:39,658
watch me as i step on the field

312
00:22:40,535 --> 00:22:43,231
you will see my aspirations flying high

313
00:22:44,239 --> 00:22:46,833
just give me a chance

314
00:22:47,175 --> 00:22:51,942
just give me one chance, my dear,
oh my dear

315
00:22:52,213 --> 00:22:53,771
and watch me take flight

316
00:22:53,949 --> 00:22:58,283
just give me one chance, my dear,
oh my dear

317
00:22:59,054 --> 00:22:59,611
and watch me take flight

318
00:22:59,921 --> 00:23:05,553
just give me one chance, my dear,
oh my dear

319
00:23:05,994 --> 00:23:07,859
and watch me take flight

320
00:23:13,168 --> 00:23:14,760
watch me take flight

321
00:23:19,708 --> 00:23:21,573
watch me take flight

322
00:23:22,877 --> 00:23:24,242
just one chance

323
00:23:37,292 --> 00:23:38,760
panditji? What have you scored?

324
00:23:38,760 --> 00:23:40,853
85.3%, poorbi.

325
00:23:41,062 --> 00:23:43,622
Wow! That means you are
definitely getting into engineering.

326
00:23:43,932 --> 00:23:45,763
- Congratulations.
- Thank you.

327
00:23:47,235 --> 00:23:48,896
- Glory to k. K!

328
00:23:49,137 --> 00:23:50,968
Congratulations, sir.

329
00:23:51,006 --> 00:23:52,166
Three new courses this year!

330
00:23:56,778 --> 00:23:58,006
- Namaskar.
- Namaste.

331
00:23:58,046 --> 00:23:59,377
You are god, sir.

332
