00:23:59,814 --> 00:24:02,408
My son had flunked twice but
with your help he cleared the exam.

333
00:24:02,884 --> 00:24:03,885
We feel blessed, sir.

334
00:24:03,885 --> 00:24:06,080
Now your brother, the minister,
will take care of things.

335
00:24:06,187 --> 00:24:08,087
I won't go to any college but s.t.m.

336
00:24:08,723 --> 00:24:10,953
Sir, but you're a professor at s.t.m.

337
00:24:11,660 --> 00:24:12,820
Please use your clout.

338
00:24:13,228 --> 00:24:13,990
We'll pay any amount.

339
00:24:14,029 --> 00:24:15,930
There's nothing i can do!

340
00:24:15,930 --> 00:24:18,296
Without s.t.m. Life is meaningless.

341
00:24:19,300 --> 00:24:22,064
He will commit suicide, sir.

342
00:24:24,305 --> 00:24:26,671
Only the minister can save him then.

343
00:24:30,111 --> 00:24:31,009
Come, please come...

344
00:24:32,247 --> 00:24:33,771
hello... please sit.

345
00:24:35,083 --> 00:24:37,483
Deepak kumar and kamlesh narayan.

346
00:24:37,852 --> 00:24:42,016
It's my pleasure to introduce
these two newjunior lecturers.

347
00:24:43,124 --> 00:24:44,022
Go, meet them.

348
00:24:46,795 --> 00:24:47,693
Welcome...

349
00:24:50,832 --> 00:24:53,232
why are you wasting
your time here, mr. Deepak kumar?

350
00:24:54,035 --> 00:24:55,696
Make use of the reservation rule.

351
00:24:56,271 --> 00:24:58,466
The government is doling outjobs
to you people in charity.

352
00:24:59,874 --> 00:25:01,865
It's you people who've been
living on charity, sir.

353
00:25:02,210 --> 00:25:04,178
By snatching from us
what is rightfully ours.

354
00:25:05,380 --> 00:25:08,816
But now, when you have to give it back,
it hurts, doesn't it?

355
00:25:15,490 --> 00:25:18,126
You are the minister for education,
you practically run the government.

356
00:25:18,126 --> 00:25:20,026
But you can't get admission
for your only nephew?

357
00:25:20,061 --> 00:25:22,086
Oh stop crying, please!

358
00:25:22,731 --> 00:25:24,062
I'm getting it done.

359
00:25:24,733 --> 00:25:25,995
Sir, it's impossible at s.t.m.

360
00:25:26,234 --> 00:25:27,166
No one can do that.

361
00:25:27,435 --> 00:25:29,104
Why is it so difficult, verma?

362
00:25:29,104 --> 00:25:32,006
Sir, over the past 35 years,
principal prabhakar anand has...

363
00:25:32,006 --> 00:25:36,344
nurtured the college in every way
on his own.

364
00:25:36,344 --> 00:25:37,746
Even the government can't interfere.

365
00:25:37,746 --> 00:25:40,044
Last year, he refused admission
to the home secretary's daughter.

366
00:25:40,081 --> 00:25:40,843
Really?!

367
00:25:42,317 --> 00:25:44,979
In that case,
i have to meet this principal.

368
00:25:46,354 --> 00:25:49,152
Aniruddha prasad is the secretary
of the s.t.m. Trust.

369
00:25:49,824 --> 00:25:50,959
Let's have a word with him.

370
00:25:50,959 --> 00:25:51,755
Yes, please do.

371
00:25:51,993 --> 00:25:54,461
We've got more than
10,000 applications this time.

372
00:25:56,765 --> 00:25:57,163
Hello...

373
00:25:58,199 --> 00:26:00,468
the first cut off list is 94%.

374
00:26:00,468 --> 00:26:02,570
Your daughter has scored 76%.

375
00:26:02,570 --> 00:26:04,162
It's impossible, navneetji.

376
00:26:08,209 --> 00:26:11,079
You've made millions
as a secretary in the government.

377
00:26:11,079 --> 00:26:12,512
Time to put it to use.

378
00:26:12,914 --> 00:26:16,179
You can buy a seat
in any college for your daughter!

379
00:26:23,691 --> 00:26:26,023
Aniruddha has come with
the minister for education.

380
00:26:27,295 --> 00:26:29,531
Baburam chaudhary,
the minister for education.

381
00:26:29,531 --> 00:26:30,293
Namaskar.

382
00:26:30,765 --> 00:26:33,668
It's great to see that you go
for a run in the morning, sir.

383
00:26:33,668 --> 00:26:36,603
No wonder that even the college
is in such terrific shape.

384
00:26:36,871 --> 00:26:38,202
What has your nephew scored?

385
00:26:38,606 --> 00:26:39,971
His score is low.

386
00:26:40,909 --> 00:26:44,538
But, in any case, no one in our family
ever managed to score above 40%.

387
00:26:44,746 --> 00:26:47,015
But all thanks to k.k. Coaching...

388
00:26:47,015 --> 00:26:50,285
they made him slog
at memorising everything...

389
00:26:50,285 --> 00:26:51,809
and he scored 52.07%.

390
00:26:54,189 --> 00:26:55,816
I'm sorry but i can't help you.

391
00:26:55,890 --> 00:26:57,118
Don't say that, sir.

392
00:26:57,826 --> 00:27:00,351
Please don't say that.
He is my sister's only son.

393
00:27:00,395 --> 00:27:04,161
He doesn't want anything except s.t.m.

394
00:27:06,067 --> 00:27:07,068
If you'll kindly excuse me...

395
00:27:07,068 --> 00:27:07,902
i have some things
to take care of.

396
00:27:07,902 --> 00:27:09,893
Aniruddha, please look after him.

397
00:27:11,139 --> 00:27:12,299
Sir, just listen to me.

398
00:27:13,341 --> 00:27:16,708
Oh! So this is where you run
your private coaching.

399
00:27:16,845 --> 00:27:19,109
But why are you taking
classes in your backyard?

400
00:27:19,280 --> 00:27:21,214
I have lots of space
in my commercial complex.

401
00:27:21,249 --> 00:27:24,150
You can hold your classes there.
Your name will attract the students.

402
00:27:24,185 --> 00:27:26,585
You can mint money.

403
00:27:31,993 --> 00:27:34,587
Mr. Minister, our college
pays good salaries.

404
00:27:36,064 --> 00:27:41,229
Moreover, we are not allowed
to give private tuitions outside.

405
00:27:46,174 --> 00:27:48,142
You mean all this is for free?

406
00:27:48,676 --> 00:27:49,802
Please come...

407
00:27:50,979 --> 00:27:52,003
have i upset him?

408
00:27:52,113 --> 00:27:55,241
Don't worry, sir.
I'll speak with him.

409
00:27:55,283 --> 00:27:58,620
You advise people to
pay for admission outside.

410
00:27:58,620 --> 00:28:01,714
Why not have that system
in your college?

411
00:28:07,128 --> 00:28:08,857
Mr. Minister, you?

412
00:28:09,197 --> 00:28:10,198
You should've sent for me.

413
00:28:10,198 --> 00:28:11,256
Damodar seth...

414
00:28:11,833 --> 00:28:13,357
you are a senior trustee at s.t.m.

415
00:28:13,902 --> 00:28:15,703
For years, i have got you
contracts worth millions...

416
00:28:15,703 --> 00:28:16,971
from the education department.

417
00:28:16,971 --> 00:28:19,064
And yet, you can't get
my nephew admitted?

418
00:28:19,173 --> 00:28:20,401
That's precisely the problem.

419
00:28:21,042 --> 00:28:23,272
The principal controls
the admissions completely.

420
00:28:23,378 --> 00:28:24,436
So that's a 'no'?

421
00:28:25,046 --> 00:28:28,641
If the boy's grade is low,
take money for the admission.

422
00:28:28,983 --> 00:28:30,644
Why are you ruining his career?

423
00:28:31,185 --> 00:28:33,187
Moreover, the college is losing millions.

424
00:28:33,187 --> 00:28:34,381
What sort of education is this?

425
00:28:34,722 --> 00:28:35,323
Don't worry.

426
00:28:35,323 --> 00:28:37,120
How can i not?

427
00:28:38,726 --> 00:28:40,284
My nephew's career is at stake.

428
00:28:40,795 --> 00:28:45,095
I'll have the chief minister call
the founder member shakuntala thakralji.

429
00:28:45,867 --> 00:28:48,427
The chief minister began
his political career through her party.

430
00:28:48,903 --> 00:28:50,939
Your principal
won't be able to refuse her.

431
00:28:50,939 --> 00:28:54,773
Sir, shakuntala quit everything worldly
32 years ago...

432
00:28:54,809 --> 00:28:57,312
to live in an ashram in hrishikesh.

433
00:28:57,312 --> 00:28:58,913
There's no way to contact her.

434
00:28:58,913 --> 00:29:00,039
Listen, don't worry.

435
00:29:00,114 --> 00:29:02,250
I'll take care of your nephew's admission.

436
00:29:02,250 --> 00:29:03,945
I just had a word with the chairman.

437
00:29:04,218 --> 00:29:06,482
At the next board meeting,
we'll cut the principal down to size.

438
00:29:06,988 --> 00:29:10,321
Appoint your own man there,
damodar seth.

439
00:29:10,858 --> 00:29:12,086
It will work wonders.

440
00:29:12,860 --> 00:29:15,260
There's no business like education!

441
00:29:15,830 --> 00:29:17,263
Paid service - without guarantee.

442
00:29:17,765 --> 00:29:22,828
Students will pay the fees through their noses
and then be responsible for their own results.

443
00:29:23,338 --> 00:29:27,342
You've reduced the trustees to nothing
more than a rubber-stamp, principal sir.

444
00:29:27,342 --> 00:29:28,376
Damodarji, the agenda...

445
00:29:28,376 --> 00:29:34,749
you have admitted 11 students with 52-55%,
just because they are "underprivileged".

446
00:29:34,749 --> 00:29:36,284
But, you won't accept a
single recommendation of ours.

447
00:29:36,284 --> 00:29:38,753
Damodarji, no one is rejected.

448
00:29:38,753 --> 00:29:40,755
All applications are
still under consideration.

449
00:29:40,755 --> 00:29:42,484
According to me,
they should be rejected.

450
00:29:43,091 --> 00:29:44,752
Will you kindly enlighten us, why?

451
00:29:48,496 --> 00:29:52,967
The 11 students you mention have
studied under very difficult circumstances...

452
00:29:52,967 --> 00:29:58,371
without any facilities or coaching classes
and yet managed to get those scores.

453
00:29:59,907 --> 00:30:05,243
If you compare them to the children of ministers,
bureaucrats and rich families...

454
00:30:06,381 --> 00:30:14,516
who have access to good teachers,
schools, facilities and coaching classes...

455
00:30:15,456 --> 00:30:24,966
and yet score only 52.07%...

456
00:30:24,966 --> 00:30:28,868
pray tell, how
i can consider them as deserving.

457
00:30:29,470 --> 00:30:33,074
Should you ever recommend
a weak but deserving student...

458
00:30:33,074 --> 00:30:34,507
i shall never disappoint you.

459
00:30:34,609 --> 00:30:38,409
That was one fine speech, principal sir.

460
00:30:39,447 --> 00:30:44,441
But s.t. M belongs to
a private trust created to...

461
00:30:44,485 --> 00:30:48,478
help the children of
our caste come up in life.

462
00:30:48,890 --> 00:30:52,519
For the poor and the backward castes
there's the government.

463
00:30:54,562 --> 00:30:56,154
Forgive me, damodarji.

464
00:30:57,098 --> 00:31:00,261
Your views are fatal for
the principles of s.t.m.

465
00:31:02,503 --> 00:31:05,301
S.t.m. Was established
with the sole purpose to offer...

466
00:31:05,840 --> 00:31:10,078
the best possible education
to every deserving student...

467
00:31:10,078 --> 00:31:13,980
regardless of caste,
religion, class or community.

468
00:31:14,082 --> 00:31:17,916
But, if you people have decided to
go against that purpose...

469
00:31:19,053 --> 00:31:21,214
i regret to say,
i can't be with you anymore.

470
00:31:21,255 --> 00:31:24,588
Prabhakarji, our views
are no different from yours.

471
00:31:25,359 --> 00:31:28,930
Damodar is merely saying that
the trustee quota should be respected.

472
00:31:28,930 --> 00:31:29,864
Noted.

473
00:31:29,864 --> 00:31:31,232
The next proposal is to...

474
00:31:31,232 --> 00:31:34,502
appoint a permanent vice principal
to replace kamta prasad.

475
00:31:34,502 --> 00:31:39,574
Excuse me, but why do
we have to decide on this now?

476
00:31:39,574 --> 00:31:43,510
Kamta prasad is still there.
Moreover, dinkar paswan is doing thatjob.

477
00:31:44,011 --> 00:31:45,205
Prabhakarji...

478
00:31:45,279 --> 00:31:48,009
surely you don't intend to...

479
00:31:48,049 --> 00:31:51,507
appoint dinkar paswan as
the permanent vice principal?

480
00:31:53,688 --> 00:31:57,988
There are other teachers more senior
and more qualified than him.

481
00:31:58,359 --> 00:32:03,592
I propose that dr. Mithilesh singh
will be most suitable as the vice principal.

482
00:32:04,031 --> 00:32:06,261
Highly qualified and dedicated.

483
00:32:06,467 --> 00:32:08,536
I support the recommendation fully.
Please call him in here.

484
00:32:08,536 --> 00:32:09,002
Ok.

485
00:32:15,610 --> 00:32:17,077
Come in, mithileshji.

486
00:32:17,545 --> 00:32:21,538
It's our pleasure to appoint you
as the new vice principal of s.t.m.

487
00:32:22,483 --> 00:32:23,575
I...

488
00:32:24,285 --> 00:32:27,311
will try my best to not disappoint you.

489
00:32:28,589 --> 00:32:29,283
Congratulations.

490
00:32:30,658 --> 00:32:34,321
I'm certain that i will continue
to receive your co-operation.

491
00:32:35,396 --> 00:32:36,158
Trust me.

492
00:32:38,366 --> 00:32:41,733
Thank you very much for my nephew's
admission mr. Vice principal.

493
00:32:41,936 --> 00:32:43,597
All i want is your blessings.

494
00:32:43,938 --> 00:32:46,406
Now you just watch
how we take you to great heights.

495
00:32:47,208 --> 00:32:49,644
How many coaching centres
do you operate currently, mithilesh?

496
00:32:49,644 --> 00:32:50,201
Seven, sir.

497
00:32:50,578 --> 00:32:52,513
What if we raise that to 27?

498
00:32:52,513 --> 00:32:53,377
Excuse me?

499
00:32:53,648 --> 00:32:57,516
The minister will set up k.k. Coaching centers
in all his commercial complexes.

500
00:32:58,052 --> 00:32:59,110
And then in every district.

501
00:32:59,754 --> 00:33:03,212
I already have a plan for a university
on my 110 acres on agra road.

502
00:33:03,257 --> 00:33:05,691
This is the saraswati centre of education!

503
00:33:05,960 --> 00:33:09,764
World class - medical, commerce,
engineering, i.t.

504
00:33:09,764 --> 00:33:11,595
Every bloody subject!

505
00:33:11,632 --> 00:33:13,768
The investment will be
to the tune of 12 billion rupees.

506
00:33:13,768 --> 00:33:16,498
Time for you to establish
a business empire of education.

507
00:33:18,706 --> 00:33:21,776
Consider it done.
By god's grace.

508
00:33:21,776 --> 00:33:25,177
Within a year we'll
list it on the stock market.

509
00:33:25,446 --> 00:33:28,210
And then get at least 50 billion
from the public!

510
00:33:30,785 --> 00:33:33,549
God is great!

511
00:33:45,099 --> 00:33:46,293
What are you doing here?

512
00:33:47,602 --> 00:33:48,864
I'm asking you!

513
00:33:49,704 --> 00:33:52,264
I am putting my knowledge
of science to good use.

514
00:33:52,707 --> 00:33:54,709
And who will attend the
engineering college classes?

515
00:33:54,709 --> 00:33:58,236
I missed out on the admission
by a mere 1%.

516
00:33:58,846 --> 00:33:59,904
But your name was in the merit list!

517
00:34:00,214 --> 00:34:04,583
Yes, i was the last one in the merit list.

518
00:34:05,786 --> 00:34:09,017
But the complicated policy of
reservation denied me my rightful seat.

519
00:34:10,024 --> 00:34:13,187
My life is ruined.

520
00:34:13,628 --> 00:34:14,788
Relax, pandit.

521
00:34:15,796 --> 00:34:17,098
Even if you didn't get
admission into engineering...

522
00:34:17,098 --> 00:34:18,827
life is meaningless!

523
00:34:19,166 --> 00:34:22,169
It's either engineering or
i'll sweep the streets!

524
00:34:22,169 --> 00:34:23,227
No, but...

525
00:34:25,706 --> 00:34:27,196
where did you get these?

526
00:34:27,742 --> 00:34:28,936
Sleeping pills?

527
00:34:29,810 --> 00:34:31,744
Are you planning to commit suicide?

528
00:34:33,681 --> 00:34:36,150
This guy is dangerous!
He'll send us to prison.

529
00:34:36,150 --> 00:34:37,879
Don't let him get away.

530
00:34:40,688 --> 00:34:42,990
What's the meaning of this?
You can'tjust barge in like that.

531
00:34:42,990 --> 00:34:45,126
Sorry sir, but this is urgent.
We are students of s.t.m.

532
00:34:45,126 --> 00:34:47,194
I am principal prabhakar's daughter.

533
00:34:47,194 --> 00:34:48,829
Oh. How can i help you?

534
00:34:48,829 --> 00:34:49,557
Injustice!

535
00:34:50,364 --> 00:34:53,197
I mean, you can stop this injustice.

536
00:34:53,701 --> 00:34:56,169
He had the last spot
on the admission list.

537
00:34:56,671 --> 00:34:58,901
However, since a backward caste
candidate scored higher...

538
00:34:58,939 --> 00:35:00,341
he was bumped off the list.

539
00:35:00,341 --> 00:35:01,709
I can't do anything about it.

540
00:35:01,709 --> 00:35:02,733
It's just bad luck.

541
00:35:02,977 --> 00:35:03,739
Bad luck?

542
00:35:04,178 --> 00:35:06,578
Sir, his life will be destroyed.

543
00:35:06,681 --> 00:35:07,748
He is contemplating suicide.

544
00:35:07,748 --> 00:35:11,052
Sorry, the rule is that
if a backward caste student scores...

545
00:35:11,052 --> 00:35:13,111
enough to compete
in the open category...

546
00:35:13,154 --> 00:35:15,222
then he gets
admission through that category.

547
00:35:15,222 --> 00:35:17,918
Even if that means a
wasted seat in the reserved category?

548
00:35:18,225 --> 00:35:20,250
Those are the rules.
I can do nothing about them.

549
00:35:20,661 --> 00:35:22,720
Sir, his father is
a janitor in our college.

550
00:35:23,230 --> 00:35:25,232
He has studied
against very difficult odds.

551
00:35:25,232 --> 00:35:26,867
I do understand...

552
00:35:26,867 --> 00:35:28,302
but this is the system.

553
00:35:28,302 --> 00:35:29,904
To hell with the system, sir!

554
00:35:29,904 --> 00:35:30,233
What?

555
00:35:31,038 --> 00:35:31,972
Nothing.

556
00:35:31,972 --> 00:35:32,870
Thank you.

557
00:35:33,007 --> 00:35:34,998
See, don't lose heart.

558
00:35:36,277 --> 00:35:38,312
Apply to the
padmavati institute of engineering.

559
00:35:38,312 --> 00:35:39,780
Sir, but the fees...

560
00:35:39,780 --> 00:35:42,840
are 500,000 rupees.
Payable in advance.

561
00:35:42,917 --> 00:35:44,111
Even my retirement fund...

562
00:35:44,352 --> 00:35:45,319
don't worry.

563
00:35:45,353 --> 00:35:46,012
Just apply.

564
00:35:46,921 --> 00:35:47,945
You will get a scholarship.

565
00:35:48,356 --> 00:35:52,690
I... i will personally recommend your case
to the dwarka das foundation.

566
00:35:53,327 --> 00:35:54,095
Sir...

567
00:35:54,095 --> 00:35:56,859
don't do that, please...

568
00:35:57,932 --> 00:35:59,923
you are god for us.

569
00:36:02,269 --> 00:36:03,293
Sushant?

570
00:36:06,006 --> 00:36:07,200
Son, what have you done?

571
00:36:07,908 --> 00:36:09,705
You've changed your stream once again?

572
00:36:09,744 --> 00:36:11,234
Dad, how does it matter?

573
00:36:11,278 --> 00:36:12,646
I want to go to jamia university.

574
00:36:12,646 --> 00:36:14,648
I have already appeared for
the entrance test.

575
00:36:14,648 --> 00:36:16,275
And you think
you will get admission there?

576
00:36:16,350 --> 00:36:17,408
Of course, dad.

577
00:36:18,018 --> 00:36:20,782
Listen, forget about jamia
and study commerce.

578
00:36:21,021 --> 00:36:22,056
It's business that is -

579
00:36:22,056 --> 00:36:23,353
dad, i don't want business.

580
00:36:24,258 --> 00:36:26,060
I want to do mass comm,
and that's it!

581
00:36:26,060 --> 00:36:27,994
In that case,
you can forget about jamia.

582
00:36:28,462 --> 00:36:30,896
This is their admission list...

583
00:36:31,899 --> 00:36:33,833
and your name doesn't feature in it.

584
00:36:35,202 --> 00:36:38,660
51.5% seats are reserved at jamia.

585
00:36:39,273 --> 00:36:43,175
And, you thought admission
would be easy there?

586
00:36:45,112 --> 00:36:46,977
But dad, i put in a lot of effort.

587
00:36:47,782 --> 00:36:49,113
Even the personal interview went well.

588
00:36:49,683 --> 00:36:53,744
Son, you can forget about
government-supported institutes.

589
00:36:54,155 --> 00:36:56,783
Reservations reign supreme over there.

590
00:37:01,424 --> 00:37:03,221
Let's make it quick.
I've three more lectures to go.

591
00:37:04,327 --> 00:37:05,487
You're late again!

592
00:37:05,562 --> 00:37:07,864
Sharma sir gave notes on quantum today.

593
00:37:07,864 --> 00:37:09,466
Check the sachchar and sachchar text.

594
00:37:09,466 --> 00:37:11,297
They have the best notes on quantum.

595
00:37:14,404 --> 00:37:15,063
What's wrong?

596
00:37:16,339 --> 00:37:17,863
Here, you take half.

597
00:37:17,974 --> 00:37:18,565
50-50.

598
00:37:18,975 --> 00:37:20,272
Why are you letting go even 50%?

599
00:37:21,077 --> 00:37:23,477
Why don't you people
keep it all? 100%.

600
00:37:25,315 --> 00:37:26,145
What did you say?

601
00:37:26,349 --> 00:37:28,249
You heard me.

602
00:37:35,225 --> 00:37:37,853
Finally, the historic ruling that everyone
was impatiently waiting for has been arrived.

603
00:37:37,928 --> 00:37:42,627
For 60 years, we have had 22.5% reservation for
the scheduled castes and scheduled tribes.

604
00:37:42,933 --> 00:37:45,502
However, the recommendation
of the mandal commission that...

605
00:37:45,502 --> 00:37:49,973
the other backward castes be given
another 27% reservation, was under a cloud.

606
00:37:49,973 --> 00:37:52,676
Now, the supreme court has cleared that too.

607
00:37:52,676 --> 00:37:58,548
So, now the reservation in higher education
and governmentjobs will be 49.5%.

608
00:37:58,548 --> 00:38:01,117
These caste-based
reservations have caused...

609
00:38:01,117 --> 00:38:04,054
deep satisfaction as well as
severe discontent in the country.

610
00:38:04,054 --> 00:38:07,182
The so-called upper castes
are perturbed by the developments.

611
00:38:07,324 --> 00:38:10,452
This is abhay raichand with
cameraman akhilesh singh.

612
00:38:17,667 --> 00:38:19,002
What do you think will happen?

613
00:38:19,002 --> 00:38:22,038
If they do our work,
we'll have to do what they were doing.

614
00:38:22,038 --> 00:38:24,674
We'll have to leave our studies
and take up shoe-polishing now!

615
00:38:24,674 --> 00:38:25,402
What else can we do?

616
00:38:25,442 --> 00:38:27,911
These are dark days.

617
00:38:27,911 --> 00:38:29,713
And so it shall be that...

618
00:38:29,713 --> 00:38:32,181
the swan will get discarded grain...

619
00:38:32,482 --> 00:38:34,109
while the crow will be fed pearls.

620
00:38:46,930 --> 00:38:49,599
In this democracy,
everyone is meant to have equal rights.

621
00:38:49,599 --> 00:38:51,635
We believe in merit...

622
00:38:51,635 --> 00:38:53,003
not in reservation.

623
00:38:53,003 --> 00:38:58,942
- We're for merit...
against reservation!

624
00:38:59,175 --> 00:39:01,109
Brothers, these are those very people...

625
00:39:01,945 --> 00:39:05,108
who never allowed us
to even sit beside them.

626
00:39:05,515 --> 00:39:08,211
But, now that the supreme court's
decision has arrived...

627
00:39:09,019 --> 00:39:15,425
they're screaming their lungs out that
everyone has equal rights in a democracy.

628
00:39:15,425 --> 00:39:17,290
Don't fall into their trap.

629
00:39:18,561 --> 00:39:21,698
If they had their way, they would
never allow any change whatsoever.

630
00:39:21,698 --> 00:39:25,259
Glory to the supreme court!

631
00:39:28,304 --> 00:39:30,670
Hail, lord mandal!

632
00:39:35,111 --> 00:39:37,170
Time to pack
our bags and leave.

633
00:39:37,313 --> 00:39:38,575
Now these people will rule.

634
00:39:51,127 --> 00:39:52,116
Security...

635
00:39:53,363 --> 00:39:54,694
shut the gate and lock it.

636
00:39:54,731 --> 00:39:55,755
Lock it. Now!

637
00:39:58,802 --> 00:39:59,291
This is the problem with our country.

638
00:40:01,337 --> 00:40:04,067
Everyone has the freedom
to stage his own circus.

639
00:40:12,015 --> 00:40:14,609
They are deliberately
dancing outside our gate.

640
00:40:15,218 --> 00:40:15,707
Disgusting.

641
00:40:35,205 --> 00:40:36,536
What are they doing?

642
00:40:44,848 --> 00:40:46,475
- Close the gates.

643
00:40:47,517 --> 00:40:49,883
- Throw them out.

644
00:40:54,891 --> 00:40:56,222
Immediately send the police to s.t.m.

645
00:40:56,259 --> 00:40:58,328
Thousands of rioters
have gathered here.

646
00:40:58,328 --> 00:40:58,794
Yes... hurry!

647
00:41:00,797 --> 00:41:02,025
What is the need
to call the police, sir?

648
00:41:02,799 --> 00:41:03,527
They will leave now.

649
00:41:04,367 --> 00:41:05,425
Of course, they'll leave.

650
00:41:05,869 --> 00:41:07,131
Either on their own
or by getting kicked out.

651
00:41:07,403 --> 00:41:09,303
You guys don't know
any other language, anyway.

652
00:41:29,125 --> 00:41:31,227
Whoever's gone out
should not come back in.

653
00:41:31,227 --> 00:41:32,888
Sushant, what are you doing?!

654
00:41:32,929 --> 00:41:34,055
Let them back in.

655
00:41:34,397 --> 00:41:35,329
You also go out...

656
00:41:35,565 --> 00:41:36,623
go dance with them.

657
00:41:37,500 --> 00:41:38,364
Have you lost it?

658
00:41:38,468 --> 00:41:39,901
No, i haven't.

659
00:41:40,336 --> 00:41:41,997
In fact, i've finally realised that...

660
00:41:42,438 --> 00:41:45,842
for merit... against reservation!

661
00:41:45,842 --> 00:41:46,536
Hold on.

662
00:42:02,458 --> 00:42:04,394
What's happening? Stop it.

663
00:42:04,394 --> 00:42:06,123
Sushant, have you gone mad?

664
00:42:06,329 --> 00:42:07,130
You shut up!

665
00:42:07,130 --> 00:42:08,324
And get out of here!!

666
00:42:10,867 --> 00:42:11,959
Don't even think about it.

667
00:42:12,635 --> 00:42:14,569
We haven't forgotten how to drive cattle!

668
00:42:15,405 --> 00:42:16,303
You will regret it.

669
00:42:22,579 --> 00:42:23,341
Stop it!

670
00:42:24,214 --> 00:42:25,044
- Stop it!

671
00:42:25,181 --> 00:42:26,876
- For merit... against reservation!

672
00:42:27,650 --> 00:42:28,412
Stop it!

673
00:42:28,518 --> 00:42:29,252
I said, shut up!

674
00:42:29,252 --> 00:42:30,549
- For merit... against reservation!

675
00:42:30,587 --> 00:42:31,679
- Shut up!

676
00:42:32,121 --> 00:42:33,356
Shut up!

677
00:42:33,356 --> 00:42:34,482
Shut up!

678
00:42:38,228 --> 00:42:39,991
It's okay, officer. You may leave.

679
00:42:40,029 --> 00:42:40,961
Thank you very much.

680
00:42:41,364 --> 00:42:42,456
Bring our students in.

681
00:42:43,399 --> 00:42:44,058
Come on in.

682
00:42:45,134 --> 00:42:45,691
Get inside!

683
00:42:51,274 --> 00:42:54,437
Everyone!
Gather at the assembly...

684
00:42:54,978 --> 00:42:55,376
now!

685
00:43:03,453 --> 00:43:04,545
Who called the police?

686
00:43:08,291 --> 00:43:09,383
Who called the police?

687
00:43:10,093 --> 00:43:13,930
The manner in which
a riot was breaking out, i...

688
00:43:13,930 --> 00:43:16,398
we have never needed to
call the police in this college.

689
00:43:17,000 --> 00:43:20,094
And, without my permission
you will never do so again.

690
00:43:20,136 --> 00:43:20,536
The situation was...

691
00:43:20,536 --> 00:43:21,400
never!

692
00:43:21,571 --> 00:43:22,697
Never again!

693
00:43:23,239 --> 00:43:24,035
Am i understood?

694
00:43:25,742 --> 00:43:27,039
Yes... sir.

695
00:43:30,613 --> 00:43:35,277
I will never tolerate
anyone who breaks discipline.

696
00:43:37,186 --> 00:43:42,647
I want the names of all those students
who were at the gate.

697
00:43:42,759 --> 00:43:44,659
You will never do this again!

698
00:43:45,662 --> 00:43:48,597
Today you have brought disrepute
to this institution.

699
00:43:51,100 --> 00:43:51,657
Sushant seth...

700
00:43:53,436 --> 00:43:54,130
deepak kumar.

701
00:43:55,571 --> 00:43:59,007
Your irresponsible conduct
has shamed this college.

702
00:43:59,042 --> 00:43:59,667
Sir, the fault is theirs.

703
00:43:59,709 --> 00:44:02,109
Just a minute.
Listen to me!

704
00:44:02,178 --> 00:44:02,974
Sir, i...

705
00:44:03,112 --> 00:44:04,511
listen... listen to me!

706
00:44:04,714 --> 00:44:05,703
And listen carefully.

707
00:44:08,685 --> 00:44:11,483
This is my last warning to you...
and to those with you.

708
00:44:12,422 --> 00:44:15,414
I will not tolerate this hooliganism!

709
00:44:16,559 --> 00:44:19,392
I won't hesitate to
expel you two from this college.

710
00:44:37,880 --> 00:44:38,471
What is this?

711
00:44:39,515 --> 00:44:40,641
Tickets for yoga classes.

712
00:44:42,385 --> 00:44:43,374
I'm busy.

713
00:44:44,320 --> 00:44:45,548
But, it's an evening show.

714
00:44:45,955 --> 00:44:46,478
Please...

715
00:44:54,063 --> 00:44:55,496
can't you forget what happened?

716
00:44:58,901 --> 00:44:59,333
It's a 1000-year old story, poorbi.

717
00:45:01,304 --> 00:45:03,431
Repeated everyday - a million times!

718
00:45:04,440 --> 00:45:06,704
Even if i want to,
i'm not allowed to forget.

719
00:45:14,650 --> 00:45:16,584
Hey! An email from cornell!

720
00:45:17,620 --> 00:45:19,144
Your paper's been accepted!

721
00:45:20,023 --> 00:45:21,183
You're going to america!

722
00:45:22,658 --> 00:45:23,682
Congratulations.

723
00:45:26,062 --> 00:45:26,289
Thanks.

724
00:45:28,097 --> 00:45:30,588
Don't we even have the
freedom to celebrate openly?

725
00:45:31,100 --> 00:45:32,465
Shame on us!

726
00:45:33,369 --> 00:45:35,200
It's shameful that sushant was let off!

727
00:45:35,338 --> 00:45:36,566
But we won't tolerate it anymore...

728
00:45:36,606 --> 00:45:37,373
no matter who it is.

729
00:45:37,373 --> 00:45:38,067
Shut up!

730
00:45:38,674 --> 00:45:40,505
What are you
crying revolution now for?

731
00:45:41,277 --> 00:45:43,006
The supreme court
has already created history.

732
00:45:43,179 --> 00:45:45,948
No matter how much the
upper castes jump and dance now...

733
00:45:45,948 --> 00:45:48,075
no one can erase the stamp of 27%!

734
00:45:48,384 --> 00:45:49,316
It's sealed now!

735
00:45:50,219 --> 00:45:52,278
They'll know tomorrow morning.
Just watch!

736
00:46:01,397 --> 00:46:04,059
Reservation is our birthright!

737
00:46:04,233 --> 00:46:05,291
Oh god!

738
00:46:05,701 --> 00:46:06,725
Who has done this?

739
00:46:08,137 --> 00:46:09,069
Who has written this?

740
00:46:09,739 --> 00:46:10,603
Who has written this?!

741
00:46:11,507 --> 00:46:13,236
If you have the guts, step forward!

742
00:46:16,512 --> 00:46:18,036
These people will never get it.

743
00:46:18,781 --> 00:46:21,648
They're like cowardly snakes...
strike and scurry back into the burrow.

744
00:46:22,985 --> 00:46:24,384
Something will have to be done
about them.

745
00:46:24,987 --> 00:46:26,386
Whoever has done this,
it's not right.

746
00:46:27,690 --> 00:46:29,749
Chhotu, get me a bucket of water.

747
00:46:29,992 --> 00:46:31,721
Where's the need to erase this,
mr. Deepak kumar?

748
00:46:32,061 --> 00:46:33,153
Just tweak it a little bit.

749
00:46:33,629 --> 00:46:35,620
Instead of 'reservation', write 'charity'.

750
00:46:36,466 --> 00:46:37,763
'Charity is our birthright.'

751
00:46:38,434 --> 00:46:41,665
For 60 years, we've suffered the scheduled
caste and scheduled tribe reservation.

752
00:46:42,338 --> 00:46:44,363
And now, the other backward castes!

753
00:46:45,575 --> 00:46:48,567
Our children slog throughout the year...

754
00:46:49,312 --> 00:46:52,213
but when it comes to admissions,
you just rake in the loot!

755
00:46:53,716 --> 00:46:55,343
Scared of working hard, aren't you?

756
00:46:55,818 --> 00:46:56,341
Really?!

757
00:46:58,321 --> 00:46:59,652
You'll teach us hard work, will you?

758
00:47:01,023 --> 00:47:02,513
What else have we done until now?

759
00:47:03,493 --> 00:47:05,484
If you've forgotten,
go read your history again.

760
00:47:05,695 --> 00:47:07,424
Then you'll know who slogged...

761
00:47:07,530 --> 00:47:09,395
and who looted it
like it was their birthright.

762
00:47:09,665 --> 00:47:12,668
For centuries you people
filled up your coffers with handouts...

763
00:47:12,668 --> 00:47:14,533
and you accuse us of living on charity?

764
00:47:15,037 --> 00:47:16,197
We ploughed your fields...

765
00:47:16,772 --> 00:47:19,434
we reaped your corn,
grazed your cattle...

766
00:47:20,543 --> 00:47:22,670
we carried your daughters
and wives' palanquins...

767
00:47:24,213 --> 00:47:25,407
we cremated your corpses...

768
00:47:25,581 --> 00:47:27,446
stitched your shoes,
drove your oxen, rowed your boats...

769
00:47:27,483 --> 00:47:29,352
cleaned your filthy drains...

770
00:47:29,352 --> 00:47:31,252
and we even carried your shit on our heads.

771
00:47:31,320 --> 00:47:32,514
And you're going to teach us hard work?

772
00:47:32,622 --> 00:47:35,113
You're absolutely right.
That's all that you're good for!

773
00:47:35,358 --> 00:47:36,586
That is all you're worth.

774
00:47:36,859 --> 00:47:38,121
And you deserve to be like that.

775
00:47:38,494 --> 00:47:40,655
Here, we're talking about
building our nations' future.

776
00:47:41,330 --> 00:47:43,457
And only the deserving will get a position.

777
00:47:43,633 --> 00:47:46,261
But you guys want
everything free of cost.

778
00:47:46,736 --> 00:47:49,296
The truth is that you are
scared of competition.

779
00:47:50,506 --> 00:47:52,064
Which competition are you talking about?

780
00:47:53,242 --> 00:47:55,233
The one that you
never let us participate in?

781
00:47:55,678 --> 00:47:57,771
The door of every school
was closed for us.

782
00:47:58,481 --> 00:48:01,851
And, if we got in somehow,
we were relegated to the back benches.

783
00:48:01,851 --> 00:48:04,654
You controlled all the schools...
the hospitals... police stations...

784
00:48:04,654 --> 00:48:06,451
every support system belonged to you!

785
00:48:09,358 --> 00:48:11,656
Do you know why you
never let us compete?

786
00:48:12,728 --> 00:48:16,095
Because you were afraid of
a level competition... not us.

787
00:48:16,432 --> 00:48:18,559
Don't use history to
hide your weaknesses.

788
00:48:19,502 --> 00:48:21,766
Nothing of this sort happens
in our generation.

789
00:48:22,405 --> 00:48:24,873
If you have the guts,
accept the challenge and fight.

790
00:48:25,374 --> 00:48:28,275
But you won't do that.
Because, for that you need merit -

791
00:48:28,311 --> 00:48:29,744
which you clearly don't have!

792
00:48:30,446 --> 00:48:32,311
We're ready to compete with you on merit.

793
00:48:33,115 --> 00:48:36,107
But the starting line for the race
should be the same for everyone.

794
00:48:36,552 --> 00:48:40,750
First, tell your pop to vacate
his ancestral mansion and live in our slums.

795
00:48:40,923 --> 00:48:45,261
Ask him to wear a company uniform
and go to work as a driver, a doorman or a cleaner.

796
00:48:45,261 --> 00:48:48,389
Tell your mother to leave
her air-conditioned house and...

797
00:48:48,731 --> 00:48:51,325
accompany our mothers
to clean other people's homes.

798
00:48:51,801 --> 00:48:54,136
Tell your sister that, as soon as
she wakes up every morning...

799
00:48:54,136 --> 00:48:57,731
to fetch water from the municipal tap in
the neighbourhood.

800
00:48:58,741 --> 00:49:02,142
Come with us! Sample our lives.
And then lecture us!

801
00:49:02,945 --> 00:49:04,708
We will compete with you on merit too.

802
00:49:05,281 --> 00:49:06,714
But until you do all that...

803
00:49:07,483 --> 00:49:09,417
keep your ridiculous hogwash to yourself!

804
00:49:30,906 --> 00:49:34,239
In spite of the severe
last warning yesterday...

805
00:49:35,344 --> 00:49:37,437
you were misbehaving again toay.

806
00:49:39,115 --> 00:49:43,518
It's obvious that you don't respect
the code of conduct of this college.

807
00:49:44,420 --> 00:49:48,652
Sushant seth, for your unruly conduct...

808
00:49:49,525 --> 00:49:50,924
i hereby rusticate you from s.t.m.

809
00:49:51,427 --> 00:49:52,519
Sir, you can't do this!

810
00:49:53,629 --> 00:49:55,392
I haven't misbehaved in any way.

811
00:49:56,098 --> 00:49:58,434
In fact, yesterday
i was just trying to stop them.

812
00:49:58,434 --> 00:49:59,594
And i was doing the same, today.

813
00:50:01,304 --> 00:50:03,306
They create a ruckus,
damage college property...

814
00:50:03,306 --> 00:50:04,295
they abuse us...

815
00:50:04,573 --> 00:50:06,598
they openly destroy s.t.m.'s reputation...

816
00:50:07,643 --> 00:50:09,235
i will not be a mute spectator in all this!

817
00:50:09,645 --> 00:50:12,671
And, since when have you been appointed
the security chief and moral guardian here?

818
00:50:13,683 --> 00:50:15,951
If you had any complaint,
why didn't you come to me?

819
00:50:15,951 --> 00:50:17,077
That would have made no difference, sir.

820
00:50:17,553 --> 00:50:20,215
You would never have taken
any action against deepak kumar.

821
00:50:20,256 --> 00:50:21,086
Everyone knows that!

822
00:50:24,193 --> 00:50:24,591
What?!

823
00:50:26,095 --> 00:50:26,959
Out!

824
00:50:27,430 --> 00:50:28,124
Get out of here!

825
00:50:28,497 --> 00:50:29,054
Now!!

826
00:50:32,668 --> 00:50:36,968
Sir, even you are supporting
those people who are ruining our lives.

827
00:50:44,680 --> 00:50:45,738
Sushant, what?

828
00:50:46,182 --> 00:50:47,376
Sushant, what happened?

829
00:50:47,483 --> 00:50:48,575
Get lost!

830
00:50:51,087 --> 00:50:55,224
Sir, i had no intention of getting
into an argument with anyone.

831
00:50:55,224 --> 00:50:57,658
Least of all with the vice principal.

832
00:50:58,561 --> 00:50:59,729
But, given the kind of remarks
that were made there...

833
00:50:59,729 --> 00:51:03,130
it became impossible for me to remain silent.

834
00:51:03,733 --> 00:51:06,224
Can i know what your compulsion was?

835
00:51:06,736 --> 00:51:07,998
My identity, sir.

836
00:51:08,437 --> 00:51:12,373
Sushant and mithileshji were
repeatedly insulting our caste... our people...

837
00:51:13,175 --> 00:51:14,073
your people?!

838
00:51:16,579 --> 00:51:20,015
Since when did you begin speaking
this language of caste politics?

839
00:51:20,349 --> 00:51:21,817
You are a teacher...

840
00:51:21,817 --> 00:51:23,444
who should be above such things.

841
00:51:23,619 --> 00:51:25,553
It's easy for you to say that, sir.

842
00:51:26,088 --> 00:51:28,249
But, my birth leaves me no choice.

843
00:51:29,225 --> 00:51:31,352
For centuries,
we have endured abuses and insults.

844
00:51:32,495 --> 00:51:34,554
Now, we will not tolerate it anymore, sir!

845
00:51:35,164 --> 00:51:37,496
It is incredible that a
teacher is using such language.

846
00:51:38,768 --> 00:51:41,203
You're repeatedly violating
the discipline of s.t. M... .

847
00:51:41,203 --> 00:51:42,101
Discipline?

848
00:51:43,105 --> 00:51:46,165
Sir, our entire society is
struggling with a historic upheaval outside...

849
00:51:46,275 --> 00:51:47,833
and all you can think of is discipline?!

850
00:51:50,045 --> 00:51:52,513
You will not speak to me like this!

851
00:51:55,151 --> 00:51:55,674
Alright, sir.

852
00:51:57,787 --> 00:51:59,618
But, just answer one question of mine.

853
00:51:59,789 --> 00:52:04,055
What is your stand on
the supreme court's verdict?

854
00:52:04,460 --> 00:52:05,561
I haven't called you here to debate...

855
00:52:05,561 --> 00:52:08,325
sir, you can't ignore
this question anymore.

856
00:52:09,298 --> 00:52:12,665
If you're not for reservation,
then you're against it.

857
00:52:13,235 --> 00:52:15,396
There is no safe middle ground left.

858
00:52:16,705 --> 00:52:18,138
What is your position?

859
00:52:19,408 --> 00:52:23,276
I do not have to explain
my position to you.

860
00:52:24,447 --> 00:52:27,149
And for this misconduct,
i will take disciplinary...

861
00:52:27,149 --> 00:52:29,515
what else can i expect
from a place like this, sir?

862
00:52:30,553 --> 00:52:32,487
Here, i will be punished for telling the truth.

863
00:52:33,355 --> 00:52:34,723
But, no action will be taken against those...

864
00:52:34,723 --> 00:52:37,214
who flagrantly violate the rules of s.t. M!

865
00:52:37,827 --> 00:52:38,555
Look.

866
00:52:40,296 --> 00:52:41,194
Your vice principal.

867
00:52:42,198 --> 00:52:43,859
He openly runs k.k. Coaching classes.

868
00:52:45,100 --> 00:52:47,330
He earns millions
but all his sins are forgiven, sir.

869
00:52:48,370 --> 00:52:49,837
After all, his identity is different from mine!

870
00:52:52,208 --> 00:52:56,577
Are you making an allegation
of casteism against me?

871
00:52:57,813 --> 00:52:59,678
Are you trying to accuse me...

872
00:53:01,350 --> 00:53:02,908
of being a casteist?

873
00:53:08,657 --> 00:53:10,852
Thank you...

874
00:53:13,829 --> 00:53:16,127
for holding such an opinion of me.

875
00:53:17,800 --> 00:53:20,132
Thank you... very very much.

876
00:53:20,903 --> 00:53:22,131
Now you may leave.

877
00:53:23,739 --> 00:53:26,867
And, never try to come before me again.

878
00:53:28,143 --> 00:53:28,700
Ever!

879
00:53:30,346 --> 00:53:30,744
So...

880
00:53:32,381 --> 00:53:32,847
leave.

881
00:53:35,518 --> 00:53:36,246
Leave!

882
00:54:29,034 --> 00:54:30,058
Why aren't you answering my calls?

883
00:54:39,578 --> 00:54:41,705
You'll have to apologise to my dad!

884
00:54:42,848 --> 00:54:45,043
Have you come here in
this rain only to tell me this?

885
00:54:45,784 --> 00:54:47,183
Who the hell do you think you are?

886
00:54:47,819 --> 00:54:49,684
How dare you talk to my dad like that?

887
00:54:50,889 --> 00:54:53,687
I will not tolerate anyone hurting my dad.

888
00:54:54,293 --> 00:54:55,760
Even if it is you!

889
00:54:57,929 --> 00:54:58,725
Do you know what it means to be hurt?

890
00:55:00,966 --> 00:55:02,092
Or, do you follow the same system:

891
00:55:03,001 --> 00:55:03,899
First inflict hurt.

892
00:55:04,703 --> 00:55:06,261
And, then get the victim to apologise?

893
00:55:07,339 --> 00:55:09,136
I can't believe that you are talking like this.

894
00:55:10,242 --> 00:55:13,109
Deepak kumar, whatever
you are today is because of my dad.

895
00:55:13,245 --> 00:55:14,371
You owe everything to him!

896
00:55:16,682 --> 00:55:17,410
That's true.

897
00:55:18,750 --> 00:55:20,047
I am who i am because of him.

898
00:55:21,186 --> 00:55:23,746
And no matter what i do,
i can never repay him.

899
00:55:26,258 --> 00:55:29,193
But, today i realized
what a great burden that is.

900
00:55:31,697 --> 00:55:35,360
So, whatever my dad did for
you has now become a burden?!

901
00:55:36,768 --> 00:55:40,172
Have you forgotten those years when he
stayed up full nights preparing you for your exams?

902
00:55:40,172 --> 00:55:41,696
I haven't forgotten anything.

903
00:55:42,774 --> 00:55:44,799
But, i feel that he does all that as charity.

904
00:55:45,911 --> 00:55:48,141
And charity can't bring real change in society.

905
00:55:49,381 --> 00:55:50,643
Poorbi...

906
00:55:51,083 --> 00:55:55,315
by giving a blanket to a poor man,
you might remove the poverty that is inside you.

907
00:55:56,455 --> 00:55:57,353
But, not his.

908
00:55:58,824 --> 00:56:02,021
I haven't come here
to listen to your arguments.

909
00:56:03,095 --> 00:56:04,960
Will you apologise to my dad or not?

910
00:56:09,234 --> 00:56:10,258
I'm asking you...

911
00:56:12,037 --> 00:56:13,265
will you apologise or not?

912
00:56:17,743 --> 00:56:18,368
Fine.

913
00:56:20,412 --> 00:56:21,936
Then, understand this clearly.

914
00:56:23,782 --> 00:56:25,010
I never want to see you again.

915
00:56:29,121 --> 00:56:30,281
Ever.

916
00:56:36,695 --> 00:56:39,323
Oh beautiful life

917
00:56:39,865 --> 00:56:42,163
oh beautiful life

918
00:56:42,501 --> 00:56:45,231
oh beautiful life

919
00:56:45,804 --> 00:56:47,704
oh beautiful life

920
00:56:59,484 --> 00:57:06,253
which cord do you lean on,
which cord do you sever

921
00:57:09,728 --> 00:57:15,064
this beautiful life says
why do you share me

922
00:57:18,737 --> 00:57:24,835
which cord do you lean on,
which cord do you sever

923
00:58:04,216 --> 00:58:08,550
we sowed crops with lot of effort

924
00:58:09,888 --> 00:58:13,449
we picked the best seeds of the lot

925
00:58:15,427 --> 00:58:20,797
watered the soil with a lot of care

926
00:58:21,933 --> 00:58:26,427
and that's when the sprouts smiled

927
00:58:28,240 --> 00:58:33,439
fate can very cruel

928
00:58:34,012 --> 00:58:39,211
fate can very cruel

929
00:58:39,885 --> 00:58:43,582
but who can scold it

930
00:58:45,824 --> 00:58:49,988
but who can scold it

931
00:58:52,931 --> 00:58:58,130
which cord do you lean on,
which cord do you sever

932
00:58:59,304 --> 00:59:03,240
oh beautiful life

933
00:59:03,275 --> 00:59:06,039
oh beautiful life

934
00:59:06,144 --> 00:59:09,281
oh beautiful life

935
00:59:09,281 --> 00:59:11,511
oh beautiful life

936
00:59:30,669 --> 00:59:36,039
the mind seems lost in the wilderness

937
00:59:36,508 --> 00:59:40,877
leaves scattered all around

938
00:59:42,447 --> 00:59:47,544
the river is lashing against its banks

939
00:59:48,987 --> 00:59:52,445
the heart awakens from its slumber

940
00:59:54,593 --> 00:59:59,155
storms may come and go

941
01:00:00,565 --> 01:00:05,400
storms may come and go

942
01:00:06,338 --> 01:00:10,274
silence alone is eternal

943
01:00:12,477 --> 01:00:15,913
silence alone is eternal

944
01:00:19,517 --> 01:00:23,681
which cord do you lean on,
which cord do you sever...

945
01:00:27,025 --> 01:00:31,928
oh beautiful life

946
01:00:33,031 --> 01:00:35,022
oh beautiful life

947
01:00:35,734 --> 01:00:37,725
oh beautiful life

948
01:01:00,058 --> 01:01:00,786
namaste sir.

949
01:01:03,161 --> 01:01:04,719
Good morning, sir.

950
01:01:13,505 --> 01:01:14,272
Whose class is this?

951
01:01:14,272 --> 01:01:15,762
Sir, the vice principal's.

952
01:01:18,977 --> 01:01:21,036
He must be on his way.
You people read your notes until then.

953
01:01:21,112 --> 01:01:22,010
He won't come, sir.

954
01:01:23,281 --> 01:01:24,771
Sir, he rarely comes to class.

955
01:01:25,116 --> 01:01:26,981
For the last three weeks,
not even once.

956
01:01:46,071 --> 01:01:46,871
Excuse me...

957
01:01:46,871 --> 01:01:47,303
yes, sir?

958
01:01:47,338 --> 01:01:48,473
Where can i find mithilesh singh?

959
01:01:48,473 --> 01:01:49,774
Sir, in the classroom...

960
01:01:49,774 --> 01:01:50,069
there?

961
01:01:50,108 --> 01:01:50,574
Yes, sir.

962
01:01:54,779 --> 01:02:02,185
...by 12 n is equal to 416.6 mn.

963
01:02:02,253 --> 01:02:03,117
Right?

964
01:02:06,991 --> 01:02:09,084
Please look up the
answer in your 'guess' paper.

965
01:02:12,063 --> 01:02:15,829
Sir, it's actually my brother's class...
but he is ill, you see...

966
01:02:15,967 --> 01:02:20,461
i was only... tr... trying to help...

967
01:02:23,041 --> 01:02:24,175
you can ask the students.

968
01:02:24,175 --> 01:02:25,233
Please report at the college.

969
01:02:26,511 --> 01:02:27,535
And come to the principal's office.

970
01:02:28,246 --> 01:02:28,905
Sir, you...

971
01:02:28,947 --> 01:02:31,177
come to the principal's office.

972
01:02:37,255 --> 01:02:40,315
Prabhakar, please think
calmly before you take any action.

973
01:02:45,630 --> 01:02:48,292
In brazen violation
of the rules of this college...

974
01:02:49,267 --> 01:02:53,499
you are running a commercial
coaching institute, mithilesh singh.

975
01:02:54,305 --> 01:02:57,240
You're the victim of a misunderstanding, sir.

976
01:02:57,275 --> 01:03:02,338
First of all, k.k. Coaching
which you visited this morning...

977
01:03:02,547 --> 01:03:03,878
doesn't belong to me.

978
01:03:04,282 --> 01:03:05,408
It belongs to my cousin...

979
01:03:06,217 --> 01:03:07,081
krishna kumar...

980
01:03:07,652 --> 01:03:09,017
k. K.

981
01:03:09,888 --> 01:03:10,877
And, second...

982
01:03:11,856 --> 01:03:14,484
even you run a coaching
class in your back verandah.

983
01:03:15,994 --> 01:03:17,894
People like you won't
understand the difference.

984
01:03:18,963 --> 01:03:21,900
I run classes in my verandah because...

985
01:03:21,900 --> 01:03:26,496
in our college, we are unable
to offer special help to our weak students.

986
01:03:26,538 --> 01:03:27,664
Whereas teachers like you...

987
01:03:28,506 --> 01:03:29,996
deliberately miss lectures and thereby...

988
01:03:30,575 --> 01:03:35,512
force students to take private
commercial coaching for your profit.

989
01:03:36,981 --> 01:03:39,313
And that, mr. Mithilesh singh,
is the difference!

990
01:03:41,286 --> 01:03:44,881
I work for the college.
Whereas you...

991
01:03:45,256 --> 01:03:46,587
work against it.

992
01:03:52,063 --> 01:03:53,360
You are being served
with a 'show-cause' notice.

993
01:03:54,666 --> 01:03:57,260
In seven days, explain why you
shouldn't be suspended from the college.

994
01:03:57,402 --> 01:03:57,936
Prabhakar...

995
01:03:57,936 --> 01:03:58,402
seven days!

996
01:03:59,637 --> 01:04:00,626
In seven days, i want an answer.

997
01:04:05,009 --> 01:04:06,340
You will get your answer.

998
01:04:10,014 --> 01:04:10,946
Most certainly.

999
01:04:12,483 --> 01:04:16,010
Dr. Prabhakar anand... sir.

1000
01:04:23,094 --> 01:04:24,652
Prabhakar, what are you doing?

1001
01:04:26,331 --> 01:04:28,322
That, which your board
hasn't for the last 11 years.

1002
01:04:29,200 --> 01:04:31,725
If you people had approved
my proposal for remedial classes...

1003
01:04:32,403 --> 01:04:37,175
and had organized free
coaching for our weaker students...

1004
01:04:37,175 --> 01:04:39,109
we wouldn't have had
monsters like k.k. Coaching!

1005
01:04:40,578 --> 01:04:44,708
You're well aware of how these people
are swallowing up our entire education system.

1006
01:04:44,949 --> 01:04:47,713
But, what you propose is
not feasible either, prabhakar.

1007
01:04:48,219 --> 01:04:49,345
And, you know it.

1008
01:04:50,421 --> 01:04:53,982
Morever, s.t.m. Is a private college.
Why, even the government doesn't do that!

1009
01:04:54,492 --> 01:04:55,584
Then why doesn't it?!

1010
01:04:56,394 --> 01:05:00,728
Why isn't it investing most
on its most valuable asset... education?

1011
01:05:02,200 --> 01:05:04,302
In this country, we make the
i.a.s., indian foreign service...

1012
01:05:04,302 --> 01:05:08,705
medical, management, engineering
and every such career so attractive!

1013
01:05:08,773 --> 01:05:12,072
But, that which prepares
students for all these, is totally neglected!

1014
01:05:12,644 --> 01:05:14,312
Like i.f. S and i.a. S...

1015
01:05:14,312 --> 01:05:17,645
why don't we have an
i.t.s. - Indian teaching services...

1016
01:05:17,749 --> 01:05:19,341
to attract the best talent for the job!

1017
01:05:21,619 --> 01:05:26,079
Aniruddha, this parallel education system...

1018
01:05:27,292 --> 01:05:31,319
which thrives on capitation
and private coaching...

1019
01:05:31,729 --> 01:05:32,718
will destroy everything!

1020
01:05:45,643 --> 01:05:50,214
Sir, first you rusticated sushant seth,
and now vice principal mithilesh singh.

1021
01:05:50,214 --> 01:05:51,772
He has alleged that you...

1022
01:05:55,119 --> 01:05:57,713
dad, mithilesh sir had
called a press conference...

1023
01:05:58,156 --> 01:05:59,953
where he said some
very nasty things against you.

1024
01:05:59,991 --> 01:06:03,051
I think that is why the editor
of dainik bhaskar, arvind kamal is here.

1025
01:06:03,594 --> 01:06:04,253
He's inside.

1026
01:06:05,163 --> 01:06:08,326
Your vice principal mithilesh singh
has accused you of being autocratic.

1027
01:06:09,200 --> 01:06:12,135
And alleged that when he opposed this,
you suspended him.

1028
01:06:12,236 --> 01:06:13,037
He's lying!

1029
01:06:13,037 --> 01:06:14,061
Please, my dear...

1030
01:06:17,375 --> 01:06:18,740
i haven't suspended him yet.

1031
01:06:20,178 --> 01:06:22,874
For regularly breaking the college's rules,
i've issued him a show-cause notice.

1032
01:06:23,281 --> 01:06:24,578
Which rules has he broken?

1033
01:06:26,250 --> 01:06:31,779
Mr. Arvind kamal, i don't consider it appropriate
to explain my disciplinary actions...

1034
01:06:32,256 --> 01:06:34,121
through a newspaper.

1035
01:06:35,126 --> 01:06:36,821
But, his allegation is
very serious, prabhakar sir.

1036
01:06:37,195 --> 01:06:40,062
S.t.m. Is a private college
where the rule of reservation doesn't apply.

1037
01:06:41,299 --> 01:06:42,596
But, according to him...

1038
01:06:42,900 --> 01:06:44,697
your admission policy is doing precisely that.

1039
01:06:45,703 --> 01:06:48,001
You declare a high cut-off percentage but...

1040
01:06:48,206 --> 01:06:50,834
admit backward caste
students through the backdoor, so to say.

1041
01:06:51,342 --> 01:06:52,274
See, i am a teacher.

1042
01:06:53,644 --> 01:06:56,238
My responsibility
towards each child is the same.

1043
01:06:57,215 --> 01:07:02,320
Proud as i am of my
successful and privileged students...

1044
01:07:02,320 --> 01:07:03,621
i am equally concerned
about the weaker and...

1045
01:07:03,621 --> 01:07:05,885
poor students of our society.

1046
01:07:07,158 --> 01:07:11,959
Two indias co-exist in our country...

1047
01:07:12,830 --> 01:07:14,024
mr. Arvind kamal.

1048
01:07:15,333 --> 01:07:18,427
And, if we want our country
to genuinely progress, then...

1049
01:07:18,903 --> 01:07:21,667
we shall have to eliminate
the gap between the two.

1050
01:07:22,006 --> 01:07:24,770
But, is caste-based
reservation the only way to do so?

1051
01:07:25,376 --> 01:07:28,046
Well, if we believe that,
for centuries...

1052
01:07:28,046 --> 01:07:29,847
injustice has been caused because
of caste-discrimination...

1053
01:07:29,847 --> 01:07:32,816
then justice should also
be served bearing caste in mind.

1054
01:07:33,151 --> 01:07:36,211
But what about those children
who have never believed in casteism?

1055
01:07:36,421 --> 01:07:38,787
Who have achieved good
results through hard work?

1056
01:07:39,690 --> 01:07:43,126
But, who now may not get admission
because of this new reservation policy!

1057
01:07:47,165 --> 01:07:48,860
Today, every teacher, every college...

1058
01:07:49,400 --> 01:07:51,891
as well as the
government is facing a big challenge.

1059
01:07:53,037 --> 01:07:56,040
On the one hand, they have
to give due opportunities to the...

1060
01:07:56,040 --> 01:07:58,372
backward castes,
and encourage their talent.

1061
01:07:59,143 --> 01:08:02,271
But, on the other hand, they have
to be sensitive to the plight of those students...

1062
01:08:03,014 --> 01:08:06,142
who feel they are at a
disadvantage in this new scenario.

1063
01:08:06,717 --> 01:08:09,311
It is evident that you support
the supreme court's ruling.

1064
01:08:11,722 --> 01:08:14,282
I cannot answer that question in the words...

1065
01:08:15,827 --> 01:08:18,193
that you expect me to!

1066
01:08:19,230 --> 01:08:20,331
However, i will say that if...

1067
01:08:20,331 --> 01:08:24,927
we accept this decision in all honesty,
without making a political issue of it...

1068
01:08:24,969 --> 01:08:26,231
then it will benefit our society.

1069
01:08:26,370 --> 01:08:28,304
So, would you want this
reservation policy to be implemented in...

1070
01:08:28,406 --> 01:08:30,966
private colleges and institutions as well?

1071
01:08:31,476 --> 01:08:32,340
Like s.t.m., for instance?

1072
01:08:34,712 --> 01:08:36,805
I don't have the right to comment on this.

1073
01:08:37,115 --> 01:08:37,740
Thank you.

1074
01:08:38,716 --> 01:08:41,276
Dad, don't you feel that
this reservation policy will prove harmful?

1075
01:08:43,387 --> 01:08:44,479
What're you trying to say?

1076
01:08:45,323 --> 01:08:47,450
You say that the backward castes
will get a chance to improve their lot...

1077
01:08:48,493 --> 01:08:49,926
that it'll reduce the gap between us...

1078
01:08:51,395 --> 01:08:52,327
it'll create equality...

1079
01:08:54,265 --> 01:08:55,892
but, the fact is that distances are increasing.

1080
01:08:57,301 --> 01:08:59,098
People are becoming
enemies of one another.

1081
01:09:02,273 --> 01:09:03,433
That is indeed unfortunate, my dear...

1082
01:09:04,108 --> 01:09:05,973
but it's bound to happen, i'm afraid.

1083
01:09:07,011 --> 01:09:09,070
Whenever change has
come about in a society...

1084
01:09:10,381 --> 01:09:12,212
a price has had to be paid for it.

1085
01:09:26,464 --> 01:09:28,898
How can you be
so sure that you are right?

1086
01:09:29,934 --> 01:09:32,402
What could be wrong about
providing equal opportunity to everyone?

1087
01:09:32,470 --> 01:09:33,368
It is wrong!

1088
01:09:34,238 --> 01:09:35,432
Your method is wrong.

1089
01:09:37,275 --> 01:09:37,866
Meaning?

1090
01:09:38,442 --> 01:09:40,774
If you really want the
backward castes to progress...

1091
01:09:41,145 --> 01:09:43,204
then give them the best
possible primary education.

1092
01:09:43,414 --> 01:09:44,916
Build special schools for them...

1093
01:09:44,916 --> 01:09:46,144
big hostels...

1094
01:09:46,184 --> 01:09:47,048
offer scholarships...

1095
01:09:47,385 --> 01:09:51,287
provide them every facility
and train them to compete!

1096
01:09:53,024 --> 01:09:54,821
Why have this... policy of reservation?!

1097
01:09:56,494 --> 01:09:59,429
What you're recommending
should be done in any case.

1098
01:10:00,097 --> 01:10:03,589
But, that is precisely what
we haven't done in 60 years.

1099
01:10:04,368 --> 01:10:05,995
Hence, reservation
becomes even more essential.

1100
01:10:07,838 --> 01:10:12,241
That section of our population,
which is backward simply because of their caste...

1101
01:10:12,843 --> 01:10:15,175
must surely be given a
small window of opportunity!

1102
01:10:15,313 --> 01:10:16,473
Look here, i'm a mother.

1103
01:10:17,181 --> 01:10:18,148
Not mother india!

1104
01:10:19,350 --> 01:10:22,217
So, first and foremost i will
be concerned about my own child.

1105
01:10:22,253 --> 01:10:23,379
That is my duty!

1106
01:10:23,821 --> 01:10:27,848
For me, if a rule threatens her future,
then it is just plain wrong.

1107
01:10:28,459 --> 01:10:29,016
That's it!

1108
01:10:35,062 --> 01:10:35,756
Is that so?

1109
01:10:36,397 --> 01:10:37,056
Thank you!

1110
01:10:40,334 --> 01:10:41,995
The ploy worked perfectly, mithilesh.

1111
01:10:42,870 --> 01:10:46,101
The principal made a
statement in support of reservation.

1112
01:10:47,341 --> 01:10:48,968
Now you just watch.

1113
01:10:49,710 --> 01:10:52,702
If he is not reduced to begging on the streets,
you can change my name!

1114
01:10:53,414 --> 01:10:57,451
But, i don't think you
should take this reservation policy lightly.

1115
01:10:57,451 --> 01:10:59,783
Baburam sir, it won't
make a jot of a difference.

1116
01:10:59,820 --> 01:11:03,586
When seats in the open category decrease,
competition will increase.

1117
01:11:03,924 --> 01:11:06,694
And, that is when people will turn
to coaching and private colleges.

1118
01:11:06,694 --> 01:11:09,686
This is 'shining' india!

1119
01:11:10,131 --> 01:11:11,365
Here people of high society...

1120
01:11:11,365 --> 01:11:12,466
are willing to pay any high cost...

1121
01:11:12,466 --> 01:11:14,058
for higher education!

1122
01:11:15,136 --> 01:11:17,331
Moreover, the reservation
rule may get these people admission.

1123
01:11:18,005 --> 01:11:22,908
But, to move ahead in that
too they'll need to spend big money!

1124
01:11:24,879 --> 01:11:26,369
Cheers!

1125
01:11:33,721 --> 01:11:34,119
What is this?

1126
01:11:34,155 --> 01:11:35,850
S.t.m. Should have reservation:
Dr. Prabhakar anand

1127
01:11:41,495 --> 01:11:42,393
those words aren't mine.

1128
01:11:43,397 --> 01:11:45,922
You mean you didn't say
that you support reservation?

1129
01:11:48,035 --> 01:11:53,174
As a teacher, i did express
my personal opinion. But s.t. M...

1130
01:11:53,174 --> 01:11:53,731
personal?!

1131
01:11:54,775 --> 01:11:58,575
Your opinions are personal
as long as you don't speak.

1132
01:11:59,080 --> 01:11:59,739
You're the voice of s.t.m.

1133
01:12:00,147 --> 01:12:04,379
Whatever you say will
be taken as s.t.m.'s policy!

1134
01:12:06,420 --> 01:12:08,411
You'll have to retract
this statement, prabhakar.

1135
01:12:09,423 --> 01:12:12,881
That you support reservation -
you'll have to withdraw that opinion.

1136
01:12:16,397 --> 01:12:18,957
I don't consider it necessary
to do any such thing, aniruddha.

1137
01:12:21,702 --> 01:12:22,964
Whatever i said...

1138
01:12:24,505 --> 01:12:26,097
has deep thought and my conviction.

1139
01:12:26,207 --> 01:12:27,674
You are misunderstanding this.

1140
01:12:28,042 --> 01:12:29,669
Oh, we've misunderstood him
alright all this while.

1141
01:12:30,177 --> 01:12:31,007
But tell him...

1142
01:12:31,445 --> 01:12:32,742
politics won't be allowed in this college.

1143
01:12:33,914 --> 01:12:35,814
I was thrown out of college, i kept quiet.

1144
01:12:36,517 --> 01:12:38,075
But this deceit won't be tolerated.

1145
01:12:40,821 --> 01:12:44,825
They'll cancel our seats
and insert a quota system here too.

1146
01:12:44,825 --> 01:12:47,995
I think we should speak
with prabhakarji once.

1147
01:12:47,995 --> 01:12:50,463
Chairman sir, what is left to be discussed?

1148
01:12:50,564 --> 01:12:53,467
Call for an emergency meeting of
the trust and get rid of this arrogant fellow!

1149
01:12:53,467 --> 01:12:54,058
We've had enough!

1150
01:12:54,101 --> 01:12:57,638
Damodarji, a big action like
this will impact s.t.m.'s reputation too.

1151
01:12:57,638 --> 01:12:59,740
Why can't you people
see that he is playing politics?

1152
01:12:59,740 --> 01:13:00,241
Damodarji...

1153
01:13:00,241 --> 01:13:03,644
listen, let me try to
speak with him one more time.

1154
01:13:03,644 --> 01:13:04,906
Yes, that'll be best.

1155
01:13:05,012 --> 01:13:05,671
Yes, sunny?

1156
01:13:09,850 --> 01:13:10,578
When did this happen?

1157
01:13:13,187 --> 01:13:15,178
Take care of your mother.
I'm coming across.

1158
01:13:46,454 --> 01:13:47,944
Not as a trustee today...

1159
01:13:50,191 --> 01:13:51,920
but i'm speaking as a friend.

1160
01:13:54,295 --> 01:13:57,321
Till date, i've never
insisted on anything with you.

1161
01:13:59,033 --> 01:13:59,465
But, today for once...

1162
01:14:01,168 --> 01:14:02,692
just for once, please do what i ask.

1163
01:14:04,672 --> 01:14:08,073
On monday, there's an
emergency meeting of trustees at 10 a.m.

1164
01:14:09,977 --> 01:14:12,673
I've drafted a brief
clarification on your behalf.

1165
01:14:14,982 --> 01:14:16,347
Please sign it.

1166
01:14:19,587 --> 01:14:20,485
Please!

1167
01:14:32,199 --> 01:14:35,436
Prabhakarji, this statement of yours
has put our college in a serious situation.

1168
01:14:35,436 --> 01:14:38,132
What is your agenda?
To support reservations?

1169
01:14:39,573 --> 01:14:42,565
The newspaper printed
that statement out of context.

1170
01:14:43,544 --> 01:14:46,604
The principal is retracting his statement.

1171
01:15:07,301 --> 01:15:09,201
It is my good fortune that
i had the opportunity to...

1172
01:15:11,438 --> 01:15:18,571
serve shakuntala thakral college
for 35 years.

1173
01:15:19,613 --> 01:15:20,807
However, it is clear now that...

1174
01:15:24,618 --> 01:15:26,210
your love...

1175
01:15:27,821 --> 01:15:29,118
and your trust...

1176
01:15:32,393 --> 01:15:34,418
is no longer available to me.

1177
01:15:36,697 --> 01:15:38,130
It is time for me to move on now.

1178
01:15:40,601 --> 01:15:44,662
Thank you and...

1179
01:15:47,474 --> 01:15:48,202
my best wishes.

1180
01:15:56,817 --> 01:15:57,545
Prabhakar...

1181
01:16:38,492 --> 01:16:40,551
the board has appointed
mithilesh singh as the principal, sir.

1182
01:16:41,695 --> 01:16:42,787
He will destroy everything, sir.

1183
01:16:44,698 --> 01:16:47,565
Sir! Please don't go.

1184
01:16:51,572 --> 01:16:52,664
Please come, mithileshji.

1185
01:16:54,908 --> 01:16:56,273
You've come at the right time.

1186
01:16:57,478 --> 01:17:01,710
I personally wanted to
welcome you to the principal's chair.

1187
01:17:02,916 --> 01:17:04,440
Thank you. Thank you.

1188
01:17:05,219 --> 01:17:09,349
But this chair's tenure has ended
with yours, dr. Prabhakar anand.

1189
01:17:10,858 --> 01:17:12,587
I'm calling for a new chair!

1190
01:17:13,761 --> 01:17:14,591
Sure... whatever.

1191
01:17:15,729 --> 01:17:18,465
I hope that you'll take
s.t.m. To even greater heights.

1192
01:17:18,465 --> 01:17:19,833
My best wishes are with you.

1193
01:17:19,833 --> 01:17:20,822
Certainly!

1194
01:17:21,368 --> 01:17:26,567
And it is also certain that
i'll never let it fall from those heights.

1195
01:18:44,479 --> 01:18:46,037
Neither of them is answering their phone.

1196
01:18:48,583 --> 01:18:51,313
We can'tjust suddenly ask
them to vacate the house.

1197
01:18:53,188 --> 01:18:55,588
But, surely they can arrange
an alternative in a week or so.

1198
01:19:00,262 --> 01:19:02,025
Dad, this is the street.

1199
01:19:02,998 --> 01:19:04,488
Look, there's shambhu's stable!

1200
01:19:10,839 --> 01:19:12,274
Greetings, guruji.

1201
01:19:12,274 --> 01:19:13,571
Yes, greetings...

1202
01:19:14,643 --> 01:19:16,133
guruji, what's the matter?
All this luggage?

1203
01:19:16,845 --> 01:19:21,043
Yes, we had to come to
our house all of a sudden... but...

1204
01:19:21,383 --> 01:19:24,284
that is your house! B 47.

1205
01:19:24,352 --> 01:19:28,379
But some people put up
these signboards last night.

1206
01:19:29,291 --> 01:19:30,280
I don't know...

1207
01:19:35,864 --> 01:19:37,065
sir, one minute, sir...

1208
01:19:37,065 --> 01:19:39,226
get away!

1209
01:19:43,271 --> 01:19:44,203
What's going on here?

1210
01:19:47,008 --> 01:19:48,407
K.k. Coaching in my house?!

1211
01:19:48,944 --> 01:19:49,638
How can you?

1212
01:19:50,145 --> 01:19:50,873
Get out of here right now!

1213
01:19:52,414 --> 01:19:53,346
C'mon, get out!

1214
01:19:56,017 --> 01:19:56,415
Hello...

1215
01:19:57,285 --> 01:19:59,150
sir, prabhakar uncle is here...

1216
01:19:59,654 --> 01:20:00,586
i'm coming.

1217
01:20:00,622 --> 01:20:01,554
Don't worry.

1218
01:20:03,325 --> 01:20:05,156
...and that is the centre of gravity.

1219
01:20:05,560 --> 01:20:06,288
Wow!

1220
01:20:07,262 --> 01:20:08,296
How could you people do this?

1221
01:20:08,296 --> 01:20:09,531
But, for two years you had...

1222
01:20:09,531 --> 01:20:10,899
where's your mother?

1223
01:20:10,899 --> 01:20:13,101
We've rented a place to live...

1224
01:20:13,101 --> 01:20:15,126
and started a coaching
centre in our house?! Great!

1225
01:20:16,505 --> 01:20:17,904
Aren't you students of s.t. M?

1226
01:20:18,540 --> 01:20:20,269
I want everybody out of here.
Everybody!

1227
01:20:20,909 --> 01:20:21,376
Uncle...

1228
01:20:21,376 --> 01:20:22,206
you just shut up!

1229
01:20:23,245 --> 01:20:25,907
You have perhaps
no idea what you've done!

1230
01:20:32,387 --> 01:20:33,183
Come...

1231
01:20:33,688 --> 01:20:34,916
what happened? This?

1232
01:20:40,662 --> 01:20:41,094
You??

1233
01:20:42,430 --> 01:20:44,022
You had better stay out of this house!

1234
01:20:44,432 --> 01:20:44,989
Me?

1235
01:20:46,601 --> 01:20:48,937
It is not me, but you
who will go out of the house.

1236
01:20:48,937 --> 01:20:51,531
See, these are my
business premises, dr. Prabhakar anand.

1237
01:20:51,573 --> 01:20:52,699
And you are creating a nuisance here.

1238
01:20:53,375 --> 01:20:56,044
You had said that we
could be here for two years.

1239
01:20:56,044 --> 01:20:58,308
Two years? What nonsense!!

1240
01:20:58,947 --> 01:21:02,178
In friendship, to offer you support
we gave you this house.

1241
01:21:03,118 --> 01:21:05,052
And you betrayed us!

1242
01:21:06,421 --> 01:21:07,718
Kamta and i...

1243
01:21:08,290 --> 01:21:10,492
fought against commercial coaching,
all our lives.

1244
01:21:10,492 --> 01:21:12,050
And here in my own
house you have k.k. Coaching?

1245
01:21:12,294 --> 01:21:13,352
So, what could i do?

1246
01:21:13,562 --> 01:21:15,757
He kept struggling with you...
but to what end?

1247
01:21:16,097 --> 01:21:17,689
Couldn't even build a house for himself.

1248
01:21:18,366 --> 01:21:21,392
You did give us shelter,
but we had no earnings.

1249
01:21:22,270 --> 01:21:26,575
Thank god for mithileshji
that he showed a way to my sons...

1250
01:21:26,575 --> 01:21:28,770
to earn a living and save...

1251
01:21:28,977 --> 01:21:31,446
so, do whatever you
wish to in your rented place?

1252
01:21:31,446 --> 01:21:32,208
Why are you using our house?

1253
01:21:32,247 --> 01:21:33,509
Enough! Enough!

1254
01:21:33,582 --> 01:21:35,709
Stop this family court drama.

1255
01:21:36,351 --> 01:21:37,682
Whoever wants to go wherever, please do.

1256
01:21:38,086 --> 01:21:39,986
For two years this place is ours.

1257
01:21:40,789 --> 01:21:43,622
So, please don't disturb k.k. Coaching classes.
Now, please...

1258
01:21:47,062 --> 01:21:50,190
will you show yourself out or...
should i help?

1259
01:21:52,434 --> 01:21:53,992
Don't you dare touch my dad.

1260
01:21:54,069 --> 01:21:54,728
Get away!

1261
01:21:55,003 --> 01:21:56,163
Let go!

1262
01:21:56,504 --> 01:21:58,267
You don't know who i am!

1263
01:22:00,408 --> 01:22:02,137
Even if you so much as touch our guruji...

1264
01:22:02,344 --> 01:22:03,011
shambhu...

1265
01:22:03,011 --> 01:22:03,568
no, guruji...

1266
01:22:03,812 --> 01:22:05,336
i'll finish them off!

1267
01:22:05,447 --> 01:22:06,141
Shambhu!

1268
01:22:07,582 --> 01:22:09,345
Who do you guys think you are?

1269
01:22:10,018 --> 01:22:11,349
You don't scare me!

1270
01:22:12,087 --> 01:22:16,421
Just that i do not believe in
and practice violence, does not mean that...

1271
01:22:20,228 --> 01:22:22,128
this house is ours,
and we won't leave.

1272
01:22:22,297 --> 01:22:22,626
Shambhu...

1273
01:22:23,732 --> 01:22:26,030
if you have the local
police station's number, then please...

1274
01:22:26,701 --> 01:22:28,100
yes...
please come soon.

1275
01:22:28,370 --> 01:22:29,394
B 47.

1276
01:22:29,738 --> 01:22:30,500
Okay.

1277
01:22:30,805 --> 01:22:32,272
Guruji, in fact i was calling them.

1278
01:22:32,307 --> 01:22:35,037
Station in-charge thakur is on his way.

1279
01:22:35,510 --> 01:22:37,205
Call anyone you want to
dr. Prabhakar anand.

1280
01:22:37,646 --> 01:22:38,840
You can't do a thing.

1281
01:22:41,149 --> 01:22:44,380
See mithileshji, we don't
want to fight with anyone.

1282
01:22:44,819 --> 01:22:46,377
We'll leave from here.

1283
01:22:47,489 --> 01:22:49,184
Yeah sure. You may happily leave.

1284
01:22:49,224 --> 01:22:50,851
But before that, let's just square up.

1285
01:22:51,059 --> 01:22:53,361
2.5 million for setting
up this centre overnight.

1286
01:22:53,361 --> 01:22:55,830
I transferred 186 students here...

1287
01:22:55,830 --> 01:22:58,628
their advance fee of 9.3 million...

1288
01:22:58,667 --> 01:23:02,370
how much is that? Yes, 11.8 million.
Just pay that.

1289
01:23:02,370 --> 01:23:04,395
When did we take
any money from you?

1290
01:23:05,807 --> 01:23:07,502
You've signed a contract!

1291
01:23:08,243 --> 01:23:10,177
K.k. Coaching is
perfect with all paperwork.

1292
01:23:14,783 --> 01:23:15,647
Inspector, this way, please.

1293
01:23:16,084 --> 01:23:18,075
There's a limit to misbehaviour.

1294
01:23:18,386 --> 01:23:19,853
This way please...

1295
01:23:20,088 --> 01:23:21,248
look here.

1296
01:23:23,892 --> 01:23:24,688
Principal sir?

1297
01:23:28,096 --> 01:23:29,859
Sir, i'm station in-charge shaktinath thakur...

1298
01:23:30,598 --> 01:23:31,656
you may not recognize me.

1299
01:23:31,800 --> 01:23:35,292
Elder brother of your student,
bhaktinath thakur. He's a police officer now.

1300
01:23:37,372 --> 01:23:38,464
See, inspector, this house is ours.

1301
01:23:40,241 --> 01:23:42,110
Today, when we came here to move-in...

1302
01:23:42,110 --> 01:23:44,408
we saw that these people
have started a coaching centre here.

1303
01:23:44,546 --> 01:23:45,103
Really?

1304
01:23:45,680 --> 01:23:46,748
People broke in?

1305
01:23:46,748 --> 01:23:48,340
Hey! See who these people are.

1306
01:23:48,483 --> 01:23:49,711
- Round them up.
- Yes, sir.

1307
01:23:50,452 --> 01:23:50,918
Come...

1308
01:23:51,353 --> 01:23:54,189
mithilesh-babu? You, here?

1309
01:23:54,189 --> 01:23:54,712
Sir...

1310
01:23:55,323 --> 01:23:56,654
my son goes to his coaching centre.

1311
01:23:57,292 --> 01:23:58,657
You're wasting your time, inspector.

1312
01:23:59,127 --> 01:24:00,428
Nobody broke into this house.

1313
01:24:00,428 --> 01:24:04,558
On his own, he gave it to
these kids to reside and run a business.

1314
01:24:05,567 --> 01:24:06,192
Is this true?

1315
01:24:07,202 --> 01:24:09,363
Yes... for two years.

1316
01:24:09,404 --> 01:24:10,438
They're lying!

1317
01:24:10,438 --> 01:24:11,700
We merely allowed them to stay here.

1318
01:24:11,806 --> 01:24:12,431
Just a minute...

1319
01:24:13,308 --> 01:24:13,637
sir...

1320
01:24:14,909 --> 01:24:17,901
who among these broke into your house?

1321
01:24:18,279 --> 01:24:20,747
Just name them and
i'll throw them out right now.

1322
01:24:22,384 --> 01:24:23,214
See, inspector...

1323
01:24:25,286 --> 01:24:29,723
to help my friend kamta prasad's sons,
i allowed them to stay here.

1324
01:24:30,158 --> 01:24:31,853
Not to set up a
coaching center with him.

1325
01:24:32,660 --> 01:24:35,720
Oh, so nobody forced their way in?

1326
01:24:36,831 --> 01:24:40,935
In that case, sir, it's a civil matter,
not a police case.

1327
01:24:40,935 --> 01:24:42,570
But this house is ours!

1328
01:24:42,570 --> 01:24:43,662
That's what i am trying to say, sir.

1329
01:24:44,439 --> 01:24:46,304
It has become an issue
of property and possession.

1330
01:24:47,242 --> 01:24:48,334
Hire a lawyer immediately.

1331
01:24:48,943 --> 01:24:53,782
Sir, senior advocate madan mohan pandey
is an ace in these matters.

1332
01:24:53,782 --> 01:24:56,683
Trust me, he is the right person
to deal with mithilesh singh.

1333
01:24:56,985 --> 01:24:59,476
I'll have a word with him.

1334
01:25:10,765 --> 01:25:12,434
You people settle down in the room.

1335
01:25:12,434 --> 01:25:13,696
I will go meet the lawyer.

1336
01:25:18,473 --> 01:25:22,811
Thank you very much, sir,
for seeing me at such short notice.

1337
01:25:22,811 --> 01:25:24,210
No, no, it's okay...

1338
01:25:25,346 --> 01:25:27,337
actually, i couldn't
understand clearly over the phone.

1339
01:25:27,782 --> 01:25:29,909
Did you sign any
agreement with those people?

1340
01:25:29,984 --> 01:25:30,712
No.

1341
01:25:31,352 --> 01:25:33,217
I didn't sign any agreement
for my house.

1342
01:25:34,222 --> 01:25:35,211
It's my friend's family.

1343
01:25:35,890 --> 01:25:37,323
I helped them since i trusted them.

1344
01:25:37,992 --> 01:25:41,758
But, they signed a
contract with mithilesh singh...

1345
01:25:41,963 --> 01:25:43,487
to run a coaching centre there.

1346
01:25:44,833 --> 01:25:46,323
Mithilesh singh - the k.k. Coaching person?

1347
01:25:47,235 --> 01:25:49,465
Both my sons studied at his coaching centre!

1348
01:25:50,371 --> 01:25:52,805
He is a very intelligent person.
Very sharp.

1349
01:25:53,541 --> 01:25:55,566
He never does anything foolish.

1350
01:25:56,644 --> 01:25:57,736
But, i know him personally.

1351
01:25:57,946 --> 01:25:58,970
We can talk with him.

1352
01:25:59,347 --> 01:26:00,939
But, what will we talk about?

1353
01:26:02,250 --> 01:26:05,344
Prabhakarji, i mean we
can work out a compromise.

1354
01:26:06,054 --> 01:26:08,389
Mr. Advocate, i haven't come here
to work out a compromise.

1355
01:26:08,389 --> 01:26:09,253
I want my house.

1356
01:26:10,058 --> 01:26:11,252
Of course, of course!

1357
01:26:11,860 --> 01:26:14,488
We can file a civil suit for eviction.

1358
01:26:15,697 --> 01:26:19,394
But, mr. Prabhakar, you know very well
how long the court's decision takes.

1359
01:26:19,434 --> 01:26:20,635
Could even take years.

1360
01:26:20,635 --> 01:26:21,533
And then, there are expenses.

1361
01:26:22,670 --> 01:26:24,272
Listen to me...

1362
01:26:24,272 --> 01:26:25,796
i'll arrange for a meeting with mithileshji.

1363
01:26:26,274 --> 01:26:27,571
I'll fix it for tomorrow itself.

1364
01:26:27,909 --> 01:26:31,367
You don't you worry.
He's a very reasonable man.

1365
01:26:35,383 --> 01:26:38,614
Thank you very much,
madan mohanji.

1366
01:26:55,170 --> 01:26:57,104
When else will we be of help, sir.

1367
01:26:57,505 --> 01:26:58,904
When we are here,
why should you live in a hotel?

1368
01:27:00,275 --> 01:27:01,476
Please bhabhiji [sister-in-law],
please pack your stuff.

1369
01:27:01,476 --> 01:27:02,610
You people will stay in my house.

1370
01:27:02,610 --> 01:27:04,237
Thank you, dinkar.

1371
01:27:04,579 --> 01:27:05,705
But it will cause inconvenience
to your family.

1372
01:27:06,080 --> 01:27:06,637
So what, sir?

1373
01:27:07,482 --> 01:27:09,074
Both my sons will sleep in the balcony.

1374
01:27:09,450 --> 01:27:10,644
We'll sleep in the drawing room.

1375
01:27:11,286 --> 01:27:12,116
The bedroom is yours.

1376
01:27:14,055 --> 01:27:15,089
It'll just be a couple of days.

1377
01:27:15,089 --> 01:27:16,522
We're filing a case tomorrow.

1378
01:27:18,593 --> 01:27:19,928
If you want to file a case...

1379
01:27:19,928 --> 01:27:21,486
my elder son abhishek
will come tomorrow morning.

1380
01:27:22,230 --> 01:27:23,561
He practices at the district court itself.

1381
01:27:23,998 --> 01:27:24,623
Yes... that...

1382
01:27:26,467 --> 01:27:28,332
that would be a great help.
Thank you.

1383
01:27:31,706 --> 01:27:33,071
This is a new case.

1384
01:27:35,510 --> 01:27:36,442
What's the urgency?

1385
01:27:36,945 --> 01:27:38,276
Sir, dr. Prabhakar anand's house has been...

1386
01:27:38,413 --> 01:27:40,347
your honour, it's about my house.

1387
01:27:40,748 --> 01:27:43,581
The defendants have occupied our house,
unauthorized and we're out on the streets.

1388
01:27:44,352 --> 01:27:45,216
I...

1389
01:27:45,253 --> 01:27:46,387
i'm an old man, your honour.

1390
01:27:46,387 --> 01:27:47,755
We need our house desperately.

1391
01:27:47,755 --> 01:27:50,121
Hence, eviction is very essential,
your honour.

1392
01:27:50,391 --> 01:27:52,450
Your honour, we would
like to be a party in this case.

1393
01:27:56,764 --> 01:27:57,287
You are?

1394
01:27:57,665 --> 01:27:59,534
I represent the bank.

1395
01:27:59,534 --> 01:28:02,628
The defendants are debtors of the bank
and that place is their business premise.

1396
01:28:03,037 --> 01:28:05,306
If they are removed from there,
their business will shut down...

1397
01:28:05,306 --> 01:28:07,342
and the bank won't be
able to recover its loan.

1398
01:28:07,342 --> 01:28:08,707
Sir, had you signed this?

1399
01:28:08,977 --> 01:28:09,306
Yes.

1400
01:28:09,444 --> 01:28:10,138
But...

1401
01:28:10,979 --> 01:28:11,980
i am a guarantor for their loan.

1402
01:28:11,980 --> 01:28:13,414
Doesn't concern the house.

1403
01:28:13,414 --> 01:28:14,176
It does now, dad.

1404
01:28:14,515 --> 01:28:16,983
They've linked your guarantee
to this case.

1405
01:28:17,619 --> 01:28:18,643
Why did you sign that?

1406
01:28:21,756 --> 01:28:22,347
Your honour...

1407
01:28:23,424 --> 01:28:25,415
i need some time to study this.

1408
01:28:25,793 --> 01:28:27,488
Please grant us a short date.

1409
01:28:31,766 --> 01:28:32,664
Fourth of may.

1410
01:28:33,101 --> 01:28:34,090
Thank you, your honour.

1411
01:28:41,876 --> 01:28:43,138
Excuse me, excuse me, sir...

1412
01:28:43,444 --> 01:28:44,433
how can you do this?

1413
01:28:44,946 --> 01:28:45,469
That house is ours.

1414
01:28:45,513 --> 01:28:47,215
How can the bank stop us
from living there?

1415
01:28:47,215 --> 01:28:50,585
Sir, based on your guarantee
we gave them a loan to start their business.

1416
01:28:50,585 --> 01:28:52,416
And now you yourself
want to stop their business?

1417
01:28:52,453 --> 01:28:53,454
You are too much!

1418
01:28:53,454 --> 01:28:55,547
I gave a guarantee.
I didn't mortgage my house!

1419
01:28:55,957 --> 01:28:57,515
Do you know what a guarantee means?

1420
01:28:58,026 --> 01:29:00,528
If they can't repay the loan,
you will have to pay it back.

1421
01:29:00,528 --> 01:29:03,865
And if you can't, the bank
will sell your house to recover the money.

1422
01:29:03,865 --> 01:29:07,164
But, that was for a computer centre,
not for coaching classes.

1423
01:29:07,402 --> 01:29:08,494
Don't ask me about all that... please!

1424
01:29:08,603 --> 01:29:10,805
Who else are we to ask?

1425
01:29:10,805 --> 01:29:12,473
You're in-charge of the bank, aren't you?

1426
01:29:12,473 --> 01:29:14,941
I was. Now it's him.

1427
01:29:15,943 --> 01:29:17,410
May your reservation policy flourish!

1428
01:29:18,212 --> 01:29:20,915
My junior by four years
having got a job via reservation...

1429
01:29:20,915 --> 01:29:24,043
mr. Indradev ram has been
promoted as my senior.

1430
01:29:24,419 --> 01:29:25,147
Now, please go to him for your answers.

1431
01:29:26,220 --> 01:29:27,949
Thank you, sir.
