And, goodbye!

1432
01:29:45,606 --> 01:29:46,630
What happened?

1433
01:29:49,110 --> 01:29:50,372
Poorbi?

1434
01:29:52,847 --> 01:29:53,836
Poorbi dear...

1435
01:30:00,121 --> 01:30:01,383
what is the matter?

1436
01:30:02,457 --> 01:30:04,584
Dad has given away our house in charity.

1437
01:30:04,926 --> 01:30:05,620
What?!

1438
01:30:06,260 --> 01:30:08,626
By standing guarantee
for kamta uncle's sons' loan.

1439
01:30:10,331 --> 01:30:11,593
What are you saying?

1440
01:30:12,367 --> 01:30:14,961
Just that we no longer
have a house to live in.

1441
01:30:15,002 --> 01:30:16,871
Who says that you don't have a house?

1442
01:30:16,871 --> 01:30:18,862
Our lawyers will fight and get it back.

1443
01:30:19,207 --> 01:30:21,869
But, for now, move from here
and stay in my house.

1444
01:30:22,543 --> 01:30:25,012
Prabhakar, you too are unbelievable.

1445
01:30:25,012 --> 01:30:27,448
While i'm around,
how can you stay in a hotel!

1446
01:30:27,448 --> 01:30:29,643
Bhabhiji, my guest house is vacant.

1447
01:30:30,051 --> 01:30:32,320
You can live there
for as long as you want.

1448
01:30:32,320 --> 01:30:34,618
I am truly... grateful, aniruddha.

1449
01:30:35,456 --> 01:30:37,253
I don't want to be a burden. We are...

1450
01:30:38,059 --> 01:30:38,582
we're fine.

1451
01:30:38,659 --> 01:30:40,094
There you go
with your stubbornness again!

1452
01:30:40,094 --> 01:30:42,196
Poorbi, get your stuff.

1453
01:30:42,196 --> 01:30:43,094
Bhabhi...

1454
01:30:44,699 --> 01:30:46,132
prabhakar, you are simply too much.

1455
01:30:46,567 --> 01:30:50,003
It's precisely this stubbornness
that's made the whole world your enemy.

1456
01:30:50,471 --> 01:30:53,541
If only you had listened to me
and not made that mistake...

1457
01:30:53,541 --> 01:30:55,065
you wouldn't be facing this situation today.

1458
01:30:55,543 --> 01:30:56,373
It's still not too late.

1459
01:30:56,411 --> 01:30:58,242
Which mistake are you
referring to, aniruddha?

1460
01:30:59,614 --> 01:31:01,445
Prabhakar, what aniruddha means...
just a second...

1461
01:31:04,352 --> 01:31:05,614
which mistake are you referring to?

1462
01:31:07,054 --> 01:31:09,284
That mistake which i committed...

1463
01:31:09,590 --> 01:31:12,320
by helping kamta's sons to
give him some relief?

1464
01:31:13,461 --> 01:31:15,292
Or that mistake...

1465
01:31:15,329 --> 01:31:19,467
which i committed by supporting
the supreme court's verdict on reservation?

1466
01:31:19,467 --> 01:31:21,702
Prabhakar, for god's sake.
Now at least be...

1467
01:31:21,702 --> 01:31:24,432
practical?
That's what you want to say, right?

1468
01:31:25,406 --> 01:31:29,342
No, aniruddha. For me,
these are not mistakes.

1469
01:31:29,644 --> 01:31:31,134
These are my principles.

1470
01:31:31,612 --> 01:31:33,011
And i believe in them.

1471
01:31:33,581 --> 01:31:35,572
So, know this, once and for all...

1472
01:31:36,717 --> 01:31:38,207
this is how i am.

1473
01:31:38,319 --> 01:31:41,652
I don't have any
intention of changing myself.

1474
01:31:42,023 --> 01:31:43,183
And, my family knows this.

1475
01:31:45,726 --> 01:31:46,249
Thank you.

1476
01:31:58,105 --> 01:31:59,402
What's happened to you, dad?

1477
01:32:00,508 --> 01:32:03,238
How can you insult aniruddha uncle
like this and drive him out?

1478
01:32:04,378 --> 01:32:05,504
You heard what he said?

1479
01:32:05,847 --> 01:32:06,973
So, what was wrong with that?

1480
01:32:08,216 --> 01:32:09,581
He didn't say anything wrong!

1481
01:32:10,551 --> 01:32:12,917
For you, your principles are everything.
That's it.

1482
01:32:14,155 --> 01:32:16,589
Do you ever think about
how your family lives?

1483
01:32:17,425 --> 01:32:19,994
That your daughter has to
endure taunts everyday in college...

1484
01:32:19,994 --> 01:32:21,962
because of your
headline-grabbing statements?

1485
01:32:23,030 --> 01:32:24,497
Does all this make any difference to you?

1486
01:32:25,333 --> 01:32:28,461
What is this you're saying, poorbi?
What's gotten into you all of a sudden?

1487
01:32:28,603 --> 01:32:30,093
Nothing has happened suddenly, mom.

1488
01:32:31,272 --> 01:32:35,003
We've always done
what dad wanted - without question.

1489
01:32:36,143 --> 01:32:37,804
It didn't take me a second
to break off with deepak...

1490
01:32:37,879 --> 01:32:40,404
because he had hurt dad.

1491
01:32:41,549 --> 01:32:44,347
I lost sushant... i lost all my friends.

1492
01:32:45,152 --> 01:32:48,280
But, ask him if he ever bothered
to find out what i want?

1493
01:32:49,557 --> 01:32:53,254
I couldn't get into medicine because
dad wouldn't allow me one grace mark.

1494
01:32:53,427 --> 01:32:55,129
One grace mark!!

1495
01:32:55,129 --> 01:32:56,130
Why?

1496
01:32:56,130 --> 01:32:58,598
Because i'm the great
prabhakar anand's daughter.

1497
01:32:58,966 --> 01:33:01,833
So, i will have to reap the fruits
of his principles.

1498
01:33:02,036 --> 01:33:04,937
You will not speak to your father like this.
Never!

1499
01:33:05,139 --> 01:33:06,834
You're also suffering, mom.

1500
01:33:07,141 --> 01:33:09,143
Otherwise you wouldn't be
in this hotel room...

1501
01:33:09,143 --> 01:33:13,273
while someone else is having fun in your house
because your husband donated it to him.

1502
01:33:13,347 --> 01:33:14,041
Enough!

1503
01:33:15,182 --> 01:33:16,046
Just shut up.

1504
01:33:17,118 --> 01:33:18,619
You've said enough.

1505
01:33:18,619 --> 01:33:19,847
Now, not another word from you!

1506
01:33:20,121 --> 01:33:23,113
I don't know of any person
who is better than your father.

1507
01:33:23,324 --> 01:33:26,191
In a world filled with cowards,
he's a real hero.

1508
01:33:27,628 --> 01:33:29,163
No matter what he says or does...

1509
01:33:29,163 --> 01:33:30,391
i will always stand by him!

1510
01:33:31,499 --> 01:33:33,067
Without any question.

1511
01:33:33,067 --> 01:33:35,627
And, as long as you live with us,
you too will have to do the same.

1512
01:33:36,871 --> 01:33:37,895
Without any question.

1513
01:33:37,939 --> 01:33:39,964
Get it?

1514
01:33:43,044 --> 01:33:44,238
I hate my life!

1515
01:33:54,121 --> 01:33:56,214
I've gone over your... proposal, deepak.

1516
01:33:57,658 --> 01:33:58,522
Interesting.

1517
01:33:59,460 --> 01:34:01,291
I'm lucky to have you as a guide, sir.

1518
01:34:02,229 --> 01:34:05,562
Dr. Prabhakar anand says,
you are the best in applied mathematics.

1519
01:34:05,666 --> 01:34:08,066
He's a fine man.
A great scholar.

1520
01:34:08,402 --> 01:34:10,165
I think, i'll email him right away.

1521
01:34:13,240 --> 01:34:14,229
What's this?

1522
01:34:17,078 --> 01:34:18,375
Do you know anything about this?

1523
01:35:05,359 --> 01:35:05,688
Hello...

1524
01:35:06,127 --> 01:35:06,889
hello?

1525
01:35:07,662 --> 01:35:08,651
Hello poorbi?

1526
01:35:09,630 --> 01:35:10,562
It's me, deepak.

1527
01:35:12,033 --> 01:35:14,194
Hello? Can you hear me?

1528
01:35:15,636 --> 01:35:18,036
Poorbi, it's me... deepak.

1529
01:35:19,206 --> 01:35:20,366
Yes, how are you?

1530
01:35:20,541 --> 01:35:22,634
How are you people? How is sir?

1531
01:35:23,511 --> 01:35:24,409
I read on the net that...

1532
01:35:25,146 --> 01:35:26,443
yes, everything is fine here.

1533
01:35:27,014 --> 01:35:28,242
Dad has taken voluntary retirement.

1534
01:35:29,016 --> 01:35:30,005
Retirement?

1535
01:35:30,584 --> 01:35:33,382
Poorbi, is everything okay?
Tell me the truth, please...

1536
01:35:34,221 --> 01:35:36,246
yes, everything is fine. And you?

1537
01:35:37,258 --> 01:35:38,282
I'm not okay at all.

1538
01:35:38,325 --> 01:35:43,092
Poorbi, since i left home,
i've been cursing myself.

1539
01:35:43,497 --> 01:35:47,934
I just failed to understand him.
I behaved so badly with him.

1540
01:35:49,103 --> 01:35:51,094
How much i hurt him!

1541
01:35:51,505 --> 01:35:53,097
I wasn't in my senses, poorbi.

1542
01:35:54,108 --> 01:35:55,370
I feel so guilty.

1543
01:35:57,344 --> 01:35:58,936
Poorbi, i want to apologise to him.

1544
01:36:01,048 --> 01:36:03,676
Poorbi, please.
I want to talk to him.

1545
01:36:04,385 --> 01:36:05,511
He's fine.

1546
01:36:06,387 --> 01:36:08,252
Deepak, i'll speak with you later, ok?

1547
01:36:08,723 --> 01:36:10,156
Poorbi, please!

1548
01:36:43,624 --> 01:36:45,993
Here, hand me the plate.

1549
01:36:45,993 --> 01:36:46,721
And that too.

1550
01:36:56,237 --> 01:36:57,261
You're back, my dear?

1551
01:36:57,471 --> 01:36:57,732
Come.

1552
01:36:59,507 --> 01:37:02,442
See, i called for your favourite food.

1553
01:37:02,777 --> 01:37:07,009
Curry tempered with cumin seeds
and missi roti.

1554
01:37:07,715 --> 01:37:09,342
This is potato...

1555
01:37:16,090 --> 01:37:17,387
i'm sorry, dad.

1556
01:37:18,025 --> 01:37:19,492
I'm really sorry.

1557
01:37:21,428 --> 01:37:23,453
I hurt you so much.

1558
01:37:27,401 --> 01:37:28,425
I was scared.

1559
01:37:30,304 --> 01:37:31,498
Very scared.

1560
01:37:51,859 --> 01:37:52,553
Dad?

1561
01:37:53,494 --> 01:37:54,483
Yes, my dear?

1562
01:37:55,863 --> 01:37:57,330
I'm starving.

1563
01:38:20,053 --> 01:38:23,113
It's very important.
I need to see the honourable secretary.

1564
01:38:23,256 --> 01:38:25,349
He isn't here right now.
What is it?

1565
01:38:25,659 --> 01:38:28,695
The intimation for my scholarship
hasn't reached padmavati institute yet.

1566
01:38:28,695 --> 01:38:30,330
And, the deadline for admissions is 4 p.m.

1567
01:38:30,330 --> 01:38:31,627
What is your name?

1568
01:38:31,665 --> 01:38:33,599
Pandit dinanath upadhyay.

1569
01:38:34,601 --> 01:38:36,193
But, your name isn't in this list.

1570
01:38:36,503 --> 01:38:37,333
Sorry?

1571
01:38:38,538 --> 01:38:40,740
That's impossible!

1572
01:38:40,740 --> 01:38:43,072
My name was there... at the top.

1573
01:38:43,643 --> 01:38:45,679
Prabhakar sir had personally
recommended my name. Please check...

1574
01:38:45,679 --> 01:38:46,737
which prabhakar sir?

1575
01:38:47,347 --> 01:38:49,082
The ex-principal of s.t. M?

1576
01:38:49,082 --> 01:38:49,741
Yes, yes...

1577
01:38:50,884 --> 01:38:52,215
go tell him...

1578
01:38:52,852 --> 01:38:55,150
to get you admitted
through some reserved quota.

1579
01:38:55,488 --> 01:38:58,514
We don't waste our scholarships on
the recommendations of people like him.

1580
01:39:05,565 --> 01:39:06,623
Please do forgive me.

1581
01:39:07,600 --> 01:39:09,465
I wasn't acquainted with
your current circumstances.

1582
01:39:10,704 --> 01:39:16,336
Else, i would never have come
in your presence with my difficulty.

1583
01:39:22,649 --> 01:39:23,274
Wait, pandit.

1584
01:39:25,852 --> 01:39:26,580
You did the right thing.

1585
01:39:27,887 --> 01:39:28,512
You...

1586
01:39:29,723 --> 01:39:30,747
you... just wait.

1587
01:39:38,832 --> 01:39:42,859
An entire year of this child
will be wasted.

1588
01:39:44,504 --> 01:39:48,201
And, more than that,
he'll completely break.

1589
01:39:50,577 --> 01:39:54,343
It's because of me that
those people cancelled his scholarship.

1590
01:40:17,337 --> 01:40:18,861
Hurry up, prabhakar.

1591
01:40:19,973 --> 01:40:23,966
If he doesn't reach on time,
his admission will lapse.

1592
01:40:40,260 --> 01:40:42,490
You... i...

1593
01:40:43,496 --> 01:40:45,191
please don't...

1594
01:40:45,532 --> 01:40:48,729
young man, do not delay even a bit.

1595
01:40:49,202 --> 01:40:53,468
Go directly there, and conclude
the admission process.

1596
01:40:53,673 --> 01:40:54,935
Yes, sir.

1597
01:41:03,016 --> 01:41:04,506
All my wishes have come true, it seems.

1598
01:41:04,651 --> 01:41:06,744
Without a moment's hesitation,
he handed me the cheque.

1599
01:41:07,020 --> 01:41:10,717
With just a balance of three minutes,
i made it to the admission-window.

1600
01:41:11,324 --> 01:41:12,791
Never will i be able to repay his debt.

1601
01:41:14,327 --> 01:41:14,986
Please take one...

1602
01:41:17,831 --> 01:41:18,422
congratulations.

1603
01:41:20,300 --> 01:41:21,028
All my best... er...

1604
01:41:21,434 --> 01:41:21,991
auspicious wishes?

1605
01:41:22,368 --> 01:41:24,700
Yeah... auspicious wishes.

1606
01:41:40,520 --> 01:41:41,316
Please sit.

1607
01:41:42,956 --> 01:41:43,752
Bring two coffees, please.

1608
01:41:45,792 --> 01:41:46,724
Poorbi...

1609
01:41:47,660 --> 01:41:49,321
i cannot tell you how sorry i am.

1610
01:41:50,630 --> 01:41:52,359
I failed to understand sir.

1611
01:42:11,718 --> 01:42:12,480
Have you spoken with deepak?

1612
01:42:16,422 --> 01:42:17,787
I didn't tell him anything.

1613
01:42:19,926 --> 01:42:20,950
Didn't want him to worry.

1614
01:42:24,764 --> 01:42:28,894
I want to meet sir.
I would really like to help.

1615
01:42:31,537 --> 01:42:35,735
Thanks. But right now,
he doesn't want to meet anyone.

1616
01:43:20,086 --> 01:43:23,522
There was no need to leave
your college in america and come back for this!

1617
01:43:23,556 --> 01:43:25,258
You could've just called me.

1618
01:43:25,258 --> 01:43:29,490
How dare mithilesh singh do this to prabhakar,
the messiah of the poor!

1619
01:43:30,330 --> 01:43:32,594
Hey luttan!
Call up the college.

1620
01:43:34,000 --> 01:43:35,365
Don't you worry.

1621
01:43:36,002 --> 01:43:38,197
The backward caste
holds him in very high regard.

1622
01:43:38,438 --> 01:43:41,100
If need be, we'll all
land up there in a demonstration.

1623
01:43:41,374 --> 01:43:42,033
Hello...

1624
01:43:43,376 --> 01:43:45,503
it's the principal on line, big brother.

1625
01:43:46,245 --> 01:43:46,574
Hello?

1626
01:43:46,913 --> 01:43:48,073
Greetings, mr. Leader.

1627
01:43:48,114 --> 01:43:50,048
I'm going to greet you alright.

1628
01:43:50,083 --> 01:43:52,210
When did you leave
teaching and begin bullying?

1629
01:43:53,019 --> 01:43:54,253
I'm sorry... i don't understand.

1630
01:43:54,253 --> 01:43:55,550
I can come there and explain!

1631
01:43:56,155 --> 01:43:59,283
Look here, if prabhakar sir's house
isn't vacated in 24 hours...

1632
01:43:59,659 --> 01:44:02,595
i will hang your photograph on
the wall with a garland around it.

1633
01:44:02,595 --> 01:44:04,030
Why don't you hear me out once...

1634
01:44:04,030 --> 01:44:06,362
there's nothing to be heard!

1635
01:44:06,499 --> 01:44:09,434
Sure, but why don't
you at least come here...

1636
01:44:12,939 --> 01:44:14,099
take it as vacated!

1637
01:44:21,247 --> 01:44:24,011
Please do come, mr. Bishambhar das.
You are welcome.

1638
01:44:24,050 --> 01:44:26,644
You can drop the welcomes,
mithilesh singh.

1639
01:44:26,686 --> 01:44:29,489
And drop your bullying,
and get out of our man's house.

1640
01:44:29,489 --> 01:44:31,657
You're absolutely right,
bishambhar das.

1641
01:44:31,657 --> 01:44:34,627
Now, he has become 'your' man...
dr. Prabhakar anand.

1642
01:44:34,627 --> 01:44:36,424
Oh... baburamji, you?

1643
01:44:36,763 --> 01:44:38,025
Lovely!

1644
01:44:38,531 --> 01:44:42,023
You get his cottage vacated,
he'll get your elected seat vacated!

1645
01:44:42,402 --> 01:44:44,131
Seat?! What are you saying?

1646
01:44:44,303 --> 01:44:45,292
What else?

1647
01:44:45,538 --> 01:44:50,305
You plough the land of backward caste politics,
he will harvest the gains!

1648
01:44:51,744 --> 01:44:55,305
You turned out to be even
more foolish than i realized.

1649
01:44:56,682 --> 01:44:58,513
Can't see through his game, can you?

1650
01:45:00,553 --> 01:45:03,556
By making just one statement
in support of reservation...

1651
01:45:03,556 --> 01:45:05,490
he has sidelined all of you.

1652
01:45:08,361 --> 01:45:11,125
Now watch how he becomes
the leader of the backward castes.

1653
01:45:11,464 --> 01:45:13,728
Leader? How will be become
the leader of the backward castes?

1654
01:45:14,233 --> 01:45:16,793
With the help of your retarded brain.

1655
01:45:18,671 --> 01:45:21,307
Go on, support him... do it.

1656
01:45:21,307 --> 01:45:21,739
Support?

1657
01:45:23,342 --> 01:45:24,673
Why should i support him?

1658
01:45:26,279 --> 01:45:29,715
You won't understand.
He's not a good man.

1659
01:45:32,018 --> 01:45:33,383
Thank you.

1660
01:45:35,555 --> 01:45:36,385
I get it.

1661
01:45:48,701 --> 01:45:49,497
Stop!

1662
01:46:01,547 --> 01:46:02,241
What is it?

1663
01:46:02,482 --> 01:46:03,710
I want you out of here!

1664
01:46:04,584 --> 01:46:06,176
Vacate the house? Now!

1665
01:46:07,320 --> 01:46:08,387
Vacate this house?

1666
01:46:08,387 --> 01:46:09,513
Are you the collector or what?

1667
01:46:14,794 --> 01:46:16,523
Security! Security!!

1668
01:46:16,729 --> 01:46:19,596
Security! Security!

1669
01:46:26,672 --> 01:46:30,438
You'd have been on the streets,
if prabhakar sir hadn't given you shelter.

1670
01:46:30,476 --> 01:46:34,147
What did you think?
That he'll quietly keep running to the court...

1671
01:46:34,147 --> 01:46:35,546
while you continue to harass him?

1672
01:46:35,882 --> 01:46:37,543
Get out of this place right now!

1673
01:46:37,583 --> 01:46:40,143
Sir, i've called the police.

1674
01:46:40,620 --> 01:46:42,144
Mr. Deepak is on a rampage here.

1675
01:46:42,622 --> 01:46:45,420
Let him do exactly what he wants to.

1676
01:46:45,558 --> 01:46:47,753
Just don't let him leave. Understood?

1677
01:46:53,232 --> 01:46:54,756
Mr. Digambar...

1678
01:46:56,202 --> 01:46:59,763
have you stopped doing
live coverage these days or what?

1679
01:47:16,422 --> 01:47:17,184
You!

1680
01:47:17,657 --> 01:47:18,419
Mithilesh singh.

1681
01:47:19,725 --> 01:47:22,295
You are responsible for this situation.

1682
01:47:22,295 --> 01:47:23,227
I will not spare you!

1683
01:47:23,396 --> 01:47:24,697
You don't scare me.

1684
01:47:24,697 --> 01:47:26,562
Go tell this to dr. Prabhakar anand...

1685
01:47:26,599 --> 01:47:27,395
who sent you here.

1686
01:47:27,700 --> 01:47:28,935
You rascal!

1687
01:47:28,935 --> 01:47:30,493
You think he is weak, huh?

1688
01:47:31,604 --> 01:47:33,333
This is my last warning.

1689
01:47:33,372 --> 01:47:35,533
Close your shop and get out of this place!

1690
01:47:35,608 --> 01:47:37,269
Otherwise, i'll throw you out myself!

1691
01:47:37,510 --> 01:47:37,839
Get out!

1692
01:47:40,580 --> 01:47:43,606
Did you see this?
Is this the way to behave?

1693
01:47:44,684 --> 01:47:47,585
We're running this coaching centre
in a legal and peaceful manner.

1694
01:47:47,887 --> 01:47:49,616
And prabhakar anand
sends his his thugs here.

1695
01:47:50,156 --> 01:47:51,623
Who're you calling a thug?

1696
01:47:51,824 --> 01:47:53,155
See, see...

1697
01:47:53,593 --> 01:47:54,389
- you thug!

1698
01:47:54,594 --> 01:47:55,583
- See for yourself.

1699
01:47:55,928 --> 01:47:58,590
- See for yourself.

1700
01:47:59,232 --> 01:48:01,367
See the level to which they have stooped.

1701
01:48:01,367 --> 01:48:03,460
Sir, what action will you take against this?

1702
01:48:04,503 --> 01:48:06,494
I'm... i'm totally shocked.

1703
01:48:07,607 --> 01:48:11,244
According to me,
there's only one place for such people.

1704
01:48:11,244 --> 01:48:11,642
Jail!

1705
01:48:12,511 --> 01:48:15,181
The owner of k.k. Coaching centre
alleges that...

1706
01:48:15,181 --> 01:48:19,352
it is on prabhakar anand's orders
that deepak kumar attacked them.

1707
01:48:19,352 --> 01:48:21,454
The police have arrested deepak kumar.

1708
01:48:21,454 --> 01:48:23,623
- He got into a fight with mithilesh singh.

1709
01:48:23,623 --> 01:48:26,421
- Mithilesh singh is in a shock
since the incident.

1710
01:48:28,261 --> 01:48:29,319
Are you dr. Prabhakar anand?

1711
01:48:29,929 --> 01:48:31,264
Yes, that's me.

1712
01:48:31,264 --> 01:48:32,822
You've been summoned
to the police station.

1713
01:48:32,999 --> 01:48:34,557
He was right here!
What has he?

1714
01:48:34,600 --> 01:48:35,862
Kavita, please.

1715
01:48:36,736 --> 01:48:37,532
Let's go.

1716
01:48:37,570 --> 01:48:38,332
I'm coming with you!

1717
01:48:38,371 --> 01:48:38,632
No, both of you stay here.

1718
01:48:45,778 --> 01:48:47,336
Dr. Anand what are you charged with?

1719
01:48:47,380 --> 01:48:48,847
Did you send hooligans there?

1720
01:48:49,282 --> 01:48:50,683
What is your relationship
with deepak kumar?

1721
01:48:50,683 --> 01:48:52,674
Are you taking revenge on mithilesh kumar?

1722
01:48:52,918 --> 01:48:56,410
Dr. Anand, first a principal,
then a convict - how do you feel?

1723
01:49:05,498 --> 01:49:07,125
- Sign your 'horoscope'!

1724
01:49:07,500 --> 01:49:10,162
- Attack k.k. Coaching, will you?
Sign this!

1725
01:49:11,037 --> 01:49:12,436
Take him inside!

1726
01:49:17,610 --> 01:49:18,474
I am sorry, sir.

1727
01:49:20,212 --> 01:49:21,839
Welcome principal sir.

1728
01:49:23,416 --> 01:49:25,213
You seem like a reasonable gentleman.

1729
01:49:25,685 --> 01:49:28,449
That is why i had
explained to you with such respect.

1730
01:49:29,221 --> 01:49:30,813
Even hired a lawyer for you.

1731
01:49:31,123 --> 01:49:34,684
But you? You resorted
to using a cheap thug!

1732
01:49:35,428 --> 01:49:36,156
Sheesh!

1733
01:49:37,163 --> 01:49:38,425
I didn't expect this from you.

1734
01:49:38,497 --> 01:49:41,500
Inspector, please!
Sir didn't know anything about this.

1735
01:49:41,500 --> 01:49:44,833
Hey, if you act smart,
i'll shove this all the way in!

1736
01:49:48,074 --> 01:49:51,669
You think the law is blindfolded, do you?

1737
01:49:52,278 --> 01:49:55,381
This guy will be locked
up under sections 326 and 452.

1738
01:49:55,381 --> 01:49:58,818
Under criminal conspiracy section 120-b,
should i haul you in too?

1739
01:49:58,818 --> 01:50:03,221
Lt'll make no difference to him,
inspector thakur. No difference at all!

1740
01:50:05,091 --> 01:50:06,854
He's sold his self-respect.

1741
01:50:07,526 --> 01:50:10,689
Otherwise, he wouldn't have been
kicked out of s.t.m. In this way.

1742
01:50:12,465 --> 01:50:15,298
He's done a doctorate in hypocrisy!

1743
01:50:16,102 --> 01:50:18,332
He has been unmasked.

1744
01:50:19,105 --> 01:50:21,173
Total fake teacher!

1745
01:50:21,173 --> 01:50:24,310
Hey mithilesh singh!
One more word about sir and...

1746
01:50:24,310 --> 01:50:27,677
see that?
See the students that he's trained?

1747
01:50:28,681 --> 01:50:31,707
For 35 years, he weaved a
web of deceit with mathematics.

1748
01:50:32,385 --> 01:50:33,784
Now, the result is out!

1749
01:50:34,820 --> 01:50:38,483
Sir, you were a zero,
you are a zero...

1750
01:50:38,624 --> 01:50:41,889
and you'll always remain a...

1751
01:50:42,695 --> 01:50:43,593
zero.

1752
01:50:43,896 --> 01:50:46,232
Mithilesh sir, what should we do with him?

1753
01:50:46,232 --> 01:50:48,257
There's no need to do anything.

1754
01:50:52,405 --> 01:50:56,273
You set out to serve a
'show cause' notice to k.k. Coaching?

1755
01:50:56,809 --> 01:50:59,903
It is the future of india's education.

1756
01:51:00,613 --> 01:51:03,275
There's no room for teachers like you!

1757
01:51:04,350 --> 01:51:06,716
Dr. Prabhakar anand, you are...

1758
01:51:08,621 --> 01:51:09,679
dismissed!

1759
01:51:54,733 --> 01:51:56,462
Sir...

1760
01:52:06,445 --> 01:52:08,777
but, i'm enquiring
about dr. Prabhakar anand.

1761
01:52:09,348 --> 01:52:10,212
What happened?

1762
01:52:10,850 --> 01:52:11,544
What happened, poorbi?

1763
01:52:11,584 --> 01:52:12,551
They hung up!

1764
01:52:12,551 --> 01:52:14,053
What did they say?
Where is he?

1765
01:52:14,053 --> 01:52:14,781
They said nothing, mom.

1766
01:52:17,690 --> 01:52:19,282
Ok, i will come tomorrow morning.

1767
01:52:22,294 --> 01:52:23,625
What did they do with dad?

1768
01:52:23,762 --> 01:52:25,598
They haven't charged him with anything.

1769
01:52:25,598 --> 01:52:27,065
- So, then?
- Then, where is he?

1770
01:52:27,533 --> 01:52:28,734
He left before i got here.

1771
01:52:28,734 --> 01:52:29,860
And deepak?

1772
01:52:30,703 --> 01:52:31,727
Where could he have gone?

1773
01:52:38,777 --> 01:52:41,075
What have i done!

1774
01:52:42,348 --> 01:52:44,077
I can never forgive myself.

1775
01:53:05,838 --> 01:53:10,175
- Shambhu, there's someone at the gate.

1776
01:53:10,175 --> 01:53:11,472
- Then, open it!

1777
01:53:20,786 --> 01:53:22,515
Guruji? You... here?

1778
01:53:23,622 --> 01:53:25,681
Shambhu, i need your help.

1779
01:53:29,528 --> 01:53:30,586
Please come.

1780
01:53:32,598 --> 01:53:34,733
Yes, this is hotel surendra vilas.

1781
01:53:34,733 --> 01:53:36,502
Please can i speak with poorbi.

1782
01:53:36,502 --> 01:53:37,196
Yes...

1783
01:53:37,469 --> 01:53:38,868
they just walked in.

1784
01:53:38,904 --> 01:53:41,668
Excuse me, ma'am...
some shambhu yadav on the line for you.

1785
01:53:42,408 --> 01:53:43,272
Shambhu?

1786
01:53:43,909 --> 01:53:44,398
Hello?

1787
01:53:44,543 --> 01:53:46,946
- Shambhu speaking... the stable owner.

1788
01:53:46,946 --> 01:53:48,470
- Guruji is here at my place.

1789
01:53:49,214 --> 01:53:52,479
- And he has asked you to come here.
Please come here.

1790
01:53:53,652 --> 01:53:55,142
Poorbi... what?

1791
01:53:57,256 --> 01:53:58,280
What happened?

1792
01:53:58,824 --> 01:54:00,155
Dad has called us.

1793
01:54:09,602 --> 01:54:10,261
Greetings.

1794
01:54:10,569 --> 01:54:11,870
Hey you!
Take the luggage - quick.

1795
01:54:11,870 --> 01:54:13,172
Where is he?

1796
01:54:13,172 --> 01:54:14,332
There...

1797
01:54:15,908 --> 01:54:19,435
he's at it.
Guruji... you know...

1798
01:54:19,745 --> 01:54:25,274
x is equal to y to the power a,
is equal to z to the power b to the power a...

1799
01:54:25,317 --> 01:54:28,354
is equal to z to the power ab,

1800
01:54:28,354 --> 01:54:32,757
is equal to x to the power c to the power ab,

1801
01:54:32,791 --> 01:54:35,294
is equal to x to the power abc...

1802
01:54:35,294 --> 01:54:38,998
therefore, abc = 1.

1803
01:54:38,998 --> 01:54:40,795
Q.e.d.

1804
01:54:41,400 --> 01:54:43,630
That was quite easily done!

1805
01:54:46,438 --> 01:54:48,633
Okay, go now.
Get ready for school.

1806
01:54:48,741 --> 01:54:50,436
Next class this evening.

1807
01:54:50,476 --> 01:54:50,908
Go now.

1808
01:55:11,530 --> 01:55:13,088
Guruji, your tea.

1809
01:55:16,168 --> 01:55:17,692
Shall i say something, guruji?

1810
01:55:19,071 --> 01:55:24,566
I've never seen my muniya
actually laugh while studying.

1811
01:55:30,315 --> 01:55:34,453
Shambhu, there must be
other children around here...

1812
01:55:34,453 --> 01:55:36,944
in 10th and 12th grades?

1813
01:55:38,090 --> 01:55:40,684
Of course!
There are a lot, guruji.

1814
01:55:40,726 --> 01:55:42,591
There's a settlement over here.

1815
01:55:45,731 --> 01:55:46,959
Gather them.

1816
01:55:48,567 --> 01:55:50,159
No matter which society they come from.

1817
01:55:51,603 --> 01:55:52,968
I'll will teach them.

1818
01:55:55,307 --> 01:55:56,239
Free of cost.

1819
01:56:10,689 --> 01:56:13,351
Prabhakar, i want my house back.

1820
01:56:14,326 --> 01:56:19,161
Where have you brought us?
And what is this you've started?

1821
01:56:21,767 --> 01:56:23,792
We will reclaim our house.

1822
01:56:25,003 --> 01:56:26,231
And everything else...

1823
01:56:28,006 --> 01:56:31,442
self-respect, reputation
and all those values that...

1824
01:56:31,477 --> 01:56:37,143
i lived by, as a teacher.
All of it!

1825
01:56:37,816 --> 01:56:43,015
These petty traders of
education cannot terrorise us!

1826
01:56:45,257 --> 01:56:47,350
I will wipe them out!

1827
01:56:47,986 --> 01:56:48,918
Excellent!

1828
01:56:50,055 --> 01:56:51,784
The collections are good this time.

1829
01:56:51,823 --> 01:56:54,189
But, henceforth collect
the entire fees in advance.

1830
01:56:54,693 --> 01:56:59,858
If you continue to run this centre like this,
i'll extend your contract to five years.

1831
01:57:00,232 --> 01:57:01,028
But, sir...

1832
01:57:01,199 --> 01:57:02,768
prabhakar uncle had said two years...

1833
01:57:02,768 --> 01:57:04,668
it's a civil case!

1834
01:57:04,903 --> 01:57:07,167
He'll be running to
the court for 20-25 years.

1835
01:57:07,639 --> 01:57:10,938
I hear he lives in the stable now
with his family.

1836
01:57:11,710 --> 01:57:14,110
Does he want
reservation for buffaloes now?

1837
01:57:14,646 --> 01:57:16,910
No, sir. A few students from
the neighbourhood slum go to him.

1838
01:57:17,149 --> 01:57:19,049
What else can he do?

1839
01:57:19,084 --> 01:57:21,211
After all, he has to
pay rent to shambhu!

1840
01:57:26,858 --> 01:57:29,019
Yes, what is it?

1841
01:57:29,795 --> 01:57:31,695
I have deepak kumar's bail papers.

1842
01:57:32,631 --> 01:57:33,928
His bail has been granted.

1843
01:57:36,134 --> 01:57:36,998
Hey...

1844
01:57:38,370 --> 01:57:40,065
let that 'hero' go.

1845
01:57:43,775 --> 01:57:45,675
Come with me, mr. Advocate.

1846
01:57:51,349 --> 01:57:52,976
Get a grip, fellow.

1847
01:57:53,585 --> 01:57:55,746
This hooliganism won't be
tolerated here.

1848
01:57:59,224 --> 01:58:01,692
Here, please sign this.

1849
01:58:06,198 --> 01:58:09,031
Thanks, mr. Advocate.
But, who got the bail done?

1850
01:58:59,551 --> 01:59:02,884
For a maximum product of q into q minus q...

1851
01:59:03,421 --> 01:59:06,288
both parts must be the same. Therefore...

1852
01:59:09,361 --> 01:59:13,297
q divided by q is equal to 2.

1853
01:59:17,435 --> 01:59:18,834
What is it, muniya?

1854
01:59:21,406 --> 01:59:23,340
Sir... i won't study.

1855
01:59:24,943 --> 01:59:25,932
Why not?

1856
01:59:29,181 --> 01:59:32,150
Sir, the principal has issued a warning...

1857
01:59:32,150 --> 01:59:34,419
that no one who scores
below 65% in the preliminaries...

1858
01:59:34,419 --> 01:59:36,751
will be allowed to take the final exams.

1859
01:59:36,888 --> 01:59:39,857
And sir, i've never scored above 57%.

1860
01:59:40,959 --> 01:59:41,983
When is your pre-board?

1861
01:59:42,194 --> 01:59:42,455
Sorry?

1862
01:59:42,894 --> 01:59:43,792
From the 23rd, sir.

1863
01:59:44,029 --> 01:59:46,998
23rd. We have two weeks!

1864
01:59:48,200 --> 01:59:51,363
Why won't you score 65%, then?
We'll make it happen!

1865
01:59:54,206 --> 01:59:55,833
You will work hard, won't you?

1866
01:59:57,309 --> 01:59:58,105
- Will you?
- Yes.

1867
01:59:58,143 --> 01:59:59,667
Then you will get a 65%!

1868
02:00:05,016 --> 02:00:06,418
So, as i was saying...

1869
02:00:06,418 --> 02:00:10,252
a charge q is divided
into two parts of q and q minus q.

1870
02:00:11,022 --> 02:00:12,390
If the coulomb...

1871
02:00:12,390 --> 02:00:14,449
- sushant and deepak want to meet you.

1872
02:00:14,759 --> 02:00:17,057
Repulsion between them
when they are separated...

1873
02:00:17,429 --> 02:00:18,293
dad, please!

1874
02:00:19,764 --> 02:00:20,788
Even they want to help.

1875
02:00:24,970 --> 02:00:27,165
I don't need anybody's help.
Thank you.

1876
02:00:30,375 --> 02:00:32,866
Then the ratio of q/q should be...

1877
02:00:32,911 --> 02:00:36,438
(a) 2, (b) 1/2

1878
02:00:36,481 --> 02:00:40,941
(c) 4 or (d) 1/4

1879
02:00:41,019 --> 02:00:45,479
as i was saying,
a charged q is divided into two parts...

1880
02:01:07,512 --> 02:01:11,209
it's 3 a.m.
Where are you going at this hour?

1881
02:01:11,950 --> 02:01:13,417
I have to help them revise.

1882
02:01:14,519 --> 02:01:16,885
They have a math exam today.

1883
02:01:40,111 --> 02:01:40,941
Guruji...

1884
02:01:41,413 --> 02:01:42,505
so, the revision is going on...

1885
02:01:43,214 --> 02:01:43,908
yes, sir.

1886
02:01:44,983 --> 02:01:46,883
So, where have we got stuck?

1887
02:01:48,119 --> 02:01:49,279
See...

1888
02:01:49,888 --> 02:01:53,558
minus 2k squared
cancels out plus 2k squared.

1889
02:01:53,558 --> 02:01:54,889
Yes, of course!

1890
02:02:02,267 --> 02:02:02,961
Greetings madam.

1891
02:02:03,001 --> 02:02:03,558
Greetings.

1892
02:02:04,469 --> 02:02:05,868
Is... everything okay?

1893
02:02:05,904 --> 02:02:07,337
Yes, yes. Everything's fine.

1894
02:02:13,178 --> 02:02:15,043
This is dr. Prabhakar anand!

1895
02:02:15,080 --> 02:02:17,605
Yes, it is he who teaches
all the students here.

1896
02:02:18,283 --> 02:02:20,615
Our principal has come to meet you.

1897
02:02:23,221 --> 02:02:24,051
Greetings, sir.

1898
02:02:24,356 --> 02:02:26,620
Greetings. What brings you here?

1899
02:02:27,325 --> 02:02:30,954
Your student, muniya,
has done what we haven't ever seen earlier.

1900
02:02:31,496 --> 02:02:35,330
The student who would score 50-57%
earlier has scored a 76% in the preliminary exam!

1901
02:02:36,001 --> 02:02:37,093
What?!! Really?

1902
02:02:37,268 --> 02:02:38,292
Only you could have done this, sir!

1903
02:02:38,536 --> 02:02:41,973
She will do even better in
the board exams. Right, muniya?

1904
02:02:41,973 --> 02:02:43,008
I'll score more than 80%!

1905
02:02:43,008 --> 02:02:44,635
More than 80...

1906
02:02:45,543 --> 02:02:46,845
my muniya!!

1907
02:02:46,845 --> 02:02:48,146
Please serve tea!

1908
02:02:48,146 --> 02:02:50,273
I'll... i'll get some sweets.

1909
02:02:51,082 --> 02:02:53,107
- What's the matter?

1910
02:02:53,251 --> 02:02:55,446
I've stood first in my class!

1911
02:02:57,088 --> 02:03:00,080
Many of our students
take private tuitions and coaching.

1912
02:03:00,525 --> 02:03:01,082
At k.k. Too.

1913
02:03:02,193 --> 02:03:04,184
But, this time,
muniya has beaten everyone.

1914
02:03:04,429 --> 02:03:07,592
Now all the parents are
inquiring about muniya's coaching school.

1915
02:03:07,999 --> 02:03:11,230
Stable school!
Anyone who wishes to study can join.

1916
02:03:12,470 --> 02:03:13,872
Refund our fees.

1917
02:03:13,872 --> 02:03:14,600
We don't want our children to study here.

1918
02:03:14,639 --> 02:03:17,199
Sir, please...
tej, just attend to them.

1919
02:03:19,077 --> 02:03:19,441
Hello sir?

1920
02:03:19,944 --> 02:03:21,138
What is going on here, sunny?

1921
02:03:21,613 --> 02:03:23,248
The number of students
has reduced to half this month!

1922
02:03:23,248 --> 02:03:24,549
Admissions are still going on.

1923
02:03:24,549 --> 02:03:28,319
A group of 20 is coming to join today.
Perhaps a little publicity...

1924
02:03:28,319 --> 02:03:29,081
- publicity?!

1925
02:03:30,188 --> 02:03:32,486
Since when did k.k. Coaching
begin needing publicity?

1926
02:03:44,335 --> 02:03:45,700
What is this, tej prasad?

1927
02:03:45,904 --> 02:03:49,533
Sir, i've already spoken with them about it.
In a few days some more students...

1928
02:03:51,709 --> 02:03:53,370
sir, in a day or two...

1929
02:03:55,914 --> 02:03:56,903
what's this?

1930
02:04:07,325 --> 02:04:08,087
Where are these people going?

1931
02:04:08,326 --> 02:04:12,023
Sir, uh... in the stable opposite...
coaching classes are being held.

1932
02:04:12,130 --> 02:04:13,427
These are kids from gandhi nagar, sir.

1933
02:04:13,932 --> 02:04:15,695
Sushant seth has
arranged a bus service for them.

1934
02:04:21,573 --> 02:04:22,437
Really?!

1935
02:04:24,209 --> 02:04:26,040
Looks like his farce has begun to work.

1936
02:04:48,733 --> 02:04:51,224
If your notes are ready,
please give them to me.

1937
02:04:51,269 --> 02:04:52,759
I'll get photocopies made.

1938
02:04:53,171 --> 02:04:54,900
Now, there are more
than 70 students in the stable now.

1939
02:04:58,476 --> 02:04:59,465
Mrs. Dey?

1940
02:05:00,411 --> 02:05:02,046
Forgive me, dinkarji.

1941
02:05:02,046 --> 02:05:03,035
I won't be able to come any longer.

1942
02:05:04,015 --> 02:05:06,347
Sir, the principal has summoned you.

1943
02:05:09,954 --> 02:05:11,319
Come... have a seat.

1944
02:05:13,324 --> 02:05:15,417
You seem to be putting in
a lot of extra hours at the stable.

1945
02:05:16,294 --> 02:05:18,091
You guys are minting good money, eh?

1946
02:05:19,998 --> 02:05:21,397
I offer my services there for free.

1947
02:05:21,799 --> 02:05:22,800
But why?!

1948
02:05:22,800 --> 02:05:27,362
Mr. Dinkar, why are you throwing away
your hard-earned knowledge into a dustbin?

1949
02:05:27,705 --> 02:05:30,469
Join our k.k. Coaching.
Your talent will be rewarded there.

1950
02:05:31,342 --> 02:05:33,003
100,000 rupees a month!

1951
02:05:35,246 --> 02:05:38,272
Mr. Mithilesh, i am devoted
to the principles of prabhakarji.

1952
02:05:40,385 --> 02:05:41,784
You can't buy me.

1953
02:05:42,887 --> 02:05:46,015
Fine, fine... please sit.
What's the hurry?

1954
02:05:46,257 --> 02:05:48,960
You've rejected my offer.
No problem.

1955
02:05:48,960 --> 02:05:50,359
Please take this new time-table with you.

1956
02:05:50,862 --> 02:05:52,727
You are in big demand
among the students.

1957
02:05:53,164 --> 02:05:55,400
So, two classes in the morning...
two in the evening.

1958
02:05:55,400 --> 02:05:57,027
Four extra classes everyday.

1959
02:05:58,403 --> 02:05:59,870
But, this is blatantly unjust!

1960
02:06:00,538 --> 02:06:02,972
I... i... i won't be able to do this.

1961
02:06:03,975 --> 02:06:08,746
Dinkarji, if you don't follow
these instructions...

1962
02:06:08,746 --> 02:06:11,977
i'll be forced to
take disciplinary action.

1963
02:06:13,351 --> 02:06:16,154
The bank guarantee that
s.t.m. Has taken for your house mortgage...

1964
02:06:16,154 --> 02:06:17,314
will have to be withdrawn.

1965
02:06:18,823 --> 02:06:20,347
As for yourjob, well...

1966
02:06:21,459 --> 02:06:24,758
mr. Ex-vice principal...

1967
02:06:26,898 --> 02:06:28,490
you have no other option.

1968
02:06:29,767 --> 02:06:31,359
Your house could get auctioned.

1969
02:06:32,337 --> 02:06:34,931
Then, perhaps you too will
have to seek shelter in that stable.

1970
02:06:41,779 --> 02:06:43,337
See you in the class.

1971
02:06:49,387 --> 02:06:51,514
Namaste, dinkar, you're early today.

1972
02:06:56,027 --> 02:06:56,857
What's wrong?

1973
02:06:59,998 --> 02:07:02,432
Sir, i'm resigning from s.t.m.

1974
02:07:03,434 --> 02:07:08,804
Sir, mithilesh singh has lured
the other teachers away with money.

1975
02:07:09,374 --> 02:07:10,807
He tried the same with me too.

1976
02:07:11,876 --> 02:07:13,070
Sir, i can't take it anymore.

1977
02:07:13,111 --> 02:07:14,100
Sir, i'm leaving this job.

1978
02:07:14,479 --> 02:07:16,276
No, dinkar.
You will do nothing of the sort.

1979
02:07:16,814 --> 02:07:18,577
I know you have
your responsibilities.

1980
02:07:18,616 --> 02:07:21,085
But, you're alone, sir!
Sir, this job isn't...

1981
02:07:21,085 --> 02:07:24,384
don't worry about me.
I will manage. Ok?

1982
02:07:33,631 --> 02:07:37,192
Come, come on, here all of you.

1983
02:07:39,971 --> 02:07:42,307
Come... come with me...

1984
02:07:42,307 --> 02:07:44,342
it's like this.

1985
02:07:44,342 --> 02:07:48,836
The other teachers
won't be able to come now.

1986
02:07:49,547 --> 02:07:54,118
So, those of you who can come
in the afternoon, be here at 3 p.m.

1987
02:07:54,118 --> 02:07:57,849
And those who can make it
in the evening, come at 7 p.m.

1988
02:07:58,222 --> 02:08:00,213
I will take three sessions. Daily.

1989
02:08:00,358 --> 02:08:01,188
Pseudopodia.

1990
02:08:01,859 --> 02:08:04,987
The parental body itself
functions as the reproductive unit.

1991
02:08:05,029 --> 02:08:07,965
The unicellular parent organism
divides itself into two parts.

1992
02:08:07,965 --> 02:08:12,595
...1, 2, 3, 3, 1, 1 within brackets.

1993
02:08:13,471 --> 02:08:14,165
Now...

1994
02:08:15,173 --> 02:08:17,869
obtain the universe of the following matrix...

1995
02:08:18,242 --> 02:08:20,608
using... elementary proportions.

1996
02:08:21,112 --> 02:08:21,942
And...

1997
02:08:27,585 --> 02:08:30,315
i'll be back in a minute.
Finish the diagrams.

1998
02:08:47,004 --> 02:08:50,440
Dad, please rest for a while.

1999
02:08:50,575 --> 02:08:51,940
No, i'm okay, my dear.

2000
02:08:52,510 --> 02:08:54,171
I have to complete their lesson today.

2001
02:08:54,345 --> 02:08:56,006
Please, dad... just for a little while.

2002
02:08:56,681 --> 02:08:58,615
You worry a lot about me.

2003
02:08:59,484 --> 02:09:01,645
Okay then,
please get me a cup of tea.

2004
02:09:03,955 --> 02:09:04,444
Okay.

2005
02:09:04,956 --> 02:09:05,752
Thank you.

2006
02:09:16,134 --> 02:09:18,227
Okay, settle down,
settle down... alright?

2007
02:09:19,170 --> 02:09:19,727
Let's start.

2008
02:09:28,379 --> 02:09:30,643
Dad, sit still for a minute at least!

2009
02:09:31,516 --> 02:09:36,421
I gave them a test.
I have to check the answers.

2010
02:09:36,421 --> 02:09:38,514
Just what are you
trying to do, prabhakar?

2011
02:09:38,689 --> 02:09:41,590
How long are you
going to do all this alone?

2012
02:09:42,260 --> 02:09:43,522
What if something happens to you?

2013
02:09:48,733 --> 02:09:51,327
Well, anything can happen
at anytime, kavita.

2014
02:09:52,737 --> 02:09:55,205
But, the path that
i have chosen to walk on...

2015
02:09:56,541 --> 02:09:58,372
i am not going to stop.

2016
02:09:59,610 --> 02:10:02,374
Even if i have to
walk alone all the way.

2017
02:10:10,154 --> 02:10:13,646
Hariya, come...
have some sweets. Good!

2018
02:10:14,358 --> 02:10:17,020
Deepak, here have some sweets.

2019
02:10:18,029 --> 02:10:20,156
I had organised a prayer
for lord satyanarayan.

2020
02:10:20,665 --> 02:10:23,793
There are only 30 days to go
for muniya's board exams.

2021
02:10:24,135 --> 02:10:25,837
Suraj, please distribute these sweets.

2022
02:10:25,837 --> 02:10:26,769
To everyone!

2023
02:10:28,706 --> 02:10:29,331
So...

2024
02:10:30,141 --> 02:10:31,039
how is sir?

2025
02:10:32,410 --> 02:10:34,846
Obsessed by the same desire.

2026
02:10:34,846 --> 02:10:37,610
From 5 a.m. Until late at night...

2027
02:10:37,648 --> 02:10:38,816
he's at it for the kids.

2028
02:10:38,816 --> 02:10:43,150
There's poorbi and kavita who help.

2029
02:10:44,188 --> 02:10:46,190
But he really has no
breathing space at all.

2030
02:10:46,190 --> 02:10:47,425
We get double benefits.

2031
02:10:47,425 --> 02:10:50,553
Guruji teaches us in day
and here deepak guides us at night.

2032
02:10:52,063 --> 02:10:54,156
If only you were with him...

2033
02:10:54,565 --> 02:10:56,396
he would've had some support.

2034
02:10:57,768 --> 02:11:00,638
27 students from our neighbourhood
attend sir's morning class.

2035
02:11:00,638 --> 02:11:02,503
That's all very well, deepak.

2036
02:11:02,540 --> 02:11:04,375
But with more students coming in...

2037
02:11:04,375 --> 02:11:05,433
and guruji being alone...

2038
02:11:14,113 --> 02:11:18,709
a upon x+4 plus b upon x+7

2039
02:11:18,751 --> 02:11:22,454
and to find the value of the
constants a and b, we will assume...

2040
02:11:22,454 --> 02:11:25,355
x + 4 is equal 0

2041
02:11:25,391 --> 02:11:29,418
which means that x is equal to - 4

2042
02:11:34,433 --> 02:11:35,764
- namaskar.
- Namaste.

2043
02:11:36,702 --> 02:11:39,170
Sir, our kids want to join your class.

2044
02:11:40,105 --> 02:11:43,233
Both of these go to k.k. Coaching but
now want to come to your class.

2045
02:11:44,109 --> 02:11:47,340
My sons, shiv and om are already with you.

2046
02:11:47,513 --> 02:11:49,674
Seeing their improvement,
these people have also come.

2047
02:11:52,051 --> 02:11:54,053
Any student who wishes
to study is welcome here.

2048
02:11:54,053 --> 02:11:55,421
You can definitely send them.

2049
02:11:55,421 --> 02:11:57,355
But, sir, we had one request.

2050
02:11:57,389 --> 02:11:59,584
Please teach our kids separately.

2051
02:12:00,292 --> 02:12:02,726
Many people want
to send their kids to you.

2052
02:12:02,795 --> 02:12:05,831
If you wish, we can even give
you a separate place.

2053
02:12:05,831 --> 02:12:09,062
We are willing to
pay any fee that you ask.

2054
02:12:09,368 --> 02:12:13,405
The only thing is...
sitting near them is a problem.

2055
02:12:13,405 --> 02:12:15,202
These kids are...

2056
02:12:15,574 --> 02:12:16,700
you understand, don't you?

2057
02:12:17,076 --> 02:12:19,244
I mean... they don't even bathe.

2058
02:12:19,244 --> 02:12:21,405
Being with them will
ruin our children's culture.

2059
02:12:22,748 --> 02:12:25,808
There's a stench that comes
from your thoughts, in fact.

2060
02:12:26,819 --> 02:12:28,878
Your views are disgusting.

2061
02:12:30,222 --> 02:12:31,712
For me, all children are equal.

2062
02:12:33,225 --> 02:12:36,562
I will teach them together,
in one class.

2063
02:12:36,562 --> 02:12:37,654
If anyone wants to leave, he can.

2064
02:12:39,098 --> 02:12:41,467
And now, if you'll excuse me,
may i get back to my class?

2065
02:12:41,467 --> 02:12:43,560
We were talking about your benefit.

2066
02:12:43,702 --> 02:12:46,638
There, at k.k. Coaching,
mithileshji has brought in 10 teachers...

2067
02:12:46,638 --> 02:12:48,469
from delhi who're paid
200,000 a month.

2068
02:12:48,540 --> 02:12:50,175
He has also reduced the fees.

2069
02:12:50,175 --> 02:12:51,767
Who wants to send their kids to you?

2070
02:12:52,511 --> 02:12:52,875
Let's go!

2071
02:12:53,645 --> 02:12:55,237
Shiv! Om! Come on home.

2072
02:12:55,614 --> 02:12:57,479
From tomorrow, you'll study at k.k.

2073
02:12:57,516 --> 02:12:58,448
C'mon... c'mon!

2074
02:13:00,319 --> 02:13:00,876
Come on.

2075
02:13:03,789 --> 02:13:04,881
Right now.

2076
02:13:07,192 --> 02:13:10,320
So, if we have to find the value.

2077
02:13:10,529 --> 02:13:12,793
Of a and b, let us assume...

2078
02:13:13,799 --> 02:13:15,630
let us assume that...

2079
02:13:16,635 --> 02:13:19,661
x+4 is equal to 0

2080
02:13:20,139 --> 02:13:20,833
therefore...

2081
02:13:21,340 --> 02:13:23,501
x is equal to - 4

2082
02:13:23,776 --> 02:13:24,470
now...

2083
02:13:25,544 --> 02:13:26,945
how do we factor this?

2084
02:13:26,945 --> 02:13:30,244
Sir, x+7 is equal to 0 i.e. X is equal to - 7

2085
02:13:30,682 --> 02:13:32,445
now put this value in f of x

2086
02:13:32,718 --> 02:13:35,881
sir, except at x + 7 i.e. In the denominator

2087
02:13:36,722 --> 02:13:37,689
correct!

2088
02:13:38,924 --> 02:13:39,822
Sir, 2 by 3.

2089
02:13:43,562 --> 02:13:44,654
Now...

2090
02:13:45,864 --> 02:13:48,731
if z is a complex number then...

2091
02:13:50,502 --> 02:13:55,641
what does mod z = 1,
represent geometrically?

2092
02:13:55,641 --> 02:13:57,309
Sir, it represents a circle.

2093
02:13:57,309 --> 02:13:59,743
It's origin will be at the centre
and radius will be one.

2094
02:14:08,854 --> 02:14:11,345
Mass of hardness of a substance...

2095
02:14:11,390 --> 02:14:14,827
multiplied by multiplication factor,
how much is it friends?

2096
02:14:14,827 --> 02:14:15,828
Eighty one...

2097
02:14:15,828 --> 02:14:17,496
so today's question is to find...

2098
02:14:17,496 --> 02:14:21,300
the resistance of the circuit
va is equal to vb, vb is equal to vc...

2099
02:14:21,300 --> 02:14:22,631
always remember...

2100
02:14:22,668 --> 02:14:25,204
in the exam,
read the questions twice...

2101
02:14:25,204 --> 02:14:26,694
or even thrice, ok?

2102
02:14:27,539 --> 02:14:29,875
The answer always lies within the question.

2103
02:14:29,875 --> 02:14:33,402
We answered prabhakar sir's question
as soon as he wrote it on the board.

2104
02:14:33,679 --> 02:14:34,509
Really?

2105
02:14:35,447 --> 02:14:36,004
What did he say?

2106
02:14:36,582 --> 02:14:37,640
Nothing, he merely praised us.

2107
02:15:44,783 --> 02:15:50,380
I knew that no one else
could sabotage my class like this.

2108
02:15:50,856 --> 02:15:51,720
Sir...

2109
02:15:53,558 --> 02:15:55,549
sir, we never meant to.

2110
02:15:56,395 --> 02:15:57,384
We were just...

2111
02:15:58,263 --> 02:16:01,366
sir, whatever punishment
you want to give us...

2112
02:16:01,366 --> 02:16:02,731
we will happily accept it.

2113
02:16:04,403 --> 02:16:07,634
But, please forgive us, sir.

2114
02:16:08,774 --> 02:16:09,638
That will happen.

2115
02:16:11,610 --> 02:16:12,872
You will certainly be punished.

2116
02:16:16,982 --> 02:16:19,177
From tomorrow,
you will hold your classes...

2117
02:16:21,386 --> 02:16:22,614
together with mine.

2118
02:16:45,744 --> 02:16:47,974
Tearing walls down

2119
02:16:50,549 --> 02:16:52,710
breaking new ground

2120
02:16:54,953 --> 02:16:56,853
is this light

2121
02:16:59,524 --> 02:17:03,551
leaving behind shackles that held it tight

2122
02:17:04,529 --> 02:17:08,397
the darkness will surround you

2123
02:17:09,001 --> 02:17:11,731
make it your ink pot

2124
02:17:13,238 --> 02:17:16,230
and script a brand new day

2125
02:17:17,642 --> 02:17:21,578
smash the locks, let the sun shine

2126
02:17:22,447 --> 02:17:26,907
hold the light in your hands, make it thine

2127
02:17:27,352 --> 02:17:31,686
break the wells, the river will flow

2128
02:17:31,790 --> 02:17:35,783
inhale it, share it, let it glow

2129
02:17:36,361 --> 02:17:37,055
it's the light

2130
02:17:37,262 --> 02:17:37,785
it belongs to everyone

2131
02:17:39,364 --> 02:17:40,729
it's shining bright

2132
02:17:41,533 --> 02:17:43,262
it belongs to everyone

2133
02:17:44,002 --> 02:17:45,526
it's shining bright

2134
02:17:45,871 --> 02:17:48,431
it's shining bright all around

2135
02:17:57,816 --> 02:17:58,646
mr. Principal...

2136
02:17:59,084 --> 02:18:01,416
i am going to teach with prabhakarji.

2137
02:18:02,454 --> 02:18:04,752
Do what you can.

2138
02:18:18,603 --> 02:18:20,935
May there be paths for everyone

2139
02:18:20,972 --> 02:18:22,872
lined with hope on either side

2140
02:18:22,908 --> 02:18:27,368
and the light shines along through the ride

2141
02:18:27,446 --> 02:18:30,115
may there be paths for everyone

2142
02:18:30,115 --> 02:18:32,049
lined with hope on either side

2143
02:18:32,084 --> 02:18:36,421
and the light shines along through the ride

2144
02:18:36,421 --> 02:18:38,757
there was a void, but now it's filled

2145
02:18:38,757 --> 02:18:41,021
there was a barrier, but now it's gone

2146
02:18:41,059 --> 02:18:43,755
the sun and the sky

2147
02:18:45,030 --> 02:18:46,759
are right here

2148
02:18:50,502 --> 02:18:54,768
smash the locks, let the sun shine

2149
02:18:54,873 --> 02:18:59,478
hold the light in your hands, make it thine

2150
02:18:59,478 --> 02:19:03,676
break the wells, the river will flow

2151
02:19:04,349 --> 02:19:08,376
inhale it, share it, let it glow

2152
02:19:08,453 --> 02:19:09,147
it's the light

2153
02:19:09,354 --> 02:19:11,481
it belongs to everyone

2154
02:19:11,823 --> 02:19:13,825
it's shining bright

2155
02:19:13,825 --> 02:19:15,850
it belongs to everyone

2156
02:19:16,495 --> 02:19:18,029
it's shining bright

2157
02:19:18,029 --> 02:19:19,097
guruji!

2158
02:19:19,097 --> 02:19:21,600
These are people from century ply.

2159
02:19:21,600 --> 02:19:23,635
They helped enormously in building this.

2160
02:19:23,635 --> 02:19:24,863
Thank you very much.

2161
02:19:25,103 --> 02:19:27,037
Your contribution was indeed very worthy.

2162
02:19:27,072 --> 02:19:29,131
No sir, we just did our duty.

2163
02:19:29,608 --> 02:19:31,643
You're slogging away in a stable...

2164
02:19:31,643 --> 02:19:33,008
with that worthless guy?!

2165
02:19:33,044 --> 02:19:34,773
You'll be thrown out of college.

2166
02:19:35,013 --> 02:19:36,139
You will fail!

2167
02:19:36,414 --> 02:19:37,711
Go ahead and throw me out.

2168
02:19:38,717 --> 02:19:40,412
But, no one can fail me now.

2169
02:19:41,553 --> 02:19:43,612
You see, i have the
best teacher in the world.

2170
02:19:44,089 --> 02:19:44,783
Prabhakar anand.

2171
02:19:46,391 --> 02:19:47,050
Best?!

2172
02:19:48,093 --> 02:19:52,998
We're offering you such brilliant,
expensive teachers, the best facilities...

2173
02:19:52,998 --> 02:19:56,034
and guaranteeing admission to our university.

2174
02:19:56,034 --> 02:19:59,137
And yet you are sending your kids to
that stable to reduce their future to bullshit?!

2175
02:19:59,137 --> 02:20:02,507
Here you teach just by
distributing notes and guess papers.

2176
02:20:02,507 --> 02:20:04,407
Our kids are sick of memorizing everything.

2177
02:20:04,442 --> 02:20:07,045
Whatever that may be.
But we fetch you results!

2178
02:20:07,045 --> 02:20:08,603
Finally, that's all that matters.

2179
02:20:08,947 --> 02:20:09,709
Result!

2180
02:20:10,081 --> 02:20:11,844
Let the exams get over, sir.

2181
02:20:11,883 --> 02:20:13,145
We'll see about the results too.

2182
02:20:13,585 --> 02:20:14,986
It cancels out 2xy, therefore...

2183
02:20:14,986 --> 02:20:18,523
2 into x square plus y square is equal to

2184
02:20:18,523 --> 02:20:21,515
2 into x square plus y square

2185
02:20:21,793 --> 02:20:24,159
q. E. D.

2186
02:20:24,462 --> 02:20:27,098
- That was quite easily done.

2187
02:20:27,098 --> 02:20:28,156
Very good!

2188
02:20:46,418 --> 02:20:52,390
- Eight months ago, dr. Prabhakar anand
began teaching some 5-6 kids here in this stable.

2189
02:20:52,390 --> 02:20:56,292
- Steadily five became 10,
10 to 20, 20 to 100.

2190
02:20:56,328 --> 02:21:00,031
- And today, there are a total
of 327 students of 12th standard!

2191
02:21:00,031 --> 02:21:05,560
- They took free coaching at this preparatory school
and their results are out today.

2192
02:21:05,604 --> 02:21:09,441
- 100% success!
And that too in the 1st division!

2193
02:21:09,441 --> 02:21:13,275
- From slum-dwellers to
those that arrive in luxury cars...

2194
02:21:13,311 --> 02:21:17,215
- all category of children study here.
There is no discrimination here.

2195
02:21:17,215 --> 02:21:21,709
Even those, like k.k. Coaching,
that charge hundreds of thousands of rupees...

2196
02:21:21,753 --> 02:21:25,689
have been beaten by this
free coaching centre that...

2197
02:21:25,724 --> 02:21:28,522
began in a stable
and is now being termed...

2198
02:21:28,560 --> 02:21:29,754
super stable!

2199
02:21:36,001 --> 02:21:38,765
This stable coaching centre
will have to be shut down!

2200
02:22:12,037 --> 02:22:16,371
Sister! Just see what
they've pasted on my gate.

2201
02:22:17,409 --> 02:22:18,034
Just see.

2202
02:22:20,578 --> 02:22:21,442
Oh god!

2203
02:22:22,647 --> 02:22:23,705
What does it say?

2204
02:22:24,249 --> 02:22:25,511
It's an official notice.

2205
02:22:26,051 --> 02:22:28,820
Shambhu uncle, did you take this land
on lease from the government?

2206
02:22:28,820 --> 02:22:31,584
Yes, the then collector,
ramesh chandra...

2207
02:22:31,623 --> 02:22:33,614
got it done 20 years ago.

2208
02:22:34,259 --> 02:22:36,386
The government wants it back now.

2209
02:22:38,063 --> 02:22:41,700
What! But i...
deposit the rent every month!

2210
02:22:41,700 --> 02:22:43,168
I have all the receipts.

2211
02:22:43,168 --> 02:22:43,600
Look.

2212
02:22:43,635 --> 02:22:44,397
What happened?

2213
02:22:46,504 --> 02:22:49,074
They've given us a notice of seven days
but have served it today...

2214
02:22:49,074 --> 02:22:50,598
which is the last day.

2215
02:22:50,642 --> 02:22:54,271
But how can anyone
just snatch my land from me?

2216
02:22:55,480 --> 02:22:59,075
The government wants to sell
this stable and build a warehouse here.

2217
02:23:02,287 --> 02:23:06,155
But we all know who is using this excuse...

2218
02:23:07,225 --> 02:23:09,327
to demolish our stable school...

2219
02:23:09,327 --> 02:23:10,589
and why.

2220
02:23:11,229 --> 02:23:13,094
But this time we won't let it happen!

2221
02:23:13,732 --> 02:23:15,529
We definitely won't, guruji.

2222
02:23:16,267 --> 02:23:17,564
Even if they shoot us!

2223
02:23:47,128 --> 02:23:48,026
Open the gate!

2224
02:23:48,363 --> 02:23:49,489
- You aren't allowed inside!

2225
02:23:56,404 --> 02:24:00,500
Do you people know
why i'm not allowed to go in?

2226
02:24:02,777 --> 02:24:04,768
Because i supported prabhakar sir.

2227
02:24:05,713 --> 02:24:10,946
First they pushed him out of here,
and now they're hell bent on destroying him.

2228
02:24:12,520 --> 02:24:14,010
This is the moment, friends.

2229
02:24:15,089 --> 02:24:18,650
Come with me,
and put an end to their dirty intentions.

2230
02:24:49,757 --> 02:24:51,019
Why should our children go there?

2231
02:24:51,059 --> 02:24:52,185
To get beaten and shot?

2232
02:24:52,727 --> 02:24:54,024
You are absolutely right.

2233
02:24:54,662 --> 02:24:55,822
Why should they go?

2234
02:24:56,231 --> 02:25:00,793
Why did prabhakar anand raise his voice for
the poor and the backward and ruined his life?

2235
02:25:01,135 --> 02:25:05,037
Why does he live in a stable and
work round the clock to teach these kids for free?

2236
02:25:05,139 --> 02:25:05,969
Why?

2237
02:25:07,175 --> 02:25:09,439
Because that isn't merely a stable.

2238
02:25:09,477 --> 02:25:10,569
It is a pathway.

2239
02:25:11,112 --> 02:25:13,637
A pathway for these
and other kids to move ahead.

2240
02:25:14,182 --> 02:25:16,013
To have a better life.

2241
02:25:16,584 --> 02:25:18,552
For them to be educated.

2242
02:25:18,653 --> 02:25:21,121
So that they can hold
their heads high in this society!

2243
02:25:21,155 --> 02:25:24,249
Friends, today that stable needs you.

2244
02:25:25,226 --> 02:25:27,626
Prabhakar sir needs you!

2245
02:25:28,496 --> 02:25:29,827
What is your decision?

2246
02:25:29,864 --> 02:25:31,229
The decision has
already been made, madam.

2247
02:25:32,200 --> 02:25:33,462
No one will go from here.

2248
02:25:33,501 --> 02:25:34,991
Why not?
We'll certainly go!

2249
02:25:36,004 --> 02:25:37,562
Come on, let's go!

2250
02:25:40,975 --> 02:25:41,669
Get lost!

2251
02:25:42,176 --> 02:25:42,733
Hey!

2252
02:25:42,844 --> 02:25:43,708
Hey stop them!

2253
02:25:43,745 --> 02:25:45,144
Don't damage my car!

2254
02:26:39,334 --> 02:26:41,165
It is the government's order!

2255
02:26:42,036 --> 02:26:44,061
This land has to be vacated.

2256
02:26:44,305 --> 02:26:49,538
You people leave quietly
and let us finish our work.

2257
02:26:50,111 --> 02:26:51,669
Otherwise, in one minute...

2258
02:26:51,746 --> 02:26:53,976
there is no need
for any warning, inspector.

2259
02:26:55,016 --> 02:26:56,711
You do your work and we'll do ours.

2260
02:26:57,685 --> 02:26:59,050
Roll the bulldozer!

2261
02:27:00,321 --> 02:27:03,188
You have batons, guns,
a lot of power.

2262
02:27:03,925 --> 02:27:07,190
But, it's obvious that you
aren't aware of our strength.

2263
02:27:07,762 --> 02:27:09,286
We have determination!

2264
02:27:10,965 --> 02:27:12,227
And it's growing now.

2265
02:27:13,601 --> 02:27:15,660
No power can crush it.

2266
02:27:16,270 --> 02:27:18,761
All of you, look carefully
and understand one thing.

2267
02:27:19,273 --> 02:27:23,300
That these kids come
from families that are like yours.

2268
02:27:24,946 --> 02:27:28,211
The dream that they have of a future...

2269
02:27:29,817 --> 02:27:32,251
is the same that is
nurtured in your house too.

2270
02:27:32,620 --> 02:27:37,284
Those powerful contractors and ministers,
on whose orders you've come here...

2271
02:27:37,358 --> 02:27:39,792
they do not want that dream to be realised.

2272
02:27:40,628 --> 02:27:42,255
Now, the choice is yours.

2273
02:27:43,631 --> 02:27:47,032
Do you want to protect this dream...

2274
02:27:48,136 --> 02:27:50,161
or do you want to crush it?

2275
02:28:15,229 --> 02:28:16,423
Hey!
What's going on here?

2276
02:28:19,634 --> 02:28:20,760
Hey, what's happening?

2277
02:28:21,102 --> 02:28:22,797
You have orders to raze this stable.

2278
02:28:23,871 --> 02:28:24,667
Understood?

2279
02:28:26,374 --> 02:28:26,965
Thakur!

2280
02:28:28,209 --> 02:28:29,767
I'll get you stripped of your uniform.

2281
02:28:30,044 --> 02:28:30,908
Understood?

2282
02:28:31,446 --> 02:28:32,879
Do your duty!

2283
02:28:34,849 --> 02:28:36,077
Empty this stable!

2284
02:28:36,851 --> 02:28:38,216
Use your batons...

2285
02:28:38,686 --> 02:28:39,812
and drive everyone out of here!

2286
02:28:39,921 --> 02:28:40,853
Use your batons!

2287
02:28:40,955 --> 02:28:42,149
Demolish that!

2288
02:28:43,124 --> 02:28:44,284
You don't know me...

2289
02:28:46,194 --> 02:28:47,855
hey! Have you lost it or what?

2290
02:28:48,129 --> 02:28:50,324
We had, because we feared you.

2291
02:28:50,398 --> 02:28:51,922
But, now we have
recovered our senses.

2292
02:28:51,999 --> 02:28:53,023
Come on!

2293
02:28:53,134 --> 02:28:54,999
Batons are going to be
used on them now!

2294
02:28:57,872 --> 02:28:59,134
- Do you hear me?

2295
02:29:00,842 --> 02:29:04,710
- Mark my words!
You will be finished!

2296
02:29:06,247 --> 02:29:10,707
I've built a university for 12 billion.

2297
02:29:10,985 --> 02:29:12,282
I will buy everyone out!

2298
02:29:13,121 --> 02:29:14,748
I will buy off this land.

2299
02:29:14,822 --> 02:29:16,687
And... these cops.

2300
02:29:16,724 --> 02:29:17,281
And you too!

2301
02:29:17,358 --> 02:29:18,086
- Enough!

2302
02:29:19,360 --> 02:29:20,088
Enough!

2303
02:29:21,362 --> 02:29:22,954
You've said enough mithilesh singh.

2304
02:29:24,065 --> 02:29:26,226
What is your credibility actually?

2305
02:29:26,300 --> 02:29:28,291
You have pawned your soul itself!

2306
02:29:28,369 --> 02:29:31,031
Your desperation clearly reveals
your bankruptcy.

2307
02:29:31,072 --> 02:29:32,869
Bankruptcy?!

2308
02:29:33,374 --> 02:29:34,238
Bankruptcy?!

2309
02:29:34,275 --> 02:29:38,871
No matter how much poison
greedy frauds like you may unleash...

2310
02:29:38,946 --> 02:29:43,042
this country understands
the value of knowledge and education.

2311
02:29:43,184 --> 02:29:45,516
It knows how to respect its teachers.

2312
02:29:46,354 --> 02:29:48,049
Why 12 billion?

2313
02:29:48,089 --> 02:29:51,752
Even if you stake 12 trillion,
you will get nothing!

2314
02:29:52,360 --> 02:29:55,921
The future of india's education
isn't for sale!

2315
02:29:56,397 --> 02:29:58,763
You had called me a zero, hadn't you?

2316
02:29:59,400 --> 02:30:00,526
Thank you!

2317
02:30:01,235 --> 02:30:04,727
That zero was invented by a great indian.

2318
02:30:05,106 --> 02:30:07,438
Its power you have obviously
failed to comprehend.

2319
02:30:07,542 --> 02:30:11,239
Anyone who collides with a zero,
gets reduced to a zero himself.

2320
02:30:11,279 --> 02:30:12,473
Becomes nothing!

2321
02:30:13,181 --> 02:30:14,170
You...

2322
02:30:14,782 --> 02:30:19,412
and your low-down greedy bosses
have lost your game now.

2323
02:30:19,487 --> 02:30:20,784
You are finished.

2324
02:30:21,556 --> 02:30:22,113
Finished!

2325
02:30:22,223 --> 02:30:23,247
Finished?!

2326
02:30:24,091 --> 02:30:25,080
I?

2327
02:30:25,259 --> 02:30:26,419
Is that so?

2328
02:30:27,094 --> 02:30:28,891
You don't know who i am!

2329
02:30:29,797 --> 02:30:31,788
I will destroy this stable.

2330
02:30:32,466 --> 02:30:33,933
Watch me!

2331
02:30:34,368 --> 02:30:36,029
You'd set out to create a super stable, eh?

2332
02:30:37,038 --> 02:30:38,335
Nowjust wait.

2333
02:30:38,406 --> 02:30:40,806
And watch!
Baburamji...

2334
02:30:42,109 --> 02:30:42,905
- what!

2335
02:30:43,511 --> 02:30:44,500
- What do you mean,
you didn't know?

2336
02:30:45,246 --> 02:30:46,577
Is this why i got you promoted?

2337
02:30:47,215 --> 02:30:48,273
- For a day like this?

2338
02:30:48,382 --> 02:30:49,246
Sir, i'm almost there...

2339
02:30:49,317 --> 02:30:51,217
- just drive the bulldozers over it.

2340
02:30:51,552 --> 02:30:53,952
- And if batons don't work, use bullets.

2341
02:30:54,322 --> 02:30:56,882
- If that stable is not destroyed...

2342
02:30:56,958 --> 02:30:57,982
i'll destroy you!

2343
02:31:00,494 --> 02:31:01,119
D. G... d.g.p. Sir...

2344
02:31:02,797 --> 02:31:03,991
just look at this!

2345
02:31:05,833 --> 02:31:07,926
You have been served with a notice.

2346
02:31:08,336 --> 02:31:10,998
There is no need for a warning.

2347
02:31:11,138 --> 02:31:14,437
After 10 seconds,
there will be a baton-charge!

2348
02:31:14,942 --> 02:31:19,402
And, if we meet with
any resistance from you...

2349
02:31:19,947 --> 02:31:21,209
we will open fire!

2350
02:31:22,016 --> 02:31:23,608
Be ready for a baton-charge!

2351
02:31:29,457 --> 02:31:30,287
- Ten...

2352
02:31:31,259 --> 02:31:31,987
- nine...

2353
02:31:32,026 --> 02:31:33,288
- these people are not
going to obey!

2354
02:31:33,394 --> 02:31:33,985
- Eight...

2355
02:31:34,262 --> 02:31:35,490
- i'm telling you...
this countdown will do nothing!

2356
02:31:35,529 --> 02:31:36,359
- Seven...

2357
02:31:37,031 --> 02:31:38,259
- just roll the bulldozers!

2358
02:31:38,399 --> 02:31:39,195
- Six...

2359
02:31:40,134 --> 02:31:41,032
- five...

2360
02:31:42,003 --> 02:31:42,560
- four...

2361
02:31:42,603 --> 02:31:43,865
- it's no good.

2362
02:31:44,038 --> 02:31:44,527
- Three...

2363
02:31:44,572 --> 02:31:46,267
- i'm telling you,
this man won't budge!

2364
02:31:46,440 --> 02:31:47,134
- Two...

2365
02:31:47,174 --> 02:31:49,870
- this man is actually a criminal!

2366
02:31:55,416 --> 02:31:56,849
- Where are you people looking?

2367
02:31:57,285 --> 02:31:58,343
- Roll the bulldozers!

2368
02:31:59,186 --> 02:32:00,915
All this is illegal!

2369
02:32:01,088 --> 02:32:03,454
- No one is ready to listen!

2370
02:32:03,491 --> 02:32:05,288
- Is there a law or not?

2371
02:32:06,827 --> 02:32:08,021
Shakuntala ma'am!

2372
02:32:08,062 --> 02:32:09,324
- Just watch what i'll do!

2373
02:32:09,864 --> 02:32:11,695
She has never stepped out of hrishikesh.

2374
02:32:12,066 --> 02:32:12,896
Ma'am...

2375
02:32:14,302 --> 02:32:16,429
you've become
the chief minister, prabhu dayal.

2376
02:32:16,704 --> 02:32:19,332
You can't even fill up
the potholes on the roads but...

2377
02:32:20,041 --> 02:32:21,338
you will drive bulldozers over children?

2378
02:32:21,475 --> 02:32:24,000
Please forgive me, ma'am.
I just got to know.

2379
02:32:24,078 --> 02:32:25,340
These people will move away
in a minute.

2380
02:32:25,513 --> 02:32:26,343
- Sorry, ma'am.

2381
02:32:26,380 --> 02:32:27,312
- Come on, come on...

2382
02:32:27,348 --> 02:32:29,373
place your cameras there!

2383
02:32:29,717 --> 02:32:32,083
There... cover that.

2384
02:32:32,186 --> 02:32:33,278
Who is this man?

2385
02:32:33,988 --> 02:32:37,355
He's... uh... the principal of s.t.m.,
mithilesh singh.

2386
02:32:37,858 --> 02:32:40,019
He's lost his mental balance.

2387
02:32:40,294 --> 02:32:41,090
Sir!

2388
02:32:41,762 --> 02:32:42,751
Yes, sir!

2389
02:32:43,097 --> 02:32:44,257
Sir, i'll withdraw them immediately.

2390
02:32:44,899 --> 02:32:46,730
Guruji, the police is leaving.

2391
02:32:46,834 --> 02:32:49,029
Does this mean our stable
won't be demolished?

2392
02:32:49,403 --> 02:32:50,165
It won't be demolished, muniya.

2393
02:32:50,271 --> 02:32:52,102
Greetings, shakuntala ma'am.

2394
02:32:52,139 --> 02:32:53,504
Bless you.

2395
02:32:54,041 --> 02:32:56,942
I saw you 32 years ago.
You're still the same.

2396
02:32:58,212 --> 02:32:59,008
Poorbi...

2397
02:32:59,780 --> 02:33:00,906
this is poorbi, our daughter.

2398
02:33:00,948 --> 02:33:01,277
Bless you.

2399
02:33:01,315 --> 02:33:03,215
- This is deepak kumar, ma'am.

2400
02:33:03,718 --> 02:33:03,945
Namaste.

2401
02:33:04,018 --> 02:33:05,280
University topper from s.t.m.

2402
02:33:06,020 --> 02:33:08,887
Now, i teach here.
With sir. In the stable class.

2403
02:33:10,758 --> 02:33:12,953
I have just one demand, ma'am.

2404
02:33:13,294 --> 02:33:14,761
From the s.t.m. Trust...

2405
02:33:15,663 --> 02:33:16,652
you should have my father... er...

2406
02:33:18,132 --> 02:33:18,757
- discharged!

2407
02:33:18,833 --> 02:33:19,390
Yes, discharged.

2408
02:33:20,668 --> 02:33:21,930
Please discharge him!

2409
02:33:24,038 --> 02:33:25,300
Do you remember...

2410
02:33:25,339 --> 02:33:28,206
when i quit
s.t.m.'s day-to-day affairs?

2411
02:33:28,676 --> 02:33:30,109
Yes, 32 years ago.

2412
02:33:30,644 --> 02:33:32,168
When you became the principal.

2413
02:33:33,014 --> 02:33:36,882
And, you just left,
without even telling me!

2414
02:33:37,651 --> 02:33:39,278
I apologise sincerely for that.

2415
02:33:40,688 --> 02:33:42,849
But, it was clear that
my time there was over.

2416
02:33:43,891 --> 02:33:47,691
And, if i say that
actually your time starts now?

2417
02:33:49,263 --> 02:33:53,131
Madam, i can't become
the principal of s.t.m. Again.

2418
02:33:53,200 --> 02:33:54,189
I have a lot to do here.

2419
02:33:54,268 --> 02:33:56,202
Not s.t.m. But...

2420
02:33:56,404 --> 02:33:58,395
s.t. Remedial centre.

2421
02:33:59,073 --> 02:34:01,132
Aniruddha has told me everything.

2422
02:34:01,442 --> 02:34:05,845
In our own college campus,
we will open a remedial centre where...

2423
02:34:05,913 --> 02:34:10,907
needy and weak students
will receive free coaching.

2424
02:34:11,218 --> 02:34:16,383
And, you will be its principal
and chief trustee for life.

2425
02:35:09,643 --> 02:35:11,907
Q. E. D.

2426
02:35:12,046 --> 02:35:15,106
- That was quite easily done!
