00:04:13,080 --> 00:04:15,840
So Mr. Vachani you want to say that..

33
00:04:16,800 --> 00:04:19,360
..the core committee
does not take responsibility..

34
00:04:19,440 --> 00:04:21,600
..for spokes person's live comments.

35
00:04:21,680 --> 00:04:24,480
Look I..
- Answer my question, Mr. Vachani.

36
00:04:24,560 --> 00:04:27,120
I am..
- You will have to answer my question.

37
00:04:27,200 --> 00:04:27,840
Answer me first.

38
00:04:27,920 --> 00:04:30,360
Let me also...
- Answer me first, Mr. Vachani.

39
00:04:30,440 --> 00:04:33,080
Let me speak.
- Answer me first.

40
00:04:33,160 --> 00:04:35,120
You will have to answer Mr. Vachani.

41
00:04:35,200 --> 00:04:37,200
I am speaking. Let me speak.
- Answer me.

42
00:04:37,280 --> 00:04:38,200
I am giving.

43
00:04:38,280 --> 00:04:39,600
Answer me.
- I am speaking.

44
00:04:39,680 --> 00:04:41,360
Answer me first, Mr. Vachani.

45
00:04:41,440 --> 00:04:42,520
You have to.

46
00:04:43,560 --> 00:04:44,400
Okay.

47
00:04:45,440 --> 00:04:48,440
Mr Vachani who is promoting
the campaign of save water..

48
00:04:48,520 --> 00:04:53,480
..has wasted one glass of water here.

49
00:04:53,560 --> 00:04:58,320
This means that today without
worrying about anything..

50
00:04:58,400 --> 00:05:02,400
..you are publicly going against
the cause you are supporting.

51
00:05:02,480 --> 00:05:05,280
Why don't you let me speak anything?
- Answer me first.

52
00:05:05,360 --> 00:05:07,920
Shall I say something?
- You have to answer me.

53
00:05:09,040 --> 00:05:10,160
Okay.

54
00:05:10,240 --> 00:05:14,800
You have thrown the political
ideology of your party on my face.

55
00:05:14,880 --> 00:05:16,600
What are you saying?
- You cannot do that.

56
00:05:16,680 --> 00:05:20,840
That means you do not believe in
the political ideology of your party.

57
00:05:20,920 --> 00:05:22,560
I..
- That's what you want to say.

58
00:05:22,640 --> 00:05:27,720
You have insulted and made fun of
the 150 years old party, Mr. Vachani.

59
00:05:27,800 --> 00:05:29,000
There is no joke..

60
00:05:29,640 --> 00:05:31,640
Come on sir let's go. It is
live telecast. Everybody is listening.

61
00:05:31,720 --> 00:05:32,680
Let's go sir.

62
00:05:32,760 --> 00:05:35,240
Hey, he is amazing.

63
00:05:35,600 --> 00:05:39,320
He is talking nonstop like
bullet train without a break.

64
00:05:40,080 --> 00:05:41,720
If you call us in studio..

65
00:05:41,800 --> 00:05:43,400
..then give us chance to speak.
- You answer me.

66
00:05:43,480 --> 00:05:44,240
Let's go sir.

67
00:05:44,320 --> 00:05:46,880
Do you know how much preparation
we do before coming here?

68
00:05:47,000 --> 00:05:48,360
Let's go.
- He does not understand.

69
00:05:48,440 --> 00:05:49,400
It is a limit.
Leave me.

70
00:05:49,480 --> 00:05:50,880
Answer me Mr. Vachani.

71
00:05:51,000 --> 00:05:52,480
He..
- You cannot leave like this.

72
00:05:52,560 --> 00:05:54,080
It is matter of everyday.

73
00:05:54,440 --> 00:05:57,280
Come every day and
get insulted in Prime time.

74
00:05:57,360 --> 00:05:59,760
You..
- What do you have to say my friend?

75
00:05:59,840 --> 00:06:00,760
You tell me.

76
00:06:00,840 --> 00:06:02,160
Understand one thing that..

77
00:06:02,240 --> 00:06:04,680
..even politicians have some dignity.
Understood.

78
00:06:05,200 --> 00:06:06,720
Do answer me Mr. Vachani.

79
00:06:07,160 --> 00:06:08,520
You cannot do that.

80
00:06:09,160 --> 00:06:11,520
Mr. Vachani you have to answer.

81
00:06:14,480 --> 00:06:15,520
Give the phone to Pankaj.

82
00:06:17,360 --> 00:06:20,720
Pankaj, first of all cut the feed now.

83
00:06:20,880 --> 00:06:22,320
And switch it to something else.

84
00:06:22,400 --> 00:06:23,240
Anything.

85
00:06:23,800 --> 00:06:27,480
And secondly remove Arnab
from prime time slot from Monday.

86
00:06:27,640 --> 00:06:30,040
Listen, ask Neha to come to studio.

87
00:06:35,080 --> 00:06:37,840
Everyone go out.
I want to talk to Arnab.

88
00:06:39,200 --> 00:06:41,120
Hey, go out.

89
00:06:43,040 --> 00:06:43,840
What?

90
00:06:44,240 --> 00:06:45,080
Hey..

91
00:06:46,800 --> 00:06:48,000
How did you get wet?

92
00:06:48,280 --> 00:06:49,360
I threw water on myself.

93
00:06:49,800 --> 00:06:51,480
I can give away my life.
- Yes of course.

94
00:06:51,560 --> 00:06:55,400
Listen, Arnab from tomorrow
you will do the 7-8PM slot.

95
00:06:55,880 --> 00:06:58,040
Now will I have to do 7-8 as well?

96
00:06:58,080 --> 00:06:59,680
No, no you will have to do that only.

97
00:07:00,000 --> 00:07:00,840
Only that.

98
00:07:01,640 --> 00:07:02,560
What?
- Yes.

99
00:07:04,360 --> 00:07:05,720
7-8 PM means.

100
00:07:06,200 --> 00:07:08,240
Now will I tell people
how to cook food?

101
00:07:08,320 --> 00:07:11,440
Yes. It is cookery slot so understand
what and how you will do it.

102
00:07:11,640 --> 00:07:12,760
What the hell Roy?

103
00:07:13,440 --> 00:07:14,880
What the hell? You tell me.

104
00:07:16,720 --> 00:07:17,400
Really.

105
00:07:17,640 --> 00:07:19,840
First you were saying that TRP is
not coming and losses are mounting up.

106
00:07:19,920 --> 00:07:21,680
Now TRP is coming
and you have a problem.

107
00:07:21,760 --> 00:07:22,840
Do you increase TRP like this?

108
00:07:23,200 --> 00:07:24,720
Is this the way to increase TRP?

109
00:07:27,880 --> 00:07:28,600
Okay.

110
00:07:28,840 --> 00:07:31,320
Now you remember the
chapters of moral science.

111
00:07:31,520 --> 00:07:32,600
Very nice.

112
00:07:36,040 --> 00:07:36,840
What happened?

113
00:07:37,240 --> 00:07:39,000
Burn it.
- Warning comes downstairs.

114
00:07:41,280 --> 00:07:42,720
Look at Neha's shows, buddy.

115
00:07:43,600 --> 00:07:46,320
Pure fashion reporting
delivered with a pinch of salt.

116
00:07:46,720 --> 00:07:47,920
And ratings are good too.

117
00:07:48,000 --> 00:07:49,040
Nobody is complaining.

118
00:07:49,080 --> 00:07:51,680
Roy, to make shows
on lingerie and sex..

119
00:07:51,760 --> 00:07:54,400
..and to openly challenge
politicians on a live show..

120
00:07:54,480 --> 00:07:55,640
..is two different things.

121
00:07:55,720 --> 00:07:57,880
Oh hello, mind your language.

122
00:07:58,040 --> 00:08:01,400
It is not lingerie show but
India's best glamour update show.

123
00:08:01,480 --> 00:08:01,840
Oh.

124
00:08:01,920 --> 00:08:03,800
I am the best news
writer in the country.

125
00:08:04,240 --> 00:08:06,560
I am doing this show on Roy's request.

126
00:08:08,040 --> 00:08:10,680
Why are you involving
me into this debate?

127
00:08:11,120 --> 00:08:12,800
Take your beauty parlor out.

128
00:08:13,360 --> 00:08:14,560
There is no need to do this here.

129
00:08:14,640 --> 00:08:16,560
I am here because Roy called me.

130
00:08:16,640 --> 00:08:18,840
And I am getting the
prime time slot of your show.

131
00:08:19,000 --> 00:08:19,760
Yeah..

132
00:08:20,160 --> 00:08:20,840
What?

133
00:08:21,280 --> 00:08:22,120
Yes..

134
00:08:23,000 --> 00:08:25,240
Will Neha do prime
time slot on my place?

135
00:08:25,760 --> 00:08:28,080
Have you literally taken
the show by its name? One on one.

136
00:08:28,160 --> 00:08:31,040
If she does the show then
politicians will give fewer answers..

137
00:08:31,120 --> 00:08:32,920
..and will give phone
numbers to her more.

138
00:08:35,080 --> 00:08:36,240
I am leaving Roy.

139
00:08:36,520 --> 00:08:39,040
Let me know when Mr.
Angry pans has cooled down.

140
00:08:39,080 --> 00:08:41,040
I will come later.
- No, no Neha.

141
00:08:41,120 --> 00:08:43,200
You are not going anywhere.
Wait, wait..

142
00:08:44,400 --> 00:08:48,120
This man must know how important
it is to change with time.

143
00:08:49,560 --> 00:08:50,640
Even you know that..

144
00:08:51,520 --> 00:08:54,880
..Neha used to be the best
writer in the news business.

145
00:08:55,000 --> 00:08:55,600
Okay.

146
00:08:57,440 --> 00:08:59,920
She is doing this show
because the channel needs her.

147
00:09:00,000 --> 00:09:01,320
You know flexibility.

148
00:09:11,400 --> 00:09:12,280
Shut up.

149
00:09:12,760 --> 00:09:14,400
Have cup and smell the coffee.

150
00:09:15,080 --> 00:09:17,040
No one wants to see
your show nowadays.

151
00:09:17,760 --> 00:09:21,520
It is okay that ratings
were fine today but at what cost.

152
00:09:21,600 --> 00:09:22,800
Tomorrow RGV will come.

153
00:09:22,880 --> 00:09:26,760
Again I will have to give answer about
6 cameras, 4 mikes and so many bones.

154
00:09:27,000 --> 00:09:27,760
Do you know that?

155
00:09:27,920 --> 00:09:31,240
It is not my fault that you
cannot handle political hooliganism.

156
00:09:31,320 --> 00:09:34,120
My work was to handle heated
debates and that I was doing.

157
00:09:34,200 --> 00:09:36,600
Until you..
Hello. What is it?

158
00:09:36,680 --> 00:09:39,080
I said I will get the watermelon.
Watermelon, watermelon....

159
00:09:43,120 --> 00:09:44,000
Yes baby..

160
00:09:44,920 --> 00:09:46,160
Nothing, nothing..

161
00:09:46,600 --> 00:09:50,160
I have chucked out an office boy
so he is getting angry and shouting.

162
00:09:50,240 --> 00:09:51,000
Yes.

163
00:09:51,440 --> 00:09:52,400
I will get it.

164
00:09:53,040 --> 00:09:53,840
Sure.

165
00:09:54,760 --> 00:09:55,720
Bye sweetheart.

166
00:10:00,400 --> 00:10:02,520
Sorry I did not see.

167
00:10:02,920 --> 00:10:04,120
I was in heated debate so I got..

168
00:10:04,200 --> 00:10:05,640
It was not a heated debate.

169
00:10:06,280 --> 00:10:07,640
It was hardly a debate.

170
00:10:07,720 --> 00:10:09,080
You had said at 10'0clock.

171
00:10:09,160 --> 00:10:10,920
Why is so much shouting
happening outside?

172
00:10:11,040 --> 00:10:12,320
Stop it.
- Stop it, Pankaj.

173
00:10:15,600 --> 00:10:16,560
Don't laugh, Arnab.

174
00:10:18,320 --> 00:10:22,440
A 70 year old man crying on
prime time.. it was not heated debate.

175
00:10:22,520 --> 00:10:25,760
It seemed as if you have snatched
a lollipop from a 6 year old child.

176
00:10:26,000 --> 00:10:27,480
Did you see the way he was crying?

177
00:10:28,320 --> 00:10:31,160
But it was good one, yeah..

178
00:10:37,760 --> 00:10:38,760
Arnab!

179
00:10:39,600 --> 00:10:42,520
You were a good news anchor.
- Thanks.

180
00:10:44,200 --> 00:10:46,920
But this drama cannot
continue every day, buddy.

181
00:10:47,160 --> 00:10:49,040
Even you know it. It is not feasible.

182
00:10:49,240 --> 00:10:51,360
People want to see some real stuff.

183
00:10:52,040 --> 00:10:54,240
Remember those days when
people would leave their dinner..

184
00:10:54,320 --> 00:10:55,640
..and sit in front of the TV.

185
00:10:55,720 --> 00:10:59,360
Which topic would Arnab discuss on?
Who will be court martial?

186
00:11:00,320 --> 00:11:01,400
It's gone buddy.

187
00:11:03,800 --> 00:11:04,760
Look!

188
00:11:06,120 --> 00:11:08,200
I can't sustain like this.

189
00:11:10,160 --> 00:11:14,640
Even the order from top management has
come that we have got 2 months time.

190
00:11:15,680 --> 00:11:17,360
We have to make profit by them.

191
00:11:17,760 --> 00:11:20,120
Otherwise everything finished.

192
00:11:20,840 --> 00:11:22,560
Channel is finished. You are finished.

193
00:11:24,240 --> 00:11:26,360
You are under estimating me, Roy.

194
00:11:27,040 --> 00:11:28,080
Do you remember..

195
00:11:28,440 --> 00:11:31,120
..that I had brought the
channel to the top position?

196
00:11:31,440 --> 00:11:34,080
It was me who had made
the channel the biggest brand.

197
00:11:35,120 --> 00:11:39,280
When a person talks
about past again and again..

198
00:11:39,520 --> 00:11:42,360
..then one should understand
that there is some problem.

199
00:11:42,920 --> 00:11:45,560
And you very well know
it what the problem is.

200
00:11:47,800 --> 00:11:49,040
Do something.

201
00:11:49,480 --> 00:11:51,360
You can do it.
You have done it before as well.

202
00:11:51,840 --> 00:11:53,040
Think huge.

203
00:11:54,280 --> 00:11:58,920
Otherwise many people
are pushing me for 7-8 slot.

204
00:11:59,000 --> 00:12:01,000
So now Arnab Ghosh..

205
00:12:01,040 --> 00:12:04,320
..will have to compete
with chef Kapoor for screen time.

206
00:12:04,760 --> 00:12:06,920
What the hell?
- Neha, please.

207
00:12:08,800 --> 00:12:10,600
Buddy, think of something.

208
00:12:11,200 --> 00:12:12,280
Think of something quickly.

209
00:12:13,360 --> 00:12:16,080
We just have two months time.
- Hey..

210
00:12:16,160 --> 00:12:18,360
Pankaj, will this noise stop or not?

211
00:12:18,440 --> 00:12:19,600
Sir I am vinod.

212
00:12:19,680 --> 00:12:22,240
Vinod, is this a
studio or a fish market?

213
00:12:23,440 --> 00:12:24,200
Come baby.

214
00:12:57,560 --> 00:13:02,000
"Whosoever you bless Haji Ali..."

215
00:13:02,360 --> 00:13:06,760
"He need not worry at all,
Haji Ali, Haji Ali.."

216
00:13:07,160 --> 00:13:11,640
"Whosoever you bless Haji Ali.."

217
00:13:12,040 --> 00:13:16,320
"He need not worry at all,
Haji Ali, Haji Ali.."

218
00:13:16,400 --> 00:13:18,760
"Ali, Ali Haji Ali.."

219
00:13:18,840 --> 00:13:21,160
"Ali, Ali Haji Ali.."

220
00:13:21,240 --> 00:13:23,560
"Ali, Ali Haji Ali.."

221
00:13:23,640 --> 00:13:26,440
"Ali, Ali Haji Ali.."

222
00:13:33,200 --> 00:13:38,000
"Haji Ali.."

223
00:13:38,600 --> 00:13:42,440
"My Haji Ali.."

224
00:13:43,200 --> 00:13:47,560
"The day is not good
so help to let it pass soon."

225
00:13:47,840 --> 00:13:52,400
"Give my life a direction."

226
00:13:52,800 --> 00:13:57,200
"Change my bad luck into good luck."

227
00:13:57,520 --> 00:14:02,240
"Help me to come out of problems."

228
00:14:02,400 --> 00:14:11,440
"Bless me; help me to find my way."

229
00:14:11,520 --> 00:14:14,000
"Ali, Ali Haji Ali.."

230
00:14:14,040 --> 00:14:16,320
"Ali, Ali Haji Ali.."

231
00:14:16,400 --> 00:14:18,760
"Ali, Ali Haji Ali.."

232
00:14:18,840 --> 00:14:21,160
"Ali, Ali Haji Ali.."

233
00:14:21,240 --> 00:14:23,520
"Ali, Ali Haji Ali.."

234
00:14:23,600 --> 00:14:26,000
"Ali, Ali Haji Ali.."

235
00:14:26,040 --> 00:14:28,800
"Ali, Ali Haji Ali.."

236
00:14:43,200 --> 00:14:46,680
What happened? Why have you
made face like a grilled chicken?

237
00:14:48,640 --> 00:14:52,320
Many people make a mistake of removing
the chicken before it is grilled.

238
00:14:52,400 --> 00:14:54,400
Look at this.
It should be of this color.

239
00:14:54,480 --> 00:14:56,640
Till that time let be on grill.

240
00:14:56,720 --> 00:14:59,600
I am being thrashed in
the office and you are joking.

241
00:14:59,680 --> 00:15:02,400
Are you just being
thrashed and not me?

242
00:15:03,120 --> 00:15:04,800
That also from my own child.

243
00:15:06,040 --> 00:15:07,680
It is 4th month. Do you remember?

244
00:15:07,920 --> 00:15:10,080
Sorry.
- Sorry.

245
00:15:11,000 --> 00:15:12,760
Then you must be enjoying?
- What?

246
00:15:12,840 --> 00:15:15,680
I mean.. sorry baby.
After making chicken roast....

247
00:15:15,760 --> 00:15:17,840
I mean..now is turn of spices.

248
00:15:17,920 --> 00:15:22,040
..people are happy when the
child kicks for the first time.

249
00:15:22,520 --> 00:15:24,480
Like that I said. Yes.

250
00:15:25,600 --> 00:15:26,880
You know everything..

251
00:15:27,880 --> 00:15:29,120
..then you do it.

252
00:15:35,880 --> 00:15:37,000
I am sorry.

253
00:15:37,240 --> 00:15:38,680
How are you feeling?

254
00:15:38,760 --> 00:15:41,040
Does someone talk like
this with pregnant woman?

255
00:15:41,120 --> 00:15:42,760
Of course I am feeling awful.

256
00:15:43,320 --> 00:15:44,240
Leave it.

257
00:15:45,560 --> 00:15:46,280
Okay.

258
00:15:48,360 --> 00:15:49,880
Now tell me what has happened?

259
00:15:50,840 --> 00:15:52,600
Or you want me to read your face.

260
00:15:53,320 --> 00:15:54,120
Shall I say the truth?

261
00:15:54,200 --> 00:15:57,240
No, tell me the story of Harry Potter.
Of course, tell me the truth.

262
00:15:57,480 --> 00:15:59,480
I have been removed
from the prime time slot.

263
00:15:59,560 --> 00:16:01,920
What?
- I will do the cookery show. 7-8 PM.

264
00:16:02,000 --> 00:16:02,920
Like this.

265
00:16:05,440 --> 00:16:06,200
Shit.

266
00:16:07,920 --> 00:16:09,320
But what happened suddenly today.

267
00:16:12,160 --> 00:16:15,920
Roy said it point blankly
that we have two months.

268
00:16:16,000 --> 00:16:18,760
If the ratings don't
go up we are doomed.

269
00:16:18,840 --> 00:16:20,800
Channel will shut down.

270
00:16:22,360 --> 00:16:26,800
You will get another assignment. I
mean there is no other Arnab in India.

271
00:16:26,880 --> 00:16:28,240
It is not that easy.

272
00:16:28,800 --> 00:16:31,360
I will not get a second
chance failing at my level.

273
00:16:31,440 --> 00:16:34,360
And even if I get I can't
expect to be paid like before.

274
00:16:35,240 --> 00:16:36,800
It is too much.

275
00:16:37,600 --> 00:16:40,720
I have booked so many
thing online for the baby.

276
00:16:54,640 --> 00:16:56,480
Don't worry.
We will figure something out.

277
00:16:56,840 --> 00:16:58,480
Life is already going on loan.

278
00:16:59,080 --> 00:17:00,760
If we do not do something quickly..

279
00:17:01,520 --> 00:17:03,000
..then we will have
to come from Toyota to Tata.

280
00:17:03,040 --> 00:17:06,480
If you do not have budget for
cashew nuts then there is no problem.

281
00:17:06,560 --> 00:17:10,400
We can use groundnuts
to make this dish cheaper.

282
00:17:10,480 --> 00:17:12,560
There will be a slight
change in taste.

283
00:17:14,280 --> 00:17:17,000
Tell me, what you did the whole day.

284
00:17:17,600 --> 00:17:19,920
Browsing but did not buy anything.

285
00:17:20,600 --> 00:17:21,720
What were you finding?

286
00:17:23,000 --> 00:17:24,160
White Sari.

287
00:17:24,240 --> 00:17:25,720
What?
- What?

288
00:17:27,320 --> 00:17:29,080
Don't be so surprised Arnab.

289
00:17:29,360 --> 00:17:32,080
I will have to buy because
of the way you insult..

290
00:17:32,560 --> 00:17:34,040
..the politicians on live TV.

291
00:17:36,040 --> 00:17:37,280
Sometimes I feel..

292
00:17:37,360 --> 00:17:40,120
..I should have taken the
offer of News India two years back.

293
00:17:40,200 --> 00:17:42,000
They are on top of the charts now.

294
00:17:42,160 --> 00:17:43,520
Relax Arnab.

295
00:17:43,880 --> 00:17:45,560
Whatever happens is for good.

296
00:17:46,000 --> 00:17:48,880
The important thing is that
you cannot control everything.

297
00:17:49,000 --> 00:17:50,240
So just let it be.

298
00:17:50,640 --> 00:17:52,800
It is very easy to talk.

299
00:17:53,640 --> 00:17:56,160
You feel regretted thinking
practically about it.

300
00:17:56,680 --> 00:17:58,280
You know that time I got the offer.

301
00:17:59,640 --> 00:18:00,560
May be.

302
00:18:03,040 --> 00:18:04,040
Listen.

303
00:18:05,320 --> 00:18:07,360
I have to tell you something.
- Tell me.

304
00:18:08,920 --> 00:18:09,880
Tell me.

305
00:18:11,880 --> 00:18:14,240
Do you remember the night I conceived?

306
00:18:19,520 --> 00:18:21,880
You came late from studio that day.

307
00:18:23,200 --> 00:18:25,400
Shekhar had come home before you came.

308
00:18:26,120 --> 00:18:28,840
Shekhar, your ex boyfriend.

309
00:18:29,480 --> 00:18:30,280
Okay.

310
00:18:31,000 --> 00:18:34,320
We just got talking and had some wine.

311
00:18:35,520 --> 00:18:37,640
One thing just led to another and..

312
00:18:38,240 --> 00:18:39,080
I..

313
00:18:39,520 --> 00:18:42,600
You know women get stupid
and emotional sometimes.

314
00:18:44,680 --> 00:18:45,800
What are you going to say?

315
00:18:49,440 --> 00:18:50,280
I..

316
00:18:50,680 --> 00:18:51,440
Speak.

317
00:18:52,280 --> 00:18:56,200
I am not too sure
but I am just confused.

318
00:18:58,360 --> 00:19:00,720
Maybe this baby is yours or his..

319
00:19:01,640 --> 00:19:02,600
I don't know.

320
00:19:02,680 --> 00:19:07,040
Male snake attracts the
female snake with his smell.

321
00:19:07,080 --> 00:19:12,720
After the female snake agrees
they both enjoy sex for many hours.

322
00:19:21,280 --> 00:19:22,240
Are you enjoying?

323
00:19:22,760 --> 00:19:23,800
What do you mean by saying that?

324
00:19:25,200 --> 00:19:27,640
Don't worry. It is yours.

325
00:19:28,400 --> 00:19:32,760
I just wanted to say
that things can go worst.

326
00:19:33,040 --> 00:19:37,040
So you learn to respect
your achievements, husband.

327
00:19:39,920 --> 00:19:41,200
Relax.

328
00:19:42,120 --> 00:19:44,000
I am going to sleep, good night.

329
00:19:45,320 --> 00:19:46,400
Good night.

330
00:20:35,600 --> 00:20:38,080
Okay, okay how old is the story?

331
00:20:38,160 --> 00:20:39,720
Hot tea..
- Okay.

332
00:20:39,800 --> 00:20:41,920
Are you sure it is untapped.
- Hot tea..

333
00:20:42,480 --> 00:20:44,040
Hot tea..

334
00:20:44,600 --> 00:20:46,400
Hot tea sir.

335
00:20:46,800 --> 00:20:48,520
Hot tea sir. - Tell me
something more about the story.

336
00:20:49,320 --> 00:20:51,320
More means more about it.
- Take it sir.

337
00:20:52,000 --> 00:20:54,440
What.
- Take it sir.

338
00:20:55,360 --> 00:20:56,840
Okay political history.

339
00:20:58,280 --> 00:20:59,320
I'll call you back.

340
00:21:01,040 --> 00:21:02,720
Sit down.
- What happened, sir?

341
00:21:02,800 --> 00:21:05,080
Wasn't morning tea nice?
- Sit down.

342
00:21:05,160 --> 00:21:06,480
Were the tea leaves more?

343
00:21:06,560 --> 00:21:09,680
I had told the people in the
pantry that sir has gastric problem.

344
00:21:09,760 --> 00:21:11,040
Put the tea leaves less.

345
00:21:11,560 --> 00:21:13,200
Sit down.
- Okay sir.

346
00:21:18,840 --> 00:21:21,160
What is this?
- This is tea sir.

347
00:21:21,600 --> 00:21:22,720
It is very nice.

348
00:21:23,000 --> 00:21:25,000
You are bringing tea
in every five minutes.

349
00:21:25,040 --> 00:21:26,800
Give me time to drink tea.

350
00:21:27,120 --> 00:21:30,040
Drink one more sir. It is very nice.

351
00:21:30,400 --> 00:21:33,640
Tea is always hot and
people enjoy it while drinking.

352
00:21:33,720 --> 00:21:35,840
Are you making me drink
tea or watering the plants?

353
00:21:35,920 --> 00:21:39,440
Sir, you are getting angry.
You work so hard.

354
00:21:39,720 --> 00:21:41,440
So you will drink more tea.

355
00:21:41,840 --> 00:21:43,200
Drink it sir.

356
00:21:43,480 --> 00:21:44,280
It is nice.

357
00:21:44,360 --> 00:21:47,240
If you say it once again that it is
nice then I will press my throat or....

358
00:21:47,320 --> 00:21:48,680
Don't get angry sir.

359
00:21:48,840 --> 00:21:50,200
I will bring it later.

360
00:21:50,800 --> 00:21:52,240
Don't bring it later.

361
00:21:52,760 --> 00:21:53,600
Don't bring it.

362
00:21:55,800 --> 00:21:57,600
You are a makeup and not a tea seller.

363
00:21:57,680 --> 00:22:00,720
I don't understand
why are you after tea.

364
00:22:01,000 --> 00:22:03,800
There is a difference between
profession and passion, sir.

365
00:22:04,000 --> 00:22:08,800
You know it well that I love to make
others drink tea from college times.

366
00:22:09,240 --> 00:22:12,000
Why are you spoiling your career?

367
00:22:12,480 --> 00:22:14,320
I don't see a bright future.

368
00:22:14,640 --> 00:22:16,760
You cannot make a career
by making others drink tea.

369
00:22:17,400 --> 00:22:19,920
If you do hard work then one day
you will be in front of the camera.

370
00:22:20,000 --> 00:22:21,600
Your mother wanted to see you on TV.

371
00:22:21,680 --> 00:22:24,160
Yes sir.
She wants it but..

372
00:22:24,240 --> 00:22:25,520
..what does she know about passion.

373
00:22:26,680 --> 00:22:28,440
Sir, you don't seem
to be in god mood sir.

374
00:22:28,520 --> 00:22:29,400
Oh really.

375
00:22:30,440 --> 00:22:32,720
Are you getting angry with
me because of tasteless tea?

376
00:22:34,640 --> 00:22:36,040
God, just kill me.

377
00:22:38,080 --> 00:22:40,040
Today I will finish this debate.
- Okay.

378
00:22:41,040 --> 00:22:41,800
Where is brother?

379
00:22:42,360 --> 00:22:43,440
Where is brother?
- He is Ranchi?

380
00:22:43,520 --> 00:22:44,600
Yesterday it came in the news.

381
00:22:44,680 --> 00:22:46,640
Where is your brother, idiot.

382
00:22:46,720 --> 00:22:47,720
That courier man.

383
00:22:47,800 --> 00:22:48,840
Okay, choosy.

384
00:22:48,920 --> 00:22:50,800
I will just call him, sir.
- Call him.

385
00:22:59,240 --> 00:23:00,000
Hello.

386
00:23:00,200 --> 00:23:02,760
Sorry Ajay,
I got caught up with some office work.

387
00:23:04,000 --> 00:23:05,320
Tell me what you were saying.

388
00:23:05,840 --> 00:23:06,520
Okay.

389
00:23:07,080 --> 00:23:07,720
Yes..

390
00:23:08,720 --> 00:23:09,640
Correct, correct..

391
00:23:10,800 --> 00:23:11,320
Okay..

392
00:23:12,280 --> 00:23:13,200
Yes, will see. Sir, Choosy..

393
00:23:14,080 --> 00:23:16,280
Good afternoon sir.
Do you want to courier something?

394
00:23:17,400 --> 00:23:18,000
Okay.

395
00:23:18,360 --> 00:23:18,920
Right.

396
00:23:19,040 --> 00:23:20,640
So send it till tomorrow.

397
00:23:21,040 --> 00:23:21,680
Okay.

398
00:23:21,880 --> 00:23:24,320
Sir, just say yes once.

399
00:23:24,600 --> 00:23:27,480
Once you said yes means
your things have gone, sir.

400
00:23:27,600 --> 00:23:30,280
I will call you in five minutes.
Boss has called me. Okay.

401
00:23:30,560 --> 00:23:31,600
He has called me urgently. Bye.

402
00:23:32,440 --> 00:23:34,200
Sir, did sister-in-law
get the bouquet?

403
00:23:34,920 --> 00:23:35,760
Did you send it?

404
00:23:39,000 --> 00:23:39,840
Listen.

405
00:23:40,480 --> 00:23:42,880
Do whatever you feel is right.
I just have one request to make.

406
00:23:43,000 --> 00:23:43,600
What sir?

407
00:23:44,120 --> 00:23:46,320
You make me drink the
entire year's tea in one day.

408
00:23:47,080 --> 00:23:48,920
After that you will
never make me drink tea.

409
00:23:49,240 --> 00:23:50,240
Okay. And you.

410
00:23:50,720 --> 00:23:51,320
This..

411
00:23:51,880 --> 00:23:53,600
This is your border.

412
00:23:54,040 --> 00:23:56,600
You will courier things of others..

413
00:23:56,680 --> 00:23:59,160
..and you will not courier
anything inside this.

414
00:23:59,520 --> 00:24:00,320
Swear it.

415
00:24:00,400 --> 00:24:02,000
Okay sir.
- Not mine but yours.

416
00:24:02,040 --> 00:24:03,160
Okay sir.
- Not of yours but of each other's.

417
00:24:03,240 --> 00:24:05,560
Okay..
- Get lost from here.

418
00:24:05,720 --> 00:24:06,600
Okay sir.

419
00:24:06,680 --> 00:24:08,000
This is your limit.

420
00:24:08,080 --> 00:24:09,200
I had told him..

421
00:24:09,440 --> 00:24:10,520
..to make tea less strong

422
00:24:10,600 --> 00:24:12,600
It is gas so it will
come out from somewhere.

423
00:24:12,680 --> 00:24:13,680
You are right.

424
00:24:15,520 --> 00:24:16,880
Yes Ajay, I was in a meeting.

425
00:24:17,000 --> 00:24:17,720
Yes.

426
00:24:20,680 --> 00:24:22,640
Any updates. Did Roy say anything?

427
00:24:23,240 --> 00:24:24,440
Nothing new.

428
00:24:26,200 --> 00:24:27,720
You tell me how your day was.

429
00:24:29,560 --> 00:24:31,520
Crime Patrol 8 episodes.

430
00:24:32,000 --> 00:24:32,920
Back to back.

431
00:24:33,200 --> 00:24:36,480
Wow! Women crave for sweet
or sour things in pregnancy.

432
00:24:36,640 --> 00:24:38,360
My wife has craving for crime.

433
00:24:38,920 --> 00:24:39,760
Thank you God.

434
00:24:39,840 --> 00:24:42,080
I am blessed.
- You are such a drama.

435
00:24:42,160 --> 00:24:43,800
Such a drama. God.

436
00:24:44,360 --> 00:24:47,080
In one episode there was a guy..

437
00:24:47,320 --> 00:24:50,000
..who was caught stealing
bricks from the construction site.

438
00:24:50,360 --> 00:24:51,880
Can you believe which
gang he belonged to?

439
00:24:52,000 --> 00:24:53,120
No one told me.

440
00:24:53,800 --> 00:24:54,600
D gang.

441
00:24:55,640 --> 00:24:58,480
I mean imagine D gang
has to steal bricks.

442
00:24:58,560 --> 00:25:00,920
What is so weird?
Many people of D gang are struggling.

443
00:25:01,680 --> 00:25:03,640
Brother has escaped
and has left boys behind..

444
00:25:03,720 --> 00:25:05,040
..to steal bricks and steel rods.

445
00:25:06,840 --> 00:25:07,560
Anyways...

446
00:25:08,040 --> 00:25:10,160
I have heard that he
is still active here. I mean..

447
00:25:10,240 --> 00:25:12,000
People say he has
many investments here.

448
00:25:12,080 --> 00:25:13,080
People say many things..

449
00:25:13,320 --> 00:25:15,760
..but for me what matters
is that what you say.

450
00:25:16,720 --> 00:25:17,680
Imagine..

451
00:25:18,280 --> 00:25:20,320
..it would be so
cool to interview him.

452
00:25:20,400 --> 00:25:23,240
I mean one on one
with the man himself.

453
00:25:23,720 --> 00:25:25,160
Sensational.

454
00:25:29,720 --> 00:25:30,560
Are you hypnotizing me?

455
00:25:30,640 --> 00:25:32,160
You have already been hypnotized.

456
00:25:32,800 --> 00:25:35,640
Keep these crime patrol
dangerous ideas with you.

457
00:25:35,760 --> 00:25:37,720
Otherwise you will really
have to wear white sari.

458
00:25:37,800 --> 00:25:39,080
You are such a buzz kill.

459
00:25:39,520 --> 00:25:40,360
It did not go in the mouth.

460
00:25:40,440 --> 00:25:41,320
Once more.
- Take this.

461
00:25:43,000 --> 00:25:45,080
Clean it. I am going to bed.

462
00:25:48,640 --> 00:25:50,080
I'll have two drinks and come.

463
00:25:58,000 --> 00:26:00,680
Imagine it would be
so cool to interview him.

464
00:26:00,760 --> 00:26:02,680
One on one with the man himself.

465
00:26:02,760 --> 00:26:03,760
Sensational.

466
00:26:19,600 --> 00:26:20,240
Parul.

467
00:26:22,040 --> 00:26:22,920
Parul..

468
00:26:24,080 --> 00:26:25,280
Baby..

469
00:26:26,360 --> 00:26:30,440
What is it Arnab so late at night?
You scared me.

470
00:26:30,640 --> 00:26:32,720
I came to compliment you.

471
00:26:33,000 --> 00:26:34,080
For what?

472
00:26:34,320 --> 00:26:37,240
You had give me a useless
idea to interview D.

473
00:26:38,240 --> 00:26:40,120
So will you insult me
by waking me up from sleep?

474
00:26:40,200 --> 00:26:42,720
No, it is not a bad idea at all.

475
00:26:43,400 --> 00:26:45,200
Good for you.
- I am going to pitch it Roy.

476
00:26:45,920 --> 00:26:47,040
All the best.

477
00:26:48,040 --> 00:26:49,040
Are you excited?

478
00:26:51,000 --> 00:26:51,800
Very much.

479
00:26:57,920 --> 00:26:59,600
How did you like this idea?

480
00:27:01,000 --> 00:27:01,720
What?

481
00:27:02,560 --> 00:27:03,400
Is it risky?

482
00:27:05,520 --> 00:27:06,320
Don't worry..

483
00:27:06,800 --> 00:27:09,000
..your birth certificate
will have my name.

484
00:27:10,640 --> 00:27:12,480
You tell me what I shall
get for you from there.

485
00:27:13,520 --> 00:27:14,760
Gun.

486
00:27:16,240 --> 00:27:18,720
They have the real one.

487
00:27:19,360 --> 00:27:20,640
Sleep.

488
00:27:21,080 --> 00:27:22,120
You are very naughty.

489
00:27:25,160 --> 00:27:27,880
Remember that the flame
should not be high..

490
00:27:28,000 --> 00:27:31,000
..otherwise the spoon
and wok both can burn.

491
00:27:33,600 --> 00:27:34,640
Greetings, sir.

492
00:27:34,760 --> 00:27:36,080
Greetings.

493
00:27:36,240 --> 00:27:37,800
Sir, there is no
balance in your phone.

494
00:27:37,880 --> 00:27:39,480
Do you want to get it recharged?

495
00:27:39,560 --> 00:27:41,080
That will be done.

496
00:27:41,480 --> 00:27:43,840
Smiling bright face.

497
00:27:44,520 --> 00:27:46,280
Do you want to set a caller tune?

498
00:27:46,640 --> 00:27:50,880
Black hair and golden color..

499
00:27:51,280 --> 00:27:53,040
How is the weather there?

500
00:27:53,120 --> 00:27:54,360
Shut up, idiot.

501
00:27:55,080 --> 00:27:57,880
Girdhari, come quickly.
Brother is calling you at the pool.

502
00:28:02,440 --> 00:28:04,000
How are you dear?

503
00:28:04,280 --> 00:28:05,680
You do not miss me these days.

504
00:28:05,800 --> 00:28:06,800
Why should I miss you?

505
00:28:06,880 --> 00:28:08,600
I have found someone here.

506
00:28:08,760 --> 00:28:09,800
You uncle..

507
00:28:10,480 --> 00:28:11,360
Okay.

508
00:28:16,880 --> 00:28:17,560
Yes brother.

509
00:28:17,760 --> 00:28:19,480
Go and kill Sheela.

510
00:28:19,720 --> 00:28:22,280
Now. I want to hear
the sound of the bullet.

511
00:28:22,360 --> 00:28:24,120
As you say, brother.
The work will be done.

512
00:28:24,440 --> 00:28:25,800
Okay fine.

513
00:28:27,600 --> 00:28:28,640
Girdhari.

514
00:28:29,720 --> 00:28:30,680
Meet him.

515
00:28:31,320 --> 00:28:35,000
He is the owner of GML group Mr.
Arshad Ansari.

516
00:28:35,120 --> 00:28:35,920
Mr. Ansari.

517
00:28:37,040 --> 00:28:39,640
He is Girdhari and
takes care of my work.

518
00:28:39,880 --> 00:28:40,680
Greetings..

519
00:28:44,280 --> 00:28:45,920
Don't go on his face.

520
00:28:47,000 --> 00:28:50,440
He is innocent to look
at but he is very clever.

521
00:28:52,440 --> 00:28:56,040
So brother, get my work
done about which I had told you.

522
00:28:56,680 --> 00:28:58,000
Yes.

523
00:28:58,400 --> 00:28:59,280
Girdhari.

524
00:29:00,040 --> 00:29:01,720
He says that he had asked..

525
00:29:01,800 --> 00:29:06,320
..to threaten the builder
but we have not called.

526
00:29:08,760 --> 00:29:10,120
Yes.

527
00:29:10,560 --> 00:29:13,440
Tell me from there.
Tell in front of everyone.

528
00:29:13,520 --> 00:29:15,720
I don't like whispering in business.

529
00:29:18,560 --> 00:29:20,800
Why are you shaking the phone?
Tell me what it is.

530
00:29:23,120 --> 00:29:25,040
I did not have balance in the phone.

531
00:29:28,280 --> 00:29:30,400
That is why I wanted
to tell you in your ears.

532
00:29:30,480 --> 00:29:32,040
Are all other phones dead?

533
00:29:32,520 --> 00:29:34,000
Where was Mehmood's phone?

534
00:29:34,440 --> 00:29:37,680
Sir, Mehmood's phone
is not good quality.

535
00:29:37,760 --> 00:29:40,240
There are so many landlines
in the house. What are they for?

536
00:29:40,320 --> 00:29:42,920
Actually brother tele marketing
people have troubled..

537
00:29:43,040 --> 00:29:45,840
..people so much that
they do not pick up landline.

538
00:29:45,920 --> 00:29:47,400
I tried many times.

539
00:29:49,240 --> 00:29:50,120
Mr. Ansari.

540
00:29:51,160 --> 00:29:52,920
You go and your work will be done.

541
00:29:53,000 --> 00:29:56,040
Don't bother about what he is talking.
He has the habit of eating opium.

542
00:29:56,440 --> 00:29:59,120
Okay brother, now that you
are saying then it will be done.

543
00:30:02,560 --> 00:30:04,200
You should have got it recharged.

544
00:30:04,280 --> 00:30:05,560
Bother you do not know.

545
00:30:05,640 --> 00:30:08,280
I have to beg for
100/- to the accountant..

546
00:30:08,360 --> 00:30:10,640
..and he says there is no collection.
- One minute. One minute.

547
00:30:10,720 --> 00:30:11,920
Is this enough for recharge?

548
00:30:12,000 --> 00:30:13,440
Yes it is enough.

549
00:30:14,760 --> 00:30:15,560
Brother.

550
00:30:16,240 --> 00:30:18,640
For 10 days vegetables have
not been bought leave aside mutton.

551
00:30:18,920 --> 00:30:20,400
Sprinkle salt on me and eat.

552
00:30:21,280 --> 00:30:22,680
We are there because of you.

553
00:30:27,000 --> 00:30:27,600
Sir.

554
00:30:28,040 --> 00:30:30,200
Sir, I feel to increase the TRP..

555
00:30:30,280 --> 00:30:31,440
..we will have to do
something path breaking.

556
00:30:31,520 --> 00:30:33,400
Roy, you are going to thank me.

557
00:30:36,600 --> 00:30:37,880
Yes, you were saying something Peter.

558
00:30:38,000 --> 00:30:41,040
Sir. I think we will
have to do something new sir.

559
00:30:41,200 --> 00:30:44,040
You say it every time but what new.

560
00:30:44,120 --> 00:30:44,880
Sir.

561
00:30:45,360 --> 00:30:47,480
You must have read what I had said.

562
00:30:47,560 --> 00:30:49,040
Yes. What I had said?

563
00:30:49,120 --> 00:30:51,080
I want to do something for women.

564
00:30:52,040 --> 00:30:54,000
What is interesting in this?
Who will see?

565
00:30:54,040 --> 00:30:55,120
Listen sir.

566
00:30:55,360 --> 00:30:57,760
we will put an original twist in this.

567
00:30:58,120 --> 00:30:58,920
I am listening.

568
00:30:59,040 --> 00:31:04,720
The headlines of our news
piece would be 'Manch Pe Kiya Bawal'

569
00:31:04,920 --> 00:31:06,560
I want to do women.

570
00:31:06,640 --> 00:31:08,640
It would become a rage, sir.
- Great.

571
00:31:08,720 --> 00:31:09,800
Very nice, very nice..

572
00:31:09,880 --> 00:31:12,120
Later we will put all
the blame on the edit, sir.

573
00:31:12,200 --> 00:31:13,640
Superb.
- We are safe.

574
00:31:13,720 --> 00:31:15,880
There will not be
rage but riot, idiot.

575
00:31:16,000 --> 00:31:16,880
Get out.

576
00:31:17,320 --> 00:31:18,680
Good for nothing.

577
00:31:18,760 --> 00:31:20,040
Sir..
- Out.

578
00:31:25,440 --> 00:31:26,040
Okay.

579
00:31:26,920 --> 00:31:29,320
So..
- Rajat, you were saying something.

580
00:31:29,400 --> 00:31:32,320
Sir, Peter spoke my idea.

581
00:31:32,400 --> 00:31:35,240
This always happens, sir. I
had come here to tell you about this.

582
00:31:35,400 --> 00:31:36,880
Get out.
- Sir..

583
00:31:37,000 --> 00:31:37,880
Get out.

584
00:31:40,120 --> 00:31:41,800
Sir, my idea.
- Just leave.

585
00:31:41,880 --> 00:31:44,320
Get out.

586
00:31:45,120 --> 00:31:46,880
Go..

587
00:31:51,760 --> 00:31:54,440
Our luck is not bad but
we have kept wrong people.

588
00:32:01,200 --> 00:32:03,240
What is it? It was my idea.

589
00:32:03,640 --> 00:32:04,840
Get lost.

590
00:32:05,080 --> 00:32:05,520
Get lost.

591
00:32:05,600 --> 00:32:07,440
It was my idea. Get lost.
- Rascal.

592
00:32:07,520 --> 00:32:09,040
I will tell everyone
that it was my idea. Rascal...

593
00:32:09,120 --> 00:32:10,640
Thief..
- Go and tell.

594
00:32:10,720 --> 00:32:12,200
I have seen many people like you.

595
00:32:12,640 --> 00:32:14,360
How did you like the idea?
- Rubbish idea.

596
00:32:15,120 --> 00:32:16,040
What do you think, Neha?

597
00:32:17,920 --> 00:32:22,040
Stupid, utter garbage
and I can go on and on..

598
00:32:22,080 --> 00:32:24,520
Look, our luck is not bad.

599
00:32:24,800 --> 00:32:25,920
What does Neha know?

600
00:32:27,280 --> 00:32:29,320
Roy, I think you did
not hear it properly.

601
00:32:29,400 --> 00:32:32,200
I heard it and imagined it in my mind.

602
00:32:32,280 --> 00:32:35,840
At the end of imagination
I saw that we both are dead.

603
00:32:36,120 --> 00:32:37,240
Hence.

604
00:32:38,440 --> 00:32:39,280
Rubbish.

605
00:32:40,120 --> 00:32:43,320
Roy, till today D
has not been interviewed.

606
00:32:43,520 --> 00:32:46,720
This is going to be big.
- Big..

607
00:32:47,000 --> 00:32:49,600
D has not been interviewed because
they are many reasons behind it.

608
00:32:49,680 --> 00:32:51,640
He is dangerous, he is impossible.

609
00:32:51,920 --> 00:32:53,440
This is a life risking idea.

610
00:32:53,800 --> 00:32:56,720
Every big idea seems
to be risky in the beginning.

611
00:32:56,800 --> 00:32:58,240
Don't be poetic.

612
00:32:58,600 --> 00:33:00,480
I asked you to get idea
to save the channel and..

613
00:33:00,520 --> 00:33:02,000
And this is what you come up with.

614
00:33:02,040 --> 00:33:04,400
Tomorrow you would say that
you need Sayyed Hafiz's interview.

615
00:33:05,120 --> 00:33:06,920
Day after tomorrow
you would say that..

616
00:33:07,000 --> 00:33:08,760
..you need interview
of Veerappan's cousin.

617
00:33:09,120 --> 00:33:10,320
Have you gone mad?

618
00:33:10,400 --> 00:33:14,880
Roy, you are saying this? It is
not that no one has done this before.

619
00:33:15,400 --> 00:33:18,280
Going by the history in 1959
the famous British..

620
00:33:18,360 --> 00:33:20,800
..journalist Graham
Smith had done this.

621
00:33:20,880 --> 00:33:22,000
Quite successfully.

622
00:33:22,320 --> 00:33:24,040
Did he interview D?

623
00:33:25,320 --> 00:33:28,640
In 1959 D was in nursery. Why would
anyone interview a nursery child?

624
00:33:28,720 --> 00:33:32,600
He interviewed the famous
mafia king of Italy Fabio Castilana.

625
00:33:32,840 --> 00:33:34,720
The one and only interview with him.

626
00:33:36,800 --> 00:33:39,000
What happened of that

739

I love you..you are my life

At this time I am in

Yes..

I slapped..

he had thrashed you hard.

00:48:05,920 --> 00:48:09,280
That constable is saying so.

881
00:48:11,080 --> 00:48:11,880
Show me the video.

882
00:48:12,000 --> 00:48:13,000
No, no..

883
00:48:13,200 --> 00:48:15,520
Show it to me.
- No..

884
00:48:18,040 --> 00:48:21,120
What is this?
This seems to be ammunition shop.

885
00:48:21,840 --> 00:48:23,880
This is new one.
Even I had not seen this.

886
00:48:24,000 --> 00:48:26,920
At this moment I am with Mr.
Zuber proprietor of Zuber arms.

887
00:48:27,360 --> 00:48:29,240
Mr. Zuber I am with you.

888
00:48:29,320 --> 00:48:30,240
Tell me.

889
00:48:30,320 --> 00:48:32,760
Did D buy the gun for
the first time from you?

890
00:48:33,240 --> 00:48:37,440
Yes sir, we needed
gun oil to repair the guns.

891
00:48:37,520 --> 00:48:39,760
The picture as well as sound is good.
- he used to supply.

892
00:48:39,840 --> 00:48:40,440
What?

893
00:48:40,640 --> 00:48:41,880
He used to supply.

894
00:48:42,000 --> 00:48:45,840
He used to supply. So how long did
this association with him continued?

895
00:48:46,000 --> 00:48:49,680
It could not continue for long
but the matter is that he used to..

896
00:48:49,760 --> 00:48:54,000
..steal oil from Mahalaxmi
godown and sell us at cheaper rate.

897
00:48:54,400 --> 00:48:56,520
This must have continued
for 2-3 months..

898
00:48:56,600 --> 00:48:58,000
..and then what could have happened.

899
00:48:58,120 --> 00:49:00,680
Mr. Dougle came and arrested him.

900
00:49:00,760 --> 00:49:01,240
Okay.

901
00:49:01,320 --> 00:49:04,080
He thrashed him so hard that after..

902
00:49:04,160 --> 00:49:05,840
..that he was hardly
seen once or twice around.

903
00:49:05,920 --> 00:49:09,080
What did you talk with him
whenever you saw him once or twice?

904
00:49:09,360 --> 00:49:13,240
Just tell me that does
a man speak who is injured?

905
00:49:13,600 --> 00:49:18,480
He wanted to speak a lot but
could not speak with swollen lips.

906
00:49:18,800 --> 00:49:19,520
Did he speak?

907
00:49:19,680 --> 00:49:21,080
No, he could not speak.
- Okay.

908
00:49:21,320 --> 00:49:25,880
All he could say was that he
will not be able to do this business.

909
00:49:26,000 --> 00:49:26,440
Okay.

910
00:49:28,240 --> 00:49:30,600
When did he but the
first gun from you?

911
00:49:30,880 --> 00:49:33,880
1989. he came here with two friends.

912
00:49:34,040 --> 00:49:36,000
He came here to buy three
hand guns and two pistols.

913

What would have been the
cost of 3 hand guns and 2 pistols?

914
00:49:39,320 --> 00:49:40,880
There was no sale.

915
00:49:41,160 --> 00:49:46,600
There is a ground behind
our godown where guns are tested.

916
00:49:46,680 --> 00:49:49,200
I took him there to get the test done.

917
00:49:49,360 --> 00:49:53,040
Believe it or not but it seemed
as if he knew nothing about it.

918
00:49:53,200 --> 00:49:56,000
He did not know
anything about the gun.

919

Even then he was adamant to shoot.

920
00:49:57,680 --> 00:50:00,400
I asked him to shoot
as even I had to make sale.

921
00:50:00,640 --> 00:50:04,080
Then he picked up the
gun and started shooting..

922
00:50:04,160 --> 00:50:04,520
Yes..

923
00:50:04,600 --> 00:50:06,600
..and because of the weight
of the gun the wrist got twisted.

924
00:50:06,680 --> 00:50:08,800
And did not hit the aim.
- The aim had to miss.

925
00:50:08,880 --> 00:50:10,080
Absolutely right, sir.

926
00:50:10,160 --> 00:50:13,360
But he aimed at the
ceiling of nearby shop.

927
00:50:13,440 --> 00:50:15,400
The ceiling fell
and three workers died.

928
00:50:16,000 --> 00:50:19,200
Against his will D
committed his first murder.

929
00:50:19,280 --> 00:50:20,800
Okay then what happened?

930
00:50:20,880 --> 00:50:24,760
Then I asked him to
leave before any more died.

931
00:50:24,840 --> 00:50:28,200
Then Mr. Dougle came and took him.

932
00:50:28,520 --> 00:50:30,360
Then..

933
00:50:30,640 --> 00:50:33,880
In this way D committed
his first murder.

934
00:50:34,000 --> 00:50:37,160
To give your response tweet..

935
00:50:37,240 --> 00:50:41,680
..

936
00:50:44,520 --> 00:50:45,560
Who is he?

937
00:50:54,200 --> 00:50:56,320
Find out Girdhari.
- Okay.

938
00:50:56,880 --> 00:50:58,160
I will not spare him.

939
00:50:58,240 --> 00:51:00,320
Be careful brother.
Your BP will shoot.

940
00:51:00,640 --> 00:51:02,920
Find out. Find out..

941
00:51:03,000 --> 00:51:04,040
Okay.

942
00:51:04,520 --> 00:51:06,480
Brother that..

943
00:51:08,360 --> 00:51:09,680
What?

944

There are two more videos.

945

946

Because you were laughing brother.

947
00:51:39,760 --> 00:51:41,360
Hello..

948

Before doing the daring you
should have thought about the dangers.

949

Who is speaking?

950

Since three days you

951

..twitter and you do
not know who I am speaking.

952

D.

953

954
00:51:58,280 --> 00:51:59,160
So who is speaking?

955
00:51:59,240 --> 00:52:01,480
It is not important who I am speaking.

956
00:52:01,560 --> 00:52:06,040
It is important that
you stop your drama.

957

Otherwise we will not

958
00:52:10,080 --> 00:52:11,640
This drama will not stop.

959
00:52:12,480 --> 00:52:13,480
India is a free country
and we have the..

960
00:52:13,560 --> 00:52:15,080
..right to speak and
show anything we wish to.

961

Hey, free country.

962
00:52:17,320 --> 00:52:19,120
Keep a finger on the globe.

963
00:52:19,520 --> 00:52:22,480
Every country is there
but none is free for us.

964
00:52:23,320 --> 00:52:25,360
Whatever you are showing

965
00:52:25,440 --> 00:52:26,640

966
00:52:26,720 --> 00:52:28,800
If you believe vegetable seller
and constable then everything is true.

967
00:52:28,880 --> 00:52:32,040
Understand that you
and your actors will die.

968

You do not understand.
This drama will not end.

969
00:52:35,680 --> 00:52:37,440
Kill me if you wish to.

970

971

Look, if one incident happens on social

972

Your brother is going

973

Yes, there is one option.

974
00:52:49,760 --> 00:52:52,280
Quiet. Are you playing KBC with me?

975

Ask brother to give
me personal interview.

976
00:52:55,240 --> 00:52:57,280
Whatever he wishes to
justify say in that interview.

977
00:52:57,360 --> 00:53:00,240
I take the responsibility
of telecasting that interview.

978
00:53:00,360 --> 00:53:00,920
Okay..

979
00:53:01,040 --> 00:53:04,080
Hey you rascal..

980
00:53:04,160 --> 00:53:05,800
Don't curse me but do me this favor.

981
00:53:06,440 --> 00:53:10,400
Now call me next time only when
brother agrees for interview. Okay.

982
00:53:10,640 --> 00:53:11,680
Hey hello..

983

So he has created all
this chaos for the interview.

984
00:53:32,280 --> 00:53:33,120
Yes brother.

985

Say yes.

986

987
00:53:39,000 --> 00:53:40,400
Say yes to him.
How?

988
00:53:41,600 --> 00:53:45,320
It is an opportunity Girdhari.
Enough of playing jokes.

989
00:53:47,240 --> 00:53:49,640
Those who were scared till
yesterday are laughing today.

990
00:53:53,480 --> 00:53:59,160
Everyone should know
that D means fear.

991
00:53:59,480 --> 00:54:02,200
That means D you will
give interview and come on TV.

992

Bringing him here
would create trouble.

993
00:54:04,680 --> 00:54:06,160
There is a security risk.

994
00:54:06,240 --> 00:54:08,680

995
00:54:10,880 --> 00:54:13,400
He has just to be brought here.

996
00:54:13,760 --> 00:54:15,040
What do you mean?

997
00:54:15,920 --> 00:54:19,800
I mean you say yes
to him for the interview..

998
00:54:21,520 --> 00:54:24,760
..and I will kill him live on TV.

999
00:54:38,560 --> 00:54:39,280
Hello..

1000
00:54:39,720 --> 00:54:42,120
Tomorrow afternoon
3:30 at Bhendi Bazaar.

1001
00:54:42,200 --> 00:54:43,120
Come alone.

1002
00:54:43,920 --> 00:54:45,000
Who is speaking?

1003

If you need interview
then reach there.

1004
00:54:48,160 --> 00:54:50,760
Tindi Bazaar..
- Bhendi Bazaar..

1005
00:54:51,040 --> 00:54:52,040
Aloo Bazaar..

1006
00:54:52,160 --> 00:54:53,840
Bhendi Bazaar. Can't you hear?

1007
00:54:54,040 --> 00:54:56,440
Okay, Bhendi Bazaar.
But where in Bhendi Bazaar?

1008
00:54:56,600 --> 00:54:59,000
Ask for 100gms cardamom
at Simar general store.

1009
00:54:59,240 --> 00:55:00,040
200gms.

1010
00:55:00,120 --> 00:55:02,760
100gms cardamom.
- Okay.

1011
00:55:03,480 --> 00:55:04,520
Bhendi Bazaar. Right.

1012
00:55:04,600 --> 00:55:06,400
Yes, Bhendi Bazaar.
- Okay.

1013
00:55:18,200 --> 00:55:23,040
Roy, my boy we are in cardamom!

1014
00:55:23,680 --> 00:55:25,800
I mean we are in business.

1015
00:55:26,800 --> 00:55:27,600
Yes.

1016
00:55:50,400 --> 00:55:52,800
I hope you had no problem
in understanding the route. - No..

1017
00:55:53,080 --> 00:55:55,200
Look at this cardamom.

1018
00:55:55,280 --> 00:55:57,240
I had called for it.

1019
00:55:57,520 --> 00:55:59,040
It was finished at home.

1020
00:55:59,120 --> 00:56:01,000
It will be of use
to make rice pudding.

1021
00:56:01,040 --> 00:56:04,320
You just have to take 4 people there.

1022
00:56:04,400 --> 00:56:05,760
Tell me before hand.

1023

Take this.
- What is this?

1024
00:56:07,880 --> 00:56:12,240
These are your tickets. Do
not open them before reaching there.

1025
00:56:12,320 --> 00:56:14,800
You must have understood
that Haftaa brother has sent this.

1026
00:56:14,880 --> 00:56:16,200
But how will we go?

1027
00:56:16,280 --> 00:56:19,440
There is a Bahid village
near Bikaner in Rajasthan.

1028
00:56:19,520 --> 00:56:22,920
Reach there at 4 in the afternoon
there day after tomorrow.

1029
00:56:23,040 --> 00:56:26,320
Near kali Mata Chowk
you will find a tea stall.

1030
00:56:26,400 --> 00:56:29,480
Order for Udta Chicken
and Bullet Chaat.

1031
00:56:29,640 --> 00:56:31,920
Brother, give me 4 Udta Chicken chaat.

1032
00:56:32,200 --> 00:56:33,520
Coffee With D

1033
00:56:37,000 --> 00:56:41,240
If you want to live
then drink coffee with D

1034
00:56:44,040 --> 00:56:48,520
If you want to live
then drink coffee with D

1035
00:57:02,160 --> 00:57:05,360
Brother we got message
of Hafta brother.

1036
00:57:05,920 --> 00:57:07,160
The boys are right.

1037
00:57:07,240 --> 00:57:10,080
Won't you blindfold us
so that we cannot see the way?

1038
00:57:10,320 --> 00:57:12,040
There is no problem if you see..

1039
00:57:12,080 --> 00:57:13,880
..because you will not
be able to see while returning.

1040
00:57:14,000 --> 00:57:14,680
Why?

1041
00:57:14,760 --> 00:57:16,720
Because while returning
you will be in chicken bag.

1042
00:57:17,640 --> 00:57:19,560
Coffee With D.

1043
00:57:31,320 --> 00:57:33,160
Okay, who is Arnab?

1044
00:57:33,440 --> 00:57:35,560
Okay, okay.

1045
00:57:35,640 --> 00:57:39,360
Hey, what are you selling nowadays,
vegetable seller?

1046
00:57:39,440 --> 00:57:42,120
I don't have a shop.
I am a makeup man sir.

1047
00:57:42,200 --> 00:57:43,480
Okay, keep quiet vegetable seller.

1048
00:57:43,560 --> 00:57:45,640
Hey madam, no photo.
- Why?

1049
00:57:45,720 --> 00:57:46,600
Keep your mobile inside.

1050
00:57:47,520 --> 00:57:50,160
No photo.
- Sorry.

1051
00:57:50,240 --> 00:57:51,920
You seemed to be very brave
on the phone the other day.

1052
00:57:52,000 --> 00:57:53,800
I felt as if you would
kill me there and then.

1053

1054

1055

What do you mean?

1056

I mean will D sir

1057
00:58:04,640 --> 00:58:05,760
He will meet you later.

1058
00:58:05,840 --> 00:58:07,720
Is she your wife?
- No.

1059
00:58:08,400 --> 00:58:10,640
Is she your sister?
- No.

1060

1061

Either shake hands or give me the bag.

1062
00:58:19,520 --> 00:58:20,840
Hello.

1063

Come..

1064
00:58:26,040 --> 00:58:27,000
Come..

1065

Come on tell.

1066
00:58:33,720 --> 00:58:36,440
I swear I did not shoot.

1067
00:58:36,520 --> 00:58:38,080

1068
00:58:39,760 --> 00:58:41,080
I am saying truth.
- Egg and bread.

1069
00:58:41,880 --> 00:58:42,640
I don't want.

1070
00:58:44,760 --> 00:58:47,520
Come on I am too angry now. Come on..

1071
00:58:47,600 --> 00:58:49,040
Hey, make the video.
- Yes..

1072
00:58:49,080 --> 00:58:50,760
Come on make the video quickly.
- Making..

1073
00:58:50,840 --> 00:58:53,000
Straighten your hand.
- It is straight.

1074
00:58:53,080 --> 00:58:54,920
Come on quickly.
- Keep the focus here.

1075
00:58:55,000 --> 00:58:57,040
Yes keep the focus there.
- Sorry madam..

1076
00:58:57,320 --> 00:59:00,560
Hey Bhansali, will you
make a three and half hour movie?

1077
00:59:00,640 --> 00:59:02,320
Make a small love story.

1078
00:59:02,680 --> 00:59:03,440
Done..
- Done..

1079
00:59:03,520 --> 00:59:05,320
Come on now..

1080
00:59:05,400 --> 00:59:06,080
Come on move...

1081
00:59:06,160 --> 00:59:07,440
Not that side but come this side.

1082
00:59:07,520 --> 00:59:10,400
Ask her to pick up.

1083
00:59:10,480 --> 00:59:12,480
Come on get inside.
- Come on.

1084
00:59:12,560 --> 00:59:15,000
Come on.
- be careful of knife.

1085
00:59:24,040 --> 00:59:24,640
Hello.

1086
00:59:25,040 --> 00:59:27,800
You should have been
director in CBI Mr. Roy.

1087
00:59:28,000 --> 00:59:29,000
Who is this?

1088
00:59:29,040 --> 00:59:31,160
I am director of CBI speaking fool.

1089
00:59:31,360 --> 00:59:34,120
Is there some legal matter that
you have sent your people to Pakistan?

1090
00:59:34,200 --> 00:59:36,920
Sorry sir. I made a mistake.

1091
00:59:37,040 --> 00:59:39,920
I was about to call
you and then I realized..

1092
00:59:40,000 --> 00:59:42,440
..that you will talk that nonsense.

1093
00:59:42,680 --> 00:59:44,760
Get the phone of D tapped.

1094
00:59:45,000 --> 00:59:47,520
Or send some of his internal photos.

1095
00:59:48,320 --> 00:59:49,800
Or give him posion.

1096
00:59:50,120 --> 00:59:52,560
My boy would have got
distracted from his work, sir.

1097
00:59:52,880 --> 00:59:55,240
You do not know what
foolishness have you done.

1098
00:59:55,480 --> 01:00:00,760
Sir if we do the work that you cannot
do then it is called foolishness.

1099
01:00:00,840 --> 01:00:01,840
This is wrong, sir.

1100
01:00:01,920 --> 01:00:04,040
You idiot.
Do you know what you have done?

1101
01:00:04,080 --> 01:00:05,520
Because of this..
- I am sorry sir.

1102
01:00:05,600 --> 01:00:07,240
I will have to keep the phone.
There is lots of work here.

1103
01:00:07,320 --> 01:00:09,600
Sir we will talk
at ease some other time.

1104
01:00:09,680 --> 01:00:11,840
Why don't you do one thing?
Come to our studio.

1105
01:00:11,920 --> 01:00:13,320
We will take your interview as well.
- What..

1106
01:00:13,720 --> 01:00:15,360
Okay sir.
- Idiot.

1107
01:00:17,320 --> 01:00:19,480
I know that you are scared.

1108
01:00:20,160 --> 01:00:22,680
Anyways there is nothing
to be scared of as..

1109
01:00:22,760 --> 01:00:25,040
I do not unnecessarily
raise hand on someone.

1110
01:00:25,080 --> 01:00:28,120
Hey, can't you see it is a carpet.

1111
01:00:28,760 --> 01:00:30,160

1112
01:00:30,480 --> 01:00:34,560
Hey, I think you do
not know whose men are we.

1113
01:00:34,640 --> 01:00:38,560
Idiot, you are the men of that person
who sells cardamom in Bhendi bazaar.

1114
01:00:38,840 --> 01:00:42,040
And my husband has personally gone
to meet the person for whom he works.

1115
01:00:42,120 --> 01:00:43,840
Now you see what is your standing?

1116
01:00:45,240 --> 01:00:47,120
Keep the shoes away and sit down.
- Okay.

1117
01:00:47,200 --> 01:00:48,480
I am saying that..

1118
01:00:48,600 --> 01:00:50,640
First remove your shoes.
- Remove them, remove them..

1119
01:00:50,720 --> 01:00:52,440
Okay, okay..

1120
01:00:54,920 --> 01:00:59,120
Hey beautiful,
you are taking us too lightly.

1121
01:00:59,320 --> 01:01:01,160
Do you know what is this?
- It is a shoe.

1122
01:01:04,640 --> 01:01:08,120
Brother, gun.
Since long we were playing with knife.

1123
01:01:08,200 --> 01:01:13,440
Keep it straight.

1124
01:01:14,000 --> 01:01:16,920
Keep it on the side
otherwise you may shoot.

1125
01:01:17,080 --> 01:01:18,920

1126
01:01:19,080 --> 01:01:21,600
If you shoot then
this bulb will burst.

1127
01:01:21,920 --> 01:01:25,000
And if I shoot then God forbid even
I don't know what will happen of you.

1128
01:01:26,320 --> 01:01:30,000
I think I will have to
take permission to kill you.

1129
01:01:32,880 --> 01:01:34,520
Is it correct?
