01:13:46,400 --> 01:13:48,840
That day Pakistan
bashing was necessary.

1382
01:13:48,920 --> 01:13:52,040
Population control guys
wanted to run a story for them.

1383
01:13:52,120 --> 01:13:55,680
And more rumors of you being
in Pakistan or not continue.

1384
01:13:55,760 --> 01:13:58,560
Yes so. I did not understand anything.

1385
01:13:59,360 --> 01:14:01,160
We had fewer slots.

1386
01:14:01,240 --> 01:14:03,840
So chief editor covered
three stories in single news.

1387
01:14:03,920 --> 01:14:05,520
You must have heard the headlines.

1388
01:14:05,600 --> 01:14:09,280
No facility in Pakistan..D
had to go to Bangkok.

1389
01:14:09,360 --> 01:14:10,400
What's wrong with that?

1390
01:14:13,000 --> 01:14:15,400
You should have called
the chief editor as well.

1391
01:14:22,800 --> 01:14:25,560
Brother, may I ask you a question?
- Yes.

1392
01:14:26,280 --> 01:14:28,680
I hope you will let
me go alive from here.

1393
01:14:28,880 --> 01:14:29,920
Do you have any doubt?

1394
01:14:30,000 --> 01:14:32,720
I am sure that you will
not do anything like that.

1395
01:14:33,160 --> 01:14:34,440
What will I not do?

1396
01:14:34,520 --> 01:14:35,880
Cheap hooligan acts.

1397
01:14:43,560 --> 01:14:46,080
Brother, firstly I would
like to ask you that..

1398
01:14:46,160 --> 01:14:48,480
..how did you become
such a big gangster?

1399
01:14:48,560 --> 01:14:51,080
You have said it once
so dare not say it again.

1400
01:14:52,000 --> 01:14:53,760
I am not gangster..

1401
01:14:56,360 --> 01:14:57,560
..but a Don.

1402
01:14:58,480 --> 01:15:01,120
What did you understand?
- Okay, what is the difference?

1403
01:15:01,440 --> 01:15:04,360
Have you ever seen shootout on roads?

1404
01:15:04,440 --> 01:15:06,320
Not really but have heard from police.

1405
01:15:06,600 --> 01:15:10,200
Those involved in
shootout are gangsters.

1406
01:15:10,280 --> 01:15:11,360
And don?

1407
01:15:11,840 --> 01:15:16,480
Have you ever heard about the
mastermind behind these shootouts?

1408
01:15:16,720 --> 01:15:18,160
Not really. Have heard rumors.

1409
01:15:18,240 --> 01:15:24,360
So Don is the mastermind
about whom you have heard rumors.

1410
01:15:25,200 --> 01:15:28,240
So basically how did you become Don?

1411
01:15:34,400 --> 01:15:37,160
Any problem sir.
- No problem.

1412
01:15:37,680 --> 01:15:40,640
Actually I had a desire
of doing business from childhood.

1413
01:15:40,920 --> 01:15:42,680
But business can be of any kind.

1414
01:15:42,760 --> 01:15:45,680
Construction, production,
transportation, real estate etc.

1415
01:15:45,760 --> 01:15:48,640
So what do you think all
these are not my businesses?

1416
01:15:48,720 --> 01:15:50,600
Let's not get involved in what I feel.

1417
01:15:50,680 --> 01:15:52,840
Otherwise this interview
will have pre mature climax.

1418
01:15:52,920 --> 01:15:54,560
Where did you begin from?

1419
01:15:54,800 --> 01:15:57,520
Actually I was multi
talented from childhood.

1420
01:15:57,920 --> 01:16:01,520
What is the called? All rounder.

1421
01:16:02,480 --> 01:16:05,040
But my father had problem with this.

1422
01:16:05,120 --> 01:16:07,200
So you mean to say that
the reason you became a Don..

1423
01:16:07,280 --> 01:16:09,840
..are the unresolved father issues.

1424
01:16:11,120 --> 01:16:12,000
What?

1425
01:16:13,600 --> 01:16:16,040
Only one person is responsible..

1426
01:16:16,120 --> 01:16:20,640
..for me to become Don and that is I.

1427
01:16:21,600 --> 01:16:23,800
What did you understand?
- You are right.

1428
01:16:24,040 --> 01:16:26,040
What a stupid question on my part?

1429
01:16:26,120 --> 01:16:29,040
Which father would want his
son to become a Don after growing up?

1430
01:16:29,160 --> 01:16:30,920
Even you are right?

1431
01:16:31,040 --> 01:16:35,040
Which channel would want
his best reporter to die untimely?

1432
01:16:42,320 --> 01:16:43,680
Let's come to your question?

1433
01:16:44,840 --> 01:16:48,200
Actually I loved
cricket from childhood.

1434
01:16:49,280 --> 01:16:51,840
I was short height with
heavy body so could not play.

1435
01:16:51,920 --> 01:16:56,560
But my instincts were very strong.

1436
01:16:57,360 --> 01:17:02,600
In your language 'Mann Ki Baat'

1437
01:17:02,880 --> 01:17:07,440
So from childhood you got
involved in match fixing and betting.

1438
01:17:18,800 --> 01:17:21,200
I said four it was four.

1439
01:17:21,680 --> 01:17:23,680
I said six it was a six.

1440
01:17:24,080 --> 01:17:27,160
I said out it was out.

1441
01:17:27,520 --> 01:17:30,880
So basically you want to say
that your gut feeling was very strong.

1442
01:17:31,000 --> 01:17:32,360
Yes, in the beginning.

1443
01:17:32,440 --> 01:17:35,080
Afterwards there
was no need of gut feel.

1444
01:17:36,080 --> 01:17:37,400
Sorry, I did not understand.

1445
01:17:37,480 --> 01:17:40,280
Ask something else.
Ask something interesting.

1446
01:17:40,360 --> 01:17:44,200
So you are saying that you
have nothing to do with match fixing.

1447
01:17:44,480 --> 01:17:47,720
The entire world knows this D.
you cannot deny this.

1448
01:17:47,800 --> 01:17:50,120
Your photographs
are seen in the stadium.

1449
01:17:50,200 --> 01:17:51,480
How can you say this?

1450
01:17:51,560 --> 01:17:53,240
Photo.
- Yes.

1451
01:17:54,080 --> 01:17:56,280
Photographs are seen
of film stars on grant road..

1452
01:17:56,360 --> 01:17:58,560
..so that means all
of them are prostitutes.

1453
01:17:59,480 --> 01:18:02,400
Photo of politicians is also
there in from Amar Jawan Jyoti..

1454
01:18:02,480 --> 01:18:03,480
..so all of them are patriots.

1455
01:18:03,560 --> 01:18:04,640
What are you talking, brother Arnab?

1456
01:18:04,720 --> 01:18:07,080
So where did all rumors come from?

1457
01:18:07,280 --> 01:18:10,880
Actually I had friendship
with few players.

1458
01:18:11,440 --> 01:18:14,360
Some had difficulty in
affording two girlfriends.

1459
01:18:14,440 --> 01:18:16,280
Some had to repay education loan.

1460
01:18:16,360 --> 01:18:18,200
I use to help them.

1461
01:18:18,280 --> 01:18:20,360
Oh I see and in return.

1462
01:18:20,680 --> 01:18:23,280
In return they used to help me.
What else?

1463
01:18:24,200 --> 01:18:25,040
Now..

1464
01:18:25,800 --> 01:18:29,360
If every batsman will
make 100 in every match then..

1465
01:18:30,080 --> 01:18:32,320
..how will rest of
the talent get a chance?

1466
01:18:33,040 --> 01:18:35,880
Growth should be inclusive.

1467
01:18:36,160 --> 01:18:39,040
That means whatever
we saw on TV screens..

1468
01:18:39,120 --> 01:18:41,000
..was actually remote
controlled by you.

1469
01:18:41,120 --> 01:18:44,200
Hey, you are unnecessarily
exaggerating things.

1470
01:18:46,720 --> 01:18:48,720
So many times..

1471
01:18:49,200 --> 01:18:55,320
..I have told the players
to make 100 in a match.

1472
01:18:55,400 --> 01:18:57,520
For which country?
- My country.

1473
01:18:57,600 --> 01:19:01,000
What do you mean by my country?
- My country means my country.

1474
01:19:01,200 --> 01:19:03,440
That's all very fine
but why don't you take a name?

1475
01:19:03,520 --> 01:19:06,640
What is there in a name,
brother Arnab?

1476
01:19:06,720 --> 01:19:09,560
A country is not made
by name but with people.

1477
01:19:09,640 --> 01:19:11,040
What did you understand?
- Okay.

1478
01:19:11,280 --> 01:19:13,120
So you were talking
about your talents.

1479
01:19:13,280 --> 01:19:14,200
Yes.

1480
01:19:14,520 --> 01:19:16,720
Other than cricket
I loved movies also.

1481
01:19:18,760 --> 01:19:21,520
But I had two weaknesses
with regard to movies.

1482
01:19:23,000 --> 01:19:25,920
One I cannot wait till the
movie is released in cinema halls.

1483
01:19:26,800 --> 01:19:28,160
Secondly..

1484
01:19:29,840 --> 01:19:32,080
..I cannot enjoy movie alone.

1485
01:19:32,160 --> 01:19:35,040
If the movie is nice it
should reach everyone. Isn't it?

1486
01:19:35,320 --> 01:19:38,400
Okay, so that is
why you started piracy.

1487
01:19:39,040 --> 01:19:40,440
Piracy?

1488
01:19:40,760 --> 01:19:42,440
What does that mean, Girdhari?

1489
01:19:43,400 --> 01:19:48,280
I used to travel the world.

1490
01:19:48,360 --> 01:19:52,400
Wherever I saw a nice movie
I used to make one copy of it.

1491
01:19:52,480 --> 01:19:54,840
Did you understand? - So
this according to you is not piracy.

1492
01:19:54,920 --> 01:20:00,560
Not forcefully, Arnab but with love.

1493
01:20:00,840 --> 01:20:02,880
Sometimes France and sometimes Cannes.

1494
01:20:03,000 --> 01:20:05,280
France and Cannes are the same Mr. D.

1495
01:20:05,360 --> 01:20:08,000
You understood it so
why are you going in detail.

1496
01:20:08,040 --> 01:20:11,080
So basically you picked
up a print from festivals.

1497
01:20:12,440 --> 01:20:14,520
Picked up?

1498
01:20:16,000 --> 01:20:17,800
Men are kidnapped.

1499
01:20:18,400 --> 01:20:20,560
Have you ever heard
that the film was kidnapped?

1500
01:20:21,200 --> 01:20:22,480
No, Have you heard?

1501
01:20:22,560 --> 01:20:24,120
A question to your passion for movies.

1502
01:20:24,280 --> 01:20:26,400
Do you invest in Bollywood?
- No.

1503
01:20:26,680 --> 01:20:28,560
A lot of people believe that you do.

1504
01:20:28,640 --> 01:20:32,160
And you have a huge
piracy racket that causes..

1505
01:20:32,240 --> 01:20:35,560
..losses worth crores
to film industry every year.

1506
01:20:35,840 --> 01:20:37,120
Which losses?

1507
01:20:38,240 --> 01:20:39,680
Which losses?

1508
01:20:40,000 --> 01:20:42,560
First tell me where is my money?

1509
01:20:42,640 --> 01:20:44,040
Which money of yours?

1510
01:20:44,200 --> 01:20:48,800
The money that I should get
on every film that is based on me.

1511
01:20:48,880 --> 01:20:50,240
Should I get it or not?

1512
01:20:50,440 --> 01:20:52,600
Intellectual property.

1513
01:20:53,000 --> 01:20:57,000
I am sure everyone wants
to know what your real business is.

1514
01:20:57,040 --> 01:21:00,720
Smuggling,
extortion, horse racing or what..

1515
01:21:00,920 --> 01:21:02,280
Nothing out of this.

1516
01:21:03,320 --> 01:21:05,560
Basically you are unemployed.

1517
01:21:06,040 --> 01:21:07,680
Shall I ask you
something brother Arnab?

1518
01:21:09,320 --> 01:21:13,680
Begal family in America,
Gonzalis family in South America..

1519
01:21:13,760 --> 01:21:16,040
..and there are so
many names in Italy.

1520
01:21:16,120 --> 01:21:17,840
You will keep counting till evening.

1521
01:21:18,280 --> 01:21:21,640
All these people work
according to their wish.

1522
01:21:23,160 --> 01:21:24,720
Why do you have..

1523
01:21:25,440 --> 01:21:27,840
..special interest in me?

1524
01:21:27,920 --> 01:21:31,560
What special have they done
that no one says anything to them.

1525
01:21:31,640 --> 01:21:33,480
Mr. D you are evading my question.

1526
01:21:33,560 --> 01:21:35,560
Are you saying that
you don't do smuggling?

1527
01:21:36,480 --> 01:21:39,400
Hey buddy, I am service provider.

1528
01:21:39,560 --> 01:21:41,360
Service provider.

1529
01:21:42,560 --> 01:21:47,320
Transport service,
courier service, mobile service..

1530
01:21:47,400 --> 01:21:49,080
From mobile service
I remember one thing.

1531
01:21:50,120 --> 01:21:54,200
Tell me one thing if a person
calls from an airtel number..

1532
01:21:54,280 --> 01:21:57,560
..and do kidnapping then
what is the fault of airtel.

1533
01:21:57,640 --> 01:22:00,920
You said courier service. So
that means are you dominoes of drugs.

1534
01:22:01,440 --> 01:22:05,000
Your question has two words
which I did not understand.

1535
01:22:05,200 --> 01:22:05,760
Okay.

1536
01:22:05,880 --> 01:22:08,040
If you are a service provider..

1537
01:22:08,120 --> 01:22:11,200
..then why don't you openly
do business just like others?

1538
01:22:11,720 --> 01:22:13,560
I work openly.

1539
01:22:14,520 --> 01:22:17,760
You tell me how much material
you want me to send to your house.

1540
01:22:20,480 --> 01:22:21,600
I never meant that.

1541
01:22:24,760 --> 01:22:25,640
Leave it.

1542
01:22:26,520 --> 01:22:28,040
What about extortion?

1543
01:22:28,080 --> 01:22:29,680
I swear upon God..

1544
01:22:30,320 --> 01:22:32,440
..till today I have not
got anyone's child aborted.

1545
01:22:32,520 --> 01:22:36,040
Mr. D I am not talking
about abortion but of extortion.

1546
01:22:36,120 --> 01:22:39,720
Okay, what is the meaning of this?
I do not know its meaning.

1547
01:22:39,800 --> 01:22:43,000
Actor..he understands
intellectual property..

1548
01:22:43,040 --> 01:22:44,920
..but does not understand extortion.

1549
01:22:45,000 --> 01:22:48,560
Extortion means to obtain
money through force or threat.

1550
01:22:48,760 --> 01:22:49,920
Amazing.

1551
01:22:50,680 --> 01:22:53,680
Why do people come to
the point of force and threat?

1552
01:22:53,760 --> 01:22:55,120
What is my fault in this?

1553
01:22:55,200 --> 01:22:58,240
So you do agree that
you extract money from people.

1554
01:22:58,320 --> 01:23:01,480
If I provide service then
will surely give the bill.

1555
01:23:01,560 --> 01:23:05,040
Do you take salary from
the channel to do this show?

1556
01:23:05,200 --> 01:23:09,240
Okay Mr. D I think you are
not in mood to give direct answers.

1557
01:23:09,320 --> 01:23:11,360
Let's shift to some lighter questions.

1558
01:23:12,640 --> 01:23:16,000
You have already shifted
from brother to Mr. D

1559
01:23:16,040 --> 01:23:19,600
Even you have shifted from Mr.
Arnab to brother Arnab.

1560
01:23:23,920 --> 01:23:26,720
Who is your favorite actor?

1561
01:23:26,800 --> 01:23:29,200
Bruce Wills and Sylvester Stallone.

1562
01:23:29,480 --> 01:23:30,880
So you see Hollywood as well.

1563
01:23:31,000 --> 01:23:32,200
I see only Hollywood.

1564
01:23:32,280 --> 01:23:34,480
That is strange but why not Bollywood.

1565
01:23:34,640 --> 01:23:36,480
I don't like movies from South and..

1566
01:23:36,560 --> 01:23:38,800
..you do not make
anything else except that.

1567
01:23:39,520 --> 01:23:41,040
Who is your favorite heroine?

1568
01:23:41,080 --> 01:23:42,840
No one is nice in your country.

1569
01:23:42,920 --> 01:23:45,640
Some have fake lips,
some do not know Hindi..

1570
01:23:45,720 --> 01:23:47,240
..and if you see someone
without make up..

1571
01:23:47,320 --> 01:23:48,800
..then you would get paralysis attack.

1572
01:23:50,280 --> 01:23:52,200
Where do you get all these from?

1573
01:23:52,360 --> 01:23:54,880
Okay, so who do you like?

1574
01:23:55,000 --> 01:23:57,640
Nazreena..
- But she is from Bollywood.

1575
01:23:57,800 --> 01:24:02,520
She is in Bollywood now. Her
actual work started in New York's bar.

1576
01:24:03,120 --> 01:24:05,040
Mr. D this is a family show..

1577
01:24:05,120 --> 01:24:08,280
..so it would be better if
you keep your responses censored.

1578
01:24:08,360 --> 01:24:11,360
If you were to do family show
then why are you interviewing me?

1579
01:24:11,440 --> 01:24:14,000
You should have done of
Sooraj Barjatya or Raju Hirani.

1580
01:24:14,040 --> 01:24:17,600
Believe me I tried for that
but they are busier than you nowadays.

1581
01:24:17,680 --> 01:24:19,880
Shall I arrange by calling them now?

1582
01:24:20,200 --> 01:24:24,400
Anyway, other than
Hollywood what do you like?

1583
01:24:24,880 --> 01:24:27,920
Other than Hollywood
I like to see porn.

1584
01:24:28,000 --> 01:24:33,840
There is no story in this as well
in that but action is surely there.

1585
01:24:34,280 --> 01:24:37,600
But nowadays many such movies
are being made in Bollywood..

1586
01:24:37,680 --> 01:24:39,120
..where there is so much action.

1587
01:24:39,200 --> 01:24:43,560
For example Jism 2, Ragini MMS 2
Extreme action.

1588
01:24:43,640 --> 01:24:46,080
So you had to get a porn star.

1589
01:24:48,640 --> 01:24:52,600
Okay, With that we take a short break.
Stay with us we will just be back.

1590
01:24:57,720 --> 01:25:02,440
Special LIV-IN condoms. Made from
Nigeria's special 4N TCM polyster.

1591
01:25:02,520 --> 01:25:04,240
You need not remove it.

1592
01:25:04,320 --> 01:25:06,800
You never know when
you would get a chance.

1593
01:25:07,080 --> 01:25:10,800
It adjusts according to your size.

1594
01:25:10,920 --> 01:25:15,760
So that at the time
of need you are ready.

1595
01:25:16,400 --> 01:25:20,120
LIV-In condoms. Keep wearing it.

1596
01:25:20,520 --> 01:25:21,360
Don't remove it.

1597
01:25:21,440 --> 01:25:23,680
Welcome back. I am still with D.

1598
01:25:24,200 --> 01:25:26,360
A man who is not
ready to give answer..

1599
01:25:26,440 --> 01:25:28,720
..but we are trying
to find answers from him.

1600
01:25:29,120 --> 01:25:34,560
Sir, tell me something about
your journey from Mumbai to here.

1601
01:25:36,160 --> 01:25:37,440
Not Mumbai.

1602
01:25:38,400 --> 01:25:39,480
Okay, sure.

1603
01:25:39,920 --> 01:25:41,800
That reminds me.

1604
01:25:41,880 --> 01:25:43,600
I received a call yesterday that..

1605
01:25:43,680 --> 01:25:45,760
..there is no water in
my area for last three days.

1606
01:25:46,240 --> 01:25:48,400
You cannot do such a small work.

1607
01:25:49,000 --> 01:25:52,280
Mr. D let me remind you
that I am not in municipality.

1608
01:25:52,360 --> 01:25:54,760
Not that I have remembered
then let me get it done.

1609
01:25:54,840 --> 01:25:56,440
Call up Gaitonde.

1610
01:25:57,600 --> 01:25:59,920
I will just show you
what municipality is.

1611
01:26:04,120 --> 01:26:05,640
Hello..
- Gaitonde...

1612
01:26:05,720 --> 01:26:06,480
Greetings, brother.

1613
01:26:06,680 --> 01:26:07,840
How are you?
- Absolutely fine.

1614
01:26:07,920 --> 01:26:08,680
Greetings.

1615
01:26:09,080 --> 01:26:10,800
All that is fine. Listen to me.

1616
01:26:11,840 --> 01:26:13,920
There is no water
in Dongri for three days.

1617
01:26:14,600 --> 01:26:18,480
Send tanker there quickly
and I will not call again.

1618
01:26:19,520 --> 01:26:23,000
Yes brother Arnab, tell me.

1619
01:26:23,040 --> 01:26:26,000
Mr. D you have still
not answered my question.

1620
01:26:26,040 --> 01:26:29,120
Tell me about your
journey from...to here.

1621
01:26:29,200 --> 01:26:33,360
Look Dongri brought me up,
waiting room helped me to grow

1622
01:26:33,440 --> 01:26:35,760
Wadala and Manish Market made me Don.

1623
01:26:35,840 --> 01:26:38,080
Your government made me fugitive.

1624
01:26:38,160 --> 01:26:40,840
That is all about my journey.

1625
01:26:41,040 --> 01:26:45,000
And how did you reach this place?

1626
01:26:45,040 --> 01:26:47,320
Here I have come with my wish.
Ask why?

1627
01:26:47,560 --> 01:26:48,320
Why?

1628
01:26:49,280 --> 01:26:51,800
I Karachi I feel the fragrance of....

1629
01:26:51,880 --> 01:26:54,520
Okay now that e are
talking of fragrance then..

1630
01:26:54,600 --> 01:26:57,440
..do you want to say
something about 93 blasts.

1631
01:26:57,520 --> 01:27:00,840
Don't go there otherwise
interview will become like that.

1632
01:27:00,920 --> 01:27:03,040
Mr. D it is my job to go there.

1633
01:27:03,400 --> 01:27:05,760
I am also a service provider like you.

1634
01:27:05,840 --> 01:27:06,840
I deliver truth.

1635
01:27:06,920 --> 01:27:10,280
Then go and find truth somewhere else.
There is no truth about this here.

1636
01:27:10,360 --> 01:27:11,520
So you do not want to say anything.

1637
01:27:11,600 --> 01:27:13,920
How did the battery
of the remote decreased?

1638
01:27:15,560 --> 01:27:19,560
Brother Arnab,
in childhood my mother had explained..

1639
01:27:19,640 --> 01:27:22,080
..that if someone has
made up his mind then..

1640
01:27:22,160 --> 01:27:25,400
..don't waste time
to make him understand.

1641
01:27:25,600 --> 01:27:28,480
Okay so if you won't
tell then let me ask.

1642
01:27:28,800 --> 01:27:32,680
Were you involved in 93 blasts?
- No.

1643
01:27:33,320 --> 01:27:34,640
Not a plain no.

1644
01:27:34,720 --> 01:27:36,640
I was not involved so
you want me to give a speech..

1645
01:27:36,720 --> 01:27:38,600
..of three and a half minutes on it.

1646
01:27:38,680 --> 01:27:39,680
What rubbish is this?

1647
01:27:39,760 --> 01:27:44,080
It is very clear from the evidences
that you had supplied bombs.

1648
01:27:44,560 --> 01:27:46,640
Yes I did.
When did I say that I didn't?

1649
01:27:46,800 --> 01:27:48,800
But you just said that
you were not involved.

1650
01:27:49,240 --> 01:27:50,440
Brother..

1651
01:27:52,560 --> 01:27:55,080
I supply the bombs
and crackers that burst.

1652
01:27:55,160 --> 01:27:58,480
I have a fireworks factory in....

1653
01:27:58,720 --> 01:28:02,800
So you are actually saying that
you own a fireworks factory in India.

1654
01:28:03,000 --> 01:28:03,720
Yes.

1655
01:28:03,920 --> 01:28:06,440
If you don't mind can you
tell me the name of that company?

1656
01:28:06,520 --> 01:28:08,040
You are again getting into details.

1657
01:28:08,720 --> 01:28:11,360
What did you say that
is was what of drugs?

1658
01:28:11,440 --> 01:28:13,080
Dominoes....
- Dominoes.

1659
01:28:13,160 --> 01:28:17,800
So understand that I am
big bazaar of bombs as well.

1660
01:28:18,600 --> 01:28:22,760
Let us talk about your
occupational hazards.

1661
01:28:23,600 --> 01:28:27,920
I mean let's talk about the problems
you face in running your business.

1662
01:28:28,240 --> 01:28:30,760
You must be facing problems
in running the business of bombs.

1663
01:28:31,000 --> 01:28:33,200
Yes, from problem I remember.

1664
01:28:33,280 --> 01:28:36,440
Yesterday Al-Qaida people
called and said that..

1665
01:28:36,520 --> 01:28:39,280
..they had sent a suicide
bomb girl in Delhi.

1666
01:28:39,560 --> 01:28:41,720
She was passing through petrol pump..

1667
01:28:41,800 --> 01:28:44,320
..and four boys noticed
and thought she was their right.

1668
01:28:44,400 --> 01:28:45,200
And did....

1669
01:28:45,280 --> 01:28:50,400
Has it been declared
as official sport in Delhi?

1670
01:28:50,560 --> 01:28:54,800
Can you elaborate that
suicide bomber matter?

1671
01:28:55,080 --> 01:28:56,360
Don't deviate from the issue.

1672
01:28:56,800 --> 01:29:03,560
The point is that in your country
a kind girl cannot work peacefully.

1673
01:29:03,640 --> 01:29:05,440
I agree....

1674
01:29:06,760 --> 01:29:11,560
But that so called innocent girl
had not gone there to do candle march.

1675
01:29:12,840 --> 01:29:14,720
Leave it. Let's just move on.

1676
01:29:15,360 --> 01:29:18,160
What other problems do you have?
- Attrition.

1677
01:29:18,240 --> 01:29:20,080
Great. He did not
understand unresolved..

1678
01:29:20,160 --> 01:29:22,480
..father issues but
knows of attrition.

1679
01:29:22,560 --> 01:29:25,320
Did you say anything?
- No nothing.

1680
01:29:25,400 --> 01:29:26,320
You carry on.

1681
01:29:26,640 --> 01:29:29,920
In last two months two hundred
people have stopped working for me.

1682
01:29:30,000 --> 01:29:33,640
Amazing. I had heard no
one can leave the job of Don.

1683
01:29:34,000 --> 01:29:37,720
You heard it right but your Baba..

1684
01:29:39,560 --> 01:29:40,600
..he keeps doing this.

1685
01:29:40,680 --> 01:29:42,640
I had sent to threaten him.

1686
01:29:43,520 --> 01:29:47,240
Three days they stayed in his camp and
said that they don't want to return.

1687
01:29:47,320 --> 01:29:50,600
Seeing them some people
left from there as well.

1688
01:29:50,680 --> 01:29:53,080
What SMS had come, Girdhari?

1689
01:29:53,640 --> 01:29:54,480
Show them.

1690
01:29:55,280 --> 01:29:56,560
Brother, we will not be able to do it.

1691
01:29:56,640 --> 01:29:59,000
Such SMS are coming.

1692
01:29:59,320 --> 01:30:00,000
What should we do?

1693
01:30:05,000 --> 01:30:06,280
Absolutely bomb.

1694
01:30:06,680 --> 01:30:08,080
Where?

1695
01:30:10,120 --> 01:30:12,040
Brother, what is her name?

1696
01:30:12,320 --> 01:30:13,800
Absolutely Bomb.

1697
01:30:20,720 --> 01:30:23,280
Where have you got lost?
Ask further, reporter.

1698
01:30:23,640 --> 01:30:25,200
Not reporter but senior editor.

1699
01:30:25,280 --> 01:30:26,600
What is the difference between both?

1700
01:30:26,880 --> 01:30:28,920
The same that is there
between gangster and Don.

1701
01:30:30,840 --> 01:30:33,000
On this note let's take a short break.

1702
01:30:33,080 --> 01:30:36,640
I am still sitting with
the most wanted man on the planet.

1703
01:30:36,720 --> 01:30:41,280
And believe me things are going to get
lot more interesting. Don't go away.

1704
01:30:41,840 --> 01:30:43,280
Bring water for brother.

1705
01:30:43,680 --> 01:30:45,840
I will just check it.

1706
01:30:48,080 --> 01:30:49,600
I was saying....
- Water...

1707
01:30:51,680 --> 01:30:53,600
I was giving it to her.

1708
01:30:53,680 --> 01:30:55,000
So, I was saying...

1709
01:30:55,040 --> 01:30:56,760
Strange man you are.

1710
01:30:57,760 --> 01:30:59,840
Okay drink.

1711
01:31:00,480 --> 01:31:01,240
Thank you.

1712
01:31:10,200 --> 01:31:10,920
What happened?

1713
01:31:11,080 --> 01:31:15,160
These rich people are so stingy.

1714
01:31:15,240 --> 01:31:18,280
After begging for two hours we
got this and that also without sugar.

1715
01:31:18,360 --> 01:31:20,160
What are you talking?
Is there no sugar in this?

1716
01:31:20,400 --> 01:31:21,760
What should we do now?

1717
01:31:23,080 --> 01:31:25,160
I have an idea.
- What?

1718
01:31:25,480 --> 01:31:26,840
Wait, let me think.

1719
01:31:26,920 --> 01:31:28,600
Idea and that also you have to think.

1720
01:31:31,320 --> 01:31:34,800
Bomb, bond....

1721
01:31:34,880 --> 01:31:37,080
Brother, let me tell you one thing.

1722
01:31:37,480 --> 01:31:40,600
Since long this idea
was coming to my mind.

1723
01:31:40,680 --> 01:31:42,120
But just could not speak.

1724
01:31:42,200 --> 01:31:44,920
It is the effect of the company.

1725
01:31:46,800 --> 01:31:48,440
What has she given?

1726
01:31:48,520 --> 01:31:53,480
After Duryodhan only
you have dared to insult.

1727
01:31:53,760 --> 01:31:56,000
What do you mean?

1728
01:31:56,080 --> 01:31:59,480
It means to insult someone physically.

1729
01:31:59,560 --> 01:32:02,040
Is there any other
way to make someone naked?

1730
01:32:02,080 --> 01:32:04,360
Yes brother.
Which one?

1731
01:32:04,440 --> 01:32:05,560
Emotionally.

1732
01:32:19,240 --> 01:32:20,040
Hi.

1733
01:32:21,160 --> 01:32:23,760
Greetings.
- Greetings.

1734
01:32:24,720 --> 01:32:26,000
You seem to belong to this place.

1735
01:32:26,400 --> 01:32:30,640
What do you mean?
I was born in Faislabad.

1736
01:32:31,160 --> 01:32:35,840
Okay. Don't you feel
guilty in working with D?

1737
01:32:39,760 --> 01:32:43,560
I mean in whatever you are
saying is not with conviction.

1738
01:32:43,880 --> 01:32:45,080
What is that?

1739
01:32:46,320 --> 01:32:51,000
You are not saying with true
heart whatever you want to say.

1740
01:32:51,200 --> 01:32:55,080
I am unmarried so do
not know the matter of heart.

1741
01:32:55,720 --> 01:33:00,360
If I was Gafur instead of Girdhari
then would you ask this question?

1742
01:33:00,440 --> 01:33:01,440
About guilt.

1743
01:33:05,320 --> 01:33:06,400
Do you want number?

1744
01:33:06,560 --> 01:33:09,120
No, there is a call for me.
Excuse me.

1745
01:33:11,040 --> 01:33:11,720
Yes sir.

1746
01:33:11,920 --> 01:33:14,720
Come on Arnab,
he is killing you out there.

1747
01:33:15,440 --> 01:33:17,480
Have you gone there to
ask questions or give answers?

1748
01:33:17,880 --> 01:33:20,280
Just kick him in the guts man.

1749
01:33:21,000 --> 01:33:23,000
Do you know what the
reaction of the public is?

1750
01:33:23,200 --> 01:33:27,400
You are trending globally
with a hash tag national hero.

1751
01:33:27,480 --> 01:33:29,240
Do you know what that means?

1752
01:33:29,760 --> 01:33:32,160
He is smarter than
what we had thought of.

1753
01:33:32,640 --> 01:33:35,120
But don't worry it
is just the interval.

1754
01:33:35,320 --> 01:33:37,720
I will take care. Okay.

1755
01:33:40,400 --> 01:33:43,200
I think we are missing
an opportunity here.

1756
01:33:43,880 --> 01:33:46,920
We are interviewing the
biggest interview of the century.

1757
01:33:48,120 --> 01:33:51,560
Do you understand? This is Arnab v/s D

1758
01:33:52,120 --> 01:33:56,200
Alright then 3, 2, 1 going live.

1759
01:33:56,280 --> 01:33:59,000
Welcome back to the most
exciting part of the interview.

1760
01:33:59,080 --> 01:34:00,120
The rapid fire.

1761
01:34:00,400 --> 01:34:03,720
Yes, this is my favorite.
- Not this one sir.

1762
01:34:03,800 --> 01:34:07,480
Okay, the one in which you
ask questions one after the other.

1763
01:34:07,560 --> 01:34:10,440
And the one who gives answers
just say anything in haste.

1764
01:34:10,520 --> 01:34:13,120
Is it that?
- Yes exactly.

1765
01:34:13,320 --> 01:34:14,120
So shall we move ahead?

1766
01:34:14,200 --> 01:34:16,040
You go ahead. I will speak from here.

1767
01:34:17,280 --> 01:34:20,680
In this round I will ask
you five questions in 1 minute.

1768
01:34:20,760 --> 01:34:22,680
You have to answer them quickly.

1769
01:34:22,760 --> 01:34:23,640
1st question.

1770
01:34:24,200 --> 01:34:28,040
If you are left alone
on an island for one week..

1771
01:34:28,080 --> 01:34:29,920
..then whom would you
like to take with you?

1772
01:34:30,000 --> 01:34:31,000
Anyone would do.

1773
01:34:31,160 --> 01:34:32,280
What do you mean that anyone would do?

1774
01:34:32,360 --> 01:34:35,320
Because whosoever will come with me
but only I will be alive after one week.

1775
01:34:35,400 --> 01:34:39,280
If you get a chance
to meet American president..

1776
01:34:39,360 --> 01:34:42,680
..Pakistan PM and Indian
PM then who would you like to meet.

1777
01:34:42,760 --> 01:34:44,440
I do not like the Indian one.

1778
01:34:44,920 --> 01:34:47,000
US one is scared of me.

1779
01:34:47,040 --> 01:34:49,880
And as far as Pakistan PM is concerned
then he is almost here all the time.

1780
01:34:50,000 --> 01:34:52,080
Wait for 10 minutes and
I shall make you meet him.

1781
01:34:53,040 --> 01:34:55,120
Virat or Shahid?
- Whoever takes the money?

1782
01:34:55,320 --> 01:34:57,640
AK 47 or AK 56

1783
01:34:58,520 --> 01:35:02,160
Brain...most dangerous.

1784
01:35:02,240 --> 01:35:04,040
Nazreena or Geetika.

1785
01:35:04,120 --> 01:35:05,280
Both....

1786
01:35:06,600 --> 01:35:08,680
Not both but you have to choose one.

1787
01:35:08,920 --> 01:35:12,160
Both have come here.

1788
01:35:12,240 --> 01:35:13,040
Okay.

1789
01:35:13,120 --> 01:35:17,240
If there is biopic on D then
whom would you want to play your role?

1790
01:35:18,040 --> 01:35:19,040
Shashi Kapoor.

1791
01:35:19,120 --> 01:35:20,640
Mr. Shashi Kapoor. Why?

1792
01:35:20,720 --> 01:35:24,120
Even I have bungalow,
car and money but..

1793
01:35:24,520 --> 01:35:26,760
..mother is still with him till today.

1794
01:35:26,840 --> 01:35:27,720
Okay.

1795
01:35:27,800 --> 01:35:29,600
Black money or white money?

1796
01:35:30,760 --> 01:35:34,600
I am not racist like you.
Black and white is same for me.

1797
01:35:34,680 --> 01:35:36,160
Okay favorite song?

1798
01:35:36,400 --> 01:35:45,520
"The heart still finds
those free days and nights...."

1799
01:35:45,600 --> 01:35:55,120
"The heart still finds
those free days and nights...."

1800
01:35:55,200 --> 01:35:56,880
"We kept on sitting..."

1801
01:35:57,000 --> 01:35:58,560
You want me to dance now.....

1802
01:35:58,640 --> 01:35:59,480
Ask further.

1803
01:35:59,560 --> 01:36:02,880
I thought audience would
like to hear you singing.

1804
01:36:04,120 --> 01:36:07,120
Anyone can sing.
Nowadays even cricketers are singing.

1805
01:36:07,840 --> 01:36:11,520
If you would like to change one thing
in your life then what would it be.

1806
01:36:11,720 --> 01:36:15,040
Instead of Dongri I would
like to be born in Colaba.

1807
01:36:15,120 --> 01:36:17,360
After that life would
automatically change.

1808
01:36:17,440 --> 01:36:22,360
I have to say that you
have answered well and frank.

1809
01:36:22,440 --> 01:36:24,680
Leave all this, where is the hamper?

1810
01:36:25,040 --> 01:36:25,760
Which hamper?

1811
01:36:25,840 --> 01:36:29,920
The hamper that you
give after the rapid fire.

1812
01:36:30,040 --> 01:36:31,440
I did not talk about that.

1813
01:36:31,520 --> 01:36:33,120
That is not my problem
if you did not talk.

1814
01:36:33,200 --> 01:36:35,600
A hamper is always
given after rapid fire.

1815
01:36:35,680 --> 01:36:36,400
Everyone knows it.

1816
01:36:36,480 --> 01:36:37,600
Do you know or not?

1817
01:36:38,040 --> 01:36:38,880
Where is it?

1818
01:36:39,000 --> 01:36:42,080
Sir, we will get it delivered
to you once we reach India.

1819
01:36:45,360 --> 01:36:48,160
Hurry up and ask further.
It is time for my prayers.

1820
01:36:48,400 --> 01:36:50,440
So Mr. D this is our
live audience segment.

1821
01:36:50,520 --> 01:36:53,600
In Mumbai studio a panel
of three people is sitting.

1822
01:36:53,680 --> 01:36:55,240
They will directly
ask questions from you.

1823
01:36:56,120 --> 01:36:58,680
First of all Rohit Shukla from JNU.

1824
01:36:59,080 --> 01:37:01,400
Rohit, ask your question please.

1825
01:37:01,600 --> 01:37:04,480
Mr. D your responses till now show..

1826
01:37:04,560 --> 01:37:06,320
..that you do not
have illegal business..

1827
01:37:06,400 --> 01:37:08,640
..and till now you have
never gone against law.

1828
01:37:08,720 --> 01:37:10,440
Practically very hard to believe.

1829
01:37:10,760 --> 01:37:13,680
Hey, when did I say this sir?

1830
01:37:13,760 --> 01:37:16,640
No Mr D we can have
a re learn of the interview.

1831
01:37:16,720 --> 01:37:19,240
We are asking you something
and you are answering differently.

1832
01:37:19,320 --> 01:37:23,200
Instead of you if I play interview of
Chhota Bheem it would look the same.

1833
01:37:23,280 --> 01:37:25,040
Really..
- Yes..

1834
01:37:25,120 --> 01:37:26,320
Come on....

1835
01:37:27,240 --> 01:37:30,920
I have broken countless laws.

1836
01:37:31,040 --> 01:37:32,680
Now we are talking.
Tell us more please.

1837
01:37:32,760 --> 01:37:34,600
From last 3 years I
have not paid service tax.

1838
01:37:34,680 --> 01:37:37,400
So you mean you have not
broken bigger law than this.

1839
01:37:37,480 --> 01:37:42,840
Brother, you had said that
it is a family show so be censored.

1840
01:37:42,920 --> 01:37:45,520
Our next question is from Mr.
Vijay Chakraborty..

1841
01:37:45,600 --> 01:37:49,720
..who is our special guest tonight
from external affairs ministry.

1842
01:37:51,320 --> 01:37:54,040
Can you tell us Mr. D that which
country's citizenship do you have?

1843
01:37:54,680 --> 01:37:57,440
Don't censor this.
I will take care of it.

1844
01:38:11,160 --> 01:38:14,880
Take this.
This is the proof of my citizenship.

1845
01:38:15,000 --> 01:38:17,640
Whatever you feel is
more controversial keep it.

1846
01:38:18,640 --> 01:38:20,800
What the hell? What is this?

1847
01:38:21,400 --> 01:38:24,480
These are passport of 192 countries.

1848
01:38:26,520 --> 01:38:30,200
You want to say that you
are citizen of the entire world.

1849
01:38:30,280 --> 01:38:32,480
No, 4 still remain.

1850
01:38:32,560 --> 01:38:34,240
Girdhari, what happened
about those 4 countries?

1851
01:38:34,320 --> 01:38:36,760
Brother, we have applied
for it so it will come in 4 days.

1852
01:38:36,840 --> 01:38:39,240
He must have made it in tatkaal.

1853
01:38:39,920 --> 01:38:42,040
He is the one who was
the owner of the gun shop.

1854
01:38:42,120 --> 01:38:45,720
Our next question is from
Miss Neha who is our ace news writer.

1855
01:38:47,680 --> 01:38:49,120
Hi Mr. D

1856
01:38:49,720 --> 01:38:52,200
This question is from
your female audience.

1857
01:38:52,320 --> 01:38:54,880
Why do you always keep
moustache and what is this..

1858
01:38:55,000 --> 01:38:57,800
..fascination with the
same brand of sunglasses.

1859
01:38:59,680 --> 01:39:01,320
Why do I keep moustache?

1860
01:39:02,320 --> 01:39:04,520
I get a character.

1861
01:39:05,040 --> 01:39:07,480
I cannot keep a tail so
that is why I keep moustaches.

1862
01:39:09,080 --> 01:39:13,080
Without moustaches I feel
a man is standing naked on the road.

1863
01:39:15,160 --> 01:39:17,440
As far as sunglasses are concerned.

1864
01:39:17,840 --> 01:39:22,160
So all things related
to me are banned in the world.

1865
01:39:22,360 --> 01:39:25,160
So my glasses would be Ray Ban.

1866
01:39:27,360 --> 01:39:31,000
A big thanks to our
panel in Mumbai and to Neha.

1867
01:39:31,400 --> 01:39:33,080
World reminds me that..

1868
01:39:34,000 --> 01:39:38,840
..there is a rumor that you knew
in advance about the Osama killings.

1869
01:39:39,040 --> 01:39:42,080
I knew it? My men killed him.

1870
01:39:43,120 --> 01:39:45,400

00:15:00,000 --> 00:15:02,571
Jha, get these bodies out of there.

189
00:15:05,280 --> 00:15:09,126
Sir, we recovered these
two hand-made bombs and a gun.

190
00:15:11,160 --> 00:15:14,323
But I heard that
they were on that tree..

191
00:15:14,760 --> 00:15:16,091
..when the shots were fired.

192
00:15:24,640 --> 00:15:25,687
Maybe, sir.

193
00:15:27,040 --> 00:15:29,725
You can't trust these extremists, sir.

194
00:15:32,520 --> 00:15:36,047
That means they were shot on that tree.

195
00:15:36,760 --> 00:15:38,888
And they fell inside the manor, Jha.

196
00:15:41,280 --> 00:15:42,361
Them.

197
00:15:44,400 --> 00:15:46,209
They are Maoists, sir.

198
00:15:46,560 --> 00:15:49,564
They get shot in
China, but die on our land.

199
00:15:49,880 --> 00:15:51,006
In India.

200
00:15:52,000 --> 00:15:54,685
This two feet
distance is irrelevant, sir.

201
00:15:55,120 --> 00:15:57,930
They kill or get killed anywhere.

202
00:16:17,160 --> 00:16:18,321
Master.

203
00:16:19,280 --> 00:16:20,770
The manager's here.

204
00:16:56,640 --> 00:16:58,244
The new Collector.

205
00:17:19,960 --> 00:17:21,485
You've arrived at a time"

206
00:17:22,320 --> 00:17:24,368
..when I can't show you my hospitality.

207
00:17:25,160 --> 00:17:26,241
Well..

208
00:17:27,040 --> 00:17:30,362
...I had few questions myself.

209
00:17:31,280 --> 00:17:32,406
Unfortunately.

210
00:17:34,080 --> 00:17:35,081
Anyway.

211
00:17:35,880 --> 00:17:37,291
..some other time.

212
00:18:01,280 --> 00:18:02,964
All your life you were like a relief.

213
00:18:04,000 --> 00:18:05,445
But your death is a burden on me.

214
00:18:08,040 --> 00:18:10,327
Friendship is more
dangerous than enmity.

215
00:18:11,320 --> 00:18:12,481
Right, Sadhu.

216
00:18:14,280 --> 00:18:16,044
Let's call Karua, master.

217
00:18:17,160 --> 00:18:18,685
We've kept silent for a long time.

218
00:18:19,640 --> 00:18:23,361
But the rascals have
a whiff of his absence.

219
00:18:25,400 --> 00:18:26,731
A small bird.

220
00:18:27,920 --> 00:18:29,331
One Scarecrow.

221
00:18:31,800 --> 00:18:34,201
The rascal managed to
create a stir in Rajapur.

222
00:18:36,920 --> 00:18:39,161
It's more important to put a leash..

223
00:18:40,280 --> 00:18:43,090
..on Vidrohi of Raniganj.

224
00:18:44,640 --> 00:18:49,282
He's stirred up this storm.

225
00:18:50,720 --> 00:18:51,926
He's the one.

226
00:19:00,280 --> 00:19:03,523
"Gentleman, Pandit and Yadav."

227
00:19:04,160 --> 00:19:09,610
"First I greet everyone."

228
00:19:09,800 --> 00:19:11,325
Bless you!

229
00:19:12,680 --> 00:19:19,450
"Now turn your eyes and take a look."

230
00:19:20,240 --> 00:19:26,725
"Take a good look at my beauty."

231
00:19:31,000 --> 00:19:32,490
"How do I go.. "

232
00:19:32,560 --> 00:19:34,050
"How do I go.. "

233
00:19:34,600 --> 00:19:39,049
"How do I go to Jhariya."

234
00:19:39,840 --> 00:19:43,731
"My life's in trouble."

235
00:19:46,280 --> 00:19:48,442
"You look delicious."

236
00:19:49,920 --> 00:19:51,843
"How do I go.. " -"How do I go.. "

237
00:19:51,880 --> 00:19:53,450
"How do I go to Jhariya."

238
00:19:53,520 --> 00:19:56,490
"My life's in trouble."

239
00:19:56,640 --> 00:19:58,290
"Everyone" ".

240
00:19:58,360 --> 00:20:00,044
"Everyone tries to touch me."

241
00:20:00,120 --> 00:20:03,169
"They all have cruel intentions."

242
00:20:03,240 --> 00:20:06,084
"They come close and say.. "

243
00:20:06,640 --> 00:20:08,005
"They come close and say.. "

244
00:20:08,080 --> 00:20:09,923
"You're number one."

245
00:20:10,000 --> 00:20:12,207
"Your beauty's.. "

246
00:20:13,320 --> 00:20:16,642
"Your beauty's like AK-47."

247
00:20:16,800 --> 00:20:19,883
"Your beauty's like AK-47."

248
00:20:19,960 --> 00:20:23,203
"Your beauty's like AK-47."

249
00:20:23,280 --> 00:20:26,523
"Your beauty's like AK-47."

250
00:20:26,600 --> 00:20:30,127
"Your beauty's like AK-47."

251
00:20:32,840 --> 00:20:38,051
10 Rs from lrshad
Tailor, Delhi return. Dhambad Road.

252
00:20:38,240 --> 00:20:39,924
Please give your money in round figures.

253
00:20:40,000 --> 00:20:41,570
It takes time for counting.

254
00:20:41,720 --> 00:20:44,803
Ram Avtar, Confectioner. Purani Puliya.

255
00:20:45,640 --> 00:20:46,880
Rani Ganj Coal Committee.

256
00:20:46,920 --> 00:20:49,730
..extends their gratitude to you.

257
00:20:53,720 --> 00:20:56,564
"Doctor, engineer, builder."

258
00:20:56,840 --> 00:20:59,730
"I am everyone's darling."

259
00:21:00,120 --> 00:21:06,366
"They call me
everyday.. and say good morning."

260
00:21:06,720 --> 00:21:13,001
"I've connections..
with big politicians."

261
00:21:13,360 --> 00:21:19,686
"My program is what
makes them win election."

262
00:21:20,280 --> 00:21:25,969
"But I don't react on their injection."

263
00:21:26,120 --> 00:21:28,202
"Not one or two.. "

264
00:21:29,400 --> 00:21:32,768
"Not one or two.. I take eleven."

265
00:21:32,840 --> 00:21:36,049
"Your beauty's like AK-47."

266
00:21:36,120 --> 00:21:39,363
"Your beauty's like AK-47."

267
00:21:39,440 --> 00:21:42,683
"Your beauty's like AK-47."

268
00:21:42,760 --> 00:21:45,969
"Your beauty's like AK-47."

269
00:21:46,040 --> 00:21:49,283
"Your beauty's like AK-47."

270
00:21:49,440 --> 00:21:50,965
"Your beauty's like AK-47."

271
00:21:51,120 --> 00:21:52,167
Hello.

272
00:21:53,520 --> 00:21:54,806
Calm down.

273
00:21:55,080 --> 00:21:57,287
We'll have to take a small break.

274
00:21:57,560 --> 00:22:01,360
We're fortunate that
Koye
aancha
's messiah..

275
00:22:01,440 --> 00:22:05,525
..Govardhan Das Vidrohi has arrived.

276
00:22:05,600 --> 00:22:08,251
I would like to
request the people of Raniganj..

277
00:22:08,320 --> 00:22:12,962
..to give a warm
welcome to this brave warrior.

278
00:22:16,040 --> 00:22:17,280
Be quiet.

279
00:22:24,120 --> 00:22:25,485
Don't worry.

280
00:22:26,240 --> 00:22:29,881
I won't spoil your fun. -Listen to him.

281
00:22:30,320 --> 00:22:33,881
I'll finish my speech with a few lines..

282
00:22:33,960 --> 00:22:36,804
..from Pakistani
poet's Ahmed Farhaz's sonnet.

283
00:22:37,640 --> 00:22:41,008
"I guess my enemy didn't imagine.. "

284
00:22:41,640 --> 00:22:42,926
That the lamp.. "

285
00:22:43,320 --> 00:22:47,803
"The storm of death."

286
00:22:48,600 --> 00:22:52,047
"The storm of death
can fire up the lamp."

287
00:22:52,320 --> 00:22:54,163
"They have
confidence on their brutality."

288
00:22:54,520 --> 00:22:55,760
"His pride.. "

289
00:22:56,280 --> 00:23:00,001
"they have confidence on
their brutality, I have faith that."

290
00:23:00,720 --> 00:23:03,087
"The hands raised
for truth are stronger.."

291
00:23:03,160 --> 00:23:05,083
"..than the hands raised to kill."

292
00:23:07,440 --> 00:23:10,728
"My executioner is probably not aware."

293
00:23:11,280 --> 00:23:15,171
"This heart can beat in
the hands of a killer as well."

294
00:23:19,160 --> 00:23:23,961
"A dear is caught in
the midst of cannibals."

295
00:23:26,040 --> 00:23:28,122
The program's over, boy.

296
00:23:28,880 --> 00:23:30,928
Didn't you see your boss?

297
00:23:33,080 --> 00:23:34,844
Get out of there. Now.

298
00:23:34,920 --> 00:23:39,050
"The sun has to shine."

299
00:23:39,360 --> 00:23:43,410
"The ambience has
to change at any cost."

300
00:23:52,880 --> 00:23:54,803
Hey, where do you think you are going?

301
00:24:14,400 --> 00:24:15,606
Karua.

302
00:24:16,120 --> 00:24:18,885
Saryu Bhan's most ferocious killer.

303
00:24:19,400 --> 00:24:22,882
He's shown great honor
by sending you to kill me.

304
00:24:24,960 --> 00:24:29,488
The labor's voice can
be suppressed but not killed.

305
00:24:31,080 --> 00:24:32,525
By killing Vidrohi..

306
00:24:33,000 --> 00:24:35,571
..your master cannot
suppress this revolution.

307
00:25:52,680 --> 00:25:53,966
Vishnu, what is it?

308
00:25:54,320 --> 00:25:55,731
Vishnu, be quiet.

309
00:25:56,040 --> 00:25:57,644
Vishnu, I told you to be quiet.

310
00:25:58,840 --> 00:26:00,126
Let go.

311
00:26:00,520 --> 00:26:01,601
I'll be right back.

312
00:26:03,640 --> 00:26:04,721
Vishnu..

313
00:26:06,080 --> 00:26:07,161
You?

314
00:26:08,680 --> 00:26:09,806
When did you return?

315
00:26:11,280 --> 00:26:12,770
I didn't know you're coming.

316
00:26:12,960 --> 00:26:14,689
The Toll Collection officer's inside.

317
00:26:15,600 --> 00:26:16,886
Wait, I'll be right back.

318
00:26:17,880 --> 00:26:18,961
I'll be right back.

319
00:26:19,480 --> 00:26:21,005
Karua. Karua, wait.

320
00:26:24,040 --> 00:26:27,840
No, dear. No.

321
00:26:29,400 --> 00:26:30,640
Here.

322
00:26:31,520 --> 00:26:32,885
Don't pay heed to him.

323
00:26:34,240 --> 00:26:36,288
He's been wronged by God, just like you.

324
00:27:03,160 --> 00:27:04,730
Hey, hello. How are you?

325
00:27:05,080 --> 00:27:07,686
Great. So, what's the latest?

326
00:27:08,720 --> 00:27:09,721
Latest?

327
00:27:09,960 --> 00:27:11,405
You wouldn't want to hear it.

328
00:27:12,800 --> 00:27:14,529
When are you leaving? -Saturday.

329
00:27:15,360 --> 00:27:16,930
Saturday? Why not tomorrow?

330
00:27:17,280 --> 00:27:19,169
Nimesh still has to be given two drops.

331
00:27:19,240 --> 00:27:20,446
And mom's saying that.

332
00:27:20,480 --> 00:27:22,005
...I should leave only
after completing the entire course.

333
00:27:22,040 --> 00:27:23,280
Better. Better. Better.

334
00:27:23,560 --> 00:27:26,723
Listen, is there a good hospital around.

335
00:27:26,960 --> 00:27:28,485
The place is plagued with diseases.

336
00:27:28,600 --> 00:27:30,125
So there's bound to be a hospital.

337
00:27:31,000 --> 00:27:33,606
Nimesh is up, I'll call you later.

338
00:27:33,840 --> 00:27:35,251
Fine, call me.

339
00:27:35,400 --> 00:27:36,447
Bye.

340
00:27:36,520 --> 00:27:37,681
Bye.

341
00:27:43,400 --> 00:27:45,562
Due to the heavy massacre..

342
00:27:45,720 --> 00:27:47,563
..in Jharkhand's Rajapur district.

343
00:27:47,680 --> 00:27:50,286
"the situation's quite tensed.

344
00:27:50,600 --> 00:27:52,602
Since Koye
aancha
's the hometown"

345
00:27:52,680 --> 00:27:54,808
..of Saryu Bhan Singh, the attack..

346
00:27:54,880 --> 00:27:58,930
..by Rajapur's labors and Maoists.

347
00:27:59,000 --> 00:28:03,961
..is being considered as
a challenge to his authority.

348
00:28:04,480 --> 00:28:06,403
Other than Saryu Bhan Singh's kin..

349
00:28:06,480 --> 00:28:08,608
..and his former
Minister, he also lost"

350
00:28:08,680 --> 00:28:11,206
"most of his
workers in his union office..

351
00:28:11,680 --> 00:28:13,284
Jai Hind, sir. -Jai Hind.

352
00:28:13,360 --> 00:28:14,486
Where's the SHO?

353
00:28:14,920 --> 00:28:16,649
SHO sir hasn't arrived yet.

354
00:28:16,720 --> 00:28:18,609
He always comes in late.

355
00:28:18,680 --> 00:28:20,444
A big incident took place yesterday.

356
00:28:21,160 --> 00:28:22,924
How can he sleep?

357
00:28:24,080 --> 00:28:25,730
Tell him I was here. -Yes, sir.

358
00:28:25,800 --> 00:28:26,881
Let's go.

359
00:28:27,120 --> 00:28:30,249
This is a big challenge
for the new district collector.

360
00:28:30,320 --> 00:28:33,290
He calls
yesterday's incident a big deal.

361
00:28:33,360 --> 00:28:35,806
What will he call
what's going to happen tomorrow?

362
00:28:35,880 --> 00:28:39,089
The king of all incidents.

363
00:28:46,520 --> 00:28:48,682
So what were you saying, Captain?

364
00:28:51,040 --> 00:28:54,044
I was saying this is
Bhusan Santa
i's doing.

365
00:28:55,240 --> 00:28:57,402
He called in shooter's from Ranchi..

366
00:28:57,960 --> 00:29:01,043
..and together executed this plans.

367
00:29:01,240 --> 00:29:03,686
I had a doubt. it was Bhusan.

368
00:29:04,080 --> 00:29:06,208
He's using our tricks on us.

369
00:29:06,440 --> 00:29:08,408
He thinks he's a leader of the Dalits.

370
00:29:09,120 --> 00:29:10,645
Son..

371
00:29:12,040 --> 00:29:14,168
..you don't blame the gun..

372
00:29:15,840 --> 00:29:18,241
"but the one who fires for the murders.

373
00:29:20,480 --> 00:29:24,804
If Bhusan's the
gun, then who is using him?

374
00:29:27,120 --> 00:29:30,169
This is a very high-class game.

375
00:29:31,720 --> 00:29:35,008
I just told you what was useful to you.

376
00:29:38,280 --> 00:29:41,045
Let me decide what's useful to me.

377
00:29:41,880 --> 00:29:43,041
Only me.

378
00:29:44,920 --> 00:29:48,527
I've vowed to put an end to the law..

379
00:29:50,000 --> 00:29:53,721
"that you swore to protect.

380
00:29:57,720 --> 00:29:58,846
What did you think?

381
00:29:59,280 --> 00:30:01,009
Without a reason.

382
00:30:02,160 --> 00:30:06,210
You do know Darbanga's Narsu.

383
00:30:06,680 --> 00:30:09,047
He's in jail. For a year.

384
00:30:09,400 --> 00:30:11,880
Even you're in jail.. officially.

385
00:30:13,280 --> 00:30:14,361
Idiot.

386
00:30:16,240 --> 00:30:20,245
Last year Narsu spent a lot of money.

387
00:30:21,280 --> 00:30:23,009
In Lucknow, Patna and Ranchi.

388
00:30:23,720 --> 00:30:25,131
This time the people believe".

389
00:30:25,160 --> 00:30:27,128
...he'll definitely get
a ticket for the elections.

390
00:30:28,640 --> 00:30:30,051
Other than the Minority"

391
00:30:30,640 --> 00:30:32,369
..he has an eye on the Dalit votes.

392
00:30:33,400 --> 00:30:37,689
And this is why
Bhusan's goons support him.

393
00:30:39,840 --> 00:30:41,968
And you do know, if people like him..

394
00:30:42,520 --> 00:30:46,047
..get their hands on
money, how haughty they get.

395
00:30:48,560 --> 00:30:51,245
And as far as the labor
leader Ghosh is concerned.

396
00:30:51,840 --> 00:30:56,243
I'll.. stick this up
his back whenever you say.

397
00:31:00,360 --> 00:31:02,647
If you do everything.

398
00:31:03,880 --> 00:31:06,360
..then you'll be
burdened with work Lord.

399
00:31:08,240 --> 00:31:09,685
God's there.

400
00:31:10,680 --> 00:31:13,684
To keep an account of
everyone's merits and sins.

401
00:31:48,040 --> 00:31:51,840
Son, it's time for my prayers.

402
00:31:53,240 --> 00:31:54,810
Go and play.

403
00:32:07,480 --> 00:32:09,801
Praise the lord!

404
00:32:22,320 --> 00:32:24,163
He isn't at home.

405
00:32:26,000 --> 00:32:28,207
If you show courage, then"

406
00:32:28,880 --> 00:32:32,965
"the rest of the
Koye
aancha
's unions will join us.

407
00:32:33,080 --> 00:32:35,481
They own.. the weighing depot.

408
00:32:35,680 --> 00:32:38,604
They scam.. the DO.

409
00:32:38,880 --> 00:32:40,723
Now they own the Unions too.

410
00:32:40,920 --> 00:32:42,843
This isn't dictatorship.

411
00:32:43,840 --> 00:32:45,410
This won't do.

412
00:32:45,720 --> 00:32:47,051
This won't do.

413
00:32:47,240 --> 00:32:51,370
We'll have to tell
them.. that we aren't alone.

414
00:32:51,800 --> 00:32:54,565
Everyone's with us.

415
00:32:54,840 --> 00:32:58,208
Many people are with us.

416
00:32:58,760 --> 00:33:04,767
We can stand up to them.

417
00:34:11,280 --> 00:34:12,691
'Lal Salaam' (Red Salute).

418
00:34:22,960 --> 00:34:25,804
Nasru.. or everyone!

419
00:34:34,120 --> 00:34:35,281
Massage.

420
00:35:50,280 --> 00:35:54,808
Lord dwells in the heart.

421
00:35:55,320 --> 00:35:58,483
Glory to Lord Ram!

422
00:36:00,760 --> 00:36:02,205
Forgive me, Lord!

423
00:36:03,760 --> 00:36:04,966
Forgive me.

424
00:36:16,240 --> 00:36:17,969
People of Maharashtra.

425
00:36:18,040 --> 00:36:21,362
..in association of
people of Bihar presents"

426
00:36:21,480 --> 00:36:24,245
..Jharia, a Comedy of Fire.

427
00:36:24,400 --> 00:36:26,721
A film by Bhudbhak Bhansali.

428
00:36:26,880 --> 00:36:29,247
A very goodnight to all the ladies..

429
00:36:29,320 --> 00:36:31,766
..and gentlemen all over the world.

430
00:36:31,840 --> 00:36:35,242
Welcome to the funniest place on earth"

431
00:36:35,480 --> 00:36:37,164
...called Jharia.

432
00:36:37,280 --> 00:36:40,170
This is Boka Pahadi Village in the back.

433
00:36:40,600 --> 00:36:43,763
You can see the
smoke coming from under..

434
00:36:43,840 --> 00:36:48,687
..because whole
Jharia's been burning since 1914.

435
00:36:49,280 --> 00:36:52,409
But.. people still live here.

436
00:36:52,680 --> 00:36:54,648
That's why it is funny.

437
00:36:55,080 --> 00:36:59,642
Please.. listen to
the modern music of Jharia.

438
00:37:09,480 --> 00:37:11,926
This is called
'Khasi Music' (Cough Music).

439
00:37:12,120 --> 00:37:17,490
Because everyone here
has Asthma and Lung disease.

440
00:37:17,560 --> 00:37:20,450
..due to smoke and coal dust.

441
00:37:21,680 --> 00:37:24,729
This beautiful girl's name is Kalpana.

442
00:37:25,400 --> 00:37:27,801
I asked her 5 months ago.

443
00:37:28,040 --> 00:37:32,489
I guess.. you want
to be Aishwarya Rai. -No.

444
00:37:32,560 --> 00:37:35,245
I want to be Kalpana Chawla.

445
00:37:37,400 --> 00:37:39,323
Wow! Bravo.

446
00:37:41,720 --> 00:37:44,291
She wants to become Kalpana Chawla.

447
00:37:44,400 --> 00:37:46,323
Lady. Space traveler.

448
00:37:46,400 --> 00:37:49,847
But Kalpana Chawla died in space.

449
00:37:50,080 --> 00:37:52,845
This Kalpana will get buried here.

450
00:37:53,080 --> 00:37:55,686
Trust me.. here is her house.

451
00:37:56,000 --> 00:37:59,004
When the earth cracks,
she will get buried under here.

452
00:37:59,320 --> 00:38:02,164
Jharia is a very funny place.

453
00:38:02,440 --> 00:38:05,683
It's keep her people grounded.

454
00:38:07,840 --> 00:38:09,569
Here earth cracked suddenly.

455
00:38:09,680 --> 00:38:12,251
Because people take coal from under..

456
00:38:12,320 --> 00:38:14,243
..and don't fill the hollow gap.

457
00:38:22,480 --> 00:38:24,323
They are happy with money.

458
00:38:26,200 --> 00:38:31,411
Poor life of 4 lakh
poor people of Jharia.

459
00:38:36,520 --> 00:38:40,764
Government want to shift
these people, but they say..

460
00:38:40,840 --> 00:38:42,490
We're fine.

461
00:38:42,560 --> 00:38:44,130
We're not in any danger.

462
00:38:44,200 --> 00:38:46,601
The government only
wants to drive us away.

463
00:38:46,680 --> 00:38:48,045
They want to drive us out"

464
00:38:48,120 --> 00:38:51,090
..and take authority over this place.

465
00:38:53,920 --> 00:38:56,161
We won't leave our lands.

466
00:38:59,080 --> 00:39:01,048
This is just the trailer.

467
00:39:01,160 --> 00:39:05,802
To watch the full movie,
at a reasonable price contact.

468
00:39:06,440 --> 00:39:10,684
Sharma Marriage Video
and Still Photographer"

469
00:39:10,880 --> 00:39:13,121
..Purana Bus Adda Sindre.

470
00:39:13,320 --> 00:39:17,120
Phone Number: 243451.

471
00:39:17,360 --> 00:39:18,600
Remember.

472
00:39:18,880 --> 00:39:22,362
It is a Budbhak Bhansali Presentation.

473
00:39:26,000 --> 00:39:28,002
Who is Budbhak Bhansali?

474
00:39:28,440 --> 00:39:29,726
That's me.

475
00:39:30,000 --> 00:39:31,729
I was ruined trying to make..

476
00:39:31,840 --> 00:39:35,322
...the Bhojpuri remake
of 'Hum Dil De Chuke Sanam.

477
00:39:36,280 --> 00:39:38,248
Since then people gave me this name.

478
00:39:38,840 --> 00:39:40,569
We're artists.

479
00:39:40,960 --> 00:39:42,689
All we want is to get famous.

480
00:39:43,080 --> 00:39:44,411
Doesn't matter by which name.

481
00:39:45,280 --> 00:39:47,248
But this is a serious matter, so..

482
00:39:47,320 --> 00:39:51,211
No one takes Biharis and
Jharkhandis seriously, sir.

483
00:39:51,920 --> 00:39:56,960
Our songs, food,
movies, atrocities, life, death"

484
00:39:57,040 --> 00:39:59,884
..has become an international joke.

485
00:40:00,560 --> 00:40:04,963
A politician has
presented this country like ajester.

486
00:40:06,880 --> 00:40:09,451
I've invested money,
so I want to recover that.

487
00:40:10,400 --> 00:40:13,324
And.. I've also put
in Tribal women dance..

488
00:40:13,400 --> 00:40:14,890
..in few intervals.

489
00:40:15,560 --> 00:40:18,006
They are dancing without a blouse..

490
00:40:18,080 --> 00:40:19,605
..on a hot ground.

491
00:40:19,840 --> 00:40:22,650
And that increased sales.

492
00:40:22,960 --> 00:40:24,485
Why don't you spare some time, sir?

493
00:40:24,640 --> 00:40:26,529
I want to show you the entire film.

494
00:40:26,600 --> 00:40:28,011
No, no. No need for that.

495
00:40:28,280 --> 00:40:31,204
I completely
understand what you want to convey.

496
00:40:31,600 --> 00:40:33,090
lam working on the same issue.

497
00:40:33,320 --> 00:40:37,325
Sir, my motive behind
showing you the film was..

498
00:40:37,400 --> 00:40:39,004
You must have understood"

499
00:40:39,080 --> 00:40:40,889
"that I've made this film with..

500
00:40:41,000 --> 00:40:43,128
..the international
audience in mind. -Yes.

501
00:40:43,200 --> 00:40:46,044
I wish for an Oscar
Award, sir. -Oh, good!

502
00:40:46,120 --> 00:40:49,727
If you liked it,
please recommend it to Delhi.

503
00:40:49,840 --> 00:40:51,524
Yes. -If not in the country"

504
00:40:51,600 --> 00:40:54,046
..maybe I'll get some respect outside.

505
00:40:54,280 --> 00:40:56,806
Please spare some
time to watch the film.

506
00:40:56,880 --> 00:40:58,291
Yes, of course.

507
00:40:58,360 --> 00:40:59,930
Okay.. see you.

508
00:41:01,680 --> 00:41:05,048
The girl.. Kalpana.

509
00:41:05,440 --> 00:41:06,851
She was my daughter.

510
00:41:07,200 --> 00:41:08,690
That's where my house was.

511
00:41:09,040 --> 00:41:12,726
Imagine sir, it's so difficult.

512
00:41:14,280 --> 00:41:15,725
..to stand there and laugh.

513
00:41:19,440 --> 00:41:20,521
I am sorry.

514
00:41:20,600 --> 00:41:22,284
See you, sir.

515
00:41:34,640 --> 00:41:36,244
Get me the file on Mine Filling Scams.

516
00:41:36,320 --> 00:41:37,606
Yes, sir.

517
00:41:37,720 --> 00:41:40,121
And fix a meeting with
Saryu Bhan Singh, right now.

518
00:41:40,200 --> 00:41:41,281
Okay, sir.

519
00:42:18,120 --> 00:42:19,451
Hello.

520
00:42:20,680 --> 00:42:22,011
Come.

521
00:42:25,160 --> 00:42:26,764
Let's talk in the open field.

522
00:42:27,240 --> 00:42:31,245
This isn't the place
for the district Collector..

523
00:42:31,480 --> 00:42:34,211
..and a former Ruler to meet.

524
00:42:34,640 --> 00:42:36,085
Are you scared?

525
00:42:38,000 --> 00:42:41,209
Your company's filled this mine.

526
00:42:41,920 --> 00:42:43,809
You must have
sealed it with sand properly.

527
00:42:44,000 --> 00:42:45,365
So why be scared?

528
00:42:47,400 --> 00:42:49,323
Come sit in the car.

529
00:42:56,240 --> 00:42:58,891
Fine, as you wish Saryu Bhan.

530
00:42:59,320 --> 00:43:00,481
Karua.

531
00:43:01,120 --> 00:43:02,724
Follow us in the officer's car.

532
00:43:07,360 --> 00:43:09,283
You're new here.

533
00:43:10,280 --> 00:43:12,806
You must want to know about me.

534
00:43:13,320 --> 00:43:15,641
I've heard a lot about it.

535
00:43:16,000 --> 00:43:18,924
After you mine coal from these mines..

536
00:43:20,720 --> 00:43:24,281
..it's important to be filled properly.

537
00:43:26,280 --> 00:43:28,521
It is. It's important.

538
00:43:29,920 --> 00:43:35,529
And your company gets
all the contracts for filling.

539
00:43:37,240 --> 00:43:41,211
Who can know
Koyelaanchal better than me?

540
00:43:41,800 --> 00:43:42,926
Yes.

541
00:43:43,280 --> 00:43:46,443
And that's why, when you
should be using 200 trucks of sand..

542
00:43:47,720 --> 00:43:49,882
..you don't even use 100.

543
00:43:51,120 --> 00:43:54,408
Do you realize how
hazardous this can be..

544
00:43:54,480 --> 00:43:57,689
..for normal life and the environment?

545
00:43:59,480 --> 00:44:01,005
You will understand.

546
00:44:01,560 --> 00:44:03,085
You will understand gradually.

547
00:44:04,880 --> 00:44:06,325
Towards the Weighing depot.

548
00:44:09,520 --> 00:44:16,165
Saryu Bhan, you
should 210 trucks of sand..

549
00:44:16,480 --> 00:44:18,562
...in mine no 34114.

550
00:44:18,720 --> 00:44:25,842
And this truck 3222,
made 16 trips in 24 hours.

551
00:44:27,520 --> 00:44:29,727
If you get sand from Ganga Ghat..

552
00:44:30,040 --> 00:44:32,646
..this distance takes 2 hours.

553
00:44:33,720 --> 00:44:35,484
And loading-unloading is separate.

554
00:44:37,000 --> 00:44:39,651
There might be a
mistake in the accounts.

555
00:44:41,080 --> 00:44:42,844
We'll sit down and rectify it.

556
00:44:43,800 --> 00:44:47,805
You see.. the
educated people left this place.

557
00:44:48,320 --> 00:44:51,403
Delhi, Mumbai.. America.

558
00:44:52,720 --> 00:44:55,929
And those who are
here.. make mistakes. What to do?

559
00:44:57,440 --> 00:44:58,805
Yes, Saryu Bhan.

560
00:44:58,920 --> 00:45:01,969
This is why the
educated people don't stay here.

561
00:45:02,960 --> 00:45:06,407
The mistake of violating the law.

562
00:45:08,000 --> 00:45:10,162
This place is an ecological disaster.

563
00:45:10,240 --> 00:45:12,447
A human disaster. Do you understand?

564
00:45:14,440 --> 00:45:16,442
Where do you hail from?

565
00:45:17,040 --> 00:45:18,121
What?

566
00:45:19,520 --> 00:45:21,648
I mean.. hometown.

567
00:45:24,160 --> 00:45:25,605
Samistipur.

568
00:45:26,120 --> 00:45:27,645
Samistipur.

569
00:45:29,520 --> 00:45:30,885
It feels really good..

570
00:45:31,720 --> 00:45:37,409
..when I hear a
Bihari speak such good English.

571
00:45:38,520 --> 00:45:40,284
I feel proud.

572
00:45:40,720 --> 00:45:42,006
Master.

573
00:45:42,440 --> 00:45:45,011
Master. I beg your forgiveness.

574
00:45:45,160 --> 00:45:47,811
I made a grave mistake.

575
00:45:48,520 --> 00:45:50,727
Master, I'll accept any punishment.

576
00:45:50,880 --> 00:45:53,770
Just forgive me.

577
00:45:54,160 --> 00:45:58,529
Everyone was high
for the last three days.

578
00:45:58,920 --> 00:46:02,720
But after Ghosh died,
everyone's back to normal.

579
00:46:04,120 --> 00:46:05,645
These labors..

580
00:46:06,520 --> 00:46:08,284
They care about no one.

581
00:46:08,720 --> 00:46:10,643
They understand just one language.

582
00:46:11,400 --> 00:46:12,731
Violence.

583
00:46:13,240 --> 00:46:15,686
Violence.

584
00:46:16,160 --> 00:46:17,764
Forgive me.

585
00:46:18,160 --> 00:46:21,130
Take a look.. it's before your eyes.

586
00:46:21,920 --> 00:46:23,684
Now you decide who is responsible..

587
00:46:24,680 --> 00:46:27,923
..for disrupting the law the order here.

588
00:46:28,320 --> 00:46:30,800
I had lost my mind.

589
00:46:31,520 --> 00:46:33,966
I did it on Nasru saying.

590
00:46:34,560 --> 00:46:37,006
It's that same rascal..

591
00:46:38,200 --> 00:46:42,171
..who wrote those
abusing words for Master that day.

592
00:46:42,600 --> 00:46:44,728
Now that he's scared for his life..

593
00:46:44,880 --> 00:46:47,724
..he's begging in front of Master.

594
00:46:48,520 --> 00:46:50,170
How did he escape you?

595
00:46:58,720 --> 00:47:00,290
Karua. -Karua, let go.

596
00:47:00,440 --> 00:47:01,771
Karua.

597
00:47:02,200 --> 00:47:03,440
Stop, Karua.

598
00:47:05,720 --> 00:47:07,643
Stop, Karua.

599
00:47:14,440 --> 00:47:15,566
Karua.

600
00:47:15,720 --> 00:47:19,281
Get out of my sight. now.

601
00:47:19,680 --> 00:47:21,011
Stupid!

602
00:47:26,880 --> 00:47:28,041
Serves him right, sir.

603
00:47:28,720 --> 00:47:30,324
The rascal was a big nuisance.

604
00:47:33,560 --> 00:47:34,641
No..

605
00:47:35,120 --> 00:47:36,201
"whatever"

606
00:47:36,640 --> 00:47:38,722
..he shouldn't have
taken the law in his hands.

607
00:47:44,160 --> 00:47:47,926
The son's blood is ought to boil..

608
00:47:48,400 --> 00:47:50,721
..if his father's abused.

609
00:47:52,160 --> 00:47:54,686
Just forget what you saw, Mr.Collector.

610
00:48:02,480 --> 00:48:05,689
No will talk about this in Koyelaanchal.

611
00:48:06,200 --> 00:48:08,123
This is my promise to you.

612
00:48:23,400 --> 00:48:24,401
Feeling better.

613
00:48:24,680 --> 00:48:25,920
Yeah, yeah, come.

614
00:48:27,520 --> 00:48:31,161
Come, come, sit, sit, sit.

615
00:48:31,640 --> 00:48:33,290
Anything bothering you, sweetheart?

616
00:48:35,160 --> 00:48:36,241
No.

617
00:48:36,640 --> 00:48:37,721
Actually, yes.

618
00:48:39,360 --> 00:48:41,442
I shouldn't have called you two here.

619
00:48:41,920 --> 00:48:43,081
Why?

620
00:48:43,400 --> 00:48:45,971
Fear of love and
loathing in Eastern India.

621
00:48:48,560 --> 00:48:49,766
It wasn't that.

622
00:48:51,880 --> 00:48:53,644
This place is unbelievable.

623
00:48:56,040 --> 00:48:59,886
A man was brutally
murdered before my eyes.

624
00:49:03,360 --> 00:49:07,445
The government,
people, police just watched.

625
00:49:09,240 --> 00:49:10,241
Neetu.

626
00:49:11,720 --> 00:49:17,045
Neetu I don't know who I need to reform.

627
00:49:18,800 --> 00:49:20,450
Where do I begin?

628
00:49:23,200 --> 00:49:24,884
Who do I begin with?

629
00:49:25,800 --> 00:49:27,928
And against whom?

630
00:49:29,520 --> 00:49:33,127
And what price should I be ready to pay?

631
00:49:35,120 --> 00:49:37,361
Are you scared? -Aren't you scared?

632
00:49:39,080 --> 00:49:42,129
Once a woman returns
alive from the labor room..

633
00:49:42,600 --> 00:49:43,931
..she forsakes all fear.

634
00:49:44,440 --> 00:49:47,967
The fear and pain in the
labor room teaches you one thing.

635
00:49:49,160 --> 00:49:51,288
If you want new hope in life..

636
00:49:51,880 --> 00:49:54,451
"then you have to go through some pain.

637
00:50:01,920 --> 00:50:03,251
Nimesh is awake.

638
00:50:03,320 --> 00:50:05,084
Go. -I'll be right back. Move.

639
00:50:05,400 --> 00:50:06,925
Coming, son.

640
00:50:08,120 --> 00:50:09,645
Coming.

641
00:50:18,480 --> 00:50:20,721
Your name in the Mine Filling case..

642
00:50:21,040 --> 00:50:27,491
..and Karua in Bhusan's
murder case have been brought up.

643
00:50:28,200 --> 00:50:29,281
So?

644
00:50:29,640 --> 00:50:32,849
So.. I'll have to lodge an FIR.

645
00:50:34,360 --> 00:50:35,521
So go ahead.

646
00:50:35,960 --> 00:50:38,122
Until now there were 422.

647
00:50:38,400 --> 00:50:39,765
Now there will be 423.

648
00:50:40,240 --> 00:50:43,005
I'll have to show an arrest.

649
00:50:45,040 --> 00:50:46,121
Who?

650
00:50:49,200 --> 00:50:51,043
Are you dreaming?

651
00:50:52,200 --> 00:50:57,240
The Collector was the
eye-witness in Karua's case.

652
00:50:58,080 --> 00:51:00,970
Didn't your Collector
puke at the Weighing depot?

653
00:51:01,720 --> 00:51:05,202
I guess.. if I make
him s**t in his pants..

654
00:51:05,280 --> 00:51:06,725
...he'll know what Karua is.

655
00:51:07,200 --> 00:51:08,247
Go on.

656
00:51:08,320 --> 00:51:10,288
I'll handle this matter myself.

657
00:51:39,320 --> 00:51:40,367
Bless you.

658
00:51:42,560 --> 00:51:43,641
Karua..

659
00:51:44,680 --> 00:51:45,681
Son.

660
00:51:47,200 --> 00:51:52,730
Now.. listen carefully
to what I say and understand.

661
00:51:54,600 --> 00:51:57,444
Sorry. Sorry. Sorry. I ran into Mishra.

662
00:51:57,520 --> 00:51:59,568
And you got an
excuse to drink another peg.

663
00:52:00,960 --> 00:52:02,325
Absolutely right.

664
00:52:02,400 --> 00:52:05,131
I was in the mood
to be drunk today, and..

665
00:52:05,280 --> 00:52:08,284
And? This is the last
time we come here for dinner.

666
00:52:08,880 --> 00:52:10,370
The food's so tasteless.

667
00:52:11,120 --> 00:52:12,849
I'll ready my kitchen tomorrow.

668
00:52:13,400 --> 00:52:15,323
And you keep at least 2 hours for me.

669
00:52:15,680 --> 00:52:17,011
Yes, ma'am. Yes, ma'am.

670
00:52:17,040 --> 00:52:20,044
I'll do the grocery shopping
myself tomorrow. -Ok. Shall we go?

671
00:52:20,200 --> 00:52:21,247
Shall we go?

672
00:52:22,520 --> 00:52:23,681
What's this?

673
00:52:23,720 --> 00:52:26,087
The District
Collector's going to Drink and Drive.

674
00:52:27,240 --> 00:52:29,368
Come here, I'll drive.

675
00:52:29,440 --> 00:52:31,920
Superb! No problem.

676
00:52:32,000 --> 00:52:33,729
New chauffeur.

677
00:52:33,800 --> 00:52:35,404
Driver cum wife.

678
00:52:35,560 --> 00:52:38,370
Excuse me, you
forgot to sign the logbook.

679
00:52:38,720 --> 00:52:39,881
No, no, I'm coming.

680
00:52:39,960 --> 00:52:41,883
I'll just go sign the logbook.

681
00:52:41,960 --> 00:52:43,200
Give me a minute. -Okay.

682
00:52:44,320 --> 00:52:45,401
Yes.

683
00:52:53,360 --> 00:52:55,249
'You don't have to
kill him, just scare him.'

684
00:52:55,320 --> 00:52:58,642
'He should see his death.'

685
00:53:09,280 --> 00:53:10,884
No, no.

686
00:53:10,960 --> 00:53:12,246
Nisheeth!

687
00:53:17,200 --> 00:53:19,567
Nisheeth! Help.

688
00:53:21,560 --> 00:53:22,641
Meetu.

689
00:53:23,960 --> 00:53:27,601
'Be careful, son..
there's no room for mistake.'

690
00:53:42,720 --> 00:53:44,165
Stop!

691
00:53:50,480 --> 00:53:53,609
'If anything goes wrong,
it will add to my troubles.'

692
00:54:01,400 --> 00:54:04,165
Stop! Stop! -He got away.

693
00:54:04,200 --> 00:54:05,201
Car..

694
00:54:05,440 --> 00:54:07,408
Stop" -Stop the car.

695
00:54:09,000 --> 00:54:10,001
Follow him.

696
00:54:15,680 --> 00:54:16,806
Meetu.

697
00:54:17,360 --> 00:54:18,441
Someone..

698
00:54:19,880 --> 00:54:21,484
Someone call the ambulance.

699
00:54:22,720 --> 00:54:23,721
Meetu.

700
00:54:25,160 --> 00:54:26,924
Someone call the doctor.

701
00:54:27,000 --> 00:54:29,890
Someone call the ambulance. Please.

702
00:54:30,440 --> 00:54:31,601
Meetu.

703
00:54:33,560 --> 00:54:34,971
Please call the doctor.

704
00:54:35,200 --> 00:54:37,248
Call the doctor.

705
00:54:48,960 --> 00:54:49,961
Greetings.

706
00:54:50,520 --> 00:54:52,807
Karua, are you fine?

707
00:54:53,640 --> 00:54:54,641
I am fine, master.

708
00:54:55,400 --> 00:54:56,640
What happened, son?

709
00:54:57,400 --> 00:54:58,925
Even after I explained you.

710
00:54:59,360 --> 00:55:01,362
I did what you said.

711
00:55:01,640 --> 00:55:03,369
I didn't tell you
to shoot the Collector.

712
00:55:03,440 --> 00:55:04,646
I didn't shoot him.

713
00:55:04,720 --> 00:55:06,563
But how did his wife
get so seriously injured?

714
00:55:06,720 --> 00:55:08,051
It's her fault.

715
00:55:08,280 --> 00:55:14,083
Karua, you don't know
what mess you've put me into.

716
00:55:14,480 --> 00:55:15,481
Listen.

717
00:55:15,560 --> 00:55:18,848
Now stay quietly in RaniGanj.

718
00:55:19,200 --> 00:55:20,281
Yes, Master.

719
00:55:20,360 --> 00:55:24,126
If anyone abuses me
or pees on my picture.

720
00:55:25,240 --> 00:55:26,526
You won't do anything.

721
00:55:28,560 --> 00:55:30,324
If I hear anything about you..

722
00:55:31,320 --> 00:55:33,049
"then I won't forgive you.

lam going.. the

u."

If they master stays alive".
