when I needed a friend.

27
00:05:19,728 --> 00:05:21,286
You didn't get married again?

28
00:05:22,263 --> 00:05:24,857
I couldn't find you. Or
I would've married you.

29
00:05:26,267 --> 00:05:27,461
Rahul. - Anjali.

30
00:05:27,535 --> 00:05:31,471
We live once, die once..

31
00:05:31,973 --> 00:05:33,634
..even marry once.

32
00:05:34,476 --> 00:05:36,774
And we fall in love..
- just once.

33
00:05:51,059 --> 00:05:52,390
Congratulations Kamal!

34
00:05:52,460 --> 00:05:54,860
Your daughter's getting married.
- Thank you.

35
00:06:08,710 --> 00:06:09,768
Quiet.

36
00:06:09,811 --> 00:06:11,278
Stop this nonsense.

37
00:06:11,446 --> 00:06:14,415
She isn't dead.
She's getting married.

38
00:06:14,916 --> 00:06:19,615
''Tandoori Nights''. Play that one.

39
00:06:29,731 --> 00:06:32,325
Why haven't you put the
flowers in Abhays room.

40
00:06:32,367 --> 00:06:33,834
Come on, do it fast.

41
00:06:44,913 --> 00:06:46,278
Aaliya!

42
00:06:47,682 --> 00:06:49,673
I know you hate sentimental stuff.

43
00:06:51,386 --> 00:06:52,478
Too bad.

44
00:06:54,422 --> 00:06:55,582
Here goes..

45
00:06:57,058 --> 00:06:58,650
Grandma gave me this ring..

46
00:07:00,729 --> 00:07:02,287
For her daughter-in-law..

47
00:07:03,498 --> 00:07:04,726
For you!

48
00:07:06,367 --> 00:07:08,301
What a crappy dialogue, Gulati!

49
00:07:08,436 --> 00:07:10,267
'Grandma's ring'? You serious?

50
00:07:12,841 --> 00:07:14,900
Aaliya, grandma and grandpa eloped..

51
00:07:16,611 --> 00:07:18,977
.. Even though no one had a
problem with their relationship.

52
00:07:20,248 --> 00:07:21,909
The history of this
ring is very dramatic.

53
00:07:24,519 --> 00:07:27,283
Al.. I love you.

54
00:07:27,589 --> 00:07:29,716
So? Does that mean
we should get married?

55
00:07:29,958 --> 00:07:32,017
Why are love and
marriage the same thing?

56
00:07:32,293 --> 00:07:35,023
I mean, here's a
perfectly nice thing. Love.

57
00:07:35,363 --> 00:07:37,490
Now let's destroy it..
Piece by piece.

58
00:07:37,565 --> 00:07:39,430
Because if we don't get married..

59
00:07:39,501 --> 00:07:40,866
.. what will PEOPLE say?

60
00:07:41,302 --> 00:07:45,762
Al, you think I wanna marry
you 'cos of social pressure?

61
00:07:46,674 --> 00:07:48,608
I want to get married for us.

62
00:07:48,910 --> 00:07:50,309
For you and me.

63
00:07:50,779 --> 00:07:52,872
I know what's gotten into you.

64
00:07:52,947 --> 00:07:56,405
Your sister's wedding trumpets
have crawled under your skin.

65
00:07:56,918 --> 00:07:58,852
Sorry, that can't convince me.

66
00:07:59,320 --> 00:08:00,480
How about this?

67
00:08:00,822 --> 00:08:03,586
I love how my mornings
begin with your voice.

68
00:08:03,825 --> 00:08:05,622
'Cos you call for
something important like..

69
00:08:05,960 --> 00:08:07,484
.. ''How do I
switch on the computer?''

70
00:08:08,663 --> 00:08:11,723
And I love how passionately
you do all four of your jobs.

71
00:08:11,800 --> 00:08:13,427
How you come to see me for an hour..

72
00:08:13,501 --> 00:08:14,968
.. after tormenting me for fifteen..

73
00:08:15,403 --> 00:08:18,702
.. just to say ''Gulati,
you're an idiot. Now kiss me.''

74
00:08:20,708 --> 00:08:22,733
And I love the way
you shut your eyes..

75
00:08:22,811 --> 00:08:28,579
.. and enjoy every
single bite.. from my plate.

76
00:08:30,318 --> 00:08:32,309
And when my clothes smell of you.

77
00:08:32,453 --> 00:08:35,445
Your hands on mine..
- Shut up, you idiot.

78
00:08:35,924 --> 00:08:37,551
Let's elope right now.

79
00:08:40,628 --> 00:08:42,357
And now we would've kissed.

80
00:08:44,032 --> 00:08:45,294
But that would be weird..

81
00:08:45,366 --> 00:08:46,799
.. 'cos I'd be kissing myself.

82
00:08:47,969 --> 00:08:49,903
But, God, I am good.

83
00:09:42,724 --> 00:09:43,816
Drag?

84
00:09:44,359 --> 00:09:48,261
No! Smoking is bad for girls

85
00:09:48,329 --> 00:09:50,854
Really? I thought
it's bad for anyone.

86
00:09:51,566 --> 00:09:54,535
Men don't get pregnant.
- You're pregnant?

87
00:09:54,969 --> 00:10:00,532
No. But.. I plan to.

88
00:10:01,342 --> 00:10:02,832
Marriage at twenty two.

89
00:10:02,977 --> 00:10:04,535
First kid at twenty three.

90
00:10:04,612 --> 00:10:06,978
Second kid, three years later.

91
00:10:08,716 --> 00:10:10,274
My plan was simpler.

92
00:10:10,485 --> 00:10:12,510
Turn twenty and lose my virginity!

93
00:10:12,987 --> 00:10:14,545
Thanks for tomorrow's headlines.

94
00:10:15,990 --> 00:10:17,423
It's a wedding, Al.

95
00:10:17,492 --> 00:10:19,050
Please take your 'chimney' away.

96
00:10:19,327 --> 00:10:21,386
So your wedding smoke is
'devotion'.. And mine is pollution?

97
00:10:21,462 --> 00:10:22,861
Hypocrite!
- Come on, Al.

98
00:10:22,931 --> 00:10:25,661
And spare me your lecture
the cigar is for my play.

99
00:10:25,733 --> 00:10:26,961
I have to look convincing!

100
00:10:27,035 --> 00:10:29,026
But why are you
rehearsing when you are a smoker?

101
00:10:30,471 --> 00:10:33,565
Hang on! A play?
- Street play.

102
00:10:33,608 --> 00:10:36,076
Which means aunty Ayesha
definitely doesn't know about it.

103
00:10:36,344 --> 00:10:37,504
Nope, 'cos she'll freak out..

104
00:10:37,545 --> 00:10:39,035
.. the minute she
hears the word 'acting'.

105
00:10:39,314 --> 00:10:40,941
It's just one show.
At Pragati Maidan.

106
00:10:41,015 --> 00:10:42,607
No one will ever know.

107
00:10:42,684 --> 00:10:44,049
But you do.

108
00:10:44,319 --> 00:10:45,843
Just tell aunty and end the lies.

109
00:10:45,920 --> 00:10:47,444
Stop compromising.

110
00:10:47,522 --> 00:10:50,047
The amount you act in real life..
- Less than you.

111
00:10:50,425 --> 00:10:51,949
'Born in his Papa's theatre..

112
00:10:52,026 --> 00:10:54,722
.. and numbed to
death by it's boredom.'

113
00:10:54,896 --> 00:10:57,956
Thanks for your
wisdom and sensitivity.

114
00:10:58,032 --> 00:10:59,363
Screw sensitivity!

115
00:10:59,434 --> 00:11:01,800
Uncle Jeet's theatre
business will be fine without you.

116
00:11:01,869 --> 00:11:05,361
This is the Nth time.
- What?

117
00:11:05,773 --> 00:11:07,741
Whenever I point out your problem..

118
00:11:07,809 --> 00:11:10,710
.. you turn the spotlight on me.

119
00:11:10,778 --> 00:11:12,405
But you started.. - But..

120
00:11:12,480 --> 00:11:13,947
Since you won't
focus on your problem..

121
00:11:14,015 --> 00:11:17,712
.. without discussing mine,
let's focus on me.

122
00:11:18,686 --> 00:11:22,554
Let's say I tell dad I'm not
interested in his business.

123
00:11:23,424 --> 00:11:27,019
Let's say he doesn't get multiple
cardiac arrests from this news.

124
00:11:27,495 --> 00:11:29,793
What will I do then?
- That's the best part.

125
00:11:29,998 --> 00:11:31,761
You'll find out, Gulati.

126
00:11:33,034 --> 00:11:35,628
Let's travel. Let's be nomads.

127
00:11:36,004 --> 00:11:38,564
Is this honeymoon ever
going to end? - Aunt Pammi.

128
00:11:38,873 --> 00:11:40,340
When are you getting married?

129
00:11:40,408 --> 00:11:41,636
We're thinking about it.
- Not thought about it.

130
00:11:44,545 --> 00:11:46,809
Tell your babe that if
she continues like this..

131
00:11:46,881 --> 00:11:48,610
..she'll stay single
like me. - Don't beat her.

132
00:11:48,683 --> 00:11:51,584
If you're so desperate,
why don't you marry? - Rude!

133
00:11:51,819 --> 00:11:54,379
I'm ahead of you by three divorces.

134
00:11:54,689 --> 00:11:56,714
Can't help a quirky destiny.

135
00:11:56,791 --> 00:11:58,759
Destiny is never quirky.
People are.

136
00:11:58,826 --> 00:12:01,488
But aren't quirky
people the most fun?

137
00:12:02,897 --> 00:12:05,991
Cigarette packets come
with a warning, people don't.

138
00:12:06,601 --> 00:12:08,296
Doesn't stop you
from smoking, does it?

139
00:12:08,336 --> 00:12:09,394
Wow.

140
00:12:09,470 --> 00:12:12,462
So put your money where your
mouth is the altar's ready.

141
00:12:12,540 --> 00:12:13,837
Get married.

142
00:12:14,042 --> 00:12:15,942
Look, Ayesha is here as well.

143
00:12:17,045 --> 00:12:19,013
Your mother still looks stunning.

144
00:12:19,380 --> 00:12:22,508
See how she still affects people.

145
00:12:23,518 --> 00:12:26,009
Here comes the superstar!

146
00:12:28,289 --> 00:12:30,519
Still thinks she's a superstar.

147
00:12:30,591 --> 00:12:33,424
See how their tails start wagging.

148
00:12:33,828 --> 00:12:36,023
She still looks a million bucks.

149
00:12:36,297 --> 00:12:38,026
Hi, Aunty.
- Hi, dear.

150
00:12:38,599 --> 00:12:40,464
I love your sari.

151
00:12:40,535 --> 00:12:41,866
But where is Aaliya?

152
00:12:42,303 --> 00:12:44,999
Must be up to her
usual tricks somewhere.

153
00:12:45,573 --> 00:12:46,801
Oh no!

154
00:12:53,714 --> 00:12:55,841
What's the rush?
- Can't you smell it?

155
00:12:56,017 --> 00:12:58,850
This henna smells so bad
it's affecting my brains.

156
00:12:58,986 --> 00:13:01,454
Girls look happy with
henna on their hands..

157
00:13:01,522 --> 00:13:02,750
.. 'cos they're
actually high on this dung.

158
00:13:05,293 --> 00:13:08,820
Yonks ago if a lassie had not
this shite in her fair hands..

159
00:13:08,996 --> 00:13:10,725
.. a laddie could carry her away.

160
00:13:12,733 --> 00:13:15,759
Henna marked a woman betrothed.

161
00:13:17,905 --> 00:13:19,304
What say thee?

162
00:13:19,674 --> 00:13:21,301
Shall I abduct ye?

163
00:13:21,642 --> 00:13:23,041
Who's stopping you?

164
00:13:23,811 --> 00:13:25,369
Or will ye need steroids?

165
00:13:37,358 --> 00:13:38,723
You've got competition.

166
00:13:45,566 --> 00:13:47,500
The maiden is mine.

167
00:13:48,069 --> 00:13:49,866
Lower ye eyes.

168
00:13:50,438 --> 00:13:51,769
She's your sister.

169
00:13:52,607 --> 00:13:54,302
Sis left.

170
00:14:05,520 --> 00:14:07,420
They could've done a court-marriage.

171
00:14:07,488 --> 00:14:09,388
Why are weddings such a circus?

172
00:14:09,824 --> 00:14:11,553
Dumped another thing on her.

173
00:14:11,626 --> 00:14:12,957
She looks like a clothes shop.

174
00:14:13,027 --> 00:14:14,358
She's smiling.

175
00:14:15,329 --> 00:14:16,591
''She's smiling.''

176
00:14:16,664 --> 00:14:18,564
Some coma patients
also smile, stupid..

177
00:14:18,633 --> 00:14:19,964
.. doesn't mean they're happy.

178
00:14:20,001 --> 00:14:23,767
She's smiling 'cos no one
knows Jai is holding her hands.

179
00:14:26,641 --> 00:14:28,871
They are celebrating the
biggest day of their lives..

180
00:14:29,043 --> 00:14:31,637
..with the most
important people in their lives.

181
00:14:31,879 --> 00:14:33,813
I can't see anyone important here.

182
00:14:33,881 --> 00:14:35,371
I'm here for the free food.

183
00:14:35,449 --> 00:14:37,314
The men are here
for the free whiskey.

184
00:14:37,385 --> 00:14:39,353
And the women are
missing their TV serials.

185
00:14:39,754 --> 00:14:40,948
Stupid.

186
00:14:41,689 --> 00:14:44,317
There won't be a repeat
telecast of my sister's wedding.

187
00:14:44,692 --> 00:14:47,889
And happiness grows
only when you share it.

188
00:14:49,430 --> 00:14:50,590
Say that dialogue again.

189
00:14:54,569 --> 00:14:57,299
Happiness grows only
when you share it.

190
00:15:16,023 --> 00:15:18,651
Like a wild river..

191
00:15:18,993 --> 00:15:24,260
.. she ripples without a care.

192
00:15:24,865 --> 00:15:27,663
Like a gentle stream ..

193
00:15:27,735 --> 00:15:33,537
.. he lets his silences sing.

194
00:15:34,642 --> 00:15:38,840
Her fiery sands sting his feet..

195
00:15:39,280 --> 00:15:43,410
.. like sunshine tickles rainy days.

196
00:15:44,785 --> 00:15:47,777
You, my dear, are lost without me..

197
00:15:47,855 --> 00:15:51,018
.. and I'm incomplete without you.

198
00:15:53,628 --> 00:15:56,654
You, my dear, are lost without me..

199
00:15:56,731 --> 00:15:59,723
.. and I'm incomplete without you.

200
00:16:05,539 --> 00:16:08,736
'I love you, Gelato.'
- Hello, 'baby'.

201
00:16:08,809 --> 00:16:10,436
Another fight?

202
00:16:10,478 --> 00:16:11,570
Another slap?

203
00:16:11,646 --> 00:16:14,547
'Sorry, baby.'
- 'Kiss me, baby'.

204
00:16:14,615 --> 00:16:17,675
'Sorry, baby! Kiss me, baby!'

205
00:16:17,752 --> 00:16:19,276
Buzz off!

206
00:16:20,521 --> 00:16:24,013
Bye.

207
00:16:24,792 --> 00:16:26,555
There are many ways to die, Al.

208
00:16:26,827 --> 00:16:29,591
Then let's try this.
We'll die together.

209
00:16:32,300 --> 00:16:38,933
She melts clouds in her hands..

210
00:16:40,975 --> 00:16:49,405
.. and fills still
nights with laughter.

211
00:16:49,850 --> 00:16:54,310
She melts clouds in her hands..

212
00:16:54,455 --> 00:16:58,516
.. and fills still
nights with laughter.

213
00:16:58,592 --> 00:17:03,291
So fearless, carefree
and thirsty for life..

214
00:17:03,364 --> 00:17:07,858
.. I'm helpless
with her and without.

215
00:17:07,935 --> 00:17:10,233
Are you a character from Saas-Bahu
(a popular genre on TV) serials?

216
00:17:10,504 --> 00:17:13,530
It's sign of respect Al..
that comes from the heart.

217
00:17:13,607 --> 00:17:15,802
Then I should take the
blessings of any elder.

218
00:17:15,876 --> 00:17:17,571
Hello, Uncle.
- Bless you.

219
00:17:17,645 --> 00:17:19,772
I hope you two get married soon.

220
00:17:20,514 --> 00:17:21,981
Happy Diwali, sir!

221
00:17:22,249 --> 00:17:24,376
So don't do it. It's
not an obligation.

222
00:17:24,585 --> 00:17:27,554
I do it 'cos it makes ma and
papa happy. And that makes me happy.

223
00:17:28,255 --> 00:17:30,485
If it made someone happy,
wouldn't you.. - Suffer spondylitis?

224
00:17:30,524 --> 00:17:31,718
No way!

225
00:17:31,792 --> 00:17:33,419
What's wrong with your family?

226
00:17:33,461 --> 00:17:34,519
One cigarette, please.

227
00:17:34,595 --> 00:17:37,792
I'm sorry we're so normal.
And not as 'cool' as you!

228
00:17:38,332 --> 00:17:40,994
Perhaps we should all start
smoking 'cos that's so 'rebellious'.

229
00:17:41,335 --> 00:17:42,461
That's it.

230
00:17:42,536 --> 00:17:44,299
Al..
- Screw you, Gulati.

231
00:17:44,805 --> 00:17:46,295
Superb idea!

232
00:17:52,947 --> 00:18:01,651
He opens vials of
perfumes in her heart..

233
00:18:02,356 --> 00:18:06,292
''I've searched for
love high and low.''.

234
00:18:06,360 --> 00:18:10,592
.. and looks for
love-filled shells on sandy shores

235
00:18:11,265 --> 00:18:15,565
He opens vials of
perfumes in her heart..

236
00:18:15,636 --> 00:18:17,729
''I've searched for
love high and low.''.

237
00:18:17,805 --> 00:18:19,932
.. and looks for
love-filled shells on sandy shores

238
00:18:20,007 --> 00:18:24,341
He fills his world with love..

239
00:18:24,512 --> 00:18:26,707
''The closeness of hearts,
the streams of desires.''

240
00:18:26,781 --> 00:18:28,908
.. as she fills hers with dreams.

241
00:18:29,383 --> 00:18:30,873
He was not flirting with me.

242
00:18:30,951 --> 00:18:32,475
Yes, he was.

243
00:18:32,553 --> 00:18:34,453
Trust me, I am a guy.
- You're jealous.

244
00:18:34,522 --> 00:18:35,921
You're blind.
- What?

245
00:18:36,290 --> 00:18:37,587
Can't a boy and a girl..

246
00:18:37,858 --> 00:18:41,294
A boy and a girl can't
be 'just good friends'.

247
00:18:45,299 --> 00:18:47,893
So if we break-up
we can't be friends.

248
00:18:47,968 --> 00:18:49,629
Nope.

249
00:18:51,605 --> 00:18:53,630
God, you're such an old-fashioned..

250
00:18:53,707 --> 00:18:55,368
.. almost chauvinistic..
- You're an idiot.

251
00:18:56,343 --> 00:18:57,708
I can't believe I am with you.

252
00:18:57,778 --> 00:18:58,870
I am sexy.

253
00:19:05,920 --> 00:19:08,980
You, my dear, are lost without me..

254
00:19:09,223 --> 00:19:12,420
.. and I'm incomplete without you.

255
00:19:12,893 --> 00:19:15,726
Like a wild river..

256
00:19:15,896 --> 00:19:20,924
.. she ripples without a care.

257
00:19:21,802 --> 00:19:24,532
Like a gentle stream ..

258
00:19:24,839 --> 00:19:30,300
.. he lets his silences sing.

259
00:19:31,612 --> 00:19:35,514
Her fiery sands sting his feet..

260
00:19:35,916 --> 00:19:39,477
.. like sunshine tickles rainy days.

261
00:19:39,553 --> 00:19:44,581
You, my dear, are lost without me..

262
00:19:44,658 --> 00:19:47,718
.. like I'm incomplete without you.

263
00:19:50,498 --> 00:19:53,524
You, my dear, are lost without me..

264
00:19:53,601 --> 00:19:56,764
.. like I'm incomplete without you.

265
00:19:59,406 --> 00:20:02,432
You, my dear, are lost without me..

266
00:20:02,510 --> 00:20:05,968
.. like I'm incomplete without you.

267
00:20:07,381 --> 00:20:09,576
I am Shah Rukh Khan.

268
00:20:13,854 --> 00:20:19,292
This is probably the most disturbing
thing you ever said to me.

269
00:20:20,694 --> 00:20:25,290
I am a star in
every scene of my life.

270
00:20:26,634 --> 00:20:27,896
Okay.

271
00:20:33,040 --> 00:20:36,009
What if you fail to
become an actor?

272
00:20:36,911 --> 00:20:38,310
Lying to your mother..

273
00:20:38,379 --> 00:20:41,542
Everything's going
to change Gelati.

274
00:20:42,683 --> 00:20:43,877
Gulato?

275
00:20:44,385 --> 00:20:46,353
What's your name?
- Sunita.

276
00:20:46,720 --> 00:20:48,085
Sunita!

277
00:20:49,056 --> 00:20:51,524
I have a sexy plan, Sunita.

278
00:20:52,326 --> 00:20:55,659
But I'll tell you later 'cos I
don't want to lose the high.

279
00:20:56,830 --> 00:20:58,354
Oh God! Another plan!

280
00:20:59,400 --> 00:21:02,699
Sunita, you're so cute..
- What?

281
00:21:02,770 --> 00:21:06,729
Stress makes you look cuter.

282
00:21:06,807 --> 00:21:09,037
'Oh God! Another plan!'

283
00:21:09,543 --> 00:21:12,444
I'm okay.

284
00:21:14,615 --> 00:21:17,049
You're my stud, Sunita.

285
00:21:17,551 --> 00:21:19,485
You can handle anything.

286
00:21:20,554 --> 00:21:21,953
And you take advantage of that.

287
00:21:22,356 --> 00:21:23,789
Don't say that.

288
00:21:23,891 --> 00:21:26,018
You know I'm 'nonsense person'.

289
00:21:26,927 --> 00:21:30,328
Understand, Sunita.
- Why?

290
00:21:33,033 --> 00:21:34,523
Why should I understand?

291
00:21:34,735 --> 00:21:36,635
Who argues?
- Me.

292
00:21:36,670 --> 00:21:38,399
Who is stupid?
- Me.

293
00:21:38,472 --> 00:21:41,737
Who is impulsive?
- Me, Your Honour, me.

294
00:21:42,743 --> 00:21:44,438
Then why should I understand?

295
00:21:44,645 --> 00:21:46,613
Who is older? You!

296
00:21:46,947 --> 00:21:49,006
Who is mature? You!

297
00:21:49,416 --> 00:21:51,543
Who is understanding? You!

298
00:21:51,952 --> 00:21:54,318
Who is sensible? You.

299
00:21:54,788 --> 00:21:56,619
So it's all up to you, Sunita.

300
00:21:56,690 --> 00:21:58,089
You've to handle everything.

301
00:21:58,325 --> 00:21:59,622
Because if you let go..

302
00:22:01,996 --> 00:22:03,623
You complete me.

303
00:22:04,999 --> 00:22:06,398
Shah Rukh, please!

304
00:22:06,467 --> 00:22:10,369
I am the kite and you're my bread.
- Thread.

305
00:22:10,437 --> 00:22:13,372
I fly and you let me go higher..

306
00:22:13,641 --> 00:22:15,700
But as soon as you sense danger..

307
00:22:15,976 --> 00:22:18,001
.. you pull me back.

308
00:22:18,712 --> 00:22:19,974
What if the thread breaks?

309
00:22:20,047 --> 00:22:21,605
Don't say that.

310
00:22:21,682 --> 00:22:24,515
Ask the Thread Maintenance
Department to look after it.

311
00:22:24,551 --> 00:22:27,452
It can't break, it can't break.
- I'll talk to them.

312
00:22:27,688 --> 00:22:31,681
Promise?
- I promise.

313
00:22:32,893 --> 00:22:36,385
'Cos I love flying a lot..

314
00:22:36,797 --> 00:22:38,287
I can't help it. - I've noticed.

315
00:22:38,632 --> 00:22:40,361
You know, I'm a USA.

316
00:22:40,934 --> 00:22:44,461
UFO. - I know. Same thing.

317
00:22:45,406 --> 00:22:47,067
So you'll stick around, right?

318
00:22:48,642 --> 00:22:50,075
You won't let us drift apart.

319
00:22:50,844 --> 00:22:52,072
Say it.. !

320
00:22:52,880 --> 00:22:56,646
Sunita, where are you taking me?
- To bed.

321
00:23:22,643 --> 00:23:24,042
I will never let us break.

322
00:23:27,414 --> 00:23:28,574
I promise.

323
00:23:47,901 --> 00:23:51,359
Hello. - Ayesha has started
her classic emotional blackmail.

324
00:23:51,472 --> 00:23:52,496
So much melodrama..

325
00:23:52,573 --> 00:23:54,404
It was a long shot. !
Didn't think I'd get in.

326
00:23:54,441 --> 00:23:55,965
Al, calm down

327
00:23:56,043 --> 00:23:57,340
She's so unreasonable.

328
00:23:57,377 --> 00:23:59,777
She's been gone into
sentimental Overdrive.

329
00:23:59,847 --> 00:24:01,610
Al, are you nuts? This is an office.

330
00:24:01,682 --> 00:24:03,741
If she wasn't my mother,
I would've left home.

331
00:24:03,817 --> 00:24:05,444
Shut up!

332
00:24:05,919 --> 00:24:07,580
This is an office. People work here!

333
00:24:09,623 --> 00:24:10,988
It's a loo actually.

334
00:24:12,426 --> 00:24:13,518
What happened?

335
00:24:14,995 --> 00:24:16,963
Good news, I've got admission here.

336
00:24:17,364 --> 00:24:19,832
Bad news, Ayesha has flatly
refused my going to Gold Coast.

337
00:24:20,267 --> 00:24:21,894
Just a sec! You're
going to Australia?

338
00:24:21,969 --> 00:24:25,336
Obviously not. I want to,
but Ayesha won't let me go.

339
00:24:25,405 --> 00:24:26,565
When did you apply?

340
00:24:26,640 --> 00:24:27,937
Three months ago.

341
00:24:28,275 --> 00:24:30,766
It was a long shot.
Didn't think I'd get in.

342
00:24:30,844 --> 00:24:33,574
Thought I'd tell you both
about it.. - From the airport?

343
00:24:34,314 --> 00:24:36,908
Abhay, I am already quite tense
I don't need your senti-crap now!

344
00:24:36,984 --> 00:24:38,349
And I don't need two moms.

345
00:24:39,019 --> 00:24:40,509
I am getting sentimental?

346
00:24:41,655 --> 00:24:43,384
It's a one year course..

347
00:24:43,891 --> 00:24:47,452
.. in another country
without telling anyone..

348
00:24:47,528 --> 00:24:48,961
.. and this is your good news?

349
00:24:49,663 --> 00:24:50,823
You're unbelievable.

350
00:24:50,898 --> 00:24:53,765
I didn't tell you 'cos I
knew you would react like this..

351
00:24:54,034 --> 00:24:56,434
There's a difference
between a plan and a decision.

352
00:24:56,503 --> 00:24:58,698
If this was so important for you
why didn't you tell me before?

353
00:24:58,739 --> 00:25:00,866
Why are you all so bloody emotional?

354
00:25:01,275 --> 00:25:02,401
Gelato, understand!

355
00:25:02,476 --> 00:25:05,639
Thought I'd surprise you guys
once the scholarship comes in.

356
00:25:05,712 --> 00:25:08,408
I didn't think mom would react
badly to a Communications course.

357
00:25:08,649 --> 00:25:09,877
And me?

358
00:25:12,352 --> 00:25:13,910
I shouldn't react either?

359
00:25:16,456 --> 00:25:17,980
I know. I'm sorry.

360
00:25:18,525 --> 00:25:19,685
I knew you'd freak out, and so..

361
00:25:19,760 --> 00:25:21,352
I freak out 'cos I'm always..

362
00:25:21,428 --> 00:25:23,555
.. competing with
your lists and plans.

363
00:25:24,798 --> 00:25:26,390
Where do I fit in your life, Aaliya?

364
00:25:26,466 --> 00:25:28,434
Where do you fit in your own life?

365
00:25:28,502 --> 00:25:29,833
Don't like what you're doing.

366
00:25:29,903 --> 00:25:31,564
Don't know what you want to do.

367
00:25:31,638 --> 00:25:34,539
And you've the nerve to tell me
that I shouldn't follow my dreams.

368
00:25:34,608 --> 00:25:36,371
You're doing it again!

369
00:25:36,577 --> 00:25:37,635
Instead of pointing out my flaws..

370
00:25:37,711 --> 00:25:39,542
.. focus on your actions,
for a change.

371
00:25:39,613 --> 00:25:40,739
I'm trying to.

372
00:25:40,814 --> 00:25:43,681
You wouldn't be angry if
you understood 'focus'!

373
00:25:43,917 --> 00:25:46,477
You're a boring
executive in your dad's office..

374
00:25:46,553 --> 00:25:47,815
..who doesn't even know himself..

375
00:25:47,888 --> 00:25:49,355
..and you're okay with it!

376
00:25:49,590 --> 00:25:51,353
Where is the fire,
Abhay? What do you want?

377
00:25:51,425 --> 00:25:52,756
I don't know.

378
00:25:53,293 --> 00:25:55,557
But I'm not scared to
admit this truth. Unlike you.

379
00:25:55,629 --> 00:25:57,597
Who's only solution
to problems is lying!

380
00:25:57,664 --> 00:26:00,360
Because you can't hear the truth,
Abhay. You're too scared!

381
00:26:01,568 --> 00:26:03,627
Try me, Al.
- Fine.

382
00:26:03,904 --> 00:26:06,395
You don't have a life.
I am your life.

383
00:26:06,573 --> 00:26:10,009
Your life shouldn't be disturbed,
and to hell with mine!

384
00:26:10,577 --> 00:26:12,704
I'm not your 'love'. I'm your habit!

385
00:26:12,779 --> 00:26:14,576
You're actually defending this?

386
00:26:14,781 --> 00:26:17,807
You're lying and telling
me I don't really love you?

387
00:26:17,851 --> 00:26:19,614
You're pathetic.
- And you're delusional!

388
00:26:19,686 --> 00:26:21,483
You've decided to go to Australia..

389
00:26:21,555 --> 00:26:23,887
So your mom and I
should just 'deal with it'!

390
00:26:23,957 --> 00:26:26,323
To hell with our feelings.
- What about my feelings?

391
00:26:26,393 --> 00:26:27,724
You don't have any.

392
00:26:27,794 --> 00:26:29,955
You're just a
selfish programmed robot.

393
00:26:30,030 --> 00:26:31,759
You couldn't
communicate with two people..

394
00:26:31,832 --> 00:26:33,459
.. and you want to do
'Mass' Communications.

395
00:26:47,014 --> 00:26:52,008
So you think he's unambitious,
unhappy..

396
00:26:52,419 --> 00:26:54,319
.. and lacks focus.

397
00:26:54,922 --> 00:26:56,549
And his problem is that you're..

398
00:26:56,623 --> 00:27:00,252
.. over-ambitious, you
focus on everything..

399
00:27:00,394 --> 00:27:01,622
.. except him.

400
00:27:02,462 --> 00:27:03,656
And you know what?

401
00:27:04,731 --> 00:27:05,959
I see his point.

402
00:27:06,900 --> 00:27:08,697
You two should
seriously get married!

403
00:27:08,769 --> 00:27:09,929
What a pair!

404
00:27:10,003 --> 00:27:14,667
You're casually joking
about this 'cos you know..

405
00:27:14,741 --> 00:27:16,470
.. how committed he is towards you.

406
00:27:16,643 --> 00:27:19,976
No matter what, he
will still love you.

407
00:27:20,614 --> 00:27:24,243
I need some space from that love.
- Bravo.

408
00:27:24,551 --> 00:27:26,416
Spoken like your dad's daughter!

409
00:27:26,954 --> 00:27:29,252
Dad cheated on you, ma!

410
00:27:30,490 --> 00:27:31,787
And what did you do?

411
00:27:32,526 --> 00:27:34,460
Lied to me, as usual.

412
00:27:36,296 --> 00:27:37,524
For what, Aunty?

413
00:27:37,698 --> 00:27:39,632
A silly course. A year long course.

414
00:27:40,801 --> 00:27:42,530
Stop whining!

415
00:27:42,703 --> 00:27:45,900
Telling you late is not lying!

416
00:27:46,306 --> 00:27:49,537
She's no saint but
she's independent.

417
00:27:49,676 --> 00:27:54,306
So let her be. Why
does it bother you?

418
00:27:54,581 --> 00:27:57,414
Why cook for an army over this?

419
00:27:57,551 --> 00:28:00,349
Aaliya is independent, adventurous..

420
00:28:00,387 --> 00:28:02,287
.. wants to experience everything.

421
00:28:02,456 --> 00:28:03,718
And I love that about her.

422
00:28:04,424 --> 00:28:06,722
But that's what's
throwing me out of her life.

423
00:28:06,860 --> 00:28:08,293
And she's okay with that.

424
00:28:08,362 --> 00:28:09,693
What's wrong with that?

425
00:28:09,763 --> 00:28:12,425
I want to travel. See the world.

426
00:28:12,532 --> 00:28:14,625
Live on my own, free as a bird.

427
00:28:15,635 --> 00:28:17,500
Are we threatening your freedom?

428
00:28:17,637 --> 00:28:19,696
Buddy boy, go or not..

429
00:28:19,940 --> 00:28:21,999
If she's even thinking about going..

430
00:28:22,275 --> 00:28:23,765
.. one thing's for sure.

431
00:28:23,944 --> 00:28:25,571
Are you breaking up with him?

432
00:29:55,402 --> 00:29:57,370
She wants to act!

433
00:29:57,671 --> 00:30:00,731
And Acting is the most
popular course of that college.

434
00:30:00,907 --> 00:30:02,602
I'm sure you noticed that.

435
00:30:02,943 --> 00:30:06,743
This is just an
excuse to get out of here.

436
00:30:08,849 --> 00:30:10,908
When Aaliya was six..

437
00:30:11,485 --> 00:30:16,616
.. she convinced her teacher
that she couldn't do homework

438
00:30:16,990 --> 00:30:20,926
As her actress mom
couldn't pack her lunch-box..

439
00:30:21,628 --> 00:30:24,392
.. and Aaliya had to do
all her chores herself.

440
00:30:24,865 --> 00:30:28,562
Just to escape homework!

441
00:30:28,935 --> 00:30:30,334
You know what?

442
00:30:30,537 --> 00:30:32,971
If I was Aaliya's teacher..

443
00:30:33,373 --> 00:30:35,341
.. I'd have bought
the story as well.

444
00:30:35,509 --> 00:30:37,033
Aaliya is that good.

445
00:30:37,677 --> 00:30:42,705
These small lies are just a
rehearsal to become an actress.

446
00:30:43,383 --> 00:30:45,578
She thinks it's fun.

447
00:30:53,527 --> 00:30:57,463
Who knows what she
might do in Australia?

448
00:30:58,832 --> 00:31:03,394
She hasn't seen the real,
ugly side of this world..

449
00:31:04,938 --> 00:31:06,599
.. which I have.

450
00:31:07,674 --> 00:31:09,403
I was married to it.

451
00:31:12,012 --> 00:31:13,946
There are all sorts of
people in this world..

452
00:31:14,648 --> 00:31:16,411
.. notjust one's like Al's dad.

453
00:31:18,818 --> 00:31:20,342
She will make mistakes.

454
00:31:20,854 --> 00:31:22,344
And she has a right to.

455
00:31:25,292 --> 00:31:27,419
How else will your
stubborn daughter learn?

456
00:31:34,067 --> 00:31:35,694
The blemish is inside, not on it.

457
00:31:36,002 --> 00:31:37,299
Let it be.

458
00:31:38,471 --> 00:31:40,405
That's what makes it unique!

459
00:32:39,065 --> 00:32:40,657
Aunty has one condition.

460
00:32:42,802 --> 00:32:45,828
Only Communications. No acting.

461
00:33:02,322 --> 00:33:07,658
Al. I'm doing a boring
job in my dad's office..

462
00:33:09,296 --> 00:33:10,854
But I'm not lying to myself.

463
00:33:11,865 --> 00:33:13,492
I know. I'm sorry.

464
00:33:13,566 --> 00:33:15,329
But..
- I know.

465
00:33:17,337 --> 00:33:18,964
I don't want to lose myself either.

466
00:33:20,840 --> 00:33:22,569
Take a risk, Gulati.

467
00:33:22,776 --> 00:33:24,573
You're the smartest guy I know.

468
00:33:24,644 --> 00:33:26,578
If you stay so safe..
- You balance that..

469
00:33:26,813 --> 00:33:27,939
.. Risk-taker!

470
00:33:29,349 --> 00:33:30,611
You're even risking us.

471
00:33:30,684 --> 00:33:32,982
Are you mad? What risk!

472
00:33:33,420 --> 00:33:36,355
Aren't we still together after
yesterday's record-breaking fight.

473
00:33:36,923 --> 00:33:38,948
A year's break won't
make any difference.

474
00:33:41,061 --> 00:33:42,551
What 'break'?

475
00:33:42,796 --> 00:33:44,423
Don't be an idiot.

476
00:33:44,497 --> 00:33:47,022
Being apart for a year
is an obvious break!

477
00:33:47,600 --> 00:33:51,331
Al, one doesn't apply for
'casual leave' in a relationship!

478
00:33:52,739 --> 00:33:54,001
Are you breaking up with me?

479
00:33:54,341 --> 00:33:56,969
No, you sentimental freak!
Don't complicate it.

480
00:33:57,377 --> 00:34:00,574
This is not a break-up,
this is just a little.. break.

481
00:34:00,914 --> 00:34:02,711
What does a 'little break' mean, Al?

482
00:34:03,750 --> 00:34:05,445
Think before you answer.

483
00:34:06,720 --> 00:34:08,654
Do you know what a
'little break' is?

484
00:34:10,790 --> 00:34:15,625
No, but I know that we need it.

485
00:34:16,262 --> 00:34:17,889
We need to find ourselves.

486
00:34:18,765 --> 00:34:21,928
I just hope we don't lose each
other while finding ourselves.

487
00:34:22,569 --> 00:34:23,797
We won't.

488
00:34:23,970 --> 00:34:25,437
You won't let it happen.

489
00:34:28,675 --> 00:34:30,404
Don't lose hope, Gulati.

490
00:34:34,748 --> 00:34:35,942
What are you thinking?

491
00:34:38,785 --> 00:34:40,946
It's time to fax the
'Thread Maintenance Dept.'

492
00:35:22,595 --> 00:35:25,496
Don't lie, I know
you're missing no one.

493
00:35:25,732 --> 00:35:28,724
Met your aunt yet? - No, but
she's lived in Oz for twenty years.

494
00:35:28,802 --> 00:35:31,032
Besides, mom's sister
is bound to be cool.

495
00:35:46,953 --> 00:35:49,649
Ayesha first spoiled you
and now she's regretting it.

496
00:35:50,790 --> 00:35:54,453
Had you come to me earlier
she wouldn't be ruing this day.

497
00:35:54,928 --> 00:35:57,453
What's wrong with this day?

498
00:35:57,664 --> 00:35:58,824
You don't like Tuesdays?

499
00:35:59,899 --> 00:36:02,367
No boys, no late-nights.

500
00:36:02,435 --> 00:36:04,630
And no phone calls after eleven.

501
00:36:06,439 --> 00:36:07,497
What?

502
00:36:07,574 --> 00:36:10,008
I need to pee. Shall I hold or wait?

503
00:36:17,383 --> 00:36:22,377
And finally a whiff of fresh air..

504
00:36:24,824 --> 00:36:29,693
.. as our bound arms
stretch themselves.

505
00:36:31,731 --> 00:36:35,497
My heart wants to hum..

506
00:36:35,668 --> 00:36:39,331
While he wants to sing..

507
00:36:39,506 --> 00:36:43,033
I smile, he giggles..

508
00:36:43,943 --> 00:36:47,435
.. powerless
against this crazy whim.

509
00:36:47,914 --> 00:36:53,546
Distances are important too.

510
00:36:54,387 --> 00:37:02,419
Sometimes you gotta chase space.

511
00:37:03,363 --> 00:37:08,801
Distances are important too.

512
00:37:09,536 --> 00:37:17,773
Sometimes you gotta chase space.

513
00:37:18,745 --> 00:37:24,547
Distances are important too.

514
00:37:25,251 --> 00:37:33,590
Sometimes you gotta chase space.

515
00:37:33,626 --> 00:37:36,789
She said my skirt's
too short! Change it.

516
00:37:36,963 --> 00:37:39,329
Imagine! Even Ayesha
never said this to me!

517
00:37:39,399 --> 00:37:41,492
But why are we discussing her?
- Thank you.

518
00:37:42,769 --> 00:37:44,794
The kids were
missing you today. -Who?

519
00:37:44,871 --> 00:37:46,930
The kids we meet at the signal, Al!

520
00:37:47,574 --> 00:37:49,872
You've forgotten them already?
- Don't be silly.

521
00:37:50,410 --> 00:37:52,742
Hey, if I murder my aunt..

522
00:37:52,812 --> 00:37:55,610
.. where should I hide
her body? -Al, please.

523
00:37:55,748 --> 00:37:57,841
Can we please talk
about something else?

524
00:37:57,917 --> 00:38:01,409
I have to live with her,
Gulati! -So do I.

525
00:38:01,487 --> 00:38:02,852
Gelato, guess what?

526
00:38:03,590 --> 00:38:06,286
Your aunt is wearing a bikini
and head banging in the campus.

527
00:38:06,359 --> 00:38:08,350
I was not talking about her.

528
00:38:08,661 --> 00:38:11,687
Sometimes you're more
irritating than my aunt!

529
00:38:11,764 --> 00:38:13,629
And we're back to your aunt!

530
00:38:14,434 --> 00:38:16,265
Alright. We'll talk about aunt only.

531
00:38:16,336 --> 00:38:21,399
Such intimacy sows
seeds of distances..

532
00:38:23,910 --> 00:38:29,246
.. don't be fooled,
these waters are not sweet.

533
00:38:30,717 --> 00:38:34,585
Look but don't touch; its fire..

534
00:38:34,654 --> 00:38:38,454
..just watch it shimmer from afar..

535
00:38:38,524 --> 00:38:42,858
..any closer and you could burn..

536
00:38:42,929 --> 00:38:46,922
..powerless against this crazy whim.

537
00:38:47,000 --> 00:38:52,734
Distances are important too.

538
00:38:53,306 --> 00:38:58,710
Sometimes you gotta
chase space. - Hi, guys.

539
00:38:58,778 --> 00:39:01,747
Hi, I'm Rishabh.
- Hi, Aaliya.

540
00:39:01,814 --> 00:39:03,543
You were really good today.
- Thanks.

541
00:39:07,553 --> 00:39:09,453
God, my aunt.

542
00:39:11,257 --> 00:39:12,554
Gotta go, guys.

543
00:39:16,229 --> 00:39:18,789
It's 10 O' clock.
She could've called me.

544
00:39:19,565 --> 00:39:21,226
I don't know what to do with her.

545
00:39:21,534 --> 00:39:22,762
She just walked in.

546
00:39:22,835 --> 00:39:26,669
Ayesha, I agreed to house my niece,
not to become part of local gossip!

547
00:39:26,839 --> 00:39:29,569
She thinks it's ok to be
wild 'cos this is Australia!

548
00:39:31,411 --> 00:39:33,641
Has no respect for elders.

549
00:40:25,465 --> 00:40:27,296
It's called survival, Gelato.

550
00:40:27,667 --> 00:40:28,759
So what?

551
00:40:28,835 --> 00:40:30,666
This isn't India, it's Australia.

552
00:40:30,737 --> 00:40:32,432
It's a bench in Australia.

553
00:40:32,605 --> 00:40:34,300
Sounds really adventurous.

554
00:40:35,575 --> 00:40:38,408
Look, dad has a
partner in Melbourne..

555
00:40:38,478 --> 00:40:40,309
Ah! So I should leave
one dictatorship and..

556
00:40:40,379 --> 00:40:42,074
..enter another rulebook!

557
00:40:42,348 --> 00:40:44,612
Know what? Why don't I
just come back home?

558
00:40:44,684 --> 00:40:46,675
Why explore the world, right?

559
00:40:46,753 --> 00:40:48,311
Please don't do that.

560
00:40:48,988 --> 00:40:50,785
Who will do the other
courses in the world?

561
00:40:50,857 --> 00:40:52,620
Like the one in Switzerland,
on Snow Management.

562
00:40:52,692 --> 00:40:54,023
Screw you!

563
00:40:54,093 --> 00:40:56,823
We've been arguing for over two
months! I'm sick of this shit!

564
00:41:03,503 --> 00:41:05,903
I'm.. sorry, I don't want to fight.

565
00:41:07,039 --> 00:41:08,404
I just want to help you.

566
00:41:09,275 --> 00:41:12,438
Let's not talk for a few days, ok?

567
00:41:12,812 --> 00:41:14,609
How will that help, Al?

568
00:41:14,981 --> 00:41:16,608
If we don't hear
each other's voices..

569
00:41:16,682 --> 00:41:18,309
..we'll have very little left?

570
00:41:19,318 --> 00:41:20,546
No, Gulati.

571
00:41:22,955 --> 00:41:24,388
It'll make us stronger.

572
00:41:36,769 --> 00:41:38,532
Ok. Let's try this as well.

573
00:41:41,474 --> 00:41:42,873
But you're a 'nonsense person'.

574
00:41:43,676 --> 00:41:45,439
Bye, sweety.

575
00:41:45,511 --> 00:41:47,376
I love you, sweety.

576
00:41:58,090 --> 00:42:00,285
I've never felt so
pathetically poor.

577
00:42:00,560 --> 00:42:03,256
Who can afford 200 dollars a month?

578
00:42:03,496 --> 00:42:04,724
I'm screwed, man.

579
00:42:05,965 --> 00:42:09,366
Hey, I have an idea!

580
00:42:10,603 --> 00:42:12,867
You can stay where I live
if you pay advance rent.

581
00:42:13,406 --> 00:42:14,896
Six hundred for six months.

582
00:42:15,741 --> 00:42:16,833
Sorted!

583
00:42:17,443 --> 00:42:18,535
What?
- Yup.

584
00:42:18,611 --> 00:42:20,738
That's awesome. Thank you.

585
00:42:35,661 --> 00:42:37,788
Did you leave this pink
toothbrush in my bathroom?

586
00:42:37,997 --> 00:42:40,329
What?
- I did.

587
00:42:40,933 --> 00:42:43,424
Good. Come.

588
00:42:46,472 --> 00:42:49,999
Last night was sensational.
- Deja vouz!

589
00:42:50,076 --> 00:42:51,703
That's yours.

590
00:42:51,911 --> 00:42:54,573
That's the way. Don't call.

591
00:42:54,647 --> 00:42:56,842
I'll call or not.

592
00:42:58,351 --> 00:43:00,842
Were there the two of
you last night? - No, I'm..

593
00:43:00,920 --> 00:43:02,410
No one cares who you are.

594
00:43:02,488 --> 00:43:03,955
Get out.
- Excuse me?

595
00:43:04,023 --> 00:43:06,423
Are you dumb and deaf? No
one gives a shit who you are!

596
00:43:06,492 --> 00:43:07,857
She needs to take a shit!

597
00:43:07,927 --> 00:43:09,326
But.. -Why aren't you at the shack?

598
00:43:09,395 --> 00:43:10,487
I wasn't in the mood.

599
00:43:10,563 --> 00:43:11,894
I'm in the mood to cut
your wage. -Just a sec..

600
00:43:11,964 --> 00:43:13,454
You can't cut your
elder brother's pay.

601
00:43:13,499 --> 00:43:14,932
Bite me!

602
00:43:15,001 --> 00:43:16,764
You work for me. I own that shack!

603
00:43:16,836 --> 00:43:18,497
Don't make me angry, Cyrus.

604
00:43:18,738 --> 00:43:20,933
You're Cyrus? Is this your house?

605
00:43:21,307 --> 00:43:23,275
Wow! Ms. India has brains too.

606
00:43:23,309 --> 00:43:24,401
She's not your type.

607
00:43:24,477 --> 00:43:25,774
And you
- that's called a door..

608
00:43:25,845 --> 00:43:28,780
.. and if you lift those two,
you might discover walking.

609
00:43:28,848 --> 00:43:29,974
Excuse me.

610
00:43:30,016 --> 00:43:32,576
Or we can do something
else with them. - What?

611
00:43:32,652 --> 00:43:34,381
This is not a freaking motel, Cy!

612
00:43:37,456 --> 00:43:38,753
Thanks, that was butt ugly.

613
00:43:38,824 --> 00:43:39,916
Freaks, I'm Aaliya..

614
00:43:39,992 --> 00:43:41,289
Rishabh sent me here.
- Aaliya.

615
00:43:41,360 --> 00:43:42,520
Why didn't you say that earlier?

616
00:43:42,595 --> 00:43:43,857
He finally got a hot babe.

617
00:43:43,930 --> 00:43:45,830
We were expecting you..
- I'm not his babe.

618
00:43:45,898 --> 00:43:48,526
Sorry about the confusion..
got the rent?

619
00:43:49,702 --> 00:43:51,567
600 dollars.
- Are you single?

620
00:43:51,704 --> 00:43:54,673
What? - You'll need to
learn to ignore my brother.

621
00:43:54,840 --> 00:43:56,398
Can I feel that butt?

622
00:43:56,876 --> 00:44:01,245
I've handled bigger sleazes in
Delhi buses. You're nothing.

623
00:44:01,614 --> 00:44:03,445
Nads.
- Yes.

624
00:44:03,516 --> 00:44:04,983
What's a 'sleazoid'?

625
00:44:05,651 --> 00:44:08,313
Oh, by the way. I am Nadia.

626
00:44:08,387 --> 00:44:10,378
Hi.
- This feels good.

627
00:44:10,456 --> 00:44:12,321
Spank me while you're at it.

628
00:44:15,795 --> 00:44:17,524
Our house.

629
00:44:17,897 --> 00:44:19,831
The beach bed.

630
00:44:20,800 --> 00:44:22,290
Our beach shack.

631
00:44:22,368 --> 00:44:27,704
Where we rent out surfboards. Cyrus!

632
00:44:28,341 --> 00:44:30,969
My real talents emerge at the bar!

633
00:44:32,778 --> 00:44:34,575
Nadia likes pain.

634
