Butt out, Cy!

891
01:00:11,728 --> 01:00:13,559
Just take it.

892
01:00:14,998 --> 01:00:17,330
Just get some real clothes.

893
01:00:19,036 --> 01:00:23,564
She really likes you, bro,
'cos she never refuses money!

894
01:00:23,774 --> 01:00:26,242
She loves money.
- Our dead parents' money.

895
01:00:26,310 --> 01:00:27,607
And I own half of it.

896
01:00:27,678 --> 01:00:29,646
You will, once you get
out of this beer can..

897
01:00:30,347 --> 01:00:32,178
So how long were you
guys together for?

898
01:00:33,917 --> 01:00:35,009
Ten years.

899
01:00:35,085 --> 01:00:38,851
Ten! One girl! One girl! Disgusting!

900
01:00:44,995 --> 01:00:48,931
My neighbour's a strange girl..

901
01:00:50,000 --> 01:00:54,096
..with strange signs,
can't read her mind.

902
01:00:54,972 --> 01:00:58,931
My neighbour's a strange girl..

903
01:00:59,977 --> 01:01:04,038
..with strange signs,
can't read her mind.

904
01:01:05,215 --> 01:01:09,584
My life's in a strange phase..

905
01:01:09,853 --> 01:01:14,756
..And teases in strange ways.

906
01:01:15,225 --> 01:01:19,286
My life's in a strange phase..

907
01:01:19,896 --> 01:01:24,765
..And teases in strange ways.

908
01:01:25,035 --> 01:01:28,937
My neighbour's a strange girl.

909
01:01:30,040 --> 01:01:34,204
..with strange signs,
can't read her mind.

910
01:01:35,045 --> 01:01:38,913
My neighbour's a strange girl.

911
01:01:39,950 --> 01:01:44,114
..with strange signs,
can't read her mind.

912
01:01:44,955 --> 01:01:48,891
My neighbour's a strange girl.

913
01:01:49,893 --> 01:01:55,058
..with strange signs,
can't read her mind.

914
01:02:20,557 --> 01:02:21,649
Brother Javed.

915
01:02:22,325 --> 01:02:23,758
What's the menu today?

916
01:02:24,628 --> 01:02:25,856
Mutton curry and bread.

917
01:02:27,330 --> 01:02:29,298
Very funny!

918
01:02:34,738 --> 01:02:35,830
Try some!

919
01:03:00,230 --> 01:03:01,697
Come on. Come on.

920
01:03:26,590 --> 01:03:27,648
Thanks.

921
01:03:27,824 --> 01:03:28,916
Come on.

922
01:03:34,231 --> 01:03:35,323
Hey.
- Hi.

923
01:03:47,811 --> 01:03:48,869
Two.

924
01:03:49,212 --> 01:03:50,543
Thank you.

925
01:03:53,016 --> 01:03:54,813
Hey.
- Hi.

926
01:03:54,851 --> 01:03:56,113
Nads, want one?
- Sure.

927
01:04:05,595 --> 01:04:06,619
No.

928
01:04:24,114 --> 01:04:26,981
Last month's debt, this and
the next two months' rent.

929
01:04:27,050 --> 01:04:28,210
Slow down, Mr. Gates.

930
01:04:29,586 --> 01:04:30,678
Thanks, guys.

931
01:04:32,622 --> 01:04:33,714
Keep it!

932
01:04:33,924 --> 01:04:35,892
What? Enough of this shit!

933
01:04:36,159 --> 01:04:37,956
Who made you the
decision maker on the rent?

934
01:04:38,161 --> 01:04:39,560
Is he in love or are you?

935
01:04:39,629 --> 01:04:40,789
It's business, Cy.

936
01:04:42,165 --> 01:04:43,689
I keep the shack deposit.

937
01:04:44,067 --> 01:04:45,694
The rest is the
start-up cost for you two.

938
01:04:46,636 --> 01:04:47,694
Who two?

939
01:04:48,271 --> 01:04:49,568
You two.

940
01:04:49,906 --> 01:04:51,237
That's your kitchen
area from tomorrow.

941
01:04:51,308 --> 01:04:53,606
Your talent, your investment,
my place.

942
01:04:53,977 --> 01:04:56,002
Cy's the manger.
Profit splits three ways.

943
01:04:56,646 --> 01:04:57,704
Deal?

944
01:04:58,181 --> 01:04:59,273
I need a beer.

945
01:04:59,316 --> 01:05:01,648
I won't ask again. You in?

946
01:05:06,623 --> 01:05:08,147
Yes. Yes.

947
01:05:14,231 --> 01:05:15,323
Why are you doing it?

948
01:05:15,599 --> 01:05:17,123
'Cos she loves money.

949
01:05:17,200 --> 01:05:18,827
And she hates me.

950
01:05:19,236 --> 01:05:21,204
This is not business, Nads.

951
01:05:22,906 --> 01:05:25,636
Someone should have a happy ending.

952
01:05:52,168 --> 01:05:53,260
Congratulations.

953
01:05:59,743 --> 01:06:02,303
Hi.
- Aaliya Khan.

954
01:06:03,680 --> 01:06:04,772
Yes?

955
01:06:04,814 --> 01:06:07,282
Daniel Trip. I'm the
casting director on a film.

956
01:06:07,684 --> 01:06:08,810
We need an Asian actor.

957
01:06:09,686 --> 01:06:10,710
And you're good.

958
01:06:11,087 --> 01:06:14,352
Auditions have begun
and are on for two weeks.

959
01:06:17,827 --> 01:06:20,193
Congratulations
for tonight. Call me!

960
01:06:25,802 --> 01:06:27,064
Come on, girl, smile.

961
01:06:27,137 --> 01:06:28,195
You gonna call him?

962
01:06:58,835 --> 01:07:00,769
Surprise!

963
01:07:02,572 --> 01:07:03,630
Happy birthday, Al.

964
01:07:11,781 --> 01:07:13,646
How can you forget
your own birthday?

965
01:07:13,717 --> 01:07:15,048
It's called old age.

966
01:07:15,251 --> 01:07:16,616
Your momma's old!

967
01:07:16,953 --> 01:07:18,921
I love dirty talk in Hindi.

968
01:07:20,123 --> 01:07:21,954
You guys baked me a cake? How sweet!

969
01:07:22,125 --> 01:07:23,251
Aunty made it.

970
01:07:24,127 --> 01:07:26,095
He's the cook, I'm the manager!
That's the deal.

971
01:07:27,630 --> 01:07:30,326
Happy birthday to you!

972
01:07:30,700 --> 01:07:33,294
Happy birthday to you!

973
01:07:33,670 --> 01:07:36,764
Happy birthday, dear Aaliya!

974
01:07:36,940 --> 01:07:39,238
Happy birthday to you!

975
01:07:50,920 --> 01:07:52,046
Come on.

976
01:07:52,222 --> 01:07:53,883
Hey! Stop it!

977
01:08:22,819 --> 01:08:24,753
Good night, see you tomorrow.
- See you.

978
01:08:51,815 --> 01:08:52,907
Thanks.

979
01:08:55,285 --> 01:08:56,718
I completely forgot my birthday.

980
01:09:02,025 --> 01:09:03,083
You're welcome.

981
01:09:07,864 --> 01:09:08,922
What's up?

982
01:09:10,667 --> 01:09:11,759
Nothing.

983
01:09:11,935 --> 01:09:14,165
Al, something's wrong.

984
01:09:18,641 --> 01:09:21,041
I'm.. Nothing.

985
01:09:22,178 --> 01:09:23,270
Come on.

986
01:09:25,748 --> 01:09:27,739
Abhay, can you forget
everything for five minutes?

987
01:09:28,051 --> 01:09:30,713
We were never dating,
we never broke up..

988
01:09:30,854 --> 01:09:32,685
..we're just Abhay
and Aaliya. Friends.

989
01:09:32,889 --> 01:09:34,857
No expectations, no complications?

990
01:09:39,095 --> 01:09:40,187
What happened?

991
01:09:40,830 --> 01:09:42,730
I met a casting agent today..

992
01:09:42,932 --> 01:09:44,024
..he's offered me a film.

993
01:09:44,100 --> 01:09:45,590
It's big.
- That's great.

994
01:09:46,269 --> 01:09:47,759
Oh, no.
- I know.

995
01:09:48,271 --> 01:09:50,831
Your mom.. Most actors
don't get this chance.

996
01:09:51,040 --> 01:09:52,268
And I don't know when I
would get such a chance again..

997
01:09:52,642 --> 01:09:54,576
You're not sure
what's more important.

998
01:09:54,644 --> 01:09:55,702
Acting or your promise to your mom.

999
01:09:55,778 --> 01:09:57,268
I'm a jackass!

1000
01:09:57,647 --> 01:09:58,841
Why did I make that promise?

1001
01:09:59,115 --> 01:10:00,241
I thought I am getting to do a play,

1002
01:10:00,316 --> 01:10:02,716
Ayesha will never know
- it's perfect!

1003
01:10:02,986 --> 01:10:05,750
And now I get a damn International
film in Oz of all the places.

1004
01:10:06,189 --> 01:10:07,816
This doesn't even happen in films.

1005
01:10:08,725 --> 01:10:09,817
What do I do now?

1006
01:10:12,562 --> 01:10:13,654
Speak, Gelato.

1007
01:10:14,831 --> 01:10:16,822
Follow the beat of your heart!
- Meaning?

1008
01:10:20,637 --> 01:10:23,071
Why are love and happiness
different things for people?

1009
01:10:26,809 --> 01:10:29,607
You were right, you were my life.

1010
01:10:30,346 --> 01:10:31,870
Not that again..

1011
01:10:31,948 --> 01:10:33,575
Hear me out, Al.

1012
01:10:36,319 --> 01:10:40,016
I was insecure 'cos I didn't
know how someone could be..

1013
01:10:40,089 --> 01:10:42,557
..so passionate about their dreams.

1014
01:10:44,093 --> 01:10:45,185
But I do now.

1015
01:10:47,263 --> 01:10:49,288
I stood between you and your dream.

1016
01:10:49,933 --> 01:10:51,059
I made you choose.

1017
01:10:52,835 --> 01:10:53,961
That's not love.

1018
01:10:55,838 --> 01:10:56,930
That's selfishness.

1019
01:11:00,276 --> 01:11:01,675
Aunty Ayesha will understand.

1020
01:11:04,047 --> 01:11:05,139
Like me.

1021
01:11:13,056 --> 01:11:16,150
I didn't celebrate
your admission, did I?

1022
01:11:17,327 --> 01:11:18,658
Let's do it now.

1023
01:11:19,896 --> 01:11:20,954
Let's get a beer.

1024
01:11:23,099 --> 01:11:24,157
Actually..

1025
01:11:25,101 --> 01:11:26,762
Let's celebrate you first.

1026
01:11:27,737 --> 01:11:28,829
Why?

1027
01:11:29,072 --> 01:11:31,040
'Cos you found your dream, Gulati.

1028
01:11:31,608 --> 01:11:33,599
For the first time
you look happy working.

1029
01:11:34,978 --> 01:11:36,843
You always looked good in an apron!

1030
01:11:39,749 --> 01:11:40,943
Did you tell your dad?

1031
01:11:46,556 --> 01:11:47,784
I'm following the beat of my heart.

1032
01:11:49,525 --> 01:11:50,583
He'll understand too.

1033
01:11:53,997 --> 01:11:55,123
Chef Ramsay!

1034
01:12:09,979 --> 01:12:11,071
I missed you.

1035
01:12:13,850 --> 01:12:15,044
My only friend in the world!

1036
01:13:07,904 --> 01:13:09,599
So the vixen is softening.

1037
01:13:09,939 --> 01:13:11,031
She's bound to.

1038
01:13:11,107 --> 01:13:15,203
If a boy crosses seven seas to
woo her, any girl would melt!

1039
01:13:15,745 --> 01:13:19,044
It's too loose!
- Get her some boobs!

1040
01:13:19,182 --> 01:13:20,672
When are you coming back?

1041
01:13:20,850 --> 01:13:21,976
I don't know, Aunty.

1042
01:13:22,285 --> 01:13:25,118
But I will return with Aaliya.

1043
01:13:25,888 --> 01:13:27,719
No, Nads, we're just friends.

1044
01:13:27,957 --> 01:13:29,618
Finally we are un-complicated.

1045
01:13:29,826 --> 01:13:31,293
Love, relationships, hurt..

1046
01:13:32,261 --> 01:13:33,888
..one should leave
these for old-age.

1047
01:13:33,963 --> 01:13:35,089
It's too much.

1048
01:13:35,798 --> 01:13:37,231
Shut up, Cyrus.

1049
01:13:38,935 --> 01:13:41,096
Actually, you're a genius.

1050
01:13:41,771 --> 01:13:42,931
It's simple.

1051
01:13:43,005 --> 01:13:44,939
Love was getting complicated,
so you broke up.

1052
01:13:45,541 --> 01:13:46,735
Then you felt all alone..

1053
01:13:46,876 --> 01:13:48,673
..and became friends again.
Perfect! - Exactly.

1054
01:13:48,745 --> 01:13:50,940
And Abhay thinks he's..
- An ATM machine.

1055
01:13:51,581 --> 01:13:53,572
He gets no deposits, you
get to make withdrawals..

1056
01:13:53,916 --> 01:13:56,908
..of his heart, mind or time..

1057
01:13:57,120 --> 01:13:58,280
And the best part?

1058
01:13:58,888 --> 01:14:00,082
Machines don't expect anything back.

1059
01:14:01,858 --> 01:14:03,052
You're being sarcastic, right?

1060
01:14:04,160 --> 01:14:06,151
And this is why you're a genius.

1061
01:14:09,832 --> 01:14:12,164
''I love you.''

1062
01:14:13,836 --> 01:14:17,135
''It's so difficult to
spend days and nights.''

1063
01:14:17,206 --> 01:14:20,767
''There's just one thing
I want to say to you.''

1064
01:14:20,843 --> 01:14:22,743
She's smoking!

1065
01:14:23,279 --> 01:14:27,147
Gulati wanted to marry
her when he grew up.

1066
01:14:27,884 --> 01:14:29,579
I was ten, guys.

1067
01:14:29,919 --> 01:14:32,581
Hey, are you coming on
the 10th for my graduation?

1068
01:14:33,623 --> 01:14:35,921
Okay, good news! My new restaurant..

1069
01:14:35,992 --> 01:14:37,118
Our restaurant!

1070
01:14:37,994 --> 01:14:40,588
Our new restaurant
has found an investor!

1071
01:14:40,897 --> 01:14:44,298
Bad news! Meeting's on the 10th.
- Gulati.

1072
01:14:44,567 --> 01:14:46,967
Didn't tell you 'cos I
knew you'd freak out!

1073
01:14:47,203 --> 01:14:50,104
Don't friends fit
into your plans anymore?

1074
01:14:51,174 --> 01:14:52,573
Not fair!

1075
01:14:52,975 --> 01:14:54,704
You used to make
time for me earlier.

1076
01:14:55,011 --> 01:14:56,069
Not fair!

1077
01:14:58,981 --> 01:15:00,346
Yes, I've packed the pickles.

1078
01:15:00,616 --> 01:15:02,083
Hang up and save your money.

1079
01:15:02,251 --> 01:15:04,651
You're arrivingjust a
day before my graduation.

1080
01:15:04,720 --> 01:15:05,880
Abhay and Cyrus have a meeting.

1081
01:15:05,955 --> 01:15:07,286
Nadia has to manage the Shack.

1082
01:15:07,790 --> 01:15:09,052
Nobody loves me.

1083
01:15:09,892 --> 01:15:11,587
Why couldn't you come earlier?

1084
01:15:12,895 --> 01:15:14,192
I need to discuss
an important thing.

1085
01:15:14,664 --> 01:15:15,722
What happened?

1086
01:15:15,798 --> 01:15:18,096
We'll talk face to face.

1087
01:15:22,038 --> 01:15:23,130
It's kind of big.

1088
01:15:23,206 --> 01:15:26,107
Your ''big'' is usually a ''big bomb''.

1089
01:15:26,709 --> 01:15:28,267
You know I don't like surprises.

1090
01:15:28,711 --> 01:15:29,803
But..
- Aaliya Khan.

1091
01:15:30,146 --> 01:15:31,204
Just a second.

1092
01:15:31,781 --> 01:15:32,873
Gotta run, ma. Bye.

1093
01:15:37,019 --> 01:15:39,010
Nervous?
- Not at all.

1094
01:15:39,222 --> 01:15:40,917
Good, 'cos you can nail it.

1095
01:15:42,024 --> 01:15:43,787
That's what I'm nervous about.

1096
01:15:44,560 --> 01:15:47,893
And now we've reached the
end of another academic year

1097
01:15:48,197 --> 01:15:52,964
Congratulations, class of 2009.
You are all now graduates.

1098
01:15:56,105 --> 01:15:58,596
That's it Ayesha. No more courses.

1099
01:15:58,875 --> 01:16:00,103
I'm fed up of studying.

1100
01:16:00,776 --> 01:16:02,107
Thank God!

1101
01:16:03,145 --> 01:16:06,672
So what's your big surprise?

1102
01:16:07,116 --> 01:16:08,777
You've kept me in
suspense since yesterday.

1103
01:16:09,986 --> 01:16:11,613
Yes, I..

1104
01:16:14,657 --> 01:16:15,783
Gulati!

1105
01:16:19,729 --> 01:16:21,856
Thank you! Thank you! Thank you!

1106
01:16:23,766 --> 01:16:24,824
Have you told her yet?

1107
01:16:24,967 --> 01:16:26,093
I'm shitting bricks!

1108
01:16:26,802 --> 01:16:27,860
Don't worry, you'll be fine.

1109
01:16:28,137 --> 01:16:30,332
You know how she is.. -Yes.

1110
01:16:30,940 --> 01:16:32,669
Don't give her less
credit than she deserves.

1111
01:16:34,010 --> 01:16:35,102
Hey..

1112
01:16:36,212 --> 01:16:37,270
''I'll be right
here waiting for you!''

1113
01:16:38,948 --> 01:16:40,779
Chill! It's just an offer..

1114
01:16:41,183 --> 01:16:42,741
..it's not like
you've signed a contract.

1115
01:16:45,821 --> 01:16:48,688
Al..!
- So that's your big surprise.

1116
01:16:49,125 --> 01:16:50,251
Congratulations, aunty.

1117
01:16:50,626 --> 01:16:52,025
Congratulations to you too.

1118
01:16:52,728 --> 01:16:56,926
I'm happier about this
than your graduation.

1119
01:16:57,166 --> 01:17:00,135
I knew it. This
break-up wouldn't last long.

1120
01:17:00,202 --> 01:17:01,328
But how did this happen?

1121
01:17:01,837 --> 01:17:04,135
And please don't
take an eternity again..

1122
01:17:04,707 --> 01:17:05,867
..get married soon.

1123
01:17:07,944 --> 01:17:10,879
Marriage? Where did that come from?

1124
01:17:11,280 --> 01:17:13,009
Even Abhay's managed to move on.

1125
01:17:14,050 --> 01:17:15,142
Aaliya.

1126
01:17:16,686 --> 01:17:18,085
Abhay, tell her that
we're just friends.

1127
01:17:18,154 --> 01:17:19,280
We're just friends.

1128
01:17:21,691 --> 01:17:22,783
Gelato, are you..?

1129
01:17:24,627 --> 01:17:25,719
We're just friends.

1130
01:17:29,098 --> 01:17:31,760
So what was your news?

1131
01:17:33,302 --> 01:17:34,633
What was the surprise?

1132
01:17:37,673 --> 01:17:38,799
Mother, I..

1133
01:17:43,713 --> 01:17:45,977
Promises, commitments, feelings..

1134
01:17:46,282 --> 01:17:48,648
..these things mean nothing to you.

1135
01:17:49,251 --> 01:17:51,845
Don't pretend to ask after
you've signed the contract.

1136
01:17:52,922 --> 01:17:55,948
I don't mind your having dreams..

1137
01:17:57,159 --> 01:18:03,257
..but I mind that our feelings are
nothing but hurdles in your path.

1138
01:18:04,166 --> 01:18:07,795
People don't love you
because you're special Aaliya.

1139
01:18:07,970 --> 01:18:12,805
You're special because a few people
in this world love you immensely.

1140
01:18:13,075 --> 01:18:15,202
Sometimes, despite the way you are.

1141
01:18:16,212 --> 01:18:19,841
And today you proved
how foolish they are!

1142
01:18:40,236 --> 01:18:41,635
I didn't want this.

1143
01:18:43,873 --> 01:18:45,306
I just..
- You can't expect everything..

1144
01:18:46,108 --> 01:18:47,666
.. and not expect to get hurt.

1145
01:18:50,713 --> 01:18:51,771
I'm sorry.

1146
01:18:54,183 --> 01:18:55,741
I didn't want to hurt you.

1147
01:18:59,255 --> 01:19:03,692
When we broke up, I refused
to accept it as a possibility.

1148
01:19:04,960 --> 01:19:06,052
I didn't believe you.

1149
01:19:08,097 --> 01:19:09,257
That was my fault.

1150
01:19:10,266 --> 01:19:11,631
You did move on.

1151
01:19:13,803 --> 01:19:14,929
You're lucky you can.

1152
01:19:21,777 --> 01:19:23,745
Goodbye!
- Gulati?

1153
01:19:24,647 --> 01:19:25,705
I'm off.

1154
01:19:43,299 --> 01:19:48,601
Rain.. It will wash it all away.

1155
01:19:50,539 --> 01:19:55,602
Lit up, you'll see it,
a whole new way.

1156
01:19:56,145 --> 01:20:02,709
Slowly, yesterday will ebb away..

1157
01:20:03,119 --> 01:20:10,753
Slowly, making way for a new day.

1158
01:20:11,193 --> 01:20:14,754
Like a roof of sunlight..

1159
01:20:14,830 --> 01:20:18,061
Like a slip-sliding road..

1160
01:20:18,134 --> 01:20:23,094
This is but a
gentle detour on my way.

1161
01:20:24,974 --> 01:20:28,910
Like a roof of sunlight..

1162
01:20:28,978 --> 01:20:32,311
Like a slip-sliding road..

1163
01:20:32,581 --> 01:20:36,574
This is but a
gentle detour on my way.

1164
01:20:36,652 --> 01:20:40,611
''If you believe, sun is shining,
love is lighting your way.''

1165
01:20:55,538 --> 01:20:58,234
I'm sorry. And
thanks for everything.

1166
01:21:07,750 --> 01:21:12,949
Drops of realisation
trickle down on me..

1167
01:21:14,857 --> 01:21:20,318
I'm haunted by a
thirst from before..

1168
01:21:21,564 --> 01:21:28,026
But I see new clouds dancing above..

1169
01:21:28,904 --> 01:21:35,275
..kissing my forehead,
with drops of love.

1170
01:21:35,878 --> 01:21:39,211
Letting go.. it is time, I know.

1171
01:21:39,582 --> 01:21:42,779
Seasons have changed in a burst.

1172
01:21:43,018 --> 01:21:48,718
I take a small step,
perhaps my first.

1173
01:21:49,992 --> 01:21:53,587
Like a roof of sunlight..

1174
01:21:53,662 --> 01:21:56,961
Like a slip-sliding road..

1175
01:21:57,132 --> 01:22:02,764
This is but a
gentle detour on my way.

1176
01:22:04,139 --> 01:22:10,271
This is but a
gentle detour on my way.

1177
01:22:11,947 --> 01:22:13,574
I didn't choose my dream, ma..

1178
01:22:14,750 --> 01:22:15,910
..it chose me.

1179
01:22:17,653 --> 01:22:19,211
But I will not lose you for it.

1180
01:22:20,990 --> 01:22:22,855
I will walk towards but
only with you beside me..

1181
01:22:23,892 --> 01:22:25,723
And if you aren't
ready to stand by my side..

1182
01:22:25,794 --> 01:22:26,852
..then I'll wait.

1183
01:22:28,297 --> 01:22:29,696
But I won't do this without you.

1184
01:22:31,066 --> 01:22:32,931
I won't leave you alone like dad.

1185
01:22:37,573 --> 01:22:38,767
I am so sorry, Aaliya.

1186
01:22:40,576 --> 01:22:42,203
Your dream wasn't wrong, dear.

1187
01:22:43,512 --> 01:22:47,710
Your means were callous.

1188
01:23:03,666 --> 01:23:07,102
How much dough do you need
for the kitchen expansion?

1189
01:23:07,169 --> 01:23:09,535
Wow, did we make a profit?
- Buzz off.

1190
01:23:09,905 --> 01:23:10,997
Nice.

1191
01:23:11,173 --> 01:23:12,902
Now Cyrus will go on a holiday..

1192
01:23:12,975 --> 01:23:15,773
.. after which you
will expand the kitchen.

1193
01:23:15,844 --> 01:23:17,175
No one will touch this money.

1194
01:23:18,080 --> 01:23:20,640
We're going to
open a new restaurant.

1195
01:23:21,650 --> 01:23:22,742
The Investors loved
our restaurant plan.

1196
01:23:22,818 --> 01:23:23,876
The paperwork will be done tomorrow.

1197
01:23:23,952 --> 01:23:26,147
Are you serious? We got funding?

1198
01:23:26,221 --> 01:23:29,156
Does that mean I can now..
- No, Cy.

1199
01:23:29,325 --> 01:23:30,758
I hate you guys.

1200
01:23:38,267 --> 01:23:39,894
Absolutely.

1201
01:23:39,968 --> 01:23:41,936
It was my idea to open an
Indian restaurant. - Hi, Cy.

1202
01:23:42,004 --> 01:23:44,097
Here is my partner. Gelato Gulati.

1203
01:23:44,173 --> 01:23:46,198
Congratulations, man!

1204
01:23:46,275 --> 01:23:48,209
Houseful on the first
day itself. - Thanks, man.

1205
01:23:48,277 --> 01:23:49,608
No free drinks.

1206
01:24:00,689 --> 01:24:02,122
Abhay.

1207
01:24:06,795 --> 01:24:07,887
Nice place.

1208
01:24:09,698 --> 01:24:14,226
Abhay, had I known
you're so talented..

1209
01:24:14,837 --> 01:24:17,829
..I'd have thrown you out years ago.

1210
01:24:20,642 --> 01:24:21,768
I'm sorry, Papa.

1211
01:24:23,112 --> 01:24:28,982
I didn't tell you earlier
'cos even I didn't know..

1212
01:24:30,185 --> 01:24:34,918
Abhay, my dream wasn't that
you'll learn to manage my theatre..

1213
01:24:36,158 --> 01:24:38,149
..but that you'll
learn to manage your life.

1214
01:24:39,328 --> 01:24:40,625
My dream's come true.

1215
01:24:44,133 --> 01:24:45,600
You're finally on your feet..

1216
01:24:47,569 --> 01:24:48,763
..earning as well.

1217
01:24:49,772 --> 01:24:52,240
So you and Aaliya..

1218
01:24:52,307 --> 01:24:53,604
No, Papa.

1219
01:24:54,777 --> 01:24:56,005
We won't discuss that.

1220
01:24:57,146 --> 01:24:58,738
That topic is closed, please.

1221
01:24:59,915 --> 01:25:02,782
Fine, let's talk
about something else.

1222
01:25:04,353 --> 01:25:06,947
Why.. don't you get married?

1223
01:25:12,961 --> 01:25:14,223
She's cute.

1224
01:25:14,296 --> 01:25:16,787
And she'll turn eighteen soon.

1225
01:25:18,233 --> 01:25:23,330
Happiness hung from
a branch so elusive..

1226
01:25:25,274 --> 01:25:30,712
..but I leaped and
caught its fragrance.

1227
01:25:31,880 --> 01:25:38,217
So fragile, but we
inevitably slipped..

1228
01:25:39,288 --> 01:25:45,284
..but I will heal, I
will rewrite my script!

1229
01:25:46,328 --> 01:25:53,234
I can see the shore,
I see the light..

1230
01:25:53,602 --> 01:25:58,938
..new stars wink at me from the sky!

1231
01:26:04,313 --> 01:26:05,940
The flight's day after tomorrow.

1232
01:26:06,315 --> 01:26:07,782
Next Monday flight to Gold Coast.

1233
01:26:10,319 --> 01:26:15,086
By the time I realized
that my parents are right..

1234
01:26:17,226 --> 01:26:22,186
..my own daughter was standing in
front of me telling me I was wrong!

1235
01:26:25,334 --> 01:26:29,327
I was trying to protect you from
making the mistakes I had made.

1236
01:26:31,206 --> 01:26:35,267
But I forgot.. you're not like me.

1237
01:26:36,845 --> 01:26:37,869
You're much stronger.

1238
01:26:41,049 --> 01:26:42,311
Still have a knack for dialogues!

1239
01:26:43,018 --> 01:26:44,110
Why'd you quit acting?

1240
01:26:46,588 --> 01:26:47,748
Go back, Aaliya.

1241
01:26:48,056 --> 01:26:49,148
Follow your heart.

1242
01:26:53,729 --> 01:26:57,096
Like a roof of sunlight..

1243
01:26:57,165 --> 01:27:00,692
Like a slip-sliding road..

1244
01:27:00,769 --> 01:27:05,866
This is but a
gentle detour on my way.

1245
01:27:07,776 --> 01:27:11,177
Like a roof of sunlight..

1246
01:27:11,246 --> 01:27:14,807
Like a slip-sliding road..

1247
01:27:14,883 --> 01:27:20,082
This is but a
gentle detour on my way.

1248
01:27:21,857 --> 01:27:25,315
Like a roof of sunlight..

1249
01:27:25,594 --> 01:27:28,961
Like a slip-sliding road..

1250
01:27:28,997 --> 01:27:33,900
This is but a
gentle detour on my way.

1251
01:27:36,004 --> 01:27:39,531
Like a roof of sunlight..

1252
01:27:39,608 --> 01:27:42,975
Like a slip-sliding road..

1253
01:27:43,045 --> 01:27:47,744
This is but a
gentle detour on my way.

1254
01:27:50,052 --> 01:27:53,647
Like a roof of sunlight..

1255
01:27:53,722 --> 01:27:57,123
Like a slip-sliding road..

1256
01:27:57,192 --> 01:28:03,791
This is but a
gentle detour on my way.

1257
01:28:19,681 --> 01:28:20,773
Come on, Aunt Pammi.

1258
01:28:21,283 --> 01:28:23,717
You know I'm not
interested in marriage.

1259
01:28:24,252 --> 01:28:25,913
So why should I meet any more girls?

1260
01:28:25,988 --> 01:28:27,615
'Cos that's the only way!

1261
01:28:27,889 --> 01:28:32,155
Just meet them, then say 'no'!

1262
01:28:32,828 --> 01:28:33,920
Oh, please..

1263
01:28:34,696 --> 01:28:35,822
Is this seat taken?

1264
01:28:36,898 --> 01:28:37,922
Are you meeting a girl?

1265
01:28:38,700 --> 01:28:40,031
A beautiful babe.

1266
01:28:40,268 --> 01:28:42,168
Can I go now?
- Don't ever call me that.

1267
01:28:43,138 --> 01:28:45,129
She sounds like a vixen too.

1268
01:28:46,008 --> 01:28:47,066
Bye aunty!

1269
01:28:47,275 --> 01:28:50,142
I can't believe the
restaurant's completed a year.

1270
01:28:50,679 --> 01:28:53,011
Happy anniversary.
- Yes, whatever.

1271
01:28:53,882 --> 01:28:56,646
Everything began in
this shack. Thanks..

1272
01:28:56,985 --> 01:28:59,783
I owe you guys everything, or I'd
still be rotting at the taxi stand..

1273
01:28:59,855 --> 01:29:01,948
..and Cyrus would be
rotting in a beer can.

1274
01:29:02,624 --> 01:29:03,682
We're even!

1275
01:29:03,725 --> 01:29:05,693
No one owes shit!

1276
01:29:05,961 --> 01:29:07,053
A toast..!

1277
01:29:10,065 --> 01:29:11,191
To Cyrus..!

1278
01:29:11,833 --> 01:29:13,994
Who achieved nothing
in life, till today!

1279
01:29:15,237 --> 01:29:18,035
This restaurant is my first..
- And sole!

1280
01:29:19,074 --> 01:29:21,235
And soul milestone.

1281
01:29:21,777 --> 01:29:23,005
Well done, Cyrus.

1282
01:29:23,245 --> 01:29:24,337
Cheers!

1283
01:29:26,948 --> 01:29:28,074
What's a 'soul'?

1284
01:29:29,751 --> 01:29:31,013
What you can only hope for.

1285
01:29:40,996 --> 01:29:42,896
Surprise!
- Surprise!

1286
01:29:43,632 --> 01:29:44,997
She's shooting a film here.

1287
01:29:45,634 --> 01:29:46,726
Aunty Ayesha agreed.

1288
01:29:50,605 --> 01:29:52,300
Why dredge up what's over..
- Just a minute.

1289
01:29:52,841 --> 01:29:54,706
Have you been on a single
date after your break-up?

1290
01:29:58,847 --> 01:30:00,246
This isn't over yet.

1291
01:30:02,084 --> 01:30:03,176
Hi.

1292
01:30:03,552 --> 01:30:04,712
Hey.

1293
01:30:10,192 --> 01:30:13,059
I told Nads that maybe I
shouldn't.. - It's fine.

1294
01:30:18,033 --> 01:30:19,125
How are you?

1295
01:30:20,135 --> 01:30:21,193
I'm good.

1296
01:30:25,040 --> 01:30:26,132
Thank you.

1297
01:30:31,580 --> 01:30:33,605
Let's end this awkwardness,
I'm not good at it.

1298
01:30:33,648 --> 01:30:36,048
I just came to say..
- Al, it's fine.

1299
01:30:36,118 --> 01:30:37,210
No, let me say it.

1300
01:30:37,285 --> 01:30:38,912
I just came to say that..
- Al, chill.

1301
01:30:39,654 --> 01:30:40,712
I'm glad you're here.

1302
01:30:40,789 --> 01:30:41,881
Gulati, I need to say this!

1303
01:30:42,224 --> 01:30:44,590
I just want to say that
I'm really happy for you..

1304
01:30:44,659 --> 01:30:46,149
I'm very proud of you and..

1305
01:30:48,663 --> 01:30:49,755
..I'm sorry.

1306
01:30:52,734 --> 01:30:53,996
I'm really very sorry.

1307
01:30:55,537 --> 01:30:56,765
I didn't mean to hurt you.

1308
01:30:59,674 --> 01:31:01,039
So how many
restaurants do you own now?

1309
01:31:01,610 --> 01:31:02,736
Two and a half!

1310
01:31:03,545 --> 01:31:05,672
Two in Gold Coast and
one in papa's theatre.

1311
01:31:06,948 --> 01:31:08,006
Wow!

1312
01:31:08,650 --> 01:31:09,912
So you finally told him.

1313
01:31:10,819 --> 01:31:12,047
He must be so proud of you.

1314
01:31:14,589 --> 01:31:17,581
Last year's been so hectic..
- One year and forty days!

1315
01:31:19,728 --> 01:31:20,956
When did your memory improve?

1316
01:31:21,263 --> 01:31:23,629
I remember everything.
- Really?

1317
01:31:25,133 --> 01:31:26,828
I was thinking on the flight..

1318
01:31:27,235 --> 01:31:29,999
..when we first met in class..
- In the theatre.

1319
01:31:30,338 --> 01:31:33,739
Who would've imagined that we
would kiss while watching DDLJ

1320
01:31:33,809 --> 01:31:34,867
Kuch Kuch Hota Hai.

1321
01:31:34,943 --> 01:31:36,308
And then date for eight years.

1322
01:31:36,645 --> 01:31:37,703
Eight years and nine months.

1323
01:31:37,879 --> 01:31:40,677
Thanks for shitting on my nostalgia!

1324
01:31:42,184 --> 01:31:43,845
We were watching Kuch Kuch Hota Hai.

1325
01:31:45,187 --> 01:31:46,984
In fact, for the third time.

1326
01:31:48,190 --> 01:31:49,748
We had memorized the dialogues..

1327
01:31:49,825 --> 01:31:51,884
..but you were saying
them with all your heart.

1328
01:31:52,694 --> 01:31:54,252
While Shahrukh's
monologues kept going..

1329
01:31:54,763 --> 01:31:57,129
.. your horrific
impersonation got scarier.

1330
01:32:00,001 --> 01:32:01,935
I had a thumping headache!

1331
01:32:02,804 --> 01:32:04,669
But I kept saying them dialogues..

1332
01:32:04,739 --> 01:32:08,140
..so you wouldn't notice
that I was only watching you!

1333
01:32:10,312 --> 01:32:12,177
And your perfume
was driving me wild.

1334
01:32:14,583 --> 01:32:15,845
Maybe that caused the headache.

1335
01:32:17,319 --> 01:32:18,650
I think it was Lily.

1336
01:32:20,255 --> 01:32:22,587
To end your blabbering,
I suggested going home..

1337
01:32:22,657 --> 01:32:24,147
..and watching some
more Shahrukh films.

1338
01:32:25,894 --> 01:32:27,225
And something happened to you.

1339
01:32:29,664 --> 01:32:32,292
You just leaned over
and kissed me, and said..

1340
01:32:32,734 --> 01:32:37,569
'No one I know has
endured so much pain for me!'

1341
01:32:44,813 --> 01:32:45,905
Lavender!

1342
01:32:47,582 --> 01:32:48,947
The perfume was lavender.

1343
01:32:55,223 --> 01:32:56,713
Nice place, Gulati.

1344
01:32:58,960 --> 01:33:01,861
If you hadn't come here I'd
still be decaying in Delhi!

1345
01:33:02,097 --> 01:33:03,792
I would've never dared to step out.

1346
01:33:05,567 --> 01:33:07,091
So.. thank you.

1347
01:33:08,970 --> 01:33:11,996
I came here to look for you..
and found myself.

1348
01:33:13,141 --> 01:33:14,267
Say that dialogue again!

1349
01:33:21,149 --> 01:33:23,310
Seeing anyone?
- Yes.

1350
01:33:24,019 --> 01:33:25,281
Mr. Kunzru's daughter.

1351
01:33:26,087 --> 01:33:27,952
Mr. Agarwal's niece from New York.

1352
01:33:28,189 --> 01:33:30,555
Mrs. Srivastav's
''almost legal'' niece.

1353
01:33:31,593 --> 01:33:34,153
Preeti's gynecologist's
neighbor's step-daughter..

1354
01:33:34,229 --> 01:33:36,891
..who is also a gynecologist.

1355
01:33:37,098 --> 01:33:38,690
And both daughters of Mr. Wanchoo!

1356
01:33:40,735 --> 01:33:41,827
Don't ask, Al.

1357
01:33:42,570 --> 01:33:44,231
I'm going to India
tomorrow for Preeti's baby shower.

1358
01:33:44,606 --> 01:33:47,040
They're going to pounce on me
like a pack of hungry wolves!

1359
01:33:47,242 --> 01:33:49,039
Preeti's preggers?
- Don't start.

1360
01:33:49,644 --> 01:33:53,705
No. That's.. great!

1361
01:33:57,886 --> 01:33:58,978
What happened?

1362
01:34:02,190 --> 01:34:03,748
Don't resist it, Gulati.

1363
01:34:04,960 --> 01:34:06,086
Resist what?

1364
01:34:06,661 --> 01:34:07,753
Marriage.

1365
01:34:08,797 --> 01:34:10,662
Any girl would be
lucky to get your love.

1366
01:34:14,602 --> 01:34:15,694
And you?

1367
01:34:17,038 --> 01:34:18,062
Are you happy?

1368
01:34:20,208 --> 01:34:21,766
I am learning to be 'happy'.

1369
01:34:27,015 --> 01:34:28,607
You got what you wanted.

1370
01:34:30,118 --> 01:34:31,176
Yes, but..

1371
01:34:32,988 --> 01:34:34,956
Breaking things comes
easily to me, Gulati.

1372
01:34:37,792 --> 01:34:39,225
I nearly lost my mom as well.

1373
01:34:41,763 --> 01:34:43,754
All my life I
wanted to be like her..

1374
01:34:44,866 --> 01:34:46,197
..but turned out
exactly like my dad!

1375
01:34:50,205 --> 01:34:51,638
I even broke us!

1376
01:35:00,181 --> 01:35:01,648
Maybe.. I'm not meant for love.

1377
01:35:25,840 --> 01:35:28,274
'I don't want to deal
with your problems, Abhay.'

1378
01:35:28,743 --> 01:35:30,904
'This is it, I'm
breaking up with you.'

1379
01:35:31,379 --> 01:35:33,176
'Ayesha, even Abhay
has managed to move on.'

1380
01:35:33,982 --> 01:35:37,941
' When we broke up, I refused
to accept it as a possibility.'

1381
01:35:39,587 --> 01:35:42,988
'I didn't believe you.
That was my mistake.'

1382
01:35:44,926 --> 01:35:46,223
'Don't resist it, Gulati.'

1383
01:35:46,995 --> 01:35:49,190
'Resist what?
- Marriage.'

1384
01:35:50,131 --> 01:35:52,031
'Breaking things comes easily to me.

1385
01:35:53,068 --> 01:35:54,228
'I even broke us.'

1386
01:35:55,336 --> 01:35:56,826
'Maybe I'm not meant for love.'

1387
01:36:08,049 --> 01:36:09,744
I thought that I understood love.

1388
01:36:12,687 --> 01:36:13,779
But now..

1389
01:36:17,025 --> 01:36:18,151
I don't know anything.

1390
01:36:30,905 --> 01:36:32,065
I don't know what love is.

1391
01:36:37,779 --> 01:36:39,713
If you don't take
her off your wall..

1392
01:36:40,081 --> 01:36:41,708
..how will you get
her out of your heart?

1393
01:36:43,685 --> 01:36:46,313
The girl you eventually marry..
- I can't fall in love again!

1394
01:36:47,689 --> 01:36:54,185
These damn Bollywood remakes of
Devdas have ruined children's minds!

1395
01:36:54,896 --> 01:36:56,864
'Alas! She dumped me!'

1396
01:36:57,298 --> 01:37:01,166
'I dedicate my life to
scuba diving in cheap whiskey!'

1397
01:37:02,170 --> 01:37:03,967
Nothing sexy about that guy!

1398
01:37:05,073 --> 01:37:07,667
Aunty, I am not like you.
- That's the problem.

1399
01:37:11,179 --> 01:37:15,013
What if one was to leap from here?

1400
01:37:17,118 --> 01:37:20,110
They'd risk a few fractures,
brain hemorrhage and..

1401
01:37:20,188 --> 01:37:21,951
And that's the
difference between you and me,

1402
01:37:22,657 --> 01:37:24,284
I married thrice.

1403
01:37:25,093 --> 01:37:27,220
I broke my head,
suffered fractures..

1404
01:37:27,662 --> 01:37:29,687
..survived brain hemorrhage as well.

1405
01:37:30,832 --> 01:37:34,199
And I'm ready to leap again!

1406
01:37:34,369 --> 01:37:35,734
Why?

1407
01:37:36,004 --> 01:37:38,268
Because no matter how much it hurt..

1408
01:37:38,640 --> 01:37:40,870
..I never let myself be scared.

1409
01:37:41,709 --> 01:37:43,643
You have to be fearless, Abhay.

1410
01:37:44,879 --> 01:37:48,610
Or you'll end up sharing other's
happiness, in their weddings.

1411
01:37:50,251 --> 01:37:52,651
Love is inside you, dear.

1412
01:37:53,221 --> 01:37:55,917
Take your heart out of it's
shock-proof padding..

1413
01:37:55,990 --> 01:37:57,855
..and let it do it's job!

1414
01:37:58,593 --> 01:38:01,721
These tiny shocks can't hurt it!

1415
01:38:02,564 --> 01:38:04,725
And if you wanted to play so safe..

1416
01:38:05,200 --> 01:38:06,895
..why'd you fall in
love even the first time?

1417
01:38:10,705 --> 01:38:11,831
You kids..

1418
01:38:12,006 --> 01:38:16,204
..you can't want everything and
expect to not get a little hurt!

1419
01:38:37,865 --> 01:38:43,531
''It's drizzling in my thoughts..
Everything will be washed.''

1420
01:38:44,906 --> 01:38:50,003
''There will be a new ray of hope.''

1421
01:38:50,678 --> 01:38:57,049
''All the painful
memories will flow away.''

1422
01:38:57,685 --> 01:39:05,251
''There will be a new destination.
Let's go.''

1423
01:39:11,165 --> 01:39:12,996
Papa.
- Yes?

1424
01:39:14,302 --> 01:39:15,564
What?

1425
01:39:16,037 --> 01:39:17,265
Have you lost it?

1426
01:39:17,672 --> 01:39:19,264
Cy, keep it down.
You're on a film set!

1427
01:39:19,707 --> 01:39:21,072
What about me and our business?

1428
01:39:21,309 --> 01:39:23,834
We're discussing two more
restaurants with the investors.

1429
01:39:24,012 --> 01:39:26,276
I can't believe I'm
the responsible one here.

1430
01:39:26,614 --> 01:39:28,104
I get to behave like this, not you.

1431
01:39:28,650 --> 01:39:29,708
Abhay's getting married.

1432
01:39:30,018 --> 01:39:31,076
What?

1433
01:39:33,721 --> 01:39:34,847
Wow.

1434
01:39:35,323 --> 01:39:37,052
'Wow'? That's it?

1435
01:39:37,125 --> 01:39:39,753
I can't buy my Porsche 'cos of you.

1436
01:39:40,295 --> 01:39:41,660
Yeah, whatever.

1437
01:39:42,697 --> 01:39:45,188
Congratulations.. loser!

1438
01:39:46,601 --> 01:39:48,034
He told you first?

1439
01:39:49,737 --> 01:39:50,931
He didn't even call me.

1440
01:39:51,205 --> 01:39:53,298
And you're upset about that?

1441
01:39:54,842 --> 01:40:00,246
Yes, I told him to get married,
but.. he didn't tell me?

1442
01:40:10,291 --> 01:40:11,724
Why's he not answering?

1443
01:40:12,327 --> 01:40:13,624
Chicks are weird.

1444
01:40:14,162 --> 01:40:18,189
I hope the girl's a
voluptuous North Indian babe!

1445
01:40:18,566 --> 01:40:21,296
Not Abhay's type.
- Cy was talking about himself.

1446
01:40:21,936 --> 01:40:24,666
I can't believe he's getting
married. - And he didn't tell me!

1447
01:40:24,739 --> 01:40:27,105
Why? After all he's just marrying!

1448
01:40:27,241 --> 01:40:28,708
But, Ayesha, he didn't even tell me.

1449
01:40:28,876 --> 01:40:31,106
He will tell you. He must be busy.

1450
01:40:31,713 --> 01:40:32,805
Why?

1451
01:40:33,881 --> 01:40:35,348
What's the point in worrying now?

1452
01:40:35,750 --> 01:40:37,081
I'm not worried.

1453
01:40:37,352 --> 01:40:38,546
I'm happy for him.

1454
01:40:38,720 --> 01:40:39,948
But he could've called me.

1455
01:40:40,688 --> 01:40:42,087
But you broke up with him.

1456
01:40:42,223 --> 01:40:44,123
So?
- So he's moved on.

1457
01:40:44,559 --> 01:40:46,026
Not to another planet.

1458
01:40:47,662 --> 01:40:48,754
What the hell..!

1459
01:40:56,304 --> 01:40:58,738
Are you alright?
- Yes.

1460
01:40:58,873 --> 01:41:00,204
Are you sure?
- Are you deaf?

1461
01:41:00,742 --> 01:41:02,539
No, just rich and single.

1462
01:41:02,677 --> 01:41:03,769
Al..

1463
01:41:03,845 --> 01:41:05,278
I'm fine, okay!

1464
01:41:05,580 --> 01:41:06,945
No, you're in love with Abhay.

1465
01:41:18,793 --> 01:41:21,694
Ladies and gentleman, the
flight from Gold Coast to Delhi..

1466
01:41:21,763 --> 01:41:23,025
..will be now ready for boarding.

1467
01:41:23,097 --> 01:41:24,155
What will you do after going there?

1468
01:41:24,232 --> 01:41:25,324
I don't know.

1469
01:41:25,733 --> 01:41:27,257
You broke up with him.
- I know.

1470
01:41:27,735 --> 01:41:29,760
You think..
- I don't know.

1471
01:41:30,271 --> 01:41:32,865
Isn't it a little too late?
- No.

1472
01:41:34,909 --> 01:41:36,706
Maybe. I don't know.

1473
01:41:36,911 --> 01:41:37,935
Just shut up.

1474
01:41:39,213 --> 01:41:40,612
Chicks are weird.

1475
01:41:43,551 --> 01:41:45,178
Aaliya, please relax.

1476
01:41:45,553 --> 01:41:46,781
He's not answering his phone.

1477
01:41:46,854 --> 01:41:48,845
Obviously, he's
getting married today.

1478
01:41:49,056 --> 01:41:51,115
Did you try his residence number?

1479
01:42:01,736 --> 01:42:04,204
So loose?

1480
01:42:04,772 --> 01:42:06,137
Is this a blouse or a jacket?

1481
01:42:09,610 --> 01:42:11,168
I'm very high.

1482
01:42:12,246 --> 01:42:13,907
Mummy, butter chicken!

1483
01:42:13,981 --> 01:42:15,846
Why're there such few lights?

1484
01:42:15,917 --> 01:42:17,179
I've put three thousand already.

1485
01:42:17,251 --> 01:42:19,651
So double that! Where's Abhay?

1486
01:42:19,720 --> 01:42:20,914
There's no place left.

1487
01:42:21,055 --> 01:42:22,613
Put them up on my head.

1488
01:42:23,658 --> 01:42:25,853
Pick up, Pick up.. please pick up.

1489
01:42:26,327 --> 01:42:28,557
They must've booked the
honeymoon suite by now.

1490
01:42:35,570 --> 01:42:36,662
Goal!

1491
01:42:38,039 --> 01:42:40,166
Hi, Aaliya.
- Isn't that Abhay's ex?

1492
01:42:40,241 --> 01:42:41,503
Shh.. quiet!

1493
01:42:44,912 --> 01:42:46,038
Aaliya?

1494
01:42:49,550 --> 01:42:50,608
Uncle, where's Abhay?

1495
01:42:50,685 --> 01:42:51,777
He must be upstairs..

1496
01:42:54,722 --> 01:42:56,121
The vixen cometh!
- Where's Abhay?

1497
01:42:56,624 --> 01:42:58,854
Counting the last
moments of bliss in his room.

1498
01:43:01,229 --> 01:43:02,526
Aaliya..!

1499
01:43:05,066 --> 01:43:06,158
What are you doing?

1500
01:43:06,234 --> 01:43:07,531
Look at this!

1501
01:43:08,035 --> 01:43:09,127
What did I tell you?

1502
01:43:09,570 --> 01:43:10,935
But it isn't shiny, sir.

1503
01:43:11,005 --> 01:43:12,734
No, it's a damn tubelight.
- What?

1504
01:43:13,574 --> 01:43:14,700
Leave it.

1505
01:43:14,775 --> 01:43:15,833
But, ma'am, the wedding..

1506
01:43:15,910 --> 01:43:16,968
Drop it..

1507
01:43:17,044 --> 01:43:18,272
..or should I use
your scissors on you?

1508
01:43:21,949 --> 01:43:23,007
Abhay, listen..

1509
01:43:24,819 --> 01:43:26,582
God, I look like shit!

1510
01:43:26,787 --> 01:43:27,913
So do I.

1511
01:43:34,695 --> 01:43:36,128
Al..
- Shhh!

1512
01:43:41,602 --> 01:43:42,660
Abhay Gulati.

1513
01:43:43,771 --> 01:43:44,829
I love you.

1514
01:43:46,841 --> 01:43:48,536
Your grandma gave you this ring..

1515
01:43:48,609 --> 01:43:49,837
..for your wife.

1516
01:43:50,611 --> 01:43:52,135
For years it was meant for me.

1517
01:43:52,747 --> 01:43:54,840
And I ruined it with
much effort and diligence..

1518
01:43:54,916 --> 01:43:56,042
..with a little help from you.

1519
01:43:56,117 --> 01:43:57,744
But that's a minor technicality.

1520
01:43:57,818 --> 01:43:59,149
You were lost, I was immature..

1521
01:43:59,687 --> 01:44:00,813
But the point is that..

1522
01:44:00,888 --> 01:44:04,688
..the girl you're going to marry must
be a intelligent, mature person..

1523
01:44:04,759 --> 01:44:06,624
She has to be, 'cos
she's marrying you.

1524
01:44:06,894 --> 01:44:08,919
And I'm a crazy,
immature, stupid, fool..

1525
01:44:09,163 --> 01:44:10,721
..I have to be, for losing you.

1526
01:44:10,865 --> 01:44:13,197
But I've always loved
you and I always will..

1527
01:44:13,267 --> 01:44:15,201
..even if marry this girl,
who you don't even know.

1528
01:44:15,269 --> 01:44:16,634
But anyway the point is..

1529
01:44:16,938 --> 01:44:20,237
..even for a second, if you
still think you have a choice..

1530
01:44:23,044 --> 01:44:24,102
..then please..

1531
01:44:25,246 --> 01:44:26,543
..choose me.

1532
01:44:27,982 --> 01:44:29,074
Please.

1533
01:44:31,686 --> 01:44:32,812
Why?

1534
01:44:34,589 --> 01:44:37,319
'Cos you haven't watched Mr.
India twenty times with that girl.

1535
01:44:37,592 --> 01:44:40,026
She doesn't know how awfully you
bray when you sing in the loo.

1536
01:44:40,161 --> 01:44:42,857
How you know the name of every
kid on every traffic signal..

1537
01:44:42,930 --> 01:44:44,261
..even though they think you're '

1538
01:44:44,632 --> 01:44:47,123
And.. I don't have any other reason.

1539
01:44:50,938 --> 01:44:52,132
I've made up my mind, Al.

1540
01:44:55,009 --> 01:44:57,204
Is this marriage or vengeance?

1541
01:44:59,347 --> 01:45:01,042
We spent almost ten years together..

1542
01:45:03,751 --> 01:45:06,652
And were friends for
ten years before that!

1543
01:45:07,054 --> 01:45:08,146
Exactly.

1544
01:45:08,889 --> 01:45:09,947
Really?

1545
01:45:10,758 --> 01:45:13,318
Just because I turned
out to be a total moron..

1546
01:45:14,061 --> 01:45:16,222
..you'll marry any random girl?

1547
01:45:16,297 --> 01:45:17,594
She's not random.

1548
01:45:17,665 --> 01:45:19,030
Yes, she is. Who is this..

1549
01:45:20,167 --> 01:45:21,225
..Aaliya?

1550
01:45:24,605 --> 01:45:25,902
You're marrying me?

1551
01:45:27,074 --> 01:45:28,132
It's a typo!

1552
01:45:28,843 --> 01:45:30,640
No, look! It says 'Aaliya'..

1553
01:45:30,878 --> 01:45:32,004
Al..!

1554
01:45:33,981 --> 01:45:36,040
I don't need a reason to marry you.

1555
01:45:37,652 --> 01:45:40,780
I promised you no matter how..

1556
01:45:40,988 --> 01:45:45,550
..stupid, immature, mind-blowingly
moronically you behave..

1557
01:45:47,628 --> 01:45:48,925
..I won't let go.

1558
01:45:52,767 --> 01:45:54,098
How could the one who
pushed me to be brave..

1559
01:45:55,002 --> 01:45:56,128
..boldly took risks..

1560
01:45:57,571 --> 01:45:59,300
..was the 'star in her own life'..

1561
01:46:01,208 --> 01:46:02,937
..be afraid of herself today?

1562
01:46:06,347 --> 01:46:07,974
You taught me to be fearless, Al.

1563
01:46:09,183 --> 01:46:10,650
You can't give up!

1564
01:46:11,352 --> 01:46:12,683
You made us stronger.

1565
01:46:16,090 --> 01:46:17,648
And you're not like your dad..

1566
01:46:18,592 --> 01:46:19,854
.. or you wouldn't be here today.

1567
01:46:22,129 --> 01:46:23,619
You are meant for love!

1568
01:46:34,175 --> 01:46:35,301
By the way..

1569
01:46:36,343 --> 01:46:39,073
..the 'Thread
Maintenance Department' has quit!

1570
01:46:42,550 --> 01:46:43,744
I'm into spinning tops now.

1571
01:46:44,151 --> 01:46:45,778
The suckers stay on the ground!

1572
01:46:53,127 --> 01:46:54,185
Are you sure?

1573
01:46:54,261 --> 01:46:55,990
Al.

1574
01:46:56,197 --> 01:46:57,323
Eighteen years and nine months!

1575
01:46:57,598 --> 01:46:59,122
For the love of God, yes.

1576
01:47:00,267 --> 01:47:01,757
Then why are we getting married?

1577
01:47:02,570 --> 01:47:03,662
Excellent point.

1578
01:47:04,038 --> 01:47:06,006
We were married in a way!

1579
01:47:06,807 --> 01:47:08,866
When two people are together
for so long, it's a marriage!

1580
01:47:09,143 --> 01:47:10,974
This is pointless!
- Exactly.

1581
01:47:11,045 --> 01:47:12,842
'Cos here's a perfectly good thing
- Love.

1582
01:47:12,913 --> 01:47:14,312
Now let's destroy it,
piece by piece.

1583
01:47:14,582 --> 01:47:17,915
'Cos if we don't get
married Scandal! ! !

1584
01:47:17,985 --> 01:47:21,113
Just for a piece of paper that'll
tell us what we already know.

1585
01:47:21,188 --> 01:47:23,349
That we love each other.
- Exactly.

1586
01:47:24,191 --> 01:47:26,887
Or I wouldn't be spending our
honeymoon catering on your set!

1587
01:47:27,061 --> 01:47:28,153
See, true love.

1588
01:47:28,195 --> 01:47:30,060
This is not sin!

1589
01:47:30,131 --> 01:47:32,929
So please don't call
our kids weird names!

1590
01:47:33,000 --> 01:47:34,763
What? Hang on.
- But we won't have any kids.

1591
01:47:34,835 --> 01:47:36,803
Exactly..
- We will adopt puppies.

1592
01:47:37,071 --> 01:47:38,060
Then why didn't we?

1593
01:47:38,139 --> 01:47:39,629
I hate you, it's all your fault.

1594
01:47:39,707 --> 01:47:42,676
Al, breathe in, breathe out!
- I hate you.

1595
01:47:42,910 --> 01:47:44,104
I know. I love you.

1596
01:47:44,645 --> 01:47:45,873
I hate this guy.

1597
01:47:46,280 --> 01:47:47,645
Who the hell are you?

1598
01:47:47,715 --> 01:47:48,807
He's our doctor.

1599
01:47:48,949 --> 01:47:50,007
Don't touch me!

1600
01:47:50,084 --> 01:47:51,244
How else will he do the delivery?

1601
01:47:51,318 --> 01:47:52,615
I'm talking about you.

1602
01:47:52,653 --> 01:47:53,950
Please get this thing out of her.

1603
01:47:54,955 --> 01:47:56,047
Let's do it again.

1604
01:47:57,792 --> 01:47:59,191
I don't think I can
go through the trauma

1605
01:47:59,794 --> 01:48:02,228
What shit! I endured the trauma.

1606
01:48:02,830 --> 01:48:03,922
Come on.

1607
01:48:04,565 --> 01:48:05,691
No.

1608
01:48:07,101 --> 01:48:09,194
Sarah, mom is leaving you now, okay?

1609
01:48:09,270 --> 01:48:12,000
Like you left daddy.

1610
01:48:12,106 --> 01:48:13,198
What?

1611
01:48:15,109 --> 01:48:17,907
Sarah, mom loves dad so much..

1612
01:48:17,978 --> 01:48:20,708
..that she came back from
Australia to be with him.

1613
01:48:20,948 --> 01:48:22,711
After the break up.

1614
01:48:24,185 --> 01:48:25,652
It was just a little break.

1615
01:48:26,821 --> 01:48:28,254
So what does a 'little
break' mean Shah Rukh?

1616
01:48:28,322 --> 01:48:29,721
Oh shut up, Sunita!

1617
01:48:44,071 --> 01:48:48,770
And finally a whiff of fresh air..

1618
01:48:51,679 --> 01:48:56,673
.. as our bound arms
stretch themselves.

1619
01:48:59,920 --> 01:49:03,617
My heart wants to hum..

1620
01:49:03,891 --> 01:49:05,859
While he wants to sing..

1621
01:49:06,126 --> 01:49:09,687
I smile, he giggles..

1622
01:49:10,798 --> 01:49:14,029
.. powerless
against this crazy whim.

1623
01:49:14,768 --> 01:49:20,104
Distances are important too.

1624
01:49:20,975 --> 01:49:23,808
Sometimes you gotta chase space.

1625
01:49:24,144 --> 01:49:29,047
Distances are important too.

1626
01:49:30,150 --> 01:49:36,020
Distances are important too.

1627
01:49:36,690 --> 01:49:39,090
Sometimes you gotta chase space.

1628
01:49:39,560 --> 01:49:45,590
Distances are important too.

1629
01:49:49,169 --> 01:49:54,072
Such intimacy sows
seeds of distances..

1630
01:49:56,777 --> 01:50:01,714
.. don't be fooled,
these waters are not sweet.

1631
01:50:03,817 --> 01:50:04,943
Look, but don't touch; its fire..

1632
01:50:05,152 --> 01:50:07,552
..just watch it shimmer from afar..

1633
01:50:07,721 --> 01:50:15,719
..any closer and you could burn..

1634
01:50:15,996 --> 01:50:19,762
..powerless against this crazy whim.

1635
01:50:20,067 --> 01:50:25,767
Distances are important too.

1636
01:50:26,273 --> 01:50:29,106
Sometimes you gotta chase space.

1637
01:50:29,610 --> 01:50:35,105
Distances are important too.

1638
01:50:35,349 --> 01:50:40,616
Distances are important too.

1639
01:50:41,889 --> 01:50:44,255
Sometimes you gotta chase space.

1640
01:50:44,792 --> 01:50:50,753
Distances are important too.

1641
01:50:54,668 --> 01:51:04,168
I am rain and sunshine..

1642
01:51:04,244 --> 01:51:10,740
And he is a big bore.

1643
01:51:12,286 --> 01:51:14,686
Both rain but not together.

1644
01:51:14,855 --> 01:51:18,552
Life's easy with some distance.

1645
01:51:18,692 --> 01:51:22,253
We have our different worlds.

1646
01:51:23,163 --> 01:51:26,792
We are powerless
against this crazy whim.

1647
01:51:59,867 --> 01:52:05,169
Distances are important too.

1648

Sometimes you gotta chase space.

1649
01:52:09,209 --> 01:52:14,203
Distances are important too.

1650
01:52:15,182 --> 01:52:20,620
Distances are important too.

1651
01:52:21,789 --> 01:52:24,053
Sometimes you gotta chase space.

1652

1
00:01:49,790 --> 00:01:51,550
'I am Chaman Kohli.'

2
00:01:51,980 --> 00:01:54,310
'The eldest son of the 
Kohli Family in Rajouri Garden.'

3
00:01:56,270 --> 00:01:59,800
'A Hindi Professor at the 
Delhi University on weekdays.'

4
00:01:59,880 --> 00:02:02,550
'And a 30-year-old eligible 
bachelor on weekends.'

5
00:02:03,200 --> 00:02:04,970
Get lost! Get lost! 
Don't come here again.

6
00:02:05,050 --> 00:02:06,270
'Like every other Sunday..'

7
00:02:06,350 --> 00:02:09,250
'..my family and I were visiting 
a prospective girl's family.'

8
00:02:10,320 --> 00:02:12,080
'What happened was, 
my pictures in the matrimony site..'

9
00:02:12,160 --> 00:02:13,360
'..turned out to be 5 years old.'

10
00:02:15,240 --> 00:02:18,000
'The ones shoving the 
Kohli Family out now..'

11
00:02:18,080 --> 00:02:20,960
'..were not so long 
ago trying to fawn us.'

12
00:02:21,040 --> 00:02:24,390
- That's amazing. 
- So, let's get started?

13
00:02:24,470 --> 00:02:25,930
What do you do, son?

14
00:02:26,900 --> 00:02:28,460
He does Whatsapp.

15
00:02:30,180 --> 00:02:32,500
Don't we all!

16
00:02:32,580 --> 00:02:35,780
- There, that's my younger daughter. 
- Come..

17
00:02:37,310 --> 00:02:39,030
Come here, dear.

18
00:02:43,620 --> 00:02:47,470
Meet the Kohli Family, 
he's the eldest son.

19
00:02:48,860 --> 00:02:50,580
Have a seat. Come here.

20
00:02:52,860 --> 00:02:55,820
That's my eldest daughter and her son.

21
00:02:55,900 --> 00:02:59,100
Go and say hello to uncle, son.

22
00:02:59,180 --> 00:03:00,950
- Come on, son. 
- Very good!

23
00:03:01,860 --> 00:03:02,910
Good boy.

24
00:03:05,540 --> 00:03:06,540
What's your name?

25
00:03:06,940 --> 00:03:07,970
Bittu!

26
00:03:14,620 --> 00:03:15,420
Frauds!

27
00:03:15,500 --> 00:03:16,780
You post a handsome 
looking picture of him..

28
00:03:16,860 --> 00:03:17,980
..but he turned out to be a bald guy.

29
00:03:18,060 --> 00:03:19,580
- You bloody.. 
- Get lost!

30
00:03:19,820 --> 00:03:21,980
That's my younger brother, Goldie.

31
00:03:22,060 --> 00:03:25,820
A full time idler who 
is pursuing a master's degree.

32
00:03:26,060 --> 00:03:27,980
Well, just for the heck of it.

33
00:03:28,060 --> 00:03:29,140
Stop it, Goldie.

34
00:03:29,220 --> 00:03:32,580
- Bloody hoggers. 
- Here's your cheap Samosa, oldie!

35
00:03:32,660 --> 00:03:34,340
Meet the Papa Kohli.

36
00:03:34,420 --> 00:03:36,620
A clerk at Delhi 
Municipal Cooperation.

37
00:03:36,880 --> 00:03:38,940
In the past five years, 
his hair has turned grey..

38
00:03:39,020 --> 00:03:40,420
..trying to find a match for me.

39
00:03:40,500 --> 00:03:41,260
You are an oldie!

40
00:03:41,340 --> 00:03:43,900
- Your son is an oldie and a baldie! 
- Oh really?

41
00:03:43,980 --> 00:03:45,540
Don't you have a mirror at home?

42
00:03:45,620 --> 00:03:47,160
Where's your hair, you baldie!

43
00:03:47,240 --> 00:03:48,450
That's my mom.

44
00:03:48,530 --> 00:03:52,030
She still believes that I am quite 
handsome, even if the world doesn't.

45
00:03:52,110 --> 00:03:54,940
Even after 50 rejections, 
she hasn't lost hope.

46
00:03:55,020 --> 00:03:59,060
- Baldie! Baldie! Baldie! 
- All of you are so gross!

47
00:03:59,140 --> 00:03:59,980
- You.. 
- You..

48
00:04:00,060 --> 00:04:01,100
- You.. 
- Come back.

49
00:04:01,180 --> 00:04:02,820
- You.. 
- Mummy, let's go.

50
00:04:02,900 --> 00:04:04,660
- Don't come here again. 
- Come on, get lost!

51
00:04:04,740 --> 00:04:06,460
- Come on, get inside. 
- You get lost from here.

52
00:04:06,540 --> 00:04:09,180
I'll make you go bald if 
you ever bring a proposal again.

53
00:04:09,260 --> 00:04:12,660
- Stop! Let me put a jinx on her. 
- Come on, let's go from here.

54
00:04:12,740 --> 00:04:15,060
- Go ahead. Come on. 
- Let me put a jinx on her.

55
00:04:15,140 --> 00:04:18,740
May every male in your 
family be forever bald.

56
00:04:27,060 --> 00:04:29,820
Please don't ask us to meet 
such disgusting families again.

57
00:04:29,900 --> 00:04:32,260
I agree. They looked 
like a family of hooligans.

58
00:04:32,340 --> 00:04:34,300
- It is not so. - My son has 
a narrow escape. Good riddance.

59
00:04:34,380 --> 00:04:36,180
You know so many people. 
Why can't you find us a good match?

60
00:04:36,260 --> 00:04:37,380
What is this?

61
00:04:38,420 --> 00:04:40,540
Did a crow do that or a pigeon?

62
00:04:40,620 --> 00:04:42,900
- What? 
- Shit.

63
00:04:42,980 --> 00:04:46,020
- Do you have to say that? 
- But it is shit. Have a look.

64
00:04:46,100 --> 00:04:47,900
Oh, I got it.

65
00:04:47,980 --> 00:04:49,900
- Rajni is behind this. 
- This shit?

66
00:04:49,980 --> 00:04:53,180
- No, black magic. - Come on, 
how do you expect Rajni to sit here?

67
00:04:53,260 --> 00:04:54,660
You might think that 
she is very naive..

68
00:04:54,740 --> 00:04:56,500
..but she keeps doing 
black magic all the time.

69
00:04:56,580 --> 00:04:57,500
Whatever.

70
00:04:57,580 --> 00:05:00,460
- Brother, please introduce us 
to Mr. Shastri. - Okay.

71
00:05:00,540 --> 00:05:04,580
He predicted that Trump 
would be America's Prime Minister.

72
00:05:04,660 --> 00:05:05,580
And it came true.

73
00:05:05,660 --> 00:05:07,740
Mummy, he's the President, 
not the Prime Minister.

74
00:05:08,340 --> 00:05:09,380
He is something, right?

75
00:05:09,460 --> 00:05:11,900
- Don't argue with me, Goldie. 
- You keep crushing the candies.

76
00:05:11,980 --> 00:05:14,780
- This isn't Candy Crush, papa. 
- He behaves as if he is some minister.

77
00:05:16,620 --> 00:05:22,660
Look, his planetary positions 
bypassing the wedding platform..

78
00:05:22,740 --> 00:05:25,740
..will take a shortcut 
through asceticism..

79
00:05:25,820 --> 00:05:28,140
..and lead him directly to Moksa.

80
00:05:30,420 --> 00:05:31,180
Great.

81
00:05:31,500 --> 00:05:32,260
Amazing.

82
00:05:33,940 --> 00:05:34,980
That means everything is fine.

83
00:05:35,100 --> 00:05:39,980
This means if he doesn't 
get married before he turns 31..

84
00:05:41,020 --> 00:05:44,060
..then he will forever 
lead an ascetic life.

85
00:05:47,860 --> 00:05:49,420
In English, it's called..

86
00:05:49,500 --> 00:05:53,420
- Celebrate. 
- Not celebrate, celibate.

87
00:05:55,140 --> 00:05:56,980
- We will celebrate. 
- What?

88
00:05:57,060 --> 00:05:58,940
Why will we celebrate?

89
00:05:59,020 --> 00:06:01,300
It's not celebrate, it's celibate.

90
00:06:01,380 --> 00:06:04,780
This means he will 
stay single all his life.

91
00:06:04,860 --> 00:06:06,540
He will never get married.

92
00:06:06,780 --> 00:06:07,940
- What? 
- Yes.

93
00:06:08,640 --> 00:06:09,900
What are you saying, Guruji?

94
00:06:09,980 --> 00:06:13,180
It's not me, 
his planetary positions suggest that.

95
00:06:13,260 --> 00:06:14,140
Please don't put this on me.

96
00:06:14,220 --> 00:06:16,860
- This is so wrong. 
- No..

97
00:06:16,940 --> 00:06:19,620
- Whether it's wrong or right, 
it is what is it is. - Don't cry, Guddi.

98
00:06:19,700 --> 00:06:21,260
- This is a big thing. 
- Mummy..

99
00:06:21,340 --> 00:06:22,660
- What is trhis? 
- He is my eldest son.

100
00:06:22,740 --> 00:06:23,580
Please don't cry.

101
00:06:23,660 --> 00:06:24,620
- Eldest or youngest doesn't matter. 
- How will the youngest one..

102
00:06:24,700 --> 00:06:25,900
- Please, don't cry.. 
- ..get married if he doesn't?

103
00:06:25,980 --> 00:06:27,780
- Please calm her down. 
- Every mother has a dream..

104
00:06:27,860 --> 00:06:29,740
- ..of getting her son married. - Please 
don't cry. I am begging you not to.

105
00:06:29,820 --> 00:06:31,540
- Is there a solution? 
- There is.

106
00:06:32,140 --> 00:06:36,340
Get him married before he turns 31.

107
00:06:36,420 --> 00:06:37,820
This is the solution.

108
00:06:38,100 --> 00:06:39,420
Okay.

109
00:06:39,620 --> 00:06:41,340
That can be done.

110
00:06:42,660 --> 00:06:44,180
It's okay, son. Okay?

111
00:06:44,260 --> 00:06:45,860
Give the offerings to everyone.

112
00:06:45,940 --> 00:06:47,940
- Celebrate. 
- Celebrate.

113
00:06:48,020 --> 00:06:50,420
"My nose ring is trying 
to say something.."

114
00:06:51,440 --> 00:06:52,420
Come on, man.

115
00:06:53,980 --> 00:06:56,580
This is Joginder's fault.

116
00:06:56,660 --> 00:06:59,660
Mummy, it's the fault of 
that 5-year-old picture and the cap.

117
00:06:59,740 --> 00:07:02,220
It's not like we love to lie.

118
00:07:03,060 --> 00:07:05,140
No one's ready to meet a bald guy.

119
00:07:05,350 --> 00:07:10,020
I mean that once they meet the boy, 
they might like him, his family.

120
00:07:10,100 --> 00:07:11,500
And things might eventually work out.

121
00:07:11,830 --> 00:07:14,740
Someone tell me what's 
the use of hair anyway.

122

They are useless, 
just like fingernails.

123
00:07:18,740 --> 00:07:21,020
He is a good guy. 
He has a government job.

124
00:07:21,100 --> 00:07:22,900
He is a professor in college. 
What else do they want?

125
00:07:22,980 --> 00:07:24,180
Don't worry.

126

Nirmala has some herbal oil.

127
00:07:26,300 --> 00:07:27,780
Apply that and you will 
have hair sprouting in three days.

128
00:07:27,860 --> 00:07:30,340
- I guarantee that. 
- The hair oil won't help.

129
00:07:31,100 --> 00:07:33,380
I think you should 
go for hair transplant.

130
00:07:33,460 --> 00:07:35,540
Don't you dare go for 
hair transplant, Chaman.

131
00:07:35,620 --> 00:07:37,500
